engChrName: These settings are for checking mob placement during day/evening/night. Remove these once they are no longer needed.
engSearchText:
These settings are for checking mob placement
during day/evening/night. Remove these once they
are no longer needed.
jpnChrName: 昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。 ※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
昼・夕・夜のモブ配置確認用です。
※不要になりましたら削除をお願いいたします。

engChrName: I noticed things have calmed down finally. Thank the Goddess. I wonder if the cops were actually useful for once?
engSearchText:
I noticed things have calmed down finally. Thank
the Goddess. I wonder if the cops were actually useful
for once?
jpnChrName: 昨日までみたいに物騒なトラブルが減って 助かるが……昨晩警察が動いていたのと関係あるのか？
jpnSearchText:
昨日までみたいに物騒なトラブルが減って
助かるが……昨晩警察が動いていたのと関係あるのか？

engChrName: There's still a lot to do with the festival, but now I feel a bit more confident about making it through it all in one piece.
engSearchText:
There's still a lot to do with the festival, but now I
feel a bit more confident about making it through it
all in one piece.
jpnChrName: 大きな催しだから大変な事に変わりはないが、 改めて最後まで頑張るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
大きな催しだから大変な事に変わりはないが、
改めて最後まで頑張るとしよう。

engChrName: It probably doesn't hurt that with the sightseeing airships flying around, folks on the ground are paying more attention to the sky.
engSearchText:
It probably doesn't hurt that with the sightseeing
airships flying around, folks on the ground are paying
more attention to the sky.
jpnChrName: 遊覧している飛行船見たさに、 注意が上に行ってしまう人もいるだろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
遊覧している飛行船見たさに、
注意が上に行ってしまう人もいるだろうしな。

engChrName: I saw that the cops've been more active around here lately, so I got curious and decided to ask what was up.
engSearchText:
I saw that the cops've been more active around here
lately, so I got curious and decided to ask what
was up.
jpnChrName: 警察の人たちが動いているみたいだから 試しに聞いてみれば……
jpnSearchText:
警察の人たちが動いているみたいだから
試しに聞いてみれば……

engChrName: They wouldn't tell me much, but it sounds like there's something bad going around the city that's causing problems.
engSearchText:
They wouldn't tell me much, but it sounds like there's
something bad going around the city that's
causing problems.
jpnChrName: 詳しくは教えてくれなかったが、 何やら問題のある品が流通していたとか何とか……
jpnSearchText:
詳しくは教えてくれなかったが、
何やら問題のある品が流通していたとか何とか……

engChrName: With all the fights that've been breaking out, I'd bet they're after what's making people go nuts.
engSearchText:
With all the fights that've been breaking out, I'd bet
they're after what's making people go nuts.
jpnChrName: 確かに最近のゴタゴタした感じを見ると、 そういうのがあってもおかしくない感じはしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
確かに最近のゴタゴタした感じを見ると、
そういうのがあってもおかしくない感じはしたよ。

engChrName: I heard from the cops that folks around town have been getting, uh, rowdy lately.
engSearchText:
I heard from the cops that folks around town have
been getting, uh, rowdy lately.
jpnChrName: 警察からも聞いたが、どうも近頃は 途中から興奮して荒れる奴も多いとか。
jpnSearchText:
警察からも聞いたが、どうも近頃は
途中から興奮して荒れる奴も多いとか。

engChrName: Around here, at least, people are going feral over parking spaces.
engSearchText:
Around here, at least, people are going feral over
parking spaces.
jpnChrName: 駐車場でも、駐車スペースを巡っての 殴り合いが何度か起きているし……
jpnSearchText:
駐車場でも、駐車スペースを巡っての
殴り合いが何度か起きているし……

engChrName: I'll try my best to hang in there until the end of the festival, but to tell you the truth, I'm at the end of my rope physically.
engSearchText:
I'll try my best to hang in there until the end of the
festival, but to tell you the truth, I'm at the end of my
rope physically.
jpnChrName: 催しが終わるまでは責任持って 頑張りたいが……正直体力の限界だ。
jpnSearchText:
催しが終わるまでは責任持って
頑張りたいが……正直体力の限界だ。

engChrName: I just need it all to be over so I can take a dip in the hamam and recharge... *sigh*
engSearchText:
I just need it all to be over so I can take a dip in the
hamam and recharge... *sigh*
jpnChrName: とっとと終わらせてハマムで リフレッシュしてぇなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
とっとと終わらせてハマムで
リフレッシュしてぇなぁ……

engChrName: With all the cars here for the festival, running these lots is tough. We're seeing more and more accidents and burglaries.
engSearchText:
With all the cars here for the festival, running these
lots is tough. We're seeing more and more accidents
and burglaries.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の影響で車も増えたが……駐車場も大変でな。 最近は事故や車上荒らしも多くなっている。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の影響で車も増えたが……駐車場も大変でな。
最近は事故や車上荒らしも多くなっている。

engChrName: Not that tourists didn't blunder into trouble before, but these last few days have seen a real uptick in rough types of all sorts.
engSearchText:
Not that tourists didn't blunder into trouble before,
but these last few days have seen a real uptick in
rough types of all sorts.
jpnChrName: 観光客絡みの面倒事自体は前からあるが、 ここ数日は特に気性の荒い奴が多くてなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
観光客絡みの面倒事自体は前からあるが、
ここ数日は特に気性の荒い奴が多くてなぁ……

engChrName: Don't get me started on nighttime, when people have dinner in their cars and just chuck garbage out the windows!
engSearchText:
Don't get me started on nighttime, when people
have dinner in their cars and just chuck
garbage out the windows!
jpnChrName: 特に夜になると……車の中で宴会して、 ゴミを窓から捨てる奴までいやがる。
jpnSearchText:
特に夜になると……車の中で宴会して、
ゴミを窓から捨てる奴までいやがる。

engChrName: Would it kill those people to spare a thought for those of us who actually have to run these places? Seriously.
engSearchText:
Would it kill those people to spare a thought for
those of us who actually have to run these places?
Seriously.
jpnChrName: まったく、管理する側の身にもなれってんだ。
jpnSearchText: まったく、管理する側の身にもなれってんだ。

engChrName: This parking lot is public, so tourists staying at places without their own parking and whatnot get directed to park here.
engSearchText:
This parking lot is public, so tourists staying at places
without their own parking and whatnot get directed
to park here.
jpnChrName: ここの駐車場は共有だからな、宿泊施設などに 駐車場がない旅行者はこっちに案内している。
jpnSearchText:
ここの駐車場は共有だからな、宿泊施設などに
駐車場がない旅行者はこっちに案内している。

engChrName: With all of the tax revenue and investments pouring into the city, these sorts of spaces are freely available to everybody, which is nice.
engSearchText:
With all of the tax revenue and investments pouring
into the city, these sorts of spaces are freely available
to everybody, which is nice.
jpnChrName: ここは投資も税収も潤沢だしな。 こういう共有エリアは皆無料なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここは投資も税収も潤沢だしな。
こういう共有エリアは皆無料なんだ。

engChrName: Unfortunately, with so many tourists coming here by car, it's only a matter of time before we run out of parking spaces.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, with so many tourists coming here by
car, it's only a matter of time before we run out of
parking spaces.
jpnChrName: まあ……それにしても最近は旅行者の車も増えすぎて そろそろスペースの余裕も無くなってね……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……それにしても最近は旅行者の車も増えすぎて
そろそろスペースの余裕も無くなってね……

engChrName: Welcome to Tharbad! I'll be sure to look after your truck while it's parked here.
engSearchText:
Welcome to Tharbad! I'll be sure to look after your
truck while it's parked here.
jpnChrName: サルバッドへようこそ。 君らの車は責任を持って預かるよ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドへようこそ。
君らの車は責任を持って預かるよ。

engChrName: We have a train station, but ever since cars got popular in the Central East, a good number of visitors chose to come by those.
engSearchText:
We have a train station, but ever since cars got
popular in the Central East, a good number of visitors
chose to come by those.
jpnChrName: 駅もあるが、中東方面も導力車が普及してきたしな、 今じゃあ結構な割合の旅行者が車で来るんだ。
jpnSearchText:
駅もあるが、中東方面も導力車が普及してきたしな、
今じゃあ結構な割合の旅行者が車で来るんだ。

engChrName: As a result, there are more parking lots around here than even just a couple years ago. But more cars means...more work. *sigh*
engSearchText:
As a result, there are more parking lots around here
than even just a couple years ago. But more cars
means...more work. *sigh*
jpnChrName: だから駐車場も数年前に拡張したんだが…… 車が増えた分の苦労も多くてね。
jpnSearchText:
だから駐車場も数年前に拡張したんだが……
車が増えた分の苦労も多くてね。

engChrName: Oh, well. We coordinate with the local police, so you all can rest assured that your truck is in safe hands here.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. We coordinate with the local police, so you
all can rest assured that your truck is in safe
hands here.
jpnChrName: まあ、警察とも連携できるようにしてるし、 皆の車はしっかり守るから安心してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、警察とも連携できるようにしてるし、
皆の車はしっかり守るから安心してくれ。

engChrName: Thanks to Edith's police stepping in and helping out, the situation has calmed down a little.
engSearchText:
Thanks to Edith's police stepping in and helping
out, the situation has calmed down a little.
jpnChrName: 首都警察と共同で処理を行った事で、 昨日の事件の状況は落ち着いてきました。
jpnSearchText:
首都警察と共同で処理を行った事で、
昨日の事件の状況は落ち着いてきました。

engChrName: Personally, though, I'm still on edge.
engSearchText: Personally, though, I'm still on edge.
jpnChrName: 気が気では無い状況ですね。
jpnSearchText: 気が気では無い状況ですね。

engChrName: I still plan to take part in the Carnal Cavalcade and will be getting ready for it soon.
engSearchText:
I still plan to take part in the Carnal Cavalcade and
will be getting ready for it soon.
jpnChrName: ですので、この後は予定通りフォクシーパレードの 準備に向かおうと思うのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ですので、この後は予定通りフォクシーパレードの
準備に向かおうと思うのですが……

engChrName: But...I can't say I'm quite as excited as I might be, having to provide security from inside the parade.
engSearchText:
But...I can't say I'm quite as excited as I might be,
having to provide security from inside the parade.
jpnChrName: パレードの内側からの警備も 気が抜けない状況になってしまいましたね。
jpnSearchText:
パレードの内側からの警備も
気が抜けない状況になってしまいましたね。

engChrName: With the help of the Edith police, it seems like we've managed to get things under control after last night's events.
engSearchText:
With the help of the Edith police, it seems like we've
managed to get things under control after last
night's events.
jpnChrName: 昨晩の事件は、首都警察と共同で 順調に処理されているようですが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の事件は、首都警察と共同で
順調に処理されているようですが……

engChrName: That doesn't mean the work of we officers of the peace is over, though.
engSearchText:
That doesn't mean the work of we officers of the
peace is over, though.
jpnChrName: ともあれ私達巡査は、引き続き街の 警備に当たる他ありません。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ私達巡査は、引き続き街の
警備に当たる他ありません。

engChrName: Even with that incident behind us, the film festival could still attract trouble.
engSearchText:
Even with that incident behind us, the film festival
could still attract trouble.
jpnChrName: 昨晩にできる限りの対処はしましたが、 映画祭でトラブルが起きる可能性はありますので。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩にできる限りの対処はしましたが、
映画祭でトラブルが起きる可能性はありますので。

engChrName: I had to confiscate literally every piece of unauthorized merchandise that specialty shop had out on display.
engSearchText:
I had to confiscate literally every piece of
unauthorized merchandise that specialty shop had out
on display.
jpnChrName: セレクトショップに陳列されていた 未認可の商品は一通り回収しました……
jpnSearchText:
セレクトショップに陳列されていた
未認可の商品は一通り回収しました……

engChrName: The staff were very apologetic about the whole thing. It seems that they weren't informed about what it was they were handling.
engSearchText:
The staff were very apologetic about the whole thing.
It seems that they weren't informed about what it was
they were handling.
jpnChrName: やはりお店の関係者も詳しい事は知らされていなかった 模様で、酷く悔やんでいました。
jpnSearchText:
やはりお店の関係者も詳しい事は知らされていなかった
模様で、酷く悔やんでいました。

engChrName: Apparently the vendor who originally sold it was going around to each store, taking advantage of the film festival campaign.
engSearchText:
Apparently the vendor who originally sold it was
going around to each store, taking advantage of the
film festival campaign.
jpnChrName: どうやら、映画祭のキャンペーンに乗じて 各所に売り込まれていたようで……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら、映画祭のキャンペーンに乗じて
各所に売り込まれていたようで……

engChrName: The nerve of them, tricking innocent stores into circulating such dangerous goods! Justice must be met.
engSearchText:
The nerve of them, tricking innocent stores into
circulating such dangerous goods! Justice must
be met.
jpnChrName: 一般のお店を巻き込んで、危険なものを 流通させるなんて……許せません。
jpnSearchText:
一般のお店を巻き込んで、危険なものを
流通させるなんて……許せません。

engChrName: I might still be performing security while out there, but that doesn't mean I won't be giving it my all to dance as best as I can.
engSearchText:
I might still be performing security while out there,
but that doesn't mean I won't be giving it my all to
dance as best as I can.
jpnChrName: 警備の為とはいえ、ゴッチ監督のパレードで みっともない真似をする訳にはいかないわ。
jpnSearchText:
警備の為とはいえ、ゴッチ監督のパレードで
みっともない真似をする訳にはいかないわ。

engChrName: After all, this is Mr. Gotti's parade we're talking about. I can't go out there making a fool of myself in front of someone like him!
engSearchText:
After all, this is Mr. Gotti's parade we're
talking about. I can't go out there making a fool of
myself in front of someone like him!
jpnChrName: 少しでも完成度を高められるように 私も全力を尽くしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
少しでも完成度を高められるように
私も全力を尽くしましょう。

engChrName: I didn't imagine Police HQ would get so involved in something like this, but here we are.
engSearchText:
I didn't imagine Police HQ would get so involved in
something like this, but here we are.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、まさか警察本部にまで 手回しされるとは思いませんでした。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、まさか警察本部にまで
手回しされるとは思いませんでした。

engChrName: But still! They're letting me take part in the parade, which is wonderful! It's such an honor.
engSearchText:
But still! They're letting me take part in the parade,
which is wonderful! It's such an honor.
jpnChrName: でも、映画祭のパレードに参加させて 貰えるなんて光栄な事だもの。
jpnSearchText:
でも、映画祭のパレードに参加させて
貰えるなんて光栄な事だもの。

engChrName: It's a lot to do on top of my security duties, but you can be sure I'll take both jobs seriously.
engSearchText:
It's a lot to do on top of my security duties, but you
can be sure I'll take both jobs seriously.
jpnChrName: 警備の任務と合わせて、 誠心誠意取り組ませてもらいますね。
jpnSearchText:
警備の任務と合わせて、
誠心誠意取り組ませてもらいますね。

engChrName: It's a huge honor, being invited to perform in the Carnal Cavalcade. I'm so flattered you would ever think to ask me.
engSearchText:
It's a huge honor, being invited to perform in the
Carnal Cavalcade. I'm so flattered you would ever
think to ask me.
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレードの出演に 誘ってもらえるだなんて光栄でした。
jpnSearchText:
フォクシーパレードの出演に
誘ってもらえるだなんて光栄でした。

engChrName: But unfortunately, I can't just take the day off from my duties with the festival to go dancing. I'm really sorry.
engSearchText:
But unfortunately, I can't just take the day off from
my duties with the festival to go dancing. I'm
really sorry.
jpnChrName: ですが、明日は映画祭の警備がありますから…… 本当にごめんなさいね。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、明日は映画祭の警備がありますから……
本当にごめんなさいね。

engChrName: I always thought that Officer Kelvin didn't take his job as seriously as he needed to, but this time he's gone too far.
engSearchText:
I always thought that Officer Kelvin didn't take his
job as seriously as he needed to, but this time he's
gone too far.
jpnChrName: ケルビン巡査……彼の事は前から 不真面目だとは思っていたのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ケルビン巡査……彼の事は前から
不真面目だとは思っていたのですが……

engChrName: He outright abandoned his post! Can you believe it? I definitely need to have a word with the precinct about it later.
engSearchText:
He outright abandoned his post! Can you believe it?
I definitely need to have a word with the precinct
about it later.
jpnChrName: それでも流石に持ち場を放棄するなんて初めてです。 流石に上司に言った方が良さそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
それでも流石に持ち場を放棄するなんて初めてです。
流石に上司に言った方が良さそうですね。

engChrName: I cut him some slack before, knowing he was new and needed to get used to the job, but I can't look past dereliction of duty.
engSearchText:
I cut him some slack before, knowing he was new and
needed to get used to the job, but I can't look past
dereliction of duty.
jpnChrName: 今までは着任したてで不慣れだろうし、 大目に見ていましたが、流石に……
jpnSearchText:
今までは着任したてで不慣れだろうし、
大目に見ていましたが、流石に……

engChrName: Tharbad's my home, so my work here feels fairly personal sometimes.
engSearchText:
Tharbad's my home, so my work here feels fairly
personal sometimes.
jpnChrName: 私などにとっては、サルバッドは 地元でもありますからね。
jpnSearchText:
私などにとっては、サルバッドは
地元でもありますからね。

engChrName: It's all the more reason I'm trying extra hard to carry out my duties while such an enormous event is going on.
engSearchText:
It's all the more reason I'm trying extra hard to carry
out my duties while such an enormous event is
going on.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、この一大イベントが終わるまで 責任を持って任務に励みたいですが……
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、この一大イベントが終わるまで
責任を持って任務に励みたいですが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, not all of my colleagues in the force are quite as...diligent, which makes work that much harder for me.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, not all of my colleagues in the force
are quite as...diligent, which makes work that much
harder for me.
jpnChrName: 同僚に責任感の無い人もいるもので、 正直困ったものです。
jpnSearchText:
同僚に責任感の無い人もいるもので、
正直困ったものです。

engChrName: If everybody just did their jobs, I probably wouldn't have so much on my plate. Too much to ask for, I suppose...
engSearchText:
If everybody just did their jobs, I probably wouldn't
have so much on my plate. Too much to ask for,
I suppose...
jpnChrName: せめて全員がちゃんと仕事をしていれば、 負担も多少は減ったかもしれないのに……
jpnSearchText:
せめて全員がちゃんと仕事をしていれば、
負担も多少は減ったかもしれないのに……

engChrName: Those sorts of stalls are always a thorn in our side. They're so slippery that it's difficult for us to really crack down on them.
engSearchText:
Those sorts of stalls are always a thorn in our side.
They're so slippery that it's difficult for us to really
crack down on them.
jpnChrName: あの手の屋台は厄介でしてね…… 徹底的に取り締まる事は難しいんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの手の屋台は厄介でしてね……
徹底的に取り締まる事は難しいんですよ。

engChrName: When someone files a criminal complaint, that's when we can really lay down the law on them, which is something, at least.
engSearchText:
When someone files a criminal complaint, that's
when we can really lay down the law on them, which
is something, at least.
jpnChrName: ですが、被害届があれば 少なからず手を打つ事は出来ます。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、被害届があれば
少なからず手を打つ事は出来ます。

engChrName: It'll have to wait until after the festival, but you can be sure I'll be recommending he's at least warned, if not outright removed.
engSearchText:
It'll have to wait until after the festival, but you can be
sure I'll be recommending he's at least warned, if not
outright removed.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が終わった頃になりますが…… 厳重注意か屋台撤去の勧告をしてみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が終わった頃になりますが……
厳重注意か屋台撤去の勧告をしてみましょう。

engChrName: Tharbad's police force has never had to deal with an event of this scale before.
engSearchText:
Tharbad's police force has never had to deal with an
event of this scale before.
jpnChrName: サルバッド警察としても、この規模の イベント対応は初めてです。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド警察としても、この規模の
イベント対応は初めてです。

engChrName: Everyone's on edge as a result. I wish my fellow officers could ease up a little, but I do understand.
engSearchText:
Everyone's on edge as a result. I wish my fellow
officers could ease up a little, but I do understand.
jpnChrName: 皆もいくらか緊張していて…… もう少し余裕を持てたら良いのですが。
jpnSearchText:
皆もいくらか緊張していて……
もう少し余裕を持てたら良いのですが。

engChrName: We have help from other precincts, but at the end of the day, it's on us local police to do our best to keep this city safe.
engSearchText:
We have help from other precincts, but at the end of
the day, it's on us local police to do our best to keep
this city safe.
jpnChrName: 他所からも応援の人員も呼んでいますが、 やはり地元警察が頑張るべきところですしね。
jpnSearchText:
他所からも応援の人員も呼んでいますが、
やはり地元警察が頑張るべきところですしね。

engChrName: A little sleep is all I needed to shake off all that agitation I was feeling yesterday. I feel like a new man again!
engSearchText:
A little sleep is all I needed to shake off all that
agitation I was feeling yesterday. I feel like a
new man again!
jpnChrName: フン、ひと眠りしたら昨日までの昂りも 幾分抜けて爽やかなものだ！
jpnSearchText:
フン、ひと眠りしたら昨日までの昂りも
幾分抜けて爽やかなものだ！

engChrName: I'm not sweating it at this point. It's not like my old man's caught wind of what happened, anyway.
engSearchText:
I'm not sweating it at this point. It's not like my old
man's caught wind of what happened, anyway.
jpnChrName: 父上にもバレていないしな、 もう心配する事もなかろう。
jpnSearchText:
父上にもバレていないしな、
もう心配する事もなかろう。

engChrName: Which means I can go out there and enjoy the film festival without anything weighing me down!
engSearchText:
Which means I can go out there and enjoy the film
festival without anything weighing me down!
jpnChrName: とにかくだ、これで心置きなく映画祭を 楽しめるというもの！
jpnSearchText:
とにかくだ、これで心置きなく映画祭を
楽しめるというもの！

engChrName: Enough chitchat. Time to see what this city is like in full party mode. I'm not missing out on the action!
engSearchText:
Enough chitchat. Time to see what this city is like in
full party mode. I'm not missing out on the action!
jpnChrName: さあ、今一度この街の新たな祭りの在り方を この目に焼き付けるとしようではないか！
jpnSearchText:
さあ、今一度この街の新たな祭りの在り方を
この目に焼き付けるとしようではないか！

engChrName: Come on, Hardy! Lay off, already! I know what I did wrong!
engSearchText:
Come on, Hardy! Lay off, already! I know what I
did wrong!
jpnChrName: し、しつこいぞハーディよ。 オレとて反省しているつもりだ！
jpnSearchText:
し、しつこいぞハーディよ。
オレとて反省しているつもりだ！

engChrName: You're getting bent out of shape over nothing, seriously!
engSearchText:
You're getting bent out of shape over
nothing, seriously!
jpnChrName: 今回ばかりは躍起になり過ぎたと 言っているだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
今回ばかりは躍起になり過ぎたと
言っているだろう！？

engChrName: I mean... Okay, I appreciate you covering for me while I was all worked up earlier.
engSearchText:
I mean... Okay, I appreciate you covering for me
while I was all worked up earlier.
jpnChrName: まあ……オレが昂っていた間も 庇ってくれた事は礼を言うがな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……オレが昂っていた間も
庇ってくれた事は礼を言うがな。

engChrName: Hahaha, see that, Hardy? This ride's exactly the kind of thing a guy like me needs!
engSearchText:
Hahaha, see that, Hardy? This ride's exactly the kind
of thing a guy like me needs!
jpnChrName: フハハハハ、見たかハーディよ！ やはりオレにこの車は相応の代物であったな！
jpnSearchText:
フハハハハ、見たかハーディよ！
やはりオレにこの車は相応の代物であったな！

engChrName: This thing's built for driving through sand dunes. You were worrying about nothing at all!
engSearchText:
This thing's built for driving through sand dunes.
You were worrying about nothing at all!
jpnChrName: 砂丘を駆け抜けるのが危ないというのも、 杞憂と言うものだっただろう！
jpnSearchText:
砂丘を駆け抜けるのが危ないというのも、
杞憂と言うものだっただろう！

engChrName: Sure, I might've kicked up a bit of sand, but that's part of the fun! I like seeing it in the air, it's like stardust blowing around.
engSearchText:
Sure, I might've kicked up a bit of sand, but that's
part of the fun! I like seeing it in the air, it's like
stardust blowing around.
jpnChrName: 砂は被ってしまったが、これもまた一興であろう！ オレには舞う砂も最早、星屑のように見えるわ！
jpnSearchText:
砂は被ってしまったが、これもまた一興であろう！
オレには舞う砂も最早、星屑のように見えるわ！

engChrName: Now that I'm all hyped up, time to hit up those actresses and see if I can't conquer THOSE dunes. It's gonna be great!
engSearchText:
Now that I'm all hyped up, time to hit up those
actresses and see if I can't conquer THOSE dunes.
It's gonna be great!
jpnChrName: よし、改めて昂って来た事だ、 そろそろ女優たちでも誑かしに行くとするか！
jpnSearchText:
よし、改めて昂って来た事だ、
そろそろ女優たちでも誑かしに行くとするか！

engChrName: Why's my dad trying to keep me stuck inside the city? It's such a waste of a perfectly good car!
engSearchText:
Why's my dad trying to keep me stuck inside the city?
It's such a waste of a perfectly good car!
jpnChrName: 父上は何故オレを街に縛り付けるような事を…… こんな車もあるのに勿体無いではないか。
jpnSearchText:
父上は何故オレを街に縛り付けるような事を……
こんな車もあるのに勿体無いではないか。

engChrName: Oh, well. At least there's the film festival. You don't get stuff like that around here every day. Might as well enjoy it while I can.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. At least there's the film festival. You don't
get stuff like that around here every day. Might as
well enjoy it while I can.
jpnChrName: まあ良い、映画祭はせいぜい堪能しよう。 せっかくの機会だ、楽しませてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良い、映画祭はせいぜい堪能しよう。
せっかくの機会だ、楽しませてもらう。

engChrName: This orbal hookah's good stuff. I guess for now, I'll just have to content myself with enjoying what's local. Could be worse, I guess.
engSearchText:
This orbal hookah's good stuff. I guess for now, I'll
just have to content myself with enjoying what's local.
Could be worse, I guess.
jpnChrName: この導力シーシャというものも悪くないし、 今はせいぜい、目の前の事を楽しむか。
jpnSearchText:
この導力シーシャというものも悪くないし、
今はせいぜい、目の前の事を楽しむか。

engChrName: I guess the film festival being so close has got me feeling fired up, because I could go for some excitement right about now!
engSearchText:
I guess the film festival being so close has got me
feeling fired up, because I could go for some
excitement right about now!
jpnChrName: しかし、映画祭が近づいてきたからか どうにも昂ってきたな、何か余興が欲しいぞ！
jpnSearchText:
しかし、映画祭が近づいてきたからか
どうにも昂ってきたな、何か余興が欲しいぞ！

engChrName: And there's nothing more exciting than cruising around the dunes!
engSearchText:
And there's nothing more exciting than cruising
around the dunes!
jpnChrName: よし、ならばやはり砂丘を 駆け抜けるのが良かろう！
jpnSearchText:
よし、ならばやはり砂丘を
駆け抜けるのが良かろう！

engChrName: Get that crusty old butler in the passenger seat, and I just know we'll have a damn good time!
engSearchText:
Get that crusty old butler in the passenger seat, and I
just know we'll have a damn good time!
jpnChrName: そのような刺激があれば、枯れた男と二人でも そこそこ楽しめようぞ！
jpnSearchText:
そのような刺激があれば、枯れた男と二人でも
そこそこ楽しめようぞ！

engChrName: If my dad's so keen on keeping me in town, then why'd he gift me such a sweet car, huh?
engSearchText:
If my dad's so keen on keeping me in town, then
why'd he gift me such a sweet car, huh?
jpnChrName: 父上はオレに街を出るなというなら、 何故この車をプレゼントしたのだ？
jpnSearchText:
父上はオレに街を出るなというなら、
何故この車をプレゼントしたのだ？

engChrName: With a ride this nice, it's just begging to be customized to Gehenna 'n' back and then taken out to satisfy the need for speed!
engSearchText:
With a ride this nice, it's just begging to be
customized to Gehenna 'n' back and then taken out
to satisfy the need for speed!
jpnChrName: こんなものを貰えば、カスタムを重ねて 遠くに駆け出したくなるのは当然ではないか！
jpnSearchText:
こんなものを貰えば、カスタムを重ねて
遠くに駆け出したくなるのは当然ではないか！

engChrName: Give it a rest, Hardy. I'm done being cooped up. I wanna see what else is out there! I NEED to!
engSearchText:
Give it a rest, Hardy. I'm done being cooped up.
I wanna see what else is out there! I NEED to!
jpnChrName: ハーディよ、オレはいい加減に 広い世界を駆けたいのだ！
jpnSearchText:
ハーディよ、オレはいい加減に
広い世界を駆けたいのだ！

engChrName: I can't stay stuck in Tharbad forever. You want this car Dad gave me to rust?
engSearchText:
I can't stay stuck in Tharbad forever. You want this
car Dad gave me to rust?
jpnChrName: いつまでもこの街に籠っていては、 父上のくれた車も宝の持ち腐れではないか！
jpnSearchText:
いつまでもこの街に籠っていては、
父上のくれた車も宝の持ち腐れではないか！

engChrName: (Damn. Whoever this guy's dad is must have cash to burn. That's a fancy, high-end urban sports car, and that's only the start of it.)
engSearchText:
(Damn. Whoever this guy's dad is must have cash
to burn. That's a fancy, high-end urban sports car,
and that's only the start of it.)
jpnChrName: （おいおい……あのスポーツカー、見てくれは   都市部向けの洒落た高級モデルだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（おいおい……あのスポーツカー、見てくれは
都市部向けの洒落た高級モデルだが……）

engChrName: (The suspension underneath that beast is Land Carrier class, and the intake's been modded to handle frickin' sandstorms!)
engSearchText:
(The suspension underneath that beast is Land Carrier
class, and the intake's been modded to handle
frickin' sandstorms!)
jpnChrName: （足回りがＬＣ（ランドキャリア）並みに強化されて、   吸気部も砂塵対策が施されてやがる！）
jpnSearchText:
（足回りがＬＣ（ランドキャリア）並みに強化されて、
吸気部も砂塵対策が施されてやがる！）

engChrName: (Those aren't exactly off-the-shelf upgrades. Can only imagine how much mira's been stuffed into this thing to trick it out like this.)
engSearchText:
(Those aren't exactly off-the-shelf upgrades. Can only
imagine how much mira's been stuffed into this thing
to trick it out like this.)
jpnChrName: （特注パーツ無しじゃ出来ねぇカスタムだ……   一体何十万ミラつぎ込んでやがるんだ……？）
jpnSearchText:
（特注パーツ無しじゃ出来ねぇカスタムだ……
一体何十万ミラつぎ込んでやがるんだ……？）

engChrName: Young master, I am afraid that is out of the question.
engSearchText: Young master, I am afraid that is out of the question.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃま……それは無理でございまする。
jpnSearchText: お坊ちゃま……それは無理でございまする。

engChrName: Your father has ordered me not to let you out of the city until you have completed your studies. Forgive me, sir.
engSearchText:
Your father has ordered me not to let you out of the
city until you have completed your studies.
Forgive me, sir.
jpnChrName: 旦那様にお坊ちゃまが学びを終えるまで、 勝手に街を出さぬよう言われております故……
jpnSearchText:
旦那様にお坊ちゃまが学びを終えるまで、
勝手に街を出さぬよう言われております故……

engChrName: Eh, so what? There's nothing to stop the two of us from going out on a little joyride across the sand dunes, right?
engSearchText:
Eh, so what? There's nothing to stop the two of us
from going out on a little joyride across the sand
dunes, right?
jpnChrName: フン、ならばこのカスタム車で 陽炎砂丘に繰り出そうではないか！
jpnSearchText:
フン、ならばこのカスタム車で
陽炎砂丘に繰り出そうではないか！

engChrName: Those are TECHNICALLY still within city limits, so it's not like we'll be breaking any rules if we take a little trip out there.
engSearchText:
Those are TECHNICALLY still within city limits,
so it's not like we'll be breaking any rules if we take a
little trip out there.
jpnChrName: あそこも一応は市の管轄内、多少冒険しても サルバッドから出た事にはなるまい！？
jpnSearchText:
あそこも一応は市の管轄内、多少冒険しても
サルバッドから出た事にはなるまい！？

engChrName: Please, young master, you must be reasonable.
engSearchText: Please, young master, you must be reasonable.
jpnChrName: む、無茶を言いなさるな……
jpnSearchText: む、無茶を言いなさるな……

engChrName: The Sandsea is simply much too dangerous to go gamboling about in, I'm afraid.
engSearchText:
The Sandsea is simply much too dangerous to go
gamboling about in, I'm afraid.
jpnChrName: 流石に陽炎砂丘は危険すぎますぞ……
jpnSearchText: 流石に陽炎砂丘は危険すぎますぞ……

engChrName: I suppose the young master has indeed learned from his mistakes, inelegant as his choice of words may be.
engSearchText:
I suppose the young master has indeed learned from
his mistakes, inelegant as his choice of words may be.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃまは……これでもお坊ちゃまなりに 反省しているつもりなのでしょうが……
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃまは……これでもお坊ちゃまなりに
反省しているつもりなのでしょうが……

engChrName: Though I can only imagine it will now take even longer for his father to give him permission to go on trips outside of the city.
engSearchText:
Though I can only imagine it will now take even
longer for his father to give him permission to go on
trips outside of the city.
jpnChrName: この分では、旦那様より遠出のお許しが出る 日は幾分か遠のいてしまうでしょうなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
この分では、旦那様より遠出のお許しが出る
日は幾分か遠のいてしまうでしょうなぁ……

engChrName: Ideally, it would be best if you spoke about your issues to your father directly, in your own words, young master.
engSearchText:
Ideally, it would be best if you spoke about your issues
to your father directly, in your own words,
young master.
jpnChrName: 諸々の件も……本当ならお坊ちゃま自身の 言葉で旦那様に伝えていただきたいものですが……
jpnSearchText:
諸々の件も……本当ならお坊ちゃま自身の
言葉で旦那様に伝えていただきたいものですが……

engChrName: Situations such as this are exactly why I always warn you to err on the side of caution! So we may avoid this very circumstance!
engSearchText:
Situations such as this are exactly why I always
warn you to err on the side of caution! So we
may avoid this very circumstance!
jpnChrName: このようなことになるから羽目を外し過ぎぬよう 日頃から言い聞かせていたのですぞ、お坊ちゃま……
jpnSearchText:
このようなことになるから羽目を外し過ぎぬよう
日頃から言い聞かせていたのですぞ、お坊ちゃま……

engChrName: To think that you were seen in public not only having your possessions confiscated by the police, but yelling all the while!
engSearchText:
To think that you were seen in public not only
having your possessions confiscated by the police,
but yelling all the while!
jpnChrName: まさか、お坊ちゃまともあろう方が、 警察に私物を没収され喚く姿を晒すなど……！
jpnSearchText:
まさか、お坊ちゃまともあろう方が、
警察に私物を没収され喚く姿を晒すなど……！

engChrName: It's extremely fortunate that it didn't turn into a far greater incident and that the police have not charged you with anything.
engSearchText:
It's extremely fortunate that it didn't turn into a far
greater incident and that the police have not charged
you with anything.
jpnChrName: 幸い大事に至らず、警察からも特に 咎めが無かった事は良かったですが……
jpnSearchText:
幸い大事に至らず、警察からも特に
咎めが無かった事は良かったですが……

engChrName: But how on Zemuria am I ever going to explain what happened to your father...? *sigh*
engSearchText:
But how on Zemuria am I ever going to explain what
happened to your father...? *sigh*
jpnChrName: 此度の顛末、旦那様にどのように お伝えすれば良いか……
jpnSearchText:
此度の顛末、旦那様にどのように
お伝えすれば良いか……

engChrName: Y-Young master, I do believe I warned you. Such driving is incredibly dangerous and serves nobody's interest!
engSearchText:
Y-Young master, I do believe I warned you.
Such driving is incredibly dangerous and serves
nobody's interest!
jpnChrName: お、お坊ちゃま……確かに無茶とは申しましたが…… よもやあのような運転をなさるとは……！
jpnSearchText:
お、お坊ちゃま……確かに無茶とは申しましたが……
よもやあのような運転をなさるとは……！

engChrName: I am, of course, relieved to see that neither you nor your vehicle have been harmed by your excursion.
engSearchText:
I am, of course, relieved to see that neither you nor
your vehicle have been harmed by your excursion.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃまもお怪我は無く、車も無事なのは 幸いでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃまもお怪我は無く、車も無事なのは
幸いでしたが……

engChrName: However, that leap through the air was truly terrifying! I felt as though I lost five years of my life watching that!
engSearchText:
However, that leap through the air was
truly terrifying! I felt as though I lost five years of my
life watching that!
jpnChrName: このハーディ、宙に舞った時には寿命が 五年は縮んだ思いでありましたぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
このハーディ、宙に舞った時には寿命が
五年は縮んだ思いでありましたぞ……！

engChrName: Young master, must we have this conversation again?
engSearchText: Young master, must we have this conversation again?
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃま、またそのような事を……
jpnSearchText: お坊ちゃま、またそのような事を……

engChrName: I fully appreciate your desire to live and roam as you please. Truly, I do.
engSearchText:
I fully appreciate your desire to live and roam as
you please. Truly, I do.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃまが自由を欲している事は 私も重々承知でございます。
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃまが自由を欲している事は
私も重々承知でございます。

engChrName: However, your father is merely trying to ensure that you do not needlessly suffer out in the real world before you are ready.
engSearchText:
However, your father is merely trying to ensure that
you do not needlessly suffer out in the real world
before you are ready.
jpnChrName: ですが、これもお坊ちゃまが外で苦労しない ための旦那様なりのお気遣いでございます。
jpnSearchText:
ですが、これもお坊ちゃまが外で苦労しない
ための旦那様なりのお気遣いでございます。

engChrName: That is why it is important that you learn etiquette. Once you do, you can appeal to your father to loosen his restrictions.
engSearchText:
That is why it is important that you learn etiquette.
Once you do, you can appeal to your father to loosen
his restrictions.
jpnChrName: 自由になるためにも、まずは礼節を身につけ、 旦那様に認めてもらいましょうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
自由になるためにも、まずは礼節を身につけ、
旦那様に認めてもらいましょうぞ。

engChrName: The young master was such an intelligent, well-behaved boy when he was young. The loss of his mother affected him profoundly.
engSearchText:
The young master was such an intelligent,
well-behaved boy when he was young. The loss of his
mother affected him profoundly.
jpnChrName: 昔はあんなにも聡明で良い子だったのに…… やはりお母上様を失われた心の傷が……
jpnSearchText:
昔はあんなにも聡明で良い子だったのに……
やはりお母上様を失われた心の傷が……

engChrName: Even so, he does grasp the basics of etiquette. Yet these past few days, he's acted rather strangely. What could have happened?
engSearchText:
Even so, he does grasp the basics of etiquette. Yet
these past few days, he's acted rather strangely.
What could have happened?
jpnChrName: しかし……それでも最低限は弁えていたはず…… ここ数日のお坊ちゃまは……何かが……
jpnSearchText:
しかし……それでも最低限は弁えていたはず……
ここ数日のお坊ちゃまは……何かが……

engChrName: Young master Ihsan comes from the largest trading house in all of Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Young master Ihsan comes from the largest trading
house in all of Tharbad.
jpnChrName: イフサーンお坊ちゃまは この街随一の貿易会社のご子息……
jpnSearchText:
イフサーンお坊ちゃまは
この街随一の貿易会社のご子息……

engChrName: Alas, he tragically lost his mother at a young age. He's since grown up lacking...regard for others, let us say.
engSearchText:
Alas, he tragically lost his mother at a young age.
He's since grown up lacking...regard for others, let
us say.
jpnChrName: しかし幼少期にお母上様を失ってから、 どうも身勝手に育ってしまいましてな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし幼少期にお母上様を失ってから、
どうも身勝手に育ってしまいましてな。

engChrName: As a result, his father has prohibited him from leaving the city until he learns to embrace proper decorum.
engSearchText:
As a result, his father has prohibited him from leaving
the city until he learns to embrace proper decorum.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃまが礼節を覚えるまで、勝手に 外に出さない事は御主人様の方針ですが……
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃまが礼節を覚えるまで、勝手に
外に出さない事は御主人様の方針ですが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, the young master does not grasp that such limits are in place for his own good, to ensure he lives comfortably.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, the young master does not grasp that
such limits are in place for his own good, to ensure he
lives comfortably.
jpnChrName: お坊ちゃま自身には、ご自分が苦労しないため という想いも十分に伝わっていないようでしてな……
jpnSearchText:
お坊ちゃま自身には、ご自分が苦労しないため
という想いも十分に伝わっていないようでしてな……

engChrName: So this is Tharbad's idea of a film festival. It's certainly different from what we have in Messeldam, but not in a bad way.
engSearchText:
So this is Tharbad's idea of a film festival.
It's certainly different from what we have in
Messeldam, but not in a bad way.
jpnChrName: へぇ、これがサルバッドの映画祭なのね。 本家とは違うけど、悪くないわね。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、これがサルバッドの映画祭なのね。
本家とは違うけど、悪くないわね。

engChrName: It seems like the kind of event you can simply turn off your brain and enjoy yourself, even if it is rather...flashy.
engSearchText:
It seems like the kind of event you can simply turn off
your brain and enjoy yourself, even if it is
rather...flashy.
jpnChrName: 確かに派手過ぎるけど、これはこれで 頭を使わないで気を楽にして楽しめそうだわ。
jpnSearchText:
確かに派手過ぎるけど、これはこれで
頭を使わないで気を楽にして楽しめそうだわ。

engChrName: For all the pageantry of Messeldam's festival and the authority of its judging, it can get rather... stuffy, sometimes.
engSearchText:
For all the pageantry of Messeldam's festival and the
authority of its judging, it can get rather...
stuffy, sometimes.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムの方は審査員も権威的だし、 芸術性も良いけど少し息苦しいのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムの方は審査員も権威的だし、
芸術性も良いけど少し息苦しいのよねぇ。

engChrName: This, on the other hand, has a more fun, lighthearted mood. And the traditional hookah I tried this morning was pretty good, too.
engSearchText:
This, on the other hand, has a more fun,
lighthearted mood. And the traditional hookah I tried
this morning was pretty good, too.
jpnChrName: 今朝吸った伝統シーシャも美味しかったし、 良い気分でたのしめそうだわ。
jpnSearchText:
今朝吸った伝統シーシャも美味しかったし、
良い気分でたのしめそうだわ。

engChrName: Are the orbal hookahs contaminated or something? I saw the police going around confiscating them earlier.
engSearchText:
Are the orbal hookahs contaminated or something?
I saw the police going around confiscating
them earlier.
jpnChrName: さっきお巡りさんが導力シーシャを 集めているのを見たけど、異物混入か何かかしら？
jpnSearchText:
さっきお巡りさんが導力シーシャを
集めているのを見たけど、異物混入か何かかしら？

engChrName: Not that I care. I feel perfectly fine, myself, and was planning on taking in the film festival as a change of pace anyway.
engSearchText:
Not that I care. I feel perfectly fine, myself, and was
planning on taking in the film festival as a change of
pace anyway.
jpnChrName: まあ、わたしはこの通り特に具合悪くは無いし、 気持ちを切り替えて映画祭を楽しむつもりだけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、わたしはこの通り特に具合悪くは無いし、
気持ちを切り替えて映画祭を楽しむつもりだけど……

engChrName: It's such a shame, the way the world is going. You never know where danger might be lurking these days.
engSearchText:
It's such a shame, the way the world is going.
You never know where danger might be lurking
these days.
jpnChrName: 本当にここのところはどこに危険なものが あるか判らなくて、嫌な世の中になったわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
本当にここのところはどこに危険なものが
あるか判らなくて、嫌な世の中になったわねぇ。

engChrName: People seem to be really high-strung this morning. I hate it!
engSearchText:
People seem to be really high-strung this morning.
I hate it!
jpnChrName: 今朝は何だかあちこちが騒がしくて 嫌になっちゃうわね！
jpnSearchText:
今朝は何だかあちこちが騒がしくて
嫌になっちゃうわね！

engChrName: Just as I was getting used to this place and sleeping soundly, too. Now I see this patch of dirt for what it really is!
engSearchText:
Just as I was getting used to this place and sleeping
soundly, too. Now I see this patch of dirt for what it
really is!
jpnChrName: せっかくこの旅先にも慣れて気持ち良く 寝ていたのに、目が覚めちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
せっかくこの旅先にも慣れて気持ち良く
寝ていたのに、目が覚めちゃった。

engChrName: But you know something? For some reason, I'm feeling...a little pumped up!
engSearchText:
But you know something? For some reason, I'm
feeling...a little pumped up!
jpnChrName: でも……何だか私も、 少しだけ興奮してきたわ！
jpnSearchText:
でも……何だか私も、
少しだけ興奮してきたわ！

engChrName: I feel like I'm young again! Young and dancing with my friends all over town!
engSearchText:
I feel like I'm young again! Young and dancing with
my friends all over town!
jpnChrName: そう、この感じ……まるで若い頃に 友達と街で踊っていた時のよう！
jpnSearchText:
そう、この感じ……まるで若い頃に
友達と街で踊っていた時のよう！

engChrName: After having a look around, I must admit, Tharbad's quite different from what I imagined.
engSearchText:
After having a look around, I must admit, Tharbad's
quite different from what I imagined.
jpnChrName: 街を見て回ったけど、サルバッドって 街も、大分思っていたのと違うわね。
jpnSearchText:
街を見て回ったけど、サルバッドって
街も、大分思っていたのと違うわね。

engChrName: Growing up, I heard it was a dusty, quiet place without a lot to offer, and figured that was probably still the case.
engSearchText:
Growing up, I heard it was a dusty, quiet place
without a lot to offer, and figured that was probably
still the case.
jpnChrName: 若い時に聞いたイメージで、もっと埃っぽくて 慎ましい感じなのかと思っていたわ。
jpnSearchText:
若い時に聞いたイメージで、もっと埃っぽくて
慎ましい感じなのかと思っていたわ。

engChrName: But I really enjoyed the Cultural District. It's making me think maybe I should have a movie set somewhere in the Central East.
engSearchText:
But I really enjoyed the Cultural District. It's making
me think maybe I should have a movie set somewhere
in the Central East.
jpnChrName: 伝統地区も思ったより面白かったし、 これを機に中東を舞台にした映画も良いかもね。
jpnSearchText:
伝統地区も思ったより面白かったし、
これを機に中東を舞台にした映画も良いかもね。

engChrName: Although, knowing Salvatore Gotti's...inclinations, I suspect I know exactly what kind of 'culture' he plans on promoting in his parade.
engSearchText:
Although, knowing Salvatore Gotti's...inclinations, I
suspect I know exactly what kind of 'culture' he plans
on promoting in his parade.
jpnChrName: まあ、ゴッチ監督の事だし、どうせ実際に アピールしたいのはそこじゃないんでしょうけどね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ゴッチ監督の事だし、どうせ実際に
アピールしたいのはそこじゃないんでしょうけどね。

engChrName: I'm really attached to the Messeldam Film Festival, so I can't help but be worried about its future after everything that's happened.
engSearchText:
I'm really attached to the Messeldam Film Festival, so
I can't help but be worried about its future after
everything that's happened.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムの映画祭に慣れ親しんだ 身としては色々と先行き不安だけど……
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムの映画祭に慣れ親しんだ
身としては色々と先行き不安だけど……

engChrName: But my daughter seems optimistic. Perhaps I'll try to think of this as more of a sightseeing trip and just try to enjoy myself.
engSearchText:
But my daughter seems optimistic. Perhaps I'll try to
think of this as more of a sightseeing trip and just try
to enjoy myself.
jpnChrName: 娘もこういっているし、観光と思って 楽しむ事にしようかしらねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
娘もこういっているし、観光と思って
楽しむ事にしようかしらねぇ。

engChrName: Plus I've heard about those hookahs they have here. I think I might just take the opportunity to partake.
engSearchText:
Plus I've heard about those hookahs they have here.
I think I might just take the opportunity to partake.
jpnChrName: あのシーシャというのも聞いた事はあるし、 せっかくの機会と思って吸ってみようかしら。
jpnSearchText:
あのシーシャというのも聞いた事はあるし、
せっかくの機会と思って吸ってみようかしら。

engChrName: I've always looked forward to the film festival in Messeldam. I thought once it got canceled, that'd be it for film this year.
engSearchText:
I've always looked forward to the film festival
in Messeldam. I thought once it got canceled, that'd
be it for film this year.
jpnChrName: ふう、地元メッセルダムで毎年楽しみにしていた 映画祭が中止になったと思えば……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、地元メッセルダムで毎年楽しみにしていた
映画祭が中止になったと思えば……

engChrName: I never expected anyone to put on another event in a place like this.
engSearchText:
I never expected anyone to put on another event in a
place like this.
jpnChrName: まさかこんな街で似たような事を 企画していたなんてねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
まさかこんな街で似たような事を
企画していたなんてねぇ……

engChrName: It's such a different-feeling city. I'm not sure it has what it takes to pull off a proper film festival.
engSearchText:
It's such a different-feeling city. I'm not sure it has
what it takes to pull off a proper film festival.
jpnChrName: 全然雰囲気も違う街だけど…… ちゃんと映画祭らしくなるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
全然雰囲気も違う街だけど……
ちゃんと映画祭らしくなるのかしら？

engChrName: Come on, Mom, give it a chance. Movies are getting popular in the Central East. I'm sure they understand what makes them so special.
engSearchText:
Come on, Mom, give it a chance. Movies are getting
popular in the Central East. I'm sure they understand
what makes them so special.
jpnChrName: 最近は中東の方でも映画は流行っているし、 大事な事はちゃんとわかってると思うよ、お母さん。
jpnSearchText:
最近は中東の方でも映画は流行っているし、
大事な事はちゃんとわかってると思うよ、お母さん。

engChrName: Besides, Mr. Gotti himself has been putting it all together. That's got to count for something!
engSearchText:
Besides, Mr. Gotti himself has been putting it
all together. That's got to count for something!
jpnChrName: それにほら、何たって企画進行は あのゴッチ監督なんだしさ！
jpnSearchText:
それにほら、何たって企画進行は
あのゴッチ監督なんだしさ！

engChrName: Maybe. I hope you're right. I'm still keeping my expectations in check. I just hope he keeps his tastes in check.
engSearchText:
Maybe. I hope you're right. I'm still keeping my
expectations in check. I just hope he keeps his tastes
in check.
jpnChrName: ふーん、ならいいけど……腹を括って来た分、 あまり変なものを見せられても困るしね。
jpnSearchText:
ふーん、ならいいけど……腹を括って来た分、
あまり変なものを見せられても困るしね。

engChrName: Oh, I recognize that hotel from a movie! Perhaps if I get some location hunting in, too, this could be a fun trip after all.
engSearchText:
Oh, I recognize that hotel from a movie! Perhaps if I
get some location hunting in, too, this could be a fun
trip after all.
jpnChrName: あ、でもあの高級ホテルは映画にも出てたわね。 ロケ地巡りも兼ねれば面白いかもね。
jpnSearchText:
あ、でもあの高級ホテルは映画にも出てたわね。
ロケ地巡りも兼ねれば面白いかもね。

engChrName: Elene, sweetheart, do you have any suggestions for places we should visit?
engSearchText:
Elene, sweetheart, do you have any suggestions for
places we should visit?
jpnChrName: エレーヌ、何ならお勧めの場所とかって あったりするかしら？
jpnSearchText:
エレーヌ、何ならお勧めの場所とかって
あったりするかしら？

engChrName: I'm so glad my mom is enjoying the film festival now. At first, she wasn't sure if she'd like it.
engSearchText:
I'm so glad my mom is enjoying the film festival now.
At first, she wasn't sure if she'd like it.
jpnChrName: お母さん、最初は色々不安だったけど 映画祭も楽しめているみたいで良かった。
jpnSearchText:
お母さん、最初は色々不安だったけど
映画祭も楽しめているみたいで良かった。

engChrName: Now I just hope I don't lose her in the crowd...
engSearchText: Now I just hope I don't lose her in the crowd...
jpnChrName: あとはこの人混みで 迷子にさえならないでくれれば……
jpnSearchText:
あとはこの人混みで
迷子にさえならないでくれれば……

engChrName: We came so far to enjoy the festival. Ideally, I'd like to make it back home together in one piece, too!
engSearchText:
We came so far to enjoy the festival. Ideally, I'd like
to make it back home together in one piece, too!
jpnChrName: せっかく新しい映画祭のために遥々来たんだし、 ちゃんと楽しんで帰らないとだしね。
jpnSearchText:
せっかく新しい映画祭のために遥々来たんだし、
ちゃんと楽しんで帰らないとだしね。

engChrName: Are those orbal hookahs actually dangerous? The police seem to be carrying them out of stalls.
engSearchText:
Are those orbal hookahs actually dangerous?
The police seem to be carrying them out of stalls.
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャってもしかして危ない物だったの……？ 警察の人たちがお店から持っていっているけど……
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャってもしかして危ない物だったの……？
警察の人たちがお店から持っていっているけど……

engChrName: My mom smoked a little bit out of one earlier. I hope she's going to be okay...
engSearchText:
My mom smoked a little bit out of one earlier. I hope
she's going to be okay...
jpnChrName: お母さんも少し吸ったようだけど 大丈夫なのかな……
jpnSearchText:
お母さんも少し吸ったようだけど
大丈夫なのかな……

engChrName: She seems relaxed, though, so I'm probably just being paranoid...right?
engSearchText:
She seems relaxed, though, so I'm probably just being
paranoid...right?
jpnChrName: でも、お母さんも今は落ち着いてるし…… こ、恐がり過ぎ……かな……？
jpnSearchText:
でも、お母さんも今は落ち着いてるし……
こ、恐がり過ぎ……かな……？

engChrName: The atmosphere here is so weird. Are festivals in Tharbad always this, uh, lively?
engSearchText:
The atmosphere here is so weird. Are festivals in
Tharbad always this, uh, lively?
jpnChrName: な、なんだろうこの雰囲気…… サルバッドのお祭りって、こういうものなの……？
jpnSearchText:
な、なんだろうこの雰囲気……
サルバッドのお祭りって、こういうものなの……？

engChrName: I knew it wasn't going to be like the Messeldam Film Festival, but I didn't quite imagine it being THIS unhinged.
engSearchText:
I knew it wasn't going to be like the Messeldam Film
Festival, but I didn't quite imagine it being
THIS unhinged.
jpnChrName: メッセルダムの映画祭とは違うのは判ってたけど…… それにしてもここまで羽目を外すものなのかな……
jpnSearchText:
メッセルダムの映画祭とは違うのは判ってたけど……
それにしてもここまで羽目を外すものなのかな……

engChrName: And is it just me or is my mother being kinda loud? She's a lot more punchy and energetic than I'm used to seeing...
engSearchText:
And is it just me or is my mother being kinda loud?
She's a lot more punchy and energetic than I'm used
to seeing...
jpnChrName: それに……お母さんも何か妙に声が大きい というか、普段より元気な気も……
jpnSearchText:
それに……お母さんも何か妙に声が大きい
というか、普段より元気な気も……

engChrName: My mom's idea of what Tharbad and the Central East are like has got to be at least 20 years out of date.
engSearchText:
My mom's idea of what Tharbad and the Central
East are like has got to be at least 20 years out of date.
jpnChrName: お母さんが思うサルバッドや中東のイメージ、 ２０年前で止まってたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
お母さんが思うサルバッドや中東のイメージ、
２０年前で止まってたみたいで……

engChrName: I think her mind might be starting to come around, though. She seems to have started enjoying herself.
engSearchText:
I think her mind might be starting to come
around, though. She seems to have started
enjoying herself.
jpnChrName: でも、実際に来てみて結構イメージ変わったのかな？ さっきから楽しそうかも。
jpnSearchText:
でも、実際に来てみて結構イメージ変わったのかな？
さっきから楽しそうかも。

engChrName: Although I just remembered... Mr. Gotti's supposed to be heavily involved in planning the festival here, right?
engSearchText:
Although I just remembered... Mr. Gotti's supposed
to be heavily involved in planning the festival
here, right?
jpnChrName: ただまあ……考えてみれば、こっちの映画祭は ゴッチ監督が企画とか色々やってるんだよね？
jpnSearchText:
ただまあ……考えてみれば、こっちの映画祭は
ゴッチ監督が企画とか色々やってるんだよね？

engChrName: I guess that explains why everything feels so much more...energized than what I'm used to in Messeldam. Maybe?
engSearchText:
I guess that explains why everything feels so much
more...energized than what I'm used to
in Messeldam. Maybe?
jpnChrName: それなら……メッセルダムと全然違うこの 盛り上がりも無理ない……のかな？
jpnSearchText:
それなら……メッセルダムと全然違うこの
盛り上がりも無理ない……のかな？

engChrName: Between you and me, I'm honestly shocked my mom came to check out the film festival.
engSearchText:
Between you and me, I'm honestly shocked my mom
came to check out the film festival.
jpnChrName: お母さんはちょっと古いところがあるし、 おまけに方向音痴なものだから……
jpnSearchText:
お母さんはちょっと古いところがあるし、
おまけに方向音痴なものだから……

engChrName: She's a little old-fashioned in some ways, not to mention her terrible sense of direction. Not the best combo for traveling.
engSearchText:
She's a little old-fashioned in some ways, not to
mention her terrible sense of direction. Not the best
combo for traveling.
jpnChrName: 正直、映画祭を見にここまで来たのが 意外なくらいなんだよね。
jpnSearchText:
正直、映画祭を見にここまで来たのが
意外なくらいなんだよね。

engChrName: But I want her to have a good time, so I'm going to do what I can to help her out.
engSearchText:
But I want her to have a good time, so I'm going to
do what I can to help her out.
jpnChrName: 映画祭を一緒に楽しむためにも、 わたしがお母さんをフォローしないと……！
jpnSearchText:
映画祭を一緒に楽しむためにも、
わたしがお母さんをフォローしないと……！

engChrName: I don't know what happened between last night and today, but there hasn't been anyone fighting this morning.
engSearchText:
I don't know what happened between last night and
today, but there hasn't been anyone fighting
this morning.
jpnChrName: ははは、昨日までとは違って 今朝はケンカとかは無かったようですなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ははは、昨日までとは違って
今朝はケンカとかは無かったようですなぁ。

engChrName: I sure ain't gonna complain. Now I can go back to enjoying the festival in peace!
engSearchText:
I sure ain't gonna complain. Now I can go back to
enjoying the festival in peace!
jpnChrName: 何があったのかはしりやせんが、 これなら祭りってモンを堪能できそうですわ。
jpnSearchText:
何があったのかはしりやせんが、
これなら祭りってモンを堪能できそうですわ。

engChrName: Let's forget all that craziness and enjoy the film festival the way it was meant to be!
engSearchText:
Let's forget all that craziness and enjoy the film
festival the way it was meant to be!
jpnChrName: さ、ここからが仕切り直しですぜ。 今一度映画祭を楽しみましょうや！
jpnSearchText:
さ、ここからが仕切り直しですぜ。
今一度映画祭を楽しみましょうや！

engChrName: Our prince has brought out that amazing airship and everything! It'd be a waste not to live it up and have fun!
engSearchText:
Our prince has brought out that amazing airship
and everything! It'd be a waste not to live it up and
have fun!
jpnChrName: 殿下も飛行船を使って盛り上げて 下さっていますしな！
jpnSearchText:
殿下も飛行船を使って盛り上げて
下さっていますしな！

engChrName: Looks like the cops were conducting some kind of search on the store over there.
engSearchText:
Looks like the cops were conducting some kind of
search on the store over there.
jpnChrName: 何やらさっきから警察の人が向こうの店に ガサ入れをやっているみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
何やらさっきから警察の人が向こうの店に
ガサ入れをやっているみたいで……

engChrName: They were hauling out those orbal hookahs I've been seeing around town lately.
engSearchText:
They were hauling out those orbal hookahs I've been
seeing around town lately.
jpnChrName: 持っていかれてたのは、最近街で見る 導力シーシャとかいうやつですかね？
jpnSearchText:
持っていかれてたのは、最近街で見る
導力シーシャとかいうやつですかね？

engChrName: I've had some customers who smoked that stuff. Now that I think about it, they were all definitely acting a little loopy.
engSearchText:
I've had some customers who smoked that stuff.
Now that I think about it, they were all definitely
acting a little loopy.
jpnChrName: うちのお客にも吸ってる人はいやしたが…… 考えてみりゃ、皆様子が変でしたな。
jpnSearchText:
うちのお客にも吸ってる人はいやしたが……
考えてみりゃ、皆様子が変でしたな。

engChrName: I like to think I'm a man who can keep up with a festival when things heat up. But I've got to be honest with you...
engSearchText:
I like to think I'm a man who can keep up with a
festival when things heat up. But I've got to be honest
with you...
jpnChrName: うーむ、あっしは大抵の盛り上がりには ついて行けるお祭り男のつもりでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
うーむ、あっしは大抵の盛り上がりには
ついて行けるお祭り男のつもりでしたが……

engChrName: This one is wearing me out. I can't keep up when things get this crazy. *sigh*
engSearchText:
This one is wearing me out. I can't keep up when
things get this crazy. *sigh*
jpnChrName: 流石に今回の熱狂ぶりには 疲れてきましたな……
jpnSearchText:
流石に今回の熱狂ぶりには
疲れてきましたな……

engChrName: This festival's really something else, and let me tell you, I've seen my fair share of festivals in my time.
engSearchText:
This festival's really something else, and let me tell
you, I've seen my fair share of festivals in my time.
jpnChrName: 色々な祭りを見てきやしたが、 こいつは相当なモンですよ。
jpnSearchText:
色々な祭りを見てきやしたが、
こいつは相当なモンですよ。

engChrName: Gotta wonder how people find all this energy and vigor in the middle of a scorching hot desert.
engSearchText:
Gotta wonder how people find all this energy and
vigor in the middle of a scorching hot desert.
jpnChrName: この暑い中であれだけの精力を、 一体どうしたっていうんですかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
この暑い中であれだけの精力を、
一体どうしたっていうんですかねぇ。

engChrName: Things are as bustling as ever come nightfall, which is great for me, haha!
engSearchText:
Things are as bustling as ever come nightfall,
which is great for me, haha!
jpnChrName: はは、夜も相変わらず賑やかですなぁ。
jpnSearchText: はは、夜も相変わらず賑やかですなぁ。

engChrName: Tharbad's always been a little rough and tumble, but I've never seen the people here go THIS wild before.
engSearchText:
Tharbad's always been a little rough and tumble, but
I've never seen the people here go THIS wild before.
jpnChrName: それにしても、サルバッドと言えど ここまでの熱狂を見るのは初めてですわ。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、サルバッドと言えど
ここまでの熱狂を見るのは初めてですわ。

engChrName: Not that I can complain. It's bringing in that much more money to me, so if that's what it takes, that's what it takes.
engSearchText:
Not that I can complain. It's bringing in that much
more money to me, so if that's what it takes, that's
what it takes.
jpnChrName: まあ、お陰であっしも儲かってるので これはこれで有難いですけどな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、お陰であっしも儲かってるので
これはこれで有難いですけどな。

engChrName: Festivals are a great opportunity to rake in some dough, of course, but they're also just fun to be around, you know?
engSearchText:
Festivals are a great opportunity to rake in some
dough, of course, but they're also just fun to be
around, you know?
jpnChrName: あっしにとって祭りってのは儲け時でもありやすが、 それ以上に自分も楽しめるものでしてなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あっしにとって祭りってのは儲け時でもありやすが、
それ以上に自分も楽しめるものでしてなぁ。

engChrName: You get to take in all of that energy, right there with your customers. It's a good time. Nothing else like it, I tell you!
engSearchText:
You get to take in all of that energy, right there with
your customers. It's a good time. Nothing else like it,
I tell you!
jpnChrName: やっぱり祭りの活気の中で商売すると、お客さんとも 祭りの雰囲気を共有できて、楽しいもんです。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり祭りの活気の中で商売すると、お客さんとも
祭りの雰囲気を共有できて、楽しいもんです。

engChrName: Hell, sometimes I take part in them just for that alone. It ain't always about business with me.
engSearchText:
Hell, sometimes I take part in them just for
that alone. It ain't always about business with me.
jpnChrName: まあ、たまには商売関係無く祭りに参加しやすがね。
jpnSearchText: まあ、たまには商売関係無く祭りに参加しやすがね。

engChrName: It's been a long time since I've been in Tharbad. Business is clearly booming out here these days!
engSearchText:
It's been a long time since I've been in Tharbad.
Business is clearly booming out here these days!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、サルバッドには久しぶりに 来ましたが、景気が良いものですなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、サルバッドには久しぶりに
来ましたが、景気が良いものですなぁ。

engChrName: Normally I do business over in Elsaim this time of year, but when I heard there was going to be a film festival, I couldn't NOT come.
engSearchText:
Normally I do business over in Elsaim this time of
year, but when I heard there was going to be a film
festival, I couldn't NOT come.
jpnChrName: 普段のこの時期はエルザイムで商売しますが、 祭りと聞いたからには来ない手は無いですわ。
jpnSearchText:
普段のこの時期はエルザイムで商売しますが、
祭りと聞いたからには来ない手は無いですわ。

engChrName: Now who wants some kebabs, huh? Don't be shy! What's a good festival without some even better eats to go with it? That's what I say!
engSearchText:
Now who wants some kebabs, huh? Don't be shy!
What's a good festival without some even better eats
to go with it? That's what I say!
jpnChrName: ささ、皆さんもケバブでも食べて食べて。 祭りは良いものを食べ、楽しんでこそですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ささ、皆さんもケバブでも食べて食べて。
祭りは良いものを食べ、楽しんでこそですよ。

engChrName: Rumors've started going around that a certain film studio's closely linked to those orbal hookahs that have taken off around town.
engSearchText:
Rumors've started going around that a certain film
studio's closely linked to those orbal hookahs that
have taken off around town.
jpnChrName: 例の導力シーシャ……あの映画会社が 関わっていたとかって噂になり始めてますぜ。
jpnSearchText:
例の導力シーシャ……あの映画会社が
関わっていたとかって噂になり始めてますぜ。

engChrName: Think there's any truth to it? Whatever the case, I'm glad we kept our hands clean, especially since the police conducted those raids.
engSearchText:
Think there's any truth to it? Whatever the case, I'm
glad we kept our hands clean, especially since the
police conducted those raids.
jpnChrName: 本当なんでしょうかね？　何にせよ、ああして 回収された以上、関わりたくないですが……
jpnSearchText:
本当なんでしょうかね？　何にせよ、ああして
回収された以上、関わりたくないですが……

engChrName: Either way, now that the film festival's here, it's money-making season for us, so I'm not too worried.
engSearchText:
Either way, now that the film festival's here, it's
money-making season for us, so I'm not too worried.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよ映画祭は始まった、 稼ぎ時には変わりないってモンですぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよ映画祭は始まった、
稼ぎ時には変わりないってモンですぜ。

engChrName: The police came around confiscating orbal hookahs along this street earlier.
engSearchText:
The police came around confiscating orbal hookahs
along this street earlier.
jpnChrName: さっきこの通りでも シーシャが回収されていましたぜ。
jpnSearchText:
さっきこの通りでも
シーシャが回収されていましたぜ。

engChrName: Now that I think about it, the visitors around here began getting more violent right around the time those things began showing up.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, the visitors around here
began getting more violent right around the time
those things began showing up.
jpnChrName: そういや、荒っぽいお客が増えてきたのって、 導力シーシャが出てきた時期と同じ……
jpnSearchText:
そういや、荒っぽいお客が増えてきたのって、
導力シーシャが出てきた時期と同じ……

engChrName: Makes you wonder if it's got anything to do with drugs. If so, I'm glad we kept our distance from them.
engSearchText:
Makes you wonder if it's got anything to do
with drugs. If so, I'm glad we kept our distance
from them.
jpnChrName: まさかヤクとかそれ系の話じゃあ…… もしそうなら関わらなくて良かったですわ。
jpnSearchText:
まさかヤクとかそれ系の話じゃあ……
もしそうなら関わらなくて良かったですわ。

engChrName: Granted, if whatever they're smoking helps them calm down so we have to rough fewer people up, it's hard to complain about that.
engSearchText:
Granted, if whatever they're smoking helps them
calm down so we have to rough fewer people up, it's
hard to complain about that.
jpnChrName: まあ……落ち着いてくれりゃあうちらも 暴力沙汰は避けられるし、助かるんですがねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……落ち着いてくれりゃあうちらも
暴力沙汰は避けられるし、助かるんですがねぇ。

engChrName: You know that nightclub down the street? Sounds like one of its more popular girls is quitting.
engSearchText:
You know that nightclub down the street?
Sounds like one of its more popular girls is quitting.
jpnChrName: そういや、向こうのナイトクラブ…… 人気だった子が一人抜けるらしいですな。
jpnSearchText:
そういや、向こうのナイトクラブ……
人気だった子が一人抜けるらしいですな。

engChrName: Supposedly she got scouted by somebody in the film industry. The owner isn't going to stop her, either, seemingly.
engSearchText:
Supposedly she got scouted by somebody in the
film industry. The owner isn't going to stop her,
either, seemingly.
jpnChrName: 何でも、映画関係者にスカウトされたとかで…… クラブのオーナーも引き止めはしないそうですわ。
jpnSearchText:
何でも、映画関係者にスカウトされたとかで……
クラブのオーナーも引き止めはしないそうですわ。

engChrName: You have to admire a show of respect like that. It's got to be a blow to their bottom line, losing someone like her.
engSearchText:
You have to admire a show of respect like that.
It's got to be a blow to their bottom line, losing
someone like her.
jpnChrName: 儲けを考えりゃどうかとは思いますが…… 俺としちゃ、嫌いになれない主義ですわ。
jpnSearchText:
儲けを考えりゃどうかとは思いますが……
俺としちゃ、嫌いになれない主義ですわ。

engChrName: We had some scuffles out in the alley this morning.
engSearchText: We had some scuffles out in the alley this morning.
jpnChrName: 今朝、この路地裏でも何件か 乱闘騒ぎがありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
今朝、この路地裏でも何件か
乱闘騒ぎがありましてね。

engChrName: They were practically back-to-back, which is unheard of at such an early hour, even in our neck of the woods. Or desert, rather.
engSearchText:
They were practically back-to-back, which is unheard
of at such an early hour, even in our neck of
the woods. Or desert, rather.
jpnChrName: 朝っぱらから立て続けに起こるってのは、 この通りでも流石に珍しいもんです。
jpnSearchText:
朝っぱらから立て続けに起こるってのは、
この通りでも流石に珍しいもんです。

engChrName: Fights are such headaches for me. If any break out at places we're contracted with, I have to go and sort them out, which is no fun.
engSearchText:
Fights are such headaches for me. If any break out at
places we're contracted with, I have to go and sort
them out, which is no fun.
jpnChrName: 俺も契約店で乱闘があれば色々と 後始末せにゃならんし、面倒な話ですわ。
jpnSearchText:
俺も契約店で乱闘があれば色々と
後始末せにゃならんし、面倒な話ですわ。

engChrName: Hey there, folks! Need something to do tonight? In fact, you boys thinking of going off by yourselves later?
engSearchText:
Hey there, folks! Need something to do tonight?
In fact, you boys thinking of going off by
yourselves later?
jpnChrName: おや、お兄さん方こんな夜に何かお探しで？ もし良ければ、後でお兄さん方二人でどうです？
jpnSearchText:
おや、お兄さん方こんな夜に何かお探しで？
もし良ければ、後でお兄さん方二人でどうです？

engChrName: Because if you are, I know some fun joints you'll enjoy that I keep to myself during the day, if you know what I mean.
engSearchText:
Because if you are, I know some fun joints you'll
enjoy that I keep to myself during the day, if you
know what I mean.
jpnChrName: 昼間には案内していない 良いお店があるものでしてねェ……
jpnSearchText:
昼間には案内していない
良いお店があるものでしてねェ……

engChrName: Hell yeah. Now you're speaking my language.
engSearchText: Hell yeah. Now you're speaking my language.
jpnChrName: ふん、面白そうだな。
jpnSearchText: ふん、面白そうだな。

engChrName: I'm from Langport, so I know a thing or two about having fun. Definitely interested to see how good this town can party.
engSearchText:
I'm from Langport, so I know a thing or two about
having fun. Definitely interested to see how good this
town can party.
jpnChrName: オレも煌都の遊び人、ここでサルバッドの 夜と見比べておくのも悪かねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
オレも煌都の遊び人、ここでサルバッドの
夜と見比べておくのも悪かねぇ。

engChrName: That's the spirit! Then here's a tip: check out the underground nightclub that's just past here.
engSearchText:
That's the spirit! Then here's a tip: check out the
underground nightclub that's just past here.
jpnChrName: そうこなくっちゃ！ 実はこの先の地下にナイトクラブがありましてなァ。
jpnSearchText:
そうこなくっちゃ！
実はこの先の地下にナイトクラブがありましてなァ。

engChrName: The girls there are the real deal. Just about everyone comes away from there a happy customer, trust me.
engSearchText:
The girls there are the real deal. Just about everyone
comes away from there a happy customer, trust me.
jpnChrName: メンバーの素材も良いモノで、色んな客層に 好評なものなんですよ、これがね。
jpnSearchText:
メンバーの素材も良いモノで、色んな客層に
好評なものなんですよ、これがね。

engChrName: Aaron, your thoughts remain sparkling pure, I hope.
engSearchText: Aaron, your thoughts remain sparkling pure, I hope.
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……？
jpnSearchText: アーロンさん……？

engChrName: Stay focused, kid. We're here on business, remember?
engSearchText: Stay focused, kid. We're here on business, remember?
jpnChrName: 全く、遊びに来てる訳じゃないっての。
jpnSearchText: 全く、遊びに来てる訳じゃないっての。

engChrName: Though granted, it might not be the worst idea to slip in there for a bit. Never know what kind of dirt you'll dig up in those joints.
engSearchText:
Though granted, it might not be the worst idea to slip
in there for a bit. Never know what kind of dirt you'll
dig up in those joints.
jpnChrName: だが、情報収集の価値があるなら 潜るのも一つの手かもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、情報収集の価値があるなら
潜るのも一つの手かもしれないな。

engChrName: It sounds like some new girls have recently joined the nightclub, too.
engSearchText:
It sounds like some new girls have recently joined the
nightclub, too.
jpnChrName: ナイトクラブの方で、最近は新しい メンバーが何人か入ったようでして。
jpnSearchText:
ナイトクラブの方で、最近は新しい
メンバーが何人か入ったようでして。

engChrName: They tend to have their reasons for being there, but they're all legit. You'd have to be crazy not to like what they have to offer.
engSearchText:
They tend to have their reasons for being there, but
they're all legit. You'd have to be crazy not to like
what they have to offer.
jpnChrName: 訳ありな人も多いですが、素材が良い以上は、 お客は素直に楽しまなきゃ失礼ってもんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
訳ありな人も多いですが、素材が良い以上は、
お客は素直に楽しまなきゃ失礼ってもんですよ。

engChrName: Hey there, boys! Out doing a little sightseeing?
engSearchText: Hey there, boys! Out doing a little sightseeing?
jpnChrName: お兄さんお兄さん、皆さんも観光で？
jpnSearchText: お兄さんお兄さん、皆さんも観光で？

engChrName: If you're looking for something to check out, I can hook you up with all kinds of places! Everybody knows me around here.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for something to check out, I can
hook you up with all kinds of places!
Everybody knows me around here.
jpnChrName: もし良ければ、楽しめるお店に 俺が色々と口利きしやしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
もし良ければ、楽しめるお店に
俺が色々と口利きしやしょうか？

engChrName: Tharbad is full of fun spots that only the locals really know. We've got casinos, bars...
engSearchText:
Tharbad is full of fun spots that only the locals
really know. We've got casinos, bars...
jpnChrName: この街も穴場ってのが多いんですよ、 例えばカジノに、バーに……
jpnSearchText:
この街も穴場ってのが多いんですよ、
例えばカジノに、バーに……

engChrName: If it was just us lads talking, I could even tell you about some of the city's 'hottest' attractions, if you catch my drift.
engSearchText:
If it was just us lads talking, I could even tell you
about some of the city's 'hottest' attractions, if you
catch my drift.
jpnChrName: おっと、お兄さん達だけだったらもっと 良いお店も紹介できたんですがねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
おっと、お兄さん達だけだったらもっと
良いお店も紹介できたんですがねぇ……

engChrName: Oh? What do you mean by 'hot'? Because if it involves some hot ass, I'm down to party.
engSearchText:
Oh? What do you mean by 'hot'? Because if it
involves some hot ass, I'm down to party.
jpnChrName: へぇ……もっと良いお店ね……？ 綺麗どころってんなら行かない手はねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ……もっと良いお店ね……？
綺麗どころってんなら行かない手はねぇな。

engChrName: A-hem! Aaron, you seem to be forgetting we have Feri with us.
engSearchText:
A-hem! Aaron, you seem to be forgetting we have
Feri with us.
jpnChrName: アーロンさん……フェリちゃんもいるのは 忘れないでくださいね……？
jpnSearchText:
アーロンさん……フェリちゃんもいるのは
忘れないでくださいね……？

engChrName: To be fair, spots like that can be worth visitin' in our line of work. You'd be surprised how much dirt you can dig up in places like that.
engSearchText:
To be fair, spots like that can be worth visitin' in our
line of work. You'd be surprised how much dirt you
can dig up in places like that.
jpnChrName: まあ……そういうところも案外、 情報は集まるものではあるけどな……
jpnSearchText:
まあ……そういうところも案外、
情報は集まるものではあるけどな……

engChrName: But she's right. You can forget it while we've got the kid with us. Just keep it in the back of your mind for later.
engSearchText:
But she's right. You can forget it while we've got the
kid with us. Just keep it in the back of your mind
for later.
jpnChrName: 女子供を連れて入るところじゃねぇ、 今は気に留めるくらいにしておくぞ。
jpnSearchText:
女子供を連れて入るところじゃねぇ、
今は気に留めるくらいにしておくぞ。

engChrName: People often refer to Tharbad as the city of pleasure, and for good reason.
engSearchText:
People often refer to Tharbad as the city of pleasure,
and for good reason.
jpnChrName: サルバッドの別名は何たって 《遊興都市》ですからね！
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの別名は何たって
《遊興都市》ですからね！

engChrName: There's plenty more to be found here beyond just sparkly hotels and traditional rest-houses.
engSearchText:
There's plenty more to be found here beyond just
sparkly hotels and traditional rest-houses.
jpnChrName: そりゃあ、高貴なホテルや伝統的な 療養施設以外にも色々あるもんなんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
そりゃあ、高貴なホテルや伝統的な
療養施設以外にも色々あるもんなんですよ。

engChrName: If you want to learn more, I'd be more than happy to fill you in. Just ask!
engSearchText:
If you want to learn more, I'd be more than happy to
fill you in. Just ask!
jpnChrName: まあ、その手のお店についての 案内ならお任せあれってところです。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その手のお店についての
案内ならお任せあれってところです。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I guess the film festival's going to start soon, isn't it? People seem to be awfully excited for it, but...
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I guess the film festival's going to start
soon, isn't it? People seem to be awfully excited for
it, but...
jpnChrName: 映画祭……そういえばもう始まるのか。 凄い熱気ではあるけど……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭……そういえばもう始まるのか。
凄い熱気ではあるけど……

engChrName: If that girl dances at the parade, I guess that means I really won't see her at the nightclub ever again, will I?
engSearchText:
If that girl dances at the parade, I guess that means I
really won't see her at the nightclub ever again, will I?
jpnChrName: あの子は……このパレードで舞いを見せたら、 あのナイトクラブで会う事も無いのかな……
jpnSearchText:
あの子は……このパレードで舞いを見せたら、
あのナイトクラブで会う事も無いのかな……

engChrName: It was a short run, but when I think about it, maybe the film festival's the best way for her to close things out, after all.
engSearchText:
It was a short run, but when I think about it, maybe
the film festival's the best way for her to close things
out, after all.
jpnChrName: 映画祭……はは、短い間だったけど 応援してきた子の締め括りには良いのかもね……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭……はは、短い間だったけど
応援してきた子の締め括りには良いのかもね……

engChrName: My beautiful savior... I hear she's going to be quitting the nightclub. Could it be true?
engSearchText:
My beautiful savior... I hear she's going to be quitting
the nightclub. Could it be true?
jpnChrName: 僕にとっての救世主のようなあの子…… ナイトクラブを辞めちゃうって話、本当かな……
jpnSearchText:
僕にとっての救世主のようなあの子……
ナイトクラブを辞めちゃうって話、本当かな……

engChrName: I mean, yeah, I'm excited to watch her perform in the parade. But if she doesn't come back to the club...
engSearchText:
I mean, yeah, I'm excited to watch her perform in
the parade. But if she doesn't come back to the club...
jpnChrName: 映画祭のパレードで見るのも楽しみだけど、 そのままクラブに戻らないとしたら……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭のパレードで見るのも楽しみだけど、
そのままクラブに戻らないとしたら……

engChrName: Wh-What am I supposed to do? She and I have made so many wonderful memories there! She can't just LEAVE!
engSearchText:
Wh-What am I supposed to do? She and I have made
so many wonderful memories there! She can't
just LEAVE!
jpnChrName: 僕にとって……あのクラブこそが あの子との思い出の場所なのに……！
jpnSearchText:
僕にとって……あのクラブこそが
あの子との思い出の場所なのに……！

engChrName: I was... I was even starting to think about maybe settling down in this city. Like I'd finally found my home. But now...now what?!
engSearchText:
I was... I was even starting to think about maybe
settling down in this city. Like I'd finally found
my home. But now...now what?!
jpnChrName: ……この先僕はどうすれば……！ 長期滞在も考え始めていたのに……！
jpnSearchText:
……この先僕はどうすれば……！
長期滞在も考え始めていたのに……！

engChrName: (This dork's completely lost it. Even I can't imagine throwing literally everything away for a girl like this sad sack.)
engSearchText:
(This dork's completely lost it. Even I can't imagine
throwing literally everything away for a girl like this
sad sack.)
jpnChrName: （おいおい何たる業の深さだ……   女に困らないオレにはとても考えられねェ……）
jpnSearchText:
（おいおい何たる業の深さだ……
女に困らないオレにはとても考えられねェ……）

engChrName: If... If that girl gets picked up for the film festival and she...she gets farther and farther out of reach, then...
engSearchText:
If... If that girl gets picked up for the film festival and
she...she gets farther and farther out of reach, then...
jpnChrName: もしも彼女が映画祭で買われて、上に上に…… 僕の手の届かない所に行ってしまったら……
jpnSearchText:
もしも彼女が映画祭で買われて、上に上に……
僕の手の届かない所に行ってしまったら……

engChrName: Does that mean I won't be able to watch her dance anymore? Will I...not be able to breathe the same air as her?
engSearchText:
Does that mean I won't be able to watch her
dance anymore? Will I...not be able to breathe the
same air as her?
jpnChrName: 僕はもう……彼女の息遣いすら感じる同じ空間で…… あの子の踊りを見る事も無いのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
僕はもう……彼女の息遣いすら感じる同じ空間で……
あの子の踊りを見る事も無いのかな……？

engChrName: Gazing at her from farther and farther away, will that...will that still give me the strength to live like before...?
engSearchText:
Gazing at her from farther and farther away, will
that...will that still give me the strength to live like
before...?
jpnChrName: 遠くから眺めるだけの彼女の姿は…… 僕に生きる力をくれるんだろうか……？
jpnSearchText:
遠くから眺めるだけの彼女の姿は……
僕に生きる力をくれるんだろうか……？

engChrName: Last night, I saw...that girl at the nightclub again. Oof, just remembering her makes me feel so...!
engSearchText:
Last night, I saw...that girl at the nightclub again.
Oof, just remembering her makes me feel so...!
jpnChrName: 昨日のナイトクラブ……あの子が…… うぅ、思い出しただけで……！
jpnSearchText:
昨日のナイトクラブ……あの子が……
うぅ、思い出しただけで……！

engChrName: *sigh* What am I doing? That dancer is my daughter's age. Yet here I am, lusting after her...
engSearchText:
*sigh* What am I doing? That dancer is my
daughter's age. Yet here I am, lusting after her...
jpnChrName: ああ、僕は何て事を…… 自分の娘くらいの歳の子で……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、僕は何て事を……
自分の娘くらいの歳の子で……

engChrName: But I can't...I can't stop myself! I don't care if it's wrong! I've gone too far to give up now!
engSearchText:
But I can't...I can't stop myself! I don't care if
it's wrong! I've gone too far to give up now!
jpnChrName: ああ、でもやめられない……！ この罪深さすらも今となっては……！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、でもやめられない……！
この罪深さすらも今となっては……！

engChrName: (Last night, huh? That must make him a fan of a certain dancer.)
engSearchText:
(Last night, huh? That must make him a fan of a
certain dancer.)
jpnChrName: （昨日の……まあ、あの子のファンって   ところなんだろうが……）
jpnSearchText:
（昨日の……まあ、あの子のファンって
ところなんだろうが……）

engChrName: (Guess it takes all kinds when you're as popular as her.)
engSearchText:
(Guess it takes all kinds when you're as popular
as her.)
jpnChrName: （そりゃあ、色んなファンもできちまうよな。）
jpnSearchText: （そりゃあ、色んなファンもできちまうよな。）

engChrName: (Yeah, this guy's having a real normal one. He's in way too deep.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah, this guy's having a real normal one. He's in
way too deep.)
jpnChrName: （ああ……難儀っつうかなんていうか……   こりゃあなかなか業が深そうだぜ……）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ……難儀っつうかなんていうか……
こりゃあなかなか業が深そうだぜ……）

engChrName: (I don't get it. Are you guys talking about that place you two visited last night?)
engSearchText:
(I don't get it. Are you guys talking about that place
you two visited last night?)
jpnChrName: （えっと……昨晩行ったお店の事ですか……？）
jpnSearchText: （えっと……昨晩行ったお店の事ですか……？）

engChrName: (*sigh* All I'll say is, whatever you two saw in there, I'm glad Feri wasn't exposed to it.)
engSearchText:
(*sigh* All I'll say is, whatever you two saw in there,
I'm glad Feri wasn't exposed to it.)
jpnChrName: （……フェリちゃんが触れなくて   良かったようですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……フェリちゃんが触れなくて
良かったようですね……）

engChrName: It's...so hard to explain what her dancing means to me. When we're in the same space, it's like...I can feel her very breath.
engSearchText:
It's...so hard to explain what her dancing means
to me. When we're in the same space, it's like...I can
feel her very breath.
jpnChrName: 同じ空間で……彼女の息遣いすら感じる 踊りは……最早僕の……何なのだろう。
jpnSearchText:
同じ空間で……彼女の息遣いすら感じる
踊りは……最早僕の……何なのだろう。

engChrName: Like our breathing is somehow...synchronized with one another...
engSearchText:
Like our breathing is somehow...synchronized with
one another...
jpnChrName: 踊っているあの子と僕の息遣いが、いつの間にか 同期しているような気がしてきて……
jpnSearchText:
踊っているあの子と僕の息遣いが、いつの間にか
同期しているような気がしてきて……

engChrName: It's as if her breathing is what keeps me alive! What gives me life itself!
engSearchText:
It's as if her breathing is what keeps me alive!
What gives me life itself!
jpnChrName: まるで……あそこにいる時の僕は、あの子の 呼吸で生きているみたいでもう……！
jpnSearchText:
まるで……あそこにいる時の僕は、あの子の
呼吸で生きているみたいでもう……！

engChrName: I know I saw that dancer somewhere around here at night.
engSearchText:
I know I saw that dancer somewhere around here
at night.
jpnChrName: あの娘さん…… 夜にこの辺で見かけたけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの娘さん……
夜にこの辺で見かけたけど……

engChrName: What could she be possibly doing in the Entertainment District at such a late hour? I need to find out...
engSearchText:
What could she be possibly doing in the
Entertainment District at such a late hour? I need to
find out...
jpnChrName: あんな時間に歓楽街で何をしているのかな…… 気になるしどこに行くのか……
jpnSearchText:
あんな時間に歓楽街で何をしているのかな……
気になるしどこに行くのか……

engChrName: Gah, what am I saying?! Just because my wife left me doesn't mean I can start stalking some local! I need to get my head on straight!
engSearchText:
Gah, what am I saying?! Just because my wife left me
doesn't mean I can start stalking some local! I need to
get my head on straight!
jpnChrName: って、いけないいけない！　妻に捨てられた とはいえ、地元の子をつけてしまうなんて！
jpnSearchText:
って、いけないいけない！　妻に捨てられた
とはいえ、地元の子をつけてしまうなんて！

engChrName: It's been a month since my wife left me. Since then, I've wondered which would mend my broken heart: beauty or excitement.
engSearchText:
It's been a month since my wife left me. Since then,
I've wondered which would mend my broken heart:
beauty or excitement.
jpnChrName: 妻に捨てられてはや一月…… 刺激と美のどちらが心を癒してくれるか……
jpnSearchText:
妻に捨てられてはや一月……
刺激と美のどちらが心を癒してくれるか……

engChrName: I've been traveling, trying to figure that out, and two days ago, I finally found my answer—nay, my fate, in the Cultural District!
engSearchText:
I've been traveling, trying to figure that out, and two
days ago, I finally found my answer—nay, my fate, in
the Cultural District!
jpnChrName: それすらわからず傷心旅行に来てしまったが一昨日、 伝統地区で希望を、運命を見つけた……！
jpnSearchText:
それすらわからず傷心旅行に来てしまったが一昨日、
伝統地区で希望を、運命を見つけた……！

engChrName: My heart needs both beauty and excitement, and I found it in that dancer! She's exactly what I've been looking for this whole time!
engSearchText:
My heart needs both beauty and excitement, and I
found it in that dancer! She's exactly what I've been
looking for this whole time!
jpnChrName: 刺激と美を併せ持つ、あの踊り子…… あれこそ僕の求めていたものなんだ……！
jpnSearchText:
刺激と美を併せ持つ、あの踊り子……
あれこそ僕の求めていたものなんだ……！

engChrName: Feels bad getting scammed by that seller, huh?
engSearchText: Feels bad getting scammed by that seller, huh?
jpnChrName: あの屋台に騙されちまうとは ご愁傷さまだな。
jpnSearchText:
あの屋台に騙されちまうとは
ご愁傷さまだな。

engChrName: But hey, at least you're not out that much money, right?
engSearchText:
But hey, at least you're not out that much
money, right?
jpnChrName: とはいえ、被害額なんて大した事ねえだろ？
jpnSearchText: とはいえ、被害額なんて大した事ねえだろ？

engChrName: I'd give up and take the loss if I were you. Consider it the price you pay for learning how things work in this town.
engSearchText:
I'd give up and take the loss if I were you. Consider it
the price you pay for learning how things work in
this town.
jpnChrName: それなら、これも社会勉強だと思ってさ。 今回の被害額は勉強代として諦めた方がいいぜ。
jpnSearchText:
それなら、これも社会勉強だと思ってさ。
今回の被害額は勉強代として諦めた方がいいぜ。

engChrName: Man, this film festival's turning out to be a bigger pain in the ass to secure than I thought. Hope we get bonuses for our trouble.
engSearchText:
Man, this film festival's turning out to be a bigger
pain in the ass to secure than I thought. Hope we get
bonuses for our trouble.
jpnChrName: これが映画祭か……予想以上に骨の折れる 警備になりそうだな、手当は出るかね。
jpnSearchText:
これが映画祭か……予想以上に骨の折れる
警備になりそうだな、手当は出るかね。

engChrName: Guess nobody's caught on to me going to the casino and smoking my hookah, though. I mean, nobody's yelled at me lately, so...
engSearchText:
Guess nobody's caught on to me going to the casino
and smoking my hookah, though. I mean, nobody's
yelled at me lately, so...
jpnChrName: しかし……今んところ上司は何も言ってこないし…… シーシャやカジノの件は……バレてないよな？
jpnSearchText:
しかし……今んところ上司は何も言ってこないし……
シーシャやカジノの件は……バレてないよな？

engChrName: Who knows? Just got to trust everything's good for now and actually focus on my job!
engSearchText:
Who knows? Just got to trust everything's good for
now and actually focus on my job!
jpnChrName: とにかく今は……そう信じて警備に 専念するしかない……！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく今は……そう信じて警備に
専念するしかない……！

engChrName: Shit, I didn't expect this to turn into such a big deal.
engSearchText:
Shit, I didn't expect this to turn into such a
big deal.
jpnChrName: やべぇ……よ、よもや こんなに大事になるとは……
jpnSearchText:
やべぇ……よ、よもや
こんなに大事になるとは……

engChrName: If they find out I was smoking that stuff, I'm in for a lot more than a write-up next time.
engSearchText:
If they find out I was smoking that stuff, I'm in for a
lot more than a write-up next time.
jpnChrName: 俺もあれを吸っていたのがバレたら…… 今度は始末書だけじゃ……
jpnSearchText:
俺もあれを吸っていたのがバレたら……
今度は始末書だけじゃ……

engChrName: I better keep my head low and just try to do my job for now. Do my job and hope for the best...
engSearchText:
I better keep my head low and just try to do my job
for now. Do my job and hope for the best...
jpnChrName: と、とにかく今はやる事やらないと……
jpnSearchText: と、とにかく今はやる事やらないと……

engChrName: Man, do people really expect me to just stand around doing nothing all day while this town's one big river of money?
engSearchText:
Man, do people really expect me to just stand around
doing nothing all day while this town's one big river
of money?
jpnChrName: フン、この盛況ン中で突っ立ってるだけの 仕事なんぞやっていられるか！
jpnSearchText:
フン、この盛況ン中で突っ立ってるだけの
仕事なんぞやっていられるか！

engChrName: Working hard's for suckers! I'm going to make a killing at this casino and then so long to the stuffy, low-paying cop life!
engSearchText:
Working hard's for suckers! I'm going to make a
