killing at this casino and then so long to the stuffy,
low-paying cop life!
jpnChrName: 見ていろ、俺はこのカジノで一儲けして、 安月給で頭の固い警察におさらばしてやる！
jpnSearchText:
見ていろ、俺はこのカジノで一儲けして、
安月給で頭の固い警察におさらばしてやる！

engChrName: I mean, what's fair about having us work while everyone else around here gets to have fun, huh? Nothing, that's what!
engSearchText:
I mean, what's fair about having us work while
everyone else around here gets to have fun, huh?
Nothing, that's what!
jpnChrName: そもそも、何で皆が楽しんでいる時に 俺らだけ働かにゃならないんだ、不公平じゃねぇか！
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、何で皆が楽しんでいる時に
俺らだけ働かにゃならないんだ、不公平じゃねぇか！

engChrName: (Talk about not being cut out for a job. This guy wouldn't know the meaning of hard work if it was tied to a brick and thrown at his face.)
engSearchText:
(Talk about not being cut out for a job. This guy
wouldn't know the meaning of hard work if it was
tied to a brick and thrown at his face.)
jpnChrName: （……この警官は……流石に不真面目とか   そういう話じゃ片付けられないな……）
jpnSearchText:
（……この警官は……流石に不真面目とか
そういう話じゃ片付けられないな……）

engChrName: Haha, these cutting-edge orbal hookahs are the best!
engSearchText: Haha, these cutting-edge orbal hookahs are the best!
jpnChrName: ははは、これは良いな 最新の導力シーシャ！
jpnSearchText:
ははは、これは良いな
最新の導力シーシャ！

engChrName: They're easy to hide, and even better, they're a great way to cope with the heat here.
engSearchText:
They're easy to hide, and even better, they're a great
way to cope with the heat here.
jpnChrName: これなら隠しやすいし、 何より暑さも和らぎそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
これなら隠しやすいし、
何より暑さも和らぎそうだ。

engChrName: I'm telling you, without a good way to relax, there's no way I'd be able to do my job.
engSearchText:
I'm telling you, without a good way to relax, there's
no way I'd be able to do my job.
jpnChrName: ふう、やっぱり息抜きも無きゃ 仕事も捗らないもんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、やっぱり息抜きも無きゃ
仕事も捗らないもんだよ。

engChrName: I bet something like this would do Officer Vernier some good, too. That woman seriously needs to learn to chill out.
engSearchText:
I bet something like this would do Officer Vernier
some good, too. That woman seriously needs to learn
to chill out.
jpnChrName: 同僚のバーニヤだって、 もう少し肩の力を抜けばいいのに。
jpnSearchText:
同僚のバーニヤだって、
もう少し肩の力を抜けばいいのに。

engChrName: Man, can't a guy take a little break in peace around here? The heat out here gets tiring when you aren't used to it.
engSearchText:
Man, can't a guy take a little break in peace
around here? The heat out here gets tiring when you
aren't used to it.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、多少の息抜きくらい良いじゃないか…… こちとらまだ暑さにも慣れないんだしさ。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、多少の息抜きくらい良いじゃないか……
こちとらまだ暑さにも慣れないんだしさ。

engChrName: All I did was smoke a bit of hookah on the job and I get written up for it. Bit harsh for such a minor offense, don't you think?
engSearchText:
All I did was smoke a bit of hookah on the job and I
get written up for it. Bit harsh for such a minor
offense, don't you think?
jpnChrName: 勤務中に少しシーシャを吸っただけで 始末書なんて……堅過ぎないか？
jpnSearchText:
勤務中に少しシーシャを吸っただけで
始末書なんて……堅過ぎないか？

engChrName: I heard there are these new pocket-sized orbal hookahs you can buy, though.
engSearchText:
I heard there are these new pocket-sized orbal
hookahs you can buy, though.
jpnChrName: そういや、最近はポケットサイズの 導力シーシャってのが出回っているが……
jpnSearchText:
そういや、最近はポケットサイズの
導力シーシャってのが出回っているが……

engChrName: I'm pretty interested. I hear they have a pretty refreshing flavor. Maybe I won't get caught with something like that. Hmm...
engSearchText:
I'm pretty interested. I hear they have a pretty
refreshing flavor. Maybe I won't get caught with
something like that. Hmm...
jpnChrName: あれならバレないか……？ 涼し気な味わいって聞くし、気になるな。
jpnSearchText:
あれならバレないか……？
涼し気な味わいって聞くし、気になるな。

engChrName: Phew, I didn't expect the film festival to be so wild and outrageous.
engSearchText:
Phew, I didn't expect the film festival to be so wild
and outrageous.
jpnChrName: くぅ～……まさか映画祭が、 こんなに熱気あるものだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
くぅ～……まさか映画祭が、
こんなに熱気あるものだなんて……

engChrName: I don't know if someone as ignorant about movies as me was meant to be here...
engSearchText:
I don't know if someone as ignorant about movies as
me was meant to be here...
jpnChrName: 私みたいなエンタメを知らない者が 覗きに来るんじゃなかった……
jpnSearchText:
私みたいなエンタメを知らない者が
覗きに来るんじゃなかった……

engChrName: All this energy is so much to take in. It's making my head spin...
engSearchText:
All this energy is so much to take in. It's making my
head spin...
jpnChrName: 何なんだこの気迫は……クラクラくる……
jpnSearchText: 何なんだこの気迫は……クラクラくる……

engChrName: (Whew...)
engSearchText: (Whew...)
jpnChrName: （きゅう……）
jpnSearchText: （きゅう……）

engChrName: Maybe it's just me, but do you get the feeling people are going a little...crazier than they were yesterday?
engSearchText:
Maybe it's just me, but do you get the feeling people
are going a little...crazier than they were yesterday?
jpnChrName: な、何だか昨日より一層 盛り上がっているみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
な、何だか昨日より一層
盛り上がっているみたいだけど……

engChrName: Do people here always go so hard when they're excited? I don't know how they can do it, if so.
engSearchText:
Do people here always go so hard when
they're excited? I don't know how they can do it, if so.
jpnChrName: ここではこのテンションが普通なのかな……？ だとしたら、ついて行けなさそうだ……
jpnSearchText:
ここではこのテンションが普通なのかな……？
だとしたら、ついて行けなさそうだ……

engChrName: If people are getting so hot and bothered about the film festival, I guess that's a good sign we're in for something fun, at least.
engSearchText:
If people are getting so hot and bothered about the
film festival, I guess that's a good sign we're in for
something fun, at least.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、これほど熱狂される映画祭は 面白そうな気もしてきたけどね。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、これほど熱狂される映画祭は
面白そうな気もしてきたけどね。

engChrName: I don't really watch movies, so I don't know much about what's going on, but even I'm pretty curious at this point.
engSearchText:
I don't really watch movies, so I don't know much
about what's going on, but even I'm pretty curious at
this point.
jpnChrName: 映画は観ないから詳しくはないが、 どんなものなんだろうねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
映画は観ないから詳しくはないが、
どんなものなんだろうねぇ。

engChrName: Boy, am I glad my client's got air conditioning in their office, or else I would've been a sweaty mess during our meeting.
engSearchText:
Boy, am I glad my client's got air conditioning in
their office, or else I would've been a sweaty mess
during our meeting.
jpnChrName: いやー、取引先の事務所に冷房があって 良かったよ、醜態を晒さずに済んだ。
jpnSearchText:
いやー、取引先の事務所に冷房があって
良かったよ、醜態を晒さずに済んだ。

engChrName: Actually, while we were talking, they told me there's going to be a film festival and that's why everyone is so jazzed up.
engSearchText:
Actually, while we were talking, they told me there's
going to be a film festival and that's why everyone is
so jazzed up.
jpnChrName: ところで、取引先に教えてもらったが どうやらこの活気は映画祭のものなんだってな。
jpnSearchText:
ところで、取引先に教えてもらったが
どうやらこの活気は映画祭のものなんだってな。

engChrName: I don't pay attention to entertainment news at all, so I had no idea they were putting on anything like that here.
engSearchText:
I don't pay attention to entertainment news at all, so I
had no idea they were putting on anything like
that here.
jpnChrName: エンタメ系のニュースは全然見ていないから、 ここで開催するのも初めて知ったよ……
jpnSearchText:
エンタメ系のニュースは全然見ていないから、
ここで開催するのも初めて知ったよ……

engChrName: It just so happens my schedule opened up, so I might make time to check it out, just to see what all the fuss is about.
engSearchText:
It just so happens my schedule opened up, so I might
make time to check it out, just to see what all the fuss
is about.
jpnChrName: 日程も丁度良く空いた事だし、せっかくだから どんなものか見物していこうかね。
jpnSearchText:
日程も丁度良く空いた事だし、せっかくだから
どんなものか見物していこうかね。

engChrName: It's so hot. How is it October and it's still feeling like this?
engSearchText:
It's so hot. How is it October and it's still feeling
like this?
jpnChrName: いやー、暑い暑い。 もう十月だってのにここまでだなんて。
jpnSearchText:
いやー、暑い暑い。
もう十月だってのにここまでだなんて。

engChrName: Next time I engage in talks to do business with a Central Eastern firm, I'm going to ask for winter meetings.
engSearchText:
Next time I engage in talks to do business with a
Central Eastern firm, I'm going to ask for
winter meetings.
jpnChrName: まったく、中東企業との商談なら 今後は冬にお願いしたいものだな……
jpnSearchText:
まったく、中東企業との商談なら
今後は冬にお願いしたいものだな……

engChrName: Anyway, is there going to be some sort of festival here? People seem to be awfully excited about whatever's brewing in town.
engSearchText:
Anyway, is there going to be some sort of
festival here? People seem to be awfully excited about
whatever's brewing in town.
jpnChrName: それにしても、何やら祭りでもあるのかな、 人々も随分と熱気を帯びているようだが。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、何やら祭りでもあるのかな、
人々も随分と熱気を帯びているようだが。

engChrName: I heard something crazy happened at Vegas Films last night in the midst of all their film festival prep.
engSearchText:
I heard something crazy happened at Vegas Films last
night in the midst of all their film festival prep.
jpnChrName: せっかくの映画祭なのに、昨晩ベガスフィルムで 何か大変そうな事件が起きたって……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくの映画祭なのに、昨晩ベガスフィルムで
何か大変そうな事件が起きたって……

engChrName: You know, I haven't seen Mr. Dillon around for a little while now. You don't think something happened to him, do you...?
engSearchText:
You know, I haven't seen Mr. Dillon around for a
little while now. You don't think something
happened to him, do you...?
jpnChrName: そう言えば、ギャスパー社長の姿が 見えない気もするけど、もしかして……
jpnSearchText:
そう言えば、ギャスパー社長の姿が
見えない気もするけど、もしかして……

engChrName: I know it's rude to gossip, but as a creator and all, it's hard not for my mind to run wild with this sort of thing.
engSearchText:
I know it's rude to gossip, but as a creator and all, it's
hard not for my mind to run wild with this sort
of thing.
jpnChrName: うーん、不謹慎なのは判っているけど…… クリエイターの性か色々と想像してしまうな。
jpnSearchText:
うーん、不謹慎なのは判っているけど……
クリエイターの性か色々と想像してしまうな。

engChrName: Well, maybe we'll hear something later. For now, I'm just going to try and get as much inspiration at the festival as I can!
engSearchText:
Well, maybe we'll hear something later. For now, I'm
just going to try and get as much inspiration at the
festival as I can!
jpnChrName: まあ、そこら辺も映画祭の中でわかるのかもね、 今は映画祭でインスピレーションを得ないと！
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そこら辺も映画祭の中でわかるのかもね、
今は映画祭でインスピレーションを得ないと！

engChrName: Now that I think about it, they're probably more concerned with judging movies for the festival right now than with checking out our work.
engSearchText:
Now that I think about it, they're probably more
concerned with judging movies for the festival right
now than with checking out our work.
jpnChrName: そういえば……提出した自主製作映画の方、 このままだとやっぱり審査は先になっちゃうのかな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……提出した自主製作映画の方、
このままだとやっぱり審査は先になっちゃうのかな。

engChrName: It might be best to just focus on checking out the festival and make something else. I'm sure we can try again later.
engSearchText:
It might be best to just focus on checking out the
festival and make something else. I'm sure we can try
again later.
jpnChrName: まあ、まだ機会はあるだろうしね、 映画祭を見て改めて作っても良いかも。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、まだ機会はあるだろうしね、
映画祭を見て改めて作っても良いかも。

engChrName: Maybe we'll try bringing in another film once things calm down around here. It'll give us time to apply what we learn here, too.
engSearchText:
Maybe we'll try bringing in another film once things
calm down around here. It'll give us time to apply
what we learn here, too.
jpnChrName: ほとぼりが冷めたあたりにでも 新作持ってこようかな、映画祭も参考になったし。
jpnSearchText:
ほとぼりが冷めたあたりにでも
新作持ってこようかな、映画祭も参考になったし。

engChrName: You've got this, Cervi! I know you're not that athletic, but you can still do it! I believe in you!
engSearchText:
You've got this, Cervi! I know you're not that athletic,
but you can still do it! I believe in you!
jpnChrName: 頑張れチェルヴィ！ 運動音痴でもきっとやれる……！
jpnSearchText:
頑張れチェルヴィ！
運動音痴でもきっとやれる……！

engChrName: Just think: if you leave a good impression with Gotti, we might be able to get him to watch our film! It'll be all worth it in the end!
engSearchText:
Just think: if you leave a good impression with Gotti,
we might be able to get him to watch our film! It'll be
all worth it in the end!
jpnChrName: ここで爪痕を残せば、持ち込みの自主製作の映画も 見てもらえるかもしれないぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
ここで爪痕を残せば、持ち込みの自主製作の映画も
見てもらえるかもしれないぞ……！

engChrName: I feel like things are extra chaotic outside today, even with the film festival so close.
engSearchText:
I feel like things are extra chaotic outside today, even
with the film festival so close.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が近づいているとはいえ…… 今日は外がやたらと騒がしいね。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が近づいているとはいえ……
今日は外がやたらと騒がしいね。

engChrName: Even in Vegas Films itself, it felt weirdly tense for some reason. Maybe I'm just imagining things, but I don't know...
engSearchText:
Even in Vegas Films itself, it felt weirdly tense for
some reason. Maybe I'm just imagining things, but I
don't know...
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルム社内も気のせいか、 妙にぴりぴりしていたような……
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルム社内も気のせいか、
妙にぴりぴりしていたような……

engChrName: Guess I'll have to give up on getting a tour today. Today feels like a really bad day to disturb them.
engSearchText:
Guess I'll have to give up on getting a tour today.
Today feels like a really bad day to disturb them.
jpnChrName: 流石に邪魔しちゃ悪いし、 今日は見学やめておこうかなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
流石に邪魔しちゃ悪いし、
今日は見学やめておこうかなぁ……

engChrName: I officially dropped our amateur film off at Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
I officially dropped our amateur film off at
Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: 応募作品、一応渡してはみたけど……
jpnSearchText: 応募作品、一応渡してはみたけど……

engChrName: Because they're so busy getting ready for the festival, though, they said they won't be able to check it out right away.
engSearchText:
Because they're so busy getting ready for the festival,
though, they said they won't be able to check it out
right away.
jpnChrName: やっぱり映画祭の準備で、 すぐには見てもらえないってね。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり映画祭の準備で、
すぐには見てもらえないってね。

engChrName: I get that we came at a busy time and all, but I hope it doesn't take too long. I really want to know what they think!
engSearchText:
I get that we came at a busy time and all, but I hope it
doesn't take too long. I really want to know what
they think!
jpnChrName: 忙しい時期に来た僕らが悪いとはいえ…… でも、やっぱり結果は早く知りたいよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
忙しい時期に来た僕らが悪いとはいえ……
でも、やっぱり結果は早く知りたいよなぁ。

engChrName: I brought a memory quartz containing an independent film I made with my friend, as well as a movie report.
engSearchText:
I brought a memory quartz containing an
independent film I made with my friend, as well as a
movie report.
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムといえば、 今を時めく気鋭の映画会社だからね！
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムといえば、
今を時めく気鋭の映画会社だからね！

engChrName: When you think successful, vibrant studio, these days the first thing that comes to mind is Vegas Films, right?
engSearchText:
When you think successful, vibrant studio, these days
the first thing that comes to mind is Vegas
Films, right?
jpnChrName: そういうところなら、僕ら駆け出しも 公平に評価してくれないかなって事でね。
jpnSearchText:
そういうところなら、僕ら駆け出しも
公平に評価してくれないかなって事でね。

engChrName: So I figured, who better to ask to evaluate our work as amateur filmmakers than them? Hopefully they'll give us a fair shake.
engSearchText:
So I figured, who better to ask to evaluate our work as
amateur filmmakers than them? Hopefully they'll give
us a fair shake.
jpnChrName: 仲間と作った自主製作映画の記録結晶と 映画のレポートを持ってきたんだ！
jpnSearchText:
仲間と作った自主製作映画の記録結晶と
映画のレポートを持ってきたんだ！

engChrName: Whoa, check it out, Cervi! It's the Al-Jumeirah hotel!
engSearchText: Whoa, check it out, Cervi! It's the Al-Jumeirah hotel!
jpnChrName: うわっはぁ、チェルヴィも見てみなよ あのアルジュメイラホテル！
jpnSearchText:
うわっはぁ、チェルヴィも見てみなよ
あのアルジュメイラホテル！

engChrName: I know we don't have any business there, but wow, it sure would make for some amazing shots if we got to film it!
engSearchText:
I know we don't have any business there, but wow, it
sure would make for some amazing shots if we got to
film it!
jpnChrName: 僕らには縁の無い場所と思ってたけど…… 被写体としてはこの上ない壮観さだよ！
jpnSearchText:
僕らには縁の無い場所と思ってたけど……
被写体としてはこの上ない壮観さだよ！

engChrName: It's nice and all, Nino, but are you telling me you didn't notice the famous director who literally just walked right past us?
engSearchText:
It's nice and all, Nino, but are you telling me you
didn't notice the famous director who literally just
walked right past us?
jpnChrName: ニーノ、それもいいけどさっきすれ違った 有名な監督さんに気づかなかった？
jpnSearchText:
ニーノ、それもいいけどさっきすれ違った
有名な監督さんに気づかなかった？

engChrName: You know that guy with the glasses? That had to have been Leslie Lam! The director! I just know it!
engSearchText:
You know that guy with the glasses? That had to have
been Leslie Lam! The director! I just know it!
jpnChrName: ほら、さっきの眼鏡の人、 絶対に九龍映像のラム監督だったって！
jpnSearchText:
ほら、さっきの眼鏡の人、
絶対に九龍映像のラム監督だったって！

engChrName: Holy crap, good eye! I didn't realize that at all!
engSearchText: Holy crap, good eye! I didn't realize that at all!
jpnChrName: マジか、気づかなかったよ！
jpnSearchText: マジか、気づかなかったよ！

engChrName: Did you happen to see where he was headed?
engSearchText: Did you happen to see where he was headed?
jpnChrName: で、その人はどこに向かって行ったんだい？
jpnSearchText: で、その人はどこに向かって行ったんだい？

engChrName: It looked like he was walking over to...Vegas Films!
engSearchText: It looked like he was walking over to...Vegas Films!
jpnChrName: えーっと、ホテルの向かいの ……《ベガスフィルム》！
jpnSearchText:
えーっと、ホテルの向かいの
……《ベガスフィルム》！

engChrName: Wait. That's where we're supposed to be going!
engSearchText: Wait. That's where we're supposed to be going!
jpnChrName: って、《ベガスフィルム》って 私達の目的地じゃん！
jpnSearchText:
って、《ベガスフィルム》って
私達の目的地じゃん！

engChrName: Yikes! You're totally right! I got so caught up sightseeing, I forgot why we're even here.
engSearchText:
Yikes! You're totally right! I got so caught up
sightseeing, I forgot why we're even here.
jpnChrName: そ、そうだった！ いやー、すっかり観光気分だったよ。
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうだった！
いやー、すっかり観光気分だったよ。

engChrName: I'm glad you said something or else I wouldn't have remembered to drop off our film there!
engSearchText:
I'm glad you said something or else I wouldn't have
remembered to drop off our film there!
jpnChrName: 応募作品も持ってきたのに、 あやうく忘れるところだった！
jpnSearchText:
応募作品も持ってきたのに、
あやうく忘れるところだった！

engChrName: ...Anyway, yesterday I ended up staying back until night to get some intensive dance lessons.
engSearchText:
...Anyway, yesterday I ended up staying back until
night to get some intensive dance lessons.
jpnChrName: ……って感じで、昨日は夜まで 居残りでダンスレッスン漬けでね。
jpnSearchText:
……って感じで、昨日は夜まで
居残りでダンスレッスン漬けでね。

engChrName: By sheer luck, I managed to give Mr. Gotti our film, but unfortunately, we didn't have time to actually talk.
engSearchText:
By sheer luck, I managed to give Mr. Gotti our film,
but unfortunately, we didn't have time to
actually talk.
jpnChrName: 自主製作の映画はなんとか渡せたけど ゴッチ監督と雑談してる暇はなかったわ……
jpnSearchText:
自主製作の映画はなんとか渡せたけど
ゴッチ監督と雑談してる暇はなかったわ……

engChrName: Damn, Cervi, I had no idea. You definitely look like you've been through the wringer, though...
engSearchText:
Damn, Cervi, I had no idea. You definitely look like
you've been through the wringer, though...
jpnChrName: おつかれチェルヴィ…… 少し見ない内にげっそりしたな……
jpnSearchText:
おつかれチェルヴィ……
少し見ない内にげっそりしたな……

engChrName: But good for you! It sounds like everything with the festival and parade is still on track, too.
engSearchText:
But good for you! It sounds like everything with the
festival and parade is still on track, too.
jpnChrName: でも良かったじゃないか、 パレードも映画祭も無事に開催するみたいだぞ。
jpnSearchText:
でも良かったじゃないか、
パレードも映画祭も無事に開催するみたいだぞ。

engChrName: You can be sure I'll be filming you as you're out there strutting your stuff. It should make for a nice trip souvenir!
engSearchText:
You can be sure I'll be filming you as you're out there
strutting your stuff. It should make for a nice
trip souvenir!
jpnChrName: 君の雄姿はしっかりと映像に残しておくから 楽しみにしててくれよ！
jpnSearchText:
君の雄姿はしっかりと映像に残しておくから
楽しみにしててくれよ！

engChrName: Thank you, Nino. I have no intention of giving up on being a film creator, but I would like something to remember all this by.
engSearchText:
Thank you, Nino. I have no intention of giving up on
being a film creator, but I would like something to
remember all this by.
jpnChrName: ありがとう……クリエイター志望だけど こういう時は撮ってもらえると嬉しいわね。
jpnSearchText:
ありがとう……クリエイター志望だけど
こういう時は撮ってもらえると嬉しいわね。

engChrName: Oh, I just remembered, that specialty store across the street sells energy drinks that're supposed to help with fatigue.
engSearchText:
Oh, I just remembered, that specialty store across the
street sells energy drinks that're supposed to help
with fatigue.
jpnChrName: そういえば向こうのセレクトショップで 疲労回復に効くドリンクが売ってたな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば向こうのセレクトショップで
疲労回復に効くドリンクが売ってたな。

engChrName: I'll buy you one. My treat for how hard you've been working.
engSearchText:
I'll buy you one. My treat for how hard you've
been working.
jpnChrName: 折角だから奢ってやるよ！
jpnSearchText: 折角だから奢ってやるよ！

engChrName: Aww, I'd like that... Thanks, Nino.
engSearchText: Aww, I'd like that... Thanks, Nino.
jpnChrName: あはは……ありがとう、ニーノ。
jpnSearchText: あはは……ありがとう、ニーノ。

engChrName: I can't afford to make a mockery of Mr. Gotti's Carnal Cavalcade with any regular old, mediocre dancing. No sir!
engSearchText:
I can't afford to make a mockery of Mr. Gotti's
Carnal Cavalcade with any regular old,
mediocre dancing. No sir!
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督のフォクシーパレードを 穢すようなみっともないダンスはできないもんね。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督のフォクシーパレードを
穢すようなみっともないダンスはできないもんね。

engChrName: I'm a new person and I'm going to prove myself to him no matter what! Not as a performer, but a fellow, budding film director!
engSearchText:
I'm a new person and I'm going to prove myself to
him no matter what! Not as a performer, but a fellow,
budding film director!
jpnChrName: 生まれ変わった私を監督に見せつけてやるわよ！ ……演者じゃなくてクリエイター志望だけどね！
jpnSearchText:
生まれ変わった私を監督に見せつけてやるわよ！
……演者じゃなくてクリエイター志望だけどね！

engChrName: Did something happen at Vegas Films after we left last night? We saw a ton of cops walking around this morning.
engSearchText:
Did something happen at Vegas Films after we left
last night? We saw a ton of cops walking around
this morning.
jpnChrName: 昨晩、私達が帰った後にベガスフィルムで 何か事件があったのかな……今朝は警官もいっぱいいたけど。
jpnSearchText:
昨晩、私達が帰った後にベガスフィルムで
何か事件があったのかな……今朝は警官もいっぱいいたけど。

engChrName: Maybe I'm overthinking it. The film festival is still happening, so whatever it is, it can't have been that big of a deal, could it?
engSearchText:
Maybe I'm overthinking it. The film festival is still
happening, so whatever it is, it can't have been that
big of a deal, could it?
jpnChrName: まあ、映画祭は予定通りにやるみたいだし…… そこまでの大事という訳でもないのかな？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、映画祭は予定通りにやるみたいだし……
そこまでの大事という訳でもないのかな？

engChrName: In which case, once things calm down, we'll visit them again and try to sell them on our work!
engSearchText:
In which case, once things calm down, we'll visit
them again and try to sell them on our work!
jpnChrName: もしそうなら、色々落ち着いた後にでも、 改めて売り込みに来てみたいなー。
jpnSearchText:
もしそうなら、色々落ち着いた後にでも、
改めて売り込みに来てみたいなー。

engChrName: Now that we have a plan, we're just going to take in the film festival and use what we learn in our next movie. It'll be great!
engSearchText:
Now that we have a plan, we're just going to take in
the film festival and use what we learn in our
next movie. It'll be great!
jpnChrName: よーし、そうと決まれば今は映画祭楽しんで、 次作の参考にするよーっ！
jpnSearchText:
よーし、そうと決まれば今は映画祭楽しんで、
次作の参考にするよーっ！

engChrName: I really want to show Mr. Gotti our independent movie that we brought, if at all possible.
engSearchText:
I really want to show Mr. Gotti our independent
movie that we brought, if at all possible.
jpnChrName: どこかで、持ち込みの自主製作の映画を ゴッチ監督に見せたいんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
どこかで、持ち込みの自主製作の映画を
ゴッチ監督に見せたいんだけど……

engChrName: First, I need to learn how to dance so they'll bring me into the parade as a backup dancer!
engSearchText:
First, I need to learn how to dance so they'll bring me
into the parade as a backup dancer!
jpnChrName: まずは追加キャストとして ちゃんと踊れるようになるのが先ね！
jpnSearchText:
まずは追加キャストとして
ちゃんと踊れるようになるのが先ね！

engChrName: Just you watch, Nino! I'm going to bowl over the people running the festival with my smooth moves, or die trying!
engSearchText:
Just you watch, Nino! I'm going to bowl over the
people running the festival with my smooth moves, or
die trying!
jpnChrName: 待っててニーノ、 ちゃんと爪痕を残してみせるわよっ！
jpnSearchText:
待っててニーノ、
ちゃんと爪痕を残してみせるわよっ！

engChrName: Hey, if you get a chance to talk to Mr. Gotti, you should bring up our movie!
engSearchText:
Hey, if you get a chance to talk to Mr. Gotti, you
should bring up our movie!
jpnChrName: そうだ、ゴッチ監督と話す機会があるなら 映画の持ち込みの事も話してみろよ！
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、ゴッチ監督と話す機会があるなら
映画の持ち込みの事も話してみろよ！

engChrName: Totally! I don't know if I'll be able to get a word in edgewise with him, though, let alone talk about that...
engSearchText:
Totally! I don't know if I'll be able to get a word in
edgewise with him, though, let alone talk about that...
jpnChrName: そうね、そんな余裕あるか分からないけど……！
jpnSearchText: そうね、そんな余裕あるか分からないけど……！

engChrName: Everybody at Vegas Films seems busy getting ready for the film festival. I'm worried we might've ruffled some feathers.
engSearchText:
Everybody at Vegas Films seems busy getting ready
for the film festival. I'm worried we might've ruffled
some feathers.
jpnChrName: やっぱり映画祭の準備で忙しそうだね。 今回は少し悪い事をしたかな……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり映画祭の準備で忙しそうだね。
今回は少し悪い事をしたかな……

engChrName: We got impatient and tried to give them a proposal we came up with, but it's probably going to be a while before we hear back. *sigh*
engSearchText:
We got impatient and tried to give them a proposal
we came up with, but it's probably going to be a while
before we hear back. *sigh*
jpnChrName: 居ても立っても居られなくて企画を持ち込みに来たけど、 この分では結果を聞けるのも大分先だろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
居ても立っても居られなくて企画を持ち込みに来たけど、
この分では結果を聞けるのも大分先だろうけど……

engChrName: I want to make sure we enjoy our time out here, especially as our way of showing thanks to everybody at Vegas Films for what they've done.
engSearchText:
I want to make sure we enjoy our time out here,
especially as our way of showing thanks to everybody
at Vegas Films for what they've done.
jpnChrName: せめてベガスフィルムの人たちに、 感謝を示すためにも、全力で楽しみたいわ。
jpnSearchText:
せめてベガスフィルムの人たちに、
感謝を示すためにも、全力で楽しみたいわ。

engChrName: It sounds like the selection process is going to take time, anyway, so we might as well look around and check stuff out while we wait.
engSearchText:
It sounds like the selection process is going to take
time, anyway, so we might as well look around and
check stuff out while we wait.
jpnChrName: 選考は時間かかりそうだけど、 まあ、見学しながら待つとするよ。
jpnSearchText:
選考は時間かかりそうだけど、
まあ、見学しながら待つとするよ。

engChrName: After all, the film festival's attracted lots of actors and production staff we wouldn't otherwise normally get to meet. That's exciting!
engSearchText:
After all, the film festival's attracted lots of actors and
production staff we wouldn't otherwise normally get
to meet. That's exciting!
jpnChrName: 何せ映画祭だけあって、普段はいない 役者やスタッフも来ているようだしね……！
jpnSearchText:
何せ映画祭だけあって、普段はいない
役者やスタッフも来ているようだしね……！

engChrName: We spent a lot to travel out here, so we need to make the most of it and enjoy ourselves, too. Maybe I'll ask for some autographs...
engSearchText:
We spent a lot to travel out here, so we need to make
the most of it and enjoy ourselves, too. Maybe I'll ask
for some autographs...
jpnChrName: 交通費の分はエンジョイしないと…… サインも貰って来ようかなー。
jpnSearchText:
交通費の分はエンジョイしないと……
サインも貰って来ようかなー。

engChrName: I just caught my first glimpse of President Dillon in the flesh and, you know, he's not quite what I imagined him to be.
engSearchText:
I just caught my first glimpse of President Dillon in
the flesh and, you know, he's not quite what I
imagined him to be.
jpnChrName: さっき中でギャスパー社長を初めて見たけど、 結構イメージと違う人なんだね……
jpnSearchText:
さっき中でギャスパー社長を初めて見たけど、
結構イメージと違う人なんだね……

engChrName: I figured as the head of an up-and-coming film studio, he'd be a more flexible and daring leader, but I guess not.
engSearchText:
I figured as the head of an up-and-coming film
studio, he'd be a more flexible and daring leader, but I
guess not.
jpnChrName: 新鋭のクリエイティブ企業の社長だし、 もっと柔軟で挑戦的な人なのかと……
jpnSearchText:
新鋭のクリエイティブ企業の社長だし、
もっと柔軟で挑戦的な人なのかと……

engChrName: I guess Vegas Films owes its rapid rise to Salvatore Gotti and his talent behind the camera more than anything else.
engSearchText:
I guess Vegas Films owes its rapid rise to Salvatore
Gotti and his talent behind the camera more than
anything else.
jpnChrName: やっぱりこの会社の躍進って社長の手腕とかじゃなく、 ゴッチ監督の実力あってものなのね……！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりこの会社の躍進って社長の手腕とかじゃなく、
ゴッチ監督の実力あってものなのね……！

engChrName: There are so many celebrities out and about here. It's easy to get distracted when you see one.
engSearchText:
There are so many celebrities out and about here.
It's easy to get distracted when you see one.
jpnChrName: こうもあちこちに有名人が見えると どうしてもそっちに目が行っちゃうよねー。
jpnSearchText:
こうもあちこちに有名人が見えると
どうしてもそっちに目が行っちゃうよねー。

engChrName: I guess the film festival is almost here. We've been so focused on dropping off our movie with Vegas Films that I guess we forgot...
engSearchText:
I guess the film festival is almost here. We've been so
focused on dropping off our movie with Vegas Films
that I guess we forgot...
jpnChrName: まあ、考えてみれば映画祭が近いものね。 持ち込み目的で来たから少し忘れてたかも。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、考えてみれば映画祭が近いものね。
持ち込み目的で来たから少し忘れてたかも。

engChrName: And then we forgot when we saw Mr. Lam! Now I feel like we're all kinds of turned around, sheesh.
engSearchText:
And then we forgot when we saw Mr. Lam!
Now I feel like we're all kinds of turned
around, sheesh.
jpnChrName: あー、でもさっきはそれで本来の目的の方を 忘れちゃってて本末転倒だったわね。
jpnSearchText:
あー、でもさっきはそれで本来の目的の方を
忘れちゃってて本末転倒だったわね。

engChrName: Thanks for all your detailed feedback earlier. It'll definitely help me hone that ice cream so it's pitch perfect.
engSearchText:
Thanks for all your detailed feedback earlier.
It'll definitely help me hone that ice cream so it's
pitch perfect.
jpnChrName: いい感想をありがとう。 とっても参考になったわ。
jpnSearchText:
いい感想をありがとう。
とっても参考になったわ。

engChrName: Tell your bartender friend I hope those pomegranates will help him make something special and win that tournament. I'll be rooting for him!
engSearchText:
Tell your bartender friend I hope those pomegranates
will help him make something special and win
that tournament. I'll be rooting for him!
jpnChrName: そちらも素敵なカクテルを作れるよう応援してるわ。 バーテンダーさんによろしくね。
jpnSearchText:
そちらも素敵なカクテルを作れるよう応援してるわ。
バーテンダーさんによろしくね。

engChrName: Finally, the film festival is here! It's so exciting!
engSearchText: Finally, the film festival is here! It's so exciting!
jpnChrName: 映画祭、とうとう始まったわね……！
jpnSearchText: 映画祭、とうとう始まったわね……！

engChrName: It's not a traditional sort of festival, but girls of my generation tend to like events like this anyway.
engSearchText:
It's not a traditional sort of festival, but girls of my
generation tend to like events like this anyway.
jpnChrName: 伝統的なお祭りとも違うけど、 アタシらの世代は結構こういうのも好きよ。
jpnSearchText:
伝統的なお祭りとも違うけど、
アタシらの世代は結構こういうのも好きよ。

engChrName: I can see why older folks are maybe raising an eyebrow over some of this, but what's the harm in it, really?
engSearchText:
I can see why older folks are maybe raising an
eyebrow over some of this, but what's the harm in
it, really?
jpnChrName: まあ、上の世代の人らはこういうのに 眉をひそめる事もあるみたいだけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、上の世代の人らはこういうのに
眉をひそめる事もあるみたいだけど……

engChrName: Apparently when the oasis was rejuvenated, we went crazy with festivals, then, too, so it's not like it's unheard of.
engSearchText:
Apparently when the oasis was rejuvenated, we went
crazy with festivals, then, too, so it's not like it's
unheard of.
jpnChrName: ２０年前にオアシスが復活した時もお祭り 騒ぎだったっていうし、たまには良いと思うわ。
jpnSearchText:
２０年前にオアシスが復活した時もお祭り
騒ぎだったっていうし、たまには良いと思うわ。

engChrName: I saw a bunch of policemen going around, taking away orbal hookahs earlier.
engSearchText:
I saw a bunch of policemen going around, taking
away orbal hookahs earlier.
jpnChrName: さっき、お巡りさんたちが例の導力シーシャって やつを取り上げていってるのを見たけど……
jpnSearchText:
さっき、お巡りさんたちが例の導力シーシャって
やつを取り上げていってるのを見たけど……

engChrName: Wonder if some kind of defect was found in them? Hygiene regulations are pretty strict these days.
engSearchText:
Wonder if some kind of defect was found in them?
Hygiene regulations are pretty strict these days.
jpnChrName: 何か不備が見つかったとかそれ系なのかな？ まあ、最近は衛生とかも厳しいもんねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
何か不備が見つかったとかそれ系なのかな？
まあ、最近は衛生とかも厳しいもんねぇ。

engChrName: Those orbal hookahs burst onto the scene so suddenly, it honestly wouldn't shock me if they had some sort of problem.
engSearchText:
Those orbal hookahs burst onto the scene so
suddenly, it honestly wouldn't shock me if they had
some sort of problem.
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャ、ぶっちゃけ少し前に急に出てきたし、 何か問題が見つかっても別に驚かないけど。
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャ、ぶっちゃけ少し前に急に出てきたし、
何か問題が見つかっても別に驚かないけど。

engChrName: Maybe it's just my imagination, but it feels like people are more feisty today. Not just tourists, either, but the locals, too.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's just my imagination, but it feels like
people are more feisty today. Not just tourists, either,
but the locals, too.
jpnChrName: 何だか今日は……旅行の人も地元の人も、 やたらとはっちゃけてるわね……
jpnSearchText:
何だか今日は……旅行の人も地元の人も、
やたらとはっちゃけてるわね……

engChrName: I thought I had my finger on the pulse of things better than my folks, but I'm completely stumped as to what's going on here.
engSearchText:
I thought I had my finger on the pulse of things
better than my folks, but I'm completely stumped as
to what's going on here.
jpnChrName: アタシとしちゃあ、親世代と違って 多少は今風なノリも判ってたつもりだけど……
jpnSearchText:
アタシとしちゃあ、親世代と違って
多少は今風なノリも判ってたつもりだけど……

engChrName: There are so many people here tonight.
engSearchText: There are so many people here tonight.
jpnChrName: 夜は夜で賑わってるわねぇ。
jpnSearchText: 夜は夜で賑わってるわねぇ。

engChrName: Lately I've been seeing more and more sorts you don't usually get in the evenings. Probably because of the film festival.
engSearchText:
Lately I've been seeing more and more sorts you don't
usually get in the evenings. Probably because of the
film festival.
jpnChrName: 映画祭で人が増えてるからか、 普段は夜に来ない客層の人もちらほらいるわ。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭で人が増えてるからか、
普段は夜に来ない客層の人もちらほらいるわ。

engChrName: Not that I'm complaining. More sales for me! I'm looking to save up and travel, so as far as I'm concerned, it's all good luck.
engSearchText:
Not that I'm complaining. More sales for me!
I'm looking to save up and travel, so as far as I'm
concerned, it's all good luck.
jpnChrName: まあ、アタシらにとっては良い儲け時ね。 貯金して旅行とか行きたいし、恩恵に預かるとするわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、アタシらにとっては良い儲け時ね。
貯金して旅行とか行きたいし、恩恵に預かるとするわ。

engChrName: Hey, folks! Need something cold to cope with the heat?
engSearchText:
Hey, folks! Need something cold to cope with
the heat?
jpnChrName: いらっしゃーい！ 冷たいものはいかが？
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃーい！
冷たいものはいかが？

engChrName: I've got traditional local drinks to quench that thirst! Or if you're looking for something modern, I've got plenty of trendy drinks, too!
engSearchText:
I've got traditional local drinks to quench that thirst!
Or if you're looking for something modern, I've got
plenty of trendy drinks, too!
jpnChrName: 伝統的なジュースもあるし、 観光客向けの流行の商品もあるわ！
jpnSearchText:
伝統的なジュースもあるし、
観光客向けの流行の商品もあるわ！

engChrName: Honestly, between you and me, I'm more into the latter, and I say that despite being born and raised here.
engSearchText:
Honestly, between you and me, I'm more into the
latter, and I say that despite being born and
raised here.
jpnChrName: ちなみにアタシは後者派かな、 地元民だけど正直言っちゃえばね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみにアタシは後者派かな、
地元民だけど正直言っちゃえばね。

engChrName: But that's the way it goes these days. There are plenty of Central Eastern girls like that.
engSearchText:
But that's the way it goes these days. There are plenty
of Central Eastern girls like that.
jpnChrName: ま、今時はこんなものよ、中東系でも そういう子はそこそこいるんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
ま、今時はこんなものよ、中東系でも
そういう子はそこそこいるんじゃない？

engChrName: Now this is how you hold a festival! This is the kind of energy I live for!
engSearchText:
Now this is how you hold a festival! This is the kind
of energy I live for!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、これだよこれ！ この盛り上がりこそロックだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、これだよこれ！
この盛り上がりこそロックだぜ！

engChrName: Who cares what happened yesterday? All that matters now is how well my dulcet baritones can add to these amazing festivities!
engSearchText:
Who cares what happened yesterday? All that matters
now is how well my dulcet baritones can add to these
amazing festivities!
jpnChrName: 昨日のノリが何だったのかはこの際どうでもいい、 今は映画祭のノリにオレの歌を如何に乗せるかだぜ！
jpnSearchText:
昨日のノリが何だったのかはこの際どうでもいい、
今は映画祭のノリにオレの歌を如何に乗せるかだぜ！

engChrName: Let's light it up, folks! What do you say? Oh, and don't forget to order some food while you're at it, too, hahaha!
engSearchText:
Let's light it up, folks! What do you say? Oh, and
don't forget to order some food while you're at it,
too, hahaha!
jpnChrName: さあ、盛り上がっていこうぜ！ ついでに飯もよろしくなァ！
jpnSearchText:
さあ、盛り上がっていこうぜ！
ついでに飯もよろしくなァ！

engChrName: Hey, any idea what the cops are going around confiscating? Is it those orbal hookahs?
engSearchText:
Hey, any idea what the cops are going
around confiscating? Is it those orbal hookahs?
jpnChrName: ポリちゃんたちが回収してんのは何だ？ ありゃあシーシャってやつかい？
jpnSearchText:
ポリちゃんたちが回収してんのは何だ？
ありゃあシーシャってやつかい？

engChrName: I don't know what could've brought that on, but it's sure to rain on some people's parades.
engSearchText:
I don't know what could've brought that on, but it's
sure to rain on some people's parades.
jpnChrName: ま、何があったのかは知らねぇが、 好きな人からしちゃ楽しみ減っちゃうのもな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、何があったのかは知らねぇが、
好きな人からしちゃ楽しみ減っちゃうのもな。

engChrName: But not to worry! I can make up for that with as much singing and grub as they need! Whatever makes 'em feel better!
engSearchText:
But not to worry! I can make up for that with as
much singing and grub as they need! Whatever makes
'em feel better!
jpnChrName: よっしゃ、そうと来ればそういう人らの代わりの 楽しみとしても、歌と飯を届けてやるとするか♪
jpnSearchText:
よっしゃ、そうと来ればそういう人らの代わりの
楽しみとしても、歌と飯を届けてやるとするか♪

engChrName: There was a weird commotion around here earlier.
engSearchText: There was a weird commotion around here earlier.
jpnChrName: さっき、この辺でも妙な騒ぎがあってさ。
jpnSearchText: さっき、この辺でも妙な騒ぎがあってさ。

engChrName: First people started brawling. Then, all of a sudden, we had people tearing off their clothes and yelling real loud.
engSearchText:
First people started brawling. Then, all of a sudden,
we had people tearing off their clothes and yelling
real loud.
jpnChrName: いきなり殴り合うのもいれば、いきなり 脱ぎ始めたり叫び始めたり……
jpnSearchText:
いきなり殴り合うのもいれば、いきなり
脱ぎ始めたり叫び始めたり……

engChrName: I know it's festival season and all, but that's not how you hold a celebration!
engSearchText:
I know it's festival season and all, but that's not how
you hold a celebration!
jpnChrName: 流石にこいつは弾け過ぎってモンだぜ…… こんなのは祭りったぁ認められねェ！
jpnSearchText:
流石にこいつは弾け過ぎってモンだぜ……
こんなのは祭りったぁ認められねェ！

engChrName: What the hell has gotten into people, huh? It's like they all forgot how to have fun.
engSearchText:
What the hell has gotten into people, huh? It's like
they all forgot how to have fun.
jpnChrName: まったく、どうしちまったんだ皆…… 楽しい弾け方、判らねェ訳じゃねェだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
まったく、どうしちまったんだ皆……
楽しい弾け方、判らねェ訳じゃねェだろ！？

engChrName: I'm getting a lot of people eating dinner at my stall, which feels great.
engSearchText:
I'm getting a lot of people eating dinner at my stall,
which feels great.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、オレの屋台で晩飯食ってくれる 人が多くて嬉しいねェ♪
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、オレの屋台で晩飯食ってくれる
人が多くて嬉しいねェ♪

engChrName: Nothing's as tasty as a good bite to eat outside during a festival, especially with my singing to accompany it, bahaha!
engSearchText:
Nothing's as tasty as a good bite to eat outside during
a festival, especially with my singing to accompany
it, bahaha!
jpnChrName: やっぱり祭り時に外で食う飯は何倍も 味が良くなる、そこにオレの弾き語りが加わる！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり祭り時に外で食う飯は何倍も
味が良くなる、そこにオレの弾き語りが加わる！

engChrName: I'm telling you, my silky voice makes everything taste exponentially better! It's science, I tell you! Science!
engSearchText:
I'm telling you, my silky voice makes everything taste
exponentially better! It's science, I tell you! Science!
jpnChrName: 何乗倍にも美味くなって当然の理さ♪
jpnSearchText: 何乗倍にも美味くなって当然の理さ♪

engChrName: Hi there! You all enjoying Tharbad so far?
engSearchText: Hi there! You all enjoying Tharbad so far?
jpnChrName: イエーイ、君たちサルバッドを楽しんでるかいー！？
jpnSearchText: イエーイ、君たちサルバッドを楽しんでるかいー！？

engChrName: You know, if there's one thing both a good festival and a good movie need, it's music! Music and singing! They're just empty without 'em.
engSearchText:
You know, if there's one thing both a good festival
and a good movie need, it's music! Music and singing!
They're just empty without 'em.
jpnChrName: 祭りと言えば歌に音楽、映画と言っても やっぱり歌と音楽が無きゃってモンさ！
jpnSearchText:
祭りと言えば歌に音楽、映画と言っても
やっぱり歌と音楽が無きゃってモンさ！

engChrName: I'm just a two-bit musician myself, but you can bet I'll be adding to the chorus, in my own way, over here!
engSearchText:
I'm just a two-bit musician myself, but you can bet I'll
be adding to the chorus, in my own way, over here!
jpnChrName: オレもミュージシャンの端くれ、 盛り上げていくぜェ！
jpnSearchText:
オレもミュージシャンの端くれ、
盛り上げていくぜェ！

engChrName: I won't deny that you all were helpful in obtaining evidence for the orbal hookah case. I'll grant you that much.
engSearchText:
I won't deny that you all were helpful in obtaining
evidence for the orbal hookah case. I'll grant you
that much.
jpnChrName: 昨晩の導力シーシャについてはお前達も 証拠の確保に貢献したとは言うが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩の導力シーシャについてはお前達も
証拠の確保に貢献したとは言うが……

engChrName: But that doesn't mean you can stick your noses into whatever police business you like. Especially not a murder case.
engSearchText:
But that doesn't mean you can stick your noses into
whatever police business you like. Especially not a
murder case.
jpnChrName: だからといって捜査全般に首を突っ込む 理由にはならん、殺人事件となれば尚更な。
jpnSearchText:
だからといって捜査全般に首を突っ込む
理由にはならん、殺人事件となれば尚更な。

engChrName: Go play bodyguard or whatever else it is you're doing and leave the police work to the professionals. Understood?
engSearchText:
Go play bodyguard or whatever else it is you're doing
and leave the police work to the professionals.
Understood?
jpnChrName: お前達はせいぜい別口の依頼の 警備をこなしているが良い。
jpnSearchText:
お前達はせいぜい別口の依頼の
警備をこなしているが良い。

engChrName: The CID has already determined how it'll go about controlling the information for this case, as well as gradual disclosure to the public.
engSearchText:
The CID has already determined how it'll go about
controlling the information for this case, as well as
gradual disclosure to the public.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤ方面で以後の情報統制と段階的な開示の 方針は既に決まっているとの事だ。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤ方面で以後の情報統制と段階的な開示の
方針は既に決まっているとの事だ。

engChrName: That means our only job as police is to gather the hookahs and round up the perpetrators.
engSearchText:
That means our only job as police is to gather
the hookahs and round up the perpetrators.
jpnChrName: となれば俺達のすべき事は、導力シーシャを 回収し、犯人を検挙する事のみとなる。
jpnSearchText:
となれば俺達のすべき事は、導力シーシャを
回収し、犯人を検挙する事のみとなる。

engChrName: I'm not exactly keen on being a pawn for the CID, but if nothing else, at least it allows us to focus on what we do best.
engSearchText:
I'm not exactly keen on being a pawn for the CID,
but if nothing else, at least it allows us to focus on
what we do best.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤの駒になるつもりはないが…… ある意味で俺達の本業に専念するという事になるな。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤの駒になるつもりはないが……
ある意味で俺達の本業に専念するという事になるな。

engChrName: I have a bad habit of being soft when it comes to things like this. But it will serve our interests, so I'll put in a word for her.
engSearchText:
I have a bad habit of being soft when it comes to
things like this. But it will serve our interests, so I'll
put in a word for her.
jpnChrName: 口車に乗ってやるのは癪だが、 警察にとっても悪くない提案だ。
jpnSearchText:
口車に乗ってやるのは癪だが、
警察にとっても悪くない提案だ。

engChrName: She'll probably get an official call about it from the higher ups soon, but if you could go ahead and tell her, I'd appreciate it.
engSearchText:
She'll probably get an official call about it from the
higher ups soon, but if you could go ahead and tell
her, I'd appreciate it.
jpnChrName: サルバッド支部の本部には掛け合っておく。 本人にも宜しく伝えておいてやってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド支部の本部には掛け合っておく。
本人にも宜しく伝えておいてやってくれ。

engChrName: You lot again. I'd say this was a surprise, had Nate not already told me that he saw you earlier.
engSearchText:
You lot again. I'd say this was a surprise, had Nate
not already told me that he saw you earlier.
jpnChrName: お前達か……来ている事自体は先ほど ネイトから聞いている。
jpnSearchText:
お前達か……来ている事自体は先ほど
ネイトから聞いている。

engChrName: I don't know what brings you to Tharbad, but I'll keep my questions to myself for the time being.
engSearchText:
I don't know what brings you to Tharbad, but I'll
keep my questions to myself for the time being.
jpnChrName: フン、お前達が如何なる案件でここに来たのかは、 一旦置いておいてやるとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
フン、お前達が如何なる案件でここに来たのかは、
一旦置いておいてやるとしよう。

engChrName: We've got far more pressing business to attend to at the moment. Stay out of our way and we'll stay out of yours, understood?
engSearchText:
We've got far more pressing business to attend to at
the moment. Stay out of our way and we'll stay out of
yours, understood?
jpnChrName: こちらも、それなりに重い事件を追っているんでな。 必要が無い限りお前達に構っている余裕は無い。
jpnSearchText:
こちらも、それなりに重い事件を追っているんでな。
必要が無い限りお前達に構っている余裕は無い。

engChrName: I've reminded Nate time and time again that, as a detective, he needs to be prepared for work to come in at any time.
engSearchText:
I've reminded Nate time and time again that, as a
detective, he needs to be prepared for work to come
in at any time.
jpnChrName: まったく、ネイトも捜査官ならば急な仕事が 入る事くらい覚悟しておけと何度も言ったはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、ネイトも捜査官ならば急な仕事が
入る事くらい覚悟しておけと何度も言ったはずだ。

engChrName: I even told him we may well end up investigating Tharbad generally, soon enough. He has no one but himself to blame here.
engSearchText:
I even told him we may well end up investigating
Tharbad generally, soon enough. He has no one but
himself to blame here.
jpnChrName: 特に今回は、近いうちにサルバッド方面を 探るかもしれんと言っていたというのに……
jpnSearchText:
特に今回は、近いうちにサルバッド方面を
探るかもしれんと言っていたというのに……

engChrName: You don't go into public service to be coddled. Either you get the job done or the public suffers for it. Period.
engSearchText:
You don't go into public service to be coddled.
Either you get the job done or the public suffers for it.
Period.
jpnChrName: 公務員として手当をもらっている以上、 甘えなど許されんぞ。
jpnSearchText:
公務員として手当をもらっている以上、
甘えなど許されんぞ。

engChrName: Well, look who the cat dragged in. It seems we owe you once again for the information you supplied us with in this case.
engSearchText:
Well, look who the cat dragged in. It seems we owe
you once again for the information you supplied us
with in this case.
jpnChrName: お前達か……今回も結果的にはお前達が掴んだ 情報に助けられた形になったな。
jpnSearchText:
お前達か……今回も結果的にはお前達が掴んだ
情報に助けられた形になったな。

engChrName: I won't ask how you even came about that information. Right now, we need to determine the provenance of those orbal hookahs.
engSearchText:
I won't ask how you even came about
that information. Right now, we need to determine
the provenance of those orbal hookahs.
jpnChrName: お前達が何をしていたのかは不問としよう。 今は導力シーシャの出所を特定せねばならん。
jpnSearchText:
お前達が何をしていたのかは不問としよう。
今は導力シーシャの出所を特定せねばならん。

engChrName: Is everything going to be okay with them? It sounds like they've spread like wildfire across the city.
engSearchText:
Is everything going to be okay with them? It sounds
like they've spread like wildfire across the city.
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャ……相当出回っていたみたいですけど、 大丈夫なのでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャ……相当出回っていたみたいですけど、
大丈夫なのでしょうか……

engChrName: We're managing. We, the local police, and the guild are all working together to confiscate them from every business in possession of one.
engSearchText:
We're managing. We, the local police, and the guild
are all working together to confiscate them from
every business in possession of one.
jpnChrName: 俺達と現地警察、ギルドで全ての小売店から 内々に回収している。
jpnSearchText:
俺達と現地警察、ギルドで全ての小売店から
内々に回収している。

engChrName: Our official excuse, to avoid a commotion, is that they contain unauthorized ingredients, though some customers may be skeptical.
engSearchText:
Our official excuse, to avoid a commotion, is that
they contain unauthorized ingredients, though some
customers may be skeptical.
jpnChrName: 混乱を避けるため店には未認可の成分とだけ 説明してはいるが……客は戸惑う可能性はあるな。
jpnSearchText:
混乱を避けるため店には未認可の成分とだけ
説明してはいるが……客は戸惑う可能性はあるな。

engChrName: It's back-breaking work getting it all done! If the CID wasn't helping behind the scenes, I don't know how we'd manage this ourselves.
engSearchText:
It's back-breaking work getting it all done! If the
CID wasn't helping behind the scenes, I don't know
how we'd manage this ourselves.
jpnChrName: ホント大変なんだよね～ＣＩＤが根回ししてくれなきゃ、 正直やり切れる自信も無いよ……
jpnSearchText:
ホント大変なんだよね～ＣＩＤが根回ししてくれなきゃ、
正直やり切れる自信も無いよ……

engChrName: I guess with the folks who've already smoked, we'll be telling them a little more and following up with them later.
engSearchText:
I guess with the folks who've already smoked, we'll be
telling them a little more and following up with
them later.
jpnChrName: まあ、吸った人へは情報を少しずつ 開示しながらフォローって事になるのかな？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、吸った人へは情報を少しずつ
開示しながらフォローって事になるのかな？

engChrName: Glad to hear things with René and his people're going well enough, at least.
engSearchText:
Glad to hear things with René and his people're
going well enough, at least.
jpnChrName: ルネのところも上手くやっているようで何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: ルネのところも上手くやっているようで何よりだ。

engChrName: I feel a little uneasy about not doing more with those smokers, but I imagine you're pressed for time and resources here.
engSearchText:
I feel a little uneasy about not doing more with those
smokers, but I imagine you're pressed for time and
resources here.
jpnChrName: まあ、吸っちまった連中をそのままにするのは 少し不安ではあるが……背に腹は代えられないか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、吸っちまった連中をそのままにするのは
少し不安ではあるが……背に腹は代えられないか。

engChrName: Indeed. I suppose we should consider ourselves lucky that the devices in question have not managed to proliferate outside of Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Indeed. I suppose we should consider ourselves lucky
that the devices in question have not managed to
proliferate outside of Tharbad.
jpnChrName: ええ、恐らく今回は極めて短期間の間に、 サルバッドのみで流通していた事も幸運だったかと……
jpnSearchText:
ええ、恐らく今回は極めて短期間の間に、
サルバッドのみで流通していた事も幸運だったかと……

engChrName: Quite. With all of the Central Eastern VIPs here, this could've turned into an international incident if we'd been slower.
engSearchText:
Quite. With all of the Central Eastern VIPs here, this
could've turned into an international incident if we'd
been slower.
jpnChrName: そういう事になるな……中東のＶＩＰも来ている以上、 下手に混乱を招けば国際問題にもなりかねん。
jpnSearchText:
そういう事になるな……中東のＶＩＰも来ている以上、
下手に混乱を招けば国際問題にもなりかねん。

engChrName: Believe me, as police, we wish there was more we could do. We're playing the hand we've been dealt as best we can.
engSearchText:
Believe me, as police, we wish there was more we
could do. We're playing the hand we've been dealt as
best we can.
jpnChrName: ……俺達としても正直、心苦しいが致し方あるまい。
jpnSearchText: ……俺達としても正直、心苦しいが致し方あるまい。

engChrName: Great Goddess, I never expected things to take a turn like THIS!
engSearchText:
Great Goddess, I never expected things to take a turn
like THIS!
jpnChrName: はあ、まさかこんな大事になるなんてな……
jpnSearchText: はあ、まさかこんな大事になるなんてな……

engChrName: I'm supposed to be out there enjoying the film festival with my girlfriend right now, and here I am doing the exact opposite.
engSearchText:
I'm supposed to be out there enjoying the film festival
with my girlfriend right now, and here I am doing the
exact opposite.
jpnChrName: 本当なら彼女と映画祭を満喫する 予定だったのに何だってこんなことに……
jpnSearchText:
本当なら彼女と映画祭を満喫する
予定だったのに何だってこんなことに……

engChrName: *sigh* I'm in it deep now. I'm going to have to do something big to make it up to her.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'm in it deep now. I'm going to have to do
something big to make it up to her.
jpnChrName: ……この埋め合わせは高くつきそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……この埋め合わせは高くつきそうだな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! I heard you guys were the ones who managed to apprehend the Devancy brothers.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! I heard you guys were the ones who
managed to apprehend the Devancy brothers.
jpnChrName: そういえば……お前たちが あのディバンシー兄弟を捕まえたらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……お前たちが
あのディバンシー兄弟を捕まえたらしいな。

engChrName: Not that this changes my opinion of you, mind you. I'm just glad we have one less hassle to take care of right now.
engSearchText:
Not that this changes my opinion of you, mind you.
I'm just glad we have one less hassle to take care of
right now.
jpnChrName: 少しでも面倒ゴトが片付いてよかったよ。 別にお前たちのことを認めたわけじゃないがな。
jpnSearchText:
少しでも面倒ゴトが片付いてよかったよ。
別にお前たちのことを認めたわけじゃないがな。

engChrName: When I got the emergency call, I was pretty irritated. But knowing that drug contamination is involved, I understand the urgency now.
engSearchText:
When I got the emergency call, I was pretty irritated.
But knowing that drug contamination is involved, I
understand the urgency now.
jpnChrName: 緊急の仕事が入った時は正直面倒だと思ったけど…… 流石に薬物汚染となれば話は違うね。
jpnSearchText:
緊急の仕事が入った時は正直面倒だと思ったけど……
流石に薬物汚染となれば話は違うね。

engChrName: Slipping substances into unsuspecting people's hookahs is no laughing matter. We're talking about public safety at this point.
engSearchText:
Slipping substances into unsuspecting people's
hookahs is no laughing matter. We're talking about
public safety at this point.
jpnChrName: 僕や彼女も、あやうく導力シーシャを 吸ってしまう所だったし……
jpnSearchText:
僕や彼女も、あやうく導力シーシャを
吸ってしまう所だったし……

engChrName: To think my girlfriend and I were going to smoke some of that stuff, too. Talk about dodging a bullet.
engSearchText:
To think my girlfriend and I were going to smoke
some of that stuff, too. Talk about dodging a bullet.
jpnChrName: いつの間にか紛れ込んでいるなんて、 この上なく質の悪い犯罪だよ……
jpnSearchText:
いつの間にか紛れ込んでいるなんて、
この上なく質の悪い犯罪だよ……

engChrName: I don't care if the inspector authorized it. You can't just go around recruiting police officers as backup dancers for the parade!
engSearchText:
I don't care if the inspector authorized it. You can't
just go around recruiting police officers as backup
dancers for the parade!
jpnChrName: 警部が了承したからいいものの、 警官を追加キャストにするなんて自由過ぎるだろ！
jpnSearchText:
警部が了承したからいいものの、
警官を追加キャストにするなんて自由過ぎるだろ！

engChrName: Besides, what are YOU guys doing, of all people, going around and grabbing dancers, huh?
engSearchText:
Besides, what are YOU guys doing, of all people,
going around and grabbing dancers, huh?
jpnChrName: ていうか……追加キャストなんて大事な仕事を どうしてお前達が請け負ってるんだ？
jpnSearchText:
ていうか……追加キャストなんて大事な仕事を
どうしてお前達が請け負ってるんだ？

engChrName: Nothing about this sits right with me! Hmph!
engSearchText: Nothing about this sits right with me! Hmph!
jpnChrName: なんだか色々と納得いかないな……
jpnSearchText: なんだか色々と納得いかないな……

engChrName: Man, this was supposed to be an opportunity to get away from work and go on a trip with my first date in ages.
engSearchText:
Man, this was supposed to be an opportunity to get
away from work and go on a trip with my first date
in ages.
jpnChrName: 忙しい仕事の合間を縫って、ようやく久しぶりに 作れた彼女との記念すべき旅行だったのに……
jpnSearchText:
忙しい仕事の合間を縫って、ようやく久しぶりに
作れた彼女との記念すべき旅行だったのに……

engChrName: Graah! I swear, life just can't cut me a break for even a minute lately, it feels like!
engSearchText:
Graah! I swear, life just can't cut me a break for even
a minute lately, it feels like!
jpnChrName: まったく、ここのところ僕の周りで 色々と起き過ぎていないか？
jpnSearchText:
まったく、ここのところ僕の周りで
色々と起き過ぎていないか？

engChrName: Inspector?! What do you mean I have to get ready? ...You're coming out to Tharbad tomorrow? But why?
engSearchText:
Inspector?! What do you mean I have to get ready?
...You're coming out to Tharbad tomorrow? But why?
jpnChrName: ……って警部！？　明日サルバッドに 行くから備えろってどういう事ですか！
jpnSearchText:
……って警部！？　明日サルバッドに
行くから備えろってどういう事ですか！

engChrName: I mean, yes, I get it's for an investigation. But why do I have to get involved when I'm supposed to be taking time off?
engSearchText:
I mean, yes, I get it's for an investigation. But why do
I have to get involved when I'm supposed to be taking
time off?
jpnChrName: 首都警察での捜査案件……それは分かりますが、 どうして非番の僕まで手伝わなきゃ……
jpnSearchText:
首都警察での捜査案件……それは分かりますが、
どうして非番の僕まで手伝わなきゃ……

engChrName: I... I understand, sir, but... Augh, if you insist.
engSearchText: I... I understand, sir, but... Augh, if you insist.
jpnChrName: そ、それは分かりますが…… ……ううっ、そこまで言われると……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それは分かりますが……
……ううっ、そこまで言われると……

engChrName: I'm going to receive additional time off later to make up for this, right?
engSearchText:
I'm going to receive additional time off later to make
up for this, right?
jpnChrName: だ、代休は貰えるんですよね、警部～！？
jpnSearchText: だ、代休は貰えるんですよね、警部～！？

engChrName: Hey, Nate, honey? You're not doing what I think you're doing, are you...?
engSearchText:
Hey, Nate, honey? You're not doing what I think
you're doing, are you...?
jpnChrName: ねえネイト、もしかしてだけど……
jpnSearchText: ねえネイト、もしかしてだけど……

engChrName: Sorry, babe! Duty calls! I've got work to do!
engSearchText: Sorry, babe! Duty calls! I've got work to do!
jpnChrName: ──ゴメ～ン、仕事が入っちゃってさ！
jpnSearchText: ──ゴメ～ン、仕事が入っちゃってさ！

engChrName: (So much for being serious, I gue—Wait, is he telling the truth? You're kidding me! That's not supposed to happen on a vacation!)
engSearchText:
(So much for being serious, I gue—Wait, is he telling
the truth? You're kidding me! That's not supposed to
happen on a vacation!)
jpnChrName: （軽っ……ってマジなの！？   いやいやいや、無いでしょフツー……！）
jpnSearchText:
（軽っ……ってマジなの！？
いやいやいや、無いでしょフツー……！）

engChrName: *sigh* Man, I didn't expect the inspector to show up all the way out here.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Man, I didn't expect the inspector to show up all
the way out here.
jpnChrName: ふう、まさかダスワニ警部が いきなり来る事になるだなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、まさかダスワニ警部が
いきなり来る事になるだなんて……

engChrName: I'm supposed to be off duty, for crying out loud! And on a date, to boot! Can't he respect a guy's precious downtime?
engSearchText:
I'm supposed to be off duty, for crying out loud!
And on a date, to boot! Can't he respect a guy's
precious downtime?
jpnChrName: こっちは非番な上にデート中だってのに…… ほんと、警部も人遣いが荒いよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
こっちは非番な上にデート中だってのに……
ほんと、警部も人遣いが荒いよなぁ。

engChrName: You don't know how long it took me to get her to finally agree to this trip! I won't let you or anyone else ruin this for me!
engSearchText:
You don't know how long it took me to get her to
finally agree to this trip! I won't let you or anyone
else ruin this for me!
jpnChrName: ようやく彼女をその気にさせて旅行に来れたんだ…… この休暇を台無しにする奴は誰であっても許さないぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ようやく彼女をその気にさせて旅行に来れたんだ……
この休暇を台無しにする奴は誰であっても許さないぞ。

engChrName: Oh, great, it's the spriggan and his lackeys. What are you people doing out HERE, of all places?!
engSearchText:
Oh, great, it's the spriggan and his lackeys. What are
you people doing out HERE, of all places?!
jpnChrName: お、お前たちは裏解決屋…… 何故こんなところに！？
jpnSearchText:
お、お前たちは裏解決屋……
何故こんなところに！？

engChrName: What's going on, baby? Do you know these people?
engSearchText: What's going on, baby? Do you know these people?
jpnChrName: え、何この人たち知り合いなの？
jpnSearchText: え、何この人たち知り合いなの？

engChrName: Relax, we're just out here on business. Sometimes the job takes us outta Edith. We aren't glued to the capital, y'know.
engSearchText:
Relax, we're just out here on business. Sometimes the
job takes us outta Edith. We aren't glued to the
capital, y'know.
jpnChrName: ただの出張だ、別に首都に 張り付きっぱなしじゃないしな。
jpnSearchText:
ただの出張だ、別に首都に
張り付きっぱなしじゃないしな。

engChrName: I'm more curious what you're doing all the way out here, Detective. Bit outta your jurisdiction, ain't it?
engSearchText:
I'm more curious what you're doing all the way out
here, Detective. Bit outta your jurisdiction, ain't it?
jpnChrName: むしろあんたの方こそ、 何でこんな所に来ているんだか……
jpnSearchText:
むしろあんたの方こそ、
何でこんな所に来ているんだか……

engChrName: Guess our big city detective here's got some time to kill if he's able to take his lady friend down to the film festival.
engSearchText:
Guess our big city detective here's got some time to
kill if he's able to take his lady friend down to the
film festival.
jpnChrName: へぇ、はるばる女を連れて映画祭デートってか。 首都の捜査官ってのはお忙しいモンだなァ？
jpnSearchText:
へぇ、はるばる女を連れて映画祭デートってか。
首都の捜査官ってのはお忙しいモンだなァ？

engChrName: Shut it. I'm off duty right now, so what's it matter to you? Besides, she wants to see the film festival, too, you know.
engSearchText:
Shut it. I'm off duty right now, so what's it matter
to you? Besides, she wants to see the film festival, too,
you know.
jpnChrName: ふん、今日は非番なんだし僕の勝手だろ？ 彼女だって映画祭を楽しみにしているんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、今日は非番なんだし僕の勝手だろ？
彼女だって映画祭を楽しみにしているんだ。

engChrName: Just don't go causing me any headaches, all right? Last thing I need is you all getting in the way of my vacation.
engSearchText:
Just don't go causing me any headaches, all right?
Last thing I need is you all getting in the way of
my vacation.
jpnChrName: お前たち、くれぐれも面倒は起こすなよ…… せっかくの彼女との休日まで巻き込まれるのはごめんだ！
jpnSearchText:
お前たち、くれぐれも面倒は起こすなよ……
せっかくの彼女との休日まで巻き込まれるのはごめんだ！

engChrName: Wouldn't it be easy to just pretend we're not here and go on with your date? You need to learn to chill out sometimes, pal.
engSearchText:
Wouldn't it be easy to just pretend we're not here and
go on with your date? You need to learn to chill out
sometimes, pal.
jpnChrName: ハッ、非番だってんならそっちが見て見ぬふりでも すりゃあ良い気もするけどな……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、非番だってんならそっちが見て見ぬふりでも
すりゃあ良い気もするけどな……

engChrName: Hey, buddy. How's your hot date going?
engSearchText: Hey, buddy. How's your hot date going?
jpnChrName: よぉ、捜査官。 サルバッドのデートは順調か？
jpnSearchText:
よぉ、捜査官。
サルバッドのデートは順調か？

engChrName: Don't call me 'buddy'! We are NOT friends! I'm not interested in shooting the breeze with you!
engSearchText:
Don't call me 'buddy'! We are NOT friends! I'm not
interested in shooting the breeze with you!
jpnChrName: 出たな解決屋……一体何の用だ。 というかそもそも、気やすく話しかけてくるな！
jpnSearchText:
出たな解決屋……一体何の用だ。
というかそもそも、気やすく話しかけてくるな！

engChrName: Oh, but of course, that doesn't apply to you, Agnès! If you ever need help with anything, I'm always happy to talk.
engSearchText:
Oh, but of course, that doesn't apply to you, Agnès!
If you ever need help with anything, I'm always happy
to talk.
jpnChrName: あっ、勿論アニエスちゃんに 困り事があるっていうなら相談に乗るけどね！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、勿論アニエスちゃんに
困り事があるっていうなら相談に乗るけどね！

engChrName: Little cozy with her, aren't you, baby? Talking to another woman while you're on a date with your girlfriend. Points for bravery, I guess.
engSearchText:
Little cozy with her, aren't you, baby? Talking to
another woman while you're on a date with
your girlfriend. Points for bravery, I guess.
jpnChrName: へぇ？　彼女とデート中だっていうのに いい度胸してるじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ？　彼女とデート中だっていうのに
いい度胸してるじゃない。

engChrName: Gah, uh, it's not like that, sweetie, I promise! I only meant I'd talk to her in my capacity as a policeman! There's nothing between us!
engSearchText:
Gah, uh, it's not like that, sweetie, I promise! I only
meant I'd talk to her in my capacity as a policeman!
There's nothing between us!
jpnChrName: あっ、いやいや！ 警察として相談に乗るっていう意味だから！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、いやいや！
警察として相談に乗るっていう意味だから！

engChrName: Ahaha... Y-Yes...
engSearchText: Ahaha... Y-Yes...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: (I thought we should try asking Detective Nate about the crooked policeman, since it is his line of work and all.)
engSearchText:
(I thought we should try asking Detective Nate about
the crooked policeman, since it is his line of work
and all.)
jpnChrName: （汚職警官の件……ネイト捜査官にも   聞いてみようかと思いましたけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（汚職警官の件……ネイト捜査官にも
聞いてみようかと思いましたけど。）

engChrName: (But if he's here off duty, then...)
engSearchText: (But if he's here off duty, then...)
jpnChrName: （サルバッドには休暇に来ているようですし……）
jpnSearchText: （サルバッドには休暇に来ているようですし……）

engChrName: (Yeah. Not to mention that he might not have much to say about that or the bootlegger in general anyway.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. Not to mention that he might not have much
to say about that or the bootlegger in general anyway.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、パチモン屋台や汚職警官について   聞き出せる事は少ねえかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、パチモン屋台や汚職警官について
聞き出せる事は少ねえかもな。）

engChrName: (That's my thinking. Could end up being more trouble than it's worth in the end, talking to him.)
engSearchText:
(That's my thinking. Could end up being more
trouble than it's worth in the end, talking to him.)
jpnChrName: （むしろ、もっと面倒くせえ事になりそうだ。）
jpnSearchText: （むしろ、もっと面倒くせえ事になりそうだ。）

engChrName: (Yeah. Guess we better back off and look elsewhere.)
engSearchText: (Yeah. Guess we better back off and look elsewhere.)
jpnChrName: （えと……それじゃあわたしたちは   退散しておきましょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（えと……それじゃあわたしたちは
退散しておきましょうか。）

engChrName: You have some nerve lounging about while all of this is going on, Detective.
engSearchText:
You have some nerve lounging about while all of this
is going on, Detective.
jpnChrName: まったく、この状況下で呑気なものだ。
jpnSearchText: まったく、この状況下で呑気なものだ。

engChrName: At least you're already here. Convenient. I'll be putting you to work until the film festival is over, understood?
engSearchText:
At least you're already here. Convenient. I'll be
putting you to work until the film festival is
over, understood?
jpnChrName: まあ、旅行先がこの街だったのは好都合だな、 悪いが映画祭が終わるまで手伝ってもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、旅行先がこの街だったのは好都合だな、
悪いが映画祭が終わるまで手伝ってもらうぞ。

engChrName: You can't be serious! You want me to give up my hard-earned vacation time just like that?!
engSearchText:
You can't be serious! You want me to give up my
hard-earned vacation time just like that?!
jpnChrName: そんな殺生な！　休暇がいきなり 無くなるなんて流石に勘弁してくださいよ！
jpnSearchText:
そんな殺生な！　休暇がいきなり
無くなるなんて流石に勘弁してくださいよ！

engChrName: You're damn right I do. Emergencies don't have a schedule. Any detective worth his salt is always ready to act in an emergency.
engSearchText:
You're damn right I do. Emergencies don't have
a schedule. Any detective worth his salt is always
ready to act in an emergency.
jpnChrName: フン、捜査官なら緊急の仕事くらい 覚悟しろといつも言っているだろうに。
jpnSearchText:
フン、捜査官なら緊急の仕事くらい
覚悟しろといつも言っているだろうに。

engChrName: Either you work now and crack this case, or it spirals out of control and you have even less time to fool around. What'll it be?
engSearchText:
Either you work now and crack this case, or it spirals
out of control and you have even less time to
fool around. What'll it be?
jpnChrName: とにかく、今事件を解決せねば大事になって、 さらに休みが減るかもしれんぞ、良いのか？
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、今事件を解決せねば大事になって、
さらに休みが減るかもしれんぞ、良いのか？

engChrName: What?! You dragged me all the way out here just so you can ditch me and go off to work?!
engSearchText:
What?! You dragged me all the way out here just so
you can ditch me and go off to work?!
jpnChrName: えぇ～、何！？　私を連れてきておいて、 いきなり仕事で私をほったらかしにするの！？
jpnSearchText:
えぇ～、何！？　私を連れてきておいて、
いきなり仕事で私をほったらかしにするの！？

engChrName: I finally caved in and agreed to do this after you badgered me so much and this is what I get? I don't believe this.
engSearchText:
I finally caved in and agreed to do this after you
badgered me so much and this is what I get? I don't
believe this.
jpnChrName: せっかくしつこいお誘いに応えてあげたのに…… 流石にあり得ないんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
せっかくしつこいお誘いに応えてあげたのに……
流石にあり得ないんですけど……

engChrName: Argh, did they really have to stick me between a rock and a hard place? I was hoping to enjoy my vacation and the festival in peace...
engSearchText:
Argh, did they really have to stick me between a rock
and a hard place? I was hoping to enjoy my vacation
and the festival in peace...
jpnChrName: くっ……どうして僕がこんな板挟みに…… せっかくの休暇が、映画祭が……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……どうして僕がこんな板挟みに……
せっかくの休暇が、映画祭が……

engChrName: *sigh* From what I can tell, some big case is going on and the cops have dragged Nate in to help take care of it.
engSearchText:
*sigh* From what I can tell, some big case is going on
and the cops have dragged Nate in to help take care
of it.
jpnChrName: はぁ……なんでも大きな事件があったらしくて ネイトも駆り出されちゃって……
jpnSearchText:
はぁ……なんでも大きな事件があったらしくて
ネイトも駆り出されちゃって……

engChrName: I get that detectives can be busy. I can be patient and wait until his case is over.
engSearchText:
I get that detectives can be busy. I can be patient and
wait until his case is over.
jpnChrName: まあ捜査官だったら仕方ないし、 一段落するまで待っててあげるけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ捜査官だったら仕方ないし、
一段落するまで待っててあげるけど……

engChrName: But I'm going to have to talk to him later. I don't want him getting in the habit of leaving me hanging like this. It's just not fair!
engSearchText:
But I'm going to have to talk to him later. I don't
want him getting in the habit of leaving me hanging
like this. It's just not fair!
jpnChrName: 今後はこういうほったらかしは無いように 気をつけて欲しいわね、まったく……！
jpnSearchText:
今後はこういうほったらかしは無いように
気をつけて欲しいわね、まったく……！

engChrName: I understand Nate's a busy guy. But did he really have to drag me all the way out here and then ditch me?
engSearchText:
I understand Nate's a busy guy. But did he really have
to drag me all the way out here and then ditch me?
jpnChrName: 仕事が忙しいのは仕方ないわ、でも私を遠くまで 連れてきて、そこでほったらかしってどうなの？
jpnSearchText:
仕事が忙しいのは仕方ないわ、でも私を遠くまで
連れてきて、そこでほったらかしってどうなの？

engChrName: He should've told me this could happen sooner. Now how am I supposed to kill time while I'm out here all alone?
engSearchText:
He should've told me this could happen sooner.
Now how am I supposed to kill time while I'm out
here all alone?
jpnChrName: そういう可能性があるなら事前に言ってくれないと、 私だって一人で時間潰せないし……
jpnSearchText:
そういう可能性があるなら事前に言ってくれないと、
私だって一人で時間潰せないし……

engChrName: Are we even still going to be able to walk around the film festival tomorrow? I don't even want to think about it...
engSearchText:
Are we even still going to be able to walk around the
film festival tomorrow? I don't even want to think
about it...
jpnChrName: てか、明日の映画祭を一緒に回るって 話はどうなっちゃうのかしらね？
jpnSearchText:
てか、明日の映画祭を一緒に回るって
話はどうなっちゃうのかしらね？

engChrName: This guy... First I catch him eying up the nightclub while he and I are supposed to be out on a date together.
engSearchText:
This guy... First I catch him eying up the nightclub
while he and I are supposed to be out on a
date together.
jpnChrName: 私とのデートだってのにナイトクラブの方見て 鼻の下伸ばしてたかと思いきや……
jpnSearchText:
私とのデートだってのにナイトクラブの方見て
鼻の下伸ばしてたかと思いきや……

engChrName: Then he just happens to get a call from work while I'm lecturing him? And then skips out on our date altogether?
engSearchText:
Then he just happens to get a call from work while
I'm lecturing him? And then skips out on our
date altogether?
jpnChrName: 次は説教中に都合よく仕事の通信？ でもって途中でドタキャンとか……
jpnSearchText:
次は説教中に都合よく仕事の通信？
でもって途中でドタキャンとか……

engChrName: This couldn't be much worse of a night out even if I tried...
engSearchText:
This couldn't be much worse of a night out even if
I tried...
jpnChrName: はぁ、本当に興ざめだわ……
jpnSearchText: はぁ、本当に興ざめだわ……

engChrName: At first I thought it was a bit early for us to be taking any trips, but the film festival's as good a reason to go as any.
engSearchText:
At first I thought it was a bit early for us to be taking
any trips, but the film festival's as good a reason to go
as any.
jpnChrName: ネイトと旅行するのはまだ早いと思ってたけど、 映画祭もあるし機会としては良さそうよね。
jpnSearchText:
ネイトと旅行するのはまだ早いと思ってたけど、
映画祭もあるし機会としては良さそうよね。

engChrName: Might as well have some fun now that I'm here either way.
engSearchText:
Might as well have some fun now that I'm here
either way.
jpnChrName: まあ、とりあえず楽しませてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText: まあ、とりあえず楽しませてもらうわ。

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys. Uh, thanks for saving me yesterday, you guys!
engSearchText:
Oh, it's you guys. Uh, thanks for saving me yesterday,
you guys!
jpnChrName: あ、裏解決屋の…… き、昨日はありがとうございましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、裏解決屋の……
き、昨日はありがとうございましたっ！

engChrName: When I got back, I passed out like a rock. I slept for so long, I was shocked to wake up and see the big festival was TODAY!
engSearchText:
When I got back, I passed out like a rock. I slept for
so long, I was shocked to wake up and see the big
festival was TODAY!
jpnChrName: 昨日はあの後、眠ってしまいましたが…… 目が覚めたらもう映画祭当日になっていて！
jpnSearchText:
昨日はあの後、眠ってしまいましたが……
目が覚めたらもう映画祭当日になっていて！

engChrName: For someone who got kidnapped, you don't sound too worse for wear.
engSearchText:
For someone who got kidnapped, you don't sound
too worse for wear.
jpnChrName: ハッ……誘拐されかけたってのに、 その様子だと随分と元気そうじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……誘拐されかけたってのに、
その様子だと随分と元気そうじゃねぇか。

engChrName: You bet I'm not! A little shuteye was all I needed to make that anxiety go away! I'm as good as new!
engSearchText:
You bet I'm not! A little shuteye was all I needed to
make that anxiety go away! I'm as good as new!
jpnChrName: ええ、ひと眠りしたら怖さも吹き飛びました！
jpnSearchText: ええ、ひと眠りしたら怖さも吹き飛びました！

engChrName: Besides, I smell a big, big scoop waiting in this city, even bigger than I figured. Something's out there, I can just feel it!
engSearchText:
Besides, I smell a big, big scoop waiting in this city,
even bigger than I figured. Something's out there, I
can just feel it!
jpnChrName: どうやら思った以上にサルバッドでは 大スクープの匂いがする事態になりましたし……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら思った以上にサルバッドでは
大スクープの匂いがする事態になりましたし……

engChrName: My business with Dingo can wait. I've got to get out there and do some digging!
engSearchText:
My business with Dingo can wait. I've got to get out
there and do some digging!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんに関わらず、せっかくなので 私なりに取材しなきゃって思って！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさんに関わらず、せっかくなので
私なりに取材しなきゃって思って！

engChrName: Ahaha... You know, you're tougher than you look, Marielle, not losing heart after such a frightening experience. I'm impressed.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... You know, you're tougher than you look,
Marielle, not losing heart after such a
frightening experience. I'm impressed.
jpnChrName: あはは……本当にへこたれないというか…… お強いですよね、マリエルさんも。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……本当にへこたれないというか……
お強いですよね、マリエルさんも。

engChrName: Of course! Hard-as-a-rock-ness is my middle name! Or my...five middle names. Anyway!
engSearchText:
Of course! Hard-as-a-rock-ness is my middle name!
Or my...five middle names. Anyway!
jpnChrName: それはもう、私のとりえですから！
jpnSearchText: それはもう、私のとりえですから！

engChrName: I'll keep hounding that guy for as long as it takes, until he changes his ways! I'll never give up!
engSearchText:
I'll keep hounding that guy for as long as it takes,
until he changes his ways! I'll never give up!
jpnChrName: 私はディンゴさんに追い付いて彼を更生させるまで、 何があっても絶対に諦めませんよ～！
jpnSearchText:
私はディンゴさんに追い付いて彼を更生させるまで、
何があっても絶対に諦めませんよ～！

engChrName: Dingo seems to be pursuing a lead. Well, two can play at that game! I'll get my scoop and then he'll have to acknowledge me!
engSearchText:
Dingo seems to be pursuing a lead. Well, two can
play at that game! I'll get my scoop and then he'll
have to acknowledge me!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん何かのネタを追っているようですが、 私も自分なりにスクープを掴んで認めてもらいます！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん何かのネタを追っているようですが、
私も自分なりにスクープを掴んで認めてもらいます！

engChrName: With the prince and all those other bigwigs hanging around the hotel, there's just got to be something juicy waiting to be unearthed!
engSearchText:
With the prince and all those other bigwigs hanging
around the hotel, there's just got to be something
juicy waiting to be unearthed!
jpnChrName: このホテルには公太子殿下以外にも多くの偉い人が 来ているし、何か貴重な情報も手に入るかも……！
jpnSearchText:
このホテルには公太子殿下以外にも多くの偉い人が
来ているし、何か貴重な情報も手に入るかも……！

engChrName: I'll be honest with you, spriggan. I find it VERY suspicious to be running into you yet again, after our little encounter in Langport.
engSearchText:
I'll be honest with you, spriggan. I find it VERY
suspicious to be running into you yet again, after our
little encounter in Langport.
jpnChrName: それにしても、裏解決屋…… ラングポートに続き、ここでも会う事になるとは。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、裏解決屋……
ラングポートに続き、ここでも会う事になるとは。

engChrName: It must have something to do with whatever Dingo's investigating, right? Right?!
engSearchText:
It must have something to do with whatever Dingo's
investigating, right? Right?!
jpnChrName: やっぱり、ディンゴさんの調べ物と 何か関係があるんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、ディンゴさんの調べ物と
何か関係があるんですか！？

engChrName: Y'know, given that you never seem to get anywhere, don't you think stickin' to one spot instead of bouncing around would work better?
engSearchText:
Y'know, given that you never seem to get anywhere,
don't you think stickin' to one spot instead of
bouncing around would work better?
jpnChrName: こっちの台詞だ、本当によく会うが、 あちこち駆け回り過ぎて空回りすんなよ？
jpnSearchText:
こっちの台詞だ、本当によく会うが、
あちこち駆け回り過ぎて空回りすんなよ？

engChrName: Anyway, to answer your question, we're here on some business for new clients. It's got nothin' to do with your hotshot heartthrob.
engSearchText:
Anyway, to answer your question, we're here on some
business for new clients. It's got nothin' to do with
your hotshot heartthrob.
jpnChrName: まあ俺達は一応、ディンゴとは別口の 依頼で出張に来ているんでな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ俺達は一応、ディンゴとは別口の
依頼で出張に来ているんでな。

engChrName: And, uhh, don't get your hopes up. He and I trade info, but nothin' that'd make for the kind of hot scoops you're anglin' for. Sorry.
engSearchText:
And, uhh, don't get your hopes up. He and I trade
info, but nothin' that'd make for the kind of hot
scoops you're anglin' for. Sorry.
jpnChrName: 情報交換くらいはしているが、 あんたのご期待には沿えないと思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
情報交換くらいはしているが、
あんたのご期待には沿えないと思うぜ。

engChrName: Sh-Shut up! I don't need your help to do my job!
engSearchText: Sh-Shut up! I don't need your help to do my job!
jpnChrName: べ、別にアテにしていた訳では……！
jpnSearchText: べ、別にアテにしていた訳では……！

engChrName: Mark my words, whatever it takes, I'll uncover the truth of what that man's up to, even if it kills me!
engSearchText:
Mark my words, whatever it takes, I'll uncover the
truth of what that man's up to, even if it kills me!
jpnChrName: とにかく、どの道この手で 真実を掴んでみせます！
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、どの道この手で
真実を掴んでみせます！

engChrName: We should probably call it a day, Dingo. But rest assured, I'll be hitting the pavement as hard as ever tomorrow!
engSearchText:
We should probably call it a day, Dingo. But rest
assured, I'll be hitting the pavement as hard as
ever tomorrow!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん、今日はもう遅いですが、 明日はわたしも本格的に動きます！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん、今日はもう遅いですが、
明日はわたしも本格的に動きます！

engChrName: And don't think you can get the jump on me for long! No matter what you try, I'll be on you like a dog going after its own tail!
engSearchText:
And don't think you can get the jump on me for long!
No matter what you try, I'll be on you like a dog
going after its own tail!
jpnChrName: 抜け駆けされても…… 記者として粘り強く追いかけますから！
jpnSearchText:
抜け駆けされても……
記者として粘り強く追いかけますから！

engChrName: When I said I wanted to put together something about the film festival, my boss let me go on the spot. It was amazing!
engSearchText:
When I said I wanted to put together something
about the film festival, my boss let me go on the spot.
It was amazing!
jpnChrName: 通信社の方には映画祭の取材って言ったら すぐに行かせてくれました！
jpnSearchText:
通信社の方には映画祭の取材って言ったら
すぐに行かせてくれました！

engChrName: But you, Dingo, I can smell it. Films are just pictures and, uh...light, to you! You're after something bigger, something way more important!
engSearchText:
But you, Dingo, I can smell it. Films are just pictures
and, uh...light, to you! You're after something bigger,
something way more important!
jpnChrName: でも、あなたが追っているのはあんな俗っぽい ショーだけでなく、他にもきっと何かあるはず……！
jpnSearchText:
でも、あなたが追っているのはあんな俗っぽい
ショーだけでなく、他にもきっと何かあるはず……！

engChrName: *sigh* You really shouldn't put me on a pedestal. And now that you're here, we've got to keep you out of trouble.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You really shouldn't put me on a pedestal.
And now that you're here, we've got to keep you out
of trouble.
jpnChrName: やれやれ……そう買い被られても困るがな。 まあ、面倒事に巻き込まれても後味は悪い。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……そう買い被られても困るがな。
まあ、面倒事に巻き込まれても後味は悪い。

engChrName: Listen, I've got stuff to do. Don't do anything crazy. The prince of Elsaim is here, you know. Why don't you interview the guy?
engSearchText:
Listen, I've got stuff to do. Don't do anything crazy.
The prince of Elsaim is here, you know. Why don't
you interview the guy?
jpnChrName: 俺は俺の仕事をするが……お前も無茶はしないで、 エルザイムのお偉いさんでも取材したらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
俺は俺の仕事をするが……お前も無茶はしないで、
エルザイムのお偉いさんでも取材したらどうだ？

engChrName: He is?! I never would've expected someone so big and famous to be visiting a trashy event like this!
engSearchText:
He is?! I never would've expected someone so big and
famous to be visiting a trashy event like this!
jpnChrName: 何と！　俗っぽいイベントかと思いきや、 あの国のＶＩＰも来訪しているんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
何と！　俗っぽいイベントかと思いきや、
あの国のＶＩＰも来訪しているんですか！？

engChrName: Yeah, maybe I SHOULD talk to him. That could be my ticket to a really big—Urgh, this isn't about me! Stop trying to distract me!
engSearchText:
Yeah, maybe I SHOULD talk to him. That could be
my ticket to a really big—Urgh, this isn't about me!
Stop trying to distract me!
jpnChrName: 確かにそれは特ダネに繋がりそうな……って、 そうじゃなくてですっ！
jpnSearchText:
確かにそれは特ダネに繋がりそうな……って、
そうじゃなくてですっ！

engChrName: I'm not letting you out of my sight for even a second, and there's nothing you can say or do about it, mister! Got it?
engSearchText:
I'm not letting you out of my sight for even a second,
and there's nothing you can say or do about it, mister!
Got it?
jpnChrName: ディンゴさん、今度こそあなたに 追い付いてみせますからねっ！
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴさん、今度こそあなたに
追い付いてみせますからねっ！

engChrName: Gaaah! I was really hoping I could come in with my sister, but they told me they don't allow outsiders.
engSearchText:
Gaaah! I was really hoping I could come in with my
sister, but they told me they don't allow outsiders.
jpnChrName: ふう、お姉と一緒にいたかったけど やっぱり部外者はダメって言われちゃってさ～。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、お姉と一緒にいたかったけど
やっぱり部外者はダメって言われちゃってさ～。

engChrName: I thought I'd have a chance to meet with some famous celebrities or something. So much for that, I guess...
engSearchText:
I thought I'd have a chance to meet with some famous
celebrities or something. So much for that, I guess...
jpnChrName: あ～あ、せっかく色んな有名人に 会えるかと思ったのに……
jpnSearchText:
あ～あ、せっかく色んな有名人に
会えるかと思ったのに……

engChrName: Maybe it wasn't such a good idea to go up to one of the staff members and get up in their face.
engSearchText:
Maybe it wasn't such a good idea to go up to one of
the staff members and get up in their face.
jpnChrName: やっぱり関係者っぽい人に グイグイ行っちゃったのがマズかったのかなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり関係者っぽい人に
グイグイ行っちゃったのがマズかったのかなぁ。

engChrName: Heehee, maybe. It's clear you want your sister to succeed, though.
engSearchText:
Heehee, maybe. It's clear you want your sister to
succeed, though.
jpnChrName: あはは……でもサァラさんには 頑張ってほしいですよね。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……でもサァラさんには
頑張ってほしいですよね。

engChrName: We're definitely rooting for her, too. I'm sure she's going to do just great.
engSearchText:
We're definitely rooting for her, too. I'm sure she's
going to do just great.
jpnChrName: 私達も微力ながら応援しています。
jpnSearchText: 私達も微力ながら応援しています。

engChrName: Aww, thanks! Yeah, I know she's gonna knock them dead. It's Saara we're talking about!
engSearchText:
Aww, thanks! Yeah, I know she's gonna knock
them dead. It's Saara we're talking about!
jpnChrName: うんうん、ありがと！ でもサァラ姉なら絶対大丈夫！
jpnSearchText:
うんうん、ありがと！
でもサァラ姉なら絶対大丈夫！

engChrName: My sister's so amazing at what she does! I'm so proud of her.
engSearchText:
My sister's so amazing at what she does! I'm so proud
of her.
jpnChrName: なんてったってあたしの自慢のお姉だもんね！
jpnSearchText: なんてったってあたしの自慢のお姉だもんね！

engChrName: Hmm... Well, if I can't get in, now's as good a time as any to get some dance practice in, myself.
