engSearchText:
Hmm... Well, if I can't get in, now's as good a time as
any to get some dance practice in, myself.
jpnChrName: ……そうだ、せっかくだし あたしも踊りの練習しよっかな。
jpnSearchText:
……そうだ、せっかくだし
あたしも踊りの練習しよっかな。

engChrName: Saara can't be the only one working so hard out there. It wouldn't be fair!
engSearchText:
Saara can't be the only one working so hard out there.
It wouldn't be fair!
jpnChrName: サァラ姉も頑張ってるんだし、あたしだけ じっとなんてしていられないもん！
jpnSearchText:
サァラ姉も頑張ってるんだし、あたしだけ
じっとなんてしていられないもん！

engChrName: (Shaheena sounds really anxious. Not that I can blame her.)
engSearchText:
(Shaheena sounds really anxious. Not that I can
blame her.)
jpnChrName: （シャヒーナさん、やっぱり 　ちょっと落ち着かないみたいですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（シャヒーナさん、やっぱり
　ちょっと落ち着かないみたいですね。）

engChrName: (Probably doesn't help that Saara can't perform like normal today or tomorrow. Hopefully all the excitement doesn't get to either of 'em.)
engSearchText:
(Probably doesn't help that Saara can't perform like
normal today or tomorrow. Hopefully all the
excitement doesn't get to either of 'em.)
jpnChrName: （今日明日は興行もできねえだろうしな。 　ま、姉妹共々気負わず臨んでほしいもんだが。）
jpnSearchText:
（今日明日は興行もできねえだろうしな。
　ま、姉妹共々気負わず臨んでほしいもんだが。）

engChrName: I've gotta do something. My sister can't be the only one busting her butt today!
engSearchText:
I've gotta do something. My sister can't be the only
one busting her butt today!
jpnChrName: サァラ姉が頑張ってるのに、あたしだけ 何もしないなんて………
jpnSearchText:
サァラ姉が頑張ってるのに、あたしだけ
何もしないなんて………

engChrName: I think I'll go out and get a present for her. Then maybe I'll do some dance practice, too.
engSearchText:
I think I'll go out and get a present for her.
Then maybe I'll do some dance practice, too.
jpnChrName: せめてお姉に差し入れとか…… あとどこかで踊りの練習でもしよっかな。
jpnSearchText:
せめてお姉に差し入れとか……
あとどこかで踊りの練習でもしよっかな。

engChrName: I actually brought my costume with me. Might as well get changed into it since I already have it with me, heehee.
engSearchText:
I actually brought my costume with me. Might as well
get changed into it since I already have it with
me, heehee.
jpnChrName: えへへ、実は衣装も持ってきてるんだよねっ！ せっかくだし着替えちゃおうかな！
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、実は衣装も持ってきてるんだよねっ！
せっかくだし着替えちゃおうかな！

engChrName: I've been looking into the new arrivals who are coming into the area from the Central East.
engSearchText:
I've been looking into the new arrivals who are
coming into the area from the Central East.
jpnChrName: 一応、中東方面から新たに来訪する方々にも 探りは入れてはいるのですが……
jpnSearchText:
一応、中東方面から新たに来訪する方々にも
探りは入れてはいるのですが……

engChrName: So far, nothing suspicious has turned up about those coming from Elsaim, which means... Hmm...
engSearchText:
So far, nothing suspicious has turned up about those
coming from Elsaim, which means... Hmm...
jpnChrName: やはり、エルザイム方面のルートには怪しい 部分は無さそうですね、となると……
jpnSearchText:
やはり、エルザイム方面のルートには怪しい
部分は無さそうですね、となると……

engChrName: Either way, Tharbad is going to see an influx of tourists starting tomorrow. We have to optimize our intel gathering as best we can.
engSearchText:
Either way, Tharbad is going to see an influx of
tourists starting tomorrow. We have to optimize our
intel gathering as best we can.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ明日以降は一層観光客も増えますし…… 情報収集も可能な限り効率化せねばなりません。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ明日以降は一層観光客も増えますし……
情報収集も可能な限り効率化せねばなりません。

engChrName: We can't expect our help from the capital to take care of everything for us.
engSearchText:
We can't expect our help from the capital to take care
of everything for us.
jpnChrName: 首都から来るという応援の方に頼りきりに なる訳にもいきませんからな。
jpnSearchText:
首都から来るという応援の方に頼りきりに
なる訳にもいきませんからな。

engChrName: So far, there don't appear to be signs of any criminal organizations infiltrating the crowds.
engSearchText:
So far, there don't appear to be signs of any criminal
organizations infiltrating the crowds.
jpnChrName: マフィアの者が群集に紛れている様子は…… 今の所は無さそうだけどな。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアの者が群集に紛れている様子は……
今の所は無さそうだけどな。

engChrName: The fact they haven't turned up despite the festival already starting is disconcerting.
engSearchText:
The fact they haven't turned up despite the festival
already starting is disconcerting.
jpnChrName: 映画祭も始まったのに、 姿が見えないのが逆に気味悪いな。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭も始まったのに、
姿が見えないのが逆に気味悪いな。

engChrName: At least we've got Fie with us. I guess we'll just coordinate with her and see what we can turn up together.
engSearchText:
At least we've got Fie with us. I guess we'll just
coordinate with her and see what we can turn
up together.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、フィーさんもいる事だし、 上手く連携して当たるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、フィーさんもいる事だし、
上手く連携して当たるとしようか。

engChrName: This morning has seen even more disturbances than yesterday. Some brawling even broke out a little while ago.
engSearchText:
This morning has seen even more disturbances
than yesterday. Some brawling even broke out a little
while ago.
jpnChrName: 今朝は昨日にも増して騒ぎが多くてな、 さっきは乱闘まであったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
今朝は昨日にも増して騒ぎが多くてな、
さっきは乱闘まであったんだ。

engChrName: The fact that the Edith police has dispatched detectives here says to me that they suspect something's going on, too.
engSearchText:
The fact that the Edith police has dispatched
detectives here says to me that they suspect
something's going on, too.
jpnChrName: ……首都警察から捜査官も来ているようだし、 警察も何かを疑っているみたいだね。
jpnSearchText:
……首都警察から捜査官も来ているようだし、
警察も何かを疑っているみたいだね。

engChrName: I'll let Ismail handle anything that requires more local insight into Tharbad than what I've got.
engSearchText:
I'll let Ismail handle anything that requires more local
insight into Tharbad than what I've got.
jpnChrName: 土地勘が必要な事は イスマイルさんに頼るとして……
jpnSearchText:
土地勘が必要な事は
イスマイルさんに頼るとして……

engChrName: As for me, I think I'll keep an eye on the trajectory of these tourists and where they're coming from.
engSearchText:
As for me, I think I'll keep an eye on the trajectory of
these tourists and where they're coming from.
jpnChrName: 僕の方は来訪者の方を少し注視して おくとしようか……
jpnSearchText:
僕の方は来訪者の方を少し注視して
おくとしようか……

engChrName: Well, the film festival's underway and thankfully, everything seems to be going smoothly, which is a relief.
engSearchText:
Well, the film festival's underway and thankfully,
everything seems to be going smoothly, which is
a relief.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が始まりましたな…… 無事に進行できているようで何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が始まりましたな……
無事に進行できているようで何よりです。

engChrName: I was really worried last night that those hookahs the police rounded up yesterday would have some sort of influence on people.
engSearchText:
I was really worried last night that those hookahs the
police rounded up yesterday would have some sort of
influence on people.
jpnChrName: 昨晩回収された例の品の影響が 何か無いかと一晩中気がかりでしたが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩回収された例の品の影響が
何か無いかと一晩中気がかりでしたが……

engChrName: You all seem more relaxed compared to yesterday. That's reassuring. I can rest a little easier today, I suppose.
engSearchText:
You all seem more relaxed compared to yesterday.
That's reassuring. I can rest a little easier today,
I suppose.
jpnChrName: 皆さん、昨日までより落ち着いているようで…… 少しばかり気が楽になりましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
皆さん、昨日までより落ち着いているようで……
少しばかり気が楽になりましたよ。

engChrName: I still have to take responsibility for my part, however. Any customers with a receipt will have their lost hookahs refunded by me.
engSearchText:
I still have to take responsibility for my part, however.
Any customers with a receipt will have their lost
hookahs refunded by me.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、責任は最低限取らねば…… 領収書さえあればシーシャ代は返金致します。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、責任は最低限取らねば……
領収書さえあればシーシャ代は返金致します。

engChrName: I... I can't believe my newest products were so dangerous to customers.
engSearchText:
I... I can't believe my newest products were so
dangerous to customers.
jpnChrName: まさか、あの新商品がそんなに 危険な代物であったとは……
jpnSearchText:
まさか、あの新商品がそんなに
危険な代物であったとは……

engChrName: I really failed as a merchant not catching on to such issues before I bought them in the first place.
engSearchText:
I really failed as a merchant not catching on to such
issues before I bought them in the first place.
jpnChrName: 売り込みの時に気づけなかった事が、 商人として情けない限りです……
jpnSearchText:
売り込みの時に気づけなかった事が、
商人として情けない限りです……

engChrName: The police haven't put any blame on me, which I appreciate, but I still feel terrible...
engSearchText:
The police haven't put any blame on me, which I
appreciate, but I still feel terrible...
jpnChrName: 警察からは、知らなかったなら仕方ないと 言って頂けはしましたが……
jpnSearchText:
警察からは、知らなかったなら仕方ないと
言って頂けはしましたが……

engChrName: I have to own up to my mistake as a businessman, not only by helping the police collect them, but refunding people who bought them from me.
engSearchText:
I have to own up to my mistake as a businessman,
not only by helping the police collect them, but
refunding people who bought them from me.
jpnChrName: 商人なりに責任はしっかり取りたいですしな。 回収にも協力し、購入者にも返金などせねば。
jpnSearchText:
商人なりに責任はしっかり取りたいですしな。
回収にも協力し、購入者にも返金などせねば。

engChrName: I've had a lot of surprisingly demanding, angry customers this morning. It's a little overwhelming, to be honest.
engSearchText:
I've had a lot of surprisingly demanding, angry
customers this morning. It's a little overwhelming, to
be honest.
jpnChrName: 今朝は妙に店頭クレーマーが多くてですなァ。 いやはや、困ったものです。
jpnSearchText:
今朝は妙に店頭クレーマーが多くてですなァ。
いやはや、困ったものです。

engChrName: Some of them have the craziest demands. I've even had folks grumble about not being able to sell camels to them, of all things!
engSearchText:
Some of them have the craziest demands. I've even
had folks grumble about not being able to sell camels
to them, of all things!
jpnChrName: 何せ、我が店でラクダを売らないのがおかしいなど 随分と無茶苦茶な方もいるもので……
jpnSearchText:
何せ、我が店でラクダを売らないのがおかしいなど
随分と無茶苦茶な方もいるもので……

engChrName: I've worked as a merchant for a long time, and never have I seen as many complaints at my shop in one day as I have today.
engSearchText:
I've worked as a merchant for a long time, and never
have I seen as many complaints at my shop in one day
as I have today.
jpnChrName: 私も長いこと商人をしとりますが、 こうもクレーマーが多い日は初めてですよ。
jpnSearchText:
私も長いこと商人をしとりますが、
こうもクレーマーが多い日は初めてですよ。

engChrName: But sometimes you've got to put your feet to the fire to make a mira, so if that's what it takes to close those deals, sign me up!
engSearchText:
But sometimes you've got to put your feet to the fire
to make a mira, so if that's what it takes to close those
deals, sign me up!
jpnChrName: ですが……それを乗り越えて商機を掴んでこその商人、 これも試練と思って頑張りましょう！
jpnSearchText:
ですが……それを乗り越えて商機を掴んでこその商人、
これも試練と思って頑張りましょう！

engChrName: My shop attracts its fair share of customers because I deal in rarities that you can't find anywhere else.
engSearchText:
My shop attracts its fair share of customers because I
deal in rarities that you can't find anywhere else.
jpnChrName: ここでしか買えない珍品なども、 それなりに取り寄せてるのですが……
jpnSearchText:
ここでしか買えない珍品なども、
それなりに取り寄せてるのですが……

engChrName: But even I can't ignore the real sales potential that these orbal hookahs seem to possess.
engSearchText:
But even I can't ignore the real sales potential that
these orbal hookahs seem to possess.
jpnChrName: どうにも導力シーシャの方が 売れ行きが良いものでしてなァ。
jpnSearchText:
どうにも導力シーシャの方が
売れ行きが良いものでしてなァ。

engChrName: If things like these are what's in vogue these days, then I need to make sure to pay attention and stock up accordingly.
engSearchText:
If things like these are what's in vogue these days,
then I need to make sure to pay attention and stock
up accordingly.
jpnChrName: ふむ、今時はこういうものが流行るのですかな、 今後の仕入れの参考にもなりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、今時はこういうものが流行るのですかな、
今後の仕入れの参考にもなりそうだ。

engChrName: That's why it's crucial to interact with your customers, so you remain clued in to what they want, as they want them!
engSearchText:
That's why it's crucial to interact with your customers,
so you remain clued in to what they want, as they
want them!
jpnChrName: まあ、そういう流行をしっかり実感するためにも、 こうして私自ら客に触れている訳ですしなァ！
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そういう流行をしっかり実感するためにも、
こうして私自ら客に触れている訳ですしなァ！

engChrName: Welcome to my pride and joy! This outlet is the perfect place to see the prosperity of Tharbad firsthand.
engSearchText:
Welcome to my pride and joy! This outlet is the
perfect place to see the prosperity of
Tharbad firsthand.
jpnChrName: 我が自慢の店へようこそ、 この街の富をお見せしましょう！
jpnSearchText:
我が自慢の店へようこそ、
この街の富をお見せしましょう！

engChrName: They call this place the City of Chances, and that's never been more true than it is right now with this boom we're seeing.
engSearchText:
They call this place the City of Chances, and that's
never been more true than it is right now with this
boom we're seeing.
jpnChrName: サルバッドはチャンスの街と言われますが、 その景気と機運は今でもうなぎ上り！
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドはチャンスの街と言われますが、
その景気と機運は今でもうなぎ上り！

engChrName: Really, that sense of opportunity was there when I was still just a humble trader, and it's why I set up shop here in the first place.
engSearchText:
Really, that sense of opportunity was there when I
was still just a humble trader, and it's why I set up
shop here in the first place.
jpnChrName: かく言う私も交易商時代に、 この街の可能性に賭けて店を興した身。
jpnSearchText:
かく言う私も交易商時代に、
この街の可能性に賭けて店を興した身。

engChrName: You can't call yourself a merchant if you're afraid of a challenge, and just look at me now! I'm doing great!
engSearchText:
You can't call yourself a merchant if you're afraid of
a challenge, and just look at me now! I'm doing great!
jpnChrName: 今思えば、やはり商人たるもの 挑戦してこそですなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
今思えば、やはり商人たるもの
挑戦してこそですなぁ！

engChrName: These orbal hookahs seem to be the latest fad. I had someone come in and try to sell me on them.
engSearchText:
These orbal hookahs seem to be the latest fad. I had
someone come in and try to sell me on them.
jpnChrName: 近頃の流行りは、この導力シーシャという 品のようで、我が店にも売り込みがありました。
jpnSearchText:
近頃の流行りは、この導力シーシャという
品のようで、我が店にも売り込みがありました。

engChrName: There are other shops stocking them around here, but I'm not one to turn down a chance to make money, so I said 'sign me up'!
engSearchText:
There are other shops stocking them around here, but
I'm not one to turn down a chance to make money, so
I said 'sign me up'!
jpnChrName: 既に他店も扱っておりますが、小さな商機も 見逃すつもりはないですからな！
jpnSearchText:
既に他店も扱っておりますが、小さな商機も
見逃すつもりはないですからな！

engChrName: After all, what good is a wave if you don't ride it? I'm more than happy to join the club if it means more mira for me.
engSearchText:
After all, what good is a wave if you don't ride it?
I'm more than happy to join the club if it means more
mira for me.
jpnChrName: 流行りにはまずは乗ってみるもの！ 我が店でも並べさせてもらいましたよ！
jpnSearchText:
流行りにはまずは乗ってみるもの！
我が店でも並べさせてもらいましたよ！

engChrName: In addition to the police doing their mass confiscation, something seems to have happened at Vegas Films sometime last night.
engSearchText:
In addition to the police doing their mass
confiscation, something seems to have happened at
Vegas Films sometime last night.
jpnChrName: 昨晩は警察による不良品回収以外にも ベガスフィルムの方で何かあったと聞きますが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は警察による不良品回収以外にも
ベガスフィルムの方で何かあったと聞きますが……

engChrName: Nevertheless, the film festival itself has commenced without incident, and we're seeing quite a range of customers, which makes me happy.
engSearchText:
Nevertheless, the film festival itself has commenced
without incident, and we're seeing quite a range of
customers, which makes me happy.
jpnChrName: 映画祭は無事に迎えられ、普段以上に 多様な顔触れがご来店され嬉しい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭は無事に迎えられ、普段以上に
多様な顔触れがご来店され嬉しい限りです。

engChrName: It's important to take advantage of events such as this so we can share the charm of our Central Eastern wares with more people.
engSearchText:
It's important to take advantage of events such as this
so we can share the charm of our Central Eastern
wares with more people.
jpnChrName: より多くの方に中東武具の魅力を伝えるために、 こうした催事の機会は活用していきたいですしね。
jpnSearchText:
より多くの方に中東武具の魅力を伝えるために、
こうした催事の機会は活用していきたいですしね。

engChrName: The police came by earlier and took a handful of our products away.
engSearchText:
The police came by earlier and took a handful of our
products away.
jpnChrName: 先ほど警察の方々が一部の商品を 回収して行かれましたが……
jpnSearchText:
先ほど警察の方々が一部の商品を
回収して行かれましたが……

engChrName: They couldn't possibly be related to the recent discord that's taken place around the city, could they?
engSearchText:
They couldn't possibly be related to the recent discord
that's taken place around the city, could they?
jpnChrName: よもや、ここ最近の混乱の数々と何か 関係があるのでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
よもや、ここ最近の混乱の数々と何か
関係があるのでしょうか……？

engChrName: I'll have to talk with the owner of this store. We need to be able to sell our gear as we have been, no matter what.
engSearchText:
I'll have to talk with the owner of this store. We need
to be able to sell our gear as we have been, no
matter what.
jpnChrName: 武具をこれまで通りに取り扱うためにも…… その辺りもオーナーと確認しておきたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
武具をこれまで通りに取り扱うためにも……
その辺りもオーナーと確認しておきたいですね。

engChrName: Apparently some scuffles broke out around town this morning. The owner here is really concerned...
engSearchText:
Apparently some scuffles broke out around town
this morning. The owner here is really concerned...
jpnChrName: オーナーも心配されていますが、 今朝は乱闘騒ぎもあったようで……
jpnSearchText:
オーナーも心配されていますが、
今朝は乱闘騒ぎもあったようで……

engChrName: Normally, we keep real swords on display, but unfortunately we've seen a few too many customers lacking...self-restraint lately.
engSearchText:
Normally, we keep real swords on display, but
unfortunately we've seen a few too many customers
lacking...self-restraint lately.
jpnChrName: 我が店では真剣も陳列しておりますし…… 抑制の利かない人が増えるのは不安ですね。
jpnSearchText:
我が店では真剣も陳列しておりますし……
抑制の利かない人が増えるのは不安ですね。

engChrName: I think it's best we keep them in storage until things calm down, just to be safe.
engSearchText:
I think it's best we keep them in storage until things
calm down, just to be safe.
jpnChrName: 落ち着くまで、実物の武具は倉庫に 仕舞っておくとしましょうか……
jpnSearchText:
落ち着くまで、実物の武具は倉庫に
仕舞っておくとしましょうか……

engChrName: It may just be me, but people around Tharbad seem to be strangely elated as of late.
engSearchText:
It may just be me, but people around Tharbad seem
to be strangely elated as of late.
jpnChrName: それにしても、ここ最近のサルバッドでは 妙に浮かれている人が多いようで……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、ここ最近のサルバッドでは
妙に浮かれている人が多いようで……

engChrName: It's not just the tourists, either. Even local residents and other Central Easterners are in exceptionally high spirits.
engSearchText:
It's not just the tourists, either. Even local residents
and other Central Easterners are in exceptionally
high spirits.
jpnChrName: 観光客のみならず、地元の方や 中東の方まで羽目を外していますし……
jpnSearchText:
観光客のみならず、地元の方や
中東の方まで羽目を外していますし……

engChrName: It could simply be excitement for the upcoming film festival, but I've never seen anything like it, for any event...
engSearchText:
It could simply be excitement for the upcoming film
festival, but I've never seen anything like it, for
any event...
jpnChrName: 映画祭が近づいている影響なのでしょうが…… 今までは催事があってもここまで浮かれる事は……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が近づいている影響なのでしょうが……
今までは催事があってもここまで浮かれる事は……

engChrName: Greetings! If you're looking for traditional equipment, Tharbad-style, you've come to the right place.
engSearchText:
Greetings! If you're looking for traditional
equipment, Tharbad-style, you've come to the
right place.
jpnChrName: こんにちは、伝統武具を ご所望でしたら私の方に。
jpnSearchText:
こんにちは、伝統武具を
ご所望でしたら私の方に。

engChrName: For decades, connoisseurs have been captivated by the decorations and sleek designs that Central Eastern gear has to offer.
engSearchText:
For decades, connoisseurs have been captivated by the
decorations and sleek designs that Central Eastern
gear has to offer.
jpnChrName: 昔から中東武具には装飾や流線美に魅入られた 愛好家が多くいらっしゃいますしね。
jpnSearchText:
昔から中東武具には装飾や流線美に魅入られた
愛好家が多くいらっしゃいますしね。

engChrName: In particular, we've had a lot of discerning customers from the west pay us visits in recent times.
engSearchText:
In particular, we've had a lot of discerning customers
from the west pay us visits in recent times.
jpnChrName: 特に最近では西方の方々にもお目が高い お客様が多くいらっしゃる……
jpnSearchText:
特に最近では西方の方々にもお目が高い
お客様が多くいらっしゃる……

engChrName: It's all the more reason to put my experience working in an Elsaim museum to use, and choose only the finest items to put on display.
engSearchText:
It's all the more reason to put my experience working
in an Elsaim museum to use, and choose only the
finest items to put on display.
jpnChrName: エルザイムの博物館に勤めた経験を活かして 良い武具を見繕って差し上げたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムの博物館に勤めた経験を活かして
良い武具を見繕って差し上げたいものです。

engChrName: I'm glad the film festival's still carrying on as planned and all of that orbal hookah stuff didn't turn into a big to-do.
engSearchText:
I'm glad the film festival's still carrying on as planned
and all of that orbal hookah stuff didn't turn into a
big to-do.
jpnChrName: シーシャの件も大した騒ぎにならず 映画祭も予定通りできて……有難いですわ。
jpnSearchText:
シーシャの件も大した騒ぎにならず
映画祭も予定通りできて……有難いですわ。

engChrName: I was helping get the parade float ready, and that whole thing is shaping up to be more spectacular than I expected.
engSearchText:
I was helping get the parade float ready, and that
whole thing is shaping up to be more spectacular than
I expected.
jpnChrName: 今朝、パレードカーの準備を手伝ってきましたが、 思った以上に見事な出来上がりになりそうで。
jpnSearchText:
今朝、パレードカーの準備を手伝ってきましたが、
思った以上に見事な出来上がりになりそうで。

engChrName: Our shop's partnered with the film festival, so I'm keen to do my part to make sure it's as big a success as can be.
engSearchText:
Our shop's partnered with the film festival, so I'm
keen to do my part to make sure it's as big a success as
can be.
jpnChrName: うちの店もこの催しには協賛してますしな、 俺もできる事で貢献していきたいですぜ。
jpnSearchText:
うちの店もこの催しには協賛してますしな、
俺もできる事で貢献していきたいですぜ。

engChrName: I guess word's gotten out that those orbal hookahs were utilizing illegal ingredients. That's insane to even think about!
engSearchText:
I guess word's gotten out that those orbal hookahs
were utilizing illegal ingredients. That's insane to
even think about!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、あの導力シーシャが 未認可の成分を使っていたかもしれないとは……
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、あの導力シーシャが
未認可の成分を使っていたかもしれないとは……

engChrName: I've taken apart the heating element, but I can't say I'm well versed in the leaves themselves, so they sure had me fooled. Sheesh.
engSearchText:
I've taken apart the heating element, but I can't say
I'm well versed in the leaves themselves, so they sure
had me fooled. Sheesh.
jpnChrName: 加熱部分は開けてみたことはありやすが…… 葉っぱの方は詳しくないんで、気づかなくて……
jpnSearchText:
加熱部分は開けてみたことはありやすが……
葉っぱの方は詳しくないんで、気づかなくて……

engChrName: I swear, those orbal hookahs or whatever you call 'em, they just keep flying off the shelves faster every day.
engSearchText:
I swear, those orbal hookahs or whatever you call 'em,
they just keep flying off the shelves faster every day.
jpnChrName: 例の導力シーシャでしたっけ、 日を追うごとによく売れているようで。
jpnSearchText:
例の導力シーシャでしたっけ、
日を追うごとによく売れているようで。

engChrName: The principle behind how they work is pretty much the same as what you'd find in something like an orbal heater.
engSearchText:
The principle behind how they work is pretty much
the same as what you'd find in something like an
orbal heater.
jpnChrName: 仕組み自体は、葉っぱを熱する部分を 機械化して小型化したものみたいでしてな。
jpnSearchText:
仕組み自体は、葉っぱを熱する部分を
機械化して小型化したものみたいでしてな。

engChrName: All they basically did was mechanize and shrink down the part of the device that heats up the water and leaves.
engSearchText:
All they basically did was mechanize and shrink down
the part of the device that heats up the water
and leaves.
jpnChrName: ほら、原理は導力ヒーターとかと 同じような感じですよ。
jpnSearchText:
ほら、原理は導力ヒーターとかと
同じような感じですよ。

engChrName: The hookahs're sold together with preprocessed leaves, which is convenient. Maybe that explains their popularity.
engSearchText:
The hookahs're sold together with preprocessed
leaves, which is convenient. Maybe that explains
their popularity.
jpnChrName: 葉っぱも加工済みのがセットで売られていて、 その手軽さも人気の理由なんですかねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
葉っぱも加工済みのがセットで売られていて、
その手軽さも人気の理由なんですかねぇ。

engChrName: Way back in the day, I always had work fixing up orbal vehicles for caravans because of how often they'd break down from the sand.
engSearchText:
Way back in the day, I always had work fixing up
orbal vehicles for caravans because of how often
they'd break down from the sand.
jpnChrName: 一昔前はキャラバンの導力車が砂で故障する 事も多くてね、仕事が絶えなかったですが……
jpnSearchText:
一昔前はキャラバンの導力車が砂で故障する
事も多くてね、仕事が絶えなかったですが……

engChrName: But now that they're built to take such terrain, that work's dried up, which is how I wound up getting recruited to come work here.
engSearchText:
But now that they're built to take such terrain, that
work's dried up, which is how I wound up getting
recruited to come work here.
jpnChrName: 砂に強い車も出回り、その筋の仕事が減った ところでこの店にスカウトされたんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
砂に強い車も出回り、その筋の仕事が減った
ところでこの店にスカウトされたんですよ。

engChrName: Being surrounded by cutting edge tech in such a clean, pristine workplace really hits home just how much things have changed.
engSearchText:
Being surrounded by cutting edge tech in such a
clean, pristine workplace really hits home just how
much things have changed.
jpnChrName: こういう綺麗な所で最新式のものに触ってると、 色々変わったなと感じますなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
こういう綺麗な所で最新式のものに触ってると、
色々変わったなと感じますなぁ……

engChrName: Looking to tune up your orbments? Well, you've come to the right place!
engSearchText:
Looking to tune up your orbments? Well, you've
come to the right place!
jpnChrName: やあ、オーブメントの調整はこっちですぜ。
jpnSearchText: やあ、オーブメントの調整はこっちですぜ。

engChrName: I know just how hard it can be to keep your gear in tip-top shape with all this sand, so why not leave it to a professional?
engSearchText:
I know just how hard it can be to keep your gear in
tip-top shape with all this sand, so why not leave it to
a professional?
jpnChrName: 砂漠だと何かと不便もありますしな、 環境に合わせた整備も任せてくだせぇ。
jpnSearchText:
砂漠だと何かと不便もありますしな、
環境に合わせた整備も任せてくだせぇ。

engChrName: I saw mountains of tired, old orbal machinery back when I ran a workshop in the Cultural District years and years ago.
engSearchText:
I saw mountains of tired, old orbal machinery back
when I ran a workshop in the Cultural District years
and years ago.
jpnChrName: 昔、伝統地区で工房を構えていた時は、 古い導力器を多く見てきましたが……
jpnSearchText:
昔、伝統地区で工房を構えていた時は、
古い導力器を多く見てきましたが……

engChrName: Now that I get to deal in the latest and greatest tech, I feel like all that toiling away has finally paid off. It's great!
engSearchText:
Now that I get to deal in the latest and greatest tech,
I feel like all that toiling away has finally paid off.
It's great!
jpnChrName: いやはや、この店で最新式の導力製品を 扱うのも技師としちゃやり甲斐がありますぜ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、この店で最新式の導力製品を
扱うのも技師としちゃやり甲斐がありますぜ。

engChrName: Thankfully, the police haven't had any major contact with us since everything that took place last night.
engSearchText:
Thankfully, the police haven't had any major contact
with us since everything that took place last night.
jpnChrName: 昨日の一件から一夜明けましたが…… 今のところ、警察からも重要な連絡はありません。
jpnSearchText:
昨日の一件から一夜明けましたが……
今のところ、警察からも重要な連絡はありません。

engChrName: Our owner is doing a recall and offering refunds to affected customers. If that's the worst we have it, I'd say we got off lucky.
engSearchText:
Our owner is doing a recall and offering refunds to
affected customers. If that's the worst we have it, I'd
say we got off lucky.
jpnChrName: オーナーも、返金補償と自主回収を 進めておりますし……何も無いならそれが一番ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
オーナーも、返金補償と自主回収を
進めておりますし……何も無いならそれが一番ですしね。

engChrName: At this point, I just want to help with the film festival so that our city can keep growing.
engSearchText:
At this point, I just want to help with the film festival
so that our city can keep growing.
jpnChrName: 今は映画祭とサルバッドの発展に少しでも 貢献していきたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
今は映画祭とサルバッドの発展に少しでも
貢献していきたいものです。

engChrName: How could a store like ours put illicit goods up for sale...?
engSearchText:
How could a store like ours put illicit goods up for
sale...?
jpnChrName: 当店があのような未認可の品を 陳列してしまっていたとは……
jpnSearchText:
当店があのような未認可の品を
陳列してしまっていたとは……

engChrName: They were sold to us as being distributed by some well-known company running a campaign, and we just took them at face value.
engSearchText:
They were sold to us as being distributed by some
well-known company running a campaign, and we
just took them at face value.
jpnChrName: どうやら有名な会社がキャンペーンで配っていたのを オーナーがそのまま信用してしまっていたらしく……
jpnSearchText:
どうやら有名な会社がキャンペーンで配っていたのを
オーナーがそのまま信用してしまっていたらしく……

engChrName: I know our owner can be impulsive to a fault, but I never thought it would lead to this sort of trouble...
engSearchText:
I know our owner can be impulsive to a fault, but I
never thought it would lead to this sort of trouble...
jpnChrName: オーナーの決断力が、こんな形で 悪い方向に働いてしまうとは……
jpnSearchText:
オーナーの決断力が、こんな形で
悪い方向に働いてしまうとは……

engChrName: I've already told you, please, keep your clothes on here!
engSearchText:
I've already told you, please, keep your clothes
on here!
jpnChrName: お客様、先ほども申しましたが、こんなところで お召し物を脱がないでください！
jpnSearchText:
お客様、先ほども申しましたが、こんなところで
お召し物を脱がないでください！

engChrName: We can do temperature adjustments on our air conditioner. Just keep your clothing on, I'm begging you!
engSearchText:
We can do temperature adjustments on our
air conditioner. Just keep your clothing on, I'm
begging you!
jpnChrName: 導力エアコンの温度調整でしたら承ります、 ですのでお願いですから脱ごうとしないでください！
jpnSearchText:
導力エアコンの温度調整でしたら承ります、
ですのでお願いですから脱ごうとしないでください！

engChrName: Shadīn, our owner, is a very decisive person and has a lot of drive as a leader, which I certainly respect.
engSearchText:
Shadīn, our owner, is a very decisive person and has
a lot of drive as a leader, which I certainly respect.
jpnChrName: シャディーン・オーナーの 行動力や決断力は尊敬しますが……
jpnSearchText:
シャディーン・オーナーの
行動力や決断力は尊敬しますが……

engChrName: We might be successful right now, but being a little TOO certain about things can breed apprehension, you know?
engSearchText:
We might be successful right now, but being a little
TOO certain about things can breed apprehension,
you know?
jpnChrName: 今は成功しているとはいえ、思い切りが 良過ぎる事には少々不安を覚える事も……
jpnSearchText:
今は成功しているとはいえ、思い切りが
良過ぎる事には少々不安を覚える事も……

engChrName: For example, I used to inspect new stock as it came in, but now that the company is all about speed, well...
engSearchText:
For example, I used to inspect new stock as it came
in, but now that the company is all about
speed, well...
jpnChrName: 以前は私も仕入れの確認等はしていたのですが、 最近のオーナーは早さを重視するもので……
jpnSearchText:
以前は私も仕入れの確認等はしていたのですが、
最近のオーナーは早さを重視するもので……

engChrName: Greetings! If you have any general questions, I'd be more than happy to answer them.
engSearchText:
Greetings! If you have any general questions, I'd be
more than happy to answer them.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、総合案内でしたら こちらで私が伺いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、総合案内でしたら
こちらで私が伺いましょう。

engChrName: The owner here does sales, too, so it falls on me, as secretary, to handle customer reception and offer guidance.
engSearchText:
The owner here does sales, too, so it falls on me, as
secretary, to handle customer reception and
offer guidance.
jpnChrName: 我が店のオーナーは販売もなさるので多忙故、 秘書の私が各種案内と取次を承ります。
jpnSearchText:
我が店のオーナーは販売もなさるので多忙故、
秘書の私が各種案内と取次を承ります。

engChrName: In addition to featuring Central Eastern merchandise hand-picked by the owner, we offer specialized services by dedicated experts.
engSearchText:
In addition to featuring Central Eastern merchandise
hand-picked by the owner, we offer specialized
services by dedicated experts.
jpnChrName: 当店ではオーナーが自ら見繕った中東の品や、 各分野の専門家によるサービスがございます。
jpnSearchText:
当店ではオーナーが自ら見繕った中東の品や、
各分野の専門家によるサービスがございます。

engChrName: If you're looking for imported goods specifically, our owner will handle that directly.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for imported goods specifically, our
owner will handle that directly.
jpnChrName: 特に輸入品についてはオーナーも 直にご案内をされております。
jpnSearchText:
特に輸入品についてはオーナーも
直にご案内をされております。

engChrName: Phew, looks like we're not gonna get charged with anything for smoking those orbal hookahs. I was so scared for a minute there!
engSearchText:
Phew, looks like we're not gonna get charged with
anything for smoking those orbal hookahs. I was so
scared for a minute there!
jpnChrName: ふう、導力シーシャの件、あたしらは お咎め無しみたいで良かったわー。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、導力シーシャの件、あたしらは
お咎め無しみたいで良かったわー。

engChrName: Now with that weird feeling out of my system, I can go back to enjoying the film festival like I was supposed to.
engSearchText:
Now with that weird feeling out of my system, I can
go back to enjoying the film festival like I was
supposed to.
jpnChrName: まあ、今は変な感じも抜けてスッキリしたし、 気分を入れ替えて映画祭を楽しむわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、今は変な感じも抜けてスッキリしたし、
気分を入れ替えて映画祭を楽しむわ。

engChrName: The shop clerk said we'd be refunded and stuff for our trouble, too, so, no harm, no foul in the end, I guess.
engSearchText:
The shop clerk said we'd be refunded and stuff for
our trouble, too, so, no harm, no foul in the end,
I guess.
jpnChrName: お店の人も返金とか色々 補償してくれるって言うしね。
jpnSearchText:
お店の人も返金とか色々
補償してくれるって言うしね。

engChrName: What the hell? Where did all the hookahs go? And why are there are so many cops in front of the shop?
engSearchText:
What the hell? Where did all the hookahs go?
And why are there are so many cops in front of
the shop?
jpnChrName: えーっ、なになに！？ あのシーシャ無くなっちゃったの？
jpnSearchText:
えーっ、なになに！？
あのシーシャ無くなっちゃったの？

engChrName: Oh, no! Don't tell me they were laced with something illegal?! Am I gonna get arrested for smoking them?!
engSearchText:
Oh, no! Don't tell me they were laced with
something illegal?! Am I gonna get arrested for
smoking them?!
jpnChrName: お店の前にお巡りさんたちが来ていたけど…… もしかして何か危なっかしいモノだったとか！？
jpnSearchText:
お店の前にお巡りさんたちが来ていたけど……
もしかして何か危なっかしいモノだったとか！？

engChrName: Eeek! Nooo, I don't wanna rot in jail! They've gotta understand, I have tall, dark, and handsome actors to meet!
engSearchText:
Eeek! Nooo, I don't wanna rot in jail! They've gotta
understand, I have tall, dark, and handsome actors
to meet!
jpnChrName: えっ何これ、吸っちゃったあたしまで タイホされちゃったりする流れ！？
jpnSearchText:
えっ何これ、吸っちゃったあたしまで
タイホされちゃったりする流れ！？

engChrName: I dooon't even know what's going on anymore, but one thing's for certain: I'm on top of the world, baby! Wooooo!
engSearchText:
I dooon't even know what's going on anymore, but
one thing's for certain: I'm on top of the world, baby!
Wooooo!
jpnChrName: 何だかわからないけど、愉快な気分だわ！
jpnSearchText: 何だかわからないけど、愉快な気分だわ！

engChrName: I better make the most of these vibes and see if I can land some hot studs!
engSearchText:
I better make the most of these vibes and see if I can
land some hot studs!
jpnChrName: せっかくだし、この勢いのままに 俳優さんとかにアタックしちゃおうかしら！
jpnSearchText:
せっかくだし、この勢いのままに
俳優さんとかにアタックしちゃおうかしら！

engChrName: When life feels this good, like, who has time for nerves, right?! YOLO!
engSearchText:
When life feels this good, like, who has time for
nerves, right?! YOLO!
jpnChrName: これだけ気分が良ければ緊張も へったくれもないしね！
jpnSearchText:
これだけ気分が良ければ緊張も
へったくれもないしね！

engChrName: We came here hoping to meet some celebrities or something, only to end up spending all day in that shop.
engSearchText:
We came here hoping to meet some celebrities or
something, only to end up spending all day in
that shop.
jpnChrName: いやぁ、有名人に会えると思って来たけど、 結局夜までお店に入り浸っちゃった。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、有名人に会えると思って来たけど、
結局夜までお店に入り浸っちゃった。

engChrName: Oh, well. The film festival hasn't even started yet. There are still plenty of chances to catch glimpses of the rich and famous!
engSearchText:
Oh, well. The film festival hasn't even started yet.
There are still plenty of chances to catch glimpses of
the rich and famous!
jpnChrName: まあ、明日以降でも俳優さんを見る 機会はあるし、映画祭本番もまだ先だしね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、明日以降でも俳優さんを見る
機会はあるし、映画祭本番もまだ先だしね。

engChrName: This stuff's amazing! Check it out, Laurel!
engSearchText: This stuff's amazing! Check it out, Laurel!
jpnChrName: すごーい、見てよローレちゃん！
jpnSearchText: すごーい、見てよローレちゃん！

engChrName: We don't have anything like this back home, not even in the fancy department stores!
engSearchText:
We don't have anything like this back home, not even
in the fancy department stores!
jpnChrName: うちらの地元じゃ、百貨店にも こんなのは無いよね！？
jpnSearchText:
うちらの地元じゃ、百貨店にも
こんなのは無いよね！？

engChrName: These rare Central Eastern items are pretty pricey, but something tells me if I don't buy something now, I'll regret it...
engSearchText:
These rare Central Eastern items are pretty pricey,
but something tells me if I don't buy something now,
I'll regret it...
jpnChrName: 中東の珍品……高いけど、こういうのって 買っておかないと後で後悔するものよね……
jpnSearchText:
中東の珍品……高いけど、こういうのって
買っておかないと後で後悔するものよね……

engChrName: Oh, hey look! They sell portable hookahs, too!
engSearchText: Oh, hey look! They sell portable hookahs, too!
jpnChrName: あ、あっちに携帯式のシーシャも 売ってるみたい！
jpnSearchText:
あ、あっちに携帯式のシーシャも
売ってるみたい！

engChrName: Phew, is it just me or is it getting really hot? If this keeps up, I might have to start stripping and we wouldn't want THAT! ❤
engSearchText:
Phew, is it just me or is it getting really hot? If this
keeps up, I might have to start stripping and we
wouldn't want THAT! ❤
jpnChrName: あーん、何だか熱くなってきちゃったよー。 脱いじゃおっかな、アハハハ！
jpnSearchText:
あーん、何だか熱くなってきちゃったよー。
脱いじゃおっかな、アハハハ！

engChrName: Careful, Laurel! You know, in movies, it's always the saucy girl who shows a little too much skin who gets turned into shark meat first!
engSearchText:
Careful, Laurel! You know, in movies, it's always the
saucy girl who shows a little too much skin who gets
turned into shark meat first!
jpnChrName: キャハハハ、ローレ、それって映画なら 真っ先にサメの餌食になるフラグじゃん！
jpnSearchText:
キャハハハ、ローレ、それって映画なら
真っ先にサメの餌食になるフラグじゃん！

engChrName: Haha, I'll be careful! Sadly, I don't think we're gonna be seeing any sharks in the middle of a desert.
engSearchText:
Haha, I'll be careful! Sadly, I don't think we're gonna
be seeing any sharks in the middle of a desert.
jpnChrName: アハハハ、言えてるかも！ でも、ここは砂漠だよー？
jpnSearchText:
アハハハ、言えてるかも！
でも、ここは砂漠だよー？

engChrName: Well, girl, I have GOOD NEWS!
engSearchText: Well, girl, I have GOOD NEWS!
jpnChrName: 大丈夫、大丈夫！
jpnSearchText: 大丈夫、大丈夫！

engChrName: They make all kinds of shark now! Sand ones, snow ones, whatever! Nature's fiercest apex predator can be admired anytime, anywhere! Isn't it GRAND?
engSearchText:
They make all kinds of shark now! Sand ones, snow
ones, whatever! Nature's fiercest apex predator can be
admired anytime, anywhere! Isn't it GRAND?
jpnChrName: 最近のサメってのは砂漠にも 雪山にも出るものだから！
jpnSearchText:
最近のサメってのは砂漠にも
雪山にも出るものだから！

engChrName: Ahahahahahaha!
engSearchText: Ahahahahahaha!
jpnChrName: キャハハハ！／アハハハハ！
jpnSearchText: <S5>キャハハハ！／アハハハハ！

engChrName: Things got so out of hand yesterday. I can't believe what I did...
engSearchText:
Things got so out of hand yesterday. I can't believe
what I did...
jpnChrName: それにしても昨日は……色々はしゃぎすぎて 黒歴史が出来ちゃった……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても昨日は……色々はしゃぎすぎて
黒歴史が出来ちゃった……

engChrName: Oh, what does it matter? It can't get any worse now! Shayla's not sweating it! I've just gotta roll with it the way she is!
engSearchText:
Oh, what does it matter? It can't get any worse now!
Shayla's not sweating it! I've just gotta roll with it the
way she is!
jpnChrName: ええい、こうなったらもうヤケクソ！ 何も気にしていないシェイラに便乗するしかない！
jpnSearchText:
ええい、こうなったらもうヤケクソ！
何も気にしていないシェイラに便乗するしかない！

engChrName: There's only one way to turn this whole mess around: enjoy the film festival so much, I forget I ever embarrassed myself!
engSearchText:
There's only one way to turn this whole mess around:
enjoy the film festival so much, I forget I ever
embarrassed myself!
jpnChrName: 映画祭で恥ずかしさを忘れるまで楽しむ、 それだけが唯一残された救いだよっ！
jpnSearchText:
映画祭で恥ずかしさを忘れるまで楽しむ、
それだけが唯一残された救いだよっ！

engChrName: I overheard some of the shopkeepers talking earlier. Apparently those orbal hookahs aren't allowed or something?
engSearchText:
I overheard some of the shopkeepers talking earlier.
Apparently those orbal hookahs aren't allowed
or something?
jpnChrName: お店の人たちの話が聞こえたけど…… 導力シーシャ、未認可がどうとか……
jpnSearchText:
お店の人たちの話が聞こえたけど……
導力シーシャ、未認可がどうとか……

engChrName: You don't think they put any dangerous substances or anything in them, do you?!
engSearchText:
You don't think they put any dangerous substances or
anything in them, do you?!
jpnChrName: も、もしかして危ない成分とか 何かが入ってないよね！？
jpnSearchText:
も、もしかして危ない成分とか
何かが入ってないよね！？

engChrName: Am I... Am I gonna be okay? I might've taken a few puffs, so I'm kinda worried...
engSearchText:
Am I... Am I gonna be okay? I might've taken a few
puffs, so I'm kinda worried...
jpnChrName: わ、私も吸っちゃってたけど…… 身体とか……大丈夫なのかな……？
jpnSearchText:
わ、私も吸っちゃってたけど……
身体とか……大丈夫なのかな……？

engChrName: Aaah... This is greeeat. My body feels all warm and stuff.
engSearchText:
Aaah... This is greeeat. My body feels all warm
and stuff.
jpnChrName: うーん、何だか体が熱くて良い気分ー。
jpnSearchText: うーん、何だか体が熱くて良い気分ー。

engChrName: Heeheeee, I don't have a caaare in the world right now. Should unwind like this more often.
engSearchText:
Heeheeee, I don't have a caaare in the world
right now. Should unwind like this more often.
jpnChrName: あはは、難しいこと考えるのやーめた、 やっぱり気の向くままが一番だよね～。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、難しいこと考えるのやーめた、
やっぱり気の向くままが一番だよね～。

engChrName: Muuuh. We probably should've gotten out of that place a little sooner.
engSearchText:
Muuuh. We probably should've gotten out of that
place a little sooner.
jpnChrName: うーん、やっぱりもう少し早めに お店でたほうが良かった気もするけど……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、やっぱりもう少し早めに
お店でたほうが良かった気もするけど……

engChrName: Oh, well. I managed to snag souvenirs for everyone back home already, at least, so it was still time well spent. Ish.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. I managed to snag souvenirs for everyone
back home already, at least, so it was still time
well spent. Ish.
jpnChrName: まあ、一足先にお土産は確保できたし 結果オーライかな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、一足先にお土産は確保できたし
結果オーライかな。

engChrName: Shayla, we're not here to go on a shopping spree! We came to enjoy the film festival and try to rub elbows with celebrities, remember?
engSearchText:
Shayla, we're not here to go on a shopping spree!
We came to enjoy the film festival and try to rub
elbows with celebrities, remember?
jpnChrName: シェイラ……一応私達、映画祭と 俳優さんたちを見に来たんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
シェイラ……一応私達、映画祭と
俳優さんたちを見に来たんだけど……

engChrName: Don't get me wrong, it's okay to let ourselves get a little distracted. But let's try to make our way toward Vegas Films later tonight, okay?
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong, it's okay to let ourselves get a
little distracted. But let's try to make our way toward
Vegas Films later tonight, okay?
jpnChrName: まあ、目を奪われるのは分かるけど、 夕方にはベガスフィルムの近くも見に行こうね？
jpnSearchText:
まあ、目を奪われるのは分かるけど、
夕方にはベガスフィルムの近くも見に行こうね？

engChrName: Although... I've gotta admit, I am a little intrigued by that orbal hookah. Hmm...
engSearchText:
Although... I've gotta admit, I am a little intrigued by
that orbal hookah. Hmm...
jpnChrName: でも、導力シーシャは…… 確かに面白そうかもね。
jpnSearchText:
でも、導力シーシャは……
確かに面白そうかもね。

engChrName: Looks like the big film festival's finally underway. For those of us in the leisure industry, it's a major event.
engSearchText:
Looks like the big film festival's finally underway.
For those of us in the leisure industry, it's a
major event.
jpnChrName: いよいよ映画祭が始まりましたな。 娯楽に携わる者にとって、大きな見物です。
jpnSearchText:
いよいよ映画祭が始まりましたな。
娯楽に携わる者にとって、大きな見物です。

engChrName: Case in point: Mr. Gotti himself is known to patronize our fine establishment from time to time!
engSearchText:
Case in point: Mr. Gotti himself is known to
patronize our fine establishment from time to time!
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督も、時折このカジノには いらっしゃいますしね。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督も、時折このカジノには
いらっしゃいますしね。

engChrName: I can only imagine how the festivities are going to play out with his kind of luck in play. I'll be keeping an eye out!
engSearchText:
I can only imagine how the festivities are going to
play out with his kind of luck in play. I'll be keeping
an eye out!
jpnChrName: 彼の運が、映画祭をどう動かしていくのか 楽しみなものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
彼の運が、映画祭をどう動かしていくのか
楽しみなものですよ。

engChrName: A police officer just paid us a visit. Apparently, they're confiscating orbal hookahs due to some kind of issue that was uncovered.
engSearchText:
A police officer just paid us a visit.
Apparently, they're confiscating orbal hookahs due to
some kind of issue that was uncovered.
jpnChrName: 先ほど警察の方がいらしましたが……何やら 導力シーシャに問題が発見され、回収中のようで。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど警察の方がいらしましたが……何やら
導力シーシャに問題が発見され、回収中のようで。

engChrName: I made it clear we don't deal in those sorts of things at my casino, but I can't deny some of our customers have smoked them.
engSearchText:
I made it clear we don't deal in those sorts of things at
my casino, but I can't deny some of our customers
have smoked them.
jpnChrName: 当カジノでは扱っていない旨を伝えましたが、 お客様には吸われている方もいましたな。
jpnSearchText:
当カジノでは扱っていない旨を伝えましたが、
お客様には吸われている方もいましたな。

engChrName: Especially Mourad over there. I'm worried about him, he had quite a lot to smoke...
engSearchText:
Especially Mourad over there. I'm worried about
him, he had quite a lot to smoke...
jpnChrName: 特にあちらのモーハード様など、 相当吸っていましたし心配ですな……
jpnSearchText:
特にあちらのモーハード様など、
相当吸っていましたし心配ですな……

engChrName: Though frankly, smoking that much of anything is cause for concern, hookah or no.
engSearchText:
Though frankly, smoking that much of anything is
cause for concern, hookah or no.
jpnChrName: ……いえ、あれだけの喫煙量となると シーシャの問題に関係無く流石に心配ですな。
jpnSearchText:
……いえ、あれだけの喫煙量となると
シーシャの問題に関係無く流石に心配ですな。

engChrName: I guess some fights broke out around town this morning. It's hard not to worry about where things are headed when it all gets less safe.
engSearchText:
I guess some fights broke out around town
this morning. It's hard not to worry about where
things are headed when it all gets less safe.
jpnChrName: 今朝は街の数か所で乱闘騒ぎもあったとか…… 最近の治安悪化も併せて考えるとやや心配ですね。
jpnSearchText:
今朝は街の数か所で乱闘騒ぎもあったとか……
最近の治安悪化も併せて考えるとやや心配ですね。

engChrName: I'd best get in touch with the security company we have contracted out, just to be sure.
engSearchText:
I'd best get in touch with the security company we
have contracted out, just to be sure.
jpnChrName: ふむ、念のために契約中の警備会社の方にも 連絡はしておくとしましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、念のために契約中の警備会社の方にも
連絡はしておくとしましょう。

engChrName: They're just as trustworthy as our own sponsors. If anyone can keep our customers safe in these uncertain times, it's them!
engSearchText:
They're just as trustworthy as our own sponsors.
If anyone can keep our customers safe in these
uncertain times, it's them!
jpnChrName: スポンサーを同じくする信頼できる会社ですしね、 しかとお客様の安全を保障してくれるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
スポンサーを同じくする信頼できる会社ですしね、
しかとお客様の安全を保障してくれるでしょう。

engChrName: (Hey. Might be me, but when I think of security outfits that've pumped big money into the Central East, y'know who comes to mind?)
engSearchText:
(Hey. Might be me, but when I think of security
outfits that've pumped big money into the Central
East, y'know who comes to mind?)
jpnChrName: （おい……中東の資本と関係の深い   警備会社っていうと……）
jpnSearchText:
（おい……中東の資本と関係の深い
警備会社っていうと……）

engChrName: (Oh, yes. He's almost certainly referring to Marduk.)
engSearchText: (Oh, yes. He's almost certainly referring to Marduk.)
jpnChrName: （ええ……我がマルドゥック社の事でしょうね。）
jpnSearchText: （ええ……我がマルドゥック社の事でしょうね。）

engChrName: (At the very least, I know there's a casino in the database that's funded with Valis money.)
engSearchText:
(At the very least, I know there's a casino in the
database that's funded with Valis money.)
jpnChrName: （一応、ヴァリス資本のカジノがこの地に在る事自体は   データベースで存じ上げておりました。）
jpnSearchText:
（一応、ヴァリス資本のカジノがこの地に在る事自体は
データベースで存じ上げておりました。）

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. It's not that I don't trust Tharbad's police. But when you're a casino, you can never be too prepared.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. It's not that I don't trust
Tharbad's police. But when you're a casino, you can
never be too prepared.
jpnChrName: 我がカジノには多くのミラがあり、来て下さる 方々も多くの資産を持っていらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
我がカジノには多くのミラがあり、来て下さる
方々も多くの資産を持っていらっしゃいます。

engChrName: After all, we make quite a lot of mira, and our customers tend to be incredibly well off, to say the least.
engSearchText:
After all, we make quite a lot of mira, and our
customers tend to be incredibly well off, to say
the least.
jpnChrName: サルバッドの警察を信頼しない訳ではないですが…… 出来る備えは、するに越した事は無いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの警察を信頼しない訳ではないですが……
出来る備えは、するに越した事は無いでしょう。

engChrName: We can always count on nighttime to pick business up and land us some lovers of astronomical bets.
engSearchText:
We can always count on nighttime to pick business
up and land us some lovers of astronomical bets.
jpnChrName: 夜はもとより、掛け金の相場も跳ね上がり 一層盛り上がるものではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
夜はもとより、掛け金の相場も跳ね上がり
一層盛り上がるものではありますが……

engChrName: But even by those standards, our customers have been unusually...eager, these last couple of days.
engSearchText:
But even by those standards, our customers have been
unusually...eager, these last couple of days.
jpnChrName: ここ数日の皆さまは妙に 思い切りが良いですね……
jpnSearchText:
ここ数日の皆さまは妙に
思い切りが良いですね……

engChrName: If our sponsors caught wind of the size of some of these bets, they'd be floored, and they're hardly the reserved sort themselves.
engSearchText:
If our sponsors caught wind of the size of some of
these bets, they'd be floored, and they're hardly the
reserved sort themselves.
jpnChrName: 当店のスポンサーの方々も挑戦的ではありますが、 流石に先ほどの賭け額などには驚かれるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
当店のスポンサーの方々も挑戦的ではありますが、
流石に先ほどの賭け額などには驚かれるでしょう。

engChrName: But that's just another side of this little desert oasis we call home.
engSearchText:
But that's just another side of this little desert oasis
we call home.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、これもまたサルバッドの持つ 一つの顔といったところでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、これもまたサルバッドの持つ
一つの顔といったところでしょうか。

engChrName: Welcome to the Moulin Casino. We hope you enjoy your visit.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Moulin Casino. We hope you enjoy
your visit.
jpnChrName: ようこそおいで下さいました、お客様。 カジノ《ムーラン》を御堪能いただければ幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
ようこそおいで下さいました、お客様。
カジノ《ムーラン》を御堪能いただければ幸いです。

engChrName: While you're here, why not indulge in some games of chance? With any luck, you might be blessed with fortune.
engSearchText:
While you're here, why not indulge in some games
of chance? With any luck, you might be blessed
with fortune.
jpnChrName: お客様も、もしよろしければ富とチャンスをその手に 掴む体験をされてはいかがでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
お客様も、もしよろしければ富とチャンスをその手に
掴む体験をされてはいかがでしょうか。

engChrName: If you wish to exchange your earnings, I'll gladly take care of that for you. It's honestly my favorite part of running a casino.
engSearchText:
If you wish to exchange your earnings, I'll gladly take
care of that for you. It's honestly my favorite part of
running a casino.
jpnChrName: 換金でしたら私が承りましょう、 ふふ、この仕事もカジノ経営の醍醐味というものです。
jpnSearchText:
換金でしたら私が承りましょう、
ふふ、この仕事もカジノ経営の醍醐味というものです。

engChrName: As you can see, with the economy in such good shape, our customers have been betting quite big recently.
engSearchText:
As you can see, with the economy in such good
shape, our customers have been betting quite
big recently.
jpnChrName: 見ての通り、最近は景気が良いですし、 皆さん豪快な額を賭けてくださいます。
jpnSearchText:
見ての通り、最近は景気が良いですし、
皆さん豪快な額を賭けてくださいます。

engChrName: Nothing like a good windfall to make people believe in the power of luck!
engSearchText:
Nothing like a good windfall to make people believe
in the power of luck!
jpnChrName: そしてそれは、その分“チャンス”の 価値も大きいという事……
jpnSearchText:
そしてそれは、その分“チャンス”の
価値も大きいという事……

engChrName: Why don't you all join them? Ride this wave of fortune and see just how far it can take you, too!
engSearchText:
Why don't you all join them? Ride this wave of
fortune and see just how far it can take you, too!
jpnChrName: さて、皆さんもそのチャンスに、 この波に乗られてはいかがですか？
jpnSearchText:
さて、皆さんもそのチャンスに、
この波に乗られてはいかがですか？

engChrName: Well, it's finally showtime for the big film festival. We in the entertainment business are going to have a lot to keep an eye out for.
engSearchText:
Well, it's finally showtime for the big film festival.
We in the entertainment business are going to have a
lot to keep an eye out for.
jpnChrName: さて、いよいよ映画祭が始まりましたね。 エンターテイナーとして興味深く見守りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
さて、いよいよ映画祭が始まりましたね。
エンターテイナーとして興味深く見守りましょう。

engChrName: Personally, I'm really keen to see what kind of parade they end up putting on.
engSearchText:
Personally, I'm really keen to see what kind of parade
they end up putting on.
jpnChrName: 見所は色々ありますが、個人的にはパレードが 果たしてどのようなものになるかが楽しみです。
jpnSearchText:
見所は色々ありますが、個人的にはパレードが
果たしてどのようなものになるかが楽しみです。

engChrName: I've heard murmurings about Mr. Gotti and the apparently outrageous surprises he has planned. But what they are is anyone's guess.
engSearchText:
I've heard murmurings about Mr. Gotti and the
apparently outrageous surprises he has planned.
But what they are is anyone's guess.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督と、予想外の要素の面白さについてを 語らいましたが……どのような仕上がりになるのか。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督と、予想外の要素の面白さについてを
語らいましたが……どのような仕上がりになるのか。

engChrName: In times like these, when people let their guard down, you can really start to see their true colors.
engSearchText:
In times like these, when people let their guard down,
you can really start to see their true colors.
jpnChrName: それにしても、人の本性が見えるというのは 面白いものです、カードゲームもそうですが……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、人の本性が見えるというのは
面白いものです、カードゲームもそうですが……

engChrName: Take the film festival. A lot of people around here are getting really excited now that we're about to have our very first one.
engSearchText:
Take the film festival. A lot of people around here are
getting really excited now that we're about to have our
very first one.
jpnChrName: 今のサルバッドでは、初の映画祭を前に随分と 舞い上がっている人も多いようで。
jpnSearchText:
今のサルバッドでは、初の映画祭を前に随分と
舞い上がっている人も多いようで。

engChrName: It's fascinating stuff to witness. Not unlike a good round of cards, in that regard.
engSearchText:
It's fascinating stuff to witness. Not unlike a good
round of cards, in that regard.
jpnChrName: こうして普段の束縛を忘れた時にこそ、 人の本質も露わになるものなのでしょうな。
jpnSearchText:
こうして普段の束縛を忘れた時にこそ、
人の本質も露わになるものなのでしょうな。

engChrName: I had the pleasure of playing against none other than Mr. Gotti himself a little while ago.
engSearchText:
I had the pleasure of playing against none
other than Mr. Gotti himself a little while ago.
jpnChrName: ふふ、先ほどあちらのゴッチ監督のお相手を させていただきましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、先ほどあちらのゴッチ監督のお相手を
させていただきましてね。

engChrName: I have to say, I find his views on entertainment and how to stimulate audiences to be really fascinating.
engSearchText:
I have to say, I find his views on entertainment and
how to stimulate audiences to be really fascinating.
jpnChrName: やはり彼のエンターテインメントへの、 刺激への見解は興味深いものですよ。
jpnSearchText:
やはり彼のエンターテインメントへの、
刺激への見解は興味深いものですよ。

engChrName: I completely agree with him that nothing spices up a scene like a big surprise.
engSearchText:
I completely agree with him that nothing spices up a
scene like a big surprise.
jpnChrName: 予想外の驚きというものが最高の スパイス、というのは私も同感ですしね。
jpnSearchText:
予想外の驚きというものが最高の
スパイス、というのは私も同感ですしね。

engChrName: All the more reason to get excited for whatever that man has in store for his Carnal Cavalcade, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
All the more reason to get excited for whatever that
man has in store for his Carnal Cavalcade, if you
ask me.
jpnChrName: ふふ、フォクシーパレードにも如何なる驚きが あるのか楽しませていただきましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、フォクシーパレードにも如何なる驚きが
あるのか楽しませていただきましょうか。

engChrName: When you work as a dealer, you learn that nothing gets a player worked up like a little zestiness they can't even see coming.
engSearchText:
When you work as a dealer, you learn that nothing
gets a player worked up like a little zestiness they
can't even see coming.
jpnChrName: ディーラーをしていると、やはり人は思いもしない ような刺激にこそ昂るものだとわかるものでして。
jpnSearchText:
ディーラーをしていると、やはり人は思いもしない
ような刺激にこそ昂るものだとわかるものでして。

engChrName: There's no greater honor in this line of work than being able to deliver a good surprise your players will never forget.
engSearchText:
There's no greater honor in this line of work than
being able to deliver a good surprise your players will
never forget.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私も何かサプライズで お力になれたら光栄なものです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私も何かサプライズで
お力になれたら光栄なものです。

engChrName: Welcome. Care to play a round of cards with me?
engSearchText: Welcome. Care to play a round of cards with me?
jpnChrName: ようこそ、カードゲームに 興味がおありですか？
jpnSearchText:
ようこそ、カードゲームに
興味がおありですか？

engChrName: There's more to them than you might think. Once you get good enough, it's fun to see glimmers of your opponents' true identities seep in.
engSearchText:
There's more to them than you might think.
Once you get good enough, it's fun to see glimmers
of your opponents' true identities seep in.
jpnChrName: カードゲームは慣れてみると、対戦相手の心が 見え隠れする側面も楽しめ、中々奥深いものです。
jpnSearchText:
カードゲームは慣れてみると、対戦相手の心が
見え隠れする側面も楽しめ、中々奥深いものです。

engChrName: Oh, you must be the ones who were talking to Mr. Brad earlier. I take it you all enjoy a good card game?
engSearchText:
Oh, you must be the ones who were talking to Mr.
Brad earlier. I take it you all enjoy a good card game?
jpnChrName: おや、先ほどブラッド様方とお話されていた…… ふふ、あなた方もカードゲームを嗜まれますか？
jpnSearchText:
おや、先ほどブラッド様方とお話されていた……
ふふ、あなた方もカードゲームを嗜まれますか？

engChrName: Of all the games out there, few can bring out a person's true self like a deck of cards. It's an endless source of fun.
engSearchText:
Of all the games out there, few can bring out a
person's true self like a deck of cards. It's an endless
source of fun.
jpnChrName: カードゲームは数ある遊戯の中でも人の内面が 表れやすい分、色々な楽しみ方が出来るもの。
jpnSearchText:
カードゲームは数ある遊戯の中でも人の内面が
表れやすい分、色々な楽しみ方が出来るもの。

engChrName: I hope you enjoy some cards yourselves. Believe me when I say: nothing beats them.
engSearchText:
I hope you enjoy some cards yourselves. Believe me
when I say: nothing beats them.
jpnChrName: 実に奥深いものですよ、どうかお楽しみあれ。
jpnSearchText: 実に奥深いものですよ、どうかお楽しみあれ。

engChrName: Welcome! I'll be your card game dealer tonight.
engSearchText: Welcome! I'll be your card game dealer tonight.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、今夜のカードゲームは 自分が担当しております。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、今夜のカードゲームは
自分が担当しております。

engChrName: Harold had some matters to attend to and took off a little while ago.
engSearchText:
Harold had some matters to attend to and took off a
little while ago.
jpnChrName: ヘラルドさんは今夜は所用があるとの事で、 先ほどお帰りになりましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヘラルドさんは今夜は所用があるとの事で、
先ほどお帰りになりましたよ。

engChrName: For someone new here, he's actually quite the card shark. I don't know if I'll be as good of a match as him, but I'll try my best.
engSearchText:
For someone new here, he's actually quite the
card shark. I don't know if I'll be as good of a match
as him, but I'll try my best.
jpnChrName: 彼は最近入った方ですが腕はとても良いですしね。 私で代わりになるかは分かりませんがお相手しましょう。
jpnSearchText:
彼は最近入った方ですが腕はとても良いですしね。
私で代わりになるかは分かりませんがお相手しましょう。

engChrName: Ugh. That Marielle's got some sharp instincts. I hadn't said a word to her about my current story... and yet here she is.
engSearchText:
Ugh. That Marielle's got some sharp instincts.
I hadn't said a word to her about my current story...
and yet here she is.
jpnChrName: ふう、今回のネタの事は言っていないんだが…… マリエルもこう見えて勘は鋭いからな。
jpnSearchText:
ふう、今回のネタの事は言っていないんだが……
マリエルもこう見えて勘は鋭いからな。

engChrName: Well, it's probably best I keep an eye on her. Guess we'll be going drinking tonight, though not too hard.
engSearchText:
Well, it's probably best I keep an eye on her.
Guess we'll be going drinking tonight, though not
too hard.
jpnChrName: まあ……目を離す訳にもいかないし、 今夜は一応、軽く酒の相手をしてやるか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……目を離す訳にもいかないし、
今夜は一応、軽く酒の相手をしてやるか。

engChrName: Marielle, I know I told you not to get involved this time... What? You're coming to Tharbad TONIGHT?!
engSearchText:
Marielle, I know I told you not to get involved
this time... What? You're coming to
Tharbad TONIGHT?!
jpnChrName: マリエル、今回は関わるなと言ったはずだが…… 何、今夜にはサルバッドに到着する？
jpnSearchText:
マリエル、今回は関わるなと言ったはずだが……
何、今夜にはサルバッドに到着する？

engChrName: Give me a break for once, will you? Oh, all right. Hit me up when you get here.
engSearchText:
Give me a break for once, will you? Oh, all right.
Hit me up when you get here.
jpnChrName: まったく、お前ときたら……仕方ない、 着いたら改めて俺に連絡してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
まったく、お前ときたら……仕方ない、
着いたら改めて俺に連絡してくれ。

engChrName: I'll come pick your nosy self up at the station. Just don't stick your head into anything weird or dangerous while you're here, got it?
engSearchText:
I'll come pick your nosy self up at the station.
Just don't stick your head into anything weird or
dangerous while you're here, got it?
jpnChrName: とりあえず駅で拾ってやる、勝手に変な事に 首を突っ込むような真似はしないでくれよ。
jpnSearchText:
とりあえず駅で拾ってやる、勝手に変な事に
首を突っ込むような真似はしないでくれよ。

engChrName: (Sounds like our intrepid reporter's on the case again. Don't get too carried away leading the poor gal on, Dingo.)
engSearchText:
(Sounds like our intrepid reporter's on the case again.
Don't get too carried away leading the poor gal
on, Dingo.)
jpnChrName: （またあの張り切り過ぎてる娘か……   やれやれ、ディンゴも罪作りだよな。）
jpnSearchText:
（またあの張り切り過ぎてる娘か……
やれやれ、ディンゴも罪作りだよな。）

engChrName: Thanks to everyone's amazing help, I think I've got a real shot at winning this thing!
engSearchText:
Thanks to everyone's amazing help, I think I've got a
real shot at winning this thing!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、皆がいい反応をしてくれたし 優勝も夢じゃないわよね❤
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、皆がいい反応をしてくれたし
優勝も夢じゃないわよね❤

engChrName: Maybe I'll whip something up for old Dingo and his squeeze Marielle later, the cuties!
engSearchText:
Maybe I'll whip something up for old Dingo and his
squeeze Marielle later, the cuties!
jpnChrName: そうだ、後でディンゴちゃんや マリエルちゃんにも振舞ってあげようかしら♪
jpnSearchText:
そうだ、後でディンゴちゃんや
マリエルちゃんにも振舞ってあげようかしら♪

engChrName: There's two ingredients I want you darlings to go out and fetch for me.
engSearchText:
There's two ingredients I want you darlings to go out
and fetch for me.
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃん達には ２つの材料を集めて来てほしいの。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンちゃん達には
２つの材料を集めて来てほしいの。

engChrName: The first is some red cactus. From what I hear, those grow where the sandstorm is at its nastiest, out in the dune-y part of the desert.
engSearchText:
The first is some red cactus. From what I hear, those
grow where the sandstorm is at its nastiest, out in the
dune-y part of the desert.
jpnChrName: ひとつは赤いサボテン──《陽炎砂丘》の 砂嵐がひどい場所に咲いてるらしいわ。
jpnSearchText:
ひとつは赤いサボテン──《陽炎砂丘》の
砂嵐がひどい場所に咲いてるらしいわ。

engChrName: The other is a type of pomegranate known as a 'nocturnal sun.'
engSearchText:
The other is a type of pomegranate known as a
'nocturnal sun.'
jpnChrName: もうひとつは《夜の太陽》っていうザクロの実よ。
jpnSearchText: もうひとつは《夜の太陽》っていうザクロの実よ。

engChrName: You might find some for sale somewhere out in the bazaar in the Cultural District, if you go sniffing around.
engSearchText:
You might find some for sale somewhere out in the
bazaar in the Cultural District, if you go
sniffing around.
jpnChrName: これは伝統地区のバザールの どこかにあるかもしれないわ。
jpnSearchText:
これは伝統地区のバザールの
どこかにあるかもしれないわ。

engChrName: I hate to call in a favor like this when I know you're so busy, but I'll love you forever if you do! Thanks, dolls!
engSearchText:
I hate to call in a favor like this when I know you're
so busy, but I'll love you forever if you do!
Thanks, dolls!
jpnChrName: 面倒をかけちゃうけど、 どうかよろしく頼むわね！
jpnSearchText:
面倒をかけちゃうけど、
どうかよろしく頼むわね！

engChrName: Well, look who we have here! That was quite the exciting evening last night—for everyone involved!
engSearchText:
Well, look who we have here! That was quite the
exciting evening last night—for everyone involved!
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァンちゃん達……昨日はお互い お楽しみだったわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
あら、ヴァンちゃん達……昨日はお互い
お楽しみだったわねぇ。

engChrName: You know, I haven't seen those two tourists around the hotel since I got up today. Maybe I put the fear of Aidios into them.
engSearchText:
You know, I haven't seen those two tourists around
the hotel since I got up today. Maybe I put the fear of
Aidios into them.
jpnChrName: あの二人の観光客はアタシを恐れちゃったのか、 今朝からホテルにも姿が見えないけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの二人の観光客はアタシを恐れちゃったのか、
今朝からホテルにも姿が見えないけど……

engChrName: Not that I'm at all worried, what with you and Dingo around. Plus everything's as ready as can be with the side gig.
engSearchText:
Not that I'm at all worried, what with you and
Dingo around. Plus everything's as ready as can be
with the side gig.
jpnChrName: まあ良いわ、アナタ達も何かあったら ここにいるアタシに遠慮なく言ってね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良いわ、アナタ達も何かあったら
ここにいるアタシに遠慮なく言ってね。

engChrName: Anyway, if you sweethearts need anything, I'll be here. Don't be a stranger!
engSearchText:
Anyway, if you sweethearts need anything, I'll
be here. Don't be a stranger!
jpnChrName: 一応、あなたやディンゴちゃんも来ている事だし、 副業の方の備えもしっかりしているから。
jpnSearchText:
一応、あなたやディンゴちゃんも来ている事だし、
副業の方の備えもしっかりしているから。

engChrName: You darlings sure seemed shocked to see me standing at the counter here, huh?
engSearchText:
You darlings sure seemed shocked to see me standing
at the counter here, huh?
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃん達、アタシがここのカウンターに 立っていて随分と驚いたみたいね？
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンちゃん達、アタシがここのカウンターに
立っていて随分と驚いたみたいね？

engChrName: That's not the only surprise I hope to have in store for you all, assuming all my practice for the bartending tournament pays off.
engSearchText:
That's not the only surprise I hope to have in store for
you all, assuming all my practice for the bartending
tournament pays off.
jpnChrName: ふふ、バーテンダー大会でもアナタ達を 驚かせたいしね、練習させてもらってるのよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、バーテンダー大会でもアナタ達を
驚かせたいしね、練習させてもらってるのよ。

engChrName: You're tellin' me. Never expected to see you hanging out with Dingo, of all people.
engSearchText:
You're tellin' me. Never expected to see you hanging
out with Dingo, of all people.
jpnChrName: まったく、それもまさかディンゴ共々 出くわす事になろうとはな……
jpnSearchText:
まったく、それもまさかディンゴ共々
出くわす事になろうとはな……

engChrName: But far be it from me to complain about having you here! Don't be surprised if we hit you up later.
engSearchText:
But far be it from me to complain about having
you here! Don't be surprised if we hit you up later.
jpnChrName: まあ、いるからにはいざって時は アテにさせてもらうとするか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、いるからにはいざって時は
アテにさせてもらうとするか。

engChrName: This bartending tournament sounds like a pretty fun time, too. Can't say I've heard of anything like that before.
engSearchText:
This bartending tournament sounds like a pretty fun
time, too. Can't say I've heard of anything like
that before.
jpnChrName: それにしてもバーテンダー大会ね…… クク、なかなか面白い事してるじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもバーテンダー大会ね……
クク、なかなか面白い事してるじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Oh, it's a thing, all right. It sounds like they deliberately timed this year's events to coincide with the film festival.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's a thing, all right. It sounds like they
deliberately timed this year's events to coincide with
the film festival.
jpnChrName: フフ、今年から映画祭に日程を 合わせてやるようになるみたいなのよねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、今年から映画祭に日程を
合わせてやるようになるみたいなのよねぇ。

engChrName: Seeing as I was invited and all, I figured it'd be rude not to put in a good effort, you know?
engSearchText:
Seeing as I was invited and all, I figured it'd be rude
not to put in a good effort, you know?
jpnChrName: せっかく招待された事だし、 張り切らなきゃ失礼というものでしょ？
jpnSearchText:
せっかく招待された事だし、
張り切らなきゃ失礼というものでしょ？

engChrName: So you're out here working a local joint trying to shake off the rust. I get it.
engSearchText:
So you're out here working a local joint trying to
shake off the rust. I get it.
jpnChrName: それでわざわざ現地のバーで 腕を磨き直しているのか……
jpnSearchText:
それでわざわざ現地のバーで
腕を磨き直しているのか……

engChrName: Didn't take you to be so serious about these sorts of things. Shows me what I know.
engSearchText:
Didn't take you to be so serious about these sorts
of things. Shows me what I know.
jpnChrName: 見かけによらずストイックっつーか……
jpnSearchText: 見かけによらずストイックっつーか……

engChrName: I've got my connections in the bartending world, as you might imagine. It wasn't that hard to call in a favor.
engSearchText:
I've got my connections in the bartending world, as
you might imagine. It wasn't that hard to call in
a favor.
jpnChrName: バーテンダー界隈にもツテはあるしね、 どこも快く貸してくれたわ。
jpnSearchText:
バーテンダー界隈にもツテはあるしね、
どこも快く貸してくれたわ。

engChrName: Regardless, I'll be training at the hotel starting tonight, so I'm sure we'll be seeing plenty of each other out here.
engSearchText:
Regardless, I'll be training at the hotel starting
tonight, so I'm sure we'll be seeing plenty of each
other out here.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、今夜からはホテルの方でも 修行させてもらうつもりだからよろしくね。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、今夜からはホテルの方でも
修行させてもらうつもりだからよろしくね。

engChrName: One way or another, wherever I am, I'll always find a way to mix drinks. If you need anything, hon, don't be afraid to ask.
engSearchText:
One way or another, wherever I am, I'll always find a
way to mix drinks. If you need anything, hon, don't
be afraid to ask.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、アタシならどこかしらでお酒を作っているから、 何かあったら遠慮なく言いに来ると良いわ。
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、アタシならどこかしらでお酒を作っているから、
何かあったら遠慮なく言いに来ると良いわ。

engChrName: When it comes to you, I'm always ready to prepare something spicy for you, whether it's alcohol or intel. ❤
engSearchText:
When it comes to you, I'm always ready to prepare
something spicy for you, whether it's alcohol
or intel. ❤
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃんのためなら、お酒でも情報でも 刺激的なのを用意してア・ゲ・ル。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンちゃんのためなら、お酒でも情報でも
刺激的なのを用意してア・ゲ・ル。

engChrName: Well, the film festival is nearly upon us. It's a big day for us bartenders, too, you know.
engSearchText:
Well, the film festival is nearly upon us. It's a big day
for us bartenders, too, you know.
jpnChrName: さて、いよいよ映画祭ですね。 そして、映画祭に隠れがちではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
さて、いよいよ映画祭ですね。
そして、映画祭に隠れがちではありますが……

engChrName: We've got our tournament going on today, as well, even if the film festival might overshadow it a little.
engSearchText:
We've got our tournament going on today, as well,
even if the film festival might overshadow it a little.
jpnChrName: 私達バーテンダーにとっては、 その一大コンテストの日でもあります。
jpnSearchText:
私達バーテンダーにとっては、
その一大コンテストの日でもあります。

engChrName: I met up with Bermotti earlier. He seemed perfectly relaxed and normal, not at all nervous about the tournament.
engSearchText:
I met up with Bermotti earlier. He seemed perfectly
relaxed and normal, not at all nervous about
the tournament.
jpnChrName: 先ほどベルモッティ氏ともお会いしましたが、 特に緊張もせず自然体で臨まれるようで。
jpnSearchText:
先ほどベルモッティ氏ともお会いしましたが、
特に緊張もせず自然体で臨まれるようで。

engChrName: I'm hoping to enter next year's tournament as well. I really need to learn to take a page out of his book and not get so worked up.
engSearchText:
I'm hoping to enter next year's tournament as well.
I really need to learn to take a page out of his book
and not get so worked up.
jpnChrName: 私も来年には出場したいですが…… 彼の姿勢は参考にしたいものですね。
jpnSearchText:
私も来年には出場したいですが……
彼の姿勢は参考にしたいものですね。

engChrName: A police officer came by a little while ago. Looks like they're out confiscating some kind of device causing trouble.
engSearchText:
A police officer came by a little while ago. Looks like
they're out confiscating some kind of device
causing trouble.
jpnChrName: 先ほど警察の方がいらっしゃいましたが…… 何やら問題のある品を回収されているようで。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど警察の方がいらっしゃいましたが……
何やら問題のある品を回収されているようで。

engChrName: There have been so many problems around here lately, it's hard not to feel like Tharbad's getting a little dicey.
engSearchText:
There have been so many problems around here
lately, it's hard not to feel like Tharbad's getting a
little dicey.
jpnChrName: 近頃のトラブルの多さといい、どうにも サルバッドも物騒になったものです。
jpnSearchText:
近頃のトラブルの多さといい、どうにも
サルバッドも物騒になったものです。

engChrName: Not to mention, it's the day before the film festival, too. Who knows what's going to happen once folks start showing up.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, it's the day before the film
festival, too. Who knows what's going to happen
once folks start showing up.
jpnChrName: よりにもよって映画祭の前日ですしね…… 人が増える事を考えるとどうなるか……
jpnSearchText:
よりにもよって映画祭の前日ですしね……
人が増える事を考えるとどうなるか……

engChrName: I've already spotted a number of people looking rather...merry, you might say.
engSearchText:
I've already spotted a number of people looking
rather...merry, you might say.
jpnChrName: 何やら、酩酊したように妙に高揚した 方々が時折見受けられますが……
jpnSearchText:
何やら、酩酊したように妙に高揚した
方々が時折見受けられますが……

engChrName: Most people would think they're drunk, but trust me, as a bartender, it's clear as day that's not what they've had.
engSearchText:
Most people would think they're drunk, but trust me,
as a bartender, it's clear as day that's not what
they've had.
jpnChrName: バーテンダーからすれば、 あれが酒の影響ではないのは一目瞭然です。
jpnSearchText:
バーテンダーからすれば、
あれが酒の影響ではないのは一目瞭然です。

engChrName: Alcohol doesn't cause people to lose their inhibitions so fast. Plus I couldn't smell it in their breath.
engSearchText:
Alcohol doesn't cause people to lose their inhibitions
so fast. Plus I couldn't smell it in their breath.
jpnChrName: アルコールにしてはタガの外れ方が急でしたし、 何より皆さま、お酒の匂いもありませんしね。
jpnSearchText:
アルコールにしてはタガの外れ方が急でしたし、
何より皆さま、お酒の匂いもありませんしね。

engChrName: Makes you wonder what the heck's going on. It looked unnatural, even given the excitement surrounding the festival. Hmm...
engSearchText:
Makes you wonder what the heck's going on.
It looked unnatural, even given the excitement
surrounding the festival. Hmm...
jpnChrName: とはいえ、映画祭の盛り上がりにしては 不自然ですし……一体何なのか……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、映画祭の盛り上がりにしては
不自然ですし……一体何なのか……

engChrName: If you're looking for Bermotti, he went over to the hotel. He said he was going to practice elsewhere.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Bermotti, he went over to
the hotel. He said he was going to practice elsewhere.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティ氏でしたら先ほど、 他でも練習すると言いホテルに向かわれましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティ氏でしたら先ほど、
他でも練習すると言いホテルに向かわれましたよ。

engChrName: He wasn't here for very long, but it was an honor to get to host him at my bar. I learned a lot just from watching him.
engSearchText:
He wasn't here for very long, but it was an honor to
get to host him at my bar. I learned a lot just from
watching him.
jpnChrName: 短い間でしたが、私のバーでもお役に立てて 光栄でした、私自身も勉強になりましたしね。
jpnSearchText:
短い間でしたが、私のバーでもお役に立てて
光栄でした、私自身も勉強になりましたしね。

engChrName: I can't help but admire his drive to hone his craft. Not everyone would move from place to place as they practiced. Kudos to him, I say!
engSearchText:
I can't help but admire his drive to hone his craft.
Not everyone would move from place to place as
they practiced. Kudos to him, I say!
jpnChrName: しかし、現地で舞台を変えながら練習するとは、 ベルモッティ氏の飽くなき向上心には脱帽ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、現地で舞台を変えながら練習するとは、
ベルモッティ氏の飽くなき向上心には脱帽ですよ。

engChrName: I can't believe Bermotti himself is entering the bartending tournament.
engSearchText:
I can't believe Bermotti himself is entering the
bartending tournament.
jpnChrName: まさかベルモッティ氏も バーテンダー大会に出場されるとは。
jpnSearchText:
まさかベルモッティ氏も
バーテンダー大会に出場されるとは。

engChrName: You may not realize it, but he's a pretty big celebrity in our line of work.
engSearchText:
You may not realize it, but he's a pretty big celebrity
in our line of work.
jpnChrName: ご存じでしたか？ あの方は業界ではそれなりに有名でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
ご存じでしたか？
あの方は業界ではそれなりに有名でしてね。

engChrName: He said he wanted to get some practice in before the big event, so I'm letting him man my counter.
engSearchText:
He said he wanted to get some practice in before the
big event, so I'm letting him man my counter.
jpnChrName: 大会を前に改めて練習をしたいとの事で、 バーカウンターを貸しているのですが……
jpnSearchText:
大会を前に改めて練習をしたいとの事で、
バーカウンターを貸しているのですが……

engChrName: I'll definitely be keeping a close eye on what he does. It's not every day you get to learn from a master like him.
engSearchText:
I'll definitely be keeping a close eye on what he does.
It's not every day you get to learn from a master
like him.
jpnChrName: その向上心も技術も、是非この機会に 学ばせてもらいたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
その向上心も技術も、是非この機会に
学ばせてもらいたいですね。

engChrName: Most days, it's me who's tending the bar here at this casino.
engSearchText:
Most days, it's me who's tending the bar here at
this casino.
jpnChrName: 普段は私が当カジノのバーテンダーを 担当させていただいております。
jpnSearchText:
普段は私が当カジノのバーテンダーを
担当させていただいております。

engChrName: I like to whip up cocktails that include rare Central Eastern fruit, which are a big hit among my customers.
engSearchText:
I like to whip up cocktails that include rare Central
Eastern fruit, which are a big hit among
my customers.
jpnChrName: 中東の珍しい果実を使ったカクテルなどを 提供しており、多くの方々に好評でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
中東の珍しい果実を使ったカクテルなどを
提供しており、多くの方々に好評でしてね。

engChrName: Plus for my more well-connected clientele, I also offer an array of fine liquor from across Zemuria.
engSearchText:
Plus for my more well-connected clientele, I also offer
an array of fine liquor from across Zemuria.
jpnChrName: 他にも、上流階級の皆さまに向けて、 各地の高級酒も取り揃えております。
jpnSearchText:
他にも、上流階級の皆さまに向けて、
各地の高級酒も取り揃えております。

engChrName: Give me a break! I went looking around this morning and can't find a single orbal hookah anywhere!
engSearchText:
Give me a break! I went looking around this morning
and can't find a single orbal hookah anywhere!
jpnChrName: ふん、今朝になってみればどこにも 導力シーシャが無いではないか！
jpnSearchText:
ふん、今朝になってみればどこにも
導力シーシャが無いではないか！

engChrName: After setting ten million mira on fire last night, you're telling me I can't even get a smoke to haze out my sorrows?!
engSearchText:
After setting ten million mira on fire last night, you're
telling me I can't even get a smoke to haze out
my sorrows?!
jpnChrName: 昨晩は何を血迷ったか、１０００万ミラも 下ろして丸ごと損をしてしまったしな！
jpnSearchText:
昨晩は何を血迷ったか、１０００万ミラも
下ろして丸ごと損をしてしまったしな！

engChrName: I REALLY could use something to take the edge off. Guess I'll have to make do with a regular ol' hookah. Ugh.
engSearchText:
I REALLY could use something to take the edge off.
Guess I'll have to make do with a regular ol' hookah.
Ugh.
jpnChrName: その分の気晴らしがしたかったのだが…… 仕方ない、あとで伝統シーシャでも吸うか。
jpnSearchText:
その分の気晴らしがしたかったのだが……
仕方ない、あとで伝統シーシャでも吸うか。

engChrName: Argh, I can't withdraw any more cash! Fine! I'll have to use what I've got in my wallet to make back everything I've lost!
engSearchText:
Argh, I can't withdraw any more cash! Fine! I'll have
to use what I've got in my wallet to make back
everything I've lost!
jpnChrName: フン、流石にあれ以上下ろす訳にはいかん！ 財布にある分で何とか取り戻すぞい！
jpnSearchText:
フン、流石にあれ以上下ろす訳にはいかん！
財布にある分で何とか取り戻すぞい！

engChrName: All right, I got myself another ten million mira! Time to turn this into a payout for the ages!
engSearchText:
All right, I got myself another ten million mira!
Time to turn this into a payout for the ages!
jpnChrName: よし、追加で１０００万ミラ下ろしてきた！ これで更なる大穴を狙うぞい！
jpnSearchText:
よし、追加で１０００万ミラ下ろしてきた！
これで更なる大穴を狙うぞい！

engChrName: Hyeh! At this point, a bet like this is chump change!
engSearchText: Hyeh! At this point, a bet like this is chump change!
jpnChrName: フン、今となってはこの程度の 賭け等造作もないわ！
jpnSearchText:
フン、今となってはこの程度の
賭け等造作もないわ！

engChrName: What's a little extra now if it means that much bigger of a return later when I win it big, right?
engSearchText:
What's a little extra now if it means that much bigger
of a return later when I win it big, right?
jpnChrName: 何倍にも膨れ上がる様、 それを見るためならばな！
jpnSearchText:
何倍にも膨れ上がる様、
それを見るためならばな！

engChrName: Hey, what's with all the commotion outside? Oh, right, that whole film festival's going on, isn't it?
engSearchText:
Hey, what's with all the commotion outside?
Oh, right, that whole film festival's going on, isn't it?
jpnChrName: ふん、外が騒がしいのう…… そういえば確か映画祭だったか！
jpnSearchText:
ふん、外が騒がしいのう……
そういえば確か映画祭だったか！

engChrName: Screw all the pomp and circumstance, I'm here to have fun! And that's eeexACTly what I'm having thanks to this amazing hookah!
engSearchText:
Screw all the pomp and circumstance, I'm here to
have fun! And that's eeexACTly what I'm having
thanks to this amazing hookah!
jpnChrName: まあ良い、ワシは思うよう楽しむとしよう！ このシーシャのお陰ですこぶる気分も良いしな！
jpnSearchText:
まあ良い、ワシは思うよう楽しむとしよう！
このシーシャのお陰ですこぶる気分も良いしな！

engChrName: Bwahaha! I just know I'm going to win even bigger than I did yesterday! I think this calls for an extra big play!
engSearchText:
Bwahaha! I just know I'm going to win even bigger
than I did yesterday! I think this calls for an extra
big play!
jpnChrName: ぶはは、何だか昨日以上に勝てそうな気分じゃ！ ここは一つ、豪快に打ってみるかのう！
jpnSearchText:
ぶはは、何だか昨日以上に勝てそうな気分じゃ！
ここは一つ、豪快に打ってみるかのう！

engChrName: Without that geological survey conducted by Valis, nobody would've ever known my ancestral lands were home to such rich mineral deposits.
engSearchText:
Without that geological survey conducted by Valis,
nobody would've ever known my ancestral lands were
home to such rich mineral deposits.
jpnChrName: しかし、先祖代々の土地に眠っていたあれ程の鉱脈も ヴァリスの地質調査が無くば判明せんかった。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、先祖代々の土地に眠っていたあれ程の鉱脈も
ヴァリスの地質調査が無くば判明せんかった。

engChrName: It was me who made the call to bring them in. Best decision I ever made! Now I'm the owner of an enormous mine!
engSearchText:
It was me who made the call to bring them in.
Best decision I ever made! Now I'm the owner of an
enormous mine!
jpnChrName: やはり、ヴァリスのバックアップを選択したワシは 正しかったな、お陰で今やワシは大鉱山主じゃ！
jpnSearchText:
やはり、ヴァリスのバックアップを選択したワシは
正しかったな、お陰で今やワシは大鉱山主じゃ！

engChrName: Nice thing about working with Valis folks is they take you to resorts, too. Never hurts having likeminded friends who know how to go hard!
engSearchText:
Nice thing about working with Valis folks is they take
you to resorts, too. Never hurts having likeminded
friends who know how to go hard!
jpnChrName: ヴァリスはこうして保養地へも招待してくれるし、 やはり持つべきは太っ腹な同志じゃな！
jpnSearchText:
ヴァリスはこうして保養地へも招待してくれるし、
やはり持つべきは太っ腹な同志じゃな！

engChrName: I'm glad I decided to visit Tharbad. This hookah's got a surprisingly addictive flavor, for how cheap the stuff in it is.
engSearchText:
I'm glad I decided to visit Tharbad. This hookah's got
a surprisingly addictive flavor, for how cheap the stuff
in it is.
jpnChrName: このシーシャも、安い割に癖になる味わいじゃ、 サルバッドに来てみて正解だったわい！
jpnSearchText:
このシーシャも、安い割に癖になる味わいじゃ、
サルバッドに来てみて正解だったわい！

engChrName: Bahaha, they sure are raking it in over at Valis! Makes Elsaim look like a bunch of cheapskates by comparison!
engSearchText:
Bahaha, they sure are raking it in over at Valis!
Makes Elsaim look like a bunch of cheapskates
by comparison!
jpnChrName: ブハハハハ、ヴァリス市国はやはり景気が良い！ 今となっては公国がケチに思えるわい！
jpnSearchText:
ブハハハハ、ヴァリス市国はやはり景気が良い！
今となっては公国がケチに思えるわい！

engChrName: Never thought a developing nation would pony up nearly twice as much for ore as the principality, but here we are!
engSearchText:
Never thought a developing nation would pony up
nearly twice as much for ore as the principality, but
here we are!
jpnChrName: よもやあの新興国が、鉱産資源をエルザイムの 倍近い値段で取引してくれようとは！
jpnSearchText:
よもやあの新興国が、鉱産資源をエルザイムの
倍近い値段で取引してくれようとは！

engChrName: The future has never been brighter for my region! Owning a mine's not so bad when you've got help like that!
engSearchText:
The future has never been brighter for my region!
Owning a mine's not so bad when you've got help
like that!
jpnChrName: これで我が領地の未来は明るいわい！ ヴァリスの手助けがあれば鉱山主も悪くないわ！
jpnSearchText:
これで我が領地の未来は明るいわい！
ヴァリスの手助けがあれば鉱山主も悪くないわ！

engChrName: Could it be true the CEO of Vegas Films died last night because of what happened? There are rumors going around...
engSearchText:
Could it be true the CEO of Vegas Films died last
night because of what happened? There are rumors
going around...
jpnChrName: 噂に聞いたけど……昨晩のベガスフィルムの事件、 あそこの社長さんが亡くなったって本当かしらね？
jpnSearchText:
噂に聞いたけど……昨晩のベガスフィルムの事件、
あそこの社長さんが亡くなったって本当かしらね？
