engChrName: If it is, that certainly paints everything in a strange light, especially the fact they're still putting on the film festival.
engSearchText:
If it is, that certainly paints everything in a strange
light, especially the fact they're still putting on the
film festival.
jpnChrName: もしそうなら……敢えて映画祭を 開催する事も含めて、一層気になるわ……
jpnSearchText:
もしそうなら……敢えて映画祭を
開催する事も含めて、一層気になるわ……

engChrName: Something must be wrong with those hookahs. I saw police officers going around confiscating them.
engSearchText:
Something must be wrong with those hookahs. I saw
police officers going around confiscating them.
jpnChrName: さっき警察の人が回収しているのを見たけど…… あのシーシャ、何かあったみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
さっき警察の人が回収しているのを見たけど……
あのシーシャ、何かあったみたいね。

engChrName: Not that I'll miss them, personally. It'll be interesting seeing how people react to having something so trendy disappear overnight, though.
engSearchText:
Not that I'll miss them, personally. It'll be interesting
seeing how people react to having something so
trendy disappear overnight, though.
jpnChrName: まあ良いわ……何であれ、流行りものが急に 消えた時、人々の間にどういう変化があるのか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良いわ……何であれ、流行りものが急に
消えた時、人々の間にどういう変化があるのか。

engChrName: It'll definitely make it worth going people-watching at the film festival tomorrow, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
It'll definitely make it worth going people-watching
at the film festival tomorrow, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: それを見るのも面白そうなものだしね、 明日の映画祭も、人間観察のし甲斐もありそうだわ。
jpnSearchText:
それを見るのも面白そうなものだしね、
明日の映画祭も、人間観察のし甲斐もありそうだわ。

engChrName: Some people seem to be puzzled about all the disturbances we've been seeing around here lately.
engSearchText:
Some people seem to be puzzled about all the
disturbances we've been seeing around here lately.
jpnChrName: 昨今のトラブルの多さ…… 首を傾げている人達もいるみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
昨今のトラブルの多さ……
首を傾げている人達もいるみたいね。

engChrName: On the flip side, you might argue that everyone acting all flustered shows their true colors coming out.
engSearchText:
On the flip side, you might argue that everyone acting
all flustered shows their true colors coming out.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、今騒いでいる人もいわば 本当の姿が見えたと言ったところかしら。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、今騒いでいる人もいわば
本当の姿が見えたと言ったところかしら。

engChrName: Everyone has ugly sides they don't want to show. Laying them bare is no laughing matter.
engSearchText:
Everyone has ugly sides they don't want to show.
Laying them bare is no laughing matter.
jpnChrName: 人間、誰しも醜い側面がある……それを 曝け出すのは何もゲームだけじゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
人間、誰しも醜い側面がある……それを
曝け出すのは何もゲームだけじゃないわ。

engChrName: It's been a while since Director Gotti paid us a little visit. Believe it or not, he's actually a fairly decent gambler.
engSearchText:
It's been a while since Director Gotti paid us a
little visit. Believe it or not, he's actually a fairly
decent gambler.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ゴッチ監督も久しぶりに遊びに来ているわね。 彼、ああ見えて結構ギャンブルも上手い方なのよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ゴッチ監督も久しぶりに遊びに来ているわね。
彼、ああ見えて結構ギャンブルも上手い方なのよ。

engChrName: In case you couldn't tell from his films, that man's desires are bottomless. With a mind like that, gambling makes him play bold.
engSearchText:
In case you couldn't tell from his films, that man's
desires are bottomless. With a mind like that,
gambling makes him play bold.
jpnChrName: 彼の作品もそうだけど、どこまでも欲望に素直。 賭け事でも、それが思い切った決断を招くみたいね。
jpnSearchText:
彼の作品もそうだけど、どこまでも欲望に素直。
賭け事でも、それが思い切った決断を招くみたいね。

engChrName: But I guess without that sort of attitude he wouldn't be able to make the kinds of movies he does.
engSearchText:
But I guess without that sort of attitude he wouldn't
be able to make the kinds of movies he does.
jpnChrName: まあ、あれくらい思い切りが良くないと、 刺激的な映画で挑戦し続けられないでしょうしね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、あれくらい思い切りが良くないと、
刺激的な映画で挑戦し続けられないでしょうしね。

engChrName: Casinos are pretty fun places to visit, and I don't just mean for the gambling, either.
engSearchText:
Casinos are pretty fun places to visit, and I don't just
mean for the gambling, either.
jpnChrName: ふふ……やはりカジノと言うのは 面白いわね……
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……やはりカジノと言うのは
面白いわね……

engChrName: That part has its thrills, sure—but I get my real kick out of simply people watching.
engSearchText:
That part has its thrills, sure—but I get my real kick
out of simply people watching.
jpnChrName: 賭け事のスリルもだけど、 何より人間観察のし甲斐があるわ。
jpnSearchText:
賭け事のスリルもだけど、
何より人間観察のし甲斐があるわ。

engChrName: At any given moment in time, you've got a sea of souls mingling, many who'll go nowhere and some who'll go far.
engSearchText:
At any given moment in time, you've got a sea of
souls mingling, many who'll go nowhere and some
who'll go far.
jpnChrName: 今この瞬間を切り取っても、底の知れる人と 底の知れない人がせめぎ合っていて……
jpnSearchText:
今この瞬間を切り取っても、底の知れる人と
底の知れない人がせめぎ合っていて……

engChrName: Like that dealer over there, the one in the glasses. He can intuit which type of customer he's playing. It's amazing stuff.
engSearchText:
Like that dealer over there, the one in the glasses.
He can intuit which type of customer he's playing.
It's amazing stuff.
jpnChrName: あちらの眼鏡のディーラーは…… その辺りも判っていて面白い方だわ。
jpnSearchText:
あちらの眼鏡のディーラーは……
その辺りも判っていて面白い方だわ。

engChrName: The film festival might've still opened as planned, but everything's not so rosy under the surface.
engSearchText:
The film festival might've still opened as planned, but
everything's not so rosy under the surface.
jpnChrName: 昨晩、ベガスフィルムで何やら 事件があったとの事で……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩、ベガスフィルムで何やら
事件があったとの事で……

engChrName: After whatever happened at Vegas Films last night, some of the sponsors seem to be panicking.
engSearchText:
After whatever happened at Vegas Films last night,
some of the sponsors seem to be panicking.
jpnChrName: 映画祭は予定通り開催されましたが、 スポンサーの方々が一部混乱しているようでした。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭は予定通り開催されましたが、
スポンサーの方々が一部混乱しているようでした。

engChrName: I hear they'll be making an official announcement of some sort. I've a feeling that, details depending, the casino will be implicated somehow.
engSearchText:
I hear they'll be making an official announcement of
some sort. I've a feeling that, details depending, the
casino will be implicated somehow.
jpnChrName: 正式な発表もあると聞きますが……詳細次第では 当カジノも無関係では無いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
正式な発表もあると聞きますが……詳細次第では
当カジノも無関係では無いでしょう。

engChrName: Hopefully the whole mess won't spell danger for Tharbad's leisure industry, but who knows?
engSearchText:
Hopefully the whole mess won't spell danger for
Tharbad's leisure industry, but who knows?
jpnChrName: サルバッドの娯楽産業自体に何かの 危険が迫っている訳ではないと良いですが。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの娯楽産業自体に何かの
危険が迫っている訳ではないと良いですが。

engChrName: The police paid us a visit a little while ago, asking if we dealt with orbal hookahs.
engSearchText:
The police paid us a visit a little while ago, asking if
we dealt with orbal hookahs.
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャ……当カジノのお客様も嗜まれて おりましたが何やら問題があったとの事。
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャ……当カジノのお客様も嗜まれて
おりましたが何やら問題があったとの事。

engChrName: Some of our customers have been known to enjoy them, and apparently some sort of problem has cropped up.
engSearchText:
Some of our customers have been known to enjoy
them, and apparently some sort of problem has
cropped up.
jpnChrName: 当店での取り扱いが無かったかを、 先ほど警察の方々が確認されていきました。
jpnSearchText:
当店での取り扱いが無かったかを、
先ほど警察の方々が確認されていきました。

engChrName: I don't know what the issue is, but whatever's going on, those cops looked awfully serious.
engSearchText:
I don't know what the issue is, but whatever's going
on, those cops looked awfully serious.
jpnChrName: 警察の方々は相当真剣な様子でしたが…… どのような問題があったのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
警察の方々は相当真剣な様子でしたが……
どのような問題があったのでしょうか。

engChrName: You might not think it, but the film festival is shaping up to be a learning exercise in how we run the casino moving forward.
engSearchText:
You might not think it, but the film festival is shaping
up to be a learning exercise in how we run the casino
moving forward.
jpnChrName: 今回の映画祭は私達にとっても、 今後のカジノ運営に当たっての参考になります。
jpnSearchText:
今回の映画祭は私達にとっても、
今後のカジノ運営に当たっての参考になります。

engChrName: Times like this, you can see shifts in our customer base and increased bet amounts, among other kinds of ripple effects.
engSearchText:
Times like this, you can see shifts in our customer
base and increased bet amounts, among other kinds
of ripple effects.
jpnChrName: 客層の変化や、掛け額のレート向上などの 経済効果やイベントの波及効果……
jpnSearchText:
客層の変化や、掛け額のレート向上などの
経済効果やイベントの波及効果……

engChrName: It's no exaggeration to say big events have a way of informing our operations long-term, as well as what new ventures we get into.
engSearchText:
It's no exaggeration to say big events have a way of
informing our operations long-term, as well as what
new ventures we get into.
jpnChrName: 長期的なカジノの運営や新規事業の展開にあたり、 こうした転機も意識する必要がありますからね。
jpnSearchText:
長期的なカジノの運営や新規事業の展開にあたり、
こうした転機も意識する必要がありますからね。

engChrName: We've always attracted a lot of Calvardian oligarchs and foreign nobles. One guy made his fortune from dealings with Elsaim, for example.
engSearchText:
We've always attracted a lot of Calvardian oligarchs
and foreign nobles. One guy made his fortune from
dealings with Elsaim, for example.
jpnChrName: 以前のお客様はエルザイムとの取引で財を成した 共和国の富豪や他国の貴族が多かったのですが……
jpnSearchText:
以前のお客様はエルザイムとの取引で財を成した
共和国の富豪や他国の貴族が多かったのですが……

engChrName: But lately, we've been seeing a lot of newly rich Calvardians, plus people with close ties to Valis, too.
engSearchText:
But lately, we've been seeing a lot of newly rich
Calvardians, plus people with close ties to Valis, too.
jpnChrName: 最近ですと、共和国の好景気で財を成した方や、 ヴァリス市国の関係者も多くいらっしゃいます。
jpnSearchText:
最近ですと、共和国の好景気で財を成した方や、
ヴァリス市国の関係者も多くいらっしゃいます。

engChrName: And, as if that weren't enough, even Director Gotti himself from Vegas Films often comes here to play.
engSearchText:
And, as if that weren't enough, even Director Gotti
himself from Vegas Films often comes here to play.
jpnChrName: ああ、それと……あのベガスフィルムの ゴッチ監督も実はよくいらっしゃいましてね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、それと……あのベガスフィルムの
ゴッチ監督も実はよくいらっしゃいましてね。

engChrName: He'd stopped visiting for a little while to work on the film festival, but was able to stop by today now that some of that work is behind him.
engSearchText:
He'd stopped visiting for a little while to work on the
film festival, but was able to stop by today now that
some of that work is behind him.
jpnChrName: 最近は映画祭の準備で来られていなかったのですが、 本日は一段落したとの事でいらしています。
jpnSearchText:
最近は映画祭の準備で来られていなかったのですが、
本日は一段落したとの事でいらしています。

engChrName: Welcome to the Moulin Casino!
engSearchText: Welcome to the Moulin Casino!
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、 カジノ《ムーラン》へようこそ。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、
カジノ《ムーラン》へようこそ。

engChrName: Feel free to pull up a chair and enjoy our wide array of games. Or, if you prefer, we also offer a best-in-class bar as well.
engSearchText:
Feel free to pull up a chair and enjoy our wide array
of games. Or, if you prefer, we also offer a
best-in-class bar as well.
jpnChrName: 当カジノでは各種のゲームに加え、 一流のバーもございます。
jpnSearchText:
当カジノでは各種のゲームに加え、
一流のバーもございます。

engChrName: We've spared no expense whatsoever to ensure that you, our customer, have nothing less than the most pleasurable experience possible.
engSearchText:
We've spared no expense whatsoever to ensure that
you, our customer, have nothing less than the most
pleasurable experience possible.
jpnChrName: 贅を尽くし、惜しみなく皆さまがご遊戯を 堪能できる空間を整えております。
jpnSearchText:
贅を尽くし、惜しみなく皆さまがご遊戯を
堪能できる空間を整えております。

engChrName: Most bets tend to skew high due to our richer Central Eastern patrons. But please, don't let that stop you from enjoying yourself.
engSearchText:
Most bets tend to skew high due to our richer Central
Eastern patrons. But please, don't let that stop you
from enjoying yourself.
jpnChrName: 中東の富豪も多くいらっしゃる故、掛け額の相場は 高いですが、心ゆくまでお楽しみくださいませ。
jpnSearchText:
中東の富豪も多くいらっしゃる故、掛け額の相場は
高いですが、心ゆくまでお楽しみくださいませ。

engChrName: If you have any questions about the games we offer, I'll be more than happy to answer them.
engSearchText:
If you have any questions about the games we offer,
I'll be more than happy to answer them.
jpnChrName: 遊戯に関してご質問があれば何なりと お聞きください。
jpnSearchText:
遊戯に関してご質問があれば何なりと
お聞きください。

engChrName: Harold is the one who runs our card games. He's new here, but I assure you, he can certainly hold his own.
engSearchText:
Harold is the one who runs our card games. He's new
here, but I assure you, he can certainly hold his own.
jpnChrName: カードゲームはあちらのヘラルド氏が担当です。 最近入った方ですが腕前は保証できます。
jpnSearchText:
カードゲームはあちらのヘラルド氏が担当です。
最近入った方ですが腕前は保証できます。

engChrName: I can't believe what happened to our president... What's going to happen to the company now?
engSearchText:
I can't believe what happened to our president...
What's going to happen to the company now?
jpnChrName: まさかうちの社長があんな事に…… 会社もこの先どうなるのかな……
jpnSearchText:
まさかうちの社長があんな事に……
会社もこの先どうなるのかな……

engChrName: I doubt we'll go out of business or anything. We were still able to put on the film festival regardless. It's just...
engSearchText:
I doubt we'll go out of business or anything. We were
still able to put on the film festival regardless.
It's just...
jpnChrName: ……映画祭はできる事になったし、 倒産とかは無いと思うけど……
jpnSearchText:
……映画祭はできる事になったし、
倒産とかは無いと思うけど……

engChrName: Our president's killer is still on the loose, too! I'm really worried how things are going to pan out...
engSearchText:
Our president's killer is still on the loose, too!
I'm really worried how things are going to pan out...
jpnChrName: 社長を殺した犯人も……まだ捕まって いないですし……正直どうなるか……
jpnSearchText:
社長を殺した犯人も……まだ捕まって
いないですし……正直どうなるか……

engChrName: President Dillon is somehow even more strung up than usual today, if you can believe it.
engSearchText:
President Dillon is somehow even more strung up
than usual today, if you can believe it.
jpnChrName: ギャスパー社長、何だか今日は 一層に神経質なんですよね。
jpnSearchText:
ギャスパー社長、何だか今日は
一層に神経質なんですよね。

engChrName: Maybe he's just feeling on edge, what with all the turmoil the city's been dealing with lately.
engSearchText:
Maybe he's just feeling on edge, what with all the
turmoil the city's been dealing with lately.
jpnChrName: 街が色々物騒な感じになっているせいで 警戒しているのかもしれないですが……
jpnSearchText:
街が色々物騒な感じになっているせいで
警戒しているのかもしれないですが……

engChrName: For my part, I've been ordered not to let anyone through unless he has personally authorized them. No exceptions.
engSearchText:
For my part, I've been ordered not to let anyone
through unless he has personally authorized them.
No exceptions.
jpnChrName: 私も、お客さんは基本的に事前に社長が確認を取った 人以外は独断で通さないよう、厳しく言われています。
jpnSearchText:
私も、お客さんは基本的に事前に社長が確認を取った
人以外は独断で通さないよう、厳しく言われています。

engChrName: Phew. I'm beat. It's not often I'm working reception until this late.
engSearchText:
Phew. I'm beat. It's not often I'm working reception
until this late.
jpnChrName: ふう、流石にここまで遅くまで 受付をするのは珍しいですが……
jpnSearchText:
ふう、流石にここまで遅くまで
受付をするのは珍しいですが……

engChrName: But on the flip side, we had all sorts of actors and directors come through that we don't normally see here.
engSearchText:
But on the flip side, we had all sorts of actors and
directors come through that we don't normally
see here.
jpnChrName: 今日も普段はこのオフィスに来ない 役者さんや監督さんたちがたくさん来ましたねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
今日も普段はこのオフィスに来ない
役者さんや監督さんたちがたくさん来ましたねぇ。

engChrName: It's not every day I get to serve visitors like that! It's pretty exciting.
engSearchText:
It's not every day I get to serve visitors like that!
It's pretty exciting.
jpnChrName: 何というか、受付をやっていてもいつもと華が 違う気がして……役得ってやつですね！
jpnSearchText:
何というか、受付をやっていてもいつもと華が
違う気がして……役得ってやつですね！

engChrName: I feel kind of bad just sitting around and enjoying myself while everybody else is working so hard on the film festival, though.
engSearchText:
I feel kind of bad just sitting around and enjoying
myself while everybody else is working so hard on the
film festival, though.
jpnChrName: でも……流石に映画祭で皆も忙しいし、 純粋に楽しむだけなのは少し悪いのかも……
jpnSearchText:
でも……流石に映画祭で皆も忙しいし、
純粋に楽しむだけなのは少し悪いのかも……

engChrName: Oh, hello! Is there anything I can help you with?
engSearchText: Oh, hello! Is there anything I can help you with?
jpnChrName: あ、いらっしゃいませ。 ベガスフィルムに何かご用ですか？
jpnSearchText:
あ、いらっしゃいませ。
ベガスフィルムに何かご用ですか？

engChrName: I won't lie, I've got my hands full with people coming and going for the film festival, but it's all still really fun, too!
engSearchText:
I won't lie, I've got my hands full with people coming
and going for the film festival, but it's all still really
fun, too!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、映画祭の準備で人の出入りも増えて、 忙しいけど、面白い事も多くてですね。
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、映画祭の準備で人の出入りも増えて、
忙しいけど、面白い事も多くてですね。

engChrName: As a movie buff, I get a real kick out of seeing all the actors and producers from other companies who come to visit!
engSearchText:
As a movie buff, I get a real kick out of seeing all the
actors and producers from other companies who come
to visit!
jpnChrName: 役者さんや他社の制作関係者もたくさん来るし、 映画好きとしては役得って感じですよ。
jpnSearchText:
役者さんや他社の制作関係者もたくさん来るし、
映画好きとしては役得って感じですよ。

engChrName: ...Oh. If it isn't the gofers Nina hired.
engSearchText: ...Oh. If it isn't the gofers Nina hired.
jpnChrName: フン……ニナ君の雇った便利屋とやら。
jpnSearchText: フン……ニナ君の雇った便利屋とやら。

engChrName: I don't know what you're trying to dig up, but knowing her, I imagine it's rather serious.
engSearchText:
I don't know what you're trying to dig up, but
knowing her, I imagine it's rather serious.
jpnChrName: 全く、何を嗅ぎまわっているのか……まあ、 ニナ君の事だから滅多な事は頼まんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
全く、何を嗅ぎまわっているのか……まあ、
ニナ君の事だから滅多な事は頼まんだろうが……

engChrName: Relax, pal. We're not here to get in the way of your little soirée.
engSearchText:
Relax, pal. We're not here to get in the way of your
little soirée.
jpnChrName: 別に心配しなくても、そちらのイベントの 邪魔にはなりはしませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
別に心配しなくても、そちらのイベントの
邪魔にはなりはしませんよ。

engChrName: Sure are workin' late, though. You know, for the right price, dependin' on what you're doing, I could maybe take a load off.
engSearchText:
Sure are workin' late, though. You know, for the right
price, dependin' on what you're doing, I could maybe
take a load off.
jpnChrName: それにしても遅くまでお疲れな事で…… ミラと内容次第じゃ手伝っても良いですがね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても遅くまでお疲れな事で……
ミラと内容次第じゃ手伝っても良いですがね。

engChrName: Hmph! Not a chance. Can't trust an amateur like you with this. Just don't go stirring things up too much, and we won't have a problem.
engSearchText:
Hmph! Not a chance. Can't trust an amateur like you
with this. Just don't go stirring things up too much,
and we won't have a problem.
jpnChrName: ふん、素人に務まるような作業ではない。 あまり掻き回さないでくれれば何でもよい。
jpnSearchText:
ふん、素人に務まるような作業ではない。
あまり掻き回さないでくれれば何でもよい。

engChrName: *sigh* As if I don't have enough trouble trying to keep a leash on Gotti and his rambunctious antics...
engSearchText:
*sigh* As if I don't have enough trouble trying to
keep a leash on Gotti and his rambunctious antics...
jpnChrName: ただでさえ、あのマイペースなゴッチ監督の 手綱を握るのでも大変なのだ……
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ、あのマイペースなゴッチ監督の
手綱を握るのでも大変なのだ……

engChrName: Now I've got to worry about grunts hired by a certain someone running amok.
engSearchText:
Now I've got to worry about grunts hired by a certain
someone running amok.
jpnChrName: 女優の個人的に雇った業者にまで 首を突っ込んでいる余裕などあるか。
jpnSearchText:
女優の個人的に雇った業者にまで
首を突っ込んでいる余裕などあるか。

engChrName: Buddy, if you're so busy, maybe you shouldn't be stressing about what an actress does in her spare time. Ever think about that?
engSearchText:
Buddy, if you're so busy, maybe you shouldn't be
stressing about what an actress does in her spare time.
Ever think about that?
jpnChrName: ハッ、まるで余裕があれば女優の プライベートに首を突っ込むような口ぶりだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、まるで余裕があれば女優の
プライベートに首を突っ込むような口ぶりだな。

engChrName: I don't like what you're insinuating. Listen, the last thing we need is one of our performers getting caught up in some mad scandal.
engSearchText:
I don't like what you're insinuating. Listen, the last
thing we need is one of our performers getting caught
up in some mad scandal.
jpnChrName: 人聞きの悪い事を……我々とて、出演者に急な スキャンダルなどを起こされては困るだけだ。
jpnSearchText:
人聞きの悪い事を……我々とて、出演者に急な
スキャンダルなどを起こされては困るだけだ。

engChrName: So it's only natural that I have a rough idea of what those ladies get up to, insofar as their agencies allow it.
engSearchText:
So it's only natural that I have a rough idea of what
those ladies get up to, insofar as their agencies
allow it.
jpnChrName: 所属事務所の許す範囲で多少は彼女らの 動向も把握するようにはしているが……
jpnSearchText:
所属事務所の許す範囲で多少は彼女らの
動向も把握するようにはしているが……

engChrName: In any case, if you don't have any business, I'll have to ask you to leave. I'm extremely busy here.
engSearchText:
In any case, if you don't have any business, I'll have to
ask you to leave. I'm extremely busy here.
jpnChrName: それはそうと、特に用は無いのかね？ それならお引き取り願おうか、私も忙しいのでね。
jpnSearchText:
それはそうと、特に用は無いのかね？
それならお引き取り願おうか、私も忙しいのでね。

engChrName: Hey, you won't hear us complainin'. Don't mind if we do.
engSearchText:
Hey, you won't hear us complainin'. Don't mind if
we do.
jpnChrName: ま、そうさせてもらいますわ。
jpnSearchText: ま、そうさせてもらいますわ。

engChrName: Just keep in mind that Arkride Solutions is in town. You never know when you might need us.
engSearchText:
Just keep in mind that Arkride Solutions is in town.
You never know when you might need us.
jpnChrName: 一応、俺達解決事務所もサルバッドに滞在中という事、 覚えておいて損は無いと思いますがね……
jpnSearchText:
一応、俺達解決事務所もサルバッドに滞在中という事、
覚えておいて損は無いと思いますがね……

engChrName: *sigh* Where did Gotti run off to this time? Does he have to go charging off at every damn foolish thing he sees?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Where did Gotti run off to this time? Does he
have to go charging off at every damn foolish thing
he sees?
jpnChrName: それにしてもゴッチ監督はどこに行ったのだ…… 自分のペースで区切りを決めて……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもゴッチ監督はどこに行ったのだ……
自分のペースで区切りを決めて……

engChrName: I told him we would need to have more meetings, and yet...
engSearchText:
I told him we would need to have more meetings,
and yet...
jpnChrName: まったく、打ち合わせも追加で 必要になったとは言ったはずなのだが……
jpnSearchText:
まったく、打ち合わせも追加で
必要になったとは言ったはずなのだが……

engChrName: I'm supposed to start some intensive training to get ready for the Carnal Cavalcade.
engSearchText:
I'm supposed to start some intensive training to get
ready for the Carnal Cavalcade.
jpnChrName: 今日から本格的に、フォクシーパレードに 向けてのレッスンをしてくれるらしくて。
jpnSearchText:
今日から本格的に、フォクシーパレードに
向けてのレッスンをしてくれるらしくて。

engChrName: I'm just waiting for Director Gotti and the others to arrive. They were supposed to be here by now. Hmm...
engSearchText:
I'm just waiting for Director Gotti and the others
to arrive. They were supposed to be here by now.
Hmm...
jpnChrName: 今はゴッチ監督や他の方々を待っているところです。 もうそろそろいらっしゃるはずですが……
jpnSearchText:
今はゴッチ監督や他の方々を待っているところです。
もうそろそろいらっしゃるはずですが……

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Oh, Van! It's you.
engSearchText: *huff* *huff* Oh, Van! It's you.
jpnChrName: はぁ、はぁ……あ、ヴァンさん。
jpnSearchText: はぁ、はぁ……あ、ヴァンさん。

engChrName: Everything's going just fine, I promise. The two of them are really considerate and doing a great job teaching me.
engSearchText:
Everything's going just fine, I promise. The two of
them are really considerate and doing a great job
teaching me.
jpnChrName: 心配なさらないでください、お二人共 とても丁寧に教えてくれていますし……
jpnSearchText:
心配なさらないでください、お二人共
とても丁寧に教えてくれていますし……

engChrName: Besides, I've got my sister to think of! I'm going to do everything I can to make my mark and be a real part of tomorrow's parade!
engSearchText:
Besides, I've got my sister to think of! I'm going to do
everything I can to make my mark and be a real part
of tomorrow's parade!
jpnChrName: 妹のためにも、しっかりと明日の パレードに貢献してみせますから……！
jpnSearchText:
妹のためにも、しっかりと明日の
パレードに貢献してみせますから……！

engChrName: You kids did good finding me those extra cast members. Now it's up to me to whip 'em into shape and make them shine brighter than ever!
engSearchText:
You kids did good finding me those extra
cast members. Now it's up to me to whip 'em into
shape and make them shine brighter than ever!
jpnChrName: 君たちが見つけてくれた追加キャストは ワシがより輝かせてみせるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
君たちが見つけてくれた追加キャストは
ワシがより輝かせてみせるぞ！

engChrName: And it goes without saying, you can bet I'll be keeping a close eye on THAT young lady's progress in particular.
engSearchText:
And it goes without saying, you can bet I'll be
keeping a close eye on THAT young lady's progress
in particular.
jpnChrName: 勿論、あちらの嬢ちゃんの仕上がりも しっかりと見させてもらうつもりじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
勿論、あちらの嬢ちゃんの仕上がりも
しっかりと見させてもらうつもりじゃ！

engChrName: Don't get me wrong. I'm absolutely concerned about Saara.
engSearchText:
Don't get me wrong. I'm absolutely concerned
about Saara.
jpnChrName: サァラちゃんの事は心配でもあるが……
jpnSearchText: サァラちゃんの事は心配でもあるが……

engChrName: But for now, all we can do is give it our all and put on the best damn parade money can buy. Trust me, you won't wanna miss tomorrow!
engSearchText:
But for now, all we can do is give it our all and put on
the best damn parade money can buy. Trust me, you
won't wanna miss tomorrow!
jpnChrName: ともかく、最高のパレードにする為に全力を尽くす。 明日の本番を楽しみにしておいてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、最高のパレードにする為に全力を尽くす。
明日の本番を楽しみにしておいてくれ！

engChrName: Things are just about to wrap now that the big event is coming up tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Things are just about to wrap now that the big event
is coming up tomorrow.
jpnChrName: 明日の本番に向けていよいよ大詰めじゃ。
jpnSearchText: 明日の本番に向けていよいよ大詰めじゃ。

engChrName: We've got to keep polishing things for as long as humanly possible! I want this parade to be nothing less than a masterpiece!
engSearchText:
We've got to keep polishing things for as long as
humanly possible! I want this parade to be nothing
less than a masterpiece!
jpnChrName: 最高のパレード（作品）になるよう 時間が許す限り磨きをかけなければな！
jpnSearchText:
最高のパレード（作品）になるよう
時間が許す限り磨きをかけなければな！

engChrName: Heh heh. Now that some of our preparations for the festival are complete, I figured it's been long enough—I'll stop by and play a few rounds.
engSearchText:
Heh heh. Now that some of our preparations for the
festival are complete, I figured it's been long
enough—I'll stop by and play a few rounds.
jpnChrName: ガハハ、映画祭の準備もある程度区切りがついて きたのでな、久しぶりに楽しませてもらっとる！
jpnSearchText:
ガハハ、映画祭の準備もある程度区切りがついて
きたのでな、久しぶりに楽しませてもらっとる！

engChrName: That dealer wasn't here the last time I came, but let me tell you, I like the cut of his jib.
engSearchText:
That dealer wasn't here the last time I came, but let
me tell you, I like the cut of his jib.
jpnChrName: あっちのディーラーは初めて見る顔だが エンタメの何たるかをわかっとってな！
jpnSearchText:
あっちのディーラーは初めて見る顔だが
エンタメの何たるかをわかっとってな！

engChrName: He gets what it means to entertain people. He's good at throwin' in big surprises to his routine.
engSearchText:
He gets what it means to entertain people. He's good
at throwin' in big surprises to his routine.
jpnChrName: 予想外のサプライズを盛り込む意味なんかも よーく理解しとる面白い男じゃ！
jpnSearchText:
予想外のサプライズを盛り込む意味なんかも
よーく理解しとる面白い男じゃ！

engChrName: Hell, he's inspired ME to throw a little something extra into the parade to spice it up even more! Only question is what...
engSearchText:
Hell, he's inspired ME to throw a little something
extra into the parade to spice it up even more!
Only question is what...
jpnChrName: よし、それならワシも改めてパレードに何か 追加で盛り込んでみるとするか！
jpnSearchText:
よし、それならワシも改めてパレードに何か
追加で盛り込んでみるとするか！

engChrName: Haha! If there's one thing people crave, it's always a good shock to the system! Something stimulating!
engSearchText:
Haha! If there's one thing people crave, it's always a
good shock to the system! Something stimulating!
jpnChrName: ガハハハ、やはり人間いつだって 刺激を渇望しているというもの！
jpnSearchText:
ガハハハ、やはり人間いつだって
刺激を渇望しているというもの！

engChrName: If you ask me, nothing gets the job done faster than a little FnV: F****ing 'n' Violence, you know!
engSearchText:
If you ask me, nothing gets the job done faster than a
little FnV: F****ing 'n' Violence, you know!
jpnChrName: ワシはそれを手っ取り早く満たせるのが セッ××＆バイオレンスと確信しとる……
jpnSearchText:
ワシはそれを手っ取り早く満たせるのが
セッ××＆バイオレンスと確信しとる……

engChrName: But I have to admit, if there's anything else out there that can prove just as stimulating, it's some good old fashioned gambling!
engSearchText:
But I have to admit, if there's anything else out there
that can prove just as stimulating, it's some good old
fashioned gambling!
jpnChrName: だが！　ギャンブルもそれに負けぬだけの 刺激が確かにあるんじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
だが！　ギャンブルもそれに負けぬだけの
刺激が確かにあるんじゃ！

engChrName: Oh, it's you guys. I take it you couldn't resist sneaking a peek at our little practice session?
engSearchText:
Oh, it's you guys. I take it you couldn't resist sneaking
a peek at our little practice session?
jpnChrName: あ、あなた達…… 何、女の子の練習風景を覗きにきたワケ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、あなた達……
何、女の子の練習風景を覗きにきたワケ？

engChrName: If you ask me, out of everyone here, Saara's far and away in possession of the best dancing chops. No doubt about it.
engSearchText:
If you ask me, out of everyone here, Saara's far and
away in possession of the best dancing chops.
No doubt about it.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよサァラちゃんの踊りのスキルは あたしらから見ても群を抜いているわね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよサァラちゃんの踊りのスキルは
あたしらから見ても群を抜いているわね。

engChrName: Probably doesn't hurt that Gotti wants something pseudo-Central Eastern, which has let her take to it pretty naturally.
engSearchText:
Probably doesn't hurt that Gotti wants something
pseudo-Central Eastern, which has let her take to it
pretty naturally.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督のオーダーが中東舞踊に近い 踊りで馴染みやすいのもあるんだろうけど……
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督のオーダーが中東舞踊に近い
踊りで馴染みやすいのもあるんだろうけど……

engChrName: Still, what the hell is he thinking, ditching us at the eleventh hour to go searching for more performers?
engSearchText:
Still, what the hell is he thinking, ditching us at the
eleventh hour to go searching for more performers?
jpnChrName: てか、本当にあの監督は何考えてるのかしら。 今更あたしらほっぽり出して追加キャスト探しなんて……
jpnSearchText:
てか、本当にあの監督は何考えてるのかしら。
今更あたしらほっぽり出して追加キャスト探しなんて……

engChrName: Saara, try to smooth out the way you twist your hips a little more. It'll make you look sexier.
engSearchText:
Saara, try to smooth out the way you twist your hips a
little more. It'll make you look sexier.
jpnChrName: サァラさん、もう少し腰の捻りを 滑らかにした方が魅力的に見えますよ。
jpnSearchText:
サァラさん、もう少し腰の捻りを
滑らかにした方が魅力的に見えますよ。

engChrName: Good idea! I'm sorry! I don't know why I didn't think of that.
engSearchText:
Good idea! I'm sorry! I don't know why I didn't think
of that.
jpnChrName: はい、すみません！
jpnSearchText: はい、すみません！

engChrName: It's okay! There's nothing to be sorry about. I'm just giving you advice on how to look more attractive out there.
engSearchText:
It's okay! There's nothing to be sorry about. I'm just
giving you advice on how to look more attractive
out there.
jpnChrName: さらに魅力的に見せるためのアドバイスです、 謝る必要なんてありません。
jpnSearchText:
さらに魅力的に見せるためのアドバイスです、
謝る必要なんてありません。

engChrName: Oh, you know, it might work if you take it slow for that beat. Make it pleasing to watch.
engSearchText:
Oh, you know, it might work if you take it slow for
that beat. Make it pleasing to watch.
jpnChrName: あ、そこはワンテンポ敢えて 気持ち遅くするくらいでも良さそうかも……
jpnSearchText:
あ、そこはワンテンポ敢えて
気持ち遅くするくらいでも良さそうかも……

engChrName: O-Okay! I'll see what I can do!
engSearchText: O-Okay! I'll see what I can do!
jpnChrName: は、はい……頑張って仕上げます！
jpnSearchText: は、はい……頑張って仕上げます！

engChrName: And there goes Nina, coaching away. She's not too bad at it.
engSearchText:
And there goes Nina, coaching away. She's not too
bad at it.
jpnChrName: ニナの指導も様になってきたわね。
jpnSearchText: ニナの指導も様になってきたわね。

engChrName: Just wish I knew what that Gotti could be possibly doing, calling us out here like this.
engSearchText:
Just wish I knew what that Gotti could be possibly
doing, calling us out here like this.
jpnChrName: それにしてもあの監督、あたしらを呼び出して 一体何をしているんだか……
jpnSearchText:
それにしてもあの監督、あたしらを呼び出して
一体何をしているんだか……

engChrName: Just once, I wish he would put himself in our shoes, saying he'll join in once he finds those additional performers. *sigh*
engSearchText:
Just once, I wish he would put himself in our shoes,
saying he'll join in once he finds those
additional performers. *sigh*
jpnChrName: 追加キャストを見つけてからレッスンに付き合うなんて、 今さっきになって聞かされる身にもなれっての……
jpnSearchText:
追加キャストを見つけてからレッスンに付き合うなんて、
今さっきになって聞かされる身にもなれっての……

engChrName: Hey, Saara, try swinging your arms a bit wider. It'll make it easier to transition into the next move.
engSearchText:
Hey, Saara, try swinging your arms a bit wider.
It'll make it easier to transition into the next move.
jpnChrName: あ、サァラちゃん、そこはもう少し 腕を大きく振った方が次の動作が楽になるわよ。
jpnSearchText:
あ、サァラちゃん、そこはもう少し
腕を大きく振った方が次の動作が楽になるわよ。

engChrName: I'm shocked at just how quickly Saara's improving. It really speaks to just how good her instincts for these things are!
engSearchText:
I'm shocked at just how quickly Saara's improving.
It really speaks to just how good her instincts for
these things are!
jpnChrName: サァラさんの上達は凄いですね…… やっぱり元からセンスがあったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
サァラさんの上達は凄いですね……
やっぱり元からセンスがあったんですね。

engChrName: She's already cut her teeth on Central Eastern dancing. That's more than half the battle right there.
engSearchText:
She's already cut her teeth on Central
Eastern dancing. That's more than half the battle
right there.
jpnChrName: 元々見事な中東舞踊で鍛えられていましたし、 幾つかの課題部分さえクリアすれば……
jpnSearchText:
元々見事な中東舞踊で鍛えられていましたし、
幾つかの課題部分さえクリアすれば……

engChrName: If she can clear just a few more hurdles, I think we'll be ready for tomorrow's parade with just a single full day of practice!
engSearchText:
If she can clear just a few more hurdles, I think we'll
be ready for tomorrow's parade with just a single full
day of practice!
jpnChrName: 今日一杯の練習で、明日の本番に きっと間に合いますよ！
jpnSearchText:
今日一杯の練習で、明日の本番に
きっと間に合いますよ！

engChrName: So this is the new film festival that Gotti himself produced. It certainly looks like his handiwork, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
So this is the new film festival that Gotti
himself produced. It certainly looks like his
handiwork, that's for sure.
jpnChrName: これがゴッチ監督の企画した新たな映画祭か、 彼らしさが表現されているといえるね。
jpnSearchText:
これがゴッチ監督の企画した新たな映画祭か、
彼らしさが表現されているといえるね。

engChrName: That parade, in particular, is full of the, ah...sensuality that man is always hungry for.
engSearchText:
That parade, in particular, is full of the, ah...sensuality
that man is always hungry for.
jpnChrName: 件のパレードも、彼の求める官能的な魅力が 活きそうな雰囲気が出来ているよ。
jpnSearchText:
件のパレードも、彼の求める官能的な魅力が
活きそうな雰囲気が出来ているよ。

engChrName: I'll be keeping a close eye on how well everything comes together as I mingle with my fans before the award ceremony.
engSearchText:
I'll be keeping a close eye on how well everything
comes together as I mingle with my fans before the
award ceremony.
jpnChrName: 僕は授賞式まで……ファンと交流もしつつ 彼の成果を見守らせてもらうとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
僕は授賞式まで……ファンと交流もしつつ
彼の成果を見守らせてもらうとしようか。

engChrName: Come to think of it, I remember hearing from the manager of Kowloon Pictures that something may have happened at Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I remember hearing from the
manager of Kowloon Pictures that something may
have happened at Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: そういえば、九龍映像のマネージャーから ベガスフィルムで何かあった可能性を聞いたが……
jpnSearchText:
そういえば、九龍映像のマネージャーから
ベガスフィルムで何かあった可能性を聞いたが……

engChrName: Not that I intend to go anywhere near THAT subject until I hear what Gotti has to say about it himself, mind you.
engSearchText:
Not that I intend to go anywhere near THAT subject
until I hear what Gotti has to say about it himself,
mind you.
jpnChrName: その件についても、ゴッチ監督の言葉を 聞くまで触れないつもりでね。
jpnSearchText:
その件についても、ゴッチ監督の言葉を
聞くまで触れないつもりでね。

engChrName: For all his brashness, I know he's a responsible guy deep down. I'll trust him and see how it pans out.
engSearchText:
For all his brashness, I know he's a responsible guy
deep down. I'll trust him and see how it pans out.
jpnChrName: 彼もああ見えて責任感もあるしね、 彼の判断を信用して待ちたいところさ。
jpnSearchText:
彼もああ見えて責任感もあるしね、
彼の判断を信用して待ちたいところさ。

engChrName: Hmm... This is a surprise, both Gotti and President Dillon being nowhere to be found.
engSearchText:
Hmm... This is a surprise, both Gotti and President
Dillon being nowhere to be found.
jpnChrName: ふむ……ギャスパー社長も ゴッチ監督も今は不在のようだね。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……ギャスパー社長も
ゴッチ監督も今は不在のようだね。

engChrName: That's unfortunate. As something of a friendly rival of his, I was hoping to say hello to Gotti and wish him luck.
engSearchText:
That's unfortunate. As something of a friendly rival
of his, I was hoping to say hello to Gotti and wish
him luck.
jpnChrName: 一応良きライバルとして、ゴッチ監督に 一声挨拶と思っていたのだが……
jpnSearchText:
一応良きライバルとして、ゴッチ監督に
一声挨拶と思っていたのだが……

engChrName: Oh, well. I'm sure we'll cross paths at the festival one way or another...even if I have no intention of losing this year! Haha.
engSearchText:
Oh, well. I'm sure we'll cross paths at the festival one
way or another...even if I have no intention of losing
this year! Haha.
jpnChrName: まあ良い、映画祭ではどの道見える。 はは、今年は負けない自信もあるしね。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良い、映画祭ではどの道見える。
はは、今年は負けない自信もあるしね。

engChrName: (Is that who I think it is...?)
engSearchText: (Is that who I think it is...?)
jpnChrName: （この人はもしかして……）
jpnSearchText: （この人はもしかして……）

engChrName: (Yep. Director Leslie Lam from Kowloon Pictures. Hell of a guest list the festival's got if he's here.)
engSearchText:
(Yep. Director Leslie Lam from Kowloon Pictures.
Hell of a guest list the festival's got if he's here.)
jpnChrName: （九龍映像のレスリー・ラム監督じゃねぇか……   まさかこの人まで来ているとはな……）
jpnSearchText:
（九龍映像のレスリー・ラム監督じゃねぇか……
まさかこの人まで来ているとはな……）

engChrName: (The event's got the Lionne d'Or award for directors, that's why. Just about every director worth their salt will be attending for that.)
engSearchText:
(The event's got the Lionne d'Or award for directors,
that's why. Just about every director worth their salt
will be attending for that.)
jpnChrName: （《レオンドール賞》って監督賞があるからな。   有名な監督も一通り来ているんだろう。）
jpnSearchText:
（《レオンドール賞》って監督賞があるからな。
有名な監督も一通り来ているんだろう。）

engChrName: (Though given the film festival's all about entertainment, people are betting either Gotti or Lam there'll end up takin' it home.)
engSearchText:
(Though given the film festival's all about
entertainment, people are betting either Gotti
or Lam there'll end up takin' it home.)
jpnChrName: （まあ、今回の映画祭はエンタメ重視だし、ラムか   ゴッチのどっちかが受賞しそうって話だが。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあ、今回の映画祭はエンタメ重視だし、ラムか
ゴッチのどっちかが受賞しそうって話だが。）

engChrName: Well, it'd be rude of me to wait around forever. I'll give him a little more time and if he still doesn't show, I'll head back to my room.
engSearchText:
Well, it'd be rude of me to wait around forever.
I'll give him a little more time and if he still doesn't
show, I'll head back to my room.
jpnChrName: まあ、ここに居座っていても悪いしね、 もう少ししたら一旦部屋に戻るとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、ここに居座っていても悪いしね、
もう少ししたら一旦部屋に戻るとしようか。

engChrName: Considering he's producing the whole festival, I can imagine he's incredibly busy right now.
engSearchText:
Considering he's producing the whole festival, I can
imagine he's incredibly busy right now.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督はイベントのプロデュースも 引き受けているし、忙しい事だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督はイベントのプロデュースも
引き受けているし、忙しい事だろう。

engChrName: Perhaps I'll save our exchange for the award ceremony. That may well be the best time for us to sit down and talk.
engSearchText:
Perhaps I'll save our exchange for the
award ceremony. That may well be the best time for
us to sit down and talk.
jpnChrName: やはり、授賞式で讃え合うとしようか。 一番通じ合えるのはその時だろうしね。
jpnSearchText:
やはり、授賞式で讃え合うとしようか。
一番通じ合えるのはその時だろうしね。

engChrName: I had a feeling President Dillon was always hiding something, but I never would've imagined he was working with criminals!
engSearchText:
I had a feeling President Dillon was always hiding
something, but I never would've imagined he was
working with criminals!
jpnChrName: ギャスパー社長、何か隠しているようにも見えたけど、 まさかマフィアに利用されていたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ギャスパー社長、何か隠しているようにも見えたけど、
まさかマフィアに利用されていたなんて……

engChrName: You could say I have mixed feelings about the way he died. I guess I feel sorry for him, but...it's hard to put into words.
engSearchText:
You could say I have mixed feelings about the way
he died. I guess I feel sorry for him, but...it's hard to
put into words.
jpnChrName: だからってこんな死に方をするなんて…… 流石に同情するというか、何というか……
jpnSearchText:
だからってこんな死に方をするなんて……
流石に同情するというか、何というか……

engChrName: Still, I can't help but wonder what's going to happen to the company and our employees once the film festival is behind us.
engSearchText:
Still, I can't help but wonder what's going to happen
to the company and our employees once the film
festival is behind us.
jpnChrName: しかし映画祭の後は、この会社と 僕ら社員はどうなるんだろう……？
jpnSearchText:
しかし映画祭の後は、この会社と
僕ら社員はどうなるんだろう……？

engChrName: But...at least the show goes on. For now, all I can do is focus on what's in front of me and hope for the best.
engSearchText:
But...at least the show goes on. For now, all I can do
is focus on what's in front of me and hope for
the best.
jpnChrName: まあ……それでも映画祭はやれるんだ、 今は目の前の事を乗り越えるしかないな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ……それでも映画祭はやれるんだ、
今は目の前の事を乗り越えるしかないな。

engChrName: Our president seems really agitated about something. I wish he would spare a thought for his workers, though.
engSearchText:
Our president seems really agitated about something.
I wish he would spare a thought for his
workers, though.
jpnChrName: パレードの件も追加オーダーなんて…… 人遣いが荒いったらありゃしないよ。
jpnSearchText:
パレードの件も追加オーダーなんて……
人遣いが荒いったらありゃしないよ。

engChrName: Doesn't he realize that adding on to the parade at this stage is a big ask? Give me a teeny little break, here!
engSearchText:
Doesn't he realize that adding on to the parade at this
stage is a big ask? Give me a teeny little break, here!
jpnChrName: 社長も変に焦ってるみたいだけど…… 俺達の身にもなって欲しいよ。
jpnSearchText:
社長も変に焦ってるみたいだけど……
俺達の身にもなって欲しいよ。

engChrName: Between you and me, I think this company got too big, too fast. It's lacking some fundamental things.
engSearchText:
Between you and me, I think this company got too
big, too fast. It's lacking some fundamental things.
jpnChrName: 正直、会社が急に大きくなり過ぎて 要領掴めてないんじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
正直、会社が急に大きくなり過ぎて
要領掴めてないんじゃないか？

engChrName: As if I'm not busy enough dealing with the festival, now I have to take care of pitches?!
engSearchText:
As if I'm not busy enough dealing with the festival,
now I have to take care of pitches?!
jpnChrName: ただでさえ映画祭で忙しいのに、 企画持ち込みの応対までやらされるとは……
jpnSearchText:
ただでさえ映画祭で忙しいのに、
企画持ち込みの応対までやらされるとは……

engChrName: I get that the one normally in charge has their hands full, but they want me to put summaries together and it's just too much.
engSearchText:
I get that the one normally in charge has their hands
full, but they want me to put summaries together and
it's just too much.
jpnChrName: 担当者も手が空いていないのはわかるけどさ、 要点纏めとけなんて無茶言うなよ……
jpnSearchText:
担当者も手が空いていないのはわかるけどさ、
要点纏めとけなんて無茶言うなよ……

engChrName: It doesn't help that our president is sticking around so late, either...which is odd, for him.
engSearchText:
It doesn't help that our president is sticking around so
late, either...which is odd, for him.
jpnChrName: まあ、その社長も……こうして遅くまで 居残っているのは珍しいんだけどさ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、その社長も……こうして遅くまで
居残っているのは珍しいんだけどさ。

engChrName: That makes it tricky to do things on your own. It's like he's keeping watch over everything.
engSearchText:
That makes it tricky to do things on your own.
It's like he's keeping watch over everything.
jpnChrName: 正直、見張られているみたいで 少しやりにくいんだよなぁ……
jpnSearchText:
正直、見張られているみたいで
少しやりにくいんだよなぁ……

engChrName: Gwuh. I'm so tired. I'm already occupied enough just helping out with preparations.
engSearchText:
Gwuh. I'm so tired. I'm already occupied enough just
helping out with preparations.
jpnChrName: うう、つ、疲れる…… ただでさえ準備で忙しいってのに……
jpnSearchText:
うう、つ、疲れる……
ただでさえ準備で忙しいってのに……

engChrName: So of course Mr. Gotti had to come in and bark one of his elaborate orders at the last minute, which, y'know, that's great. Just swell.
engSearchText:
So of course Mr. Gotti had to come in and bark one
of his elaborate orders at the last minute, which,
y'know, that's great. Just swell.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督、今更細かいオーダーを 追加してくるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督、今更細かいオーダーを
追加してくるなんて……

engChrName: Worse still, I've got President Dillon breathing down my neck, trying to rush everything.
engSearchText:
Worse still, I've got President Dillon breathing down
my neck, trying to rush everything.
jpnChrName: ギャスパー社長はギャスパー社長で、 やたらと急かしてくるし……
jpnSearchText:
ギャスパー社長はギャスパー社長で、
やたらと急かしてくるし……

engChrName: And now they want me to take care of pitches on top of that. That's not even KINDA part of my job, officially!
engSearchText:
And now they want me to take care of pitches on top
of that. That's not even KINDA part of my
job, officially!
jpnChrName: おまけに持ち込み企画の応対なんて…… どう考えても僕の管轄じゃないのに……
jpnSearchText:
おまけに持ち込み企画の応対なんて……
どう考えても僕の管轄じゃないのに……

engChrName: I'm glad the film festival was able to start fine. I heard something happened over at Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
I'm glad the film festival was able to start fine. I heard
something happened over at Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムで事件があった事は聞きましたが こうして映画祭が開催できたことは何よりです。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムで事件があった事は聞きましたが
こうして映画祭が開催できたことは何よりです。

engChrName: The festival sponsors and staff members staying at this hotel were all quite concerned.
engSearchText:
The festival sponsors and staff members staying at
this hotel were all quite concerned.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルに宿泊されている映画祭のスポンサーや 関係者の方々も、心配されておりました。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルに宿泊されている映画祭のスポンサーや
関係者の方々も、心配されておりました。

engChrName: The crown prince's own hard work was instrumental in keeping the festival on track. For our part, it's an honor to serve as the venue.
engSearchText:
The crown prince's own hard work was instrumental
in keeping the festival on track. For our part, it's an
honor to serve as the venue.
jpnChrName: 公太子殿下の尽力もあり予定通りに開催され、 会場を提供する側としても光栄な限りです。
jpnSearchText:
公太子殿下の尽力もあり予定通りに開催され、
会場を提供する側としても光栄な限りです。

engChrName: In light of the disorder this morning, we're working to bolster security at the hotel.
engSearchText:
In light of the disorder this morning, we're working
to bolster security at the hotel.
jpnChrName: 今朝は街での治安悪化を受け、当ホテルでも 安全確保に取り組んでおりますが……
jpnSearchText:
今朝は街での治安悪化を受け、当ホテルでも
安全確保に取り組んでおりますが……

engChrName: Unfortunately, it seems we have some agitators among our guests here, particularly on the upper floors.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it seems we have some agitators
among our guests here, particularly on the
upper floors.
jpnChrName: どうにも上層フロアを中心に、当ホテルの お客様の中にも興奮している方がいるとか……
jpnSearchText:
どうにも上層フロアを中心に、当ホテルの
お客様の中にも興奮している方がいるとか……

engChrName: The other floor managers and I plan to come up with a response to those individuals sometime this morning.
engSearchText:
The other floor managers and I plan to come up with
a response to those individuals sometime
this morning.
jpnChrName: そうした方々への対応も含めて、昼前には フロアマネージャー間で対応を検討いたします。
jpnSearchText:
そうした方々への対応も含めて、昼前には
フロアマネージャー間で対応を検討いたします。

engChrName: Welcome! Please, make yourself at home and enjoy the services we offer during the day, and throughout the night.
engSearchText:
Welcome! Please, make yourself at home and enjoy
the services we offer during the day,
and throughout the night.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、夜も当ホテルの サービスをご堪能いただければ幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
いらっしゃいませ、夜も当ホテルの
サービスをご堪能いただければ幸いです。

engChrName: In case you're not aware, this hotel was made possible by several investors, particularly Elsaim and the Bank of Edith.
engSearchText:
In case you're not aware, this hotel was made possible
by several investors, particularly Elsaim and the Bank
of Edith.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルはエルザイムとＢＯＥ（バンク・オブ・イーディス）を 筆頭に、複数の出資者により成立しておりましてね。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルはエルザイムとＢＯＥ（バンク・オブ・イーディス）を
筆頭に、複数の出資者により成立しておりましてね。

engChrName: Such investors expect only the absolute best in service, which we're proud to provide around the clock. Time is no object.
engSearchText:
Such investors expect only the absolute best in service,
which we're proud to provide around the clock.
Time is no object.
jpnChrName: そうした出資者の方々にも恥じぬよう、最高の サービスをいついかなる時もご用意しております。
jpnSearchText:
そうした出資者の方々にも恥じぬよう、最高の
サービスをいついかなる時もご用意しております。

engChrName: We may be famous for our nighttime swimming, but our offerings extend well beyond that. We hope you make the most of them.
engSearchText:
We may be famous for our nighttime swimming, but
our offerings extend well beyond that. We hope you
make the most of them.
jpnChrName: ナイトプールがやはり有名ですが、勿論その他の 各種サービスもご堪能いただければ幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
ナイトプールがやはり有名ですが、勿論その他の
各種サービスもご堪能いただければ幸いです。

engChrName: Welcome to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel. As one of the floor managers, we're honored by your visit.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel. As one of the
floor managers, we're honored by your visit.
jpnChrName: 《アルジュメイラホテル》にようこそ。 フロアマネージャーとして歓迎いたします。
jpnSearchText:
《アルジュメイラホテル》にようこそ。
フロアマネージャーとして歓迎いたします。

engChrName: I'm in charge of hotel services for both the first and second floors, as well as reception.
engSearchText:
I'm in charge of hotel services for both the first and
second floors, as well as reception.
jpnChrName: この１Ｆと２Ｆのエリアにおけるサービスに ついては私が責任を持って提供いたします。
jpnSearchText:
この１Ｆと２Ｆのエリアにおけるサービスに
ついては私が責任を持って提供いたします。

engChrName: As such, should you need absolutely anything whatsoever, please, don't hesitate to come find me and ask. I'll be more than glad to help.
engSearchText:
As such, should you need absolutely anything
whatsoever, please, don't hesitate to come find me
and ask. I'll be more than glad to help.
jpnChrName: その他取次等も含め、何なりと お申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
その他取次等も含め、何なりと
お申し付けください。

engChrName: This hotel is actually playing host to two events right now: a banquet for film festival award winners, and a bartending tournament.
engSearchText:
This hotel is actually playing host to two events right
now: a banquet for film festival award winners, and a
bartending tournament.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルにおいては映画祭の受賞者の方々の祝宴や、 同時開催のバーテンダー大会の会場を提供しています。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルにおいては映画祭の受賞者の方々の祝宴や、
同時開催のバーテンダー大会の会場を提供しています。

engChrName: Despite yesterday's goings-on, I'd like to believe we still managed to offer a superb venue for a successful festival.
engSearchText:
Despite yesterday's goings-on, I'd like to believe we
still managed to offer a superb venue for a
successful festival.
jpnChrName: 昨日は事件なども発生しましたが、映画祭を開催 できた以上、最高の会場をお届けしたく存じます。
jpnSearchText:
昨日は事件なども発生しましたが、映画祭を開催
できた以上、最高の会場をお届けしたく存じます。

engChrName: In light of all the concern the festival staff and guests had until yesterday, we want to do our best to put those worries to rest.
engSearchText:
In light of all the concern the festival staff and guests
had until yesterday, we want to do our best to put
those worries to rest.
jpnChrName: 関係者やお客様方の、昨晩までの不安も 拭えるよう尽力したいものですね。
jpnSearchText:
関係者やお客様方の、昨晩までの不安も
拭えるよう尽力したいものですね。

engChrName: Last night, after I heard a commotion coming from the pool, some guests came rushing straight towards me.
engSearchText:
Last night, after I heard a commotion coming from
the pool, some guests came rushing straight
towards me.
jpnChrName: 昨晩はナイトプールの方で騒動があったかと思えば 駆けてきたお客様がいらっしゃいましたが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩はナイトプールの方で騒動があったかと思えば
駆けてきたお客様がいらっしゃいましたが……

engChrName: For reasons I can only imagine, one of them managed to lose their clothing. I kept my questions to myself and directed them to a tailor.
engSearchText:
For reasons I can only imagine, one of them managed
to lose their clothing. I kept my questions to myself
and directed them to a tailor.
jpnChrName: どうもお召し物を失われていたようで…… 事情は存じませんが、一応服屋をご紹介しました。
jpnSearchText:
どうもお召し物を失われていたようで……
事情は存じませんが、一応服屋をご紹介しました。

engChrName: Come to think of it, I haven't seen any of them all morning. I wonder what happened?
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, I haven't seen any of them
all morning. I wonder what happened?
jpnChrName: そういえば……あの方々は今朝から姿が 見えませんが、どうされたのでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば……あの方々は今朝から姿が
見えませんが、どうされたのでしょうか。

engChrName: Welcome, Mr. Arkride, sir.
engSearchText: Welcome, Mr. Arkride, sir.
jpnChrName: いらっしゃいませ、アークライド様。
jpnSearchText: いらっしゃいませ、アークライド様。

engChrName: If you're looking for Ms. Lanster and Ms. Fenly, you'll find them at the swimming pool.
engSearchText:
If you're looking for Ms. Lanster and Ms. Fenly,
you'll find them at the swimming pool.
jpnChrName: ランスター様とフェンリィ様でしたら ナイトプールにてお待ちでございます。
jpnSearchText:
ランスター様とフェンリィ様でしたら
ナイトプールにてお待ちでございます。

engChrName: You may wish to have a word with them as you relax together.
engSearchText:
You may wish to have a word with them as you
relax together.
jpnChrName: 皆さまもどうぞお寛ぎいただきながら、 お話をしていただければ。
jpnSearchText:
皆さまもどうぞお寛ぎいただきながら、
お話をしていただければ。

engChrName: Welcome to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel. Ms. Lanster has already informed me of your arrival.
engSearchText:
Welcome to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel. Ms. Lanster has
already informed me of your arrival.
jpnChrName: アルジュメイラホテルへようこそ、ランスター様より 皆さま方につきましては伺っております。
jpnSearchText:
アルジュメイラホテルへようこそ、ランスター様より
皆さま方につきましては伺っております。

engChrName: She is currently staying in the upper levels of the hotel. Should you need anything, however, I'll be more than happy to assist you.
engSearchText:
She is currently staying in the upper levels of
the hotel. Should you need anything, however, I'll be
more than happy to assist you.
jpnChrName: ランスター様方は上階に宿泊されていますが、 何かございましたらこちらでお取次ぎいたします。
jpnSearchText:
ランスター様方は上階に宿泊されていますが、
何かございましたらこちらでお取次ぎいたします。

engChrName: Finally, the film festival's kicked off. As it happens, we're in charge of security for the festival grounds.
engSearchText:
Finally, the film festival's kicked off. As it happens,
we're in charge of security for the festival grounds.
jpnChrName: ついに映画祭が始まりましたな…… 私共にも会場の警備の責任がある。
jpnSearchText:
ついに映画祭が始まりましたな……
私共にも会場の警備の責任がある。

engChrName: Safety's not our only job, though. We're also expected to pitch in to make sure the event in general goes off without a hitch.
engSearchText:
Safety's not our only job, though. We're also expected
to pitch in to make sure the event in general goes off
without a hitch.
jpnChrName: イベントがつつがなく行えるよう、 安全対策以外もしっかりとサポートせねば。
jpnSearchText:
イベントがつつがなく行えるよう、
安全対策以外もしっかりとサポートせねば。

engChrName: Of particular concern on our part is that airship. Prince Sherid clearly has high hopes for the success of this festival.
engSearchText:
Of particular concern on our part is that airship.
Prince Sherid clearly has high hopes for the success of
this festival.
jpnChrName: 特にあの飛行船……シェリド殿下も この映画祭に相当な期待を寄せていると見えます。
jpnSearchText:
特にあの飛行船……シェリド殿下も
この映画祭に相当な期待を寄せていると見えます。

engChrName: Hrrm! All the more reason for us to give a hundred and ten percent and make all this a big success! We can't let a man of his stature down!
engSearchText:
Hrrm! All the more reason for us to give a hundred
and ten percent and make all this a big success!
We can't let a man of his stature down!
jpnChrName: ムウウン！　これは殿下のご期待に沿うためにも、 一層気合を入れて映画祭に助力せねば！
jpnSearchText:
ムウウン！　これは殿下のご期待に沿うためにも、
一層気合を入れて映画祭に助力せねば！

engChrName: I've heard there were disturbances around town this morning. Fighting, even.
engSearchText:
I've heard there were disturbances around town
this morning. Fighting, even.
jpnChrName: 今朝は市街の各所にて、乱闘を含む騒ぎが 起こったと聞きます。
jpnSearchText:
今朝は市街の各所にて、乱闘を含む騒ぎが
起こったと聞きます。

engChrName: Be that as it may, our mission remains unchanged. No expense will be spared when it comes to ensuring the safety and comfort of our guests.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, our mission remains unchanged.
No expense will be spared when it comes to ensuring
the safety and comfort of our guests.
jpnChrName: ですが当ホテルは、お客様の安全と 快適さを守る事には何も惜しまぬ所存です。
jpnSearchText:
ですが当ホテルは、お客様の安全と
快適さを守る事には何も惜しまぬ所存です。

engChrName: To that end, if you run into any trouble, please, don't hesitate to report it to me and my crew. We'll take care of it straight away.
engSearchText:
To that end, if you run into any trouble, please, don't
hesitate to report it to me and my crew. We'll take
care of it straight away.
jpnChrName: 何かトラブルなどがありましたら、 遠慮無く私共にお申し付けください。
jpnSearchText:
何かトラブルなどがありましたら、
遠慮無く私共にお申し付けください。

engChrName: Hrm! If you're looking for the pool, you'll find it past the door at the far end of the right.
engSearchText:
Hrm! If you're looking for the pool, you'll find it past
the door at the far end of the right.
jpnChrName: ムウウン、ナイトプールでしたら 突き当りの右手側の扉になります。
jpnSearchText:
ムウウン、ナイトプールでしたら
突き当りの右手側の扉になります。

engChrName: We offer a wide variety of services there as well, so please, take all the time you like to enjoy it.
engSearchText:
We offer a wide variety of services there as well, so
please, take all the time you like to enjoy it.
jpnChrName: そちらでも各種のサービスを提供して おりますので、ごゆるりと。
jpnSearchText:
そちらでも各種のサービスを提供して
おりますので、ごゆるりと。

engChrName: Be aware, however, some of our guests of highest stature are there as well, so I must ask you all to exercise discretion.
engSearchText:
Be aware, however, some of our guests of highest
stature are there as well, so I must ask you all to
exercise discretion.
jpnChrName: ただし、高貴な方もいらっしゃるので、 節度はお守りいただけるようお願いいたします。
jpnSearchText:
ただし、高貴な方もいらっしゃるので、
節度はお守りいただけるようお願いいたします。

engChrName: Hrrm! If you require any assistance, please, don't hesitate to call on me.
engSearchText:
Hrrm! If you require any assistance, please, don't
hesitate to call on me.
jpnChrName: ムウウン、お取次ぎが必要でしたら 私が伺いましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ムウウン、お取次ぎが必要でしたら
私が伺いましょう。

engChrName: We currently have not only very famous actors staying with us, but also a number of VIPs hailing from Elsaim.
engSearchText:
We currently have not only very famous actors staying
with us, but also a number of VIPs hailing
from Elsaim.
jpnChrName: 当ホテルには現在、一流の俳優の方々の他、 エルザイム方面のＶＩＰも多く宿泊されています。
jpnSearchText:
当ホテルには現在、一流の俳優の方々の他、
エルザイム方面のＶＩＰも多く宿泊されています。

engChrName: Between the unprecedented number of guests visiting Tharbad and the increasing trouble, it's fair to say we are a bit under pressure.
engSearchText:
Between the unprecedented number of guests visiting
Tharbad and the increasing trouble, it's fair to say we
are a bit under pressure.
jpnChrName: サルバッドでも例の無い来訪者の人数と、 ここ最近の街におけるトラブルの増加……
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドでも例の無い来訪者の人数と、
ここ最近の街におけるトラブルの増加……

engChrName: Nevertheless! We want our VIPs to feel completely safe within our walls, and will respond to issues with the urgency they demand.
engSearchText:
Nevertheless! We want our VIPs to feel completely
safe within our walls, and will respond to issues with
the urgency they demand.
jpnChrName: ＶＩＰの方々に安心して滞在していただくため、 ホテルとしても緊張感を持って対応しております。
jpnSearchText:
ＶＩＰの方々に安心して滞在していただくため、
ホテルとしても緊張感を持って対応しております。

engChrName: Hrrm! ...Ack! There I go again. My apologies. I didn't mean for that to slip out.
engSearchText:
Hrrm! ...Ack! There I go again. My apologies.
I didn't mean for that to slip out.
jpnChrName: ムウウン……おっと、 また癖が出てしまいましたな。
jpnSearchText:
ムウウン……おっと、
また癖が出てしまいましたな。

engChrName: I've done some martial arts training in the past, you see, and I also work security for the hotel here.
engSearchText:
I've done some martial arts training in the past, you
see, and I also work security for the hotel here.
jpnChrName: 私、一応武術の心得もあり状況次第では 警備方面の兼任もしていまして……
jpnSearchText:
私、一応武術の心得もあり状況次第では
警備方面の兼任もしていまして……

engChrName: Because of that, sometimes when I get into the job, that mindset from my training days comes back to me.
engSearchText:
Because of that, sometimes when I get into the job,
that mindset from my training days comes back
to me.
jpnChrName: 職務に気合を入れれば入れるほど、 鍛錬時の気合も出てしまいましてな。
jpnSearchText:
職務に気合を入れれば入れるほど、
鍛錬時の気合も出てしまいましてな。

engChrName: Our hotel will be hosting both the award ceremony and subsequent winners' banquet.
engSearchText:
Our hotel will be hosting both the award ceremony
and subsequent winners' banquet.
jpnChrName: この後行われる授賞式と受賞者の祝宴も、 当ホテルにて会場を提供する予定です。
jpnSearchText:
この後行われる授賞式と受賞者の祝宴も、
当ホテルにて会場を提供する予定です。

engChrName: I hope I can be useful during it all. I want to show the winners my appreciation for everything that they've done.
engSearchText:
I hope I can be useful during it all. I want to show the
winners my appreciation for everything that
they've done.
jpnChrName: 受賞者の方々を労うため、 少しでもお力になれれば幸いです。
jpnSearchText:
受賞者の方々を労うため、
少しでもお力になれれば幸いです。

engChrName: I might not be able to enter the bartending tournament, but if I can serve the winners well, that's more than enough of an honor for me.
engSearchText:
I might not be able to enter the bartending
tournament, but if I can serve the winners well, that's
more than enough of an honor for me.
jpnChrName: バーテンダー大会には出れませんが、受賞者の 方々をもてなせるのであれば十分に光栄ですよ。
jpnSearchText:
バーテンダー大会には出れませんが、受賞者の
方々をもてなせるのであれば十分に光栄ですよ。

engChrName: Oh, right. Did you know that the bartending tournament is actually going to be held on the same day as the film festival?
engSearchText:
Oh, right. Did you know that the bartending
tournament is actually going to be held on the same
day as the film festival?
jpnChrName: そういえば明日、映画祭と同日ですが バーテンダー大会も催される件ご存じでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
そういえば明日、映画祭と同日ですが
バーテンダー大会も催される件ご存じでしたか？

engChrName: My work at the hotel comes first, so unfortunately, I won't be able to enter, which is a shame. A lot of prominent people are entering.
engSearchText:
My work at the hotel comes first, so unfortunately, I
won't be able to enter, which is a shame. A lot of
prominent people are entering.
jpnChrName: 私はこのホテルでの業務が最優先ですので生憎 出場できませんが、一流の方も多く参加します。
jpnSearchText:
私はこのホテルでの業務が最優先ですので生憎
出場できませんが、一流の方も多く参加します。

engChrName: Especially Bermotti. He came all the way from the capital! He's still practicing hard, even today. I admire his dedication.
engSearchText:
Especially Bermotti. He came all the way from
the capital! He's still practicing hard, even today.
I admire his dedication.
jpnChrName: 特に首都からいらしたベルモッティ氏などは、 今日も練習を続けられているという油断の無さ……
jpnSearchText:
特に首都からいらしたベルモッティ氏などは、
今日も練習を続けられているという油断の無さ……

engChrName: That's probably one of the reasons why he stands head and shoulders above most everyone else in our line of work.
engSearchText:
That's probably one of the reasons why he stands
head and shoulders above most everyone else in our
line of work.
jpnChrName: 彼が私達バーテンダー業界の中でも 他と差をつけられている所以の一つでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
彼が私達バーテンダー業界の中でも
他と差をつけられている所以の一つでしょう。

engChrName: There's something fulfilling about serving some of the richer guests from the Central East, once you get used to what they order.
engSearchText:
There's something fulfilling about serving some of the
richer guests from the Central East, once you get used
to what they order.
jpnChrName: 中東系の資産家の方々への対応も、 慣れてみると一層やり甲斐がありましてね。
jpnSearchText:
中東系の資産家の方々への対応も、
慣れてみると一層やり甲斐がありましてね。

engChrName: They have their own particular demands you have to stay on top of, like fruits from there that they enjoy having.
engSearchText:
They have their own particular demands you have to
stay on top of, like fruits from there that they
enjoy having.
jpnChrName: 彼らには彼らのニーズがありまして…… やはり中東独自の果実の好みなどもありまして。
jpnSearchText:
彼らには彼らのニーズがありまして……
やはり中東独自の果実の好みなどもありまして。

engChrName: It's an interesting challenge, grasping what they want and then trying to serve them something that meets those unique expectations.
engSearchText:
It's an interesting challenge, grasping what they want
and then trying to serve them something that meets
those unique expectations.
jpnChrName: 彼らのそうした希望をいかに自然に汲み取り、 彼の理想に近いお酒を提供して差し上げるか。
jpnSearchText:
彼らのそうした希望をいかに自然に汲み取り、
彼の理想に近いお酒を提供して差し上げるか。

engChrName: It's a great opportunity to flex my muscles as a bartender, that's for sure. There's probably no better place to work than here.
engSearchText:
It's a great opportunity to flex my muscles as a
bartender, that's for sure. There's probably no better
place to work than here.
jpnChrName: バーテンダーの腕の見せ所として、 これ以上の舞台はそうそう無いでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
バーテンダーの腕の見せ所として、
これ以上の舞台はそうそう無いでしょう。

engChrName: You learn a lot when you work at a hotel where the guests are very discerning about their alcohol.
engSearchText:
You learn a lot when you work at a hotel where the
guests are very discerning about their alcohol.
jpnChrName: やはりお酒の格式を理解されたお客様の集う このホテルには多くの学びがありますね。
jpnSearchText:
やはりお酒の格式を理解されたお客様の集う
このホテルには多くの学びがありますね。

engChrName: I've practiced my craft all over the place, but I can say with confidence that this place is where I truly belong.
engSearchText:
I've practiced my craft all over the place, but I can say
with confidence that this place is where I
truly belong.
jpnChrName: 各地にてバーテンダーの修行をしてきましたが、 このホテルに就いて正解でした。
jpnSearchText:
各地にてバーテンダーの修行をしてきましたが、
このホテルに就いて正解でした。

engChrName: After all, where else in Zemuria can I try my hand at mixing Central Eastern fruits and flavors in cocktails from all over?
engSearchText:
After all, where else in Zemuria can I try my hand at
mixing Central Eastern fruits and flavors in cocktails
from all over?
jpnChrName: 中東独自の果実やフレーバー、蒸留酒を 使ったカクテルにも挑戦できますしね。
jpnSearchText:
中東独自の果実やフレーバー、蒸留酒を
使ったカクテルにも挑戦できますしね。

engChrName: My workers finally calmed down this morning, but until yesterday, they were acting quite strangely.
engSearchText:
My workers finally calmed down this morning, but
until yesterday, they were acting quite strangely.
jpnChrName: 職員達が今朝になって落ち着いてきましたが…… 昨日までの様子は何だったのでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
職員達が今朝になって落ち着いてきましたが……
昨日までの様子は何だったのでしょう？

engChrName: Post-film festival, water and orbal energy consumption is bound to go up. We need to be prepared to handle such a load.
engSearchText:
Post-film festival, water and orbal energy
consumption is bound to go up. We need to be
prepared to handle such a load.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ、映画祭の後も水や導力の消費量も 増えるでしょうし、しっかりと対応しなければ。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ、映画祭の後も水や導力の消費量も
増えるでしょうし、しっかりと対応しなければ。

engChrName: We can't afford to disappoint our Central Eastern VIPs, in particular. This is only the beginning of Tharbad's growth as a city!
engSearchText:
We can't afford to disappoint our Central Eastern
VIPs, in particular. This is only the beginning of
Tharbad's growth as a city!
jpnChrName: 中東のＶＩＰの方々を失望させる訳にはいきません、 サルバッドはこれからも発展していくのですから。
jpnSearchText:
中東のＶＩＰの方々を失望させる訳にはいきません、
サルバッドはこれからも発展していくのですから。

engChrName: I was just over at the office a little while ago and, you know, the workers there struck me as being strangely inattentive.
engSearchText:
I was just over at the office a little while ago and, you
know, the workers there struck me as being
strangely inattentive.
jpnChrName: 先ほども事務所の方に顔を出して来ましたが…… どうも普段に比べて従業員の注意が散漫に見えます。
jpnSearchText:
先ほども事務所の方に顔を出して来ましたが……
どうも普段に比べて従業員の注意が散漫に見えます。

engChrName: I'm sure some are simply excited about the festival, but that doesn't change the fact we're the ones managing the infrastructure for it.
engSearchText:
I'm sure some are simply excited about the festival,
but that doesn't change the fact we're the ones
managing the infrastructure for it.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が楽しみな社員がいるのも判りますが、 イベント中のインフラ管理も我々の仕事なのです。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が楽しみな社員がいるのも判りますが、
イベント中のインフラ管理も我々の仕事なのです。

engChrName: They really need to get their acts together. We have to be prepared for a huge influx of visitors while keeping things humming along!
engSearchText:
They really need to get their acts together. We have
to be prepared for a huge influx of visitors while
keeping things humming along!
jpnChrName: 大勢の来訪者を受けパンクしないよう管理せねば ならないのに……引き締めが必要そうですね。
jpnSearchText:
大勢の来訪者を受けパンクしないよう管理せねば
ならないのに……引き締めが必要そうですね。

engChrName: I mean, they were openly smoking orbal hookahs, right there in the office! That never used to happen. I expect better from them!
engSearchText:
I mean, they were openly smoking orbal hookahs,
right there in the office! That never used to happen.
I expect better from them!
jpnChrName: 事務所で導力シーシャとやらを節操無く、 吸い散らかすなど以前ならあり得なかったのに……
jpnSearchText:
事務所で導力シーシャとやらを節操無く、
吸い散らかすなど以前ならあり得なかったのに……

engChrName: I got a report earlier from our office in the Cultural District of water drying up in that area.
engSearchText:
I got a report earlier from our office in the Cultural
District of water drying up in that area.
jpnChrName: 先ほど現地事務所の方で報告を受けましたが…… 伝統地区の方で水枯れが発生していたとか。
jpnSearchText:
先ほど現地事務所の方で報告を受けましたが……
伝統地区の方で水枯れが発生していたとか。

engChrName: We managed to resolve the issue, thankfully, but it's embarrassing that it took us that long to realize what was going on.
engSearchText:
We managed to resolve the issue, thankfully, but it's
embarrassing that it took us that long to realize what
was going on.
jpnChrName: 無事解決したそうですが、我々の方で 確認が遅れてしまい、恥ずかしい限りです。
jpnSearchText:
無事解決したそうですが、我々の方で
確認が遅れてしまい、恥ずかしい限りです。

engChrName: We've had our hands so full expanding the Entertainment District infrastructure that I suppose we got lax about managing the water elsewhere.
engSearchText:
We've had our hands so full expanding the
Entertainment District infrastructure that I suppose
we got lax about managing the water elsewhere.
jpnChrName: やはり歓楽街のインフラ拡張で手一杯とはいえ、 伝統地区の水源管理が甘い気もしますね……
jpnSearchText:
やはり歓楽街のインフラ拡張で手一杯とはいえ、
伝統地区の水源管理が甘い気もしますね……

engChrName: There are still things left to set up in the Cultural District. I want our resources to be distributed at least a little more equitably.
engSearchText:
There are still things left to set up in the
Cultural District. I want our resources to be
distributed at least a little more equitably.
jpnChrName: 伝統地区にはまだ未整備な部分もありますが、 少しでも平等に資源を行き渡らせたいものです。
jpnSearchText:
伝統地区にはまだ未整備な部分もありますが、
少しでも平等に資源を行き渡らせたいものです。

engChrName: It's always shocking to see how much this city is growing. It's gotten so prosperous, I swear it looks different every time I visit.
engSearchText:
It's always shocking to see how much this city
is growing. It's gotten so prosperous, I swear it looks
different every time I visit.
jpnChrName: やはりこの街の発展は目を見張るものがありますね、 来るたびに姿を変え、豊かになっている。
jpnSearchText:
やはりこの街の発展は目を見張るものがありますね、
来るたびに姿を変え、豊かになっている。

engChrName: As the one who runs Verne's infrastructure division, I stay informed about the size of the investments that get made here.
engSearchText:
As the one who runs Verne's infrastructure division, I
stay informed about the size of the investments that
get made here.
jpnChrName: ヴェルヌ系のインフラ会社を預かる者として、 設備投資の額自体は定期的に報告を受けますが……
jpnSearchText:
ヴェルヌ系のインフラ会社を預かる者として、
設備投資の額自体は定期的に報告を受けますが……

engChrName: But you can't appreciate just how much the Central Eastern investors want Tharbad to grow, and the money they're spending, unless you see it.
engSearchText:
But you can't appreciate just how much the Central
Eastern investors want Tharbad to grow, and the
money they're spending, unless you see it.
jpnChrName: 実際に見てみると、中東の投資家達が如何にこの街の 発展を願い、惜しみなく投資しているかが判ります。
jpnSearchText:
実際に見てみると、中東の投資家達が如何にこの街の
発展を願い、惜しみなく投資しているかが判ります。

engChrName: Hmm... It seems the film festival has kicked off without a hitch, which is a relief.
engSearchText:
Hmm... It seems the film festival has kicked off
without a hitch, which is a relief.
jpnChrName: ふむ……無事に映画祭が開催できて 何よりというか……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……無事に映画祭が開催できて
何よりというか……

engChrName: When His Highness contacted me late last night, I was rather panicked about how things would pan out.
engSearchText:
When His Highness contacted me late last night, I
was rather panicked about how things would pan out.
jpnChrName: 昨晩遅くに殿下から連絡を頂いた際には どうなるかと焦ったが……
jpnSearchText:
昨晩遅くに殿下から連絡を頂いた際には
どうなるかと焦ったが……

engChrName: Everyone, however, was of the same mind as the prince: the event had to go on. No ifs, ands, or buts.
engSearchText:
Everyone, however, was of the same mind as the
prince: the event had to go on. No ifs, ands, or buts.
jpnChrName: わし以外も皆、殿下と志を同じくしていて、 開催の決行はすぐに決まった……
jpnSearchText:
わし以外も皆、殿下と志を同じくしていて、
開催の決行はすぐに決まった……

engChrName: Seeing as things seem to be staying on track, with any luck, I'll have good news to bring back home to the principality.
engSearchText:
Seeing as things seem to be staying on track, with any
luck, I'll have good news to bring back home to
the principality.
jpnChrName: 今のところはイベントも順調だしな、これなら 公国に良い知らせを持ち帰れるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
今のところはイベントも順調だしな、これなら
公国に良い知らせを持ち帰れるだろう。

engChrName: I'm relieved to see my daughter is enjoying the film festival, even if I have my reservations about that elder son of the Bashars.
engSearchText:
I'm relieved to see my daughter is enjoying the film
festival, even if I have my reservations about that
elder son of the Bashars.
jpnChrName: 娘も映画祭を楽しんでくれていて何よりだ…… バッシャールの長男との事は気がかりではあるが。
jpnSearchText:
娘も映画祭を楽しんでくれていて何よりだ……
バッシャールの長男との事は気がかりではあるが。

engChrName: Be that as it may, I don't regret bringing her along. This remains a good opportunity for her to learn about other families and the business.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, I don't regret bringing her along.
This remains a good opportunity for her to learn
about other families and the business.
jpnChrName: まあ、他家との関係も事業の見届けも、この機会に 学んでくれれば同行させた甲斐あるものだ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、他家との関係も事業の見届けも、この機会に
学んでくれれば同行させた甲斐あるものだ。

engChrName: The fact that Kaliyah has learned to speak her mind about things between our family and the Bashars shows how much she's grown.
engSearchText:
The fact that Kaliyah has learned to speak her mind
about things between our family and the Bashars
shows how much she's grown.
jpnChrName: カリヤが我が一族とバッシャール家の事に 意見するようになるとは……成長したものだ。
jpnSearchText:
カリヤが我が一族とバッシャール家の事に
意見するようになるとは……成長したものだ。

engChrName: That's all the more reason why I only want her to act once she learns how to protect herself, as befits a girl of nobility.
engSearchText:
That's all the more reason why I only want her to act
once she learns how to protect herself, as befits a girl
of nobility.
jpnChrName: だが、愛する娘であるからこそ貴族として身を守る術を 身につけてから動いてもらいたいものだな。
jpnSearchText:
だが、愛する娘であるからこそ貴族として身を守る術を
身につけてから動いてもらいたいものだな。

engChrName: That Bashar is so full of himself, he's clearly lost sight of his own meager capabilities!
engSearchText:
That Bashar is so full of himself, he's clearly lost sight
of his own meager capabilities!
jpnChrName: バッシャール族長はどうにも慢心し、 己の限界を見失っておるように見える……
jpnSearchText:
バッシャール族長はどうにも慢心し、
己の限界を見失っておるように見える……

engChrName: It's fair to say I was definitely right to be so cautious.
engSearchText: It's fair to say I was definitely right to be so cautious.
jpnChrName: わしが慎重に事を運んできた事が 正解だったとも言えるが……
jpnSearchText:
わしが慎重に事を運んできた事が
正解だったとも言えるが……

engChrName: That said, it genuinely pains me to see him, my rival of my many years, turn into such a mindless person.
engSearchText:
That said, it genuinely pains me to see him, my rival
of my many years, turn into such a mindless person.
jpnChrName: やはり長年のライバルが、こうも 盲目的になっている様は見るに堪えんな……
jpnSearchText:
やはり長年のライバルが、こうも
盲目的になっている様は見るに堪えんな……

engChrName: I can hardly believe that the head of the Bashars, who hold the eastern part of Elsaim, has been in bed with Valis all this time.
engSearchText:
I can hardly believe that the head of the Bashars, who
hold the eastern part of Elsaim, has been in bed with
Valis all this time.
jpnChrName: エルザイムの東方で領地を持つバッシャール族長 もヴァリスに取り込まれていたとは……
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムの東方で領地を持つバッシャール族長
もヴァリスに取り込まれていたとは……

engChrName: I knew that they'd been investing far and wide in an effort to spread their influence, but to witness it so close to home is a shock.
engSearchText:
I knew that they'd been investing far and wide in an
effort to spread their influence, but to witness it so
close to home is a shock.
jpnChrName: 彼の国が多方に投資をして覇権を拡大しておるのは 知っておったが、見知った顔までとはな。
jpnSearchText:
彼の国が多方に投資をして覇権を拡大しておるのは
知っておったが、見知った顔までとはな。

engChrName: I suppose this means the trade routes neighboring Elsaim have begun to fall under their umbrella at last...
engSearchText:
I suppose this means the trade routes neighboring
Elsaim have begun to fall under their umbrella
at last...
jpnChrName: いよいよエルザイム近辺の交易路も ヴァリスの息がかかり始めたという訳か……
jpnSearchText:
いよいよエルザイム近辺の交易路も
ヴァリスの息がかかり始めたという訳か……

engChrName: Well, what say you, Dahar? Haven't you tired yet of serving the royal family as its loyal dog?
engSearchText:
Well, what say you, Dahar? Haven't you tired yet of
serving the royal family as its loyal dog?
jpnChrName: さて、そちらはどうかなダハール侯。 公王家の飼い犬も飽きてきた頃合いではないか？
jpnSearchText:
さて、そちらはどうかなダハール侯。
公王家の飼い犬も飽きてきた頃合いではないか？

engChrName: Hmph. Bold words, coming from the man who joined forces with a developing nation to complete his trade routes. And you call me the dog.
engSearchText:
Hmph. Bold words, coming from the man who
joined forces with a developing nation to complete his
trade routes. And you call me the dog.
jpnChrName: ふん、ヴァリスのような新興国に尻尾を振って ようやく貿易路を完成させた貴殿がよく言うわ……
jpnSearchText:
ふん、ヴァリスのような新興国に尻尾を振って
ようやく貿易路を完成させた貴殿がよく言うわ……

engChrName: Unlike you, we haven't cast aside our pride as a clan and still remember the debt we owe to the royal family.
engSearchText:
Unlike you, we haven't cast aside our pride as a clan
and still remember the debt we owe to the
royal family.
jpnChrName: 部族の誇りを捨ててヴァリスの軍門に下った貴殿と違い、 我が一族は公王家への恩義を忘れんのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
部族の誇りを捨ててヴァリスの軍門に下った貴殿と違い、
我が一族は公王家への恩義を忘れんのだよ。

engChrName: Bwahaha! Bold words, coming from one such as you. Perhaps you feel the need to profess your loyalty with him present?
engSearchText:
Bwahaha! Bold words, coming from one such as you.
Perhaps you feel the need to profess your loyalty with
him present?
jpnChrName: ふはは、いつになく言いおるわ…… あのお方も来ている手前だからかな？
jpnSearchText:
ふはは、いつになく言いおるわ……
あのお方も来ている手前だからかな？

engChrName: The fact is, times are changing. I simply made the choice that best capitalized on the location of our dominion. Nothing more, nothing less.
engSearchText:
The fact is, times are changing. I simply made the
choice that best capitalized on the location of
our dominion. Nothing more, nothing less.
jpnChrName: 何にせよ時代は変わるのじゃ、ワシは部族領の 立地を最高に活かせる選択をした、それまでの事。
jpnSearchText:
何にせよ時代は変わるのじゃ、ワシは部族領の
立地を最高に活かせる選択をした、それまでの事。

engChrName: These people are true visionaries, I tell you. Free yourself of those old shackles and face reality for what it is!
engSearchText:
These people are true visionaries, I tell you.
Free yourself of those old shackles and face reality for
what it is!
jpnChrName: 貴殿にも言っておくぞ、かの国の先見性は本物じゃ。 古いしがらみは忘れて物を見よ。
jpnSearchText:
貴殿にも言っておくぞ、かの国の先見性は本物じゃ。
古いしがらみは忘れて物を見よ。

engChrName: This isn't merely about mira. Elsaim has people like His Highness the prince and your very own sister, you know.
engSearchText:
This isn't merely about mira. Elsaim has people like
His Highness the prince and your very own sister,
you know.
jpnChrName: だが、我がエルザイムにも公太子殿下も いらっしゃれば妹君もいらっしゃる。
jpnSearchText:
だが、我がエルザイムにも公太子殿下も
いらっしゃれば妹君もいらっしゃる。

engChrName: You'll come to regret showing such disregard for the principality, and you'll have nobody to blame but yourself.
engSearchText:
You'll come to regret showing such disregard for the
principality, and you'll have nobody to blame
but yourself.
jpnChrName: エルザイムの時代を甘く見ておると、 後悔する事になるのはそちらだからな？
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムの時代を甘く見ておると、
後悔する事になるのはそちらだからな？

engChrName: What? Are you telling me you're meddling in the mines? After all this time?!
engSearchText:
What? Are you telling me you're meddling in
the mines? After all this time?!
jpnChrName: 何と……貴殿、今さら鉱山にまで 手を伸ばしておるというのか……！
jpnSearchText:
何と……貴殿、今さら鉱山にまで
手を伸ばしておるというのか……！

engChrName: Bwahaha, there are plenty of other mine owners who have found great success with the help and support of Valis.
engSearchText:
Bwahaha, there are plenty of other mine owners who
have found great success with the help and support
of Valis.
jpnChrName: ハハハ、ヴァリスのバックアップで成功した 鉱山主は他にもいくらでもおるのでな！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハ、ヴァリスのバックアップで成功した
鉱山主は他にもいくらでもおるのでな！

engChrName: Like it or not, the age of Elsaim's dominance over buried resources is coming to an end!
engSearchText:
Like it or not, the age of Elsaim's dominance over
buried resources is coming to an end!
jpnChrName: 地下資源についても、エルザイム一強の 時代は終わりじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
地下資源についても、エルザイム一強の
時代は終わりじゃ！

engChrName: Not only that, I'm confident that Valis will take its profits earned from southern maritime trading and invest them in land owners like myself.
engSearchText:
Not only that, I'm confident that Valis will take its
profits earned from southern maritime trading and
invest them in land owners like myself.
jpnChrName: これからはヴァリスも南海貿易で得た利益を、 ワシのような地主に投資して開発していくじゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
これからはヴァリスも南海貿易で得た利益を、
ワシのような地主に投資して開発していくじゃろう。

engChrName: That doesn't change the fact that those people now sit at Elsaim's doorstep with YOUR land under their influence!
engSearchText:
That doesn't change the fact that those people now
sit at Elsaim's doorstep with YOUR land under
their influence!
jpnChrName: だからといって、エルザイムにほど近い 貴殿の領地にまでとは……
jpnSearchText:
だからといって、エルザイムにほど近い
貴殿の領地にまでとは……

engChrName: How can you be so blind?! Can't you tell that you're merely being used for their shell games and nothing more?!
engSearchText:
How can you be so blind?! Can't you tell that you're
merely being used for their shell games and
nothing more?!
jpnChrName: バッシャール族長、貴殿は自らが彼の国の ミラ・ゲームに利用されとるとは思わんのか？
jpnSearchText:
バッシャール族長、貴殿は自らが彼の国の
ミラ・ゲームに利用されとるとは思わんのか？

engChrName: Heh! And so what if I am? There's nothing that says I can't shuffle around their shells as well.
engSearchText:
Heh! And so what if I am? There's nothing that says I
can't shuffle around their shells as well.
jpnChrName: フン、だったらどうしたと言う話じゃ。 ワシも奴らを利用してやるまでの事よ……
jpnSearchText:
フン、だったらどうしたと言う話じゃ。
ワシも奴らを利用してやるまでの事よ……

engChrName: I assure you, I have no intention of becoming their pawn. I'll make my fortune and then move on before they try to do me in.
engSearchText:
I assure you, I have no intention of becoming
their pawn. I'll make my fortune and then move on
before they try to do me in.
jpnChrName: ワシとてただ駒になるつもりはない、 富を蓄え、喰われる前に動くのみよ。
jpnSearchText:
ワシとてただ駒になるつもりはない、
富を蓄え、喰われる前に動くのみよ。

engChrName: Such arrogance... Mark my words, a mindset like that will spell your doom, and sooner than later.
engSearchText:
Such arrogance... Mark my words, a mindset like that
will spell your doom, and sooner than later.
jpnChrName: バッシャール族長……その慢心、 いつか災厄となって降りかかるぞ……
jpnSearchText:
バッシャール族長……その慢心、
いつか災厄となって降りかかるぞ……

engChrName: Anyway, Mundt Bashar says he'd like to be on, ah, better terms with me in the future.
engSearchText:
Anyway, Mundt Bashar says he'd like to be on, ah,
better terms with me in the future.
jpnChrName: それで、バッシャール家のムント君が 私と将来的に仲良くしたいと言ってくれて……
jpnSearchText:
それで、バッシャール家のムント君が
私と将来的に仲良くしたいと言ってくれて……

engChrName: I'm not...opposed. I was hoping you would agree so as to strengthen ties between our realms without conflict. What do you think?
engSearchText:
I'm not...opposed. I was hoping you would agree so as
to strengthen ties between our realms without
conflict. What do you think?
jpnChrName: この先どうなるかわからないですし、 国同士の対立抜きで交流をさせていただければ……
jpnSearchText:
この先どうなるかわからないですし、
国同士の対立抜きで交流をさせていただければ……

engChrName: Hmm... So the rumors about the Bashar heir being a sensible fellow on the side of the moderates are true.
engSearchText:
