Hmm... So the rumors about the Bashar heir being a
sensible fellow on the side of the moderates are true.
jpnChrName: ふむ、バッシャールの跡取りが聡明で 穏健派という噂は本当だったという事か。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、バッシャールの跡取りが聡明で
穏健派という噂は本当だったという事か。

engChrName: Certainly, I don't wish for this antagonism between our families to persist with your generation...
engSearchText:
Certainly, I don't wish for this antagonism between
our families to persist with your generation...
jpnChrName: まあ、わしとてカリヤ達の代にまで 下手に対立を残す事は望んではおらんがな……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、わしとてカリヤ達の代にまで
下手に対立を残す事は望んではおらんがな……

engChrName: Then does that mean...
engSearchText: Then does that mean...
jpnChrName: それじゃあ……
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ……

engChrName: Not so fast! We still don't know if this young man truly harbors good intentions.
engSearchText:
Not so fast! We still don't know if this young man
truly harbors good intentions.
jpnChrName: だが！　かの者に下心が無いと 確信できるまでは、話は別だ！
jpnSearchText:
だが！　かの者に下心が無いと
確信できるまでは、話は別だ！

engChrName: For all we know, this could be a ploy to allow the Bashar patriarch to ensnare our family and manipulate us.
engSearchText:
For all we know, this could be a ploy to allow the
Bashar patriarch to ensnare our family and
manipulate us.
jpnChrName: もしかしたらこれもバッシャール族長が我が家を 籠絡するための策やもしれぬし……
jpnSearchText:
もしかしたらこれもバッシャール族長が我が家を
籠絡するための策やもしれぬし……

engChrName: If Mundt has even a single iota of wickedness in his eyes towards my beloved daughter, I shall not allow him to get anywhere near you!
engSearchText:
If Mundt has even a single iota of wickedness in his
eyes towards my beloved daughter, I shall not allow
him to get anywhere near you!
jpnChrName: 何より、ムントが我が愛娘カリヤを邪な目で 見ておるなら、断じて許すわけにはいかん！
jpnSearchText:
何より、ムントが我が愛娘カリヤを邪な目で
見ておるなら、断じて許すわけにはいかん！

engChrName: Erm. Father, don't you think you're being rude towards him before you've even—
engSearchText:
Erm. Father, don't you think you're being rude
towards him before you've even—
jpnChrName: お父様……流石にそれは失礼では……
jpnSearchText: お父様……流石にそれは失礼では……

engChrName: This isn't rudeness, Kaliyah. It's diligence. Maintaining healthy skepticism is a part of living and working as a noble.
engSearchText:
This isn't rudeness, Kaliyah. It's diligence.
Maintaining healthy skepticism is a part of living and
working as a noble.
jpnChrName: カリヤよ、貴族としては疑う事もまた 仕事の一つであるぞ……
jpnSearchText:
カリヤよ、貴族としては疑う事もまた
仕事の一つであるぞ……

engChrName: We live in a world of conspiracy. You never know just who may be holding a knife behind their back, so to speak.
engSearchText:
We live in a world of conspiracy. You never know just
who may be holding a knife behind their back, so
to speak.
jpnChrName: 策謀の渦巻く世界、如何なるところに毒牙が 潜んでおるかもわからん……
jpnSearchText:
策謀の渦巻く世界、如何なるところに毒牙が
潜んでおるかもわからん……

engChrName: You must take caution against such forces and learn how to protect yourself if you're to make it on your own.
engSearchText:
You must take caution against such forces and learn
how to protect yourself if you're to make it on
your own.
jpnChrName: まずは、そうした謀に用心し、 身を守る術を身につける事が先決だ。
jpnSearchText:
まずは、そうした謀に用心し、
身を守る術を身につける事が先決だ。

engChrName: This film festival is truly remarkable. And not just because you can meet so many famous Calvardian actors and directors, either.
engSearchText:
This film festival is truly remarkable. And not just
because you can meet so many famous Calvardian
actors and directors, either.
jpnChrName: これが映画祭……凄いわ、有名な共和国の 役者さんや監督さんに会えるのも嬉しいけど……
jpnSearchText:
これが映画祭……凄いわ、有名な共和国の
役者さんや監督さんに会えるのも嬉しいけど……

engChrName: The scale of the event is simply breathtaking. We certainly don't have anything like this back in Elsaim!
engSearchText:
The scale of the event is simply breathtaking.
We certainly don't have anything like this back
in Elsaim!
jpnChrName: それ以上に、イベントの規模がエルザイムでも なかなか無いくらいで素敵……
jpnSearchText:
それ以上に、イベントの規模がエルザイムでも
なかなか無いくらいで素敵……

engChrName: I can only imagine the parade will be even more magnificent. The organizers are certainly getting their mira's worth out of this event.
engSearchText:
I can only imagine the parade will be even
more magnificent. The organizers are certainly
getting their mira's worth out of this event.
jpnChrName: この後のパレードはもっと盛大なんでしょ？ 多くのミラをつぎ込んだだけあるのね……
jpnSearchText:
この後のパレードはもっと盛大なんでしょ？
多くのミラをつぎ込んだだけあるのね……

engChrName: I wonder what Mundt thinks about the film festival.
engSearchText: I wonder what Mundt thinks about the film festival.
jpnChrName: ムント君はこのイベントをどう思っているんだろう。 もし彼も、このイベントが好きなら……
jpnSearchText:
ムント君はこのイベントをどう思っているんだろう。
もし彼も、このイベントが好きなら……

engChrName: Perhaps if he takes a liking to it, the Bashars will decide to invest in it next year.
engSearchText:
Perhaps if he takes a liking to it, the Bashars will
decide to invest in it next year.
jpnChrName: バッシャール家も、来年から出資したり するようにはならないのかな？
jpnSearchText:
バッシャール家も、来年から出資したり
するようにはならないのかな？

engChrName: In fact, if we had a chance to meet because of business, that could allow our respective families to forge better ties...
engSearchText:
In fact, if we had a chance to meet because of
business, that could allow our respective families to
forge better ties...
jpnChrName: 同じ事業で会う機会があれば、私達も家同士も もっと良い関係を作れるかもしれないのに……
jpnSearchText:
同じ事業で会う機会があれば、私達も家同士も
もっと良い関係を作れるかもしれないのに……

engChrName: Things never go so smoothly, now, do they? Still, I'm lucky that my father agreed to bring me to the festival.
engSearchText:
Things never go so smoothly, now, do they?
Still, I'm lucky that my father agreed to bring me to
the festival.
jpnChrName: やっぱり簡単にはいかないものね…… でも、今回の映画祭もお父様は同行させてくれた。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり簡単にはいかないものね……
でも、今回の映画祭もお父様は同行させてくれた。

engChrName: In the past, he would never bring me anywhere abroad. He's changing a little, I'll grant him that.
engSearchText:
In the past, he would never bring me anywhere
abroad. He's changing a little, I'll grant him that.
jpnChrName: 昔なら外国になんて連れてきてくれなかったし、 お父様なりに成長を認めてくれているわ。
jpnSearchText:
昔なら外国になんて連れてきてくれなかったし、
お父様なりに成長を認めてくれているわ。

engChrName: Which means that if I can make myself just a bit more dependable, perhaps collaborating with Mundt isn't out of the question...
engSearchText:
Which means that if I can make myself just a bit
more dependable, perhaps collaborating with Mundt
isn't out of the question...
jpnChrName: だからきっと、私がもう少ししっかりできれば、 私なりにムント君と協力するのも……
jpnSearchText:
だからきっと、私がもう少ししっかりできれば、
私なりにムント君と協力するのも……

engChrName: I've had the pleasure of meeting Mundt before, at certain events in the principality. He really is quite kind and intelligent...
engSearchText:
I've had the pleasure of meeting Mundt before, at
certain events in the principality. He really is quite
kind and intelligent...
jpnChrName: ムント君とは公国の催事で何度か会っているけど…… やっぱり優しくて賢いよね。
jpnSearchText:
ムント君とは公国の催事で何度か会っているけど……
やっぱり優しくて賢いよね。

engChrName: Even if he sometimes shows rather...coquettish behavior, it would certainly be nice if our generation got along better than our parents'.
engSearchText:
Even if he sometimes shows rather...coquettish
behavior, it would certainly be nice if our
generation got along better than our parents'.
jpnChrName: たまに思わせぶりなのは気になるけど、 やっぱり私達の代では仲良くしたいわ。
jpnSearchText:
たまに思わせぶりなのは気になるけど、
やっぱり私達の代では仲良くしたいわ。

engChrName: *sigh* Must the two sides always bare fangs at one another at EVERY possible opportunity?
engSearchText:
*sigh* Must the two sides always bare fangs at one
another at EVERY possible opportunity?
jpnChrName: お父様は公太子殿下に倣って出資した イベントを見届けに来ただけのはずなのに……
jpnSearchText:
お父様は公太子殿下に倣って出資した
イベントを見届けに来ただけのはずなのに……

engChrName: Honestly, this was simply supposed to be a trip where we oversaw an event in which my father invested, following the prince's example.
engSearchText:
Honestly, this was simply supposed to be a trip where
we oversaw an event in which my father invested,
following the prince's example.
jpnChrName: どうしてこう、お互いの対抗心を いっつもむき出しにしちゃうんだろう……
jpnSearchText:
どうしてこう、お互いの対抗心を
いっつもむき出しにしちゃうんだろう……

engChrName: I was truly looking forward to this festival, but who knows if I'll even be able to enjoy it now?
engSearchText:
I was truly looking forward to this festival, but who
knows if I'll even be able to enjoy it now?
jpnChrName: 私も映画祭は楽しみだったのに、 ちゃんと楽しめるかしら……
jpnSearchText:
私も映画祭は楽しみだったのに、
ちゃんと楽しめるかしら……

engChrName: There they go, bickering again. I thought we were all here to oversee the festival, and yet...
engSearchText:
There they go, bickering again. I thought we were all
here to oversee the festival, and yet...
jpnChrName: お父様達、また言い争って…… せっかく映画祭を見届けに来たのに……
jpnSearchText:
お父様達、また言い争って……
せっかく映画祭を見届けに来たのに……

engChrName: I guess they haven't seen each other since the prince's banquet two years ago. Maybe our fathers are just 'catching up'.
engSearchText:
I guess they haven't seen each other since the prince's
banquet two years ago. Maybe our fathers are just
'catching up'.
jpnChrName: 一昨年の公王家主催の晩さん会の時以来かな、 父上たちが顔を合わせるのは。
jpnSearchText:
一昨年の公王家主催の晩さん会の時以来かな、
父上たちが顔を合わせるのは。

engChrName: They were competitive back then, to be sure, but this definitely feels more...venomous.
engSearchText:
They were competitive back then, to be sure, but this
definitely feels more...venomous.
jpnChrName: あの時も競り合っていたけど、やっぱり 今回は昔より険悪な感じだな。
jpnSearchText:
あの時も競り合っていたけど、やっぱり
今回は昔より険悪な感じだな。

engChrName: ...Forgive me for asking, but is it fair to say your father has, umm, 'changed' since letting Valis into your realm?
engSearchText:
...Forgive me for asking, but is it fair to say your
father has, umm, 'changed' since letting Valis into
your realm?
jpnChrName: ……やっぱり、ヴァリスの影響を 受け入れた事で変わっちゃったの？
jpnSearchText:
……やっぱり、ヴァリスの影響を
受け入れた事で変わっちゃったの？

engChrName: You could say that. On the one hand, I can understand him not wanting to be held back by old customs for the sake of tradition.
engSearchText:
You could say that. On the one hand, I can
understand him not wanting to be held back by old
customs for the sake of tradition.
jpnChrName: まあ、そういう事にはなるね。 古い慣習に拘るなって言うのは判るけど……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、そういう事にはなるね。
古い慣習に拘るなって言うのは判るけど……

engChrName: But the fact is, once he sets his stubborn mind on anything, nothing can dissuade him. We'll see what happens, I suppose.
engSearchText:
But the fact is, once he sets his stubborn mind on
anything, nothing can dissuade him. We'll see what
happens, I suppose.
jpnChrName: 父上も一度道を決めたら他が見えなくなる ところはあると思うし、どうなる事やら……
jpnSearchText:
父上も一度道を決めたら他が見えなくなる
ところはあると思うし、どうなる事やら……

engChrName: Be that as it may, that's no reason we personally can't get along. After all, we come from the same land. There's much we have in common.
engSearchText:
Be that as it may, that's no reason we personally can't
get along. After all, we come from the same land.
There's much we have in common.
jpnChrName: それでも私達は仲良くやりましょ、 同じ地域に生きる仲間ですもの。
jpnSearchText:
それでも私達は仲良くやりましょ、
同じ地域に生きる仲間ですもの。

engChrName: Our generation can absolutely put the quarrels of our fathers to bed if we put our minds to it. Don't you agree?
engSearchText:
Our generation can absolutely put the quarrels of our
fathers to bed if we put our minds to it. Don't
you agree?
jpnChrName: 親世代の諍いも、いつか私達の代で 解消していけるはずよ。
jpnSearchText:
親世代の諍いも、いつか私達の代で
解消していけるはずよ。

engChrName: Uhh, yeah. I don't see why not.
engSearchText: Uhh, yeah. I don't see why not.
jpnChrName: あ、ああ……そうだね。
jpnSearchText: あ、ああ……そうだね。

engChrName: To be honest, it makes me happy to hear you say that. Really happy, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
To be honest, it makes me happy to hear you say that.
Really happy, as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: ふふ、君の方からその言葉が聞けるとはね。 なかなかどうして嬉しいものだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、君の方からその言葉が聞けるとはね。
なかなかどうして嬉しいものだ。

engChrName: Unfortunately, considering your family governs near Elsaim's border, I think conflict is inevitable.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, considering your family governs near
Elsaim's border, I think conflict is inevitable.
jpnChrName: とまあ、これが父上の言い分と、うちの領地の ヴァリスにとっての価値らしくてね。
jpnSearchText:
とまあ、これが父上の言い分と、うちの領地の
ヴァリスにとっての価値らしくてね。

engChrName: Not only does my father have a bone to pick, but the people in Valis see quite a lot within our territory.
engSearchText:
Not only does my father have a bone to pick, but the
people in Valis see quite a lot within our territory.
jpnChrName: 結局のところ、エルザイムの国境近くを治める 君の家とはどうしてもかち合ってしまうんだ。
jpnSearchText:
結局のところ、エルザイムの国境近くを治める
君の家とはどうしてもかち合ってしまうんだ。

engChrName: Maybe so, but that doesn't preclude us from being friendly, does it? I, for one, don't want to have to quarrel with you.
engSearchText:
Maybe so, but that doesn't preclude us from being
friendly, does it? I, for one, don't want to have to
quarrel with you.
jpnChrName: うーん、それでも何とか仲良くできないのかな。 私、ムント君が当主になってから争いたくない……
jpnSearchText:
うーん、それでも何とか仲良くできないのかな。
私、ムント君が当主になってから争いたくない……

engChrName: ...Oh, what am I saying? With the royal family and Valis at play, perhaps I'm naïve for thinking we can be above the fray. *sigh*
engSearchText:
...Oh, what am I saying? With the royal family and
Valis at play, perhaps I'm naïve for thinking we can
be above the fray. *sigh*
jpnChrName: とはいっても、公王家とヴァリスも 後ろにいるから私達だけでは……
jpnSearchText:
とはいっても、公王家とヴァリスも
後ろにいるから私達だけでは……

engChrName: No, you're right. I think it would be good if we found a way to get closer and make it harder for our families to butt heads, long-term.
engSearchText:
No, you're right. I think it would be good if we found
a way to get closer and make it harder for our families
to butt heads, long-term.
jpnChrName: いや……長い目で見れば、むしろ僕達なりに 繋がりを作っておいて争いにくくすれば良いんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……長い目で見れば、むしろ僕達なりに
繋がりを作っておいて争いにくくすれば良いんだよ。

engChrName: Though it would mean that if things took a bad turn between us, we'd stand to lose something. That wouldn't be ideal.
engSearchText:
Though it would mean that if things took a bad turn
between us, we'd stand to lose something.
That wouldn't be ideal.
jpnChrName: 要はお互い仲が悪くなれば損をする、 そういう関係に僕らがなるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
要はお互い仲が悪くなれば損をする、
そういう関係に僕らがなるんだ。

engChrName: Good point. Then in a few years down the line, we could get into business! Or become partners in some other venture!
engSearchText:
Good point. Then in a few years down the line, we
could get into business! Or become partners in some
other venture!
jpnChrName: な、なるほど……もう何年かしたら、一緒に事業か 何かをやってパートナーになっちゃうのね！
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほど……もう何年かしたら、一緒に事業か
何かをやってパートナーになっちゃうのね！

engChrName: We'll force our fathers' hands that way. Surely once they recognize it as fact, things can't get any worse between our families, at least.
engSearchText:
We'll force our fathers' hands that way. Surely once
they recognize it as fact, things can't get any worse
between our families, at least.
jpnChrName: 既成事実ってやつなのかしら、それをお父様達が 認めちゃえば、今より仲が悪くはならないって……
jpnSearchText:
既成事実ってやつなのかしら、それをお父様達が
認めちゃえば、今より仲が悪くはならないって……

engChrName: Now that's an idea. I hadn't thought about that.
engSearchText: Now that's an idea. I hadn't thought about that.
jpnChrName: いやまあ、そうだな……それも一つの手ではあるよ。
jpnSearchText: いやまあ、そうだな……それも一つの手ではあるよ。

engChrName: There's also... You know, we should discuss this further. I'm really intrigued by the idea of us going into business together.
engSearchText:
There's also... You know, we should discuss
this further. I'm really intrigued by the idea of us
going into business together.
jpnChrName: 他には……まあ、おいおい話すとしようか。 一緒に事業をやるのも面白そうだし。
jpnSearchText:
他には……まあ、おいおい話すとしようか。
一緒に事業をやるのも面白そうだし。

engChrName: (Hmm... I should've known she wouldn't quite pick up on it. Maybe we aren't quite there yet...)
engSearchText:
(Hmm... I should've known she wouldn't quite pick
up on it. Maybe we aren't quite there yet...)
jpnChrName: （うーん、やっぱりまだ伝わらないか……   というか流石に早いのかな……）
jpnSearchText:
（うーん、やっぱりまだ伝わらないか……
というか流石に早いのかな……）

engChrName: Heh, I never had an interest in the entertainment industry, but I had to see this, knowing the royal family invested in it. And you know what?
engSearchText:
Heh, I never had an interest in the entertainment
industry, but I had to see this, knowing the royal
family invested in it. And you know what?
jpnChrName: ふん、娯楽産業に興味は無かったが、公王家が 出資しているというので見に来てみたが……
jpnSearchText:
ふん、娯楽産業に興味は無かったが、公王家が
出資しているというので見に来てみたが……

engChrName: This is far more amusing than I was expecting! Maybe I need to make similar investments myself!
engSearchText:
This is far more amusing than I was expecting!
Maybe I need to make similar investments myself!
jpnChrName: こうして見ると案外面白そうではあるな、 ワシも似たような投資を考えてみるか。
jpnSearchText:
こうして見ると案外面白そうではあるな、
ワシも似たような投資を考えてみるか。

engChrName: But I can figure that out later. Right now, I need to make the rounds among all these wonderfully powerful visitors.
engSearchText:
But I can figure that out later. Right now, I need to
make the rounds among all these wonderfully
powerful visitors.
jpnChrName: まあ、それ以上に重要なのはこの場に来ておる 有力者への表敬訪問だな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、それ以上に重要なのはこの場に来ておる
有力者への表敬訪問だな。

engChrName: Heh heh! I plan to get plenty of dirt on the more spineless ones during this event.
engSearchText:
Heh heh! I plan to get plenty of dirt on the more
spineless ones during this event.
jpnChrName: クク、この催事で腑抜けきっておる者の 弱みを握らせてもらうわ……
jpnSearchText:
クク、この催事で腑抜けきっておる者の
弱みを握らせてもらうわ……

engChrName: It's quite clear what direction Elsaim's and Valis' investments are taking.
engSearchText:
It's quite clear what direction Elsaim's and Valis'
investments are taking.
jpnChrName: まあ、何にせよエルザイムとヴァリスの 投資の方向性は顕著に出ていると言えそうじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、何にせよエルザイムとヴァリスの
投資の方向性は顕著に出ていると言えそうじゃな。

engChrName: If things go according to plan, it could be one step towards extending my business into Valis as well.
engSearchText:
If things go according to plan, it could be one step
towards extending my business into Valis as well.
jpnChrName: だが、この調子で成功を収めるのであれば、 ヴァリスにも同様の事業を進めるのも一手かもしれん。
jpnSearchText:
だが、この調子で成功を収めるのであれば、
ヴァリスにも同様の事業を進めるのも一手かもしれん。

engChrName: Ha! I don't know when Mundt learned to think so cunningly, but I like what I hear.
engSearchText:
Ha! I don't know when Mundt learned to think so
cunningly, but I like what I hear.
jpnChrName: フン、ワシの知らぬ間にムントも一丁前な事を 言えるようになりおって……
jpnSearchText:
フン、ワシの知らぬ間にムントも一丁前な事を
言えるようになりおって……

engChrName: That's what makes the boy my son. If he grows up to be a shrewd ruler like his father, I'll be more than content.
engSearchText:
That's what makes the boy my son. If he grows up to
be a shrewd ruler like his father, I'll be more
than content.
jpnChrName: だが、それでこそワシの息子だ。 賢明な世継ぎに育つなら文句など無いわい。
jpnSearchText:
だが、それでこそワシの息子だ。
賢明な世継ぎに育つなら文句など無いわい。

engChrName: Feh! I haven't lost my mind. I know full well that Valis has ambitions of its own.
engSearchText:
Feh! I haven't lost my mind. I know full well that
Valis has ambitions of its own.
jpnChrName: フン、ワシとてヴァリスの野心くらい わかっておるつもりじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、ワシとてヴァリスの野心くらい
わかっておるつもりじゃ。

engChrName: But that doesn't mean a lord like myself can't make use of their, heh, 'outpourings' to my own advantage.
engSearchText:
But that doesn't mean a lord like myself can't make
use of their, heh, 'outpourings' to my own advantage.
jpnChrName: だが、ワシらのような独立地主にとっては、 連中の流れを利用するのもまた一手……
jpnSearchText:
だが、ワシらのような独立地主にとっては、
連中の流れを利用するのもまた一手……

engChrName: A new age is upon us. Niceties are ultimately for suckers. If my family and realm are going to prosper, we've got to get dirty.
engSearchText:
A new age is upon us. Niceties are ultimately
for suckers. If my family and realm are going to
prosper, we've got to get dirty.
jpnChrName: この変わりゆく時代に在って一族と領地を 栄えさせるためなら、綺麗事など犬に食わせるわい。
jpnSearchText:
この変わりゆく時代に在って一族と領地を
栄えさせるためなら、綺麗事など犬に食わせるわい。

engChrName: Dahar is still stuck in his old ways. What good is having power if a man doesn't exercise it on others, hmm?
engSearchText:
Dahar is still stuck in his old ways.
What good is having power if a man doesn't exercise
it on others, hmm?
jpnChrName: ダハール侯も頭が硬いのう、 力ある者は逆に利用してこそだというのに。
jpnSearchText:
ダハール侯も頭が硬いのう、
力ある者は逆に利用してこそだというのに。

engChrName: But forget him. All I care about is making my realm, and fortune, as big as possible so my son can inherit a lot from me.
engSearchText:
But forget him. All I care about is making my realm,
and fortune, as big as possible so my son can inherit a
lot from me.
jpnChrName: まあ良い、ワシも息子のためにも領地と財産は 可能な限り大きくして継承させたいからな。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良い、ワシも息子のためにも領地と財産は
可能な限り大きくして継承させたいからな。

engChrName: Actions speak louder than words. I'll show that Dahar that my way will bear fruit. Plenty of fruit, at that!
engSearchText:
Actions speak louder than words. I'll show that Dahar
that my way will bear fruit. Plenty of fruit, at that!
jpnChrName: せいぜい、結果をダハール侯に 見せつけてやるとしようか。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい、結果をダハール侯に
見せつけてやるとしようか。

engChrName: Son, I understand what you're saying. But we can't resign ourselves to aligning with Elsaim, not when we've come this far.
engSearchText:
Son, I understand what you're saying. But we can't
resign ourselves to aligning with Elsaim, not when
we've come this far.
jpnChrName: ムントよ、お前の言う事も判るがな。 今さらエルザイムに下る訳にもいかんのじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ムントよ、お前の言う事も判るがな。
今さらエルザイムに下る訳にもいかんのじゃ。

engChrName: I'm not saying we have to devote ourselves to them. We just don't know what the balance of power in the Central East could be later.
engSearchText:
I'm not saying we have to devote ourselves to them.
We just don't know what the balance of power in the
Central East could be later.
jpnChrName: 別に公国の側につけという訳ではありません、 ただ今後中東の勢力図がどうなるか不明なのも事実……
jpnSearchText:
別に公国の側につけという訳ではありません、
ただ今後中東の勢力図がどうなるか不明なのも事実……

engChrName: It's not good to put all of our eggs in one basket. Doing so could put us in a tough situation as time goes on.
engSearchText:
It's not good to put all of our eggs in one basket.
Doing so could put us in a tough situation as time
goes on.
jpnChrName: ヴァリスとエルザイム以外にも不安定な地域や 小国もまだあり、彼らを利用するのも一手でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァリスとエルザイム以外にも不安定な地域や
小国もまだあり、彼らを利用するのも一手でしょう。

engChrName: Besides, there's more to our region than just Valis and Elsaim. There are plenty of smaller countries and unstable regions we could use.
engSearchText:
Besides, there's more to our region than just Valis
and Elsaim. There are plenty of smaller countries and
unstable regions we could use.
jpnChrName: ですが、そのためには二大勢力の片方に肩入れ し過ぎると後々動きにくくなるかと……
jpnSearchText:
ですが、そのためには二大勢力の片方に肩入れ
し過ぎると後々動きにくくなるかと……

engChrName: Bahaha, now you're thinking like a man! When did you grow up so much, my boy?
engSearchText:
Bahaha, now you're thinking like a man! When did
you grow up so much, my boy?
jpnChrName: ハハ、お前も一丁前な事を 言うようになりおって……
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、お前も一丁前な事を
言うようになりおって……

engChrName: All right, let's hear it. Got a plan for forging ties with Elsaim without pissing off our friends in Valis?
engSearchText:
All right, let's hear it. Got a plan for forging ties with
Elsaim without pissing off our friends in Valis?
jpnChrName: して、ヴァリスの機嫌を損なわぬ範囲で 公国とのパイプを今更作る具体策はあるのか？
jpnSearchText:
して、ヴァリスの機嫌を損なわぬ範囲で
公国とのパイプを今更作る具体策はあるのか？

engChrName: As a matter of fact, I do. It's going to involve a little bit of going back to our roots, one might say.
engSearchText:
As a matter of fact, I do. It's going to involve a little
bit of going back to our roots, one might say.
jpnChrName: そこで原点回帰という訳ですよ父上……
jpnSearchText: そこで原点回帰という訳ですよ父上……

engChrName: As they say in the Central East, the ties between the clans are older than history itself.
engSearchText:
As they say in the Central East, the ties between the
clans are older than history itself.
jpnChrName: 中東では一族間での付き合いが 古くよりものを言ってきました。
jpnSearchText:
中東では一族間での付き合いが
古くよりものを言ってきました。

engChrName: So, with your permission, I'm thinking I could start to forge personal connections that we'll then leverage in the future. What do you think?
engSearchText:
So, with your permission, I'm thinking I could start to
forge personal connections that we'll then leverage in
the future. What do you think?
jpnChrName: 僕に、個人的なパイプを作って 将来活かす事を認めていただければ……
jpnSearchText:
僕に、個人的なパイプを作って
将来活かす事を認めていただければ……

engChrName: You know, you might be on to something there. It's not like strategic marriages weren't common as dirt in my time, either!
engSearchText:
You know, you might be on to something there.
It's not like strategic marriages weren't common as
dirt in my time, either!
jpnChrName: ふむ、確かにワシらの時代なら政略結婚も 普通にあったくらいだしな……
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、確かにワシらの時代なら政略結婚も
普通にあったくらいだしな……

engChrName: All right. Let's do it. I want to be clear, I still intend to prioritize working with Valis.
engSearchText:
All right. Let's do it. I want to be clear, I still intend
to prioritize working with Valis.
jpnChrName: まあ良かろう、ワシはあくまでもヴァリスと 付き合う事を優先する。
jpnSearchText:
まあ良かろう、ワシはあくまでもヴァリスと
付き合う事を優先する。

engChrName: But if you think you can make inroads with Elsaim's aristocrats, I won't stop you. Show me how far you can take this, son.
engSearchText:
But if you think you can make inroads with Elsaim's
aristocrats, I won't stop you. Show me how far you
can take this, son.
jpnChrName: だが、お前が公国の貴族と関係を作れるというなら 止めはせん、せいぜい可能性を見せてみるが良い。
jpnSearchText:
だが、お前が公国の貴族と関係を作れるというなら
止めはせん、せいぜい可能性を見せてみるが良い。

engChrName: Yes! Thank you, Father! We can discuss the details later once we get home.
engSearchText:
Yes! Thank you, Father! We can discuss the details
later once we get home.
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、父上！ それでは詳しい話は帰国後にでも……
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございます、父上！
それでは詳しい話は帰国後にでも……

engChrName: This event is even more lavish than I expected. I guess I shouldn't have expected any less, what with the royal family's own money at stake.
engSearchText:
This event is even more lavish than I expected.
I guess I shouldn't have expected any less, what with
the royal family's own money at stake.
jpnChrName: 想像していた以上に盛大だな…… 流石は公王家が直接投資しただけある。
jpnSearchText:
想像していた以上に盛大だな……
流石は公王家が直接投資しただけある。

engChrName: In fact, I heard that the prince himself has contributed a lot to the film festival.
engSearchText:
In fact, I heard that the prince himself has
contributed a lot to the film festival.
jpnChrName: 何でも、エルザイムの公太子も この映画祭には相当貢献したと聞くが……
jpnSearchText:
何でも、エルザイムの公太子も
この映画祭には相当貢献したと聞くが……

engChrName: There's probably a lot I could learn from him being so flexible in how he chooses to spend his wealth. Hmm...
engSearchText:
There's probably a lot I could learn from him being so
flexible in how he chooses to spend his wealth.
Hmm...
jpnChrName: ふむ、そういう柔軟な思考で富を 使いこなすのは色々と参考になりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、そういう柔軟な思考で富を
使いこなすのは色々と参考になりそうだ。

engChrName: If I get the chance to meet him, it might not be the worst idea to have him advise me a little.
engSearchText:
If I get the chance to meet him, it might not be the
worst idea to have him advise me a little.
jpnChrName: 僕も機会があればお目にかかって、 色々と学ばせてもらうのも手かもしれないな。
jpnSearchText:
僕も機会があればお目にかかって、
色々と学ばせてもらうのも手かもしれないな。

engChrName: I'm surprised my father is so impressed by the film festival. He used to never care at all about the entertainment industry.
engSearchText:
I'm surprised my father is so impressed by the
film festival. He used to never care at all about the
entertainment industry.
jpnChrName: それにしても、娯楽産業に無関心だった 父上も映画祭に感心しているのは意外だな……
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、娯楽産業に無関心だった
父上も映画祭に感心しているのは意外だな……

engChrName: A good bit of it probably just has to do with him liking glitzy things, but at the same time, it feels like we may be on to something here.
engSearchText:
A good bit of it probably just has to do with him
liking glitzy things, but at the same time, it feels like
we may be on to something here.
jpnChrName: まあ、派手なものが好きという意味では分かるが…… 一歩何かに近づいたとも言えるかもしれない。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、派手なものが好きという意味では分かるが……
一歩何かに近づいたとも言えるかもしれない。

engChrName: Either way, hopefully this film festival will provide insight into how to go about collaborating with Kaliyah in the future.
engSearchText:
Either way, hopefully this film festival will provide
insight into how to go about collaborating with
Kaliyah in the future.
jpnChrName: ともあれ、僕らもこの映画祭を通して、将来カリヤと 何かをするための参考にするとしようか……
jpnSearchText:
ともあれ、僕らもこの映画祭を通して、将来カリヤと
何かをするための参考にするとしようか……

engChrName: I really do want to forge a good relationship with Kary—I mean, with the other families. You know.
engSearchText:
I really do want to forge a good relationship with
Kary—I mean, with the other families. You know.
jpnChrName: やはり僕はカリヤと……じゃなくて、 向こうの家と良好な関係を築きたい。
jpnSearchText:
やはり僕はカリヤと……じゃなくて、
向こうの家と良好な関係を築きたい。

engChrName: The way I look at it, if we build those connections now, that'll give our clan more options in the future. We have nothing to lose.
engSearchText:
The way I look at it, if we build those connections
now, that'll give our clan more options in the future.
We have nothing to lose.
jpnChrName: 今、僕達で将来のためのパイプを作れば、 一族にとっての選択肢も増えるだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
今、僕達で将来のためのパイプを作れば、
一族にとっての選択肢も増えるだろうな。

engChrName: Blast it all! I need to calm my father down, quickly!
engSearchText: Blast it all! I need to calm my father down, quickly!
jpnChrName: まあ、とにかく僕からも父上には 一旦落ち着くように言っておくとするよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、とにかく僕からも父上には
一旦落ち着くように言っておくとするよ。

engChrName: If people see our families fighting at the film festival, our reputation will take a hit. He's actually not that hard to reason with.
engSearchText:
If people see our families fighting at the film festival,
our reputation will take a hit. He's actually not that
hard to reason with.
jpnChrName: 映画祭で諍いを晒したら一族の株も下がる、 そう言えば案外簡単に大人しくなるさ。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭で諍いを晒したら一族の株も下がる、
そう言えば案外簡単に大人しくなるさ。

engChrName: Ultimately, it's our future that's most important, not what's immediately in front of us!
engSearchText:
Ultimately, it's our future that's most important, not
what's immediately in front of us!
jpnChrName: とはいえ、本当に重要なのはそんな目先の事より、 僕らの未来の事なんだけどね……
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、本当に重要なのはそんな目先の事より、
僕らの未来の事なんだけどね……

engChrName: The Bashars and Dahars have been rival clans practically since the beginning of time.
engSearchText:
The Bashars and Dahars have been rival clans
practically since the beginning of time.
jpnChrName: うちの一族とダハール家は古くから ライバル意識が強い間柄でね。
jpnSearchText:
うちの一族とダハール家は古くから
ライバル意識が強い間柄でね。

engChrName: Not that we typically resort to arms to settle our differences. In fact, we've crossed paths before at royal functions.
engSearchText:
Not that we typically resort to arms to settle
our differences. In fact, we've crossed paths before at
royal functions.
jpnChrName: まあ、武力は使っていないし、一応は 公王家の催しで顔も合わせてはいたが……
jpnSearchText:
まあ、武力は使っていないし、一応は
公王家の催しで顔も合わせてはいたが……

engChrName: But with my father getting roped into Valis' financial schemes, the situation has gotten a little...complicated.
engSearchText:
But with my father getting roped into Valis' financial
schemes, the situation has gotten a
little...complicated.
jpnChrName: ヴァリスとかいう国のミラ・ゲームに父上が 乗ってしまったから少々ややこしくてね……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァリスとかいう国のミラ・ゲームに父上が
乗ってしまったから少々ややこしくてね……

engChrName: Gah, I am so nervous now. I was feeling weirdly optimistic yesterday, but not anymore!
engSearchText:
Gah, I am so nervous now. I was feeling weirdly
optimistic yesterday, but not anymore!
jpnChrName: うう……やっぱり緊張してきた。 昨日は妙に楽観してたのに……
jpnSearchText:
うう……やっぱり緊張してきた。
昨日は妙に楽観してたのに……

engChrName: Probably because it's the big day. I don't know how I was able to relax around the hotel yesterday like it was nothing.
engSearchText:
Probably because it's the big day. I don't know how I
was able to relax around the hotel yesterday like it
was nothing.
jpnChrName: やっぱり当日になったからなのかな……ホテルで リラックスできていたのが嘘みたいよ……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり当日になったからなのかな……ホテルで
リラックスできていたのが嘘みたいよ……

engChrName: Oh, well. It is what it is. Now it's up to me to be strong and get out there into the festival!
engSearchText:
Oh, well. It is what it is. Now it's up to me to be
strong and get out there into the festival!
jpnChrName: 何とかして自分の力で、映画祭の舞台を 乗り切らなくっちゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
何とかして自分の力で、映画祭の舞台を
乗り切らなくっちゃ……！

engChrName: Mr. Gotti's whole 'scintillating spectacle' philosophy might look like mindless fluff, but he actually puts a lot of thought into his work.
engSearchText:
Mr. Gotti's whole 'scintillating spectacle' philosophy
might look like mindless fluff, but he actually puts a
lot of thought into his work.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督の『セクシー＆スペクタクル』って 単純なように見えて拘りが凄いのよね。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督の『セクシー＆スペクタクル』って
単純なように見えて拘りが凄いのよね。

engChrName: I was the actress who played the researcher that faints first thing in his movie 'Golden Blood.'
engSearchText:
I was the actress who played the researcher that faints
first thing in his movie 'Golden Blood.'
jpnChrName: 私も《ゴールデンブラッド》で真っ先に気絶 させられる女性研究員を演じていたけど……
jpnSearchText:
私も《ゴールデンブラッド》で真っ先に気絶
させられる女性研究員を演じていたけど……

engChrName: He was extremely particular about how exposing my lab coat should be, how my legs should be crossed, even the mussiness of my hair.
engSearchText:
He was extremely particular about how exposing my
lab coat should be, how my legs should be crossed,
even the mussiness of my hair.
jpnChrName: 白衣のはだけ具合やら、脚の絡み方やら、 髪の乱れっぷりまで細かく注文されてさー。
jpnSearchText:
白衣のはだけ具合やら、脚の絡み方やら、
髪の乱れっぷりまで細かく注文されてさー。

engChrName: Although...I gotta admit, having him barking orders at me and posing while I was lying on the floor was more than a little awkward.
engSearchText:
Although...I gotta admit, having him barking orders
at me and posing while I was lying on the floor was
more than a little awkward.
jpnChrName: ……正直、倒れている傍で直接色々言われながら 体勢変えるのは大分恥ずかしかったわ。
jpnSearchText:
……正直、倒れている傍で直接色々言われながら
体勢変えるのは大分恥ずかしかったわ。

engChrName: Nina is so awesome. It's amazing how hard she can get into her roles.
engSearchText:
Nina is so awesome. It's amazing how hard she can
get into her roles.
jpnChrName: やっぱりニナさんは凄いわよねぇ、 本当に役になり切るというか……
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりニナさんは凄いわよねぇ、
本当に役になり切るというか……

engChrName: I played a supporting role with her in 'Wolves' Requiem.'
engSearchText:
I played a supporting role with her in
'Wolves' Requiem.'
jpnChrName: 《狼達の鎮魂歌》では一応、 脇役で共演していたのだけど……
jpnSearchText:
《狼達の鎮魂歌》では一応、
脇役で共演していたのだけど……

engChrName: I'm telling you, it was like her character, Michelle, was really alive and standing right next to me the entire time!
engSearchText:
I'm telling you, it was like her character, Michelle,
was really alive and standing right next to me the
entire time!
jpnChrName: “ミシェル”っていう一人の女性が、 まさに隣にいるって感じがしたもの！
jpnSearchText:
“ミシェル”っていう一人の女性が、
まさに隣にいるって感じがしたもの！

engChrName: You probably know, but Nina plays Sheena Dirke in the upcoming movie 'Gloria.'
engSearchText:
You probably know, but Nina plays Sheena Dirke in
the upcoming movie 'Gloria.'
jpnChrName: ニナさん、今度上映される《ＧＬＯＲＩＡ》では あのシーナ・ディルクを演じたのよね……
jpnSearchText:
ニナさん、今度上映される《ＧＬＯＲＩＡ》では
あのシーナ・ディルクを演じたのよね……

engChrName: She made a real stir in the film industry, being able to play such a prominent white figure so naturally despite being half-Eastern.
engSearchText:
She made a real stir in the film industry, being able to
play such a prominent white figure so naturally
despite being half-Eastern.
jpnChrName: 白人だったシーナにさえ、ニナさんは 自然になり切っているって業界でも話題だわ。
jpnSearchText:
白人だったシーナにさえ、ニナさんは
自然になり切っているって業界でも話題だわ。

engChrName: If she can pull off something as tricky as that, who knows how much potential she has? Seriously, it's nuts!
engSearchText:
If she can pull off something as tricky as that, who
knows how much potential she has? Seriously,
it's nuts!
jpnChrName: 何というか、ニナさんの他人になる力って…… 相当な可能性を秘めているのでしょうね……
jpnSearchText:
何というか、ニナさんの他人になる力って……
相当な可能性を秘めているのでしょうね……

engChrName: I never imagined a second-rate actress like me would ever get to stay in such a fancy hotel...
engSearchText:
I never imagined a second-rate actress like me would
ever get to stay in such a fancy hotel...
jpnChrName: まさか私みたいな二流の女優でも こんなホテルに泊まれるなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさか私みたいな二流の女優でも
こんなホテルに泊まれるなんて……

engChrName: I've been to other film festivals before, but never got to hang out in anything like this. I mean, JUDITH LANSTER is here!
engSearchText:
I've been to other film festivals before, but never got
to hang out in anything like this. I mean, JUDITH
LANSTER is here!
jpnChrName: 前の映画祭では考えられなかったわ…… あのジュディス・ランスターと同じホテルなんて！
jpnSearchText:
前の映画祭では考えられなかったわ……
あのジュディス・ランスターと同じホテルなんて！

engChrName: Sounds like there are plenty of other A-listers here, too. Maybe if I'm lucky, I can get some pointers from them. That would be great!
engSearchText:
Sounds like there are plenty of other A-listers
here, too. Maybe if I'm lucky, I can get some pointers
from them. That would be great!
jpnChrName: 聞けば他にも一流の役者も泊まっているらしいし、 これを機に振る舞いとか色々参考にできないかな……
jpnSearchText:
聞けば他にも一流の役者も泊まっているらしいし、
これを機に振る舞いとか色々参考にできないかな……

engChrName: I wonder if anyone like Lapharl Aznavour is staying at this place? Hmm...
engSearchText:
I wonder if anyone like Lapharl Aznavour is staying
at this place? Hmm...
jpnChrName: 男優のアズナヴールさんとかは ここに泊まっていないのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
男優のアズナヴールさんとかは
ここに泊まっていないのかしら？

engChrName: Don't be shy! Step right up! You're gonna love what I have for sale!
engSearchText:
Don't be shy! Step right up! You're gonna love what I
have for sale!
jpnChrName: さあさあ、見て行ってくれよ！
jpnSearchText: さあさあ、見て行ってくれよ！

engChrName: Better act fast, though! I'm only getting more customers! This stall's as popular as ever!
engSearchText:
Better act fast, though! I'm only getting
more customers! This stall's as popular as ever!
jpnChrName: 人もますます増えてるしな。 かき入れ時だぜ！
jpnSearchText:
人もますます増えてるしな。
かき入れ時だぜ！

engChrName: Shit! Wait, you guys aren't—
engSearchText: Shit! Wait, you guys aren't—
jpnChrName: おっ、もしかしてアンタ達は！？
jpnSearchText: おっ、もしかしてアンタ達は！？

engChrName: Hmm? We aren't what?
engSearchText: Hmm? We aren't what?
jpnChrName: えっ？　な、何でしょうか？
jpnSearchText: えっ？　な、何でしょうか？

engChrName: N-Never mind. Looks like I was mistaken.
engSearchText: N-Never mind. Looks like I was mistaken.
jpnChrName: いや……悪いな。 人違いだったみてえだ。
jpnSearchText:
いや……悪いな。
人違いだったみてえだ。

engChrName: Heh, the more I think about it, there's no way a cutie like you would be one of THEM anyway.
engSearchText:
Heh, the more I think about it, there's no way a cutie
like you would be one of THEM anyway.
jpnChrName: よく考えたら、こんな可愛いらしいお嬢さんが アレの人な訳がねえもんな……
jpnSearchText:
よく考えたら、こんな可愛いらしいお嬢さんが
アレの人な訳がねえもんな……

engChrName: What do you mean, 'one of them'?
engSearchText: What do you mean, 'one of them'?
jpnChrName: アレって何でしょうか……？
jpnSearchText: アレって何でしょうか……？

engChrName: (I think I might know what he means. Might wanna check the bulletin board for any new jobs.)
engSearchText:
(I think I might know what he means. Might wanna
check the bulletin board for any new jobs.)
jpnChrName: （まさかとは思うが……   念の為、見てねえ掲示板を確認しとくか。）
jpnSearchText:
（まさかとは思うが……
念の為、見てねえ掲示板を確認しとくか。）

engChrName: Maybe it's just me, but I swear I keep seeing cops around more often than usual.
engSearchText:
Maybe it's just me, but I swear I keep seeing cops
around more often than usual.
jpnChrName: 最近、普段よりも警察を よく見かける気がするんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
最近、普段よりも警察を
よく見かける気がするんだよな。

engChrName: That probably won't make your guys' job of finding the right one any easier, but please, you've gotta help me!
engSearchText:
That probably won't make your guys' job of finding
the right one any easier, but please, you've gotta
help me!
jpnChrName: こんな状況じゃ例の警官を捜すのも大変だろうが、 どうかよろしく頼むぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
こんな状況じゃ例の警官を捜すのも大変だろうが、
どうかよろしく頼むぜ……！

engChrName: *sigh* Anyway, back to work, I suppose. This stuff ain't gonna sell itself.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Anyway, back to work, I suppose. This stuff
ain't gonna sell itself.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、それじゃ気を取り直して 商売に戻るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ、それじゃ気を取り直して
商売に戻るとするか。

engChrName: I really don't want nothing to do with any cops, so I intend to just stay low as best I can while I keep doing my thing.
engSearchText:
I really don't want nothing to do with any cops, so I
intend to just stay low as best I can while I keep doing
my thing.
jpnChrName: 本当に警察の世話になっちまわねえよう 気を付けつつやらせてもらうとするさ。
jpnSearchText:
本当に警察の世話になっちまわねえよう
気を付けつつやらせてもらうとするさ。

engChrName: People were speculating they might have to cancel the parade after what happened, but nope, sounds like that won't be the case!
engSearchText:
People were speculating they might have to cancel the
parade after what happened, but nope, sounds like
that won't be the case!
jpnChrName: パレードが中止になるんじゃないかって 噂もあったけど、無事に開催するみたいだね～。
jpnSearchText:
パレードが中止になるんじゃないかって
噂もあったけど、無事に開催するみたいだね～。

engChrName: I won't complain. It's been nothing but bad news lately, so you can bet I'll be out there, living it up and enjoying today to the fullest!
engSearchText:
I won't complain. It's been nothing but bad news
lately, so you can bet I'll be out there, living it up and
enjoying today to the fullest!
jpnChrName: 最近悪いニュースばっかりだったけど 今日はパーッと楽しまないと損でしょ！
jpnSearchText:
最近悪いニュースばっかりだったけど
今日はパーッと楽しまないと損でしょ！

engChrName: I've been working so hard getting ready for today, too.
engSearchText:
I've been working so hard getting ready for
today, too.
jpnChrName: アタシも今日に向けて コンディション整えて来たし……
jpnSearchText:
アタシも今日に向けて
コンディション整えて来たし……

engChrName: Once I'm done smoking this, I'm going to head off and prep for the parade!
engSearchText:
Once I'm done smoking this, I'm going to head off
and prep for the parade!
jpnChrName: これ吸い終わったら パレードの準備しに行ってこよっと！
jpnSearchText:
これ吸い終わったら
パレードの準備しに行ってこよっと！

engChrName: Everybody in the club was completely freaking out about those orbal hookahs turning out to be so terrible.
engSearchText:
Everybody in the club was completely freaking out
about those orbal hookahs turning out to be
so terrible.
jpnChrName: 導力シーシャがヤバいって事で ウチのクラブも大騒ぎだったんだよ～！
jpnSearchText:
導力シーシャがヤバいって事で
ウチのクラブも大騒ぎだったんだよ～！

engChrName: Especially the popular girls. I guess they had spendy regulars who liked to indulge in the stuff.
engSearchText:
Especially the popular girls. I guess they had spendy
regulars who liked to indulge in the stuff.
jpnChrName: 人気のダンサーの子も、常連の太客も 例のシーシャを吸ってたみたいでさぁ。
jpnSearchText:
人気のダンサーの子も、常連の太客も
例のシーシャを吸ってたみたいでさぁ。

engChrName: I've always been the type to just stick to my one favorite flavor, and this time it saved my hide!
engSearchText:
I've always been the type to just stick to my one
favorite flavor, and this time it saved my hide!
jpnChrName: アタシはお気に入りのフレーバーばっかり 吸う派だから巻き込まれなくて良かったよ～！
jpnSearchText:
アタシはお気に入りのフレーバーばっかり
吸う派だから巻き込まれなくて良かったよ～！

engChrName: Last thing I needed is my skin going bad on me, the day before the big parade!
engSearchText:
Last thing I needed is my skin going bad on me, the
day before the big parade!
jpnChrName: 明日はフォクシーパレードがあるっていうのに 薬物で肌の調子が悪くなるとかゼッタイ嫌だしね！
jpnSearchText:
明日はフォクシーパレードがあるっていうのに
薬物で肌の調子が悪くなるとかゼッタイ嫌だしね！

engChrName: I can't believe I get to have Mr. Gotti himself watch me dance! You can't make these things up!
engSearchText:
I can't believe I get to have Mr. Gotti himself watch
me dance! You can't make these things up!
jpnChrName: まさかアタシのダンスを ゴッチ監督に見てもらえる日が来るなんてね～！
jpnSearchText:
まさかアタシのダンスを
ゴッチ監督に見てもらえる日が来るなんてね～！

engChrName: Pole dancing is my forte, and you can be sure I'll be busting my butt to knock a guy like him off his feet!
engSearchText:
Pole dancing is my forte, and you can be sure I'll be
busting my butt to knock a guy like him off his feet!
jpnChrName: 得意のポールダンスじゃないけど、 監督をあっと言わせてみせちゃうから！
jpnSearchText:
得意のポールダンスじゃないけど、
監督をあっと言わせてみせちゃうから！

engChrName: I decided to come over to work 'cause I was feeling bored at home, so imagine my luck!
engSearchText:
I decided to come over to work 'cause I was feeling
bored at home, so imagine my luck!
jpnChrName: 家にいても退屈だから店に来たんだけど、 アタシってばツイてるんじゃない！？
jpnSearchText:
家にいても退屈だから店に来たんだけど、
アタシってばツイてるんじゃない！？

engChrName: It's an honor just to get to meet Mr. Gotti, but to be invited to work in his parade? Wow!
engSearchText:
It's an honor just to get to meet Mr. Gotti, but to be
invited to work in his parade? Wow!
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督に会えるだけでも感激なのに、 パレードにも出させてもらえるなんてね～！
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督に会えるだけでも感激なのに、
パレードにも出させてもらえるなんてね～！

engChrName: I've gotta redo my makeup! This is serious now!
engSearchText: I've gotta redo my makeup! This is serious now!
jpnChrName: 気合入れて化粧直しちゃおうっと！
jpnSearchText: 気合入れて化粧直しちゃおうっと！

engChrName: My lost camel is somewhere out in the Sandsea.
engSearchText: My lost camel is somewhere out in the Sandsea.
jpnChrName: はぐれたラクダは陽炎砂丘の どこかにいるはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
はぐれたラクダは陽炎砂丘の
どこかにいるはずだ。

engChrName: It's not just its safety I'm worried about. It's carrying valuable goods, too. I'm worried what could happen to them.
engSearchText:
It's not just its safety I'm worried about. It's carrying
valuable goods, too. I'm worried what could happen
to them.
jpnChrName: ラクダの身の危険は勿論だが、 積んでいる果物の事も気がかりだ……
jpnSearchText:
ラクダの身の危険は勿論だが、
積んでいる果物の事も気がかりだ……

engChrName: I really hate to impose, but I hope you can bring it back! I don't know what I'll do without it!
engSearchText:
I really hate to impose, but I hope you can bring
it back! I don't know what I'll do without it!
jpnChrName: 世話をかけてすまないが、 どうか連れ戻してきてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
世話をかけてすまないが、
どうか連れ戻してきてくれ！

engChrName: Listen! Judith Lanster and Nina Fenly! Those two ladies are a must, you hear me?!
engSearchText:
Listen! Judith Lanster and Nina Fenly! Those two
ladies are a must, you hear me?!
jpnChrName: ──いいか、ジュディス・ランスターに ニナ・フェンリィ！　この２人はマストだ！
jpnSearchText:
──いいか、ジュディス・ランスターに
ニナ・フェンリィ！　この２人はマストだ！

engChrName: The guys, you can hire any old schmucks for! Just do what it takes to get those two on board!
engSearchText:
The guys, you can hire any old schmucks for! Just do
what it takes to get those two on board!
jpnChrName: この際、男どもなんぞ適当でいい！ 何があっても絶対に確保するんじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
この際、男どもなんぞ適当でいい！
何があっても絶対に確保するんじゃ！

engChrName: B-But, sir...
engSearchText: B-But, sir...
jpnChrName: で、ですが監督……
jpnSearchText: で、ですが監督……

engChrName: You're talking about two of the biggest stars in the business! There's no way we could book one of them, let alone BOTH!
engSearchText:
You're talking about two of the biggest stars in
the business! There's no way we could book one of
them, let alone BOTH!
jpnChrName: 今をときめくトップスター２人を 同時に押さえるなんて無茶ですよ～！
jpnSearchText:
今をときめくトップスター２人を
同時に押さえるなんて無茶ですよ～！

engChrName: You can and you will! You're a pro, aren'cha? Act like one!
engSearchText:
You can and you will! You're a pro, aren'cha?
Act like one!
jpnChrName: それを何とかやり遂げるのが プロの仕事というもんじゃろうが！
jpnSearchText:
それを何とかやり遂げるのが
プロの仕事というもんじゃろうが！

engChrName: Screw the budget and set the schedule on fire if you have to! As long as we've got Judith and Nina, we can sort it all out later.
engSearchText:
Screw the budget and set the schedule on fire if you
have to! As long as we've got Judith and Nina, we can
sort it all out later.
jpnChrName: 予算だのスケジュールだの 細かい事は後から考えればいい！
jpnSearchText:
予算だのスケジュールだの
細かい事は後から考えればいい！

engChrName: If anything goes awry, I'll take full responsibility! So don't you worry about a thing—just go out there and get it done!
engSearchText:
If anything goes awry, I'll take full responsibility!
So don't you worry about a thing—just go out there
and get it done!
jpnChrName: 心配せずとも責任はワシが全部持つ！ 諸君は遠慮なく動いてくれたまえっ！
jpnSearchText:
心配せずとも責任はワシが全部持つ！
諸君は遠慮なく動いてくれたまえっ！

engChrName: Sir, I don't think a can-do attitude is going to cut it for this!
engSearchText:
Sir, I don't think a can-do attitude is going to cut it
for this!
jpnChrName: え、遠慮なくとかそういう問題じゃ ないんですってば～！
jpnSearchText:
え、遠慮なくとかそういう問題じゃ
ないんですってば～！

engChrName: Well...someone's as passionate as ever.
engSearchText: Well...someone's as passionate as ever.
jpnChrName: ──いやぁ、 白熱していらっしゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
──いやぁ、
白熱していらっしゃいますね。

engChrName: Ah! Prince Sherid! Fancy seeing you here!
engSearchText: Ah! Prince Sherid! Fancy seeing you here!
jpnChrName: おお、シェリド殿下！ よくいらっしゃいましたな！
jpnSearchText:
おお、シェリド殿下！
よくいらっしゃいましたな！

engChrName: Clearly, I brought on the right man for the job.
engSearchText: Clearly, I brought on the right man for the job.
jpnChrName: フフ、やはり貴方に頼んで正解でした。
jpnSearchText: フフ、やはり貴方に頼んで正解でした。

engChrName: I can already tell that this film festival of ours is going to be one for the history books.
engSearchText:
I can already tell that this film festival of ours is going
to be one for the history books.
jpnChrName: 此度の映画祭は間違いなく 素晴らしいものになってくれるでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
此度の映画祭は間違いなく
素晴らしいものになってくれるでしょう。

engChrName: And not just the festival itself. The parade seems to be shaping up to be even more exciting than I imagined.
engSearchText:
And not just the festival itself. The parade seems to
be shaping up to be even more exciting than
I imagined.
jpnChrName: 映画祭も勿論、例のパレードについても 想像以上に盛り上がりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭も勿論、例のパレードについても
想像以上に盛り上がりそうだ。

engChrName: Bwahaha! Your event's in good hands, Your Highness!
engSearchText:
Bwahaha! Your event's in good hands,
Your Highness!
jpnChrName: ムハハハッ、どちらも心配ご無用っ！
jpnSearchText: ムハハハッ、どちらも心配ご無用っ！

engChrName: I'll make this film festival hotter than anything they ever put on in Messeldam if it's the last thing I do!
engSearchText:
I'll make this film festival hotter than anything they
ever put on in Messeldam if it's the last thing I do!
jpnChrName: 必ずやメッセルダム以上に 白熱する映画祭にしてみせますとも！
jpnSearchText:
必ずやメッセルダム以上に
白熱する映画祭にしてみせますとも！

engChrName: People don't want pomp and circumstance! They won't touch that crap with a ten-arge pole!
engSearchText:
People don't want pomp and circumstance!
They won't touch that crap with a ten-arge pole!
jpnChrName: 大衆は格調だの芸術性なんぞ、 一リジュたりとも求めてませんからなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
大衆は格調だの芸術性なんぞ、
一リジュたりとも求めてませんからなぁ！

engChrName: No, what matters in movies is entertainment! I'm talking FnV: F***ing 'n' Violence, baby!
engSearchText:
No, what matters in movies is entertainment!
I'm talking FnV: F***ing 'n' Violence, baby!
jpnChrName: 映画で大切なのはエンターテイメント性、 何よりもセッ××＆バイオレンス！！
jpnSearchText:
映画で大切なのはエンターテイメント性、
何よりもセッ××＆バイオレンス！！

engChrName: Director, I believe it would be more appropriate to call it a 'scintillating spectacle', yes?
engSearchText:
Director, I believe it would be more appropriate to
call it a 'scintillating spectacle', yes?
jpnChrName: 監督監督、そこは 『セクシー＆スペクタクル』なのでは？
jpnSearchText:
監督監督、そこは
『セクシー＆スペクタクル』なのでは？

engChrName: Whoops! Slip of the tongue! Gahahaha!
engSearchText:
Whoops! Slip of the tongue!
Gahahaha!
jpnChrName: おっとこりゃ失礼── ワッハッハッハッハッ！！
jpnSearchText:
おっとこりゃ失礼──
ワッハッハッハッハッ！！

engChrName: Hahahaha!
engSearchText: Hahahaha!
jpnChrName: ハッハッハッハッ！
jpnSearchText: ハッハッハッハッ！

engChrName: ...Your Highness, please, restrain yourself.
engSearchText: ...Your Highness, please, restrain yourself.
jpnChrName: ……殿下、ご自重ください。
jpnSearchText: ……殿下、ご自重ください。

engChrName: Ah, speaking of which! My dear Naje, I don't suppose I could persuade you to take part in our humble parade, could I?
engSearchText:
Ah, speaking of which! My dear Naje, I don't
suppose I could persuade you to take part in our
humble parade, could I?
jpnChrName: おお、そういえばナージェ嬢にもパレードに 参加してもらうのはアリですかな？
jpnSearchText:
おお、そういえばナージェ嬢にもパレードに
参加してもらうのはアリですかな？

engChrName: Your talent is otherworldly! It'd be a waste not to put it to good use!
engSearchText:
Your talent is otherworldly! It'd be a waste not to put
it to good use!
jpnChrName: これだけの逸材、活かさないのも勿体ない！
jpnSearchText: これだけの逸材、活かさないのも勿体ない！

engChrName: Yes, that it would be. What say you, Naje? If you wish, you may—
engSearchText:
Yes, that it would be. What say you, Naje? If you
wish, you may—
jpnChrName: ふむ……それは確かに！ どうだろうナージェ、君さえ良ければ──
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……それは確かに！
どうだろうナージェ、君さえ良ければ──

engChrName: My prince, if you get carried away, I won't hesitate to report you to your sister.
engSearchText:
My prince, if you get carried away, I won't hesitate to
report you to your sister.
jpnChrName: 殿下──お戯れが過ぎると 妹君にご報告しますよ……？
jpnSearchText:
殿下──お戯れが過ぎると
妹君にご報告しますよ……？

engChrName: Ah, well, that won't be necessary! It was a jest, I assure you!
engSearchText:
Ah, well, that won't be necessary! It was a jest, I
assure you!
jpnChrName: い、嫌だなぁ～。 もちろん冗談だともっ！
jpnSearchText:
い、嫌だなぁ～。
もちろん冗談だともっ！

engChrName: Isn't that so, Mr. Gotti? Now, about the other candidates...
engSearchText:
Isn't that so, Mr. Gotti? Now, about the
other candidates...
jpnChrName: ──そうそう、監督。 それ以外の“候補”についてですが……
jpnSearchText:
──そうそう、監督。
それ以外の“候補”についてですが……

engChrName: Give me a break. Just how long will those two keep up that nonsense?
engSearchText:
Give me a break. Just how long will those two keep
up that nonsense?
jpnChrName: まったく…… いつまで下らん事をグチグチと。
jpnSearchText:
まったく……
いつまで下らん事をグチグチと。

engChrName: Gotti's popularity makes him a useful asset, but he and that prince are nearly impossible to control.
engSearchText:
Gotti's popularity makes him a useful asset, but he
and that prince are nearly impossible to control.
jpnChrName: 売れっ子だから使っているが 公太子共々扱いにくい事この上ない。
jpnSearchText:
売れっ子だから使っているが
公太子共々扱いにくい事この上ない。

engChrName: Oh, well. The film festival has made it this far. Might as well use it to expand our market share and—
engSearchText:
Oh, well. The film festival has made it this far.
Might as well use it to expand our market share
and—
jpnChrName: まあいい、折角ここまで来た映画祭だ。 これを機に更なるシェア拡大を──
jpnSearchText:
まあいい、折角ここまで来た映画祭だ。
これを機に更なるシェア拡大を──
ッ……！？

engChrName: Of all the times, why now?!
engSearchText: Of all the times, why now?!
jpnChrName: こ、こんな時期にどうして……
jpnSearchText: こ、こんな時期にどうして……

engChrName: October 5th, 8:02AM
engSearchText: October 5th, 8:02AM

engChrName: Wow! A waterfall in the middle of town?!
engSearchText: Wow! A waterfall in the middle of town?!
jpnChrName: わぁ、街の中に滝が……！？
jpnSearchText: わぁ、街の中に滝が……！？

engChrName: Pretty wild, right? Apparently, the water's pumped in straight from the oasis.
engSearchText:
Pretty wild, right? Apparently, the water's pumped in
straight from the oasis.
jpnChrName: えへへ、驚きますよね。 オアシス湖から汲み上げてるそうです。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、驚きますよね。
オアシス湖から汲み上げてるそうです。

engChrName: Looks like a lot of tourists running around here. Anyway, where am I parking this bad boy?
engSearchText:
Looks like a lot of tourists running around here.
Anyway, where am I parking this bad boy?
jpnChrName: 観光客も多そうだな…… で、どこに停めりゃいいんだ？
jpnSearchText:
観光客も多そうだな……
で、どこに停めりゃいいんだ？

engChrName: *yawn* Take a right 'n' pull into the big parking lot. I got us a spot booked there.
engSearchText:
*yawn* Take a right 'n' pull into the big parking lot.
I got us a spot booked there.
jpnChrName: ふわ～あ……右手にデカい駐車場がある、 押さえてるからそっちに回せ。
jpnSearchText:
ふわ～あ……右手にデカい駐車場がある、
押さえてるからそっちに回せ。

engChrName: Will do!
engSearchText: Will do!
jpnChrName: おう。
jpnSearchText: おう。

engChrName: Nnngh... Here at last.
engSearchText: Nnngh... Here at last.
jpnChrName: ん～～～～っ…… ようやく着いたか。
jpnSearchText:
ん～～～～っ……
ようやく着いたか。

engChrName: Van, are you going to be all right? You only slept for an hour.
engSearchText:
Van, are you going to be all right? You only slept for
an hour.
jpnChrName: 一時間くらいしか休んでませんが 大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText:
一時間くらいしか休んでませんが
大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: Ehh, I'll manage. Used to it at this point.
engSearchText: Ehh, I'll manage. Used to it at this point.
jpnChrName: あー、大丈夫だ、慣れてるしな。
jpnSearchText: あー、大丈夫だ、慣れてるしな。

engChrName: You can sure tell we're in the desert, though. Barely morning and it's already hotter than Gehenna.
engSearchText:
You can sure tell we're in the desert, though.
Barely morning and it's already hotter than Gehenna.
jpnChrName: しかしまだ朝方だっつうのに暑ィな…… さすが砂漠地帯だぜ。
jpnSearchText:
しかしまだ朝方だっつうのに暑ィな……
さすが砂漠地帯だぜ。

engChrName: It's only gonna get hotter throughout the day, too. And then nighttime hits and the temperature crashes like a bus.
engSearchText:
It's only gonna get hotter throughout the day, too.
And then nighttime hits and the temperature crashes
like a bus.
jpnChrName: 昼にかけてもっと暑くなるかと。 逆に夜は寒いくらいですけど。
jpnSearchText:
昼にかけてもっと暑くなるかと。
逆に夜は寒いくらいですけど。

engChrName: We're meeting our client at noon, yeah? What say we cool off at the casino?
engSearchText:
We're meeting our client at noon, yeah? What say we
cool off at the casino?
jpnChrName: 依頼人との待ち合わせは正午だったか。 それまでカジノあたりで涼むかよ？
jpnSearchText:
依頼人との待ち合わせは正午だったか。
それまでカジノあたりで涼むかよ？

engChrName: Yeah, in your dreams, kid. We need to check in to the inn first.
engSearchText:
Yeah, in your dreams, kid. We need to check in to
the inn first.
jpnChrName: 行くわけねーだろ…… まずは宿にチェックインだ。
jpnSearchText:
行くわけねーだろ……
まずは宿にチェックインだ。

engChrName: Once we drop off our luggage, it'll be time for us to limber up.
engSearchText:
Once we drop off our luggage, it'll be time for us to
limber up.
jpnChrName: 荷物を置いたら午前中は “肩慣らし”に当てるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
荷物を置いたら午前中は
“肩慣らし”に当てるぞ。

engChrName: The place we're staying at is in the Cultural District, right?
engSearchText:
The place we're staying at is in the Cultural
District, right?
jpnChrName: 予約してもらったのは “伝統地区”の宿でしたよね？
jpnSearchText:
予約してもらったのは
“伝統地区”の宿でしたよね？

engChrName: Yeah. If memory serves, it should be...
engSearchText: Yeah. If memory serves, it should be...
jpnChrName: ああ、ここからだと……
jpnSearchText: ああ、ここからだと……

engChrName: We want to go that way, then!
engSearchText: We want to go that way, then!
jpnChrName: あちらの方向がそうですね！
jpnSearchText: あちらの方向がそうですね！

engChrName: Then what're we waiting for? Let's get to it.
engSearchText: Then what're we waiting for? Let's get to it.
jpnChrName: うし、そんじゃあ行くか！
jpnSearchText: うし、そんじゃあ行くか！

engChrName: This looks like the Entertainment District. It's still pretty new. I think it opened only a decade or so ago.
engSearchText:
This looks like the Entertainment District. It's still
pretty new. I think it opened only a decade or so ago.
jpnChrName: こちらがここ１０年ほどで 新たに開かれたという歓楽街……
jpnSearchText:
こちらがここ１０年ほどで
新たに開かれたという歓楽街……

engChrName: It certainly is bustling.
engSearchText: It certainly is bustling.
jpnChrName: さすがに賑わっていますね。
jpnSearchText: さすがに賑わっていますね。

engChrName: For real! Last time I was here, there weren't this many people.
engSearchText:
For real! Last time I was here, there weren't this
many people.
jpnChrName: はい、前に来た時はここまでじゃ なかった気が……！
jpnSearchText:
はい、前に来た時はここまでじゃ
なかった気が……！

engChrName: Ain't just Calvardian tourists, either. Lots of folks comin' in from the Central East, by the look of it.
engSearchText:
Ain't just Calvardian tourists, either. Lots of folks
comin' in from the Central East, by the look of it.
jpnChrName: それこそ国内はもちろん、 中東方面からも大勢来てそうだしな。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ国内はもちろん、
中東方面からも大勢来てそうだしな。

engChrName: This festival's shapin' up to be even bigger than Messeldam's—'specially with that parade they're puttin' on.
engSearchText:
This festival's shapin' up to be even bigger than
Messeldam's—'specially with that parade they're
puttin' on.
jpnChrName: “パレード”なんかもやるみたいだし メッセルダム以上に盛り上がりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
“パレード”なんかもやるみたいだし
メッセルダム以上に盛り上がりそうだ。

engChrName: Yeah! I'm excited!
engSearchText: Yeah! I'm excited!
jpnChrName: えへへ、楽しみですねっ。
jpnSearchText: えへへ、楽しみですねっ。

engChrName: Look, I got nothing against a good festival or parade. But if you ask me, the real excitement's in that casino, so—
engSearchText:
Look, I got nothing against a good festival or parade.
But if you ask me, the real excitement's in that casino,
so—
jpnChrName: お祭り騒ぎは嫌いじゃねえぜ。 ──さて、そんじゃあカジノに……
jpnSearchText:
お祭り騒ぎは嫌いじゃねえぜ。
──さて、そんじゃあカジノに……

engChrName: We're not going gambling, punk. Not like we've got that much time to kill, anyway.
engSearchText:
We're not going gambling, punk. Not like we've got
that much time to kill, anyway.
jpnChrName: だから行かねえっつの。 さすがにそこまでの時間はねぇよ。
jpnSearchText:
だから行かねえっつの。
さすがにそこまでの時間はねぇよ。

engChrName: Let's make our way to the hotel. After that, we can walk around and do some shopping.
engSearchText:
Let's make our way to the hotel. After that, we can
walk around and do some shopping.
jpnChrName: まずはホテルに向かいましょうか。 散策や買い物はその後ということで。
jpnSearchText:
まずはホテルに向かいましょうか。
散策や買い物はその後ということで。

engChrName: Tch. Nobody knows how to have fun around here.
engSearchText: Tch. Nobody knows how to have fun around here.
jpnChrName: チッ、真面目人間どもが。
jpnSearchText: チッ、真面目人間どもが。

engChrName: The Al-Jumeirah Hotel... Just looking at it is breathtaking.
engSearchText:
The Al-Jumeirah Hotel... Just looking at it
is breathtaking.
jpnChrName: 《アルジュメイラホテル》…… ……なんだか溜息が出ちゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
《アルジュメイラホテル》……
……なんだか溜息が出ちゃいますね。

engChrName: Tell me about it. Last time I was here, I only got to check out the observation deck!
engSearchText:
Tell me about it. Last time I was here, I only got to
check out the observation deck!
jpnChrName: はい、前の時は展望エリアに 入っただけでしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
はい、前の時は展望エリアに
入っただけでしたけど……

engChrName: This place screams celebrities and millionaires. Wouldn't mind staying here once, just to see what it's like.
engSearchText:
This place screams celebrities and millionaires.
Wouldn't mind staying here once, just to see what
it's like.
jpnChrName: セレブとミラ持ち御用達って感じだな。 一回くらい泊まってみたいもんだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
セレブとミラ持ち御用達って感じだな。
一回くらい泊まってみたいもんだぜ。

engChrName: Not on our budget. A night here can easily cost more than the office rent if we ain't careful.
engSearchText:
Not on our budget. A night here can easily cost more
than the office rent if we ain't careful.
jpnChrName: ……ちなみに下手すりゃ一泊で 事務所の賃料を軽く超えるからな？
jpnSearchText:
……ちなみに下手すりゃ一泊で
事務所の賃料を軽く超えるからな？

engChrName: I bet.
engSearchText: I bet.
jpnChrName: ハッ、だろうな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、だろうな。

engChrName: Is it seriously that much?
engSearchText: Is it seriously that much?
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか……
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか……

engChrName: It's definitely a place for those who have more money than they know what to do with.
engSearchText:
It's definitely a place for those who have more money
than they know what to do with.
jpnChrName: あはは、まあこういう 世界もあるということで。
jpnSearchText:
あはは、まあこういう
世界もあるということで。

engChrName: Hrrm! Welcome to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel.
engSearchText: Hrrm! Welcome to the Al-Jumeirah Hotel.
jpnChrName: ムウウン。 ようこそいらっしゃいました。
jpnSearchText:
ムウウン。
ようこそいらっしゃいました。

engChrName: I take it you're Van Arkride and his companions? We've been expecting you.
engSearchText:
I take it you're Van Arkride and his companions?
We've been expecting you.
jpnChrName: アークライド様ご一行ですね？ お待ちしておりました。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド様ご一行ですね？
お待ちしておりました。

engChrName: Our guest is waiting for you. Please, follow me.
engSearchText: Our guest is waiting for you. Please, follow me.
jpnChrName: お客様がお待ちです、どうぞこちらへ。
jpnSearchText: お客様がお待ちです、どうぞこちらへ。

engChrName: Okay, lead the way. (That was an unusual greeting...)
engSearchText:
Okay, lead the way.
(That was an unusual greeting...)
jpnChrName: あ、はい。 （最初の掛け声は……）
jpnSearchText:
あ、はい。
（最初の掛け声は……）

engChrName: Thanks. Glad you're already filled in. (Yeah, just ignore it and move on.)
engSearchText:
Thanks. Glad you're already filled in.
(Yeah, just ignore it and move on.)
jpnChrName: 話が早くて助かるぜ。 （ま、スルーしとけ。）
jpnSearchText:
話が早くて助かるぜ。
（ま、スルーしとけ。）

engChrName: Van and the others were taken to a guest room located in the hotel's upper echelons.
engSearchText:
Van and the others were taken to a guest room
located in the hotel's upper echelons.
jpnChrName: ヴァンたちはそのまま 高層階の客室に案内された。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンたちはそのまま
高層階の客室に案内された。

engChrName: Hey, everyone. Thanks for taking the time to come all the way out here.
engSearchText:
Hey, everyone. Thanks for taking the time to come
all the way out here.
jpnChrName: 皆さん── ようこそお越しくださいました。
jpnSearchText:
皆さん──
ようこそお越しくださいました。

engChrName: You must be exhausted after such a long drive.
engSearchText: You must be exhausted after such a long drive.
jpnChrName: 遠い所までお疲れだったでしょう？
jpnSearchText: 遠い所までお疲れだったでしょう？

engChrName: Nah. It's good to go on a road trip every once in a while.
engSearchText:
Nah. It's good to go on a road trip every once in
a while.
jpnChrName: ま、長距離ドライブも たまにはいいモンさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、長距離ドライブも
たまにはいいモンさ。

engChrName: Your trip must've been pretty tiring here, too. Did you take an airship from Edith to get here?
engSearchText:
Your trip must've been pretty tiring here, too.
Did you take an airship from Edith to get here?
jpnChrName: ニナさんもお疲れ様です。 首都から飛行船で来たんですね？
jpnSearchText:
ニナさんもお疲れ様です。
首都から飛行船で来たんですね？

engChrName: Mm-hmm! I only got here just a bit ago.
engSearchText: Mm-hmm! I only got here just a bit ago.
jpnChrName: はい、つい先ほど着いたところで。
jpnSearchText: はい、つい先ほど着いたところで。

engChrName: And I don't believe we've met yet, have we?
engSearchText: And I don't believe we've met yet, have we?
jpnChrName: そちらの貴女は初めまして、ですね？
jpnSearchText: そちらの貴女は初めまして、ですね？

engChrName: No, we haven't. It's nice to meet you! I'm Agnès Claudel. I work as Van's part-time assistant.
engSearchText:
No, we haven't. It's nice to meet you! I'm
Agnès Claudel. I work as Van's part-time assistant.
jpnChrName: 初めまして、アルバイトで助手の アニエス・クローデルといいます。
jpnSearchText:
初めまして、アルバイトで助手の
アニエス・クローデルといいます。

engChrName: It's a real honor to meet you, Nina! I loved 'Along the Sea Breeze.'
engSearchText:
It's a real honor to meet you, Nina! I loved 'Along the
Sea Breeze.'
jpnChrName: 『海風に乗って』が大好きで…… ニナさんにお会いできるなんて光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
『海風に乗って』が大好きで……
ニナさんにお会いできるなんて光栄です。

engChrName: Really? I'm flattered. That was my very first film, you know.
engSearchText:
Really? I'm flattered. That was my very first film,
you know.
jpnChrName: 私のデビュー作を…… ふふ、こちらこそ嬉しいです。
jpnSearchText:
私のデビュー作を……
ふふ、こちらこそ嬉しいです。

engChrName: Oh, I remember that one. Kinda plain, but the camera work was stellar. Real emotive stuff.
engSearchText:
Oh, I remember that one. Kinda plain, but the
camera work was stellar. Real emotive stuff.
jpnChrName: ああ、あのちょっと地味だが 叙情的なカメラが秀逸だったアレか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あのちょっと地味だが
叙情的なカメラが秀逸だったアレか。

engChrName: In a way, the fact that you never overpowered any scene you were in made you stand out even more. I liked it.
engSearchText:
In a way, the fact that you never overpowered any
scene you were in made you stand out even more.
I liked it.
jpnChrName: 主演のアンタの 透明な存在感も良かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
主演のアンタの
透明な存在感も良かったぜ。

engChrName: Oh, my! I never would've guessed you'd seen it, too, Van.
engSearchText:
Oh, my! I never would've guessed you'd seen it,
too, Van.
jpnChrName: ふふ……アークライドさんも 観ていてくださったんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……アークライドさんも
観ていてくださったんですね。

engChrName: Neither would I. Do you watch a lot of romantic movies, Van?
engSearchText:
Neither would I. Do you watch a lot of romantic
movies, Van?
jpnChrName: 意外です……ヴァンさんでも 恋愛映画とか観たりするんですね？
jpnSearchText:
意外です……ヴァンさんでも
恋愛映画とか観たりするんですね？

engChrName: Sure. I'll watch just about any kinda movie.
engSearchText: Sure. I'll watch just about any kinda movie.
jpnChrName: ああ、割と何でも観るぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、割と何でも観るぜ。

engChrName: There are romance movies? I wonder if you need to be older to watch them...
engSearchText:
There are romance movies? I wonder if you need to
be older to watch them...
jpnChrName: 恋愛映画…… ……ちょっと大人な感じです……
jpnSearchText:
恋愛映画……
……ちょっと大人な感じです……

engChrName: You're just full of surprises, huh? First I hear you've got a sweet tooth, and now this. Guess you're not as tough as you look.
engSearchText:
You're just full of surprises, huh? First I hear you've
got a sweet tooth, and now this. Guess you're not as
tough as you look.
jpnChrName: クク、スイーツといい 顔に似合わねえモン観てやがんな？
jpnSearchText:
クク、スイーツといい
顔に似合わねえモン観てやがんな？

engChrName: Aww, shut up! A guy can be tough and like whatever he wants!
engSearchText:
Aww, shut up! A guy can be tough and like whatever
he wants!
jpnChrName: 顔は関係ねーだろ、顔は！
jpnSearchText: 顔は関係ねーだろ、顔は！

engChrName: Hey, Nina! I'm coming in.
engSearchText: Hey, Nina! I'm coming in.
jpnChrName: ──ニナ、入るわよ？
jpnSearchText: ──ニナ、入るわよ？

engChrName: Heard some chatter in there. I'm guessing they're all here?
engSearchText:
Heard some chatter in there. I'm guessing they're
all here?
jpnChrName: なんか騒がしいけど、 もしかしてもう来てるの？
jpnSearchText:
なんか騒がしいけど、
もしかしてもう来てるの？

engChrName: I still don't understand what in the world...you...
engSearchText: I still don't understand what in the world...you...
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 話は聞いてるけど一体どういう──え。
jpnSearchText: 話は聞いてるけど一体どういう──え。

engChrName: Hi, Judith. Perfect timing.
engSearchText: Hi, Judith. Perfect timing.
jpnChrName: 先輩── ちょうど良いところに。
jpnSearchText:
先輩──
ちょうど良いところに。

engChrName: Err... Well...this is a surprise.
engSearchText: Err... Well...this is a surprise.
jpnChrName: お、驚きました……
jpnSearchText: お、驚きました……

engChrName: Hold the—is that THE Judith Lanster? In the flesh?!
engSearchText: Hold the—is that THE Judith Lanster? In the flesh?!
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、まさかの ジュディス・ランスターかよ！？
jpnSearchText:
ヒュウ、まさかの
ジュディス・ランスターかよ！？

engChrName: Y-You all are—
engSearchText: Y-You all are—
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: あ、貴方たちは………
jpnSearchText: あ、貴方たちは………

engChrName: We're with Arkride Solutions, ma'am. I'm Van Arkride, head honcho.
engSearchText:
We're with Arkride Solutions, ma'am. I'm Van
Arkride, head honcho.
jpnChrName: 『アークライド解決事務所』、 所長のヴァン・アークライドだ。
jpnSearchText:
『アークライド解決事務所』、
所長のヴァン・アークライドだ。

engChrName: You must be the other client Nina mentioned? Pleasure doing business with you.
engSearchText:
You must be the other client Nina mentioned?
Pleasure doing business with you.
jpnChrName: アンタが“共同依頼者”だな？ ──ま、宜しく頼むぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタが“共同依頼者”だな？
──ま、宜しく頼むぜ。

engChrName: ...That was a really amazing lunch. Thank you!
engSearchText: ...That was a really amazing lunch. Thank you!
jpnChrName: ──ご馳走さまでした。 本当に素晴らしかったです。
jpnSearchText:
──ご馳走さまでした。
本当に素晴らしかったです。

engChrName: First-class joint like this, you definitely get what you pay for.
engSearchText:
First-class joint like this, you definitely get what you
pay for.
jpnChrName: さすが最高級ホテル、 料理も絶品じゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
さすが最高級ホテル、
料理も絶品じゃねーか。

engChrName: I'm pretty new to all of this, but it sure was tasty, whatever it was!
engSearchText:
I'm pretty new to all of this, but it sure was tasty,
whatever it was!
jpnChrName: よく分かりませんけど どれもこれも美味しかったですっ。
jpnSearchText:
よく分かりませんけど
どれもこれも美味しかったですっ。

engChrName: So rich, and a great sweet aftertaste... The camel's milk in this is better than I could've imagined!
engSearchText:
So rich, and a great sweet aftertaste... The camel's
milk in this is better than I could've imagined!
jpnChrName: ……この濃厚さと甘さの余韻…… ラクダのミルク、想像以上だぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
……この濃厚さと甘さの余韻……
ラクダのミルク、想像以上だぜ……！

engChrName: And the flavor from that fresh cacao! It's a damn tragedy you can only get the stuff locally.
engSearchText:
And the flavor from that fresh cacao! It's a damn
tragedy you can only get the stuff locally.
jpnChrName: そして生カカオの風味…… 現地でしか流通してねぇらしいが……
jpnSearchText:
そして生カカオの風味……
現地でしか流通してねぇらしいが……

engChrName: We really are in a desert oasis. Hell, better than that! An actual Shangri-La!
engSearchText:
We really are in a desert oasis. Hell, better than that!
An actual Shangri-La!
jpnChrName: まさに砂漠の先に辿り着いたオアシス…… いや、楽園（シャングリラ）と言えようっ……！
jpnSearchText:
まさに砂漠の先に辿り着いたオアシス……
いや、楽園（シャングリラ）と言えようっ……！

engChrName: Give it a rest already, will you?
engSearchText: Give it a rest already, will you?
jpnChrName: ウザすぎんだろ……
jpnSearchText: ウザすぎんだろ……

engChrName: Don't mind him. You'll get used to it soon enough.
engSearchText: Don't mind him. You'll get used to it soon enough.
jpnChrName: ま、まあまあ。 そのうち慣れますから。
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあまあ。
そのうち慣れますから。

engChrName: I'm glad you like the cake so much! Judith and I are both big fans of it, too.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you like the cake so much! Judith and I are
both big fans of it, too.
jpnChrName: ふふ、私たちもお気に入りなので 気に入っていただけて嬉しいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、私たちもお気に入りなので
気に入っていただけて嬉しいですね。

engChrName: Actually, speaking of which, what's wrong, Judith? You've been so quiet.
engSearchText:
Actually, speaking of which, what's wrong, Judith?
You've been so quiet.
jpnChrName: って先輩……どうかしましたか？ いつもより静かなような。
jpnSearchText:
って先輩……どうかしましたか？
いつもより静かなような。

engChrName: You haven't eaten very much at all, either. You're not coming down with something, are you?
engSearchText:
You haven't eaten very much at all, either. You're not
coming down with something, are you?
jpnChrName: 食事もあまり進んでませんでしたし、 もしかして具合でも悪いんじゃ……？
jpnSearchText:
食事もあまり進んでませんでしたし、
もしかして具合でも悪いんじゃ……？

engChrName: What? No, I'm fine! Couldn't be better, in fact.
engSearchText: What? No, I'm fine! Couldn't be better, in fact.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ………へっ？ あ、ううん大丈夫、元気いっぱいよ。
jpnSearchText:
………へっ？
あ、ううん大丈夫、元気いっぱいよ。

engChrName: Never mind me. Now that lunch is over, let's get to the topic at hand.
engSearchText:
Never mind me. Now that lunch is over, let's get to
the topic at hand.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ──食事も済んだところで 改めて本題に入らせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
──食事も済んだところで
改めて本題に入らせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Nina has more or less filled me in on what's going on. I know of your work. Or, what you do as a spriggan, to be more precise.
engSearchText:
Nina has more or less filled me in on what's going on.
I know of your work. Or, what you do as a spriggan,
to be more precise.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ニナから大体の話は聞いてる── 解決事務所、いえ《裏解決屋》だったわね。
jpnSearchText:
ニナから大体の話は聞いてる──
解決事務所、いえ《裏解決屋》だったわね。

engChrName: Word's gotten around about you.
engSearchText: Word's gotten around about you.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: その筋では名前も通ってるそうだけど……
jpnSearchText: その筋では名前も通ってるそうだけど……

engChrName: But should we really be paying out of our pockets to ask you people to handle such an assignment?
engSearchText:
But should we really be paying out of our pockets to
ask you people to handle such an assignment?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: あたしたちがポケットマネーを出してまで “あの件”を頼む価値が本当にあるのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
あたしたちがポケットマネーを出してまで
“あの件”を頼む価値が本当にあるのかしら？

engChrName: Judith, are we really going to have this conversation again?
engSearchText:
Judith, are we really going to have this
conversation again?
jpnChrName: 先輩…… ここで蒸し返すんですか？
jpnSearchText:
先輩……
ここで蒸し返すんですか？

engChrName: Look, I'm not saying I doubt your intuition. But we have to consider our positions as celebrities!
engSearchText:
Look, I'm not saying I doubt your intuition. But we
have to consider our positions as celebrities!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: アンタの直感を疑うわけじゃないけど あたしたちの立場を忘れちゃダメよ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタの直感を疑うわけじゃないけど
あたしたちの立場を忘れちゃダメよ。

engChrName: That...Dingo Brad, was it? He seems trustworthy enough as a reporter, I'll grant that.
engSearchText:
That...Dingo Brad, was it? He seems trustworthy
enough as a reporter, I'll grant that.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ディンゴ・ブラッドだっけ？ あの記者はまあ信用できそうだけど。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴ・ブラッドだっけ？
あの記者はまあ信用できそうだけど。

engChrName: But if things go south, the scandal could be awful.
engSearchText: But if things go south, the scandal could be awful.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 下手したらもっとタチの悪い スキャンダルに繋がりかねないんだし。
jpnSearchText:
下手したらもっとタチの悪い
スキャンダルに繋がりかねないんだし。

engChrName: Sure, but...
engSearchText: Sure, but...
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: That's a big-time star for you. Keeping up appearances is priority number one.
engSearchText:
That's a big-time star for you. Keeping up
appearances is priority number one.
jpnChrName: ハッ、さすがトップ女優。 そこらへんはキッチリしてるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、さすがトップ女優。
そこらへんはキッチリしてるか。

engChrName: I mean, I get it. It can't exactly be the easiest thing, calling in a favor to people who live and work in society's underbelly.
engSearchText:
I mean, I get it. It can't exactly be the easiest thing,
calling in a favor to people who live and work in
society's underbelly.
jpnChrName: 確かに“裏”に片足突っ込んでる奴らに 安易に借りを作るもんじゃねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに“裏”に片足突っ込んでる奴らに
安易に借りを作るもんじゃねぇな。

engChrName: But if I had to guess, there's probably a reason you'd rather not get the Bracer Guild involved, either, yeah?
engSearchText:
But if I had to guess, there's probably a reason you'd
rather not get the Bracer Guild involved, either, yeah?
jpnChrName: ま、そちらもどうやらギルドには 頼りたくない事情もあるみたいだが？
jpnSearchText:
ま、そちらもどうやらギルドには
頼りたくない事情もあるみたいだが？

engChrName: Mrr...
engSearchText: Mrr...
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: (Guess that hit the nail on the head.)
engSearchText: (Guess that hit the nail on the head.)
jpnChrName: （ま、だろうなぁ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、だろうなぁ。）

engChrName: (Sure looks like it.)
engSearchText: (Sure looks like it.)

engChrName: Umm, to be clear, there's nothing shady or scandalous going on with us specifically.
engSearchText:
Umm, to be clear, there's nothing shady or scandalous
going on with us specifically.
jpnChrName: えっと……？　別にスキャンダルとか 後ろ暗いことがあるわけじゃないんです。
jpnSearchText:
えっと……？　別にスキャンダルとか
後ろ暗いことがあるわけじゃないんです。

engChrName: It's just...the entertainment world is a small one. We can't rule out the chance that this is harassment from someone in the industry.
engSearchText:
It's just...the entertainment world is a small one.
We can't rule out the chance that this is harassment
from someone in the industry.
jpnChrName: ……ただ、狭い業界なので 関係者の悪戯の可能性もあって。
jpnSearchText:
……ただ、狭い業界なので
関係者の悪戯の可能性もあって。

engChrName: But if we turn to the police or the guild, it's bound to go public, so...
engSearchText:
But if we turn to the police or the guild, it's bound to
go public, so...
jpnChrName: そんな時、警察やギルドだと どうしても内々というわけには……
jpnSearchText:
そんな時、警察やギルドだと
どうしても内々というわけには……

engChrName: I understand. If it isn't a serious crime, you would rather settle things privately. Is that it?
engSearchText:
I understand. If it isn't a serious crime, you would
rather settle things privately. Is that it?
jpnChrName: 確かに……重犯罪ではない限り、 “示談”で済ませたいわけですか。
jpnSearchText:
確かに……重犯罪ではない限り、
“示談”で済ませたいわけですか。

engChrName: Yeah, that's it exactly! Thank Aidios someone here understands.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's it exactly! Thank Aidios someone
here understands.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: そうそう、そうなのよ～。 お嬢さん分かってるじゃない！
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、そうなのよ～。
お嬢さん分かってるじゃない！

engChrName: Uhh, I think we all got the idea. What isn't adding up is why WE are such a big problem, helpwise.
engSearchText:
Uhh, I think we all got the idea. What isn't adding
up is why WE are such a big problem, helpwise.
jpnChrName: ？　理屈は分かるが だったらなんで蒸し返すんだ？
jpnSearchText:
？　理屈は分かるが
だったらなんで蒸し返すんだ？

engChrName: The way you keep going on, if anybody's suspicious here, it's you.
engSearchText:
The way you keep going on, if anybody's suspicious
here, it's you.
jpnChrName: アンタの方は微妙に後付けっぽいし、 ……なんか胡散臭ぇな？
jpnSearchText:
アンタの方は微妙に後付けっぽいし、
……なんか胡散臭ぇな？

engChrName: (Now we're gettin' somewhere. Aaron knows how to cut through things in his own way.)
engSearchText:
(Now we're gettin' somewhere. Aaron knows how to
cut through things in his own way.)
jpnChrName: （コイツはコイツで鋭いし。）
jpnSearchText: （コイツはコイツで鋭いし。）

engChrName: W-Well...nobody said anything about you bringing any girls along!
engSearchText:
W-Well...nobody said anything about you bringing
any girls along!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: くっ……そもそも女の子たちまで 同行してるなんて聞いてないわよ？
jpnSearchText:
くっ……そもそも女の子たちまで
同行してるなんて聞いてないわよ？

engChrName: You wouldn't know, but last time I saw you, you were putting them in serious danger by—
engSearchText:
You wouldn't know, but last time I saw you, you were
putting them in serious danger by—
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: アンタは知らないけど 前に会った時も危ない場所に──
jpnSearchText:
アンタは知らないけど
前に会った時も危ない場所に──

engChrName: Wait, I'm confused. Do you know these people?
engSearchText: Wait, I'm confused. Do you know these people?
jpnChrName: え……先輩、 アークライドさんたちと面識が？
jpnSearchText:
え……先輩、
アークライドさんたちと面識が？

engChrName: No, we don't...? (Could she be talking about the film screening?)
engSearchText:
No, we don't...?
(Could she be talking about the film screening?)
jpnChrName: えっと…… （舞台挨拶の時でしょうか？）
jpnSearchText:
えっと……
（舞台挨拶の時でしょうか？）

engChrName: ...Not really. I just happened to see them at a showing, that's all.
engSearchText:
...Not really. I just happened to see them at a
showing, that's all.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ……前に舞台挨拶の時に たまたま見かけたってだけよ。
jpnSearchText:
……前に舞台挨拶の時に
たまたま見かけたってだけよ。

engChrName: All right, fine. It certainly SEEMS like you guys know how to handle yourselves in a rough situation.
engSearchText:
All right, fine. It certainly SEEMS like you guys
know how to handle yourselves in a rough situation.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 確かに、どうやら荒事には それなりに慣れてそうだけど……
jpnSearchText:
確かに、どうやら荒事には
それなりに慣れてそうだけど……

engChrName: But how good are you at tracking down culprits and uncovering things quietly, hmm?
engSearchText:
But how good are you at tracking down culprits and
uncovering things quietly, hmm?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 犯人捜しとか背景の洗い出しとか そちらの方はどうなのかしら？
jpnSearchText:
犯人捜しとか背景の洗い出しとか
そちらの方はどうなのかしら？

engChrName: I mean...
engSearchText: I mean...
jpnChrName: えと……
jpnSearchText: えと……

engChrName: If we had to say...
engSearchText: If we had to say...
jpnChrName: そう言われますと……
jpnSearchText: そう言われますと……

engChrName: You know, before we got here, we took a bit of a stroll around town.
engSearchText:
You know, before we got here, we took a bit of a
stroll around town.
jpnChrName: ──アンタらが来る前に この街を軽く回らせてもらったが。
jpnSearchText:
──アンタらが来る前に
この街を軽く回らせてもらったが。

engChrName: There was something that struck me as odd.
engSearchText: There was something that struck me as odd.
jpnChrName: ちょいと引っかかった事がある。
jpnSearchText: ちょいと引っかかった事がある。

engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性

engChrName: Odd? Like what?
engSearchText: Odd? Like what?
jpnChrName: 引っかかった、ですか？
jpnSearchText: 引っかかった、ですか？

engChrName: Lemme ask you guys something.
engSearchText: Lemme ask you guys something.
jpnChrName: ──お前らはどうだ？
jpnSearchText: ──お前らはどうだ？

engChrName: Now that we've walked around a little, did you notice anything that's changed? Or anything that stuck out?
engSearchText:
Now that we've walked around a little, did you notice
anything that's changed? Or anything that stuck out?
jpnChrName: 朝から動いてみて変わったことや 何か感じたことはなかったか？
jpnSearchText:
朝から動いてみて変わったことや
何か感じたことはなかったか？

engChrName: If I didn't know better, I'd say you're off your rocker. But in this case...
engSearchText:
If I didn't know better, I'd say you're off your rocker.
But in this case...
jpnChrName: ハン、何いきなり振ってやがる、 と言いたい所だが──
jpnSearchText:
ハン、何いきなり振ってやがる、
と言いたい所だが──

engChrName: Yeah. Now that you mention it, Tharbad feels a lot more...rambunctious than when I was here last time.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Now that you mention it, Tharbad feels a lot
more...rambunctious than when I was here last time.
jpnChrName: ……確かに、前に来た時よりも かなり賑わっていたみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
……確かに、前に来た時よりも
かなり賑わっていたみたいです。

engChrName: (If I had to put into words what felt off, it would be...)
