engSearchText:
(If I had to put into words what felt off, it
would be...)
jpnChrName: （気になることがあったとすれば……）
jpnSearchText: （気になることがあったとすれば……）

engChrName: (Hmm... No, that's not it.)
engSearchText: (Hmm... No, that's not it.)
jpnChrName: （……いえ、これじゃない。）
jpnSearchText: （……いえ、これじゃない。）

engChrName: (I'm pretty sure this must be what Van's talking about...)
engSearchText:
(I'm pretty sure this must be what Van's
talking about...)
jpnChrName: （ヴァンさんが気になっていること、   それは多分……）
jpnSearchText:
（ヴァンさんが気になっていること、
それは多分……）

engChrName: You're talking about all the commotion around here, aren't you?
engSearchText:
You're talking about all the commotion around here,
aren't you?
jpnChrName: ……人々の賑わいぶり、でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: ……人々の賑わいぶり、でしょうか。

engChrName: There's a big film festival starting soon, it's true. But people seem to be getting a little carried away, even beyond that.
engSearchText:
There's a big film festival starting soon, it's true.
But people seem to be getting a little carried away,
even beyond that.
jpnChrName: 新しい映画祭の開催とはいえ、 少し羽目を外しすぎている気がします。
jpnSearchText:
新しい映画祭の開催とはいえ、
少し羽目を外しすぎている気がします。

engChrName: Really?
engSearchText: Really?
jpnChrName: 羽目を外しすぎている……？
jpnSearchText: 羽目を外しすぎている……？

engChrName: What do you mean, exactly?
engSearchText: What do you mean, exactly?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ……それって……
jpnSearchText: ……それって……

engChrName: Think about it like this: they're still getting everything ready, right? It's not even time for the main event.
engSearchText:
Think about it like this: they're still getting
everything ready, right? It's not even time for the
main event.
jpnChrName: ハッ……映画祭っつっても あくまでまだ“準備中”なんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……映画祭っつっても
あくまでまだ“準備中”なんだろ？

engChrName: But what was the first thing we saw when we got here this morning? That this place is as busy as Langport. At happy hour.
engSearchText:
But what was the first thing we saw when we got here
this morning? That this place is as busy as Langport.
At happy hour.
jpnChrName: なのに朝っぱらにも関わらず 煌都の夜みてぇな喧噪に満ちてやがる。
jpnSearchText:
なのに朝っぱらにも関わらず
煌都の夜みてぇな喧噪に満ちてやがる。

engChrName: Not to mention the guys who tried to start something with those sisters.
engSearchText:
Not to mention the guys who tried to start something
with those sisters.
jpnChrName: さっきの姉妹に絡んでた連中とかな。
jpnSearchText: さっきの姉妹に絡んでた連中とかな。

engChrName: It definitely feels like there's something in the air. Like...people are more prone to getting into fights.
engSearchText:
It definitely feels like there's something in the air.
Like...people are more prone to getting into fights.
jpnChrName: ……たしかに揉めごとが起きやすい “息吹”のようなものを感じましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……たしかに揉めごとが起きやすい
“息吹”のようなものを感じましたね。

engChrName: I think so, too, even if I don't understand why.
engSearchText: I think so, too, even if I don't understand why.
jpnChrName: ええ……何故かは分かりませんが。
jpnSearchText: ええ……何故かは分かりませんが。

engChrName: It's possible it's related to this assignment somehow, though.
engSearchText:
It's possible it's related to this assignment
somehow, though.
jpnChrName: 今回の依頼にも、もしかしたら 関係しているかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
今回の依頼にも、もしかしたら
関係しているかもしれません。

engChrName: ...Huh. That's interesting.
engSearchText: ...Huh. That's interesting.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど……
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど……

engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性

engChrName: That's just the tip of the iceberg, though. Somethin' about this town stinks real bad.
engSearchText:
That's just the tip of the iceberg, though.
Somethin' about this town stinks real bad.
jpnChrName: ──あくまで序の口だ。 “匂い”を嗅ぎ取る意味ではな。
jpnSearchText:
──あくまで序の口だ。
“匂い”を嗅ぎ取る意味ではな。

engChrName: And not to toot our own horn, but we're just as good at sniffin' around as bracers, if not better.
engSearchText:
And not to toot our own horn, but we're just as good
at sniffin' around as bracers, if not better.
jpnChrName: そこらへんはギルドあたりにも 引けを取るつもりはねぇぜ？
jpnSearchText:
そこらへんはギルドあたりにも
引けを取るつもりはねぇぜ？

engChrName: Heehee! Well, you heard him, Judith. He sounds confident. What do you say?
engSearchText:
Heehee! Well, you heard him, Judith. He
sounds confident. What do you say?
jpnChrName: ふふ……どうですか、先輩？
jpnSearchText: ふふ……どうですか、先輩？

engChrName: Gah! Fine, all right. I can't really keep griping when these people have clearly done their homework.
engSearchText:
Gah! Fine, all right. I can't really keep griping when
these people have clearly done their homework.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ああもう──そこまでキッチリ ロケハンした相手に文句はないわよ！
jpnSearchText:
ああもう──そこまでキッチリ
ロケハンした相手に文句はないわよ！

engChrName: I'm still not getting my hopes up too high, mind you. But I'll join Nina in making this a formal request from the two of us.
engSearchText:
I'm still not getting my hopes up too high, mind you.
But I'll join Nina in making this a formal request
from the two of us.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 正直、そこまで期待はしてないけど 改めてニナと共同依頼をさせてもらうわ。
jpnSearchText:
正直、そこまで期待はしてないけど
改めてニナと共同依頼をさせてもらうわ。

engChrName: Show me you people are more than just talk and deliver us results. And I want the girls to stay safe out there, you hear me?
engSearchText:
Show me you people are more than just talk and
deliver us results. And I want the girls to stay safe out
there, you hear me?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: せいぜい成果を出してみてちょうだい。 ──ただし女の子は諸々気をつけること！
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい成果を出してみてちょうだい。
──ただし女の子は諸々気をつけること！

engChrName: I'm not just talking about avoiding fights. The Entertainment District here isn't exactly safe, or a good influence in general.
engSearchText:
I'm not just talking about avoiding fights.
The Entertainment District here isn't exactly safe, or
a good influence in general.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 荒事もだけど歓楽街（こっち）の方は 治安とか色々と教育にも悪いから。
jpnSearchText:
荒事もだけど歓楽街（こっち）の方は
治安とか色々と教育にも悪いから。

engChrName: You two guys, I don't care about. Go nuts if you want.
engSearchText:
You two guys, I don't care about. Go nuts if
you want.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ああ、アンタたちはどうでもいいけど。
jpnSearchText: ああ、アンタたちはどうでもいいけど。

engChrName: Wow. I can really feel the love.
engSearchText: Wow. I can really feel the love.
jpnChrName: ハッ、言ってろ。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、言ってろ。

engChrName: Wait, hold on. What's so bad about this Entertainment District?
engSearchText:
Wait, hold on. What's so bad about this
Entertainment District?
jpnChrName: 教育に……？
jpnSearchText: 教育に……？

engChrName: Ahaha, let's not worry about that, Feri. Anyway, we'll be careful, Judith, I promise.
engSearchText:
Ahaha, let's not worry about that, Feri. Anyway, we'll
be careful, Judith, I promise.
jpnChrName: あはは…… はい、気をつけますので。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
はい、気をつけますので。

engChrName: Gahaha! I see you're all having a party in here!
engSearchText:
Gahaha! I see you're all having a party
in here!
jpnChrName: ワハハ、何やら 盛り上がっているようじゃな！
jpnSearchText:
ワハハ、何やら
盛り上がっているようじゃな！

engChrName: Hey there, Judith! And glad to see you're doing great, Nina, baby!
engSearchText:
Hey there, Judith! And glad to see you're
doing great, Nina, baby!
jpnChrName: ハロハロー、ジュディス君！ ニナちゃんも元気そうで何よりじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
ハロハロー、ジュディス君！
ニナちゃんも元気そうで何よりじゃ！

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?

engChrName: Wait, isn't that—
engSearchText: Wait, isn't that—
jpnChrName: アンタは……
jpnSearchText: アンタは……

engChrName: Mr. Gotti?!
engSearchText: Mr. Gotti?!

engChrName: What are you doing? You can't just barge in on people!
engSearchText:
What are you doing? You can't just barge in
on people!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: って、何いきなり 乱入してきてるんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
って、何いきなり
乱入してきてるんですか！？

engChrName: I heard you girls were in town! I couldn't not come over and say hello now, could I?
engSearchText:
I heard you girls were in town! I couldn't not come
over and say hello now, could I?
jpnChrName: 君たちが到着したと聞いて いてもたってもいられなくてな！
jpnSearchText:
君たちが到着したと聞いて
いてもたってもいられなくてな！

engChrName: We're all friends here! There's no need to be all formal!
engSearchText:
We're all friends here! There's no need to be
all formal!
jpnChrName: ワシと君らの付き合いだ、 今更遠慮なんて無用じゃろうっ？
jpnSearchText:
ワシと君らの付き合いだ、
今更遠慮なんて無用じゃろうっ？

engChrName: Oho! And who might you two ladies be?
engSearchText: Oho! And who might you two ladies be?
jpnChrName: むむ、なんだね君らは──
jpnSearchText: むむ、なんだね君らは──

engChrName: You both look a little young, but with a bit of polish, I'm sure you would shine bright!
engSearchText:
You both look a little young, but with a bit of polish,
I'm sure you would shine bright!
jpnChrName: 少々若いが、よく見れば磨けば 光りそうな子たちじゃないかっ！
jpnSearchText:
少々若いが、よく見れば磨けば
光りそうな子たちじゃないかっ！

engChrName: Tell you what: why don't you take part in my Carnal Cavalcade? Get a taste for the limelight.
engSearchText:
Tell you what: why don't you take part in my
Carnal Cavalcade? Get a taste for the limelight.
jpnChrName: どうじゃ、ワシの“フォクシーパレード”に 参加してみないかねっ！？
jpnSearchText:
どうじゃ、ワシの“フォクシーパレード”に
参加してみないかねっ！？

engChrName: P-P-P-P-Pardon me?!
engSearchText: P-P-P-P-Pardon me?!
jpnChrName: ええっ……！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ……！？

engChrName: What's a 'cavalcade'...?
engSearchText: What's a 'cavalcade'...?
jpnChrName: ぱれーど……？
jpnSearchText: ぱれーど……？

engChrName: Well, this guy's a piece of work.
engSearchText: Well, this guy's a piece of work.
jpnChrName: なんだこの脂ギッシュなオヤジは……
jpnSearchText: なんだこの脂ギッシュなオヤジは……

engChrName: Ah, and you look like someone who'd take to the silver screen! We've already got plenty of guys in the parade as it is, but...
engSearchText:
Ah, and you look like someone who'd take to the
silver screen! We've already got plenty of guys in the
parade as it is, but...
jpnChrName: ほう、君も画面映えしそうじゃな！ 正直オトコは足りてるんじゃが……
jpnSearchText:
ほう、君も画面映えしそうじゃな！
正直オトコは足りてるんじゃが……

engChrName: ...it can never have enough feminine charm! What can I do to convince you to get out there and cross dress as a lady, huh?
engSearchText:
...it can never have enough feminine charm!
What can I do to convince you to get out there and
cross dress as a lady, huh?
jpnChrName: 花はいくらあってもいい── いっそ女装して参加するのはどうじゃ！？
jpnSearchText:
花はいくらあってもいい──
いっそ女装して参加するのはどうじゃ！？

engChrName: Now you've done it.
engSearchText: Now you've done it.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: なんか言い出してるし……
jpnSearchText: なんか言い出してるし……

engChrName: I'll have you know I can play a woman just fine. That said...I think I know who you are now.
engSearchText:
I'll have you know I can play a woman just fine.
That said...I think I know who you are now.
jpnChrName: ハン、別に慣れてるからいいが、 なるほどアンタが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、別に慣れてるからいいが、
なるほどアンタが……

engChrName: There's no doubt. We're lookin' at Director Salvatore Gotti himself.
engSearchText:
There's no doubt. We're lookin' at Director Salvatore
Gotti himself.
jpnChrName: ああ── サルバトーレ・ゴッチ監督だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
サルバトーレ・ゴッチ監督だ。

engChrName: Whoa! You mean the guy who made Golden Blood?!
engSearchText: Whoa! You mean the guy who made Golden Blood?!
jpnChrName: あ……！ 『ゴールデンブラッド』の……！
jpnSearchText:
あ……！
『ゴールデンブラッド』の……！

engChrName: And he's involved with the film festival at every level, as I understand.
engSearchText:
And he's involved with the film festival at every level,
as I understand.
jpnChrName: サルバッド映画祭の演出全般も 手がけられているという……
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド映画祭の演出全般も
手がけられているという……

engChrName: Darn tootin'! Can't say I'm shocked you kids recognize me! You are here for MY film festival, after all! Gahaha!
engSearchText:
Darn tootin'! Can't say I'm shocked you kids
recognize me! You are here for MY film festival,
after all! Gahaha!
jpnChrName: ワハハ、映画祭に来るからには さすがにワシの顔くらいは知っとるか！
jpnSearchText:
ワハハ、映画祭に来るからには
さすがにワシの顔くらいは知っとるか！

engChrName: I had the pleasure of seein' Golden Blood, for what it's worth.
engSearchText:
I had the pleasure of seein' Golden Blood, for what
it's worth.
jpnChrName: ええ、『ゴールデンブラッド』も 拝見させてもらいましたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、『ゴールデンブラッド』も
拝見させてもらいましたよ。

engChrName: The cinematography when things hit a fever pitch still didn't get in the way of how clever it all was. It's an amazing sequence.
engSearchText:
The cinematography when things hit a fever pitch
still didn't get in the way of how clever it all was.
It's an amazing sequence.
jpnChrName: ……観客を裏切らない怒涛の展開に あざとさを隠しもしねぇカメラワーク。
jpnSearchText:
……観客を裏切らない怒涛の展開に
あざとさを隠しもしねぇカメラワーク。

engChrName: Not to mention the way the protagonist makes the audience feel right at the climax...
engSearchText:
Not to mention the way the protagonist makes the
audience feel right at the climax...
jpnChrName: そのうちに観客は主人公を通じて クライマックスで“ある境地”に至る──
jpnSearchText:
そのうちに観客は主人公を通じて
クライマックスで“ある境地”に至る──

engChrName: Themes of freedom from oppression, and a celebration of life at the same time, both coming through without clashin'. It was great.
engSearchText:
Themes of freedom from oppression, and a
celebration of life at the same time, both coming
through without clashin'. It was great.
jpnChrName: テーマは、そうだな…… 『抑圧からの解放と生命への賛歌』かな？
jpnSearchText:
テーマは、そうだな……
『抑圧からの解放と生命への賛歌』かな？

engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性

engChrName: Well, I'll be damned.
engSearchText: Well, I'll be damned.
jpnChrName: ほう……
jpnSearchText: ほう……

engChrName: Son, I don't know who you are, but I see a bright future for you, too!
engSearchText:
Son, I don't know who you are, but I see a bright
future for you, too!
jpnChrName: 若いの、誰だか知らんが見所があるのう！
jpnSearchText: 若いの、誰だか知らんが見所があるのう！

engChrName: You're right on the money! I wanted my main character, Zoe, to free the humanity AND the eros trapped inside audiences!
engSearchText:
You're right on the money! I wanted my main
character, Zoe, to free the humanity AND the eros
trapped inside audiences!
jpnChrName: まさにその通り──主人公ゾーイを通じて 抑圧された人間性とエロスの解放をじゃなあ！
jpnSearchText:
まさにその通り──主人公ゾーイを通じて
抑圧された人間性とエロスの解放をじゃなあ！

engChrName: Enough already, you two! Sheesh!
engSearchText: Enough already, you two! Sheesh!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ストップ、ストーップ！！
jpnSearchText: ストップ、ストーップ！！

engChrName: Mr. Gotti, I think that's enough for now.
engSearchText: Mr. Gotti, I think that's enough for now.
jpnChrName: 監督、そのくらいで……
jpnSearchText: 監督、そのくらいで……

engChrName: If you're so discerning, then you'll have no trouble appreciating my Carnal Cavalcade!
engSearchText:
If you're so discerning, then you'll have no trouble
appreciating my Carnal Cavalcade!
jpnChrName: ふむ、そこまで分かってるということは “フォクシーパレード”の真価も分かるじゃろう。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、そこまで分かってるということは
“フォクシーパレード”の真価も分かるじゃろう。

engChrName: I can't go into details, but what I can say is that it'll bring together lots of models, dancers, and actresses, including our Judith and Nina!
engSearchText:
I can't go into details, but what I can say is that it'll
bring together lots of models, dancers, and actresses,
including our Judith and Nina!
jpnChrName: 詳細は言えんが、ジュディス君たちを始めとする 女優にモデル、ダンサーの数々を集めてじゃな！
jpnSearchText:
詳細は言えんが、ジュディス君たちを始めとする
女優にモデル、ダンサーの数々を集めてじゃな！

engChrName: It's going to make for one killer opening act for the film festival, I tell you! Even if it'll also be garnished with some guys, too.
engSearchText:
It's going to make for one killer opening act for the
film festival, I tell you! Even if it'll also be garnished
with some guys, too.
jpnChrName: 思いっきりド派手な演出で映画祭開幕を彩るんじゃ！ ………ま、一応オトコも添え物にはしてるがな。
jpnSearchText:
思いっきりド派手な演出で映画祭開幕を彩るんじゃ！
………ま、一応オトコも添え物にはしてるがな。

engChrName: (So that's what he's putting on...)
engSearchText: (So that's what he's putting on...)
jpnChrName: （そういうパレードですか……）
jpnSearchText: （そういうパレードですか……）

engChrName: (Sounds pretty fun, if you ask me!)
engSearchText: (Sounds pretty fun, if you ask me!)
jpnChrName: （なんだか楽しそうですねぇ。）
jpnSearchText: （なんだか楽しそうですねぇ。）

engChrName: (Yeaaah, it's going to be all kinds of fun, if you catch my drift.)
engSearchText:
(Yeaaah, it's going to be all kinds of fun, if you catch
my drift.)
jpnChrName: （クク、色んな意味で   愉しめそうじゃねえか。）
jpnSearchText:
（クク、色んな意味で
愉しめそうじゃねえか。）

engChrName: So basically, you're gonna build off your work in Golden Blood and break new ground again, right?
engSearchText:
So basically, you're gonna build off your work in
Golden Blood and break new ground again, right?
jpnChrName: 成程、『ゴールデンブラッド』の先にある、 革新的なテーマを見届けられるわけですね？
jpnSearchText:
成程、『ゴールデンブラッド』の先にある、
革新的なテーマを見届けられるわけですね？

engChrName: Wahaha! You've got it! You really get what I'm going for here!
engSearchText:
Wahaha! You've got it! You really get what I'm going
for here!
jpnChrName: ワハハ、その通りなんじゃ！ まさかそこまで見抜いてくれるとは！
jpnSearchText:
ワハハ、その通りなんじゃ！
まさかそこまで見抜いてくれるとは！

engChrName: Tell me, boy! What do they call you?
engSearchText: Tell me, boy! What do they call you?
jpnChrName: 名前は何という──若いの？
jpnSearchText: 名前は何という──若いの？

engChrName: Van Arkride. Nobody special—just a gofer from the capital.
engSearchText:
Van Arkride. Nobody special—just a gofer from
the capital.
jpnChrName: ヴァン・アークライド。 しがない首都の便利屋でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン・アークライド。
しがない首都の便利屋でしてね。

engChrName: Here, lemme give you my business card.
engSearchText: Here, lemme give you my business card.
jpnChrName: ああ、よかったら名刺を。
jpnSearchText: ああ、よかったら名刺を。

engChrName: Well, it's good to see they're so excited.
engSearchText: Well, it's good to see they're so excited.
jpnChrName: ふふっ…… 盛り上がって何よりですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……
盛り上がって何よりですね。

engChrName: Those two are ridiculous. Can't President Dillon keep a tighter leash on Salvatore?
engSearchText:
Those two are ridiculous. Can't President Dillon keep
a tighter leash on Salvatore?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: まったく……ギャスパー社長も ちゃんと監督の手綱を握ってくださいな。
jpnSearchText:
まったく……ギャスパー社長も
ちゃんと監督の手綱を握ってくださいな。

engChrName: Believe me, life would be so much easier if I could.
engSearchText: Believe me, life would be so much easier if I could.
jpnChrName: それが出来れば苦労しないよ……
jpnSearchText: それが出来れば苦労しないよ……

engChrName: Anyway, who are these people?
engSearchText: Anyway, who are these people?
jpnChrName: で、なんだね、そちらの彼らは？
jpnSearchText: で、なんだね、そちらの彼らは？

engChrName: I think one of them said he was a 'gofer'? Better than a news reporter, I suppose.
engSearchText:
I think one of them said he was a 'gofer'? Better than
a news reporter, I suppose.
jpnChrName: 便利屋……と言ったか。 ブン屋でないだけまあマシだが。
jpnSearchText:
便利屋……と言ったか。
ブン屋でないだけまあマシだが。

engChrName: Oh, don't mind them. They're here on personal business for us.
engSearchText:
Oh, don't mind them. They're here on personal
business for us.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: あー、こちらの事なので お気になさらず。
jpnSearchText:
あー、こちらの事なので
お気になさらず。

engChrName: Yes, they're just helping out with a bit of a private matter.
engSearchText:
Yes, they're just helping out with a bit of a
private matter.
jpnChrName: その、プライベートで少々、 お願いしているだけですので。
jpnSearchText:
その、プライベートで少々、
お願いしているだけですので。

engChrName: Hmph. All right, I'll leave you to it.
engSearchText: Hmph. All right, I'll leave you to it.
jpnChrName: フン……まあいいだろう。
jpnSearchText: フン……まあいいだろう。

engChrName: More importantly, Judith, Nina... I know you two just got here, but could you come upstairs?
engSearchText:
More importantly, Judith, Nina... I know you two just
got here, but could you come upstairs?
jpnChrName: それよりジュディス君、ニナ君。 到着早々悪いが来てもらえないかな？
jpnSearchText:
それよりジュディス君、ニナ君。
到着早々悪いが来てもらえないかな？

engChrName: There's someone I'd like to introduce you to.
engSearchText: There's someone I'd like to introduce you to.
jpnChrName: 実は君たちに紹介したい方がいてね。
jpnSearchText: 実は君たちに紹介したい方がいてね。

engChrName: Who is it?
engSearchText: Who is it?
jpnChrName: 紹介、ですか？
jpnSearchText: 紹介、ですか？

engChrName: Wait. You don't mean...?
engSearchText: Wait. You don't mean...?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ああ、ひょっとして……
jpnSearchText: ああ、ひょっとして……

engChrName: Come on—I need you two in the lounge on the top floor. It'll be rude to keep them waiting.
engSearchText:
Come on—I need you two in the lounge on the
top floor. It'll be rude to keep them waiting.
jpnChrName: あまり待たせたくはない── 最上階のラウンジに来てくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
あまり待たせたくはない──
最上階のラウンジに来てくれたまえ。

engChrName: We'll be taking our leave now. You, too, Gotti.
engSearchText: We'll be taking our leave now. You, too, Gotti.
jpnChrName: では、我々は失礼するよ。 ──ゴッチ監督も。
jpnSearchText:
では、我々は失礼するよ。
──ゴッチ監督も。

engChrName: Hey, hold on, Gaspard! I'm not done talking to these kids!
engSearchText:
Hey, hold on, Gaspard! I'm not done talking to
these kids!
jpnChrName: ああ、待つんじゃギャスパー。 こっちの話がまだ終わっておらん。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、待つんじゃギャスパー。
こっちの話がまだ終わっておらん。

engChrName: We still need to negotiate their appearance in the—
engSearchText: We still need to negotiate their appearance in the—
jpnChrName: 彼らのパレードへの出演交渉を──
jpnSearchText: 彼らのパレードへの出演交渉を──

engChrName: Don't. Make me. Repeat. Myself.
engSearchText: Don't. Make me. Repeat. Myself.
jpnChrName: ゴ ッ チ 監 督。
jpnSearchText: <S5>ゴ ッ チ 監 督。

engChrName: Time is money here. We really must be going. Right. Now.
engSearchText:
Time is money here. We really must be going. Right.
Now.
jpnChrName: 時間も押しているんです、 お待たせするわけにはいかんでしょう！
jpnSearchText:
時間も押しているんです、
お待たせするわけにはいかんでしょう！

engChrName: Hey, wait! You kids! I promise I'll be in touch! My people, your people! Do lunch! All ri—
engSearchText:
Hey, wait! You kids! I promise I'll be in touch!
My people, your people! Do lunch! All ri—
jpnChrName: ちょ、待──おおい君たち！ 後で連絡したまえ、絶対になッ……！
jpnSearchText:
ちょ、待──おおい君たち！
後で連絡したまえ、絶対になッ……！

engChrName: ...Phew. That guy was like a tornado.
engSearchText: ...Phew. That guy was like a tornado.
jpnChrName: ……嵐みたいでした。
jpnSearchText: ……嵐みたいでした。

engChrName: Some luck we have, runnin' into both Gotti and President Dillon of Vegas Films himself.
engSearchText:
Some luck we have, runnin' into both Gotti and
President Dillon of Vegas Films himself.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督──それに ベガスフィルムのギャスパー社長か。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督──それに
ベガスフィルムのギャスパー社長か。

engChrName: Mr. Dillon sure seemed to have, ahaha, trouble keeping Mr. Gotti under control.
engSearchText:
Mr. Dillon sure seemed to have, ahaha, trouble
keeping Mr. Gotti under control.
jpnChrName: うーん、苦労してそうですね……
jpnSearchText: うーん、苦労してそうですね……

engChrName: Gotti's proof that you can't work in show business unless you have...well, a few screws loose.
engSearchText:
Gotti's proof that you can't work in show business
unless you have...well, a few screws loose.
jpnChrName: やっぱ業界人ってのは どこかブッ飛んでやがんな。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱ業界人ってのは
どこかブッ飛んでやがんな。

engChrName: Though, to be fair, that is part of the reason his films are so powerful.
engSearchText:
Though, to be fair, that is part of the reason his films
are so powerful.
jpnChrName: だからこそパワーのある作品を 生み出せるのかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
だからこそパワーのある作品を
生み出せるのかもしれませんが……

engChrName: Err, but just to be clear, not everyone working in this industry is as out there as him! I swear!
engSearchText:
Err, but just to be clear, not everyone working in this
industry is as out there as him! I swear!
jpnChrName: あ、もちろん常識的な方も ちゃんといらっしゃいますよ？
jpnSearchText:
あ、もちろん常識的な方も
ちゃんといらっしゃいますよ？

engChrName: Yeah, maybe about thirty percent have their heads on straight. Maybe.
engSearchText:
Yeah, maybe about thirty percent have their heads
on straight. Maybe.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ま、３割かそこらだけどね。
jpnSearchText: ま、３割かそこらだけどね。

engChrName: Anyway, it looks like business calls. We'd better be on our way, too.
engSearchText:
Anyway, it looks like business calls. We'd better be on
our way, too.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ──お呼ばれしてるみたいだし あたしたちもそろそろ行かないと。
jpnSearchText:
──お呼ばれしてるみたいだし
あたしたちもそろそろ行かないと。

engChrName: You're free to decide the best course of action while you're in town.
engSearchText:
You're free to decide the best course of action while
you're in town.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 滞在中、貴方たちが どう行動するかは任せるわ。
jpnSearchText:
滞在中、貴方たちが
どう行動するかは任せるわ。

engChrName: Just make sure to report to us directly both tonight and tomorrow night, all right?
engSearchText:
Just make sure to report to us directly both tonight
and tomorrow night, all right?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ただ今日と明日は夜に一度ずつ、 “直接”報告に来てちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
ただ今日と明日は夜に一度ずつ、
“直接”報告に来てちょうだい。

engChrName: Other than that, we won't tell you what to do.
engSearchText: Other than that, we won't tell you what to do.
jpnChrName: それ以外は自由に動いていただいて 構いませんので。
jpnSearchText:
それ以外は自由に動いていただいて
構いませんので。

engChrName: Make sure to have some fun at the film festival itself, too, if you can!
engSearchText:
Make sure to have some fun at the film festival itself,
too, if you can!
jpnChrName: よかったら映画祭の方も 楽しんでいってくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
よかったら映画祭の方も
楽しんでいってくださいね。

engChrName: Oh, you bet. Wouldn't miss it for the world.
engSearchText: Oh, you bet. Wouldn't miss it for the world.
jpnChrName: ああ、そうさせてもらうさ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そうさせてもらうさ。

engChrName: Wish us luck, ladies. We'll see what we can dig up. We won't come back empty-handed.
engSearchText:
Wish us luck, ladies. We'll see what we can dig up.
We won't come back empty-handed.
jpnChrName: 実のある報告ができるように せいぜい祈っていてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
実のある報告ができるように
せいぜい祈っていてくれ。

engChrName: Sounds good to me. See you tonight.
engSearchText: Sounds good to me. See you tonight.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ええ、それじゃ──
jpnSearchText: ええ、それじゃ──

engChrName: Oh, I just remembered! ...Hey, Agnès!
engSearchText: Oh, I just remembered! ...Hey, Agnès!
jpnChrName: ──あっ、そういえば…… アニエスさん！
jpnSearchText:
──あっ、そういえば……
アニエスさん！

engChrName: Oh, right! Say, you two. Before you go, could we ask for a little favor?
engSearchText:
Oh, right! Say, you two. Before you go, could we ask
for a little favor?
jpnChrName: そうでした──あの、お二人とも。 少しだけお願いしたいのですが……
jpnSearchText:
そうでした──あの、お二人とも。
少しだけお願いしたいのですが……

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Heehee. You think Shaheena will like these?
engSearchText: Heehee. You think Shaheena will like these?
jpnChrName: えへへ、シャヒーナさん、 喜んでくれるでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、シャヒーナさん、
喜んでくれるでしょうか？

engChrName: Absolutely! We'll have to figure out a good time to give them to her.
engSearchText:
Absolutely! We'll have to figure out a good time to
give them to her.
jpnChrName: ええ、きっと。 折を見て届けましょう。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、きっと。
折を見て届けましょう。

engChrName: It's 1PM now. At this point, there've gotta be even more people milling around.
engSearchText:
It's 1PM now. At this point, there've gotta be even
more people milling around.
jpnChrName: 午後１時──これから 更に人も増えていくだろう。
jpnSearchText:
午後１時──これから
更に人も増えていくだろう。

engChrName: Let's do another tour around the city, especially the Entertainment District. We might spot somethin' we didn't see before.
engSearchText:
Let's do another tour around the city, especially the
Entertainment District. We might spot somethin' we
didn't see before.
jpnChrName: 午後は歓楽街も含めて動くぞ。 新しく見えてくることがある筈だ。
jpnSearchText:
午後は歓楽街も含めて動くぞ。
新しく見えてくることがある筈だ。

engChrName: All right. If that's the price I pay to keep a couple actresses company.
engSearchText:
All right. If that's the price I pay to keep a couple
actresses company.
jpnChrName: ま、女優どもも目の保養だったしな。
jpnSearchText: ま、女優どもも目の保養だったしな。

engChrName: You must be pretty raring to go after having that fancy cake, huh?
engSearchText:
You must be pretty raring to go after having that
fancy cake, huh?
jpnChrName: スイーツにもありつけて やる気ＭＡＸってところか？
jpnSearchText:
スイーツにもありつけて
やる気ＭＡＸってところか？

engChrName: That's part of it. But I also feel like I can start putting you guys to work in earnest. Somewhat, at least.
engSearchText:
That's part of it. But I also feel like I can start putting
you guys to work in earnest. Somewhat, at least.
jpnChrName: それもあるが──お前らがある程度 “使えそう”なのも分かったからな。
jpnSearchText:
それもあるが──お前らがある程度
“使えそう”なのも分かったからな。

engChrName: This next phase ought to make for good real-world training.
engSearchText:
This next phase ought to make for good
real-world training.
jpnChrName: 今回は良い実地研修にもなりそうだ。
jpnSearchText: 今回は良い実地研修にもなりそうだ。

engChrName: I've taught you three how a spriggan operates—how they think. Now it's your turn to go out there and work like one.
engSearchText:
I've taught you three how a spriggan operates—how
they think. Now it's your turn to go out there and
work like one.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋の流儀と目線── 改めて自分たちなりに掴んでみろや。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋の流儀と目線──
改めて自分たちなりに掴んでみろや。

engChrName: Right!
engSearchText: Right!
jpnChrName: ……はい！
jpnSearchText: ……はい！

engChrName: Roger!
engSearchText: Roger!
jpnChrName: 了解（ウーラ）！
jpnSearchText: 了解（ウーラ）！

engChrName: Sounds good to me! Just don't get too full of yourself with that kind of talk, man.
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me! Just don't get too full of yourself
with that kind of talk, man.
jpnChrName: 偉そうに……だが上等だ！
jpnSearchText: 偉そうに……だが上等だ！

engChrName: Well, look who it is! I had a feeling I'd run into you all sooner rather than later.
engSearchText:
Well, look who it is! I had a feeling I'd run into you
all sooner rather than later.
jpnChrName: あらアナタたち。 そろそろ会えると思ってたわ。
jpnSearchText:
あらアナタたち。
そろそろ会えると思ってたわ。

engChrName: I see you guys have had no problem getting settled in and working here.
engSearchText:
I see you guys have had no problem getting settled in
and working here.
jpnChrName: 無事に活動を始めたようだな。
jpnSearchText: 無事に活動を始めたようだな。

engChrName: Forget us. Last I checked, you weren't supposed to be here till tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Forget us. Last I checked, you weren't supposed to be
here till tomorrow.
jpnChrName: おいおい、お前の方が 明日来るとは聞いてたが……
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、お前の方が
明日来るとは聞いてたが……

engChrName: I never thought I would see you hanging out with Bermotti, either.
engSearchText:
I never thought I would see you hanging out with
Bermotti, either.
jpnChrName: まさかベルモッティさんの方も いらしてたなんて……
jpnSearchText:
まさかベルモッティさんの方も
いらしてたなんて……

engChrName: My schedule got bumped up, so I ended up running into this guy on the train.
engSearchText:
My schedule got bumped up, so I ended up running
into this guy on the train.
jpnChrName: 少し予定を繰り上げてな。 彼とは偶然、列車で居合わせただけだ。
jpnSearchText:
少し予定を繰り上げてな。
彼とは偶然、列車で居合わせただけだ。

engChrName: And here I was going to try and surprise you all later! I even made Dingo keep it a secret, too.
engSearchText:
And here I was going to try and surprise you all later!
I even made Dingo keep it a secret, too.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、ヴァンちゃんを 驚かせようと内緒にしてたんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ウフフ、ヴァンちゃんを
驚かせようと内緒にしてたんだけど……

engChrName: In my case, there's a bartending tournament taking place at the same time as the film festival, which I've been invited to.
engSearchText:
In my case, there's a bartending tournament taking
place at the same time as the film festival, which I've
been invited to.
jpnChrName: 実は映画祭に合わせて開催される バーテンダー大会に招待されていてね。
jpnSearchText:
実は映画祭に合わせて開催される
バーテンダー大会に招待されていてね。

engChrName: To even have Van here with me...*sigh* it must be fate. What else could it be? ❤
engSearchText:
To even have Van here with me...*sigh* it must
be fate. What else could it be? ❤
jpnChrName: まさかヴァンちゃんまで来るなんて── これも運命、か・し・ら❤
jpnSearchText:
まさかヴァンちゃんまで来るなんて──
これも運命、か・し・ら❤

engChrName: Yeah, no. I've had run-ins with cops more fateful than this. Well, least it explains you two being an odd couple.
engSearchText:
Yeah, no. I've had run-ins with cops more fateful
than this. Well, least it explains you two being an
odd couple.
jpnChrName: それこそ偶然だろ…… しかし道理で思わせぶりだったわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
それこそ偶然だろ……
しかし道理で思わせぶりだったわけだ。

engChrName: I assume this has nothing to do with you lining up 4SPGs, and you're out here to cover the film festival?
engSearchText:
I assume this has nothing to do with you lining up
4SPGs, and you're out here to cover the film festival?
jpnChrName: ディンゴは４ｓｐｇの仕込みとは別に 映画祭の取材だったか？
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴは４ｓｐｇの仕込みとは別に
映画祭の取材だったか？

engChrName: Not the sort of beat I'd peg you workin'. A little... normal compared to your usual fare, ain't it?
engSearchText:
Not the sort of beat I'd peg you workin'. A little...
normal compared to your usual fare, ain't it?
jpnChrName: お前にしちゃ普通のネタだと思ったが。
jpnSearchText: お前にしちゃ普通のネタだと思ったが。

engChrName: It is what it is. There's something that caught my attention that I'm trying to look into.
engSearchText:
It is what it is. There's something that caught my
attention that I'm trying to look into.
jpnChrName: ああ…… 少し気になる事があってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……
少し気になる事があってな。

engChrName: What do you mean? Does it have to do with the film festival?
engSearchText:
What do you mean? Does it have to do with the
film festival?
jpnChrName: 気になる事……映画祭にですか？
jpnSearchText: 気になる事……映画祭にですか？

engChrName: Is it related to Nina's request somehow?
engSearchText: Is it related to Nina's request somehow?
jpnChrName: えと、ニナさんの依頼と……？
jpnSearchText: えと、ニナさんの依頼と……？

engChrName: No, it's something different. Though granted, I can't entirely rule out them being related, at the moment.
engSearchText:
No, it's something different. Though granted, I can't
entirely rule out them being related, at the moment.
jpnChrName: それとは別だ──いや現時点で 関係ないとも言い切れないんだが。
jpnSearchText:
それとは別だ──いや現時点で
関係ないとも言い切れないんだが。

engChrName: Mmm, boy, that sure answers a lot.
engSearchText: Mmm, boy, that sure answers a lot.
jpnChrName: アン……なんだそりゃ？
jpnSearchText: アン……なんだそりゃ？

engChrName: Is this that scoop you're always pursuin' on the downlow?
engSearchText:
Is this that scoop you're always pursuin' on
the downlow?
jpnChrName: もしかして── ずっと追ってるっつう“裏ネタ”か？
jpnSearchText:
もしかして──
ずっと追ってるっつう“裏ネタ”か？

engChrName: Never heard what the deal is there.
engSearchText: Never heard what the deal is there.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと聞いた事は無かったが……
jpnSearchText: ちゃんと聞いた事は無かったが……

engChrName: Well...how should I put it...?
engSearchText: Well...how should I put it...?
jpnChrName: いや……そうだな。
jpnSearchText: いや……そうだな。

engChrName: Forgive my interruption, Mr. Brad, Mr. Bermotti.
engSearchText: Forgive my interruption, Mr. Brad, Mr. Bermotti.
jpnChrName: 失礼します、ベルモッティさん。 それとブラッド様。
jpnSearchText:
失礼します、ベルモッティさん。
それとブラッド様。

engChrName: Now this is a surprise.
engSearchText: Now this is a surprise.
jpnChrName: あら……？
jpnSearchText: あら……？

engChrName: What is it?
engSearchText: What is it?
jpnChrName: ああ、なんだ──
jpnSearchText: ああ、なんだ──

engChrName: I'm terribly sorry to bother you, sir. You have a call waiting for you.
engSearchText:
I'm terribly sorry to bother you, sir. You have a call
waiting for you.
jpnChrName: 突然申し訳ありません。 実はブラッド様へのお取り次ぎが。
jpnSearchText:
突然申し訳ありません。
実はブラッド様へのお取り次ぎが。

engChrName: A woman going by the last name Aymé contacted the front desk.
engSearchText:
A woman going by the last name Aymé contacted
the front desk.
jpnChrName: エーメ様とおっしゃる女性の方から フロントに連絡が入っておりまして。
jpnSearchText:
エーメ様とおっしゃる女性の方から
フロントに連絡が入っておりまして。

engChrName: Say what?!
engSearchText: Say what?!

engChrName: Aymé? Isn't that the reporter?
engSearchText: Aymé? Isn't that the reporter?
jpnChrName: それって確か……
jpnSearchText: それって確か……

engChrName: Marielle?
engSearchText: Marielle?
jpnChrName: マリエルさんですか？
jpnSearchText: マリエルさんですか？

engChrName: Oh, you mean that gullible reporter we saw back in Langport?
engSearchText:
Oh, you mean that gullible reporter we saw back
in Langport?
jpnChrName: ああ、煌都にもいた チョロそうな女ブン屋かよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、煌都にもいた
チョロそうな女ブン屋かよ。

engChrName: As I recall, she works for the Tyrell Times and has the hots for old Dingo, here. Bigtime hots.
engSearchText:
As I recall, she works for the Tyrell Times and has
the hots for old Dingo, here. Bigtime hots.
jpnChrName: ディンゴちゃんにお熱っていう タイレル通信の子だったかしら。
jpnSearchText:
ディンゴちゃんにお熱っていう
タイレル通信の子だったかしら。

engChrName: Do you have a scorching date planned all the way out here? Sounds like things are really blossoming between the two of you.
engSearchText:
Do you have a scorching date planned all the way
out here? Sounds like things are really blossoming
between the two of you.
jpnChrName: ひょっとして現地で待ち合わせ？ コノコノ、お安くないわねっ。
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとして現地で待ち合わせ？
コノコノ、お安くないわねっ。

engChrName: Like hell they are. I specifically told her to keep away from me for this trip.
engSearchText:
Like hell they are. I specifically told her to keep away
from me for this trip.
jpnChrName: いや、今回は関わるなと 言い含めておいたんだが……
jpnSearchText:
いや、今回は関わるなと
言い含めておいたんだが……

engChrName: Sorry, I'd better take care of this. I'll see you all later.
engSearchText: Sorry, I'd better take care of this. I'll see you all later.
jpnChrName: ……すまん、また後でな。
jpnSearchText: ……すまん、また後でな。

engChrName: Poor guy. Always being put through the wringer by that girl.
engSearchText:
Poor guy. Always being put through the wringer by
that girl.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、ディンゴも 随分と振り回されてやがるな。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、ディンゴも
随分と振り回されてやがるな。

engChrName: Haha. He just can't seem to keep her hanging for long.
engSearchText:
Haha. He just can't seem to keep her hanging
for long.
jpnChrName: ふふっ、何だか 放っておけないみたいねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、何だか
放っておけないみたいねぇ。

engChrName: Anyway, that bartending tournament I was talking about is being hosted at the Al-Jumeirah Hotel.
engSearchText:
Anyway, that bartending tournament I was talking
about is being hosted at the Al-Jumeirah Hotel.
jpnChrName: そうそう、例のバーテンダー大会は アルジュメイラホテルのラウンジでね。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、例のバーテンダー大会は
アルジュメイラホテルのラウンジでね。

engChrName: I'm going to hang out here a bit longer and then make my way over there.
engSearchText:
I'm going to hang out here a bit longer and then
make my way over there.
jpnChrName: もう少ししたらアタシも ホテルの方に顔を出してくるわ。
jpnSearchText:
もう少ししたらアタシも
ホテルの方に顔を出してくるわ。

engChrName: If I hear anything interesting, I'll be sure to get in touch. In the meantime, good luck, everyone!
engSearchText:
If I hear anything interesting, I'll be sure to get
in touch. In the meantime, good luck, everyone!
jpnChrName: なにかイイ情報が入ったら連絡するから ヴァンちゃんたちも頑張ってちょうだい。
jpnSearchText:
なにかイイ情報が入ったら連絡するから
ヴァンちゃんたちも頑張ってちょうだい。

engChrName: Sounds good. Can't wait to hear what you dig up.
engSearchText: Sounds good. Can't wait to hear what you dig up.
jpnChrName: ああ、期待してるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、期待してるぜ。

engChrName: Thanks, Bermotti! Good luck with your tournament!
engSearchText: Thanks, Bermotti! Good luck with your tournament!
jpnChrName: ばーてんだー大会の方も がんばってくださいっ。
jpnSearchText:
ばーてんだー大会の方も
がんばってくださいっ。

engChrName: You should treat us to some cocktails. You know, taste testing before the grueling competition.
engSearchText:
You should treat us to some cocktails. You know,
taste testing before the grueling competition.
jpnChrName: そのうちカクテルでも奢れや。 味見して貢献してやるからよ。
jpnSearchText:
そのうちカクテルでも奢れや。
味見して貢献してやるからよ。

engChrName: Aaron, no! We're here to work!
engSearchText: Aaron, no! We're here to work!
jpnChrName: もう、アーロンさん。 お仕事で来てるんですから……
jpnSearchText:
もう、アーロンさん。
お仕事で来てるんですから……

engChrName: Right, where were Nina and Judith staying again?
engSearchText: Right, where were Nina and Judith staying again?
jpnChrName: ええと、ニナさんたちの部屋は……
jpnSearchText: ええと、ニナさんたちの部屋は……

engChrName: Hnngh! You must be Mr. Arkride and company.
engSearchText: Hnngh! You must be Mr. Arkride and company.
jpnChrName: ハアアアッ、 アークライド様御一行ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ハアアアッ、
アークライド様御一行ですね。

engChrName: Ms. Lanster and Ms. Fenly are waiting for you all by the pool.
engSearchText:
Ms. Lanster and Ms. Fenly are waiting for you all by
the pool.
jpnChrName: ランスター様とフェンリィ様が あちらのプールでお待ちです。
jpnSearchText:
ランスター様とフェンリィ様が
あちらのプールでお待ちです。

engChrName: The clerk there already knows you're coming. You're free to enter whenever you're ready.
engSearchText:
The clerk there already knows you're coming.
You're free to enter whenever you're ready.
jpnChrName: 係の者に話は通しておりますので どうぞご自由にお入りください。
jpnSearchText:
係の者に話は通しておりますので
どうぞご自由にお入りください。

engChrName: Good to hear. Thanks.
engSearchText: Good to hear. Thanks.
jpnChrName: ああ、ありがとさん。
jpnSearchText: ああ、ありがとさん。

engChrName: That's one way to say hello. At least his customer service is impeccable.
engSearchText:
That's one way to say hello. At least his customer
service is impeccable.
jpnChrName: あの掛け声はともかく、 さすがの応対ぶりだな。
jpnSearchText:
あの掛け声はともかく、
さすがの応対ぶりだな。

engChrName: I'd expect nothing less from a six-star facility.
engSearchText: I'd expect nothing less from a six-star facility.
jpnChrName: さすが六つ星の格、 といった所でしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
さすが六つ星の格、
といった所でしょうか。

engChrName: I don't get it. Why would they be at the pool when it's night?
engSearchText:
I don't get it. Why would they be at the pool when
it's night?
jpnChrName: えと……夜なのに プールで遊ぶんですか？
jpnSearchText:
えと……夜なのに
プールで遊ぶんですか？

engChrName: It's a nighttime pool. You get to drink alcohol and all that good stuff there.
engSearchText:
It's a nighttime pool. You get to drink alcohol and all
that good stuff there.
jpnChrName: 酒とかも楽しめる ナイトプールってヤツだな。
jpnSearchText:
酒とかも楽しめる
ナイトプールってヤツだな。

engChrName: But a little kid like you can't really appreciate grownup stuff like that yet.
engSearchText:
But a little kid like you can't really appreciate
grownup stuff like that yet.
jpnChrName: オコチャマには大人の楽しみは まだ早いだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
オコチャマには大人の楽しみは
まだ早いだろうが。

engChrName: I am not! If you think I can't handle alcohol, I'll prove you—
engSearchText:
I am not! If you think I can't handle alcohol, I'll prove
you—
jpnChrName: むっ、そんなことありません。 なんだったらお酒にも挑戦を──
jpnSearchText:
むっ、そんなことありません。
なんだったらお酒にも挑戦を──

engChrName: Feri, NO. Not until you're older. And, Aaron? Don't. Go putting any ideas. In her head.
engSearchText:
Feri, NO. Not until you're older. And, Aaron? Don't.
Go putting any ideas. In her head.
jpnChrName: フェリちゃん、ダメですよ？ ──アーロンさんも程々に。
jpnSearchText:
フェリちゃん、ダメですよ？
──アーロンさんも程々に。

engChrName: G-Got it...
engSearchText: G-Got it...
jpnChrName: お、おう……
jpnSearchText: お、おう……

engChrName: (I see Agnès is rather mature for her age.)
engSearchText: (I see Agnès is rather mature for her age.)
jpnChrName: （ふふ、アニエス様は随分と   しっかりされているのですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、アニエス様は随分と
しっかりされているのですね。）

engChrName: (You could say that. She can definitely be forceful when she needs to be.)
engSearchText:
(You could say that. She can definitely be forceful
when she needs to be.)
jpnChrName: （まあな……   あれで押しは結構強いぜ。）
jpnSearchText:
（まあな……
あれで押しは結構強いぜ。）

engChrName: The main story will advance upon entering the hotel swimming pool.
engSearchText:
The main story will advance upon entering the hotel
swimming pool.
jpnChrName: ナイトプールエリアに入ると メインストーリーが進むので注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
ナイトプールエリアに入ると
メインストーリーが進むので注意してください。

engChrName: Whoa! So this is what a nighttime swimming pool looks like!
engSearchText:
Whoa! So this is what a nighttime swimming pool
looks like!
jpnChrName: わぁ…… これがナイトプールですか……！
jpnSearchText:
わぁ……
これがナイトプールですか……！

engChrName: It's so calm and relaxed. The view of the oasis is nice, too.
engSearchText:
It's so calm and relaxed. The view of the oasis is
nice, too.
jpnChrName: オアシス湖の眺めもいいですね。 静かで落ち着きます。
jpnSearchText:
オアシス湖の眺めもいいですね。
静かで落ち着きます。

engChrName: I dunno about 'calm.' With all these folks drinking, I bet it can get pretty rowdy.
engSearchText:
I dunno about 'calm.' With all these folks drinking, I
bet it can get pretty rowdy.
jpnChrName: ハン、若いので集まって ドンチャン騒ぐ雰囲気じゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、若いので集まって
ドンチャン騒ぐ雰囲気じゃねぇか。

engChrName: Nah, you've seen this place. 'Rowdy' guests get shown the door. Now, where're the girls...?
engSearchText:
Nah, you've seen this place. 'Rowdy' guests get shown
the door. Now, where're the girls...?
jpnChrName: そういう客層じゃねえだろう。 さて、依頼人は……
jpnSearchText:
そういう客層じゃねえだろう。
さて、依頼人は……

engChrName: Well, we meet again!
engSearchText: Well, we meet again!
jpnChrName: あら、ヴァンちゃんたちじゃない。
jpnSearchText: あら、ヴァンちゃんたちじゃない。

engChrName: Beautiful night we're having, isn't it? Are you darlings done with work for the night, hmm?
engSearchText:
Beautiful night we're having, isn't it? Are you darlings
done with work for the night, hmm?
jpnChrName: 良い夜ね❤ 今日のお仕事は終わりかしら？
jpnSearchText:
良い夜ね❤
今日のお仕事は終わりかしら？

engChrName: More or less, yeah.
engSearchText: More or less, yeah.
jpnChrName: ああ、一応な。
jpnSearchText: ああ、一応な。

engChrName: I didn't realize you'd be working here, Bermotti.
engSearchText: I didn't realize you'd be working here, Bermotti.
jpnChrName: ふふ、こちらでも 働いてらしたんですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、こちらでも
働いてらしたんですね。

engChrName: Yeah! They called me in as an extra pair of hands to pitch in before the tournament.
engSearchText:
Yeah! They called me in as an extra pair of hands to
pitch in before the tournament.
jpnChrName: ええ、例の大会の前に しばらくヘルプに呼ばれてね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、例の大会の前に
しばらくヘルプに呼ばれてね。

engChrName: And I don't think we've met before. You are...?
engSearchText: And I don't think we've met before. You are...?
jpnChrName: ってアラ、そっちの子は──
jpnSearchText: ってアラ、そっちの子は──

engChrName: Risette Twinings. It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance, Mr. Bermotti.
engSearchText:
Risette Twinings. It's a pleasure to make your
acquaintance, Mr. Bermotti.
jpnChrName: リゼット・トワイニングと申します。 お見知り置きを、ベルモッティ様。
jpnSearchText:
リゼット・トワイニングと申します。
お見知り置きを、ベルモッティ様。

engChrName: Hold on! Are you the one contracted to work with Van? What are you—
engSearchText:
Hold on! Are you the one contracted to work
with Van? What are you—
jpnChrName: ！　もしかしてヴァンちゃんと 契約を結んでいるっていう……
jpnSearchText:
！　もしかしてヴァンちゃんと
契約を結んでいるっていう……

engChrName: It's a long story. More to the point, are our actresses anywhere around here?
engSearchText:
It's a long story. More to the point, are our actresses
anywhere around here?
jpnChrName: ま、色々あってな。 それより女優たちが来てねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
ま、色々あってな。
それより女優たちが来てねぇか？

engChrName: Ah, you must mean those two. They're right over there.
engSearchText:
Ah, you must mean those two. They're right
over there.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの二人ね。 それなら──
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの二人ね。
それなら──

engChrName: *whistle* NOW we're talking. Two A-listers walking around in swimsuits. You love to see it.
engSearchText:
*whistle* NOW we're talking. Two A-listers walking
around in swimsuits. You love to see it.
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、トップスターが 水着姿でお出迎えかよ。
jpnSearchText:
ヒュウ、トップスターが
水着姿でお出迎えかよ。

engChrName: Oh, there you are! Sorry we're a little underdressed right now.
engSearchText:
Oh, there you are! Sorry we're a little underdressed
right now.
jpnChrName: あ……皆さん。 こんな格好で失礼します。
jpnSearchText:
あ……皆さん。
こんな格好で失礼します。

engChrName: I got half a mind to tell you two off for loungin' around in bikinis while we've been out there bustin' our butts.
engSearchText:
I got half a mind to tell you two off for loungin'
around in bikinis while we've been out there bustin'
our butts.
jpnChrName: 人が駆けずりまわってる時に いいご身分だなと言いたい所だが……
jpnSearchText:
人が駆けずりまわってる時に
いいご身分だなと言いたい所だが……

engChrName: Buuut comin' back to a sight like this makes it all worth it. I'll let it slide.
engSearchText:
Buuut comin' back to a sight like this makes it all
worth it. I'll let it slide.
jpnChrName: ある意味サービス良すぎかもな。
jpnSearchText: ある意味サービス良すぎかもな。

engChrName: We're not wearing these for you, you know. Yeesh!
engSearchText: We're not wearing these for you, you know. Yeesh!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 別にアンタたちのためじゃないわよ。
jpnSearchText: 別にアンタたちのためじゃないわよ。

engChrName: We've been working pretty hard ourselves. A certain president was parading us around, left and right all day. We're bushed!
engSearchText:
We've been working pretty hard ourselves. A certain
president was parading us around, left and right
all day. We're bushed!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: こっちだって一日中お偉いさんに 挨拶回りでヘトヘトだったんだから。
jpnSearchText:
こっちだって一日中お偉いさんに
挨拶回りでヘトヘトだったんだから。

engChrName: Right, that bit earlier. Sorry—should've realized that.
engSearchText: Right, that bit earlier. Sorry—should've realized that.
jpnChrName: おっと、そいつは失礼。
jpnSearchText: おっと、そいつは失礼。

engChrName: I can certainly imagine how that would get pretty draining, doing all that meeting and greeting.
engSearchText:
I can certainly imagine how that would get pretty
draining, doing all that meeting and greeting.
jpnChrName: ふふ、たしかに 神経を擦り減らしそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、たしかに
神経を擦り減らしそうですね。

engChrName: Sounds like you earned your keep today.
engSearchText: Sounds like you earned your keep today.
jpnChrName: お互いお疲れ様、ですねっ。
jpnSearchText: お互いお疲れ様、ですねっ。

engChrName: Right back at you, gir—hold on! Did you get ANOTHER girl? It's only been a few hours!
engSearchText:
Right back at you, gir—hold on! Did you get
ANOTHER girl? It's only been a few hours!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ふふ、貴女たちも──って なんかまた女の子が増えてない！？
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、貴女たちも──って
なんかまた女の子が増えてない！？

engChrName: You are Judith Lanster and Nina Fenly, if I'm not mistaken, yes?
engSearchText:
You are Judith Lanster and Nina Fenly, if I'm not
mistaken, yes?
jpnChrName: ジュディス・ランスター様に ニナ・フェンリィ様ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス・ランスター様に
ニナ・フェンリィ様ですね。

engChrName: It's an honor to meet you both. My name is Risette Twinings. I'm assisting everyone temporarily.
engSearchText:
It's an honor to meet you both. My name is
Risette Twinings. I'm assisting everyone temporarily.
jpnChrName: お会いできて光栄です、臨時スタッフの リゼット・トワイニングと申します。
jpnSearchText:
お会いできて光栄です、臨時スタッフの
リゼット・トワイニングと申します。

engChrName: O-Okay...? Well, it's nice to meet you, too, Risette.
engSearchText: O-Okay...? Well, it's nice to meet you, too, Risette.
jpnChrName: ええっと……？ よろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText:
ええっと……？
よろしくお願いします。

engChrName: ...I really can't imagine what all you've gotten up to, but all right—let's hear what happened today.
engSearchText:
...I really can't imagine what all you've gotten up to,
but all right—let's hear what happened today.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ……訳が分からないんだけど 今日の報告、聞かせてくれるのよね？
jpnSearchText:
……訳が分からないんだけど
今日の報告、聞かせてくれるのよね？

engChrName: Sure thing. Here's the gist of it...
engSearchText: Sure thing. Here's the gist of it...
jpnChrName: ああ──かいつまんで説明する。
jpnSearchText: ああ──かいつまんで説明する。

engChrName: You ran into someone dangerous in the waterway... AND found another threatening note?
engSearchText:
You ran into someone dangerous in the waterway...
AND found another threatening note?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 地下水路に怪しげな危険人物── ……それに新しい脅迫状ですって！？
jpnSearchText:
地下水路に怪しげな危険人物──
……それに新しい脅迫状ですって！？

engChrName: Umm, Judith, maybe keep it down...?
engSearchText: Umm, Judith, maybe keep it down...?
jpnChrName: せ、先輩っ……
jpnSearchText: せ、先輩っ……

engChrName: Ahem! Oh, that's wonderful, Nina! Sounds like it's gonna be pretty exciting! I can't wait!
engSearchText:
Ahem! Oh, that's wonderful, Nina! Sounds like it's
gonna be pretty exciting! I can't wait!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: コホン、いいじゃないニナ！ なかなか盛り上がりそうな展開ね！
jpnSearchText:
コホン、いいじゃないニナ！
なかなか盛り上がりそうな展開ね！

engChrName: Anyway, you guys have been through a lot today, it sounds like.
engSearchText:
Anyway, you guys have been through a lot today, it
sounds like.
jpnChrName: 今日一日でそこまでのことが……
jpnSearchText: 今日一日でそこまでのことが……

engChrName: This situation's getting pretty complicated at this point.
engSearchText:
This situation's getting pretty complicated at
this point.
jpnChrName: ……思ったより 複雑な状況になってきましたね。
jpnSearchText:
……思ったより
複雑な状況になってきましたね。

engChrName: And it sounds like it could be connected to the Messeldam film festival's cancellation?
engSearchText:
And it sounds like it could be connected to the
Messeldam film festival's cancellation?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: しかも中止になったメッセルダムの 映画祭とも関係があるかもしれない、か……
jpnSearchText:
しかも中止になったメッセルダムの
映画祭とも関係があるかもしれない、か……

engChrName: Yes, although that isn't confirmed at this stage.
engSearchText: Yes, although that isn't confirmed at this stage.
jpnChrName: はい──あくまで可能性ですが。
jpnSearchText: はい──あくまで可能性ですが。

engChrName: Hard to see how all of these things tie together. But one thing's for sure: SOMETHING is clearly goin' down.
engSearchText:
Hard to see how all of these things tie together.
But one thing's for sure: SOMETHING is clearly
goin' down.
jpnChrName: 一つ一つの関係性は分からねえが、 “何か”が起きているのは確かだろう。
jpnSearchText:
一つ一つの関係性は分からねえが、
“何か”が起きているのは確かだろう。

engChrName: What's got me real concerned is that mysterious girl who showed up in the waterway.
engSearchText:
What's got me real concerned is that mysterious girl
who showed up in the waterway.
jpnChrName: ──特に気になるのは、 地下水路に現れた正体不明の娘……
jpnSearchText:
──特に気になるのは、
地下水路に現れた正体不明の娘……

engChrName: Can't be sure yet that she's the one sendin' all those notes, but...
engSearchText:
Can't be sure yet that she's the one sendin' all those
notes, but...
jpnChrName: 脅迫状を出した犯人かまでは 断定できねぇがな。
jpnSearchText:
脅迫状を出した犯人かまでは
断定できねぇがな。

engChrName: We definitely can't ignore her, even putting my own circumstances aside.
engSearchText:
We definitely can't ignore her, even putting my own
circumstances aside.
jpnChrName: でも見過ごせませんね…… ……私の事情抜きにしても。
jpnSearchText:
でも見過ごせませんね……
……私の事情抜きにしても。

engChrName: Yeah, especially if A's involved in this.
engSearchText: Yeah, especially if A's involved in this.
jpnChrName: はい……《Ａ》ならば特に。
jpnSearchText: はい……《Ａ》ならば特に。

engChrName: So basically, long story short, you still haven't figured anything out. Is that it?
engSearchText:
So basically, long story short, you still haven't figured
anything out. Is that it?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ………ま、要するにまだ 何も分からずじまいってことね？
jpnSearchText:
………ま、要するにまだ
何も分からずじまいってことね？

engChrName: So much for the spriggan living up to the hype, hmm?
engSearchText: So much for the spriggan living up to the hype, hmm?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ずいぶん優秀じゃない、 裏解決屋さんっていうのも。
jpnSearchText:
ずいぶん優秀じゃない、
裏解決屋さんっていうのも。

engChrName: You got us there. It's not what we were hoping for, either.
engSearchText:
You got us there. It's not what we were hoping
for, either.
jpnChrName: ま、確かに言葉もねぇな。
jpnSearchText: ま、確かに言葉もねぇな。

engChrName: Oh, be nice, Judith! They still did better than we could've expected for their first day here.
engSearchText:
Oh, be nice, Judith! They still did better than we
could've expected for their first day here.
jpnChrName: もう……初日にここまでの成果が あっただけでも期待以上でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
もう……初日にここまでの成果が
あっただけでも期待以上でしょう。

engChrName: If we hadn't hired them, we'd have gone into the film festival completely unprepared!
engSearchText:
If we hadn't hired them, we'd have gone into the film
festival completely unprepared!
jpnChrName: 依頼していなかったら何の備えもなく 映画祭を迎えていたでしょうし。
jpnSearchText:
依頼していなかったら何の備えもなく
映画祭を迎えていたでしょうし。

engChrName: ...I get that. I'm not saying they did absolutely nothing.
engSearchText:
...I get that. I'm not saying they did
absolutely nothing.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ……分かってるわよ、そんなことは。
jpnSearchText: ……分かってるわよ、そんなことは。

engChrName: I'm just trying to make clear that we need to get this figured out sooner rather than later.
engSearchText:
I'm just trying to make clear that we need to get this
figured out sooner rather than later.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: あたしが言いたいのは一刻も早く なんとかしなきゃいけないってこと。
jpnSearchText:
あたしが言いたいのは一刻も早く
なんとかしなきゃいけないってこと。

engChrName: I mean, this joker's sending notes to locals who were JUST scouted now! It pisses me off!
engSearchText:
I mean, this joker's sending notes to locals who were
JUST scouted now! It pisses me off!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: スカウトされたばかりの現地の子にまで 脅迫状を送るなんてふざけてる……！
jpnSearchText:
スカウトされたばかりの現地の子にまで
脅迫状を送るなんてふざけてる……！

engChrName: Getting a little worked up over this, aren't you? Not that I disagree, mind.
engSearchText:
Getting a little worked up over this, aren't you?
Not that I disagree, mind.
jpnChrName: ハン……？ ま、その通りだがよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハン……？
ま、その通りだがよ。

engChrName: Definitely. We can't let them win!
engSearchText: Definitely. We can't let them win!
jpnChrName: 絶対に許せませんっ。
jpnSearchText: 絶対に許せませんっ。

engChrName: You know, there's something I can't help but wonder. What is the culprit trying to accomplish?
engSearchText:
You know, there's something I can't help but wonder.
What is the culprit trying to accomplish?
jpnChrName: でも結局のところ…… “犯人”は何がしたいんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
でも結局のところ……
“犯人”は何がしたいんでしょう？

engChrName: What? What do you mean? What's there to wonder?
engSearchText: What? What do you mean? What's there to wonder?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性

engChrName: No, she's right. I don't see what this person's trying to get at, myself.
engSearchText:
No, she's right. I don't see what this person's trying to
get at, myself.
jpnChrName: ああ──どうにも目的が見えてこねぇ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──どうにも目的が見えてこねぇ。

engChrName: If all they wanted to do was cancel the film festival, it'd be quicker to just threaten a terror attack again and be done with it.
engSearchText:
If all they wanted to do was cancel the film festival,
it'd be quicker to just threaten a terror attack again
and be done with it.
jpnChrName: 映画祭を中止させたいだけなら、それこそ テロ予告を出して“事件”にするのが早いはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭を中止させたいだけなら、それこそ
テロ予告を出して“事件”にするのが早いはずだ。

engChrName: But instead, they're sendin' these notes to individual actresses and even dancers. That's a pretty roundabout way of doing it.
engSearchText:
But instead, they're sendin' these notes to individual
actresses and even dancers. That's a pretty
roundabout way of doing it.
jpnChrName: なのに出演者の女優や踊り子にチマチマと 脅迫状を出すなんざ、余りにも回りくどすぎる。
jpnSearchText:
なのに出演者の女優や踊り子にチマチマと
脅迫状を出すなんざ、余りにも回りくどすぎる。

engChrName: ...Huh.
engSearchText: ...Huh.

engChrName: That's a good point...
engSearchText: That's a good point...
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性

engChrName: I see what you mean. The means and the ends don't appear to add up, so to speak.
engSearchText:
I see what you mean. The means and the ends don't
appear to add up, so to speak.
jpnChrName: 成程……目的と手段が 一致していないような印象ですね。
jpnSearchText:
成程……目的と手段が
一致していないような印象ですね。

engChrName: Even if it doesn't change the fact that the festival is still being interfered with.
engSearchText:
Even if it doesn't change the fact that the festival is
still being interfered with.
jpnChrName: かといって妨害行為で あることには変わりませんが。
jpnSearchText:
かといって妨害行為で
あることには変わりませんが。

engChrName: Yeah. I got a feelin' that little contradiction is the key to all this.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I got a feelin' that little contradiction is the key
to all this.
jpnChrName: ああ、そのあたりの食い違いが “鍵”になるかもしれねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そのあたりの食い違いが
“鍵”になるかもしれねぇな。

engChrName: Sounds like you all are having a rather intriguing conversation.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you all are having a rather
intriguing conversation.
jpnChrName: ──フフ、何やら 面白い話をしているみたいだね？
jpnSearchText:
──フフ、何やら
面白い話をしているみたいだね？

engChrName: Huh? Hey, buddy. What the hell's your—
engSearchText: Huh? Hey, buddy. What the hell's your—
jpnChrName: アン、なんだアンタ……
jpnSearchText: アン、なんだアンタ……

engChrName: Y-Your Highness?!
engSearchText: Y-Your Highness?!
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: って──殿下っ！？
jpnSearchText: って──殿下っ！？

engChrName: I didn't realize you were here, too. I'm sorry we aren't exactly dressed for a meeting with the prince.
engSearchText:
I didn't realize you were here, too. I'm sorry we aren't
exactly dressed for a meeting with the prince.
jpnChrName: いらしていたんですね。 すみません、このような恰好で。
jpnSearchText:
いらしていたんですね。
すみません、このような恰好で。

engChrName: Oh, please—you've nothing to worry about.
engSearchText: Oh, please—you've nothing to worry about.
jpnChrName: いやいや、気にする必要はない。
jpnSearchText: いやいや、気にする必要はない。

engChrName: You two are like a pair of flowers, blooming in the desert. You're the film industry's greatest treasures! Zemuria's treasures!
engSearchText:
You two are like a pair of flowers, blooming in
the desert. You're the film industry's
greatest treasures! Zemuria's treasures!
jpnChrName: 砂漠に咲いた二輪の花──映画界の、 いやゼムリアの至宝とすら言えるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
砂漠に咲いた二輪の花──映画界の、
いやゼムリアの至宝とすら言えるだろう。

engChrName: Please, bless us with your beauty as you wish. Quench the thirsts of we cast down mortal men with your presence!
engSearchText:
Please, bless us with your beauty as you wish.
Quench the thirsts of we cast down mortal men with
your presence!
jpnChrName: どうかその美を存分に振りまいて 我ら凡俗の乾きを潤してくれたまえっ。
jpnSearchText:
どうかその美を存分に振りまいて
我ら凡俗の乾きを潤してくれたまえっ。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: *sigh* You certainly have a...way with words, that's for sure.
engSearchText:
*sigh* You certainly have a...way with words, that's
for sure.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ふう、相変わらずですねぇ……
jpnSearchText: ふう、相変わらずですねぇ……

engChrName: (Color me intrigued.)
engSearchText: (Color me intrigued.)

engChrName: (Could he be...?)
engSearchText: (Could he be...?)
jpnChrName: （ひょっとして……）
jpnSearchText: （ひょっとして……）

engChrName: Your Highness, please, remain respectful.
engSearchText: Your Highness, please, remain respectful.
jpnChrName: ──殿下、 お戯れはそのくらいに。
jpnSearchText:
──殿下、
お戯れはそのくらいに。

engChrName: Haha, I'll tone it down, Naje, fear not.
engSearchText: Haha, I'll tone it down, Naje, fear not.
jpnChrName: フフ…… 分かっているさ、ナージェ。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
分かっているさ、ナージェ。

engChrName: Ah, but where are my manners? Allow me to introduce myself. I am Sherid Asval, son of Grand Prince Salman of Elsaim.
engSearchText:
Ah, but where are my manners? Allow me to
introduce myself. I am Sherid Asval, son of Grand
Prince Salman of Elsaim.
jpnChrName: エルザイムの公王サルマンが一子、 シェリド・アスヴァールだ。
jpnSearchText:
エルザイムの公王サルマンが一子、
シェリド・アスヴァールだ。

engChrName: This is my dear and trusted secretary, Naje.
engSearchText: This is my dear and trusted secretary, Naje.
jpnChrName: こちらは秘書のナージェ。
jpnSearchText: こちらは秘書のナージェ。

engChrName: Judith and Nina have informed me about you all. It appears you're handling their 'private' business for them?
engSearchText:
Judith and Nina have informed me about you all.
It appears you're handling their 'private' business
for them?
jpnChrName: ジュディス君たちから聞いている。 “プライベートな依頼”を受けているそうだね？
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス君たちから聞いている。
“プライベートな依頼”を受けているそうだね？

engChrName: If so, I'd like to consult with you all about a certain something, as well, if it would not be an imposition.
engSearchText:
If so, I'd like to consult with you all about a certain
something, as well, if it would not be an imposition.
jpnChrName: ついでに私の相談にも乗ってもらいたいんだが、 ──構わないかな？
jpnSearchText:
ついでに私の相談にも乗ってもらいたいんだが、
──構わないかな？

engChrName: ...All right. We're listenin'.
engSearchText: ...All right. We're listenin'.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどね。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほどね。

engChrName: First off, let me reiterate that it's a real pleasure to make your acquaintance, Prince Sherid.
engSearchText:
First off, let me reiterate that it's a real pleasure to
make your acquaintance, Prince Sherid.
jpnChrName: まずは改めて── お目にかかれて光栄です、公太子殿下。
jpnSearchText:
まずは改めて──
お目にかかれて光栄です、公太子殿下。

engChrName: I wouldn't ever expect a guy as big and important as you to give some guy doin' odd jobs in Calvard like me the time of day.
engSearchText:
I wouldn't ever expect a guy as big and important as
you to give some guy doin' odd jobs in Calvard like
me the time of day.
jpnChrName: 共和国のしがない便利屋風情に 声を掛けて下さるとは思いませんでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
共和国のしがない便利屋風情に
声を掛けて下さるとは思いませんでしたが。

engChrName: You're too humble, Mr. Arkride. I understand you're exceedingly capable, so I wanted to make sure to talk to you.
engSearchText:
You're too humble, Mr. Arkride. I understand you're
exceedingly capable, so I wanted to make sure to talk
to you.
jpnChrName: なに、随分優秀という話だったから 相談させてもらおうと思っただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
なに、随分優秀という話だったから
相談させてもらおうと思っただけさ。

engChrName: As a matter of fact, I've heard things about all of you...including your 'temporary help.'
engSearchText:
As a matter of fact, I've heard things about all of
you...including your 'temporary help.'
jpnChrName: なるほど噂通りの面々のようだ── そちらの臨時スタッフ殿も含めてね。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど噂通りの面々のようだ──
そちらの臨時スタッフ殿も含めてね。

engChrName: You honor me, Your Highness.
engSearchText: You honor me, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: 恐れ入ります。
jpnSearchText: 恐れ入ります。

engChrName: Still, can't say a swimming pool is where I expected to bump into the heir to a throne. Life's just full of surprises!
engSearchText:
Still, can't say a swimming pool is where I expected to
bump into the heir to a throne. Life's just full
of surprises!
jpnChrName: ハッ、一国の世継ぎと こんな所で出くわすとはな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、一国の世継ぎと
こんな所で出くわすとはな。

engChrName: I knew you were one of the sponsors for the film festival...
engSearchText:
I knew you were one of the sponsors for the
film festival...
jpnChrName: 映画祭のスポンサーという話は 聞いていましたけど……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭のスポンサーという話は
聞いていましたけど……

engChrName: ...but I can't believe someone of your stature would actually receive one of those threatening notes.
engSearchText:
...but I can't believe someone of your stature would
actually receive one of those threatening notes.
jpnChrName: ……まさか、そのような方にまで 脅迫状が届けられていたなんて。
jpnSearchText:
……まさか、そのような方にまで
脅迫状が届けられていたなんて。

engChrName: Well, it's true, unfortunately. The contents are the same as the one we got.
engSearchText:
Well, it's true, unfortunately. The contents are the
same as the one we got.
jpnChrName: ……間違いありません、 私たちに届いたものと同じ文面です。
jpnSearchText:
……間違いありません、
私たちに届いたものと同じ文面です。

engChrName: The prince got the letter five days ago. He's been staying at the grand suite. That's just about the same time as ours came in.
engSearchText:
The prince got the letter five days ago. He's been
staying at the grand suite. That's just about the same
time as ours came in.
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: 殿下の宿泊するグランスイートに届いたのは ５日前──あたしたちとほぼ同時期ね。
jpnSearchText:
殿下の宿泊するグランスイートに届いたのは
５日前──あたしたちとほぼ同時期ね。

engChrName: I guess that means they were sent to both Edith and Tharbad at the same time, then, huh?
engSearchText:
I guess that means they were sent to both Edith and
Tharbad at the same time, then, huh?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: すると首都とサルバッドに 同時に送りつけたことになるのか……
jpnSearchText:
すると首都とサルバッドに
同時に送りつけたことになるのか……

engChrName: I initiated an investigation immediately, of course, but we still haven't determined how the note got to the prince.
engSearchText:
I initiated an investigation immediately, of course,
but we still haven't determined how the note got to
the prince.
jpnChrName: すぐさま調査を手配しましたが、 郵送でのルートも未だ辿れていません。
jpnSearchText:
すぐさま調査を手配しましたが、
郵送でのルートも未だ辿れていません。

engChrName: At the very least, it appears to have been expertly camouflaged.
engSearchText:
At the very least, it appears to have been
expertly camouflaged.
jpnChrName: 巧妙な偽装が施されているようです。
jpnSearchText: 巧妙な偽装が施されているようです。

engChrName: Sounds just like what happened with Saara when she got her note.
engSearchText:
Sounds just like what happened with Saara when she
got her note.
jpnChrName: サァラさんの時と同じみたいですね……
jpnSearchText: サァラさんの時と同じみたいですね……

engChrName: You're referring to the dancer I recommended to Gotti, yes? I'd heard she'd received one as well.
engSearchText:
You're referring to the dancer I recommended to
Gotti, yes? I'd heard she'd received one as well.
jpnChrName: 私が監督に推薦した、踊り子の彼女だね。 そちらにも先ほど届いたそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
私が監督に推薦した、踊り子の彼女だね。
そちらにも先ほど届いたそうだが……

engChrName: Given she was only scouted this afternoon, however, that is...exceedingly swift. The timing is too perfect.
engSearchText:
Given she was only scouted this afternoon, however,
that is...exceedingly swift. The timing is too perfect.
jpnChrName: 昼間スカウトした直後に届くというのは いくらなんでも早すぎるし、入念すぎる。
jpnSearchText:
昼間スカウトした直後に届くというのは
いくらなんでも早すぎるし、入念すぎる。

engChrName: I believe at this stage that we can safely rule out this being some mere prank. Do you agree?
engSearchText:
I believe at this stage that we can safely rule out this
being some mere prank. Do you agree?
jpnChrName: やはりただの悪戯とは考えにくいと 思うんだが……どうかな？
jpnSearchText:
やはりただの悪戯とは考えにくいと
思うんだが……どうかな？

engChrName: Yeah. I'm right there with you.
engSearchText: Yeah. I'm right there with you.
jpnChrName: ええ、それについては同感です。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それについては同感です。

engChrName: In fact, I think it crossed that line as soon as you were sent your note, Your Highness.
engSearchText:
In fact, I think it crossed that line as soon as you were
sent your note, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: そもそも殿下に届いている時点で ただの悪戯の線はあり得ないでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも殿下に届いている時点で
ただの悪戯の線はあり得ないでしょう。

engChrName: Yeah. Whoever we're dealing with, this guy's either got guts or he's a complete dumbass. Maybe even a little bit of both.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Whoever we're dealing with, this guy's either
got guts or he's a complete dumbass. Maybe even a
little bit of both.
jpnChrName: クク、でなけりゃよっぽど、 肝が据わってるか馬鹿のどちらかだな。
jpnSearchText:
クク、でなけりゃよっぽど、
肝が据わってるか馬鹿のどちらかだな。

engChrName: That being said, for a guy who received a threat, you seem pretty relaxed about it, Your Highness.
engSearchText:
That being said, for a guy who received a threat, you
seem pretty relaxed about it, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: しかし、そんなのが送り付けられた割に ずいぶん余裕そうだな、アンタ？
jpnSearchText:
しかし、そんなのが送り付けられた割に
ずいぶん余裕そうだな、アンタ？

engChrName: Must feel pretty confident in your lady friend there to approach the likes of us, too.
engSearchText:
Must feel pretty confident in your lady friend there to
approach the likes of us, too.
jpnChrName: 俺らみたいなのに近づくのも含めて── よっぽどその姉さんを信頼してんのか？
jpnSearchText:
俺らみたいなのに近づくのも含めて──
よっぽどその姉さんを信頼してんのか？

engChrName: Haha! You are not incorrect, my friend.
engSearchText: Haha! You are not incorrect, my friend.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それはもう。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それはもう。

engChrName: Truth be told, she is also my bodyguard, and one of the principality's greatest swordfighters. Quite possibly its very best.
engSearchText:
Truth be told, she is also my bodyguard, and one of
the principality's greatest swordfighters.
Quite possibly its very best.
jpnChrName: 彼女は私の秘書だが護衛も兼任していて 剣術ともなれば公国一、二を争う腕前──
jpnSearchText:
彼女は私の秘書だが護衛も兼任していて
剣術ともなれば公国一、二を争う腕前──

engChrName: In fact, I would go so far as to reckon she outclasses even the likes of Mr. Arkride and your concierge.
engSearchText:
In fact, I would go so far as to reckon she outclasses
even the likes of Mr. Arkride and your concierge.
jpnChrName: アークライド氏やそちらのＳＣ殿も 恐らく上回るほどの使い手だからね。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド氏やそちらのＳＣ殿も
恐らく上回るほどの使い手だからね。

engChrName: No kidding?
engSearchText: No kidding?

engChrName: To be honest, I suspected as much since first laying eyes on her.
engSearchText:
To be honest, I suspected as much since first laying
eyes on her.
jpnChrName: ふふ、元より足元にも及ばぬかと。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、元より足元にも及ばぬかと。

engChrName: You got me there. Hard to stack up against a bodyguard serving such a hot shot.
engSearchText:
You got me there. Hard to stack up against a
bodyguard serving such a hot shot.
jpnChrName: ま、お世継ぎの護衛役と比べられちゃあ さすがに分が悪いですね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お世継ぎの護衛役と比べられちゃあ
さすがに分が悪いですね。

engChrName: Oh, and just to be clear, Van's fine. No need to be stiff with me.
engSearchText:
Oh, and just to be clear, Van's fine. No need to be
stiff with me.
jpnChrName: ああ、自分は呼び捨てで結構ですよ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、自分は呼び捨てで結構ですよ。

engChrName: Van it is, then. You are twenty-four, yes? That makes me three years older than you.
engSearchText:
Van it is, then. You are twenty-four, yes? That makes
me three years older than you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ならばヴァン君で── ２４だったか？　３つ年上なのでね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ならばヴァン君で──
２４だったか？　３つ年上なのでね。

engChrName: Everything Mr. Gotti has told me about you adds up. You clearly have a lot of promise.
engSearchText:
Everything Mr. Gotti has told me about you adds up.
You clearly have a lot of promise.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督から聞いた通り 中々見所があるようじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督から聞いた通り
中々見所があるようじゃないか。

engChrName: After all, not just anyone could discern the deep, nuanced themes behind Golden Blood.
engSearchText:
After all, not just anyone could discern the deep,
nuanced themes behind Golden Blood.
jpnChrName: 『ゴールデンブラッド』も 深いテーマまで見抜いたようだし。
jpnSearchText:
『ゴールデンブラッド』も
深いテーマまで見抜いたようだし。

engChrName: ...I suppose I am right in thinking you've seen the limited run R-17 director's cut?
engSearchText:
...I suppose I am right in thinking you've seen the
limited run R-17 director's cut?
jpnChrName: ──するとやはり 限定公開の『完全（Ｒ１７）版』の方も……？
jpnSearchText:
──するとやはり
限定公開の『完全（Ｒ１７）版』の方も……？

engChrName: Of course! No real fan could miss it! Wish I could catch it again while I'm here, too.
engSearchText:
Of course! No real fan could miss it! Wish I could
catch it again while I'm here, too.
jpnChrName: ええ、マストでしょう。 むしろそっちで見るつもりでしたが。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、マストでしょう。
むしろそっちで見るつもりでしたが。

engChrName: But with my underage assistants taggin' along, I can't. A shame. It makes for a real good watch.
engSearchText:
But with my underage assistants taggin' along, I can't.
A shame. It makes for a real good watch.
jpnChrName: 助手たち連れだったもんで仕方なく── まあたまには新鮮ですがね。
jpnSearchText:
助手たち連れだったもんで仕方なく──
まあたまには新鮮ですがね。

engChrName: Ah, I knew you were a man of taste! I couldn't agree more!
engSearchText:
Ah, I knew you were a man of taste! I couldn't
agree more!
jpnChrName: 分かる、分かるぞヴァン君！
jpnSearchText: 分かる、分かるぞヴァン君！

engChrName: My younger sister once happened to see it as well, and I'll tell you, she was giving me the dirtiest looks for the longest time after that...
engSearchText:
My younger sister once happened to see it as well,
and I'll tell you, she was giving me the dirtiest looks
for the longest time after that...
jpnChrName: 私も妹に一度『完全版』を見られて しばらくのあいだ氷のような目で……
jpnSearchText:
私も妹に一度『完全版』を見られて
しばらくのあいだ氷のような目で……

engChrName: Sounds like it must've been a tryin' time in the Asval household.
engSearchText:
Sounds like it must've been a tryin' time in the
Asval household.
jpnChrName: そいつは災難でしたねぇ。
jpnSearchText: そいつは災難でしたねぇ。

engChrName: Wow. These two are like peas in a pod.
engSearchText: Wow. These two are like peas in a pod.
jpnChrName: 盛り上がってますね～。
jpnSearchText: 盛り上がってますね～。

engChrName: You don't have to get so excited, Van. Please.
engSearchText: You don't have to get so excited, Van. Please.
jpnChrName: もう、ヴァンさんも……
jpnSearchText: もう、ヴァンさんも……

engChrName: I suppose I shouldn't be surprised that a man of His Highness' status would even know Mr. Arkride's age.
engSearchText:
I suppose I shouldn't be surprised that a man of His
Highness' status would even know Mr. Arkride's age.
jpnChrName: ヴァン様の年齢まで把握 されていたのも流石ですが……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様の年齢まで把握
されていたのも流石ですが……

engChrName: I like him. He's a guy who's clearly true to himself. You don't see high-and-mighty rich boys as unreserved as him every day.
engSearchText:
I like him. He's a guy who's clearly true to himself.
You don't see high-and-mighty rich boys as
unreserved as him every day.
jpnChrName: クク、素だなありゃ。 面白い跡継ぎじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クク、素だなありゃ。
面白い跡継ぎじゃねえか。

engChrName: It must be so tiring working with a guy like him all the time, isn't it?
engSearchText:
It must be so tiring working with a guy like him all
the time, isn't it?
engHtmlText: ピンクブロンドの女性
jpnChrName: ……貴女も大変ねぇ？
jpnSearchText: ……貴女も大変ねぇ？

engChrName: No, I'm...used to it at this point.
engSearchText: No, I'm...used to it at this point.
jpnChrName: いえ…… 慣れておりますので。
jpnSearchText:
いえ……
慣れておりますので。

engChrName: Hey, is that Judith Lanster? And Nina Fenly?!
engSearchText: Hey, is that Judith Lanster? And Nina Fenly?!
jpnChrName: お、ジュディス・ランスターに ニナ・フェンリィじゃね！？
jpnSearchText:
お、ジュディス・ランスターに
ニナ・フェンリィじゃね！？

engChrName: Wow! Real stars out and about in their swimsuits! Only at the Al-Jumeirah, I tell you!
engSearchText:
Wow! Real stars out and about in their swimsuits!
Only at the Al-Jumeirah, I tell you!
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、スターが水着でお出迎えとは さすがアルジュメイラだねぇ！
jpnSearchText:
ヒュウ、スターが水着でお出迎えとは
さすがアルジュメイラだねぇ！

engChrName: Hey, could you girls give us autographs? Or better yet, why not come and have some fun with us, huh?
engSearchText:
Hey, could you girls give us autographs? Or better yet,
why not come and have some fun with us, huh?
jpnChrName: おお、サインしてもらおうぜ！ つーかオレたちと一緒に遊ばねーか？
jpnSearchText:
おお、サインしてもらおうぜ！
つーかオレたちと一緒に遊ばねーか？

engChrName: ...Wait.
engSearchText: ...Wait.
jpnChrName: って──
jpnSearchText: って──

engChrName: We meet again.
engSearchText: We meet again.
jpnChrName: ……また貴方たちですか。
jpnSearchText: ……また貴方たちですか。

engChrName: This is where you guys are staying? Of all the places...
engSearchText: This is where you guys are staying? Of all the places...
jpnChrName: まさかこちらに宿泊を……？
jpnSearchText: まさかこちらに宿泊を……？

engChrName: This place must take anyone who can pay if they'll let trash like this stay here.
engSearchText:
This place must take anyone who can pay if they'll let
trash like this stay here.
jpnChrName: ハッ、こんなのを泊めるとは 品格も何もあったもんじゃねぇな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、こんなのを泊めるとは
品格も何もあったもんじゃねぇな。

engChrName: Give me a break! You're those pricks from this afternoon!
engSearchText:
Give me a break! You're those pricks from
this afternoon!
jpnChrName: て、てめぇらは昼間の……！
jpnSearchText: て、てめぇらは昼間の……！

engChrName: What the hell are you doing here?!
engSearchText: What the hell are you doing here?!
jpnChrName: な、なんでこんなところに……！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんでこんなところに……！？

engChrName: Oh, more guests. Are these friends of yours?
engSearchText: Oh, more guests. Are these friends of yours?
jpnChrName: ほう……お友達かい？
jpnSearchText: ほう……お友達かい？

engChrName: Not quite. We had a little business with them earlier today. Sorry, Your Highness. I'll make everyone pipe down.
engSearchText:
Not quite. We had a little business with them
earlier today. Sorry, Your Highness. I'll make
everyone pipe down.
jpnChrName: 昼間ちょいとね。 すみません、静かにさせますよ。
jpnSearchText:
昼間ちょいとね。
すみません、静かにさせますよ。

engChrName: Like hell you will! Your luck's run out, buddy! You're in big trouble!
engSearchText:
Like hell you will! Your luck's run out, buddy!
You're in big trouble!
jpnChrName: ふざけんな……！ ここで会ったが百年目ってヤツだ！
jpnSearchText:
ふざけんな……！
ここで会ったが百年目ってヤツだ！

engChrName: You guys take on the dudes. We'll—
engSearchText: You guys take on the dudes. We'll—
jpnChrName: 君たち、そっちの男共をまとめて──
jpnSearchText: 君たち、そっちの男共をまとめて──

engChrName: Huh...?
engSearchText: Huh...?

engChrName: Aaaaaaaaahh!
engSearchText: Aaaaaaaaahh!
jpnChrName: なああああああっ！？
jpnSearchText: なああああああっ！？

engChrName: Holy...
engSearchText: Holy...

engChrName: (She moved so fast!)
engSearchText: (She moved so fast!)
jpnChrName: （今の動きは……）
jpnSearchText: （今の動きは……）

engChrName: Oh, my. Have more young men come to play? ❤
engSearchText: Oh, my. Have more young men come to play? ❤
jpnChrName: あらヤダ、若い柔肌❤
jpnSearchText: あらヤダ、若い柔肌❤

engChrName: I've got to hand it to you all. It takes guts picking a fight with the prince of Elsaim.
engSearchText:
I've got to hand it to you all. It takes guts picking a
fight with the prince of Elsaim.
jpnChrName: アナタたち、エルザイムの公太子様に 絡むなんて度胸があるわねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
アナタたち、エルザイムの公太子様に
絡むなんて度胸があるわねぇ。

engChrName: Shouldn't you boys be enjoying this beautiful night elsewhere?
engSearchText:
Shouldn't you boys be enjoying this beautiful
night elsewhere?
jpnChrName: せっかくのいい夜、大人しく 楽しんだほうがいいんじゃなくて？
jpnSearchText:
せっかくのいい夜、大人しく
楽しんだほうがいいんじゃなくて？

engChrName: Althooough if you insist on staying, I'll be more than happy to show you all a good time. ❤
engSearchText:
Althooough if you insist on staying, I'll be more than
happy to show you all a good time. ❤
jpnChrName: そ・れ・と・も、 アタシが遊んであげましょうか❤
jpnSearchText:
そ・れ・と・も、
アタシが遊んであげましょうか❤

engChrName: O-Our mistake! We'll be leaving now!
engSearchText: O-Our mistake! We'll be leaving now!
jpnChrName: し、失礼しました～っ……！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>し、失礼しました～っ……！！

engChrName: No wonder you're His Highness' right hand. That's some quick swordplay you've got there.
engSearchText:
No wonder you're His Highness' right hand.
That's some quick swordplay you've got there.
jpnChrName: さすがは殿下の懐刀。 鮮やかな手並みだねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
さすがは殿下の懐刀。
鮮やかな手並みだねぇ？

engChrName: It was nothing. I could have handled ones such as them in my sleep.
engSearchText:
It was nothing. I could have handled ones such as
them in my sleep.
jpnChrName: ……いえ。 この程度は児戯でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
……いえ。
この程度は児戯でしょう。

engChrName: As I said. One of the Principality's best.
engSearchText: As I said. One of the Principality's best.
jpnChrName: フフ、言うだけはあるだろう？
jpnSearchText: フフ、言うだけはあるだろう？

engChrName: No doubt.
engSearchText: No doubt.
jpnChrName: ……ハッ。
jpnSearchText: ……ハッ。

engChrName: (Wow. There's someone even better than Elaine and Sylphid...? Guess I have a lot to learn.)
engSearchText:
(Wow. There's someone even better than Elaine and
Sylphid...? Guess I have a lot to learn.)
jpnChrName: （エレインさんや《妖精》以上の……   ……世の中は広いですね。）
jpnSearchText:
（エレインさんや《妖精》以上の……
……世の中は広いですね。）

engChrName: Well! With that excitement out of the way, I suppose now's as good a time as any to wrap up.
engSearchText:
Well! With that excitement out of the way, I suppose
now's as good a time as any to wrap up.
jpnChrName: ──さて、水も差された事だし 今宵はこれくらいにしておこうか。
jpnSearchText:
──さて、水も差された事だし
今宵はこれくらいにしておこうか。

engChrName: I know it is not much, but I'm prepared to offer the same sum as these ladies in exchange for your services.
engSearchText:
I know it is not much, but I'm prepared to offer the
same sum as these ladies in exchange for
your services.
jpnChrName: ささやかだが私からも彼女たちと 同額の報酬を用意させてもらうつもりだ。
jpnSearchText:
ささやかだが私からも彼女たちと
同額の報酬を用意させてもらうつもりだ。

engChrName: But please, don't let my case trump theirs. Whenever you figure things out, just be sure to pass the information on to me.
engSearchText:
But please, don't let my case trump theirs.
Whenever you figure things out, just be sure to pass
the information on to me.
jpnChrName: ご婦人方を優先して構わないので 何か分かったら情報を回してくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
ご婦人方を優先して構わないので
何か分かったら情報を回してくれたまえ。

engChrName: It was a pleasure to meet you all. I expect great things from your impromptu helper as well.
engSearchText:
It was a pleasure to meet you all. I expect great things
from your impromptu helper as well.
jpnChrName: 良き出会いに感謝を── 臨時スタッフ殿にも期待させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
良き出会いに感謝を──
臨時スタッフ殿にも期待させてもらうよ。

engChrName: Okay, seriously. What's the deal with that maid of yours, huh?
engSearchText:
Okay, seriously. What's the deal with that maid of
yours, huh?
jpnChrName: ……ほんと何モンだ、あのメイド？
jpnSearchText: ……ほんと何モンだ、あのメイド？

engChrName: That prince seemed extra keen on her for some reason, too.
engSearchText:
That prince seemed extra keen on her for some
reason, too.
jpnChrName: あの公太子どもも 妙に気にしてたみたいだが。
jpnSearchText:
あの公太子どもも
妙に気にしてたみたいだが。

engChrName: ...So it wasn't just me who noticed, huh?
engSearchText: ...So it wasn't just me who noticed, huh?
jpnChrName: ……気付いてたか。
jpnSearchText: ……気付いてたか。

engChrName: But given her employment background, maybe it's not so weird that word about her gets around.
engSearchText:
But given her employment background, maybe it's
not so weird that word about her gets around.
jpnChrName: ま、出向元の“背景”を 考えりゃ色々あんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、出向元の“背景”を
考えりゃ色々あんだろ。

engChrName: For real?
engSearchText: For real?
jpnChrName: ハン……？
jpnSearchText: ハン……？
