engChrName: You sure are trusting of this woman you have a shady ass contract with, too, you know.
engSearchText:
You sure are trusting of this woman you have a shady
ass contract with, too, you know.
jpnChrName: つーか怪しげな契約だけの関係で てめぇもよく信用できるモンだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
つーか怪しげな契約だけの関係で
てめぇもよく信用できるモンだぜ。

engChrName: Today was your first time actually meeting her, wasn't it?
engSearchText:
Today was your first time actually meeting her,
wasn't it?
jpnChrName: 会ったのも初めてなんだろ？
jpnSearchText: 会ったのも初めてなんだろ？

engChrName: Yeah, but we've been in touch, back and forth, for about three years now. It's not like I don't know her at all.
engSearchText:
Yeah, but we've been in touch, back and forth, for
about three years now. It's not like I don't know her
at all.
jpnChrName: ま、通信だけだったが ３年近くの付き合いになるからな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、通信だけだったが
３年近くの付き合いになるからな。

engChrName: But never mind that. Let's have our little peek and then head straight back. We don't want the girls worryin' about us.
engSearchText:
But never mind that. Let's have our little peek and
then head straight back. We don't want the girls
worryin' about us.
jpnChrName: ──とっとと覗いてサッと帰るぞ。 女子どもに心配かけねぇうちにな。
jpnSearchText:
──とっとと覗いてサッと帰るぞ。
女子どもに心配かけねぇうちにな。

engChrName: You sound like an old dad fretting over his daughter.
engSearchText: You sound like an old dad fretting over his daughter.
jpnChrName: ハッ、思春期の娘がいる オヤジかっつの。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、思春期の娘がいる
オヤジかっつの。

engChrName: I'm not that old, damn it!
engSearchText: I'm not that old, damn it!
jpnChrName: そんな歳じゃねえよ！！
jpnSearchText: そんな歳じゃねえよ！！

engChrName: Oh, yeah. Better make sure I go prepared.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. Better make sure I go prepared.
jpnChrName: ……そういや、 今のうちに仕込んどくか。
jpnSearchText:
……そういや、
今のうちに仕込んどくか。

engChrName: Huh? What're you doing? Let's hurry up and go in already.
engSearchText:
Huh? What're you doing? Let's hurry up and go
in already.
jpnChrName: アン……？ いいからとっとと行こうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
アン……？
いいからとっとと行こうぜ。

engChrName: *whistle* Hell yeah! Now THIS is how you run a club!
engSearchText:
*whistle* Hell yeah! Now THIS is how you run
a club!
jpnChrName: ヒュウ、いいじゃねーか♪ こういうのだよ、こういうの。
jpnSearchText:
ヒュウ、いいじゃねーか♪
こういうのだよ、こういうの。

engChrName: Let's find some empty seats and get our asses in them, already.
engSearchText:
Let's find some empty seats and get our asses in
them, already.
jpnChrName: さーて、空いてる席はと……
jpnSearchText: さーて、空いてる席はと……

engChrName: I'll have a Tharbad Night. What about you?
engSearchText: I'll have a Tharbad Night. What about you?
jpnChrName: 《サルバッドナイト》１つ。 そっちはどうする？
jpnSearchText:
《サルバッドナイト》１つ。
そっちはどうする？

engChrName: I'll take an Alexander. Extra nutmeg.
engSearchText: I'll take an Alexander. Extra nutmeg.
jpnChrName: アレキサンダー。 ナツメグ多めで。
jpnSearchText:
アレキサンダー。
ナツメグ多めで。

engChrName: As you wish, sirs.
engSearchText: As you wish, sirs.
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: かしこまりました。

engChrName: You're nothing if not consistent, aren't you?
engSearchText: You're nothing if not consistent, aren't you?
jpnChrName: ったく、徹底してんな……
jpnSearchText: ったく、徹底してんな……

engChrName: What can I say? You gotta have it with nutmeg. It's pretty damn good, you know.
engSearchText:
What can I say? You gotta have it with nutmeg.
It's pretty damn good, you know.
jpnChrName: 本場のナツメグ入りだ。 結構イケるぜ？
jpnSearchText:
本場のナツメグ入りだ。
結構イケるぜ？

engChrName: (What was that?)
engSearchText: (What was that?)

engChrName: Heheh. The women here are exquisite.
engSearchText: Heheh. The women here are exquisite.
jpnChrName: クク──なかなかイカスのを 揃えてるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
クク──なかなかイカスのを
揃えてるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Wouldn't you agree?
engSearchText: Wouldn't you agree?
jpnChrName: お前さんもそう思わねえか？
jpnSearchText: お前さんもそう思わねえか？

engChrName: Wait, what are—
engSearchText: Wait, what are—
jpnChrName: ……アンタらは……
jpnSearchText: ……アンタらは……

engChrName: Oh, come now, darling. Don't go lighting up in here. I'm sorry, dear. He's just had a little much to drink, is all.
engSearchText:
Oh, come now, darling. Don't go lighting up in here.
I'm sorry, dear. He's just had a little much to drink,
is all.
jpnChrName: 絡まんの、旦さんったら。 ごめんねぇ、ちょいと酔ってはるの。
jpnSearchText:
絡まんの、旦さんったら。
ごめんねぇ、ちょいと酔ってはるの。

engChrName: Still, there's something to be said for the occasional indulgence.
engSearchText:
Still, there's something to be said for the
occasional indulgence.
jpnChrName: でもええねぇ、たまにはこういうのも。
jpnSearchText: でもええねぇ、たまにはこういうのも。

engChrName: Just so. It's been some time since I last found myself in this city. It's shaping up to be a good stay.
engSearchText:
Just so. It's been some time since I last found myself
in this city. It's shaping up to be a good stay.
jpnChrName: ああ、サルバッドは久々だが なかなか愉しませてくれそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、サルバッドは久々だが
なかなか愉しませてくれそうだ。

engChrName: And I, for one, plan to make the most of it.
engSearchText: And I, for one, plan to make the most of it.
jpnChrName: せいぜい物見遊山といくか。
jpnSearchText: せいぜい物見遊山といくか。

engChrName: We should leave some parting gifts here as well for such a lovely time. It's only polite.
engSearchText:
We should leave some parting gifts here as well for
such a lovely time. It's only polite.
jpnChrName: うふふ、おひねりも たぁんと用意しとかんとなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、おひねりも
たぁんと用意しとかんとなぁ。

engChrName: The only question is what sort of presents young ladies like these days.
engSearchText:
The only question is what sort of presents young
ladies like these days.
jpnChrName: 今時の若い子にはどんなのが 悦んでもらえるやろねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
今時の若い子にはどんなのが
悦んでもらえるやろねぇ？

engChrName: Now that's what I'm talking about! I couldn't take my eyes off that dancing!
engSearchText:
Now that's what I'm talking about!
I couldn't take my eyes off that dancing!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございました～！ いや～、素晴らしいダンスでした！
jpnSearchText:
ありがとうございました～！
いや～、素晴らしいダンスでした！

engChrName: And now, the woman you've all been waiting for...
engSearchText: And now, the woman you've all been waiting for...
jpnChrName: 続きましては皆さんお待ちかね──
jpnSearchText: 続きましては皆さんお待ちかね──

engChrName: ...Hey.
engSearchText: ...Hey.
jpnChrName: ……おい。
jpnSearchText: ……おい。

engChrName: Hey! Pay attention!
engSearchText: Hey! Pay attention!
jpnChrName: おいって、見ろよ……！
jpnSearchText: おいって、見ろよ……！

engChrName: What? What's the big—
engSearchText: What? What's the big—
jpnChrName: ……っ、なんだ──
jpnSearchText: ……っ、なんだ──

engChrName: Here she is, ladies and gentlemen! Tonight's star!
engSearchText: Here she is, ladies and gentlemen! Tonight's star!
jpnChrName: さあ、今宵の“真打ち”の登場です！
jpnSearchText: さあ、今宵の“真打ち”の登場です！

engChrName: Tharbad's most beautiful nocturnal butterfly, handpicked to take part in the upcoming Carnal Cavalcade, it's...
engSearchText:
Tharbad's most beautiful nocturnal butterfly,
handpicked to take part in the upcoming Carnal
Cavalcade, it's...
jpnChrName: この度、映画祭を彩るフォクシーパレードに 選ばれたサルバッドきっての夜の蝶──
jpnSearchText:
この度、映画祭を彩るフォクシーパレードに
選ばれたサルバッドきっての夜の蝶──

engChrName: Lady...Saaraaaaaa!
engSearchText: Lady...Saaraaaaaa!
jpnChrName: サァラ嬢でございます！
jpnSearchText: サァラ嬢でございます！

engChrName: You won't want to miss this! This could be her last performance here if her debut at the film festival makes a splash!
engSearchText:
You won't want to miss this! This could be her last
performance here if her debut at the film festival
makes a splash!
jpnChrName: そちら方面でデビューすれば ここでの出演は最後かもしれません！
jpnSearchText:
そちら方面でデビューすれば
ここでの出演は最後かもしれません！

engChrName: They say nobody's managed to take this vixen home. If anyone hopes to break that streak, tonight's your last shot!
engSearchText:
They say nobody's managed to take this vixen home.
If anyone hopes to break that streak, tonight's your
last shot!
jpnChrName: “お持ち帰り”は難攻不落と噂の彼女、 これを機会にトライしてみては！？
jpnSearchText:
“お持ち帰り”は難攻不落と噂の彼女、
これを機会にトライしてみては！？

engChrName: But enough from me! Cue the music!
engSearchText: But enough from me! Cue the music!
jpnChrName: それではミュージック・スタートっ！
jpnSearchText: それではミュージック・スタートっ！

engChrName: October 6th, 12:30AM
engSearchText: October 6th, 12:30AM

engChrName: Ahh. So you got debts to pay.
engSearchText: Ahh. So you got debts to pay.
jpnChrName: ──借金、か。
jpnSearchText: ──借金、か。

engChrName: Yeah...
engSearchText: Yeah...
jpnSearchText: ……はい………

engChrName: My sister and I, we're not originally from Calvard. We grew up in a town in the Central East.
engSearchText:
My sister and I, we're not originally from Calvard.
We grew up in a town in the Central East.
jpnChrName: 元々私たちはカルバードではなく 大陸中東のある町で暮らしていました。
jpnSearchText:
元々私たちはカルバードではなく
大陸中東のある町で暮らしていました。

engChrName: When Shaheena was still little, my parents had a hard time making ends meet and borrowed money from some...unsavory characters.
engSearchText:
When Shaheena was still little, my parents had a hard
time making ends meet and borrowed money from
some...unsavory characters.
jpnChrName: まだ妹が幼い頃、両親が生活に困って 良くない筋から借りたみたいで……
jpnSearchText:
まだ妹が幼い頃、両親が生活に困って
良くない筋から借りたみたいで……

engChrName: Once my parents passed on, I tried to run away with Shaheena and we ended up here.
engSearchText:
Once my parents passed on, I tried to run away with
Shaheena and we ended up here.
jpnChrName: 両親の死後、逃げるようにして こちらに移り住んできたんです。
jpnSearchText:
両親の死後、逃げるようにして
こちらに移り住んできたんです。

engChrName: I'm guessing your peace and quiet didn't last long, and they were banging on your door soon enough?
engSearchText:
I'm guessing your peace and quiet didn't last long,
and they were banging on your door soon enough?
jpnChrName: だが結局目ざとく見つけられて 返済を迫られてるってわけだ。
jpnSearchText:
だが結局目ざとく見つけられて
返済を迫られてるってわけだ。

engChrName: Chasing you all the way out here... Those must've been some bad dudes your parents borrowed from.
engSearchText:
Chasing you all the way out here... Those must've
been some bad dudes your parents borrowed from.
jpnChrName: 昼の稼ぎと合わせても いまだ返せてねぇってことは……
jpnSearchText:
昼の稼ぎと合わせても
いまだ返せてねぇってことは……

engChrName: The fact you've got this side hustle, too, and still haven't paid it off says a lot.
engSearchText:
The fact you've got this side hustle, too, and still
haven't paid it off says a lot.
jpnChrName: 相当ロクでもねぇところから 借りたみてぇだな？
jpnSearchText:
相当ロクでもねぇところから
借りたみてぇだな？

engChrName: I know. It's not something I'm exactly proud of...
engSearchText: I know. It's not something I'm exactly proud of...
jpnChrName: ふふ……お恥ずかしい話です。
jpnSearchText: ふふ……お恥ずかしい話です。

engChrName: Why? There's nothing to be ashamed of.
engSearchText: Why? There's nothing to be ashamed of.
jpnChrName: あ？　別に恥じることでもねーだろ。
jpnSearchText: あ？　別に恥じることでもねーだろ。

engChrName: It's not like you've had to go and sell your body or anything. Hell, even if you did, you'd just be doing what you had to in order to survive.
engSearchText:
It's not like you've had to go and sell your body
or anything. Hell, even if you did, you'd just be doing
what you had to in order to survive.
jpnChrName: 身体売ってるわけでもなし── 仮にそうでも、だからどうしたって話だが。
jpnSearchText:
身体売ってるわけでもなし──
仮にそうでも、だからどうしたって話だが。
……………………

engChrName: To be completely honest... That's exactly how they wanted me to pay them back, at first.
engSearchText:
To be completely honest... That's exactly how they
wanted me to pay them back, at first.
jpnChrName: ……最初の頃は“そういう返済方法”も 迫られはしたんです。
jpnSearchText:
……最初の頃は“そういう返済方法”も
迫られはしたんです。

engChrName: But I heard about Calvard and its system for absolving debts taken up by one's parents.
engSearchText:
But I heard about Calvard and its system for
absolving debts taken up by one's parents.
jpnChrName: それと共和国では親の借金を放棄できる 制度があることも聞いていました……
jpnSearchText:
それと共和国では親の借金を放棄できる
制度があることも聞いていました……

engChrName: When I thought about it, though, doing either one of those things would feel like I'd be renouncing their memories.
engSearchText:
When I thought about it, though, doing either one of
those things would feel like I'd be renouncing
their memories.
jpnChrName: ですがどちらの方法も……両親との絆を 断ってしまうような気がして……
jpnSearchText:
ですがどちらの方法も……両親との絆を
断ってしまうような気がして……

engChrName: So you decided to repay them with the dancing you'd picked up in the family. I get it.
engSearchText:
So you decided to repay them with the dancing you'd
picked up in the family. I get it.
jpnChrName: あくまで受け継いだ踊りで、 返すことを選んだってわけか。
jpnSearchText:
あくまで受け継いだ踊りで、
返すことを選んだってわけか。

engChrName: Way I see it, as long as those guys get their money back, they really can't complain how you make it.
engSearchText:
Way I see it, as long as those guys get their money
back, they really can't complain how you make it.
jpnChrName: ま、ミラさえ回収できりゃ 連中は文句は言わねえだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ミラさえ回収できりゃ
連中は文句は言わねえだろうが。

engChrName: No wonder you were so hesitant on bringing in the guild earlier.
engSearchText:
No wonder you were so hesitant on bringing in the
guild earlier.
jpnChrName: ハッ、だからギルドに頼むのを 避けてやがったわけか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、だからギルドに頼むのを
避けてやがったわけか。

engChrName: More or less. I appreciate what they do, but...I have to imagine they'd recommend I get the debt forgiven, and, well.
engSearchText:
More or less. I appreciate what they do, but...I have
to imagine they'd recommend I get the debt forgiven,
and, well.
jpnChrName: はい……尊敬していますけど 放棄を勧められそうでしたので。
jpnSearchText:
はい……尊敬していますけど
放棄を勧められそうでしたので。

engChrName: It's stupid to be so proud over something like this, I know.
engSearchText:
It's stupid to be so proud over something like this,
I know.
jpnChrName: つまらない意地、ですよね。
jpnSearchText: つまらない意地、ですよね。

engChrName: It's not exactly the most elegant way to go about things, to be sure.
engSearchText:
It's not exactly the most elegant way to go about
things, to be sure.
jpnChrName: まあ、不器用だとは思うがな。
jpnSearchText: まあ、不器用だとは思うがな。

engChrName: ...From the way you're talking, I'm guessin' you haven't said anything to your sister?
engSearchText:
...From the way you're talking, I'm guessin' you
haven't said anything to your sister?
jpnChrName: ──その様子じゃ 妹には言ってなさそうだな？
jpnSearchText:
──その様子じゃ
妹には言ってなさそうだな？

engChrName: Not just about your other job, but the debt itself.
engSearchText: Not just about your other job, but the debt itself.
jpnChrName: 夜の踊り、いや借金のことすらもか。
jpnSearchText: 夜の踊り、いや借金のことすらもか。

engChrName: It's...hard to tell her everything this far in, you know?
engSearchText: It's...hard to tell her everything this far in, you know?
jpnChrName: ……今さら打ち明けるなんて、とても。
jpnSearchText: ……今さら打ち明けるなんて、とても。

engChrName: Plus there's actually some light at the end of the tunnel now.
engSearchText:
Plus there's actually some light at the end of the
tunnel now.
jpnChrName: それに──今になってようやく 完済の希望が出てきたところなんです。
jpnSearchText:
それに──今になってようやく
完済の希望が出てきたところなんです。

engChrName: Once I get my commission for taking part in the Carnal Cavalcade, I should be able to pay the remainder off.
engSearchText:
Once I get my commission for taking part in the
Carnal Cavalcade, I should be able to pay the
remainder off.
jpnChrName: 今日、お誘いをもらった フォクシーパレードの出演料さえ入れば。
jpnSearchText:
今日、お誘いをもらった
フォクシーパレードの出演料さえ入れば。

engChrName: Aaah, so that's what you've got planned, huh?
engSearchText: Aaah, so that's what you've got planned, huh?
jpnChrName: ハッ、そういうことか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、そういうことか。

engChrName: But man, I just do not get it. Why does everybody around me seem to always pick the path of most resistance?
engSearchText:
But man, I just do not get it. Why does everybody
around me seem to always pick the path of
most resistance?
jpnChrName: ったく……どいつもこいつも なんでわざわざ茨の道を選ぶかねぇ？
jpnSearchText:
ったく……どいつもこいつも
なんでわざわざ茨の道を選ぶかねぇ？

engChrName: Wouldn't it be smarter to take it easy as best you can and try to coast through life?
engSearchText:
Wouldn't it be smarter to take it easy as best you can
and try to coast through life?
jpnChrName: ラクして生きる方が賢いだろうに。
jpnSearchText: ラクして生きる方が賢いだろうに。

engChrName: Speak for yourself.
engSearchText: Speak for yourself.
jpnChrName: ハン、それはお前もだろ。
jpnSearchText: ハン、それはお前もだろ。

engChrName: Once someone's set their mind on somethin', it's pretty damn hard to shake 'em off it.
engSearchText:
Once someone's set their mind on somethin', it's
pretty damn hard to shake 'em off it.
jpnChrName: 簡単に割り切れるもんじゃねぇ── 一度、心に決めちまった以上はな。
jpnSearchText:
簡単に割り切れるもんじゃねぇ──
一度、心に決めちまった以上はな。

engChrName: ...Anyway, I think things will be okay with Shaheena if you tell her.
engSearchText:
...Anyway, I think things will be okay with Shaheena
if you tell her.
jpnChrName: ……あんたの妹なら大丈夫だ。
jpnSearchText: ……あんたの妹なら大丈夫だ。

engChrName: Might get a little mad at you for keepin' it a secret, but she's mature enough to know you did it out of love for her.
engSearchText:
Might get a little mad at you for keepin' it a secret,
but she's mature enough to know you did it out of
love for her.
jpnChrName: 黙ってた事は怒るかもしれねぇが、 それも含めての姉心なのは分かるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
黙ってた事は怒るかもしれねぇが、
それも含めての姉心なのは分かるだろ。

engChrName: You just focus on the parade for the time being. Let the rest of us worry about that dumb old note.
engSearchText:
You just focus on the parade for the time being.
Let the rest of us worry about that dumb old note.
jpnChrName: 脅迫状のことはこっちに任せて 明日からはパレードに集中するといい。
jpnSearchText:
脅迫状のことはこっちに任せて
明日からはパレードに集中するといい。

engChrName: I'd be lyin' if I said what I saw back there wasn't hot, but more than that, I could tell there was real art you put into it.
engSearchText:
I'd be lyin' if I said what I saw back there wasn't hot,
but more than that, I could tell there was real art you
put into it.
jpnChrName: さっきのもまあ、セクシーだったが それ以上に練り上げられた芸を感じた。
jpnSearchText:
さっきのもまあ、セクシーだったが
それ以上に練り上げられた芸を感じた。

engChrName: Oh, and don't worry about paying us any commission. That dance was all the reward fine young men like us could need.
engSearchText:
Oh, and don't worry about paying us any commission.
That dance was all the reward fine young men like us
could need.
jpnChrName: ああ──ついでだし依頼料もいいぜ。 追加報酬（ダンス）も貰っちまったしな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──ついでだし依頼料もいいぜ。
追加報酬（ダンス）も貰っちまったしな。

engChrName: Aww, Van...
engSearchText: Aww, Van...
jpnChrName: ………ヴァンさん………
jpnSearchText: ………ヴァンさん………

engChrName: ...All right. I won't worry about it. I'll make sure to knock them dead tomorrow. You won't want to miss it!
engSearchText:
...All right. I won't worry about it. I'll make sure to
knock them dead tomorrow. You won't want to
miss it!
jpnChrName: グスッ……はい、私、頑張りますから……！ どうか楽しみにしていてくださいね……！
jpnSearchText:
グスッ……はい、私、頑張りますから……！
どうか楽しみにしていてくださいね……！

engChrName: (Goddamn. This guy never misses a beat.)
engSearchText: (Goddamn. This guy never misses a beat.)
jpnChrName: （マジかよコイツ……）
jpnSearchText: （マジかよコイツ……）

engChrName: NOW. YOU'VE. DONE IIIT!
engSearchText: NOW. YOU'VE. DONE IIIT!
jpnChrName: ──ア・ン・タ・らぁあああっ！！
jpnSearchText: ──ア・ン・タ・らぁあああっ！！

engChrName: Huh? Wh-What the—
engSearchText: Huh? Wh-What the—
jpnSearchText: え、え……？

engChrName: Yo, what's your pro—hey! I know you! I've seen you in the tabloids!
engSearchText:
Yo, what's your pro—hey! I know you! I've seen you
in the tabloids!
jpnChrName: なんだコイツ……！？ って、タブロイドで読んだ──
jpnSearchText:
なんだコイツ……！？
って、タブロイドで読んだ──

engChrName: I...am so disappointed in you, spriggan!
engSearchText: I...am so disappointed in you, spriggan!
jpnChrName: ……見損なったわよ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）……！
jpnSearchText: ……見損なったわよ、裏解決屋（スプリガン）……！

engChrName: You're dragging this poor woman around town all night, only to make her cry! Have you no shame?!
engSearchText:
You're dragging this poor woman around town all
night, only to make her cry! Have you no shame?!
jpnChrName: こんな夜更けに女の子を連れ回して、 挙句の果てに泣かせるなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
こんな夜更けに女の子を連れ回して、
挙句の果てに泣かせるなんて……！

engChrName: I always knew you were a good-for-nothing, and this proves it!
engSearchText:
I always knew you were a good-for-nothing, and this
proves it!
jpnChrName: やっぱりロクな奴じゃなかったわね！？
jpnSearchText: やっぱりロクな奴じゃなかったわね！？

engChrName: You were watchin' us this whole time? Don't you have anything better to do?
engSearchText:
You were watchin' us this whole time? Don't you
have anything better to do?
jpnChrName: 見てたのかよ…… アンタもヒマじゃねぇだろうに。
jpnSearchText:
見てたのかよ……
アンタもヒマじゃねぇだろうに。

engChrName: You know they call it beauty sleep for a reason, right? You'll age faster if you keep pulling all-nighters like this.
engSearchText:
You know they call it beauty sleep for a reason, right?
You'll age faster if you keep pulling all-nighters
like this.
jpnChrName: 夜はとっとと寝ねぇと 自慢の美貌に悪いんじゃねぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
夜はとっとと寝ねぇと
自慢の美貌に悪いんじゃねぇのか？

engChrName: EXCUSE me? Thanks for calling me old when I'm NOT!
engSearchText:
EXCUSE me? Thanks for calling me old when
I'm NOT!
jpnChrName: だ、誰が肌が心配な年増ですってぇ～！？
jpnSearchText: だ、誰が肌が心配な年増ですってぇ～！？

engChrName: I didn't say that! Quit puttin' words in my mouth!
engSearchText: I didn't say that! Quit puttin' words in my mouth!
jpnChrName: そこまで言ってねぇだろ！？
jpnSearchText: そこまで言ってねぇだろ！？

engChrName: Uhh, sorry to interrupt, but I think this is all a big misunder—
engSearchText:
Uhh, sorry to interrupt, but I think this is all a big
misunder—
jpnChrName: あの、違うんです──
jpnSearchText: あの、違うんです──

engChrName: Whatever. There's no reasoning with you.
engSearchText: Whatever. There's no reasoning with you.
jpnChrName: ……もはや問答は無用。
jpnSearchText: ……もはや問答は無用。

engChrName: In the name of Aidios, I'll kick you straight to Gehenna, you unrepentant philanderer!
engSearchText:
In the name of Aidios, I'll kick you straight to
Gehenna, you unrepentant philanderer!
jpnChrName: 女神に蹴っ飛ばされて 煉獄に堕ちなさいっ──！
jpnSearchText:
女神に蹴っ飛ばされて
煉獄に堕ちなさいっ──！

engChrName: So you're the thief that's been causing all that mayhem in Edith, huh? Wait a sec...
engSearchText:
So you're the thief that's been causing all that
mayhem in Edith, huh? Wait a sec...
jpnChrName: 首都を騒がす女怪盗だったか。 ………だが…………
jpnSearchText:
首都を騒がす女怪盗だったか。
………だが…………

engChrName: Save the chitchat for later! Here she comes!
engSearchText: Save the chitchat for later! Here she comes!
jpnChrName: 今は後だ──来るぞ！！
jpnSearchText: 今は後だ──来るぞ！！

engChrName: Damn... She's pretty good!
engSearchText: Damn... She's pretty good!
jpnChrName: チッ……やりやがる！
jpnSearchText: チッ……やりやがる！

engChrName: Just calm down, already! You got it all wrong!
engSearchText: Just calm down, already! You got it all wrong!
jpnChrName: ったく、いい加減落ち着け……！
jpnSearchText: ったく、いい加減落ち着け……！

engChrName: Calm down? CALM DOWN?! I was such a fool, thinking you were anywhere near decent!
engSearchText:
Calm down? CALM DOWN?! I was such a fool,
thinking you were anywhere near decent!
jpnChrName: これが落ち着いてられますかっ！ ちょっと見直したアタシがバカだったわ！
jpnSearchText:
これが落ち着いてられますかっ！
ちょっと見直したアタシがバカだったわ！

engChrName: Nina needs to wake up to the truth, and I'll do whatever—
engSearchText:
Nina needs to wake up to the truth, and I'll do
whatever—
jpnChrName: ニナの目を覚ますためにもここで──
jpnSearchText: ニナの目を覚ますためにもここで──

engChrName: Stop! You're making a mistake!
engSearchText: Stop! You're making a mistake!
jpnChrName: あの──待ってください！！
jpnSearchText: あの──待ってください！！

engChrName: What are you doing? Get out of the way! I'm here to give them their just—
engSearchText:
What are you doing? Get out of the way! I'm here to
give them their just—
jpnChrName: っ……！？ どいてなさい、今アタシが天誅を──
jpnSearchText:
っ……！？
どいてなさい、今アタシが天誅を──

engChrName: You're wrong! Van and Aaron were just walking me home.
engSearchText:
You're wrong! Van and Aaron were just walking
me home.
jpnChrName: 違うんです──ヴァンさんたちは 私を送って下さってるだけなんです！
jpnSearchText:
違うんです──ヴァンさんたちは
私を送って下さってるだけなんです！

engChrName: I was just telling them about my life and got a little emotional in front of them, that's all.
engSearchText:
I was just telling them about my life and got a little
emotional in front of them, that's all.
jpnChrName: その、さっきは話を聞いてもらって 感極まってしまっただけで……！
jpnSearchText:
その、さっきは話を聞いてもらって
感極まってしまっただけで……！

engChrName: It's okay! You don't have to put on a brave face anymore! It must've been so hard dealing with—
engSearchText:
It's okay! You don't have to put on a brave
face anymore! It must've been so hard dealing with—
jpnChrName: いいの、無理しなくて！ 貴女も辛かったでしょ、う──
jpnSearchText:
いいの、無理しなくて！
貴女も辛かったでしょ、う──

engChrName: ...What.
engSearchText: ...What.
jpnSearchText: …………………………え゛。

engChrName: ...Seriously?
engSearchText: ...Seriously?
jpnSearchText: …………マジ？

engChrName: ...Huh.
engSearchText: ...Huh.
jpnSearchText: ………えっと…………

engChrName: A-All right—I'll let you off the hook THIS time!
engSearchText: A-All right—I'll let you off the hook THIS time!
jpnChrName: きょ、今日の所はこれで勘弁してあげるわ！
jpnSearchText: きょ、今日の所はこれで勘弁してあげるわ！

engChrName: But next time you make some poor girl cry, there'll be hell to pay, got it? You'd better remember that!
engSearchText:
But next time you make some poor girl cry, there'll be
hell to pay, got it? You'd better remember that!
jpnChrName: でもくれぐれも肝に銘じなさい── 次に女の子を泣かせたら只じゃおかないから！
jpnSearchText:
でもくれぐれも肝に銘じなさい──
次に女の子を泣かせたら只じゃおかないから！

engChrName: Wh-What was that all about?
engSearchText: Wh-What was that all about?
jpnChrName: え、ええと…… なんだったんでしょう？
jpnSearchText:
え、ええと……
なんだったんでしょう？

engChrName: Beats me. Looked like someone was playin' dressup as that infamous phantom thief and got a little TOO into her role.
engSearchText:
Beats me. Looked like someone was playin' dressup
as that infamous phantom thief and got a little TOO
into her role.
jpnChrName: さあな……首都を騒がす 女怪盗のコスプレじゃないか？
jpnSearchText:
さあな……首都を騒がす
女怪盗のコスプレじゃないか？

engChrName: (Hey, are you thinking what I'm thinking?)
engSearchText: (Hey, are you thinking what I'm thinking?)
jpnChrName: （つーか、オイ……）
jpnSearchText: （つーか、オイ……）

engChrName: (Yep. Sure looked like her.)
engSearchText: (Yep. Sure looked like her.)
jpnChrName: （ま、見たまんまだ。）
jpnSearchText: （ま、見たまんまだ。）

engChrName: (Look, let it go. I'm sure she has her reasons for doing it. Diggin' into it will just cause us headaches.)
engSearchText:
(Look, let it go. I'm sure she has her reasons for
doing it. Diggin' into it will just cause us headaches.)
jpnChrName: （何やら事情もありそうだ──   わざわざ突っ込むなよ、面倒だし。）
jpnSearchText:
（何やら事情もありそうだ──
わざわざ突っ込むなよ、面倒だし。）

engChrName: (Unreal...)
engSearchText: (Unreal...)
jpnChrName: （……マジかよ……）
jpnSearchText: （……マジかよ……）

engChrName: Well, what'd you think? Like what you saw?
engSearchText: Well, what'd you think? Like what you saw?
jpnChrName: ──どう、気に入った？
jpnSearchText: ──どう、気に入った？

engChrName: That I did. They were just as I'd hoped.
engSearchText: That I did. They were just as I'd hoped.
jpnChrName: ……ああ、期待通りの顔触れだ。
jpnSearchText: ……ああ、期待通りの顔触れだ。

engChrName: Moreover, our surprise guests appear to be greatly anticipating what's to come.
engSearchText:
Moreover, our surprise guests appear to be greatly
anticipating what's to come.
jpnChrName: 思いがけぬ“ゲスト”も 愉しみにしてくれているらしい。
jpnSearchText:
思いがけぬ“ゲスト”も
愉しみにしてくれているらしい。

engChrName: I think it's time we turn up the heat. Don't you? Perhaps with a golden frenzy to instill some proper fear.
engSearchText:
I think it's time we turn up the heat. Don't you?
Perhaps with a golden frenzy to instill some
proper fear.
jpnChrName: せいぜい盛り上げてやるとしよう── “恐怖”を導くための黄金の狂騒曲でな。
jpnSearchText:
せいぜい盛り上げてやるとしよう──
“恐怖”を導くための黄金の狂騒曲でな。

engChrName: Oh, I agree completely, boss. ❤
engSearchText: Oh, I agree completely, boss. ❤
jpnChrName: そうだね──ボス❤
jpnSearchText: そうだね──ボス❤

engChrName: You trying to mess with me? Huh?!
engSearchText: You trying to mess with me? Huh?!
jpnChrName: ふざけてんじゃねえぞ、ああ！？
jpnSearchText: ふざけてんじゃねえぞ、ああ！？

engChrName: What was that, asshole?!
engSearchText: What was that, asshole?!
jpnChrName: なんだとオラアッ！！
jpnSearchText: なんだとオラアッ！！

engChrName: From the look of it, fights are breaking out across the city.
engSearchText:
From the look of it, fights are breaking out across
the city.
jpnChrName: ……市内各地で同時多発的に ケンカ騒ぎが起きたようでな。
jpnSearchText:
……市内各地で同時多発的に
ケンカ騒ぎが起きたようでな。

engChrName: The authorities are struggling to keep things under control.
engSearchText:
The authorities are struggling to keep things
under control.
jpnChrName: その対処に追われているらしい。
jpnSearchText: その対処に追われているらしい。

engChrName: What the hell?
engSearchText: What the hell?
jpnChrName: おいおい、そいつは……
jpnSearchText: <C1>おいおい、そいつは……

engChrName: ...Mr. Arkride.
engSearchText: ...Mr. Arkride.
jpnChrName: ……ヴァン様。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……ヴァン様。

engChrName: Right. Hey, Dingo. Let's meet at the parking lot.
engSearchText: Right. Hey, Dingo. Let's meet at the parking lot.
jpnChrName: ああ── ディンゴ、駐車場で落ち合うぞ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──
ディンゴ、駐車場で落ち合うぞ。

engChrName: We'll talk inside my truck. Sound good?
engSearchText: We'll talk inside my truck. Sound good?
jpnChrName: 詳しい話は車で聞く……！
jpnSearchText: <C1>詳しい話は車で聞く……！

engChrName: Later, once they felt better, arrangements were made to escort Shaheena and Marielle back to their home and hotel, respectively.
engSearchText:
Later, once they felt better, arrangements were made
to escort Shaheena and Marielle back to their home
and hotel, respectively.
jpnChrName: その後、元気を取り戻したシャヒーナとマリエルを 家やホテルに送り届ける手配をしつつ……
jpnSearchText:
その後、元気を取り戻したシャヒーナとマリエルを
家やホテルに送り届ける手配をしつつ……

engChrName: Saara...
engSearchText: Saara...
jpnChrName: サァラ姉……
jpnSearchText: サァラ姉……

engChrName: Oh, Shaheena! It'll be okay!
engSearchText: Oh, Shaheena! It'll be okay!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん……
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナさん……

engChrName: The last time I saw her was when we were on break, during our rehearsal.
engSearchText:
The last time I saw her was when we were on break,
during our rehearsal.
jpnChrName: ……最後に見たのは、 リハーサルの休憩時間でした。
jpnSearchText:
……最後に見たのは、
リハーサルの休憩時間でした。

engChrName: She went to use the restroom and then...never came back.
engSearchText:
She went to use the restroom and then...never
came back.
jpnChrName: お手洗いに行ったサァラさんが そのまま帰ってこなかったんです。
jpnSearchText:
お手洗いに行ったサァラさんが
そのまま帰ってこなかったんです。

engChrName: I was getting pretty worried about how much time she was taking, so I checked with one of the guards.
engSearchText:
I was getting pretty worried about how much time
she was taking, so I checked with one of the guards.
jpnChrName: いつまでたっても戻らないから心配でね、 守衛さんにも聞いてみたんだけど。
jpnSearchText:
いつまでたっても戻らないから心配でね、
守衛さんにも聞いてみたんだけど。

engChrName: If I'd seen anybody like that, I'm confident I would've noticed.
engSearchText:
If I'd seen anybody like that, I'm confident I
would've noticed.
jpnChrName: そ、それらしい人が通れば 必ず分かると思いますが……
jpnSearchText:
そ、それらしい人が通れば
必ず分かると思いますが……

engChrName: I checked every floor and couldn't find her anywhere.
engSearchText: I checked every floor and couldn't find her anywhere.
jpnChrName: 各フロアに確認しても、どこにも いらっしゃらないようでして。
jpnSearchText:
各フロアに確認しても、どこにも
いらっしゃらないようでして。

engChrName: As far as I can tell, there are no signs she left through a side exit, either.
engSearchText:
As far as I can tell, there are no signs she left through
a side exit, either.
jpnChrName: 通用口を通った形跡もなさそうです。
jpnSearchText: 通用口を通った形跡もなさそうです。

engChrName: I'm only asking this to make sure, but...
engSearchText: I'm only asking this to make sure, but...
jpnChrName: ……これは念の為だけど。
jpnSearchText: ……これは念の為だけど。

engChrName: ...your sister wasn't complaining about being in the parade or anything, was she?
engSearchText:
...your sister wasn't complaining about being in the
parade or anything, was she?
jpnChrName: パレードに気乗りがしないとか 零してはなかった？
jpnSearchText:
パレードに気乗りがしないとか
零してはなかった？

engChrName: No, absolutely not! There's no way she would bail out of it!
engSearchText:
No, absolutely not! There's no way she would bail out
of it!
jpnChrName: そ、そんなわけないよ！ お姉が投げ出すなんて……！
jpnSearchText:
そ、そんなわけないよ！
お姉が投げ出すなんて……！

engChrName: Yeah. She was absolutely fired up about it.
engSearchText: Yeah. She was absolutely fired up about it.
jpnChrName: はい、近くで見ていても 熱心に参加されていたと思います。
jpnSearchText:
はい、近くで見ていても
熱心に参加されていたと思います。

engChrName: Definitely. I mean, hell, it was getting us amped up, too. Her mood was infectious.
engSearchText:
Definitely. I mean, hell, it was getting us amped
up, too. Her mood was infectious.
jpnChrName: ええ……それもあたしたちが 本気で引っ張られちゃうくらいに。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……それもあたしたちが
本気で引っ張られちゃうくらいに。

engChrName: Not to mention, she has such tremendous talent. Dancing might not be my thing, but even I could feel it.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, she has such tremendous talent.
Dancing might not be my thing, but even I could
feel it.
jpnChrName: 女優と踊り手、分野は違うけど 圧倒的な才能を感じさせてくれたし。
jpnSearchText:
女優と踊り手、分野は違うけど
圧倒的な才能を感じさせてくれたし。

engChrName: That's because I have an eye for these things! They don't lie. That girl is a tremendous asset to the Cavalcade!
engSearchText:
That's because I have an eye for these things!
They don't lie. That girl is a tremendous asset to
the Cavalcade!
jpnChrName: うむ、ワシの目に狂いはない！ サァラちゃんはまさしく逸材じゃ！
jpnSearchText:
うむ、ワシの目に狂いはない！
サァラちゃんはまさしく逸材じゃ！

engChrName: Not to mention, she's a professional. I just can't see her getting cold feet over something like this, all of a sudden.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, she's a professional. I just can't see
her getting cold feet over something like this, all of
a sudden.
jpnChrName: ま、間違いなくプロだ。 怖じ気づくのはあり得ねぇだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、間違いなくプロだ。
怖じ気づくのはあり得ねぇだろ。

engChrName: All right, if you guys are sure. Sorry for asking. I didn't mean to offend anyone.
engSearchText:
All right, if you guys are sure. Sorry for asking.
I didn't mean to offend anyone.
jpnChrName: ん、だったらいい。 ゴメンね、気を悪くさせて。
jpnSearchText:
ん、だったらいい。
ゴメンね、気を悪くさせて。

engChrName: ...I know. You're just doing what you need to.
engSearchText: ...I know. You're just doing what you need to.

engChrName: Anyway, seeing as we're talking about a civilian going missing, I'm going to have to get the guild involved.
engSearchText:
Anyway, seeing as we're talking about a civilian going
missing, I'm going to have to get the guild involved.
jpnChrName: 民間人が行方不明になった以上、 この件はギルドも噛ませてもらう。
jpnSearchText:
民間人が行方不明になった以上、
この件はギルドも噛ませてもらう。

engChrName: Everybody okay with that?
engSearchText: Everybody okay with that?
jpnChrName: 文句ないよね？
jpnSearchText: 文句ないよね？

engChrName: Absolutely. We appreciate you helping us.
engSearchText: Absolutely. We appreciate you helping us.
jpnChrName: はい、是非お願いします。
jpnSearchText: はい、是非お願いします。

engChrName: I'll pay any amount! Mira is no object!
engSearchText: I'll pay any amount! Mira is no object!
jpnChrName: ギャラならいくらでも出すぞ！
jpnSearchText: ギャラならいくらでも出すぞ！

engChrName: Just do whatever you have to in order to find that girl! My parade isn't complete without her, understand?
engSearchText:
Just do whatever you have to in order to find that girl!
My parade isn't complete without her, understand?
jpnChrName: パレードを完成させるためにも 何としても見つけだしてくれいっ！
jpnSearchText:
パレードを完成させるためにも
何としても見つけだしてくれいっ！

engChrName: What about you guys? What are you going to do?
engSearchText: What about you guys? What are you going to do?
jpnChrName: アンタたちの方は──
jpnSearchText: アンタたちの方は──

engChrName: Like you need to ask. She's a client we swore to protect. There's only one thing for us TO do.
engSearchText:
Like you need to ask. She's a client we swore
to protect. There's only one thing for us TO do.
jpnChrName: 守ると約束した依頼人の一人だ、 言われるまでもねえ。
jpnSearchText:
守ると約束した依頼人の一人だ、
言われるまでもねえ。

engChrName: Although we might ask for a free dance later to make it worth our while. Sound good?
engSearchText:
Although we might ask for a free dance later to make
it worth our while. Sound good?
jpnChrName: 追加の報酬（踊り）くらいは 請求させてもらうかもしれねぇが。
jpnSearchText:
追加の報酬（踊り）くらいは
請求させてもらうかもしれねぇが。

engChrName: Van...thank you.
engSearchText: Van...thank you.
jpnChrName: ……お兄さん……
jpnSearchText: ……お兄さん……

engChrName: (We'll figure it out somehow. Don't do anything reckless while we're gone. Got it?)
engSearchText:
(We'll figure it out somehow. Don't do anything
reckless while we're gone. Got it?)
jpnChrName: （……こっちで何とかする。   アンタは後先考えずに動くなよ？）
jpnSearchText:
（……こっちで何とかする。
アンタは後先考えずに動くなよ？）

engChrName: (I-I don't know what you're talking about! Mind your own business!)
engSearchText:
(I-I don't know what you're talking about! Mind your
own business!)
jpnChrName: （っ……な、なんの話よっ？）
jpnSearchText: （っ……な、なんの話よっ？）

engChrName: All right, I'm going to fill the others in at the guild branch. I'll also find out what's going on with the police.
engSearchText:
All right, I'm going to fill the others in at the
guild branch. I'll also find out what's going on with
the police.
jpnChrName: いったん支部メンバーと共有する。 警察方面の情報も仕入れておくから。
jpnSearchText:
いったん支部メンバーと共有する。
警察方面の情報も仕入れておくから。

engChrName: I'll pretty much be doing the same thing, hitting up sources in various places. I'll be sure to let Bermotti know what's going on, too.
engSearchText:
I'll pretty much be doing the same thing, hitting up
sources in various places. I'll be sure to let Bermotti
know what's going on, too.
jpnChrName: 俺も各方面を当たってみよう。 ベルモッティにも伝えておく。
jpnSearchText:
俺も各方面を当たってみよう。
ベルモッティにも伝えておく。

engChrName: That'd be great. Thanks, you two.
engSearchText: That'd be great. Thanks, you two.
jpnChrName: ああ、それぞれ頼んだぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、それぞれ頼んだぜ。

engChrName: What's with all of this racket? The festival is nearly here. What could've possibly happened to cause such chaos?
engSearchText:
What's with all of this racket? The festival is
nearly here. What could've possibly happened to
cause such chaos?
jpnChrName: やれやれ、騒がしいですな。 この映画祭直前に何事ですか？
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ、騒がしいですな。
この映画祭直前に何事ですか？

engChrName: What? You haven't heard?!
engSearchText: What? You haven't heard?!
jpnChrName: なぬ、まだ聞いておらんのか！？
jpnSearchText: なぬ、まだ聞いておらんのか！？

engChrName: That girl I scouted out yesterday—Saara— she disappeared! Nobody knows where she went!
engSearchText:
That girl I scouted out yesterday—Saara—
she disappeared! Nobody knows where she went!
jpnChrName: 昨日スカウトしたサァラちゃんが いなくなってしまったんじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
昨日スカウトしたサァラちゃんが
いなくなってしまったんじゃ！

engChrName: ...Oh? Is that so?
engSearchText: ...Oh? Is that so?

engChrName: We have to act! Get the company into gear and start throwing everything we've got!
engSearchText:
We have to act! Get the company into gear and start
throwing everything we've got!
jpnChrName: こうしちゃおれん、 ベガス社を上げて動くんじゃ、ギャスパー！
jpnSearchText:
こうしちゃおれん、
ベガス社を上げて動くんじゃ、ギャスパー！

engChrName: I don't care if it takes every single employee! We've got to find Saara! Now!
engSearchText:
I don't care if it takes every single employee!
We've got to find Saara! Now!
jpnChrName: 社員やスタッフを総動員してでも サァラちゃんの行方をじゃなあっ……！
jpnSearchText:
社員やスタッフを総動員してでも
サァラちゃんの行方をじゃなあっ……！

engChrName: Now, now. Don't you think you're being just a little rash, Gotti?
engSearchText:
Now, now. Don't you think you're being just a little
rash, Gotti?
jpnChrName: ──フン、馬鹿馬鹿しいですな。
jpnSearchText: ──フン、馬鹿馬鹿しいですな。

engChrName: We're talking about a dancer. What's it to us if one or two of them run away?
engSearchText:
We're talking about a dancer. What's it to us if one or
two of them run away?
jpnChrName: たかが踊り子の一人や二人、 逃げたくらいなんだというのです？
jpnSearchText:
たかが踊り子の一人や二人、
逃げたくらいなんだというのです？

engChrName: WHAT?!
engSearchText: WHAT?!
jpnChrName: な、なにィ！？
jpnSearchText: な、なにィ！？

engChrName: But my sister, she's—
engSearchText: But my sister, she's—
jpnChrName: だ、だからお姉は──
jpnSearchText: だ、だからお姉は──

engChrName: Hold on. Dillon, where the hell is this attitude coming from? This is serious.
engSearchText:
Hold on. Dillon, where the hell is this attitude
coming from? This is serious.
jpnChrName: それ、どういう意味でしょう？
jpnSearchText: それ、どういう意味でしょう？

engChrName: By all appearances, it's very likely she didn't simply disappear.
engSearchText:
By all appearances, it's very likely she didn't
simply disappear.
jpnChrName: ……ただの失踪ではない 可能性が高そうなのですが……
jpnSearchText:
……ただの失踪ではない
可能性が高そうなのですが……

engChrName: Please. Her up and poofing away does nothing to hamper our final preparations for the festival.
engSearchText:
Please. Her up and poofing away does nothing to
hamper our final preparations for the festival.
jpnChrName: フン、どのみち映画祭の進行に 支障は出るまいと言っているのだよ。
jpnSearchText:
フン、どのみち映画祭の進行に
支障は出るまいと言っているのだよ。

engChrName: If one of you two went missing, it'd be another matter. But her? She's merely some extra one of us hired on a hunch. Nothing more.
engSearchText:
If one of you two went missing, it'd be
another matter. But her? She's merely some extra one
of us hired on a hunch. Nothing more.
jpnChrName: 君たちが欠けるならまだしも、 所詮は即興で雇ったエキストラだろう？
jpnSearchText:
君たちが欠けるならまだしも、
所詮は即興で雇ったエキストラだろう？

engChrName: Are you out of your mind? How many times do I have to explain it to you?!
engSearchText:
Are you out of your mind? How many times do I
have to explain it to you?!
jpnChrName: バッカモン、何度も説明したじゃろうが！？
jpnSearchText: バッカモン、何度も説明したじゃろうが！？

engChrName: Saara is not 'some extra'! She's irreplaceable! She's the linchpin for all my plans! My parade isn't complete without—
engSearchText:
Saara is not 'some extra'! She's irreplaceable! She's the
linchpin for all my plans! My parade isn't complete
without—
jpnChrName: サァラちゃんはワシのパレードを完成させる 最後のピースにして唯一無二の──
jpnSearchText:
サァラちゃんはワシのパレードを完成させる
最後のピースにして唯一無二の──

engChrName: Enough! I'm done listening to this.
engSearchText: Enough! I'm done listening to this.
jpnChrName: もういい、これ以上の御託は結構です。
jpnSearchText: もういい、これ以上の御託は結構です。

engChrName: As far as I'm concerned, as long as the Cavalcade proceeds in some fashion or another, that's all that matters.
engSearchText:
As far as I'm concerned, as long as the Cavalcade
proceeds in some fashion or another, that's all
that matters.
jpnChrName: こちらはどんな形であれ、 パレードが実行されるなら文句はない。
jpnSearchText:
こちらはどんな形であれ、
パレードが実行されるなら文句はない。

engChrName: If this woman turns up, wonderful. If not, you'll simply have to compromise on your grand vision, Gotti.
engSearchText:
If this woman turns up, wonderful. If not, you'll
simply have to compromise on your grand
vision, Gotti.
jpnChrName: 見つかればよし──でなければ 妥協していただくしかありませんな。
jpnSearchText:
見つかればよし──でなければ
妥協していただくしかありませんな。

engChrName: Graaah!
engSearchText: Graaah!
jpnChrName: ぐぬぬ……！！
jpnSearchText: ぐぬぬ……！！

engChrName: What IS that fool's problem?!
engSearchText: What IS that fool's problem?!
jpnChrName: ええい、なんじゃアイツは……！！
jpnSearchText: ええい、なんじゃアイツは……！！

engChrName: That was so, so cold. How could he...?
engSearchText: That was so, so cold. How could he...?
jpnChrName: ヒドイです……
jpnSearchText: ヒドイです……

engChrName: Seems pretty clear to me that the walls're closing in on him.
engSearchText:
Seems pretty clear to me that the walls're closing in
on him.
jpnChrName: ハッ、露骨に余裕がなさそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、露骨に余裕がなさそうだな。

engChrName: Indeed. That does seem like more than it simply being the day before the festival and deciding a change of tack is impractical.
engSearchText:
Indeed. That does seem like more than it simply
being the day before the festival and deciding a
change of tack is impractical.
jpnChrName: 映画祭前日ともなれば── というだけではなさそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭前日ともなれば──
というだけではなさそうですね。

engChrName: I think so, too.
engSearchText: I think so, too.

engChrName: We got the circumstantial evidence—now we just gotta figure out what move to make.
engSearchText:
We got the circumstantial evidence—now we just
gotta figure out what move to make.
jpnChrName: 状況証拠は揃ってきた…… さぁて、どう動くか。
jpnSearchText:
状況証拠は揃ってきた……
さぁて、どう動くか。

engChrName: Mr. Gotti, I'm sure Saara will come back! I just know it!
engSearchText:
Mr. Gotti, I'm sure Saara will come back! I just
know it!
jpnChrName: 監督、お姉は絶対に戻ってきます！
jpnSearchText: 監督、お姉は絶対に戻ってきます！

engChrName: She always pulls through. She could come down with a cold before a big show and she'd still shake it off and dance her best ever!
engSearchText:
She always pulls through. She could come down with
a cold before a big show and she'd still shake it off
and dance her best ever!
jpnChrName: いつだってそうなんです──大切な興行前に 風邪を引いても治して最高の踊りをして！
jpnSearchText:
いつだってそうなんです──大切な興行前に
風邪を引いても治して最高の踊りをして！

engChrName: She just...might run a little late and need more time than usual.
engSearchText:
She just...might run a little late and need more time
than usual.
jpnChrName: でも……ひょっとしたら 遅れたりしちゃうかもしれないから………
jpnSearchText:
でも……ひょっとしたら
遅れたりしちゃうかもしれないから………

engChrName: But until then, let me help! Bring me on as a good luck charm for getting her back!
engSearchText:
But until then, let me help! Bring me on as a good
luck charm for getting her back!
jpnChrName: その時はお姉が戻ってくる“繋ぎ”として あたしを使ってくれませんか──！？
jpnSearchText:
その時はお姉が戻ってくる“繋ぎ”として
あたしを使ってくれませんか──！？

engChrName: I hope Shaheena's gonna be okay...
engSearchText: I hope Shaheena's gonna be okay...
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさん…… 大丈夫でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナさん……
大丈夫でしょうか？

engChrName: Don't worry. She will be. She's got Judith with her.
engSearchText: Don't worry. She will be. She's got Judith with her.
jpnChrName: 大丈夫ですよ、 先輩もついてくれていますし。
jpnSearchText:
大丈夫ですよ、
先輩もついてくれていますし。

engChrName: Though I'm surprised. I've never seen anyone manage to be so persuasive with Mr. Gotti before, heehee.
engSearchText:
Though I'm surprised. I've never seen anyone manage
to be so persuasive with Mr. Gotti before, heehee.
jpnChrName: ふふ、あのゴッチ監督が 押し切られた所なんて初めて見ました。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、あのゴッチ監督が
押し切られた所なんて初めて見ました。

engChrName: Despite only being fifteen years old, she is already a true professional. I certainly find myself impressed.
engSearchText:
Despite only being fifteen years old, she is already a
true professional. I certainly find myself impressed.
jpnChrName: まだ１５歳とはいえ…… 立派な“プロ”なのですね。
jpnSearchText:
まだ１５歳とはいえ……
立派な“プロ”なのですね。

engChrName: I'm sure she gets a lot of her strength from her sister. Saara seems like a wonderful role model.
engSearchText:
I'm sure she gets a lot of her strength from her sister.
Saara seems like a wonderful role model.
jpnChrName: はい、きっとサァラさんと過ごして 手に入れた強さなんでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
はい、きっとサァラさんと過ごして
手に入れた強さなんでしょう。

engChrName: Yeah. She really does.
engSearchText: Yeah. She really does.
jpnChrName: そうだな……
jpnSearchText: そうだな……

engChrName: Oh, my dear, sweet girl. That's such a generous offer.
engSearchText: Oh, my dear, sweet girl. That's such a generous offer.
jpnChrName: 折角の申し出じゃが……
jpnSearchText: 折角の申し出じゃが……

engChrName: But there's no way you could possibly replace your sister in my parade.
engSearchText:
But there's no way you could possibly replace your
sister in my parade.
jpnChrName: お前さんじゃサァラちゃんの “代わり”にはなれんわい。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんじゃサァラちゃんの
“代わり”にはなれんわい。

engChrName: But I grew up watching her dance! There's nobody that understands what she does better than me!
engSearchText:
But I grew up watching her dance! There's nobody
that understands what she does better than me!
jpnChrName: で、でも──あたしはずっと お姉の踊りを近くで見てきました！
jpnSearchText:
で、でも──あたしはずっと
お姉の踊りを近くで見てきました！

engChrName: Nobody else is going to be as good as—
engSearchText: Nobody else is going to be as good as—
jpnChrName: 他の誰よりもきっと……！
jpnSearchText: 他の誰よりもきっと……！

engChrName: You and your sister are two very different ladies. Her dancing and sex appeal are completely her own.
engSearchText:
You and your sister are two very different ladies.
Her dancing and sex appeal are completely her own.
jpnChrName: 彼女の持つ色気や踊りの魅力は 嬢ちゃんとは全く違うタイプのものじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の持つ色気や踊りの魅力は
嬢ちゃんとは全く違うタイプのものじゃ。

engChrName: It's not enough to just be related and dance the same dance. You still won't have the same effect on the people watching.
engSearchText:
It's not enough to just be related and dance the
same dance. You still won't have the same effect on
the people watching.
jpnChrName: 姉妹だから、同じ踊りだからといって そのまま通用するモンじゃあない──
jpnSearchText:
姉妹だから、同じ踊りだからといって
そのまま通用するモンじゃあない──

engChrName: Frankly, my dear, you just aren't a good fit for the sort of parade I've got in mind.
engSearchText:
Frankly, my dear, you just aren't a good fit for the sort
of parade I've got in mind.
jpnChrName: 少なくともワシの目指しているパレードには 噛み合わんのは確かじゃろうな。
jpnSearchText:
少なくともワシの目指しているパレードには
噛み合わんのは確かじゃろうな。

engChrName: I can't... I can't take this anymore. I hate seeing Saara being the only one working so hard, day after day!
engSearchText:
I can't... I can't take this anymore. I hate seeing Saara
being the only one working so hard, day after day!
jpnChrName: あたし……もうイヤなんです…… お姉ばかりに苦労をさせるのは……
jpnSearchText:
あたし……もうイヤなんです……
お姉ばかりに苦労をさせるのは……

engChrName: She always brushes it off like it's nothing, trying to make sure I don't see how much it all hurts her!
engSearchText:
She always brushes it off like it's nothing, trying to
make sure I don't see how much it all hurts her!
jpnChrName: いつも何でもないフリをして、 生活が苦しいのなんて絶対見せなくて……
jpnSearchText:
いつも何でもないフリをして、
生活が苦しいのなんて絶対見せなくて……

engChrName: Sometimes she even goes out pretending like she's off to see her 'boyfriend.'
engSearchText:
Sometimes she even goes out pretending like she's off
to see her 'boyfriend.'
jpnChrName: ……たまに彼氏に会いに行くような そぶりで夜中に出かけていくのだって……
jpnSearchText:
……たまに彼氏に会いに行くような
そぶりで夜中に出かけていくのだって……

engChrName: I WISH she had someone like that! I wish that was what's going on, but she can't fool me!
engSearchText:
I WISH she had someone like that! I wish that was
what's going on, but she can't fool me!
jpnChrName: ──せめてそんな人が、ホントに いてくれたら良かったのにって……！
jpnSearchText:
──せめてそんな人が、ホントに
いてくれたら良かったのにって……！

engChrName: (Poor Shaheena...)
engSearchText: (Poor Shaheena...)
jpnChrName: （……シャヒーナさん……）
jpnSearchText: （……シャヒーナさん……）

engChrName: (So she knew all along...)
engSearchText: (So she knew all along...)
jpnChrName: （気付いて、いたんですね……）
jpnSearchText: （気付いて、いたんですね……）
…………………………………

engChrName: Maybe I can't match up to her now, but that doesn't mean I can't train hard! I can make any outfit you put on me work, too!
engSearchText:
Maybe I can't match up to her now, but that doesn't
mean I can't train hard! I can make any outfit you put
on me work, too!
jpnChrName: ──必要ならどんな努力もします！ どんな衣装だって着こなしてみせます！
jpnSearchText:
──必要ならどんな努力もします！
どんな衣装だって着こなしてみせます！

engChrName: If I can't just totally replace my sister, then we can find something that'll fit me!
engSearchText:
If I can't just totally replace my sister, then we can
find something that'll fit me!
jpnChrName: イメージが合わないっていうなら、 お姉とは違う方向で食らいついて──
jpnSearchText:
イメージが合わないっていうなら、
お姉とは違う方向で食らいついて──

engChrName: I won't just live up to your vision! Give me a chance and I'll blow it out of the water with something even better!
engSearchText:
I won't just live up to your vision! Give me a chance
and I'll blow it out of the water with something
even better!
jpnChrName: 監督さんのイメージを 絶対に超えてみせますからっ！
jpnSearchText:
監督さんのイメージを
絶対に超えてみせますからっ！
！！

engChrName: Wow...
engSearchText: Wow...
jpnSearchText: ぁ………

engChrName: Damn.
engSearchText: Damn.
jpnChrName: ハッ……
jpnSearchText: ハッ……

engChrName: All right, young lady. You're on!
engSearchText: All right, young lady. You're on!
jpnChrName: ──よぉし、いいじゃろうっ！
jpnSearchText: ──よぉし、いいじゃろうっ！

engChrName: But if you're going to talk that big, you'd better walk that big as well! Failure is NOT an option!
engSearchText:
But if you're going to talk that big, you'd better walk
that big as well! Failure is NOT an option!
jpnChrName: その大言壮語、言ったからには せいぜい実現してもらうぞっ！？
jpnSearchText:
その大言壮語、言ったからには
せいぜい実現してもらうぞっ！？

engChrName: And hey, if your sister comes back, we'll get you both in the parade and make you two a duo for the ages!
engSearchText:
And hey, if your sister comes back, we'll get you both
in the parade and make you two a duo for the ages!
jpnChrName: そしてサァラちゃんが戻ってきたら 姉妹揃って伝説となってもらおうかっ！
jpnSearchText:
そしてサァラちゃんが戻ってきたら
姉妹揃って伝説となってもらおうかっ！

engChrName: Mr. Gotti, you're the best!
engSearchText: Mr. Gotti, you're the best!
jpnChrName: か、監督さんっ……！
jpnSearchText: か、監督さんっ……！

engChrName: Mr. Gotti...thank you.
engSearchText: Mr. Gotti...thank you.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督……
jpnSearchText: ゴッチ監督……

engChrName: Hardly! You know me. When I set my mind on something, I don't let anything get in my way! That's just the kind of man I am.
engSearchText:
Hardly! You know me. When I set my mind on
something, I don't let anything get in my way!
That's just the kind of man I am.
jpnChrName: 言っておくが、ワシはやると決めたら 絶対妥協せん男じゃ！
jpnSearchText:
言っておくが、ワシはやると決めたら
絶対妥協せん男じゃ！

engChrName: Festival is tomorrow! I expect you to train your buns off till the very last minute! Got it?
engSearchText:
Festival is tomorrow! I expect you to train your
buns off till the very last minute! Got it?
jpnChrName: 映画祭は明日──モノになるまで ぶっ通しで仕上げてもらうぞいっ！！
jpnSearchText:
映画祭は明日──モノになるまで
ぶっ通しで仕上げてもらうぞいっ！！

engChrName: Yes, sir! I wouldn't have it any other way!
engSearchText: Yes, sir! I wouldn't have it any other way!
jpnChrName: 望むところですっ！！
jpnSearchText: 望むところですっ！！

engChrName: From what I've seen, your technique is solid enough. You already know how to mimic your sister's moves.
engSearchText:
From what I've seen, your technique is solid enough.
You already know how to mimic your sister's moves.
jpnChrName: ……見たところ技術は十分、 お姉さんの踊りも繰り返し見ている。
jpnSearchText:
……見たところ技術は十分、
お姉さんの踊りも繰り返し見ている。

engChrName: That means we need to focus on polishing your steps and making sure YOUR charm comes through.
engSearchText:
That means we need to focus on polishing your steps
and making sure YOUR charm comes through.
jpnChrName: なら、ちょっとした所作と 貴女自身の“魅せ方”が課題かしら。
jpnSearchText:
なら、ちょっとした所作と
貴女自身の“魅せ方”が課題かしら。

engChrName: C'mon. I'll show you how a world-class actress knocks her audience off their feet.
engSearchText:
C'mon. I'll show you how a world-class actress knocks
her audience off their feet.
jpnChrName: 付いてきなさい、女優としての “魅せ方”を叩き込んであげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
付いてきなさい、女優としての
“魅せ方”を叩き込んであげるわ。

engChrName: It's probably going to take us all night, but that's what it'll take to get you on your sister's level. Are you ready?
engSearchText:
It's probably going to take us all night, but that's what
it'll take to get you on your sister's level. Are
you ready?
jpnChrName: 一夜漬けだろうが踊りに融合させて お姉さんの域に届かせるために……！
jpnSearchText:
一夜漬けだろうが踊りに融合させて
お姉さんの域に届かせるために……！

engChrName: Ready as I'll ever be!
engSearchText: Ready as I'll ever be!
jpnChrName: ……！　はいっ！
jpnSearchText: ……！　はいっ！

engChrName: As for you, Nina, you're in charge of keeping in touch with these doofuses and the guild. Stay on top of everything, okay?
engSearchText:
As for you, Nina, you're in charge of keeping in touch
with these doofuses and the guild. Stay on top of
everything, okay?
jpnChrName: ニナ、彼らやギルド方面の報告は あんたの方で受け取っておいて。
jpnSearchText:
ニナ、彼らやギルド方面の報告は
あんたの方で受け取っておいて。

engChrName: Yeah, I can handle that.
engSearchText: Yeah, I can handle that.
jpnChrName: ええ、任せてください。
jpnSearchText: ええ、任せてください。

engChrName: Nice! Sounds to me like we're aaall set! Let's roll those cameras, people!
engSearchText:
Nice! Sounds to me like we're aaall set! Let's roll
those cameras, people!
jpnChrName: よぉし、それじゃあ始めるぞ！！ 奥のスタジオにレッツゴーじゃいっ！！
jpnSearchText:
よぉし、それじゃあ始めるぞ！！
奥のスタジオにレッツゴーじゃいっ！！

engChrName: She's clearly earned her reputation as a best-in-class actress.
engSearchText:
She's clearly earned her reputation as a
best-in-class actress.
jpnChrName: フフ…… さすがはトップ女優ですね。
jpnSearchText:
フフ……
さすがはトップ女優ですね。

engChrName: Yeah. Seems like she's got a good bead on Shaheena's skills. She'll get her ready.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Seems like she's got a good bead on
Shaheena's skills. She'll get her ready.
jpnChrName: ああ、本質を見抜いてそうだし イイ感じで仕上げてくれんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、本質を見抜いてそうだし
イイ感じで仕上げてくれんだろ。

engChrName: Heh, hard to believe she's such a bumbling mess off the job.
engSearchText:
Heh, hard to believe she's such a bumbling mess off
the job.
jpnChrName: クク…… オマヌケ痴女とは思えねえな。
jpnSearchText:
クク……
オマヌケ痴女とは思えねえな。

engChrName: Heehee! Right? I respect her a bit more now.
engSearchText: Heehee! Right? I respect her a bit more now.
jpnChrName: えへへ…… ちょっと見直しましたっ。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ……
ちょっと見直しましたっ。

engChrName: What are you talking about...?
engSearchText: What are you talking about...?
jpnChrName: えっと……？
jpnSearchText: えっと……？

engChrName: Inside joke between us. Don't worry about it. Anyway...
engSearchText:
Inside joke between us. Don't worry about it.
Anyway...
jpnChrName: こっちの話だ──それよりも。
jpnSearchText: こっちの話だ──それよりも。

engChrName: Now that you've heard the gist of things, has this rung any bells you might've overlooked before?
engSearchText:
Now that you've heard the gist of things, has this
rung any bells you might've overlooked before?
jpnChrName: 状況は軽く説明したが ……何か心当たりはねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
状況は軽く説明したが
……何か心当たりはねぇか？

engChrName: Maybe any doubts or suspicions you've had about Vegas Films?
engSearchText:
Maybe any doubts or suspicions you've had about
Vegas Films?
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムの疑惑について。
jpnSearchText: ベガスフィルムの疑惑について。

engChrName: You're talking about the rumors of its relationships with the underworld and...drug trafficking, right?
engSearchText:
You're talking about the rumors of its relationships
with the underworld and...drug trafficking, right?
jpnChrName: ……裏社会との関係と 違法薬物への関与……でしたか。
jpnSearchText:
……裏社会との関係と
違法薬物への関与……でしたか。

engChrName: I really don't want to believe that such a big company, in my own line of work, could be involved in such things...
engSearchText:
I really don't want to believe that such a big company,
in my own line of work, could be involved in
such things...
jpnChrName: 業界内でそんな事が、なんて あまり信じたくはありませんが……
jpnSearchText:
業界内でそんな事が、なんて
あまり信じたくはありませんが……

engChrName: ...but it's true that Vegas has been expanding in a way that can't be explained just by Mr. Gotti's involvement.
engSearchText:
...but it's true that Vegas has been expanding in a way
that can't be explained just by Mr. Gotti's
involvement.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督の起用だけでは 説明のつかない事業拡大ぶり──
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督の起用だけでは
説明のつかない事業拡大ぶり──

engChrName: And yes, I've heard bits and pieces. People around the industry have a lot to say about Vegas.
engSearchText:
And yes, I've heard bits and pieces. People around the
industry have a lot to say about Vegas.
jpnChrName: ……業界でも色々言われているのは 私もちょっと耳にはしていました。
jpnSearchText:
……業界でも色々言われているのは
私もちょっと耳にはしていました。

engChrName: So when that threatening note came in, it did feel like something bigger was going on. I'm not sure what, but...it's there.
engSearchText:
So when that threatening note came in, it did feel like
something bigger was going on. I'm not sure what,
but...it's there.
jpnChrName: そんな時にあの脅迫状が届いて…… どこか引っかかっていたのも確かです。
jpnSearchText:
そんな時にあの脅迫状が届いて……
どこか引っかかっていたのも確かです。

engChrName: Wow. I didn't realize there was so much intrigue going on before we even arrived.
engSearchText:
Wow. I didn't realize there was so much intrigue
going on before we even arrived.
jpnChrName: そうだったんですね……
jpnSearchText: そうだったんですね……

engChrName: If the company's the culprit behind this, there's no way that snooty president is clueless about it all.
engSearchText:
If the company's the culprit behind this, there's no
way that snooty president is clueless about it all.
jpnChrName: ハッ……ベガスフィルムが黒だとすれば あの社長が何も知らねえはずはねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……ベガスフィルムが黒だとすれば
あの社長が何も知らねえはずはねぇ。

engChrName: And if that's true...the man's up to his nose in drug running. At least on some level.
engSearchText:
And if that's true...the man's up to his nose in
drug running. At least on some level.
jpnChrName: 違法ドラッグの流通にしても 何らかの形で関わっていたはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
違法ドラッグの流通にしても
何らかの形で関わっていたはずだ。

engChrName: Who knows what's up with the notes, but after all that, he's GOT to have something to do with Saara going missing, right?
engSearchText:
Who knows what's up with the notes, but after all
that, he's GOT to have something to do with Saara
going missing, right?
jpnChrName: 脅迫状は分からんが──それこそ 姉貴の失踪にも関わってんじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
脅迫状は分からんが──それこそ
姉貴の失踪にも関わってんじゃねぇか？

engChrName: I guess, but could a guy like him really...?
engSearchText: I guess, but could a guy like him really...?
jpnChrName: ……あの社長が……
jpnSearchText: ……あの社長が……

engChrName: Nina? Are you okay?
engSearchText: Nina? Are you okay?
jpnChrName: ニナさん……？
jpnSearchText: ニナさん……？

engChrName: Sorry, I'm okay...ish. This is all just...rattling me a bit more than normal.
engSearchText:
Sorry, I'm okay...ish. This is all just...rattling me a bit
more than normal.
jpnChrName: いえ、その…… 微妙にしっくりこなくて。
jpnSearchText:
いえ、その……
微妙にしっくりこなくて。

engChrName: Like Feri said, it's hard for me to picture Mr. Dillon doing such things!
engSearchText:
Like Feri said, it's hard for me to picture Mr. Dillon
doing such things!
jpnChrName: あのギャスパー社長がそこまで 大それたことをするかと思いまして。
jpnSearchText:
あのギャスパー社長がそこまで
大それたことをするかと思いまして。

engChrName: I mean, we're talking about the same man who's always getting pushed around by Mr. Gotti, including allowing the parade at all.
engSearchText:
I mean, we're talking about the same man who's
always getting pushed around by Mr. Gotti, including
allowing the parade at all.
jpnChrName: いつもゴッチ監督に押し切られて パレードなんかも認めるくらいですし。
jpnSearchText:
いつもゴッチ監督に押し切られて
パレードなんかも認めるくらいですし。

engChrName: Even if he were a man with more backbone, the risks involved with illicit drug smuggling are considerable.
engSearchText:
Even if he were a man with more backbone, the risks
involved with illicit drug smuggling are considerable.
jpnChrName: そうでなくても違法薬物絡み── 露見した時のリスクは計り知れないかと。
jpnSearchText:
そうでなくても違法薬物絡み──
露見した時のリスクは計り知れないかと。

engChrName: Which means you believe Mr. Dillon doesn't—or shouldn't—have the courage to arrange something so flagrantly illegal?
engSearchText:
Which means you believe Mr. Dillon doesn't—or
shouldn't—have the courage to arrange something so
flagrantly illegal?
jpnChrName: マフィアと結託してそこまでの事をする 胆力はお持ちではないと言うことですか。
jpnSearchText:
マフィアと結託してそこまでの事をする
胆力はお持ちではないと言うことですか。

engChrName: Yes. I'm not trying to dismiss everything you're saying or have seen, but...it's just so hard to reconcile.
engSearchText:
Yes. I'm not trying to dismiss everything you're saying
or have seen, but...it's just so hard to reconcile.
jpnChrName: はい……失礼は承知ながら。
jpnSearchText: はい……失礼は承知ながら。

engChrName: Hmm... Be that as it may, the circumstances paint him as our most likely culprit.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Be that as it may, the circumstances paint
him as our most likely culprit.
jpnChrName: ……ですが状況的に 一番有力なのは確か、ですよね。
jpnSearchText:
……ですが状況的に
一番有力なのは確か、ですよね。

engChrName: Even if he's normally not 'brave,' what if, for some reason, he had no choice but to play along with such a scheme?
engSearchText:
Even if he's normally not 'brave,' what if, for some
reason, he had no choice but to play along with such
a scheme?
jpnChrName: そんな人がそこまでの事をやらざるを 得ない状況があるとすれば……
jpnSearchText:
そんな人がそこまでの事をやらざるを
得ない状況があるとすれば……

engChrName: Ahh, I see what you're getting at.
engSearchText: Ahh, I see what you're getting at.
jpnChrName: ハッ……そういう事か。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……そういう事か。

engChrName: That's an excellent point. It would be perfectly plausible for criminal elements to do something underhanded to make him comply.
engSearchText:
That's an excellent point. It would be perfectly
plausible for criminal elements to do something
underhanded to make him comply.
jpnChrName: 考えてみれば反社会勢力として ごく当然のやり方かもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
考えてみれば反社会勢力として
ごく当然のやり方かもしれません。

engChrName: So, wait, let me get this straight. We don't know how involved he is in whatever's going on.
engSearchText:
So, wait, let me get this straight. We don't know how
involved he is in whatever's going on.
jpnChrName: どこからどこまでかはともかく……
jpnSearchText: どこからどこまでかはともかく……

engChrName: But you're saying that he could've been threatened into somehow helping this drug trafficking you're talking about?
engSearchText:
But you're saying that he could've been threatened
into somehow helping this drug trafficking you're
talking about?
jpnChrName: 少なくとも違法薬物の流通については “脅されて”ということですか。
jpnSearchText:
少なくとも違法薬物の流通については
“脅されて”ということですか。

engChrName: Yeah, maybe...
engSearchText: Yeah, maybe...

engChrName: That's sure how it looks.
engSearchText: That's sure how it looks.
jpnChrName: ああ──そういう事だな。
jpnSearchText: ああ──そういう事だな。

engChrName: It's all but certain that Dillon used Almata's help to grow Vegas Films into the juggernaut it is today, as fast as he did.
engSearchText:
It's all but certain that Dillon used Almata's help to
grow Vegas Films into the juggernaut it is today, as
fast as he did.
jpnChrName: あの社長がアルマータの力を借りて 業界で急成長したのは確かなんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
あの社長がアルマータの力を借りて
業界で急成長したのは確かなんだろう。

engChrName: The money funneled to the political and financial sectors, the murky fundraising, Messeldam's festival going kaput, which was perfect for him...
engSearchText:
The money funneled to the political and financial
sectors, the murky fundraising, Messeldam's festival
going kaput, which was perfect for him...
jpnChrName: 政財界への裏金、出所の不明な資金調達、 メッセルダム映画祭を潰しての我田引水。
jpnSearchText:
政財界への裏金、出所の不明な資金調達、
メッセルダム映画祭を潰しての我田引水。

engChrName: Even if it seems like everything's goin' his way, all he's been doing is squeezin' further under his 'benefactor's' thumb.
engSearchText:
Even if it seems like everything's goin' his way, all
he's been doing is squeezin' further under his
'benefactor's' thumb.
jpnChrName: ──だが裏を返せばそれだけの “弱み”を相手に晒すってことでもある。
jpnSearchText:
──だが裏を返せばそれだけの
“弱み”を相手に晒すってことでもある。

engChrName: And being under Almata's thumb is a sure way to get crushed.
engSearchText:
And being under Almata's thumb is a sure way to
get crushed.
jpnChrName: それもアルマータのような最悪の相手にな。
jpnSearchText: それもアルマータのような最悪の相手にな。

engChrName: I...hadn't thought of it like that.
engSearchText: I...hadn't thought of it like that.
jpnChrName: それは……
jpnSearchText: それは……

engChrName: Well, this is getting all amazingly grim.
engSearchText: Well, this is getting all amazingly grim.
jpnChrName: ハッ……ヤベエ所の話じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ……ヤベエ所の話じゃねえな。

engChrName: In that case, good ol' Dillon probably isn't gonna stop at drug trafficking. I bet he's being put up to do something even worse, right?
engSearchText:
In that case, good ol' Dillon probably isn't gonna stop
at drug trafficking. I bet he's being put up to do
something even worse, right?
jpnChrName: そうするとドラッグの流通だけじゃねえ、 もっとヤバイことをさせられてそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうするとドラッグの流通だけじゃねえ、
もっとヤバイことをさせられてそうだ。

engChrName: Like, say, something that could go down during the film festival here.
engSearchText:
Like, say, something that could go down during the
film festival here.
jpnChrName: しかもタイミング的に、 この映画祭に関わるような仕掛けを。
jpnSearchText:
しかもタイミング的に、
この映画祭に関わるような仕掛けを。

engChrName: Then the notes we've been receiving are—
engSearchText: Then the notes we've been receiving are—
jpnChrName: そ、そうすると あの“脅迫状”というのは……
jpnSearchText:
そ、そうすると
あの“脅迫状”というのは……

engChrName: Indeed. Almata is taking advantage of the film festival to plan something in this part of the country.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Almata is taking advantage of the film
festival to plan something in this part of the country.
jpnChrName: はい──この地で映画祭に乗じて アルマータが起こそうとしている“何か”。
jpnSearchText:
はい──この地で映画祭に乗じて
アルマータが起こそうとしている“何か”。

engChrName: Caught in the middle of it, it would seem Mr. Dillon wants to take action before something hideous happens.
engSearchText:
Caught in the middle of it, it would seem Mr. Dillon
wants to take action before something
hideous happens.
jpnChrName: 自分も加担してしまっているそれを、 取り返しのつかなくなる前に何とかしたい……
jpnSearchText:
自分も加担してしまっているそれを、
取り返しのつかなくなる前に何とかしたい……

engChrName: But he wishes to do it without quashing the festival. Simply doing that could bring the underlying conflict to the surface.
engSearchText:
But he wishes to do it without quashing the festival.
Simply doing that could bring the underlying conflict
to the surface.
jpnChrName: その一方で映画祭自体も潰したくない── そんな葛藤の現れなのかもしれません。
jpnSearchText:
その一方で映画祭自体も潰したくない──
そんな葛藤の現れなのかもしれません。

engChrName: Then does that mean that snooty guy's behind the notes?!
engSearchText:
Then does that mean that snooty guy's behind
the notes?!
jpnChrName: じゃ、じゃあ あの社長さんが脅迫状を……！？
jpnSearchText:
じゃ、じゃあ
あの社長さんが脅迫状を……！？

engChrName: Yes. The more I think about it, the more everything clicks into place. It all adds up.
engSearchText:
Yes. The more I think about it, the more everything
clicks into place. It all adds up.
jpnChrName: ええ……確かにそう考えると 全ての辻褄が合ってきそうです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ……確かにそう考えると
全ての辻褄が合ってきそうです。

engChrName: Though, wait! Couldn't that also implicate him in Saara disappearing when she did?
engSearchText:
Though, wait! Couldn't that also implicate him in
Saara disappearing when she did?
jpnChrName: ……！　でしたらサァラさんが このタイミングで失踪したことも……？
jpnSearchText:
……！　でしたらサァラさんが
このタイミングで失踪したことも……？

engChrName: It sure could, which would indicate Almata didn't snatch her—and she sure didn't vanish of her own free will.
engSearchText:
It sure could, which would indicate Almata didn't
snatch her—and she sure didn't vanish of her own
free will.
jpnChrName: ああ、アルマータの仕業でも、 もちろんサァラ本人の意志でもない。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アルマータの仕業でも、
もちろんサァラ本人の意志でもない。

engChrName: Gaspard Dillon abducted her and took her somewhere.
engSearchText:
Gaspard Dillon abducted her and took
her somewhere.
jpnChrName: ギャスパー・ディロン── ヤツが何処かに連れ去ったんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ギャスパー・ディロン──
ヤツが何処かに連れ去ったんだろう。

engChrName: Van, darling! I've got big news for you!
engSearchText: Van, darling! I've got big news for you!
jpnChrName: ヴァンちゃん、やったわよ！
jpnSearchText: ヴァンちゃん、やったわよ！

engChrName: Nice! You figured it out?
engSearchText: Nice! You figured it out?
jpnChrName: ！　特定したか……！
jpnSearchText: ！　特定したか……！

engChrName: Looks like you owe me again, Van.
engSearchText: Looks like you owe me again, Van.
jpnChrName: また一つ貸しだな、ヴァン。
jpnSearchText: また一つ貸しだな、ヴァン。

engChrName: Oh, come on, René. We're all in this together.
engSearchText: Oh, come on, René. We're all in this together.
jpnChrName: ふう…… お互い様でしょう、ルネ。
jpnSearchText:
ふう……
お互い様でしょう、ルネ。

engChrName: Elaine! And is that...?
engSearchText: Elaine! And is that...?
jpnChrName: エレインさん、それに……！
jpnSearchText: エレインさん、それに……！

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I remember you talking to someone yesterday all suspicious-like. That explains a few things.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. I remember you talking to someone
yesterday all suspicious-like. That explains a
few things.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そういや昨日どこかと 連絡を取ってたみてぇだが……
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そういや昨日どこかと
連絡を取ってたみてぇだが……

engChrName: Ehh, never hurts to have a little insurance.
engSearchText: Ehh, never hurts to have a little insurance.
jpnChrName: ま、念の為の保険ってヤツだ。
jpnSearchText: ま、念の為の保険ってヤツだ。

engChrName: When I saw those idiots goin' nuts yesterday, I figured the possibility we'd run into trouble was there.
engSearchText:
When I saw those idiots goin' nuts yesterday, I
figured the possibility we'd run into trouble was there.
jpnChrName: 昨日ハメを外してた馬鹿共を 見かけた時に可能性くらいはな。
jpnSearchText:
昨日ハメを外してた馬鹿共を
見かけた時に可能性くらいはな。

engChrName: Clearly your instincts are as sharp as ever.
engSearchText: Clearly your instincts are as sharp as ever.
jpnChrName: ふう、相変わらずカンが働くわね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、相変わらずカンが働くわね。

engChrName: If I'd known illicit drugs would be involved, I would've traveled to Tharbad, too.
engSearchText:
If I'd known illicit drugs would be involved, I
would've traveled to Tharbad, too.
jpnChrName: 違法薬物絡みと分かっていれば 私もサルバッドに……
jpnSearchText:
違法薬物絡みと分かっていれば
私もサルバッドに……

engChrName: No, we're fine. What you're doing right now is extremely important. We can handle the situation here.
engSearchText:
No, we're fine. What you're doing right now is
extremely important. We can handle the
situation here.
jpnChrName: エレインが今抱えてる案件も重要。 ここは役割分担でいこう。
jpnSearchText:
エレインが今抱えてる案件も重要。
ここは役割分担でいこう。

engChrName: That analyzer is the latest model from the Basel Institute of Science. It'll be perfectly accurate, don't worry.
engSearchText:
That analyzer is the latest model from the Basel
Institute of Science. It'll be perfectly accurate,
don't worry.
jpnChrName: 《バーゼル理科大学》から手配した 最新式の検査器だ、精度は信用していい。
jpnSearchText:
《バーゼル理科大学》から手配した
最新式の検査器だ、精度は信用していい。

engChrName: As for the form the drugs have taken and how they're being distributed, we're looking into that on our end.
engSearchText:
As for the form the drugs have taken and how they're
being distributed, we're looking into that on our end.
jpnChrName: 流通経路と形態については こちらでは探りようもないが……
jpnSearchText:
流通経路と形態については
こちらでは探りようもないが……

engChrName: But I'm sure you already have some ideas about all that.
engSearchText:
But I'm sure you already have some ideas about
all that.
jpnChrName: お前のことだ、そちらも もう当たりはつけてるんだろう？
jpnSearchText:
お前のことだ、そちらも
もう当たりはつけてるんだろう？

engChrName: Wait, you do?
engSearchText: Wait, you do?

engChrName: Er, really?
engSearchText: Er, really?
jpnChrName: そ、そうなんですか？
jpnSearchText: そ、そうなんですか？

engChrName: I might. And I bet our diligent little concierge does as well.
engSearchText:
I might. And I bet our diligent little concierge does
as well.
jpnChrName: まあな──多分、 こっちのＳＣ殿もだろうが。
jpnSearchText:
まあな──多分、
こっちのＳＣ殿もだろうが。

engChrName: Heehee! Nothing gets past you, does it, Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText: Heehee! Nothing gets past you, does it, Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: ふふ、やはりヴァン様も 気付いてらしたのですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、やはりヴァン様も
気付いてらしたのですね。

engChrName: Well, aren't you two such geniuses? But yeah, something did feel off to me.
engSearchText:
Well, aren't you two such geniuses? But yeah,
something did feel off to me.
jpnChrName: チッ、勿体ぶりやがって。 ……だが確かに違和感はあったな。
jpnSearchText:
チッ、勿体ぶりやがって。
……だが確かに違和感はあったな。

engChrName: I take it none of those dumbasses have mentioned anything about buying drugs so far?
engSearchText:
I take it none of those dumbasses have mentioned
anything about buying drugs so far?
jpnChrName: あのいかにもな馬鹿共も含めて、 薬物取引の証言はまだ出てねぇんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
あのいかにもな馬鹿共も含めて、
薬物取引の証言はまだ出てねぇんだろ？

engChrName: No, not at all.
engSearchText: No, not at all.
jpnChrName: ん、誰一人ね。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ん、誰一人ね。

engChrName: They said they didn't even remember taking anything like that, right?
engSearchText:
They said they didn't even remember taking anything
like that, right?
jpnChrName: そもそも、服用した覚えすらない…… そんな話でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、服用した覚えすらない……
そんな話でしたね。

engChrName: Is it possible they could've been forced to...ingest it, somehow?
engSearchText:
Is it possible they could've been forced to...ingest
it, somehow?
jpnChrName: ……何らかの方法で、 無理矢理薬物を服用させた……？
jpnSearchText:
……何らかの方法で、
無理矢理薬物を服用させた……？

engChrName: It would need to have been right before the film festival and distributed in a way that wouldn't catch the police or guild's attention. Hmm...
engSearchText:
It would need to have been right before the film
festival and distributed in a way that wouldn't catch
the police or guild's attention. Hmm...
jpnChrName: 映画祭前の短期間──それもギルドや 警察の目も掻い潜る流通ルート……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭前の短期間──それもギルドや
警察の目も掻い潜る流通ルート……

engChrName: (If there's any way to pull that off, it would've been...)
engSearchText: (If there's any way to pull that off, it would've been...)
jpnChrName: （……そんな方法があるとしたら──）
jpnSearchText: （……そんな方法があるとしたら──）

engChrName: (No, that can't be it. I need to think harder.)
engSearchText: (No, that can't be it. I need to think harder.)
jpnChrName: （ううん……よく考えて。）
jpnSearchText: （ううん……よく考えて。）

engChrName: (It had to have been something we're missing. A way to conceal the drugs...)
engSearchText:
(It had to have been something we're missing. A way
to conceal the drugs...)
jpnChrName: （私たちも目にしていたはずの、   違法薬物の流通ルートは……）
jpnSearchText:
（私たちも目にしていたはずの、
違法薬物の流通ルートは……）

engChrName: Wait. What about those new orbal hookahs that seem so popular recently?
engSearchText:
Wait. What about those new orbal hookahs that seem
so popular recently?
jpnChrName: ……思えば、シャヒーナさんたちを 攫った人たちも最初から持っていました。
jpnSearchText:
……思えば、シャヒーナさんたちを
攫った人たちも最初から持っていました。

engChrName: Come to think of it...the men who kidnapped Shaheena and Marielle had them!
engSearchText:
Come to think of it...the men who kidnapped
Shaheena and Marielle had them!
jpnChrName: 近頃広まり始めたという 最新式の“導力シーシャ”──
jpnSearchText:
近頃広まり始めたという
最新式の“導力シーシャ”──

engChrName: What if the drugs were mixed into the vapor ingredients of the hookahs?
engSearchText:
What if the drugs were mixed into the vapor
ingredients of the hookahs?
jpnChrName: あの中にドラッグの成分が 混入されているんですね……？
jpnSearchText:
あの中にドラッグの成分が
混入されているんですね……？

engChrName: Oh, interesting hypothesis.
engSearchText: Oh, interesting hypothesis.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど、アレか。
jpnSearchText: <C1>……なるほど、アレか。

engChrName: Not just interesting. I think you got it in one.
engSearchText: Not just interesting. I think you got it in one.
jpnChrName: ああ──恐らく正解だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ──恐らく正解だ。

engChrName: Think we can get the CID and guild to step in?
engSearchText: Think we can get the CID and guild to step in?
jpnChrName: そんじゃあＣＩＤにギルドも それぞれ汗を掻いてもらおうか？
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃあＣＩＤにギルドも
それぞれ汗を掻いてもらおうか？

engChrName: The festival's in enough trouble as it is. Anything to help it kick off more smoothly is worth it at this point, I think.
engSearchText:
The festival's in enough trouble as it is. Anything to
help it kick off more smoothly is worth it at this
point, I think.
jpnChrName: 波乱含みの映画祭──少しでも 安全に開けるようにするためにな。
jpnSearchText:
波乱含みの映画祭──少しでも
安全に開けるようにするためにな。

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: With the CID's help, sales of the hookahs throughout the city were put to a halt in short order.
engSearchText:
With the CID's help, sales of the hookahs
throughout the city were put to a halt in short order.
jpnChrName: ＣＩＤも手を回した結果、短時間のうちに 市内全域での販売が差し止められたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
ＣＩＤも手を回した結果、短時間のうちに
市内全域での販売が差し止められたのだった。

engChrName: From there, Van and the others returned to the inn to take a brief break before getting back to business.
engSearchText:
From there, Van and the others returned to the inn to
take a brief break before getting back to business.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは一旦、 宿でしばしの休息をとった後……
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンたちは一旦、
宿でしばしの休息をとった後……

engChrName: After getting in touch with some of their collaborators, the group took off for Vegas Films once more.
engSearchText:
After getting in touch with some of their
collaborators, the group took off for Vegas Films
once more.
jpnChrName: 協力者たちの一部と連絡をとりつつ、 改めてベガスフィルムに向かうことにした。
jpnSearchText:
協力者たちの一部と連絡をとりつつ、
改めてベガスフィルムに向かうことにした。

engChrName: October 6th, 8:21PM
engSearchText: October 6th, 8:21PM

engChrName: Guess there was kind of a commotion over at the bazaar. Granted, that was the point, but still.
engSearchText:
Guess there was kind of a commotion over at
the bazaar. Granted, that was the point, but still.
jpnChrName: バザールの方も少し騒がしかったな。 ま、狙い通りか。
jpnSearchText:
バザールの方も少し騒がしかったな。
ま、狙い通りか。

engChrName: I'm just relieved that the hookahs could all be confiscated before any more damage could be done.
engSearchText:
I'm just relieved that the hookahs could all be
confiscated before any more damage could be done.
jpnChrName: ……はい、無事に全て 撤去できたみたいで良かったです。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、無事に全て
撤去できたみたいで良かったです。

engChrName: At this stage, we've laid down the groundwork and gathered the evidence.
engSearchText:
At this stage, we've laid down the groundwork and
gathered the evidence.
jpnChrName: 仕込みと裏取りも済ませた。
jpnSearchText: 仕込みと裏取りも済ませた。

engChrName: For now, the guild and cops are simply going to be monitoring things. If we're going to act, now's our chance.
engSearchText:
For now, the guild and cops are simply going to be
monitoring things. If we're going to act, now's
our chance.
jpnChrName: ギルドと警察もいったん様子見── 動くなら今しかねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドと警察もいったん様子見──
動くなら今しかねぇだろう。

engChrName: Indeed. There is no time like the present. Let us proceed to Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
Indeed. There is no time like the present. Let us
proceed to Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: はい──では予定通り、 ベガスフィルムに向かいましょう。
jpnSearchText:
はい──では予定通り、
ベガスフィルムに向かいましょう。

engChrName: We should probably check in with Shaheena and see how she's doing while we're at it.
engSearchText:
We should probably check in with Shaheena and see
how she's doing while we're at it.
jpnChrName: ついでにシャヒーナさんの様子も 見ていかないと、ですねっ。
jpnSearchText:
ついでにシャヒーナさんの様子も
見ていかないと、ですねっ。

engChrName: (All right. We've prepared as much as we can for this.)
engSearchText:
(All right. We've prepared as much as we can
for this.)
jpnChrName: （さて……仕込みは全て済ませた。）
jpnSearchText: （さて……仕込みは全て済ませた。）

engChrName: (Only thing left to do is close in on our suspect and pounce. Are we ready?)
engSearchText:
(Only thing left to do is close in on our suspect
and pounce. Are we ready?)
jpnChrName: （あとは何とか当たりを付けて   仕掛けるだけ──準備は出来ているか？）
jpnSearchText:
（あとは何とか当たりを付けて
仕掛けるだけ──準備は出来ているか？）

engChrName: Once you enter Vegas Films, day two will end and the main story will advance. Proceed?
engSearchText:
Once you enter Vegas Films, day two will end and
the main story will advance. Proceed?
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムに入ると攻略が開始され、 ２日目が終了するので注意してください。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムに入ると攻略が開始され、
２日目が終了するので注意してください。

engChrName: Van and company entered the lobby, where they found Nina waiting for them.
engSearchText:
Van and company entered the lobby, where they
found Nina waiting for them.
jpnChrName: その後、ヴァンたちは玄関ロビーで 待ち合わせをしていたニナと合流し──
jpnSearchText:
その後、ヴァンたちは玄関ロビーで
待ち合わせをしていたニナと合流し──

engChrName: After making some arrangements, they headed to the studio where Shaheena and Judith were training.
engSearchText:
After making some arrangements, they headed to the
studio where Shaheena and Judith were training.
jpnChrName: 幾つか段取りをしてからシャヒーナたちがいる トレーニング室に向かうのだった。
jpnSearchText:
幾つか段取りをしてからシャヒーナたちがいる
トレーニング室に向かうのだった。

engChrName: October 6th, 9:02PM
engSearchText: October 6th, 9:02PM

engChrName: Hah!
engSearchText: Hah!
jpnChrName: はっ……！
jpnSearchText: はっ……！

engChrName: Yah!
engSearchText: Yah!

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Well, what do you guys think? You like it?
engSearchText:
*huff* *huff* Well, what do you guys think? You
like it?
jpnChrName: はあはあ、どうだった？
jpnSearchText: はあはあ、どうだった？

engChrName: That was awesome! I don't even know how to explain it! That was crazy-cool!
engSearchText:
That was awesome! I don't even know how to
explain it! That was crazy-cool!
jpnChrName: す、凄かったです……！ うまく言えないですけど！
jpnSearchText:
す、凄かったです……！
うまく言えないですけど！

engChrName: Yeah, it had your usual carefree energy, but something about it felt a bit more refined, too. I liked it!
engSearchText:
Yeah, it had your usual carefree energy, but
something about it felt a bit more refined, too. I
liked it!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさんらしく伸びやかで それでいてどこか大人っぽくて……！
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナさんらしく伸びやかで
それでいてどこか大人っぽくて……！

engChrName: Yeah, you're putting your own spin on it that's different from your sister. Good on ya!
engSearchText:
Yeah, you're putting your own spin on it that's
