different from your sister. Good on ya!
jpnChrName: ハッ……姉貴とは違った 独自の境地が見え始めやがったか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……姉貴とは違った
独自の境地が見え始めやがったか。

engChrName: What's the verdict? Think she'll be ready in time?
engSearchText: What's the verdict? Think she'll be ready in time?
jpnChrName: ……どうやら行けそうだな？
jpnSearchText: ……どうやら行けそうだな？

engChrName: Heh! Oh, ye of little faith! She will be. We still have plenty of time to finetune things to fit her in with the parade.
engSearchText:
Heh! Oh, ye of little faith! She will be. We still have
plenty of time to finetune things to fit her in with
the parade.
jpnChrName: ふふ、パレードに合わせた 調整の余地はまだまだあるけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、パレードに合わせた
調整の余地はまだまだあるけどね。

engChrName: We need all the time we can get. She's good, but she's still not quite a match for Saara.
engSearchText:
We need all the time we can get. She's good, but she's
still not quite a match for Saara.
jpnChrName: うむ、現時点ではサァラちゃんの イメージの足元にも及ばんじゃろうからな。
jpnSearchText:
うむ、現時点ではサァラちゃんの
イメージの足元にも及ばんじゃろうからな。

engChrName: But give me the rest of the night and I'll whip her into shape, or my name isn't Salvatore Gotti!
engSearchText:
But give me the rest of the night and I'll whip her
into shape, or my name isn't Salvatore Gotti!
jpnChrName: じゃがこのサルバトーレ・ゴッチの名に賭けて なんとか一晩で完成させてみせようっ！
jpnSearchText:
じゃがこのサルバトーレ・ゴッチの名に賭けて
なんとか一晩で完成させてみせようっ！

engChrName: I'm counting on you, Mr. Gotti! With your help, I can do this!
engSearchText:
I'm counting on you, Mr. Gotti! With your help, I
can do this!
jpnChrName: うん、ヨロシクね監督っ！
jpnSearchText: うん、ヨロシクね監督っ！

engChrName: I just hope my sister—never mind. I trust you guys. I know you'll do great!
engSearchText:
I just hope my sister—never mind. I trust you guys.
I know you'll do great!
jpnChrName: お姉は── ううん、今は任せたっ！
jpnSearchText:
お姉は──
<#E[3]#M_2#B_0>ううん、今は任せたっ！

engChrName: Anyway, Mr. Gotti, I'm ready to learn the next part!
engSearchText: Anyway, Mr. Gotti, I'm ready to learn the next part!
jpnChrName: 監督、次のパートについて 教えてくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
監督、次のパートについて
教えてくださいっ！

engChrName: Fabulous! Then let's get back to work! So, when things loop back around...
engSearchText:
Fabulous! Then let's get back to work! So, when
things loop back around...
jpnChrName: おお、それじゃあ 折り返し地点じゃが──！
jpnSearchText:
おお、それじゃあ
折り返し地点じゃが──！

engChrName: ...Things sure have taken an interesting turn around here, haven't they?
engSearchText:
...Things sure have taken an interesting turn around
here, haven't they?
jpnChrName: ……それにしても、あれから そんな話になってたとはね。
jpnSearchText:
……それにしても、あれから
そんな話になってたとはね。

engChrName: Especially when it comes to those orbal hookahs and how they managed to get so popular.
engSearchText:
Especially when it comes to those orbal hookahs and
how they managed to get so popular.
jpnChrName: その《導力シーシャ》を広めたのも……
jpnSearchText: その《導力シーシャ》を広めたのも……

engChrName: Definitely. Luckily, we were able to put the screws to the distributor and get evidence out of 'em, too.
engSearchText:
Definitely. Luckily, we were able to put the screws to
the distributor and get evidence out of 'em, too.
jpnChrName: ああ──卸業者を締め上げて裏も取れた。
jpnSearchText: ああ──卸業者を締め上げて裏も取れた。

engChrName: Apparently they'd been blasting out sample units all over town under the pretext of it being a campaign commemoratin' the festival.
engSearchText:
Apparently they'd been blasting out sample units all
over town under the pretext of it being a campaign
commemoratin' the festival.
jpnChrName: 映画祭のキャンペーンっつう名目で 試供品をあちこちにバラ撒いていたらしい。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭のキャンペーンっつう名目で
試供品をあちこちにバラ撒いていたらしい。

engChrName: Additionally, there are signs that they made it into the city without being inspected by the proper authorities beforehand.
engSearchText:
Additionally, there are signs that they made it into
the city without being inspected by the proper
authorities beforehand.
jpnChrName: 当局の審査も通さずに 進められた形跡もありましたね。
jpnSearchText:
当局の審査も通さずに
進められた形跡もありましたね。

engChrName: Unfortunately, it seems like nobody has managed to uncover any direct evidence of Mr. Dillon's involvement yet.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, it seems like nobody has managed to
uncover any direct evidence of Mr. Dillon's
involvement yet.
jpnChrName: その……直接的な証拠までは まだ見つかっていないそうですけど。
jpnSearchText:
その……直接的な証拠までは
まだ見つかっていないそうですけど。

engChrName: Yeah, but he's otherwise got 'guilty' written all over him. The nerve of that pompous ass, thinking he could get away with this!
engSearchText:
Yeah, but he's otherwise got 'guilty' written all
over him. The nerve of that pompous ass, thinking he
could get away with this!
jpnChrName: 状況的には真っ黒じゃない。 あのチョビ髭、舐めた真似を～……
jpnSearchText:
状況的には真っ黒じゃない。
あのチョビ髭、舐めた真似を～……

engChrName: Keep in mind, the big chief acted on his own. I'd guess Gotti's completely in the dark about everything.
engSearchText:
Keep in mind, the big chief acted on his own.
I'd guess Gotti's completely in the dark
about everything.
jpnChrName: ま、ギャスパーの独断で 多分ゴッチ監督は何も知らねぇだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ま、ギャスパーの独断で
多分ゴッチ監督は何も知らねぇだろう。

engChrName: For now, just keep Shaheena and Gotti focused on the task at hand.
engSearchText:
For now, just keep Shaheena and Gotti focused on
the task at hand.
jpnChrName: 今はシャヒーナ共々、 そっちの方に集中させといてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
今はシャヒーナ共々、
そっちの方に集中させといてくれ。

engChrName: It's our job to worry about Saara. We're gonna do everything we can to bring her back.
engSearchText:
It's our job to worry about Saara. We're gonna do
everything we can to bring her back.
jpnChrName: ──姉貴の方は俺たちの方で これから何とかするつもりだからよ。
jpnSearchText:
──姉貴の方は俺たちの方で
これから何とかするつもりだからよ。

engChrName: ...Yeah, I know. All we can do is trust you.
engSearchText: ...Yeah, I know. All we can do is trust you.
jpnChrName: ……アンタたち………
jpnSearchText: ……アンタたち………

engChrName: You think she's really somewhere in this building?
engSearchText: You think she's really somewhere in this building?
jpnChrName: やっぱりサァラさんは このビルのどこかに……？
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりサァラさんは
このビルのどこかに……？

engChrName: Based on what the cops and guild have figured out, there's no evidence that she ever left.
engSearchText:
Based on what the cops and guild have figured out,
there's no evidence that she ever left.
jpnChrName: 警察とギルドの情報も当たってみたが このビルから出た形跡はゼロだった。
jpnSearchText:
警察とギルドの情報も当たってみたが
このビルから出た形跡はゼロだった。

engChrName: It pretty much rules out any other place she could be.
engSearchText: It pretty much rules out any other place she could be.
jpnChrName: だったら可能性は一つだからなァ。
jpnSearchText: だったら可能性は一つだからなァ。

engChrName: We've also uncovered more information thanks to Mr. Brad and the CID.
engSearchText:
We've also uncovered more information thanks to
Mr. Brad and the CID.
jpnChrName: なお、ディンゴ様と ＣＩＤ方面の情報によると──
jpnSearchText:
なお、ディンゴ様と
ＣＩＤ方面の情報によると──

engChrName: According to them, there are discrepancies between the construction declaration filed a year ago and the construction firm's own paperwork.
engSearchText:
According to them, there are discrepancies between
the construction declaration filed a year ago and the
construction firm's own paperwork.
jpnChrName: 一年前の当ビル建造時の申告と 建設会社の書類に齟齬があるそうです。
jpnSearchText:
一年前の当ビル建造時の申告と
建設会社の書類に齟齬があるそうです。

engChrName: Said discrepancies appear to indicate that this building contains an entire additional floor that isn't officially accounted for.
engSearchText:
Said discrepancies appear to indicate that this
building contains an entire additional floor that isn't
officially accounted for.
jpnChrName: それによれば“ある筈のない”フロアが どこかに存在するのだとか。
jpnSearchText:
それによれば“ある筈のない”フロアが
どこかに存在するのだとか。

engChrName: We suspect it contains some sort of security that only Dillon can get past, as the company president.
engSearchText:
We suspect it contains some sort of security that only
Dillon can get past, as the company president.
jpnChrName: ……多分、何らかのセキュリティで 社長しか行けない場所なんだと思います。
jpnSearchText:
……多分、何らかのセキュリティで
社長しか行けない場所なんだと思います。

engChrName: If Saara's anywhere in here, she's probably on that floor.
engSearchText: If Saara's anywhere in here, she's probably on that floor.
jpnChrName: おそらくサァラさんはそこに──
jpnSearchText: おそらくサァラさんはそこに──

engChrName: But if we can create the right kind of diversion, he'll show us what he's really all about!
engSearchText:
But if we can create the right kind of diversion, he'll
show us what he's really all about!
jpnChrName: ですが上手く“陽動”できれば 尻尾を出すはず……！
jpnSearchText:
ですが上手く“陽動”できれば
尻尾を出すはず……！

engChrName: In fact, Nina's helping to pinpoint which terminal he uses to get into that place, right now!
engSearchText:
In fact, Nina's helping to pinpoint which terminal he
uses to get into that place, right now!
jpnChrName: 今、ニナさんにも協力してもらって 仕掛ける端末を特定していましてっ。
jpnSearchText:
今、ニナさんにも協力してもらって
仕掛ける端末を特定していましてっ。

engChrName: Judith, come over here!
engSearchText: Judith, come over here!
jpnChrName: ジュディス君、来てくれたまえっ！
jpnSearchText: ジュディス君、来てくれたまえっ！

engChrName: I need your help deciding something—which of these dance patterns looks better?!
engSearchText:
I need your help deciding something—which of these
dance patterns looks better?!
jpnChrName: ここの舞いのパターン、 どちらがいいと思いますかっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ここの舞いのパターン、
どちらがいいと思いますかっ！？

engChrName: All right, just a sec!
engSearchText: All right, just a sec!
jpnChrName: ええ、今行くわ──！
jpnSearchText: ええ、今行くわ──！

engChrName: ...You're looking for terminal A2. You're going to attempt anything, that's the one you want.
engSearchText:
...You're looking for terminal A2. You're going to
attempt anything, that's the one you want.
jpnChrName: ──Ａ２端末。 何か仕掛けるならそこよ。
jpnSearchText:
──Ａ２端末。
何か仕掛けるならそこよ。

engChrName: Did...she just...?
engSearchText: Did...she just...?

engChrName: Sounds like somebody was going to act on her own if we didn't.
engSearchText:
Sounds like somebody was going to act on her own if
we didn't.
jpnChrName: ハン、いざとなったら自分で 動くつもりだったみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、いざとなったら自分で
動くつもりだったみてぇだな。

engChrName: You guys!
engSearchText: You guys!
jpnChrName: 皆さん……！
jpnSearchText: 皆さん……！

engChrName: Sorry to bother you. I managed to find a handful of terminals that can be accessed.
engSearchText:
Sorry to bother you. I managed to find a handful of
terminals that can be accessed.
jpnChrName: ……すみません、アクセスできる 端末は幾つか見つけたんですが……
jpnSearchText:
……すみません、アクセスできる
端末は幾つか見つけたんですが……

engChrName: The only problem is, they're not the right security level, so I'm not sure which would be the easiest to use to break int—
engSearchText:
The only problem is, they're not the right security
level, so I'm not sure which would be the easiest to
use to break int—
jpnChrName: セキュリティレベルが違うらしく、 どれが侵入しやすいかまでは……
jpnSearchText:
セキュリティレベルが違うらしく、
どれが侵入しやすいかまでは……

engChrName: No worries. We already got it figured out.
engSearchText: No worries. We already got it figured out.
jpnChrName: いや、それなら問題ない。
jpnSearchText: いや、それなら問題ない。

engChrName: Yes. Could you please take us to terminal A2?
engSearchText: Yes. Could you please take us to terminal A2?
jpnChrName: ──Ａ２という端末に 案内して頂けるでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
──Ａ２という端末に
案内して頂けるでしょうか？

engChrName: October 6th, 10:00PM
engSearchText: October 6th, 10:00PM

engChrName: Damn it! I didn't expect the authorities to crack down on the orbal hookahs!
engSearchText:
Damn it! I didn't expect the authorities to crack down
on the orbal hookahs!
jpnChrName: くっ、まさか導力シーシャが いきなり取り締まられるとは……
jpnSearchText:
くっ、まさか導力シーシャが
いきなり取り締まられるとは……

engChrName: This is the end, isn't it...? No, no, no! Not yet! They can't have found any evidence that points to me yet!
engSearchText:
This is the end, isn't it...? No, no, no! Not yet!
They can't have found any evidence that points to
me yet!
jpnChrName: このままでは私は……い、いや、 まだ決定的な証拠は出ていないハズ！
jpnSearchText:
このままでは私は……い、いや、
まだ決定的な証拠は出ていないハズ！

engChrName: In which case, maybe I should pull some strings with the police to keep those people away... No, that won't work!
engSearchText:
In which case, maybe I should pull some strings with
the police to keep those people away... No, that
won't work!
jpnChrName: こうなったらいっそ警察あたりを誘導して “連中”を遠ざけ──いや駄目だっ！！
jpnSearchText:
こうなったらいっそ警察あたりを誘導して
“連中”を遠ざけ──いや駄目だっ！！

engChrName: Damn it, damn iiit! Where did I go wrong?! I... How did I end up like this?!
engSearchText:
Damn it, damn iiit! Where did I go wrong?!
I... How did I end up like this?!
jpnChrName: ええい、どうして私がこんな目に……！
jpnSearchText: ええい、どうして私がこんな目に……！

engChrName: No, no! Enough moping! I just need to focus on getting through the film festival.
engSearchText:
No, no! Enough moping! I just need to focus on
getting through the film festival.
jpnChrName: と、と、とにかく映画祭だけは なんとしても乗り切らなくては……
jpnSearchText:
と、と、とにかく映画祭だけは
なんとしても乗り切らなくては……

engChrName: Once I manage that, I can call in a favor with the ruling party and—
engSearchText:
Once I manage that, I can call in a favor with the
ruling party and—
jpnChrName: その後は与党議員を何とか動かして──
jpnSearchText: その後は与党議員を何とか動かして──

engChrName: What is it? Don't you know how late it is?!
engSearchText: What is it? Don't you know how late it is?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだこんな時に。
jpnSearchText: な、なんだこんな時に。

engChrName: E-Excuse me, sir! I'm with security! You have a visitor waiting for you.
engSearchText:
E-Excuse me, sir! I'm with security! You have a
visitor waiting for you.
jpnChrName: こ、こちら警備室……！ 社長にお客様が見えております！
jpnSearchText:
こ、こちら警備室……！
社長にお客様が見えております！

engChrName: A visitor? Who could possibly want to see me at this hour?!
engSearchText:
A visitor? Who could possibly want to see me at
this hour?!
jpnChrName: 客……？ こんな夜中にどこのどいつだ！？
jpnSearchText:
客……？
こんな夜中にどこのどいつだ！？

engChrName: Well, you see...
engSearchText: Well, you see...
jpnChrName: ええ、それが……
jpnSearchText: ええ、それが……

engChrName: They say they're with the Calvardian federal police. They want to speak with you directly.
engSearchText:
They say they're with the Calvardian federal police.
They want to speak with you directly.
jpnChrName: 共和国連邦警察だとかで 社長と今すぐ面会をしたいと──！
jpnSearchText:
共和国連邦警察だとかで
社長と今すぐ面会をしたいと──！

engChrName: What?!
engSearchText: What?!
jpnChrName: なあっ……！？
jpnSearchText: なあっ……！？

engChrName: I-Impossible! They're already on to me?!
engSearchText: I-Impossible! They're already on to me?!
jpnChrName: バ、バ、馬鹿な── もう嗅ぎつけたのか……！？
jpnSearchText:
バ、バ、馬鹿な──
もう嗅ぎつけたのか……！？

engChrName: What's wrong, sir? Should I let them through?
engSearchText: What's wrong, sir? Should I let them through?
jpnChrName: どうしました、社長！？ お通ししてもよろしいのでしょうか！？
jpnSearchText:
どうしました、社長！？
お通ししてもよろしいのでしょうか！？

engChrName: No, do NOT! E-Especially if they don't have a warrant!
engSearchText:
No, do NOT! E-Especially if they don't have
a warrant!
jpnChrName: ダメだ──い、い、いやいや、 まだ令状は持っていないのだろう！？
jpnSearchText:
ダメだ──い、い、いやいや、
まだ令状は持っていないのだろう！？

engChrName: J-J-Just...buy me some time! I don't care what you do!
engSearchText:
J-J-Just...buy me some time! I don't care what
you do!
jpnChrName: とにかく時間を稼げ……！！
jpnSearchText: とにかく時間を稼げ……！！

engChrName: DamnitdamnitDAMNIT! They leave me no choice...!
engSearchText: DamnitdamnitDAMNIT! They leave me no choice...!
jpnChrName: クソッ、こ、こうなったら……！！
jpnSearchText: クソッ、こ、こうなったら……！！

engChrName: October 6th, 11:50PM
engSearchText: October 6th, 11:50PM

engChrName: ...So we meet again.
engSearchText: ...So we meet again.
jpnChrName: ……また、お前たちか。
jpnSearchText: ……また、お前たちか。

engChrName: You're not the only one excited to cross paths again so soon after that hookah business.
engSearchText:
You're not the only one excited to cross paths again
so soon after that hookah business.
jpnChrName: って、導力シーシャの件で 顔を合わせてたじゃねぇか。
jpnSearchText:
って、導力シーシャの件で
顔を合わせてたじゃねぇか。

engChrName: Hello, detectives. It's good to see you.
engSearchText: Hello, detectives. It's good to see you.
jpnChrName: その、ネイトさんもお疲れ様です。
jpnSearchText: その、ネイトさんもお疲れ様です。

engChrName: Augh... Can you believe it, Agnès? I was supposed to finally get a nice, quiet night off, until this guy here—
engSearchText:
Augh... Can you believe it, Agnès? I was supposed to
finally get a nice, quiet night off, until this guy here—
jpnChrName: 聞いてくれよ～アニエスちゃん、 折角のオフだったのに警部ときたら──
jpnSearchText:
聞いてくれよ～アニエスちゃん、
折角のオフだったのに警部ときたら──

engChrName: Stow that moaning!
engSearchText: Stow that moaning!
jpnChrName: ええい、お前は黙っていろ！
jpnSearchText: ええい、お前は黙っていろ！

engChrName: The drug situation and the gravity of it was one matter, but this is entirely different.
engSearchText:
The drug situation and the gravity of it was one
matter, but this is entirely different.
jpnChrName: 違法薬物の深刻さは承知しているが これはこれ、それはそれだ。
jpnSearchText:
違法薬物の深刻さは承知しているが
これはこれ、それはそれだ。

engChrName: You can't go trespassing and conducting searches without a warrant. What's the big idea? And why is a bracer involved?
engSearchText:
You can't go trespassing and conducting searches
without a warrant. What's the big idea? And why is a
bracer involved?
jpnChrName: 不法侵入に令状なしの違法捜査…… ギルドまで同行して、どういうつもりだ？
jpnSearchText:
不法侵入に令状なしの違法捜査……
ギルドまで同行して、どういうつもりだ？

engChrName: 'A bracer' is involved because regulations dictate that rescuing a citizen in distress takes priority over other concerns.
engSearchText:
'A bracer' is involved because regulations dictate that
rescuing a citizen in distress takes priority over
other concerns.
jpnChrName: 規約に則って民間人の救出を 優先させてもらっただけ。
jpnSearchText:
規約に則って民間人の救出を
優先させてもらっただけ。

engChrName: I have permission from our headquarters. I haven't broken any international treaties...technically.
engSearchText:
I have permission from our headquarters. I haven't
broken any international treaties...technically.
jpnChrName: 一応、総本部の許可はもらってるし 国際条約にも違反してない──ギリだけど。
jpnSearchText:
一応、総本部の許可はもらってるし
国際条約にも違反してない──ギリだけど。

engChrName: And these people aren't vigilantes. Think of them as...assistants, who have been retained to help the guild with its mission.
engSearchText:
And these people aren't vigilantes. Think of them
as...assistants, who have been retained to help the
guild with its mission.
jpnChrName: 彼らも“ギルドの協力者”として 今回は主張する流れになるかな？
jpnSearchText:
彼らも“ギルドの協力者”として
今回は主張する流れになるかな？

engChrName: Hmph.
engSearchText: Hmph.
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: (Wow. She came prepared to talk to the police and everything.)
engSearchText:
(Wow. She came prepared to talk to the police
and everything.)
jpnChrName: （……そこまで段取って   来てくれたんですね……）
jpnSearchText:
（……そこまで段取って
来てくれたんですね……）

engChrName: (Smoooooth, throwing the law right back at them like that. I'm impressed.)
engSearchText:
(Smoooooth, throwing the law right back at them
like that. I'm impressed.)
jpnChrName: （ハッ、搦め手も行けるとは   やるじゃねーか。）
jpnSearchText:
（ハッ、搦め手も行けるとは
やるじゃねーか。）

engChrName: (Same! Not that I'd expect anything less at this point.)
engSearchText:
(Same! Not that I'd expect anything less at
this point.)
jpnChrName: （はい……さすがです。）
jpnSearchText: （はい……さすがです。）

engChrName: You must be the guild's 'hot new ace.' You're a real pain in my neck, you know that?
engSearchText:
You must be the guild's 'hot new ace.' You're a real
pain in my neck, you know that?
jpnChrName: ……ギルドの新たな若手エース、か。 まったく厄介極まりない。
jpnSearchText:
……ギルドの新たな若手エース、か。
まったく厄介極まりない。

engChrName: Our business isn't over. I expect you to come with me to check the crime site later.
engSearchText:
Our business isn't over. I expect you to come with me
to check the crime site later.
jpnChrName: とにかく、お前さんにはあとで 現場検証に付き合ってもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、お前さんにはあとで
現場検証に付き合ってもらうぞ。

engChrName: And as for you, Arkride, you'd better be prepared for another interview in your future! Understand?
engSearchText:
And as for you, Arkride, you'd better be prepared for
another interview in your future! Understand?
jpnChrName: アークライドも……後日改めて 事情聴取に呼ぶからそのつもりでいろ！
jpnSearchText:
アークライドも……後日改めて
事情聴取に呼ぶからそのつもりでいろ！

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, loud and clear. I'll keep my schedule open.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah, loud and clear. I'll keep my
schedule open.
jpnChrName: へいへい、ご苦労さん。
jpnSearchText: へいへい、ご苦労さん。

engChrName: Talk to you later, Inspector.
engSearchText: Talk to you later, Inspector.
jpnChrName: それじゃ。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ。

engChrName: SAARAAAAAAA!
engSearchText: SAARAAAAAAA!
jpnChrName: ──お姉ええええっ！！！
jpnSearchText: ──お姉ええええっ！！！

engChrName: Shaheena...
engSearchText: Shaheena...
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ……
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナ……

engChrName: I'm so sorry. You must've been worried sick...
engSearchText: I'm so sorry. You must've been worried sick...
jpnChrName: ……ごめんなさい、心配かけて……
jpnSearchText: ……ごめんなさい、心配かけて……

engChrName: *sniffle* It's n-not your fault, you dummy! But... But...!
engSearchText:
*sniffle* It's n-not your fault, you dummy! But...
But...!
jpnChrName: グスッ、お姉のせいじゃないよぉ……！
jpnSearchText: グスッ、お姉のせいじゃないよぉ……！

engChrName: But you don't have to do everything by yourself! I'm gonna help out, too, from now on!
engSearchText:
But you don't have to do everything by yourself!
I'm gonna help out, too, from now on!
jpnChrName: もう、そんな風に一人で 背負わせたりしないんだからね……！
jpnSearchText:
もう、そんな風に一人で
背負わせたりしないんだからね……！

engChrName: ...Thank you, Shaheena. I heard how hard you've been working for me.
engSearchText:
...Thank you, Shaheena. I heard how hard you've
been working for me.
jpnChrName: ……聞いたわ、私の代わりに 頑張ってくれているって……
jpnSearchText:
……聞いたわ、私の代わりに
頑張ってくれているって……

engChrName: You've really grown up, haven't you?
engSearchText: You've really grown up, haven't you?
jpnChrName: 大きくなったわね、シャヒーナ……
jpnSearchText: 大きくなったわね、シャヒーナ……

engChrName: ...*sob* Saaraaa!
engSearchText: ...*sob* Saaraaa!
jpnChrName: ……サァラ姉ぇぇ……！
jpnSearchText: ……サァラ姉ぇぇ……！

engChrName: D'aww.
engSearchText: D'aww.
jpnChrName: フフ……
jpnSearchText: フフ……

engChrName: It's so good to see them together again.
engSearchText: It's so good to see them together again.
jpnChrName: ……良かったですね。
jpnSearchText: ……良かったですね。

engChrName: *sniffle* You're telling me!
engSearchText: *sniffle* You're telling me!
jpnChrName: えぐえぐっ、本当に……！！
jpnSearchText: えぐえぐっ、本当に……！！

engChrName: Nice work back there, darlings. That can't have been easy.
engSearchText:
Nice work back there, darlings. That can't have
been easy.
jpnChrName: フフ、ヴァンちゃんたちもお疲れ様。
jpnSearchText: フフ、ヴァンちゃんたちもお疲れ様。

engChrName: This job ain't over yet, though.
engSearchText: This job ain't over yet, though.
jpnChrName: ……まだ“終わった”とは 言えなそうだがな。
jpnSearchText:
……まだ“終わった”とは
言えなそうだがな。

engChrName: Unfortunately.
engSearchText: Unfortunately.
jpnChrName: ああ……
jpnSearchText: ああ……

engChrName: I...can't believe Gaspard was running around with gangsters...
engSearchText:
I...can't believe Gaspard was running around
with gangsters...
jpnChrName: ……まさかギャスパーが マフィアと繋がってたとはのう……
jpnSearchText:
……まさかギャスパーが
マフィアと繋がってたとはのう……

engChrName: And then to get—get killed off like that, after being led around and used by them...it's insane!
engSearchText:
And then to get—get killed off like that, after being
led around and used by them...it's insane!
jpnChrName: しかもさんざん利用された挙句 口封じにあうなど……バカモンが。
jpnSearchText:
しかもさんざん利用された挙句
口封じにあうなど……バカモンが。

engChrName: We're lucky the file with the evidence was left intact. That's our one silver lining in all of this.
engSearchText:
We're lucky the file with the evidence was left intact.
That's our one silver lining in all of this.
jpnChrName: ……証拠品のファイルが残っていたのが せめてもの救いでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
……証拠品のファイルが残っていたのが
せめてもの救いでしょうか。

engChrName: I just can't stop thinking about that message that was left at the murder scene...
engSearchText:
I just can't stop thinking about that message that was
left at the murder scene...
jpnChrName: はい……ですが、現場に残された あのメッセージを考えると……
jpnSearchText:
はい……ですが、現場に残された
あのメッセージを考えると……

engChrName: Our 'friend' from Langport strikes again. Son of a bitch, making a big scene out of something that awful.
engSearchText:
Our 'friend' from Langport strikes again. Son of a
bitch, making a big scene out of something that awful.
jpnChrName: 煌都にも現れた野郎か。 これ見よがしに残しやがって……
jpnSearchText:
煌都にも現れた野郎か。
これ見よがしに残しやがって……

engChrName: He can't get away with this.
engSearchText: He can't get away with this.
jpnChrName: ……許せません、絶対に。
jpnSearchText: ……許せません、絶対に。

engChrName: I'm just as worried about him as the rest of you, but there's still somethin' else we've got to figure out.
engSearchText:
I'm just as worried about him as the rest of you, but
there's still somethin' else we've got to figure out.
jpnChrName: ……そっちはそっちで捨て置けねぇが、 もう一つの問題も残っているな。
jpnSearchText:
……そっちはそっちで捨て置けねぇが、
もう一つの問題も残っているな。

engChrName: Saara might be back safe and sound with her sister, and the threatening notes won't be a concern any longer.
engSearchText:
Saara might be back safe and sound with her sister,
and the threatening notes won't be a concern
any longer.
jpnChrName: 依頼人は無事に取り戻したし、 脅迫状の件も一応カタがついた形だが。
jpnSearchText:
依頼人は無事に取り戻したし、
脅迫状の件も一応カタがついた形だが。

engChrName: But now the question is, what the hell's gonna happen with the film festival?
engSearchText:
But now the question is, what the hell's gonna
happen with the film festival?
jpnChrName: 実際、明日の映画祭はどうなるんだ？
jpnSearchText: 実際、明日の映画祭はどうなるんだ？

engChrName: That...is a good question.
engSearchText: That...is a good question.

engChrName: Yeah. We're talking about a murder case tied to drugs—one where the culprit with ties to organized crime is still at large.
engSearchText:
Yeah. We're talking about a murder case tied to
drugs—one where the culprit with ties to organized
crime is still at large.
jpnChrName: 違法薬物絡みの殺人事件…… その上犯人のマフィアも捕まっていない。
jpnSearchText:
違法薬物絡みの殺人事件……
その上犯人のマフィアも捕まっていない。

engChrName: As much as I hate to admit it...honestly, I don't know if I see a way forward.
engSearchText:
As much as I hate to admit it...honestly, I don't know
if I see a way forward.
jpnChrName: 悔しいけど……正直、厳しいでしょうね。
jpnSearchText: 悔しいけど……正直、厳しいでしょうね。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...
jpnChrName: むうううっ……
jpnSearchText: むうううっ……

engChrName: No way! We just rescued Saara! She deserves a happy, dance-y ending!
engSearchText:
No way! We just rescued Saara! She deserves a happy,
dance-y ending!
jpnChrName: そんな……！　せっかく サァラさんも戻ってきたのに。
jpnSearchText:
そんな……！　せっかく
サァラさんも戻ってきたのに。

engChrName: Sure, but I can only imagine how exhausted she is after all that. Sure as hell doubt she's got it in her to dance at the parade.
engSearchText:
Sure, but I can only imagine how exhausted she is
after all that. Sure as hell doubt she's got it in her to
dance at the parade.
jpnChrName: そこまで消耗してたら どっちみちパレードは無理だろ。
jpnSearchText:
そこまで消耗してたら
どっちみちパレードは無理だろ。

engChrName: Then does that mean the event here will end up just like Messeldam's festival?
engSearchText:
Then does that mean the event here will end up just
like Messeldam's festival?
jpnChrName: 結局、メッセルダムと同じ結末に なってしまうんでしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
結局、メッセルダムと同じ結末に
なってしまうんでしょうか……

engChrName: Well, about that...
engSearchText: Well, about that...
jpnChrName: ああ、それについてだが……
jpnSearchText: ああ、それについてだが……

engChrName: It certainly shall not. Not on my watch.
engSearchText: It certainly shall not. Not on my watch.
jpnChrName: ──同じにはさせないさ。
jpnSearchText: ──同じにはさせないさ。

engChrName: Your Highness! I didn't realize you were here!
engSearchText: Your Highness! I didn't realize you were here!
jpnChrName: おおっ、シェリド殿下！？
jpnSearchText: おおっ、シェリド殿下！？

engChrName: What do you mean?
engSearchText: What do you mean?
jpnChrName: そいつはどういう……？
jpnSearchText: そいつはどういう……？

engChrName: I mean exactly what I said. Everything will go on tomorrow as planned.
engSearchText:
I mean exactly what I said. Everything will go on
tomorrow as planned.
jpnChrName: そのままの意味だ── 明日は予定通り決行する。
jpnSearchText:
そのままの意味だ──
明日は予定通り決行する。

engChrName: That goes for both the film festival itself as well as the Carnal Cavalcade.
engSearchText:
That goes for both the film festival itself as well as the
Carnal Cavalcade.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の式典も、 勿論フォクシーパレードもね。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の式典も、
勿論フォクシーパレードもね。

engChrName: For real?
engSearchText: For real?
jpnChrName: マジかよ……！？
jpnSearchText: マジかよ……！？

engChrName: Are you sure it's a good idea to keep going?
engSearchText: Are you sure it's a good idea to keep going?
jpnChrName: で、ですが……大丈夫なんですか？
jpnSearchText: で、ですが……大丈夫なんですか？

engChrName: Yes. I met with the other sponsors earlier to discuss it.
engSearchText: Yes. I met with the other sponsors earlier to discuss it.
jpnChrName: 主催者の一人として 他のスポンサー方面とも協議済みだ。
jpnSearchText:
主催者の一人として
他のスポンサー方面とも協議済みだ。

engChrName: In light of the circumstances, and the money spent promoting the festival, we all agree we'd rather avoid a last-minute delay or cancellation.
engSearchText:
In light of the circumstances, and the money spent
promoting the festival, we all agree we'd rather avoid
a last-minute delay or cancellation.
jpnChrName: 今日までの宣伝費や諸々の事情も考えると 中止や延期を避けたいのはどこも同じ……
jpnSearchText:
今日までの宣伝費や諸々の事情も考えると
中止や延期を避けたいのはどこも同じ……

engChrName: As for President Dillon's death and criminal case, we already have measures in place to delay those public announcements.
engSearchText:
As for President Dillon's death and criminal case, we
already have measures in place to delay those
public announcements.
jpnChrName: ギャスパー社長の変死と関連事件については、 発表を遅らせる段取りもすでにつけている。
jpnSearchText:
ギャスパー社長の変死と関連事件については、
発表を遅らせる段取りもすでにつけている。

engChrName: What he said. With His Highness' help, I've contacted every news organization to coordinate things.
engSearchText:
What he said. With His Highness' help, I've
contacted every news organization to
coordinate things.
jpnChrName: ……殿下の協力もあって、 各報道機関への根回しも済んでいてな。
jpnSearchText:
……殿下の協力もあって、
各報道機関への根回しも済んでいてな。

engChrName: Wh-When the heck did you do that?!
engSearchText: Wh-When the heck did you do that?!
jpnChrName: い、いつの間に……
jpnSearchText: い、いつの間に……

engChrName: Heh. So you're tellin' me business interests prevailed on this one.
engSearchText:
Heh. So you're tellin' me business interests prevailed
on this one.
jpnChrName: やれやれ…… 要は大人の事情ってヤツですか。
jpnSearchText:
やれやれ……
要は大人の事情ってヤツですか。

engChrName: Well, if you wish to be blunt about it, yes.
engSearchText: Well, if you wish to be blunt about it, yes.
jpnChrName: まあ、ありていに言ってしまえばね。
jpnSearchText: まあ、ありていに言ってしまえばね。

engChrName: I'm resigned to being at the mercy of such politicking these days thanks to my position, as much as it pains me to admit.
engSearchText:
I'm resigned to being at the mercy of such
politicking these days thanks to my position, as much
as it pains me to admit.
jpnChrName: しがらみに囚われっぱなしのこの身を 恨めしく思う今日この頃さ。
jpnSearchText:
しがらみに囚われっぱなしのこの身を
恨めしく思う今日この頃さ。

engChrName: Sure, but I imagine it's not all business. There's a certain someone the prince adores who's worked hard the last two years, too.
engSearchText:
Sure, but I imagine it's not all business. There's a
certain someone the prince adores who's worked hard
the last two years, too.
jpnChrName: ま、殿下が尊敬してるヒトも ここ２年は忙しいみたいだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、殿下が尊敬してるヒトも
ここ２年は忙しいみたいだけどね。

engChrName: Indeed. And just like him, if I'm going to put on this festival, I want to do it right and make it one worth remembering.
engSearchText:
Indeed. And just like him, if I'm going to put on this
festival, I want to do it right and make it one
worth remembering.
jpnChrName: だからこそ──やる以上は とことんやり切りたいのさ、彼のように。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ──やる以上は
とことんやり切りたいのさ、彼のように。

engChrName: Certainly the rest of you agree, yes?
engSearchText: Certainly the rest of you agree, yes?
jpnChrName: それは、ここにいる皆も同じだろう？
jpnSearchText: それは、ここにいる皆も同じだろう？

engChrName: ...Yes. That's why we hired Van and his assistants to help us in the first place.
engSearchText:
...Yes. That's why we hired Van and his assistants to
help us in the first place.
jpnChrName: ……はい、だからこそ 皆さんに依頼したわけですし。
jpnSearchText:
……はい、だからこそ
皆さんに依頼したわけですし。

engChrName: Right. We've been preparing for this thing for all these months, and now it's almost here. We've got to see it through.
engSearchText:
Right. We've been preparing for this thing for all
these months, and now it's almost here. We've got to
see it through.
jpnChrName: 何ヶ月も前から準備して いよいよ明日って所だものね。
jpnSearchText:
何ヶ月も前から準備して
いよいよ明日って所だものね。

engChrName: Precisely! I can't shelve my precious parade now! Not when it's so close to coming together!
engSearchText:
Precisely! I can't shelve my precious parade now!
Not when it's so close to coming together!
jpnChrName: ようやくパレードも目途が立ったのに 今更お蔵入りなどありえんじゃろう！
jpnSearchText:
ようやくパレードも目途が立ったのに
今更お蔵入りなどありえんじゃろう！

engChrName: Hmm... I can't imagine the police or guild will be very happy to hear this news.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I can't imagine the police or guild will be
very happy to hear this news.
jpnChrName: うーん……警察もギルドもさすがに イイ顔はしなさそうだけどねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うーん……警察もギルドもさすがに
イイ顔はしなさそうだけどねぇ。

engChrName: Yeah. I'm honestly still really skeptical about moving forward with this.
engSearchText:
Yeah. I'm honestly still really skeptical about moving
forward with this.
jpnChrName: ん、あんまりお勧めはしないかな。
jpnSearchText: ん、あんまりお勧めはしないかな。

engChrName: Especially not while Dillon's killer is still on the loose and while we're clueless about where that puppetmaster of ours is lurking.
engSearchText:
Especially not while Dillon's killer is still on the loose
and while we're clueless about where that
puppetmaster of ours is lurking.
jpnChrName: 社長殺害の実行犯は逃亡中、 “人形使い”の行方も分からないし。
jpnSearchText:
社長殺害の実行犯は逃亡中、
“人形使い”の行方も分からないし。

engChrName: But...perhaps if we could task someone with keeping a close eye on what's happening on the shady side, I could be convinced to recommend otherwise.
engSearchText:
But...perhaps if we could task someone with keeping
a close eye on what's happening on the shady side, I
could be convinced to recommend otherwise.
jpnChrName: ──“裏”に目を光らせる役割を 任せられる“誰か”がいれば別だけど。
jpnSearchText:
──“裏”に目を光らせる役割を
任せられる“誰か”がいれば別だけど。

engChrName: Now I get it. So that's why His Highness is here.
engSearchText: Now I get it. So that's why His Highness is here.
jpnChrName: ……なるほどね。 殿下が来たのはそういうことですか。
jpnSearchText:
……なるほどね。
殿下が来たのはそういうことですか。

engChrName: That it is. I have an additional task for you all.
engSearchText: That it is. I have an additional task for you all.
jpnChrName: ああ──君たちに追加の依頼をしたい。
jpnSearchText: ああ──君たちに追加の依頼をしたい。

engChrName: It's simple: I'd like you to continue to keep watch over Tharbad until the end of the festival.
engSearchText:
It's simple: I'd like you to continue to keep watch over
Tharbad until the end of the festival.
jpnChrName: できれば映画祭が終わるまでは この地に残って警戒を続けて欲しいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
できれば映画祭が終わるまでは
この地に残って警戒を続けて欲しいんだ。

engChrName: Oh, umm, well...
engSearchText: Oh, umm, well...

engChrName: Of course, we intend to be fully prepared for anything as well.
engSearchText:
Of course, we intend to be fully prepared for anything
as well.
jpnChrName: 当然、我々も備えますが……
jpnSearchText: 当然、我々も備えますが……

engChrName: However, since you've all proven yourselves with this Vegas Films business, I think you're more than up to the task of pitching in.
engSearchText:
However, since you've all proven yourselves with this
Vegas Films business, I think you're more than up to
the task of pitching in.
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルムの疑惑を暴いた 貴方がたならばまさに適任でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルムの疑惑を暴いた
貴方がたならばまさに適任でしょう。

engChrName: Heh. Sure took you long enough to take a liking to us.
engSearchText:
Heh. Sure took you long enough to take a liking
to us.
jpnChrName: ハッ、そりゃまた買われたモンだな。 手の平返しは気に食わねえが。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、そりゃまた買われたモンだな。
手の平返しは気に食わねえが。

engChrName: I'm certain it can be attributed to all the hard work you and the rest of the company have put in these past two days.
engSearchText:
I'm certain it can be attributed to all the hard work
you and the rest of the company have put in these
past two days.
jpnChrName: ふふ、皆様の２日間の働きに対する 正当な“評価”でしょう。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、皆様の２日間の働きに対する
正当な“評価”でしょう。

engChrName: I'll compensate you well for your effort, have no fear. Consider it an apology for our transgression this afternoon.
engSearchText:
I'll compensate you well for your effort, have no fear.
Consider it an apology for our transgression
this afternoon.
jpnChrName: ちなみに昼間のお詫びもかねて 報酬は弾むつもりさ。
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに昼間のお詫びもかねて
報酬は弾むつもりさ。

engChrName: I won't ask you to go to too much trouble. You can still focus on enjoying the festival and parade, if you please. What do you say?
engSearchText:
I won't ask you to go to too much trouble. You can
still focus on enjoying the festival and parade, if
you please. What do you say?
jpnChrName: 映画祭とパレードを楽しみながらでも 構わない──どうかな？
jpnSearchText:
映画祭とパレードを楽しみながらでも
構わない──どうかな？

engChrName: Do it for me, too, you guys! Please!
engSearchText: Do it for me, too, you guys! Please!
jpnChrName: あたしからも、どうかお願い……！
jpnSearchText: あたしからも、どうかお願い……！

engChrName: I'm confident my sister will feel all better by tomorrow.
engSearchText:
I'm confident my sister will feel all better
by tomorrow.
jpnChrName: お姉は明日までにきっと回復する──
jpnSearchText: お姉は明日までにきっと回復する──

engChrName: Even if she doesn't, I'll be ready to take her place anytime!
engSearchText:
Even if she doesn't, I'll be ready to take her
place anytime!
jpnChrName: ううん、もしできなかったとしても あたしが代わりを務める！
jpnSearchText:
ううん、もしできなかったとしても
あたしが代わりを務める！

engChrName: I want to put my training to use! I want to show everyone the dance we came up with that's as neat as Saara's!
engSearchText:
I want to put my training to use! I want to show
everyone the dance we came up with that's as neat
as Saara's!
jpnChrName: お姉を想って、お姉に届くために仕上げた あたしの踊りを見てもらうためにも……！
jpnSearchText:
お姉を想って、お姉に届くために仕上げた
あたしの踊りを見てもらうためにも……！

engChrName: Shaheena...
engSearchText: Shaheena...
jpnChrName: シャヒーナ……
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナ……

engChrName: Well, I know this might be really selfish of me to ask after everything you've done to help us both, but...
engSearchText:
Well, I know this might be really selfish of me to ask
after everything you've done to help us both, but...
jpnChrName: ……姉妹揃って助けていただいた身、 この上は図々しいかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
……姉妹揃って助けていただいた身、
この上は図々しいかもしれませんが……

engChrName: I want you all there for us, too. Please, Van, Agnès, everyone...can you do it?
engSearchText:
I want you all there for us, too. Please, Van, Agnès,
everyone...can you do it?
jpnChrName: 私からもお願いします。 ヴァンさん、アニエスさんたちも……
jpnSearchText:
私からもお願いします。
ヴァンさん、アニエスさんたちも……

engChrName: Well, damn. I was hopin' to do a little sightseeing before we made our way home, too.
engSearchText:
Well, damn. I was hopin' to do a little sightseeing
before we made our way home, too.
jpnChrName: ったく…… 明日は適当に観光でもして帰りたかったが。
jpnSearchText:
ったく……
明日は適当に観光でもして帰りたかったが。

engChrName: But at this point, in for a curim, in for a torim. If you're gonna sweeten the deal that much, far be it from me to say no.
engSearchText:
But at this point, in for a curim, in for a torim.
If you're gonna sweeten the deal that much, far be it
from me to say no.
jpnChrName: 追加報酬もたんまり出るってんなら、 これも乗りかかった船ってヤツかもな。
jpnSearchText:
追加報酬もたんまり出るってんなら、
これも乗りかかった船ってヤツかもな。

engChrName: We've come this far to make sure everything goes without a hitch. We may as well see it through to the end.
engSearchText:
We've come this far to make sure everything goes
without a hitch. We may as well see it through to
the end.
jpnChrName: ふふ……元々映画祭が 無事開催できるよう頑張ってましたし。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ……元々映画祭が
無事開催できるよう頑張ってましたし。

engChrName: It's not like we have to do much different, either.
engSearchText: It's not like we have to do much different, either.
jpnChrName: はい、やることは同じですっ。
jpnSearchText: はい、やることは同じですっ。

engChrName: Buncha overachievers. I guess I'll play along if the rest of you care that much.
engSearchText:
Buncha overachievers. I guess I'll play along if the rest
of you care that much.
jpnChrName: ハッ…… しゃあねぇ、精々付き合ってやるか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……
しゃあねぇ、精々付き合ってやるか。

engChrName: Then we've got a deal! We'll make this thing as glitzy as can be so we can send old Gaspard off in style!
engSearchText:
Then we've got a deal! We'll make this thing as glitzy
as can be so we can send old Gaspard off in style!
jpnChrName: よぉし──そうと決まれば明日は ギャスパーの弔い代わりに派手にいくとしよう！
jpnSearchText:
よぉし──そうと決まれば明日は
ギャスパーの弔い代わりに派手にいくとしよう！

engChrName: Hey, I know! What if we have ALL of the performers decked out as street dancers like Saara and Shaheena? That could pack a real punch!
engSearchText:
Hey, I know! What if we have ALL of the
performers decked out as street dancers like Saara
and Shaheena? That could pack a real punch!
jpnChrName: いっそ出場者全員、サァラちゃんたちと同じ 踊り子衣装で統一するのもありかもしれんなっ！
jpnSearchText:
いっそ出場者全員、サァラちゃんたちと同じ
踊り子衣装で統一するのもありかもしれんなっ！

engChrName: Oooh! You know, that just might work!
engSearchText: Oooh! You know, that just might work!
jpnChrName: ああ……！ それもいいかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ああ……！
それもいいかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Nina, don't! You sure have a way of following him off the deep end sometimes.
engSearchText:
Nina, don't! You sure have a way of following him off
the deep end sometimes.
jpnChrName: ちょっとニナ！？ アンタたまにとんでもないことを──
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとニナ！？
アンタたまにとんでもないことを──

engChrName: Anyway, will 'that' be ready in time?
engSearchText: Anyway, will 'that' be ready in time?
jpnChrName: （で……アレは間に合いそうか？）
jpnSearchText: （で……アレは間に合いそうか？）

engChrName: Of course. I'll see to it that it is. We can never be too prepared.
engSearchText:
Of course. I'll see to it that it is. We can never be
too prepared.
jpnChrName: （ふふ、何とかしてみます。   万が一に備える意味でも──）
jpnSearchText:
（ふふ、何とかしてみます。
万が一に備える意味でも──）

engChrName: October 7th, 1208, 10:00AM
engSearchText: October 7th, 1208, 10:00AM

engChrName: ...It's fair to say that I truly love films.
engSearchText: ...It's fair to say that I truly love films.
jpnChrName: ──皆さん、私は映画が大好きです。
jpnSearchText: ──皆さん、私は映画が大好きです。

engChrName: In the twenty years since they first emerged in Calvard, they've become a true art form—one that will continue to spread throughout Zemuria.
engSearchText:
In the twenty years since they first emerged in
Calvard, they've become a true art form—one that
will continue to spread throughout Zemuria.
jpnChrName: ２０年前にカルバードで花開いた 今後も各地へ広まるであろう総合芸術──
jpnSearchText:
２０年前にカルバードで花開いた
今後も各地へ広まるであろう総合芸術──

engChrName: The world of the silver screen is enthralling and ever-evolving, capturing the hearts of audiences with its thrilling brand of drama.
engSearchText:
The world of the silver screen is enthralling and
ever-evolving, capturing the hearts of audiences with
its thrilling brand of drama.
jpnChrName: 魅惑的な銀幕の世界が、胸躍るドラマが 皆の心を掴んで離さず、進化を遂げてきました。
jpnSearchText:
魅惑的な銀幕の世界が、胸躍るドラマが
皆の心を掴んで離さず、進化を遂げてきました。

engChrName: The fact so many of you have flocked to this desert city to celebrate them speaks volumes about the power of film.
engSearchText:
The fact so many of you have flocked to this desert
city to celebrate them speaks volumes about the
power of film.
jpnChrName: この砂漠の只中にある街に これだけの人を集めてしまうほどに。
jpnSearchText:
この砂漠の只中にある街に
これだけの人を集めてしまうほどに。

engChrName: I would, of course, be remiss not to acknowledge the cancellation of the Messeldam Film Festival two months ago. A most tragic event.
engSearchText:
I would, of course, be remiss not to acknowledge the
cancellation of the Messeldam Film Festival two
months ago. A most tragic event.
jpnChrName: ……その意味で２ヶ月前の メッセルダム映画祭の開催中止は残念でした。
jpnSearchText:
……その意味で２ヶ月前の
メッセルダム映画祭の開催中止は残念でした。

engChrName: Its loss, however, shall not diminish our shared love for this burgeoning medium, even if our passion for it takes various shapes.
engSearchText:
Its loss, however, shall not diminish our shared love
for this burgeoning medium, even if our passion for it
takes various shapes.
jpnChrName: ですが“色合い”は違うにしても、 映画を愛する全ての人々の想いは同じ……
jpnSearchText:
ですが“色合い”は違うにしても、
映画を愛する全ての人々の想いは同じ……

engChrName: Above all else, may this festival serve as an expression of that innate richness and diversity.
engSearchText:
Above all else, may this festival serve as an expression
of that innate richness and diversity.
jpnChrName: ──それを確かに示すことが 此度の映画祭の役目でもありましょう。
jpnSearchText:
──それを確かに示すことが
此度の映画祭の役目でもありましょう。

engChrName: As prince of Elsaim, I, Sherid Asval, am pleased to announce the commencement of the first Tharbad Film Festival!
engSearchText:
As prince of Elsaim, I, Sherid Asval, am pleased to
announce the commencement of the first Tharbad
Film Festival!
jpnChrName: シェリド・アスヴァールの名において── 第一回《サルバッド映画祭》の開催を宣言します！
jpnSearchText:
シェリド・アスヴァールの名において──
第一回《サルバッド映画祭》の開催を宣言します！

engChrName: At noon, we'll be awarding the Lionne d'Or, as well as putting on the Carnal Cavalcade, two events you won't want to miss!
engSearchText:
At noon, we'll be awarding the Lionne d'Or, as well
as putting on the Carnal Cavalcade, two events you
won't want to miss!
jpnChrName: 正午には“レオンドール賞”の授賞式と フォクシーパレードもあるので、ご期待あれ！
jpnSearchText:
正午には“レオンドール賞”の授賞式と
フォクシーパレードもあるので、ご期待あれ！

engChrName: But! Enough rambling from royalty. To everyone attending: may your time here be joyous! Welcome to our cinematic celebration!
engSearchText:
But! Enough rambling from royalty. To everyone
attending: may your time here be joyous! Welcome to
our cinematic celebration!
jpnChrName: 堅苦しい挨拶はこれで終わりだ── 誰も彼も心躍らせ、楽しもうじゃないか！
jpnSearchText:
堅苦しい挨拶はこれで終わりだ──
誰も彼も心躍らせ、楽しもうじゃないか！

engChrName: October 7th, 12:00PM
engSearchText: October 7th, 12:00PM

engChrName: Hello to everyone visiting Tharbad today! This is the moment you've all been waiting for!
engSearchText:
Hello to everyone visiting Tharbad today! This is the
moment you've all been waiting for!
jpnChrName: サルバッドにお集まりの皆様方、 長らくお待たせした！
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドにお集まりの皆様方、
長らくお待たせした！

engChrName: I'm happy to say that the Carnal Cavalcade is officially ready to kick off!
engSearchText:
I'm happy to say that the Carnal Cavalcade is
officially ready to kick off!
jpnChrName: 只今をもって《フォクシーパレード》の 開始準備が整ったことをお知らせする！
jpnSearchText:
只今をもって《フォクシーパレード》の
開始準備が整ったことをお知らせする！

engChrName: Nothing unusual to report. Although...
engSearchText: Nothing unusual to report. Although...
jpnChrName: 今のところは異常ありません。 で、ですが……
jpnSearchText:
今のところは異常ありません。
で、ですが……

engChrName: Whoa! Shaheena and all the others look awesome!
engSearchText: Whoa! Shaheena and all the others look awesome!
jpnChrName: すごい…… シャヒーナさんも皆さんもっ……！
jpnSearchText:
すごい……
シャヒーナさんも皆さんもっ……！

engChrName: Nothing to report at points E or F, either. This is quite the impressive procession, however.
engSearchText:
Nothing to report at points E or F, either. This is
quite the impressive procession, however.
jpnChrName: ポイントＥ、Ｆも異常ありません。 ──それにしても素晴らしいですね……
jpnSearchText:
ポイントＥ、Ｆも異常ありません。
──それにしても素晴らしいですね……

engChrName: It's straddling the line between wholesome and frisky. Should be pretty entertaining, if you ask me, heh.
engSearchText:
It's straddling the line between wholesome and frisky.
Should be pretty entertaining, if you ask me, heh.
jpnChrName: エロさと健全さのせめぎ合い…… クク、こりゃ退屈せずに済みそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
エロさと健全さのせめぎ合い……
クク、こりゃ退屈せずに済みそうだ。

engChrName: Anyway, is your little thing with Van going to be enough?
engSearchText:
Anyway, is your little thing with Van going to
be enough?
jpnChrName: ──で、ヴァンの野郎との “仕込み”は十分なのかよ？
jpnSearchText:
──で、ヴァンの野郎との
“仕込み”は十分なのかよ？

engChrName: Yes. It's only for insurance, but it should suffice for our needs if it comes to it.
engSearchText:
Yes. It's only for insurance, but it should suffice for
our needs if it comes to it.
jpnChrName: はい、ちょっとした保険程度ですが。
jpnSearchText: はい、ちょっとした保険程度ですが。

engChrName: From the look of things, I should be able to give my father a glowing report.
engSearchText:
From the look of things, I should be able to give my
father a glowing report.
jpnChrName: ……父上たちにも いい報告が出来そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
……父上たちにも
いい報告が出来そうだな。

engChrName: Naje, I think it's time we make our way over to the hotel.
engSearchText:
Naje, I think it's time we make our way over to
the hotel.
jpnChrName: ナージェ、 そろそろ会場前に行こうか。
jpnSearchText:
ナージェ、
そろそろ会場前に行こうか。

engChrName: As you wish, Your Highness.
engSearchText: As you wish, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: かしこまりました。

engChrName: It's been ten years. A whole decade since I grafted those disparate branches together.
engSearchText:
It's been ten years. A whole decade since I grafted
those disparate branches together.
jpnChrName: クク……あれから１０年。 接ぎ木した枝がどんな花を結んだか。
jpnSearchText:
クク……あれから１０年。
接ぎ木した枝がどんな花を結んだか。

engChrName: It's time to witness just what sort of fruit that garden will bear now that it has blossomed in full.
engSearchText:
It's time to witness just what sort of fruit that garden
will bear now that it has blossomed in full.
jpnChrName: “庭”の仕上がり── 存分に魅せてもらおうじゃねぇか？
jpnSearchText:
“庭”の仕上がり──
存分に魅せてもらおうじゃねぇか？

engChrName: Oh, aren't you a troublemaker? Goodness me.
engSearchText: Oh, aren't you a troublemaker? Goodness me.
jpnChrName: うふふ、難儀なヒトやねぇ。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、難儀なヒトやねぇ。

engChrName: But, I suppose as a relative of sorts, I owe it to the offspring of the heretics to watch over them and... see just how they've grown.
engSearchText:
But, I suppose as a relative of sorts, I owe it to the
offspring of the heretics to watch over them and...
see just how they've grown.
jpnChrName: 外法同士の落とし子──ウチもまぁ、 “親戚”として見守らせてもらおかな。
jpnSearchText:
外法同士の落とし子──ウチもまぁ、
“親戚”として見守らせてもらおかな。

engChrName: October 7th, 12:30PM
engSearchText: October 7th, 12:30PM

engChrName: And now, before the main award ceremony, I'd like to take this opportunity to announce the winners of the film and actor prizes.
engSearchText:
And now, before the main award ceremony, I'd like
to take this opportunity to announce the winners of
the film and actor prizes.
jpnChrName: ──それでは受賞式の前に この場で作品賞と俳優部門を発表します。
jpnSearchText:
──それでは受賞式の前に
この場で作品賞と俳優部門を発表します。

engChrName: First, the Tharbad Film Festival's first Award for Outstanding Achievement goes to...
engSearchText:
First, the Tharbad Film Festival's first Award for
Outstanding Achievement goes to...
jpnChrName: サルバッド映画祭・初代優秀賞（グランプリ）は──
jpnSearchText: サルバッド映画祭・初代優秀賞（グランプリ）は──

engChrName: Golden Blood, directed by Salvatore Gotti of Vegas Films!
engSearchText:
Golden Blood, directed by Salvatore Gotti of
Vegas Films!
jpnChrName: ベガスフィルム、サルバトーレ・ゴッチ監督作品、 『ゴールデンブラッド』！
jpnSearchText:
ベガスフィルム、サルバトーレ・ゴッチ監督作品、
『ゴールデンブラッド』！

engChrName: Next, the Tharbad Film Festival's first ever, most prestigious Lionne d'Or goes to...
engSearchText:
Next, the Tharbad Film Festival's first ever, most
prestigious Lionne d'Or goes to...
jpnChrName: そして栄えある初代、 最優秀賞（レオンドール）に輝いたのは──
jpnSearchText:
そして栄えある初代、
最優秀賞（レオンドール）に輝いたのは──

engChrName: Wolves' Requiem, directed by Leslie Lam of Kowloon Pictures!
engSearchText:
Wolves' Requiem, directed by Leslie Lam of
Kowloon Pictures!
jpnChrName: 九龍映像、レスリー・ラム監督作品 ──『狼たちの鎮魂歌』！！
jpnSearchText:
九龍映像、レスリー・ラム監督作品
──『狼たちの鎮魂歌』！！

engChrName: ARGH! Next time we'll see who has the last laugh!
engSearchText: ARGH! Next time we'll see who has the last laugh!
jpnChrName: うぬぬう～…… 次は負けんからなあっ！
jpnSearchText:
うぬぬう～……
次は負けんからなあっ！

engChrName: Haha. Be gentle with your revenge when the time comes, yeah?
engSearchText:
Haha. Be gentle with your revenge when the time
comes, yeah?
jpnChrName: ハハ…… どうかお手柔らかに。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ……
どうかお手柔らかに。

engChrName: Moving on to the actor awards...
engSearchText: Moving on to the actor awards...
jpnChrName: 続きましては俳優部門の発表です。
jpnSearchText: 続きましては俳優部門の発表です。

engChrName: The winner for Outstanding Actor is...
engSearchText: The winner for Outstanding Actor is...
jpnChrName: 優秀男優賞は──
jpnSearchText: 優秀男優賞は──

engChrName: Lapharl Aznavour, for his lead performance in Wolves' Requiem!
engSearchText:
Lapharl Aznavour, for his lead performance in
Wolves' Requiem!
jpnChrName: 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』主演、 ラファル・アズナヴール！
jpnSearchText:
『狼たちの鎮魂歌』主演、
ラファル・アズナヴール！

engChrName: Meanwhile, the award for Best Actor goes to...
engSearchText: Meanwhile, the award for Best Actor goes to...
jpnChrName: 最優秀男優賞は──
jpnSearchText: 最優秀男優賞は──

engChrName: Albert Granger, for his leading role in Perfect Driver 2!
engSearchText:
Albert Granger, for his leading role in Perfect
Driver 2!
jpnChrName: 『パーフェクトドライバー２』主演、 アルベルト・グレンジャー！
jpnSearchText:
『パーフェクトドライバー２』主演、
アルベルト・グレンジャー！

engChrName: Next, the winner for Outstanding Actress is...
engSearchText: Next, the winner for Outstanding Actress is...
jpnChrName: 優秀女優賞は──
jpnSearchText: 優秀女優賞は──

engChrName: Judith Lanster, for her lead performance in Golden Blood!
engSearchText:
Judith Lanster, for her lead performance in
Golden Blood!
jpnChrName: 『ゴールデン・ブラッド』主演、 ジュディス・ランスター！！
jpnSearchText:
『ゴールデン・ブラッド』主演、
ジュディス・ランスター！！

engChrName: And finally, the award for Best Actress goes to...
engSearchText: And finally, the award for Best Actress goes to...
jpnChrName: そして最優秀女優賞は──
jpnSearchText: そして最優秀女優賞は──

engChrName: Nina Fenly, the lead actress of Wolves' Requiem!
engSearchText: Nina Fenly, the lead actress of Wolves' Requiem!
jpnChrName: 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』主演、ニナ・フェンリィ！！！
jpnSearchText: 『狼たちの鎮魂歌』主演、ニナ・フェンリィ！！！

engChrName: ...Well, you did it, Nina. Congratulations! You've managed to beat the pants off me.
engSearchText:
...Well, you did it, Nina. Congratulations!
You've managed to beat the pants off me.
jpnChrName: ──やったわね、ニナ。 とうとう上回られちゃったか。
jpnSearchText:
──やったわね、ニナ。
とうとう上回られちゃったか。

engChrName: Judith...thank you. I couldn't have done it without such an amazing film.
engSearchText:
Judith...thank you. I couldn't have done it without
such an amazing film.
jpnChrName: ジュディス先輩…… ふふ、作品にも助けられました。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス先輩……
ふふ、作品にも助けられました。

engChrName: I can't believe it's finally happened! Nina Fenly has surpassed Judith Lanster as an actress!
engSearchText:
I can't believe it's finally happened! Nina Fenly has
surpassed Judith Lanster as an actress!
jpnChrName: つ、ついにニナ・フェンリィが ジュディス・ランスター越えですか……！
jpnSearchText:
つ、ついにニナ・フェンリィが
ジュディス・ランスター越えですか……！

engChrName: We're seeing history unfold, right before our eyes!
engSearchText:
We're seeing history unfold, right before
our eyes!
jpnChrName: まさに歴史的瞬間ですね……！！
jpnSearchText: まさに歴史的瞬間ですね……！！

engChrName: Magazines are bound to have a field day with this tomorrow.
engSearchText:
Magazines are bound to have a field day with
this tomorrow.
jpnChrName: ……明日の誌面はどこも賑わいそうだな。
jpnSearchText: ……明日の誌面はどこも賑わいそうだな。

engChrName: On that note, those of you with invitations are free to proceed to the award reception atop the hotel!
engSearchText:
On that note, those of you with invitations are free to
proceed to the award reception atop the hotel!
jpnChrName: ──それでは呼ばれた方々は どうぞホテル最上階の、受賞式会場へ！
jpnSearchText:
──それでは呼ばれた方々は
どうぞホテル最上階の、受賞式会場へ！

engChrName: Everyone else, there's plenty more excitement left in store, so don't go anywhere!
engSearchText:
Everyone else, there's plenty more excitement left in
store, so don't go anywhere!
jpnChrName: それ以外の皆さんも このまま更に熱く盛り上げて欲しい！
jpnSearchText:
それ以外の皆さんも
このまま更に熱く盛り上げて欲しい！

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Now the real fun begins, baby!
engSearchText: Oh, yeah! Now the real fun begins, baby!
jpnChrName: ああ、ここからがむしろ本番じゃっ！
jpnSearchText: ああ、ここからがむしろ本番じゃっ！

engChrName: Time for part two of my Carnal Cavalcade! Let's bring out some new guys and girls!
engSearchText:
Time for part two of my Carnal Cavalcade!
Let's bring out some new guys and girls!
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレード第二幕── 新たなフォクシーにフォックス（雄狐）も出番じゃ！！
jpnSearchText:
フォクシーパレード第二幕──
新たなフォクシーにフォックス（雄狐）も出番じゃ！！

engChrName: Got it!
engSearchText: Got it!
jpnChrName: ええっ！！／おおっ！！
jpnSearchText: ええっ！！／おおっ！！

engChrName: Wooooo!
engSearchText: Wooooo!

engChrName: Alex, there's nobody hotter up there than you!
engSearchText: Alex, there's nobody hotter up there than you!
jpnChrName: アレックス、 やっぱり貴方が一番よ──！！
jpnSearchText:
アレックス、
やっぱり貴方が一番よ──！！

engChrName: Hey, is that a supermodel I see?!
engSearchText: Hey, is that a supermodel I see?!
jpnChrName: おいおい、あれって スーパーモデルの……！？
jpnSearchText:
おいおい、あれって
スーパーモデルの……！？

engChrName: Whoa, way to up the stakes!
engSearchText: Whoa, way to up the stakes!
jpnChrName: うおおおおっ、そう来るかよ！？
jpnSearchText: うおおおおっ、そう来るかよ！？

engChrName: That's Gotti for you—giving the people exactly what they want and more.
engSearchText:
That's Gotti for you—giving the people exactly what
they want and more.
jpnChrName: ハッ……あの監督、 なかなか分かってるじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ……あの監督、
なかなか分かってるじゃねーか。

engChrName: I suppose, without his preferred star of the parade, he had to up the ante one way or the other.
engSearchText:
I suppose, without his preferred star of the parade, he
had to up the ante one way or the other.
jpnChrName: “本命”が居なくなった代わりに 更なるテコ入れでの盛り上げ、ですか。
jpnSearchText:
“本命”が居なくなった代わりに
更なるテコ入れでの盛り上げ、ですか。

engChrName: Yeah. He might not have won the big award, but with a parade full of actors and models, he's still making his mark.
engSearchText:
Yeah. He might not have won the big award, but
with a parade full of actors and models, he's still
making his mark.
jpnChrName: ああ、賞は逃しちまったが 人気俳優に一流モデルだからな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、賞は逃しちまったが
人気俳優に一流モデルだからな。

engChrName: Come on, Shaheena! You've got this!
engSearchText: Come on, Shaheena! You've got this!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナさぁん！
jpnSearchText: シャヒーナさぁん！

engChrName: That's it! You're doing great! Just like that!
engSearchText: That's it! You're doing great! Just like that!
jpnChrName: いいわよ──その調子でね！
jpnSearchText: いいわよ──その調子でね！

engChrName: She's so strong now...and it's all thanks to you guys.
engSearchText: She's so strong now...and it's all thanks to you guys.
jpnChrName: 頼もしくなって…… これも皆さんのおかげですね。
jpnSearchText:
頼もしくなって……
これも皆さんのおかげですね。

engChrName: Aww, I don't know about that. I'd say she gets it from having such a good sister!
engSearchText:
Aww, I don't know about that. I'd say she gets it from
having such a good sister!
jpnChrName: えへへ、サァラさんが いたからこその強さかと。
jpnSearchText:
えへへ、サァラさんが
いたからこその強さかと。

engChrName: It's really impressive. She doesn't look tired from the first act of the parade at all.
engSearchText:
It's really impressive. She doesn't look tired from the
first act of the parade at all.
jpnChrName: ええ、前半の疲れも まったく感じさせませんし。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、前半の疲れも
まったく感じさせませんし。

engChrName: If she keeps this up, I'm positive she'll last through the whole thing just fine.
engSearchText:
If she keeps this up, I'm positive she'll last through
the whole thing just fine.
jpnChrName: この調子なら最後までしっかり やり遂げられそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
この調子なら最後までしっかり
やり遂げられそうですね。

engChrName: I've gotta say, I was real shocked to see Golden Blood pull runner up instead of the shiny lion.
engSearchText:
I've gotta say, I was real shocked to see Golden Blood
pull runner up instead of the shiny lion.
jpnChrName: しかし『ゴールデンブラッド』が ２番手っつーのは驚いたな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし『ゴールデンブラッド』が
２番手っつーのは驚いたな。

engChrName: I still haven't seen Wolves' Requiem. Is it really as good as they say it is?
engSearchText:
I still haven't seen Wolves' Requiem. Is it really as
good as they say it is?
jpnChrName: まだ見てねえが『狼たちの鎮魂歌』 っつーのはそこまで面白ぇのか？
jpnSearchText:
まだ見てねえが『狼たちの鎮魂歌』
っつーのはそこまで面白ぇのか？

engChrName: Oh, yeah, it's an absolute masterpiece in its own right. The only other film this year that can hold a candle to it is Golden Blood.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah, it's an absolute masterpiece in its
own right. The only other film this year that can hold
a candle to it is Golden Blood.
jpnChrName: ああ、今年の中じゃあ 甲乙付けがたいくらいの傑作だろう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、今年の中じゃあ
甲乙付けがたいくらいの傑作だろう。

engChrName: It's a real timely film, you might say. Wouldn't surprise me if that was what ultimately put it on top.
engSearchText:
It's a real timely film, you might say.
Wouldn't surprise me if that was what ultimately put
it on top.
jpnChrName: 時事的にもタイムリーだったから そこら辺が決め手だったのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
時事的にもタイムリーだったから
そこら辺が決め手だったのかもな。

engChrName: Plus, if nothing else, it's a good sign the voting process was genuinely fair despite this being a Vegas Films event and all that.
engSearchText:
Plus, if nothing else, it's a good sign the voting
process was genuinely fair despite this being a Vegas
Films event and all that.
jpnChrName: 逆を言うと、ベガスフィルム主催でも フェアな投票が行われたという事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
逆を言うと、ベガスフィルム主催でも
フェアな投票が行われたという事ですね。

engChrName: I want to go see it at some point now, too. I'm really curious to see how Nina is in it.
engSearchText:
I want to go see it at some point now, too. I'm really
curious to see how Nina is in it.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ニナさんの演技も気になりますし 私も見てみたいです。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、ニナさんの演技も気になりますし
私も見てみたいです。

engChrName: Eh, you can go see it if you want. I'm more interested in that uncut version of Golden Blood everybody keeps hyping up!
engSearchText:
Eh, you can go see it if you want. I'm more interested
in that uncut version of Golden Blood everybody
keeps hyping up!
jpnChrName: わたしは『ゴールデンブラッド』の 完全版っていうのを見てみたいですっ。
jpnSearchText:
わたしは『ゴールデンブラッド』の
完全版っていうのを見てみたいですっ。

engChrName: In your dreams, kid. I don't think you're ready for it.
engSearchText: In your dreams, kid. I don't think you're ready for it.
jpnChrName: あん──？ チビにはまだ早いっつーの。
jpnSearchText:
あん──？
チビにはまだ早いっつーの。

engChrName: Yeah, I, uhh...have to agree with Aaron on this one. Maybe once you're a bit older.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I, uhh...have to agree with Aaron on this one.
Maybe once you're a bit older.
jpnChrName: あー…… もうちょい大きくなったらな。
jpnSearchText:
あー……
もうちょい大きくなったらな。

engChrName: Boo! That's so unfair. I'm plenty mature for my age, you know!
engSearchText:
Boo! That's so unfair. I'm plenty mature for my age,
you know!
jpnChrName: むう……納得いきませんっ。
jpnSearchText: むう……納得いきませんっ。

engChrName: (I'm not quite sure you're R-17 mature, though, Feri...)
engSearchText:
(I'm not quite sure you're R-17 mature,
though, Feri...)
jpnChrName: （たしかＲ１７でしたか……）
jpnSearchText: （たしかＲ１７でしたか……）

engChrName: Huh?
engSearchText: Huh?
jpnSearchText: ………え────
……！？

engChrName: Is that...?!
engSearchText: Is that...?!
jpnChrName: ッ……こいつは……！
jpnSearchText: ッ……こいつは……！

engChrName: Hey, what's going on?
engSearchText: Hey, what's going on?
jpnChrName: ……おい、何があったんだ……？
jpnSearchText: ……おい、何があったんだ……？

engChrName: What's wrong, Shaheena? Are you okay?
engSearchText: What's wrong, Shaheena? Are you okay?
jpnChrName: ど、どうしたの、シャヒーナさん？
jpnSearchText: ど、どうしたの、シャヒーナさん？

engChrName: Are you feeling tired? I can take over if you—
engSearchText: Are you feeling tired? I can take over if you—
jpnChrName: ひょっとして疲れちゃったかい？ だったらボクが代わりに──
jpnSearchText:
ひょっとして疲れちゃったかい？
だったらボクが代わりに──

engChrName: Tell me. You're not satisfied just being some substitute for your sister, are you?
engSearchText:
Tell me. You're not satisfied just being some
substitute for your sister, are you?
jpnChrName: ───姉の“代わり”。 お前は、それで満足できるのか？
jpnSearchText:
───姉の“代わり”。
お前は、それで満足できるのか？

engChrName: You are better than that. You want to shine yet brighter, don't you? To prove that you deserved the spotlight from the start.
engSearchText:
You are better than that. You want to shine yet
brighter, don't you? To prove that you deserved the
spotlight from the start.
jpnChrName: 本当はもっと輝ける筈だろう…… 今までの分を恩返しする意味でもな。
jpnSearchText:
本当はもっと輝ける筈だろう……
今までの分を恩返しする意味でもな。

engChrName: Then SHINE! Shine, golden as the sun, and consume everything around you with your brilliant rays!
engSearchText:
Then SHINE! Shine, golden as the sun, and
consume everything around you with your
brilliant rays!
jpnChrName: ならば輝くがいい── 全てを巻き込む“黄金の太陽”として。
jpnSearchText:
ならば輝くがいい──
全てを巻き込む“黄金の太陽”として。

engChrName: I...need to shine... Shine for Saara... Brighter than her...
engSearchText:
I...need to shine... Shine for Saara... Brighter
than her...
jpnChrName: ……輝く……お姉よりも…… ………お姉の、ためにも……………
jpnSearchText:
……輝く……お姉よりも……
………お姉の、ためにも……………

engChrName: More! More! I have to shine more!
engSearchText: More! More! I have to shine more!
jpnChrName: ……もっともっと、輝かなきゃ……！
jpnSearchText: ……もっともっと、輝かなきゃ……！

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!
jpnChrName: きゃああっ！？
jpnSearchText: きゃああっ！？

engChrName: What the—?!
engSearchText: What the—?!
jpnChrName: なん、だ──
jpnSearchText: なん、だ──

engChrName: Oooh...
engSearchText: Oooh...
jpnSearchText: ………ぁぁ…………

engChrName: Everyone should shine...together...
engSearchText: Everyone should shine...together...
jpnChrName: 輝きましょう……みんなで……
jpnSearchText: 輝きましょう……みんなで……

engChrName: Huh?!
engSearchText: Huh?!
jpnChrName: なっ……
jpnSearchText: なっ……

engChrName: Wh-What's wrong, you guys?
engSearchText: Wh-What's wrong, you guys?
jpnChrName: あ、貴方たち！？
jpnSearchText: あ、貴方たち！？

engChrName: Haha... Ahahahahaha!
engSearchText: Haha... Ahahahahaha!
jpnChrName: ……アハ、アハハハハ……！
jpnSearchText: ……アハ、アハハハハ……！

engChrName: I feel like I've jumped straight into the screen!
engSearchText: I feel like I've jumped straight into the screen!
jpnChrName: スクリーンの中に 飛び込んだみたいだぜ……！
jpnSearchText:
スクリーンの中に
飛び込んだみたいだぜ……！

engChrName: Dude, are you okay?
engSearchText: Dude, are you okay?
jpnChrName: お、おい、大丈夫かよ──
jpnSearchText: お、おい、大丈夫かよ──

engChrName: Shut up! Don't get in our way!
engSearchText: Shut up! Don't get in our way!
jpnChrName: うるせえ、邪魔すんな！
jpnSearchText: うるせえ、邪魔すんな！

engChrName: Eeek!
engSearchText: Eeek!
jpnChrName: きゃああああっ！？
jpnSearchText: きゃああああっ！？

engChrName: What's all this commotion?
engSearchText: What's all this commotion?
jpnChrName: なんだ、この騒ぎは……！？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、この騒ぎは……！？

engChrName: Oh, hell... Everyone, get ready to suppress—
engSearchText: Oh, hell... Everyone, get ready to suppress—
jpnChrName: クソ、仕方ない！ 一刻も早く鎮圧を──
jpnSearchText:
クソ、仕方ない！
一刻も早く鎮圧を──

engChrName: Damn. Not you all, too!
engSearchText: Damn. Not you all, too!
jpnSearchText: ！？　お前ら……！？

engChrName: Don't tell me you're trying to crash the party, sir! That's not very funny!
engSearchText:
Don't tell me you're trying to crash the party, sir!
That's not very funny!
jpnChrName: ひゃはは、せっかくのパーティを 邪魔するとか冗談キツいですよ……！
jpnSearchText:
ひゃはは、せっかくのパーティを
邪魔するとか冗談キツいですよ……！

engChrName: Yeah, Inspector! Come on, enjoy it! Enjoy yourself with the rest of us...
engSearchText:
Yeah, Inspector! Come on, enjoy it! Enjoy yourself
with the rest of us...
jpnChrName: 警部さんも一緒に楽しみましょ～……？
jpnSearchText: 警部さんも一緒に楽しみましょ～……？

engChrName: This ain't good!
engSearchText: This ain't good!
jpnChrName: こいつは……！
jpnSearchText: こいつは……！

engChrName: Shaheena!
engSearchText: Shaheena!
jpnChrName: シャ、シャヒーナ……！？
jpnSearchText: シャ、シャヒーナ……！？

engChrName: (Is that mask...?)
engSearchText: (Is that mask...?)
jpnChrName: （あの“仮面”は……）
jpnSearchText: （あの“仮面”は……）

engChrName: Shit! Guys, look over there!
engSearchText: Shit! Guys, look over there!
jpnChrName: ！？　おい、見ろ！
jpnSearchText: ！？　おい、見ろ！

engChrName: Moments before...
engSearchText: Moments before...
jpnChrName: 少し前──
jpnSearchText: 少し前──

engChrName: Why is the crowd acting like this?
engSearchText: Why is the crowd acting like this?
jpnChrName: こ、この騒ぎは……
jpnSearchText: こ、この騒ぎは……

engChrName: No! They're ruining my precious Cavalcade!
engSearchText: No! They're ruining my precious Cavalcade!
jpnChrName: ワ、ワシのフォクシーパレードがぁッ！！？
jpnSearchText: ワ、ワシのフォクシーパレードがぁッ！！？

engChrName: Looks like the worst case scenario we projected has come to pass.
engSearchText:
Looks like the worst case scenario we projected has
come to pass.
jpnChrName: ──予想していた “最悪”になりつつあるようだね。
jpnSearchText:
──予想していた
“最悪”になりつつあるようだね。

engChrName: Naje, get in touch with the Haurvatat. Get them to provide support to our ground forces.
engSearchText:
Naje, get in touch with the Haurvatat. Get them to
provide support to our ground forces.
jpnChrName: ナージェ、《ハルワタート号》に連絡を。 地上の支援に向かわせたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
ナージェ、《ハルワタート号》に連絡を。
地上の支援に向かわせたまえ。

engChrName: Yes, Your Highness! As you wi—
engSearchText: Yes, Your Highness! As you wi—
jpnChrName: は！　かしこまり──
jpnSearchText: は！　かしこまり──

engChrName: You might want to come up with a plan B. We've already got things 'sorted out' there.
engSearchText:
You might want to come up with a plan B.
We've already got things 'sorted out' there.
jpnChrName: うふふ、無駄じゃないかな？ あっちにも仕込んでおいたし❤
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、無駄じゃないかな？
あっちにも仕込んでおいたし❤

engChrName: Tch...
engSearchText: Tch...
jpnChrName: くっ……！
jpnSearchText: くっ……！

engChrName: You two must be with Almata. I take it you're the ones behind President Dillon's untimely passing?
engSearchText:
You two must be with Almata. I take it you're the
ones behind President Dillon's untimely passing?
jpnChrName: 君たちがアルマータ── ギャスパー社長殺害の実行犯か。
jpnSearchText:
君たちがアルマータ──
ギャスパー社長殺害の実行犯か。

engChrName: I think I see what's going on. That device is what's presumably made everyone out there go into a frenzy.
engSearchText:
I think I see what's going on. That device is what's
presumably made everyone out there go into a frenzy.
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。 皆を暴走させたのはその“装置”かい？
jpnSearchText:
……なるほど。
皆を暴走させたのはその“装置”かい？

engChrName: Smart man. You must be aware of what happened in Creil and Langport.
engSearchText:
Smart man. You must be aware of what happened in
Creil and Langport.
jpnChrName: フフ、ご明察。 クレイユや煌都の件も知ってるのかな？
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ご明察。
クレイユや煌都の件も知ってるのかな？

engChrName: But enough talk. Let's liven things up some more, shall we? After all, we owe it to ourselves, as fellow sponsors, to enjoy this!
engSearchText:
But enough talk. Let's liven things up some more,
shall we? After all, we owe it to ourselves, as fellow
sponsors, to enjoy this!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ一緒に盛り上げようか♪ 同じ後援者（スポンサー）同士として存分にね！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ一緒に盛り上げようか♪
同じ後援者（スポンサー）同士として存分にね！

engChrName: That we do. With this, all of the pieces are now in place.
engSearchText:
That we do. With this, all of the pieces are now
in place.
jpnChrName: ああ──これで役者は揃った。
jpnSearchText: ああ──これで役者は揃った。

engChrName: I hope you don't mind keeping us company until the show's grand finale, Your Highness.
engSearchText:
I hope you don't mind keeping us company until the
show's grand finale, Your Highness.
jpnChrName: “幕引き”まで付き合ってもらうぞ、 シェリド・アスヴァール公太子。
jpnSearchText:
“幕引き”まで付き合ってもらうぞ、
シェリド・アスヴァール公太子。

engChrName: Your Highness! Naje! Do you copy?! ...Damn. I can't get through!
engSearchText:
Your Highness! Naje! Do you copy?! ...Damn. I can't
get through!
jpnChrName: 殿下、ナージェ殿……！ ──駄目です、応答ありません！
jpnSearchText:
殿下、ナージェ殿……！
──駄目です、応答ありません！

engChrName: I've got no choice. I'll have to land this thing in the oasis!
engSearchText:
I've got no choice. I'll have to land this thing in
the oasis!
jpnChrName: このままでは……！ オアシス湖に着水させるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
このままでは……！
オアシス湖に着水させるぞ！

engChrName: This can't be real. How is this happening...?
engSearchText: This can't be real. How is this happening...?
jpnChrName: ま、まさかこんなことが……
jpnSearchText: ま、まさかこんなことが……

engChrName: It's probably safe to assume the cause of all this is in there.
engSearchText:
It's probably safe to assume the cause of all this is
in there.
jpnChrName: ……“元凶”はこの中だな。
jpnSearchText: ……“元凶”はこの中だな。

engChrName: If I had to guess, that angel we had a run-in with delivered its prize straight to Almata's clutches.
engSearchText:
If I had to guess, that angel we had a run-in with
delivered its prize straight to Almata's clutches.
jpnChrName: 多分、アルマータに持ち込まれて この事態を引き起こしているんだろう。
jpnSearchText:
多分、アルマータに持ち込まれて
この事態を引き起こしているんだろう。

engChrName: Yes... I don't see how it could be anything else. This has to be the work of the fourth Genesis.
engSearchText:
Yes... I don't see how it could be anything else.
This has to be the work of the fourth Genesis.
jpnChrName: はい……間違いありません。 あの地下水路で見た“４つ目”が。
jpnSearchText:
はい……間違いありません。
あの地下水路で見た“４つ目”が。

engChrName: Yet its effects don't appear to be wholly indiscriminate.
engSearchText:
Yet its effects don't appear to be
wholly indiscriminate.
jpnChrName: ──そしてどうやら 無差別というわけでもなさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
──そしてどうやら
無差別というわけでもなさそうです。

engChrName: The people being controlled must have some sort of shared connection between them.
engSearchText:
The people being controlled must have some sort of
shared connection between them.
jpnChrName: おそらく操られている方々は 何らかの“因子”があるのでしょう。
jpnSearchText:
おそらく操られている方々は
何らかの“因子”があるのでしょう。

engChrName: Wait! They're just like those other tourists! Then that must mean...
engSearchText:
Wait! They're just like those other tourists! Then that
must mean...
jpnChrName: あの観光客たちと同じ……！
jpnSearchText: あの観光客たちと同じ……！

engChrName: Right. Those tainted orbal hookahs are the other piece of the puzzle.
engSearchText:
Right. Those tainted orbal hookahs are the other
piece of the puzzle.
jpnChrName: じゃあ、こいつも導力シーシャの 仕業ってワケか……！
jpnSearchText:
じゃあ、こいつも導力シーシャの
仕業ってワケか……！

engChrName: I don't understand! That doesn't explain why my sister is being affected!
engSearchText:
I don't understand! That doesn't explain why my
sister is being affected!
jpnChrName: ま、待ってください！ それじゃあシャヒーナは……！？
jpnSearchText:
ま、待ってください！
それじゃあシャヒーナは……！？

engChrName: She's different. That mask she's wearing is what's giving her grief.
engSearchText:
She's different. That mask she's wearing is what's
giving her grief.
jpnChrName: ──妹さんの方は 間違いなくあの“仮面”だろうね。
jpnSearchText:
──妹さんの方は
間違いなくあの“仮面”だろうね。

engChrName: Her dancing is amplifying the strength of the interference, driving these people to act so crazy.
engSearchText:
Her dancing is amplifying the strength of the
interference, driving these people to act so crazy.
jpnChrName: “元凶”による干渉を踊りで増幅して みんなを狂乱に巻き込んでるんだと思う。
jpnSearchText:
“元凶”による干渉を踊りで増幅して
みんなを狂乱に巻き込んでるんだと思う。

engChrName: The question is when she would've gotten that mask from the culprit.
engSearchText:
The question is when she would've gotten that mask
from the culprit.
jpnChrName: 多分、どこかのタイミングで “黒幕”に渡されたんじゃないかな？
jpnSearchText:
多分、どこかのタイミングで
“黒幕”に渡されたんじゃないかな？

engChrName: Actually, wait—I think I know. It was probably sometime last night. I knew I should've stuck with her!
engSearchText:
Actually, wait—I think I know. It was probably
sometime last night. I knew I should've stuck
with her!
jpnChrName: いや……たぶん昨日の夜だね。 やっぱり付き添えばよかった。
jpnSearchText:
いや……たぶん昨日の夜だね。
やっぱり付き添えばよかった。

engChrName: Please tell me you're joking...
engSearchText: Please tell me you're joking...
jpnChrName: そんな……
jpnSearchText: そんな……

engChrName: There's more. What's going on here bears an awful resemblance to what took place a year and a half ago. Wouldn't you agree?
engSearchText:
There's more. What's going on here bears an awful
resemblance to what took place a year and a half ago.
Wouldn't you agree?
jpnChrName: いずれにしてもこの状況── 一年半前と似すぎていますね。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにしてもこの状況──
一年半前と似すぎていますね。

engChrName: Yeah. Somehow it looks like they've managed to recreate that effect out here in Calvard.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Somehow it looks like they've managed to
recreate that effect out here in Calvard.
jpnChrName: ああ──あの事件を何らかの方法で 無理矢理再現したのかもしれねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ──あの事件を何らかの方法で
無理矢理再現したのかもしれねぇ。

engChrName: What do you mean 'that'? (It couldn't possibly be...?)
engSearchText:
What do you mean 'that'?
(It couldn't possibly be...?)
jpnChrName: あの事件……（ひょっとして。）
jpnSearchText: あの事件……（ひょっとして。）

engChrName: Hey, do you know what they're talking about?
engSearchText: Hey, do you know what they're talking about?
jpnChrName: 何かご存じなんですかっ？
jpnSearchText: 何かご存じなんですかっ？

engChrName: Yeah, I heard about it from Cao.
engSearchText: Yeah, I heard about it from Cao.
jpnChrName: ハッ、ツァオから聞いた……
jpnSearchText: ハッ、ツァオから聞いた……

engChrName: They're referring to when that famous dancer was mind controlled during that takeover in Crossbell.
engSearchText:
They're referring to when that famous dancer was
mind controlled during that takeover in Crossbell.
jpnChrName: 『クロスベル再事変』とやらで “舞姫”が操られたっつーアレか。
jpnSearchText:
『クロスベル再事変』とやらで
“舞姫”が操られたっつーアレか。

engChrName: Claussell, you were in the area when all that was going down, weren't you?
engSearchText:
Claussell, you were in the area when all that was
going down, weren't you?
jpnChrName: クラウゼル──たしかその時 お前さんも現地に居たはずだな？
jpnSearchText:
クラウゼル──たしかその時
お前さんも現地に居たはずだな？

engChrName: Got any ideas on how to break the spell based on that experience?
engSearchText:
Got any ideas on how to break the spell based on
that experience?
jpnChrName: 何か打開できそうなヒントはねぇか？
jpnSearchText: 何か打開できそうなヒントはねぇか？

engChrName: *sigh* I didn't think you'd be so clued in on what happened.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I didn't think you'd be so clued in on
what happened.
jpnChrName: ……ふう、そこまで 把握されてるとは思わなかったけど。
jpnSearchText:
……ふう、そこまで
把握されてるとは思わなかったけど。

engChrName: THAT whole crisis was stopped thanks to a bunch of people coming together in the right places at the right times.
engSearchText:
THAT whole crisis was stopped thanks to a bunch of
people coming together in the right places at the
right times.
jpnChrName: あの時は本当に色々な人が 力を合わせて乗り越えたけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの時は本当に色々な人が
力を合わせて乗り越えたけど……

engChrName: But as far as the dancer you're talking about goes, it was a fellow dancer that ultimately did the trick.
engSearchText:
But as far as the dancer you're talking about goes, it
was a fellow dancer that ultimately did the trick.
jpnChrName: “舞姫”については──やっぱり もう一人の“舞姫”が決め手かな。
jpnSearchText:
“舞姫”については──やっぱり
もう一人の“舞姫”が決め手かな。

engChrName: She...brought her back from the depths of darkness and sent that phoenix flying high once more, so to speak.
engSearchText:
She...brought her back from the depths of darkness
and sent that phoenix flying high once more, so
to speak.
jpnChrName: 闇に落ちた不死鳥を引っ張り上げて 再び一緒に空へと舞い上げた。
jpnSearchText:
闇に落ちた不死鳥を引っ張り上げて
再び一緒に空へと舞い上げた。

engChrName: I think we can work with that. What do you think, Saara?
engSearchText:
I think we can work with that. What do you
think, Saara?
jpnChrName: だ、そうだが── どうする、“お姉ちゃん”。
jpnSearchText:
だ、そうだが──
どうする、“お姉ちゃん”。

engChrName: ...I'll do it!
engSearchText: ...I'll do it!
jpnChrName: ──やらせてください！
jpnSearchText: ──やらせてください！

engChrName: Whatever chance there is of bringing Shaheena back to normal, I have to take it!
engSearchText:
Whatever chance there is of bringing Shaheena back
to normal, I have to take it!
jpnChrName: シャヒーナを取り戻せる可能性が 少しでもあるなら……！
jpnSearchText:
シャヒーナを取り戻せる可能性が
少しでもあるなら……！

engChrName: Urgh! I can't hold out much...longer...
engSearchText: Urgh! I can't hold out much...longer...
jpnChrName: クソッ……！ ……このままじゃあ……！
jpnSearchText:
クソッ……！
……このままじゃあ……！

engChrName: Ngh...
engSearchText: Ngh...
jpnChrName: ぐっ……
jpnSearchText: ぐっ……

engChrName: Ugh...
engSearchText: Ugh...
jpnChrName: ううん……
jpnSearchText: ううん……

engChrName: Well, if it isn't Saara! Couldn't resist getting a front row seat to watch me, huh?
engSearchText:
Well, if it isn't Saara! Couldn't resist getting a front
row seat to watch me, huh?
jpnChrName: あはは、お姉だぁ…… 特等席で観てくれるんだねぇ……？
jpnSearchText:
あはは、お姉だぁ……
特等席で観てくれるんだねぇ……？

engChrName: ...Shaheena.
engSearchText: ...Shaheena.
jpnChrName: っ……シャヒーナ……
jpnSearchText: っ……シャヒーナ……

engChrName: I'm so sorry. I know I haven't been the best older sister in the world.
engSearchText:
I'm so sorry. I know I haven't been the best
older sister in the world.
jpnChrName: ……ごめんなさい、 私が不甲斐ないばっかりに。
jpnSearchText:
……ごめんなさい、
私が不甲斐ないばっかりに。

engChrName: Hey...what are you talking about? You should... watch...
engSearchText:
Hey...what are you talking about? You should...
watch...
jpnSearchText: ………なんのこと…………？

engChrName: Yeah! Watch me, sis! I'm gonna shine even brighter! So bright, I'll turn into a golden sun!
engSearchText:
Yeah! Watch me, sis! I'm gonna shine even brighter!
So bright, I'll turn into a golden sun!
jpnChrName: 見てよお姉、あたし、もっと輝ける……！ ……黄金の太陽にだってなれる……！
jpnSearchText:
見てよお姉、あたし、もっと輝ける……！
……黄金の太陽にだってなれる……！

engChrName: I'll dance for as long as it takes! You won't have to suffer any longer!
engSearchText:
I'll dance for as long as it takes! You won't have to
suffer any longer!
jpnChrName: もう二度とお姉を苦労させない……！ 最後まで踊り切ってみせるからね……！
jpnSearchText:
もう二度とお姉を苦労させない……！
最後まで踊り切ってみせるからね……！
…………っ…………………

engChrName: Ms. Saara, take this. It's a spare Xipha.
engSearchText: Ms. Saara, take this. It's a spare Xipha.
jpnChrName: ──サァラ様、こちらの 予備のザイファをお使いください。
jpnSearchText:
──サァラ様、こちらの
予備のザイファをお使いください。

engChrName: I set it to activate a spirit jammer. Hopefully it helps you reach her!
engSearchText:
I set it to activate a spirit jammer. Hopefully it helps
you reach her!
jpnChrName: ホロウに指示した霊子妨害（ジャミング）が 多少、助けになるかもしれません……！
jpnSearchText:
ホロウに指示した霊子妨害（ジャミング）が
多少、助けになるかもしれません……！

engChrName: If anyone's dancing can get through to Shaheena, it's yours, Saara! You can do it!
engSearchText:
If anyone's dancing can get through to Shaheena, it's
yours, Saara! You can do it!
jpnChrName: きっと届くはずです…… サァラさんの踊りならシャヒーナさんに！
jpnSearchText:
きっと届くはずです……
サァラさんの踊りならシャヒーナさんに！

engChrName: We're gonna take care of the source. Sylphid, you be sure to back her up!
engSearchText:
We're gonna take care of the source. Sylphid, you be
sure to back her up!
jpnChrName: 俺たちは“元凶”を叩く── 妖精共々バックアップは頼んだぞ！
jpnSearchText:
俺たちは“元凶”を叩く──
妖精共々バックアップは頼んだぞ！

engChrName: ...What you're doing right now isn't the dancing that was passed down to us.
engSearchText:
...What you're doing right now isn't the dancing that
was passed down to us.
jpnChrName: ──貴女の今の踊りは、私たちが 受け継いで大切にしてきたものじゃないわ。
jpnSearchText:
──貴女の今の踊りは、私たちが
受け継いで大切にしてきたものじゃないわ。

engChrName: I'm going to dance some sense into you! As your only sister, I'll show you how it's really done!
engSearchText:
I'm going to dance some sense into you! As your only
sister, I'll show you how it's really done!
jpnChrName: 思い出させてみせる── 貴女のたった一人のお姉ちゃんとして！
jpnSearchText:
思い出させてみせる──
貴女のたった一人のお姉ちゃんとして！

engChrName: Hahaha! Fine, see if I care! I'll just swallow you up, too, if that's what it takes!
engSearchText:
Hahaha! Fine, see if I care! I'll just swallow you up,
too, if that's what it takes!
jpnChrName: ……キャハハ、いいよ！ だったらあたしはお姉すら呑み込んで……！
jpnSearchText:
……キャハハ、いいよ！
だったらあたしはお姉すら呑み込んで……！

engChrName: I have to keep shining brighter! I won't stop!
engSearchText: I have to keep shining brighter! I won't stop!
jpnChrName: もっともっと──最高に輝いてみせるっ！！
jpnSearchText: もっともっと──最高に輝いてみせるっ！！

engChrName: Barrier synchronization via Genesis over 70%!
engSearchText: Barrier synchronization via Genesis over 70%!
jpnChrName: 《ゲネシス》を介した同調率、 ７０％を超えました！
jpnSearchText:
《ゲネシス》を介した同調率、
７０％を超えました！

engChrName: Van! Now!
engSearchText: Van! Now!
jpnChrName: 今です──ヴァンさん！
jpnSearchText: 今です──ヴァンさん！

engChrName: Raaaaaah!
engSearchText: Raaaaaah!
jpnChrName: おおおおおおっ！
jpnSearchText: おおおおおおっ！

engChrName: It's open!
engSearchText: It's open!
jpnChrName: 開きました……！
jpnSearchText: 開きました……！

engChrName: Let's get in!
