engSearchText: Let's get in!
jpnChrName: 入んぞ！！
jpnSearchText: 入んぞ！！

engChrName: Phew... That was too damn close. You really pushed our luck by brute forcing it, you know.
engSearchText:
Phew... That was too damn close. You really pushed
our luck by brute forcing it, you know.
jpnChrName: アブねぇアブねぇ…… ったく、力技にもほどがあんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
アブねぇアブねぇ……
ったく、力技にもほどがあんだろ。

engChrName: C'mon, don't gimme crap. We made it through, didn't we?
engSearchText:
C'mon, don't gimme crap. We made it through,
didn't we?
jpnChrName: ま、今更ってな……
jpnSearchText: ま、今更ってな……

engChrName: Wh-What the heck is this?!
engSearchText: Wh-What the heck is this?!
jpnChrName: こ、これって……！
jpnSearchText: こ、これって……！

engChrName: Hey! You all right in there?
engSearchText: Hey! You all right in there?
jpnChrName: お前たち──大丈夫なのか！？
jpnSearchText: お前たち──大丈夫なのか！？

engChrName: Yeah, just peachy. We're gonna go bash some heads and put a stop to this.
engSearchText:
Yeah, just peachy. We're gonna go bash some heads
and put a stop to this.
jpnChrName: ああ、これから“元凶”を叩きに行く。
jpnSearchText: ああ、これから“元凶”を叩きに行く。

engChrName: You guys take care of that parade float! Make sure to contact the CID's Edith branch and the guild, while you're at it!
engSearchText:
You guys take care of that parade float! Make sure to
contact the CID's Edith branch and the guild, while
you're at it!
jpnChrName: お前らはパレードカーの方を！ 首都のＣＩＤとギルドへの連絡もな！
jpnSearchText:
お前らはパレードカーの方を！
首都のＣＩＤとギルドへの連絡もな！

engChrName: All right! Leave it to us!
engSearchText: All right! Leave it to us!
jpnChrName: ！　分かった……！
jpnSearchText: ！　分かった……！

engChrName: Aww, you don't have to crack the whip so hard on your own friends, do you? But I'll give you a pass, sweetheart. We'll take care of it!
engSearchText:
Aww, you don't have to crack the whip so hard on
your own friends, do you? But I'll give you a
pass, sweetheart. We'll take care of it!
jpnChrName: んもう、人使いが荒いんだから！ でも任せてちょうだい！
jpnSearchText:
んもう、人使いが荒いんだから！
でも任せてちょうだい！

engChrName: My head is completely spinning at this point, but you can be sure I'll be recording everything! The world needs to know about this!
engSearchText:
My head is completely spinning at this point, but you
can be sure I'll be recording everything! The world
needs to know about this!
jpnChrName: あ、頭が混乱しっぱなしですけど ちゃんと記録しておきますっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、頭が混乱しっぱなしですけど
ちゃんと記録しておきますっ！

engChrName: Hahaha! Now, THIS is what I call a show!
engSearchText: Hahaha! Now, THIS is what I call a show!
jpnChrName: ハハハハハッ……！ 気が利いたショウじゃねえか！
jpnSearchText:
ハハハハハッ……！
気が利いたショウじゃねえか！

engChrName: What a fine way to recreate what happened in Crossbell. That mask must originally come from the workshop, if that's the case.
engSearchText:
What a fine way to recreate what happened
in Crossbell. That mask must originally come from
the workshop, if that's the case.
jpnChrName: 一年半前の再現──仮面も “工房”のリサイクル品ってトコか？
jpnSearchText:
一年半前の再現──仮面も
“工房”のリサイクル品ってトコか？

engChrName: Well, we made use of their Emperor back in the day so I guess turnabout's fair play.
engSearchText:
Well, we made use of their Emperor back in the
day so I guess turnabout's fair play.
jpnChrName: クク……《皇帝》とやらを 利用された意趣返しもありそうだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
クク……《皇帝》とやらを
利用された意趣返しもありそうだぜ。

engChrName: Heehee. My, I haven't witnessed such an amusing little spectacle since the serpent ensnared us.
engSearchText:
Heehee. My, I haven't witnessed such an amusing
little spectacle since the serpent ensnared us.
jpnChrName: うふふ、こないに愉しい見世物、 “蛇”に取り込まれた時みたいやねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、こないに愉しい見世物、
“蛇”に取り込まれた時みたいやねぇ。

engChrName: That certainly brings back memories... I wonder how she's doing these days.
engSearchText:
That certainly brings back memories... I wonder how
she's doing these days.
jpnChrName: 懐かしなぁ…… あの子は今頃何しとるんやろか？
jpnSearchText:
懐かしなぁ……
あの子は今頃何しとるんやろか？

engChrName: Harumph! Sir, I must ask if you have a reservation with us.
engSearchText:
Harumph! Sir, I must ask if you have a reservation
with us.
jpnChrName: むうウン、お客様、 ゴ予約はお済ミでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
むうウン、お客様、
ゴ予約はお済ミでしょうか……？

engChrName: If you don't, I'm afraid we must ask you to leave! Raaah!
engSearchText:
If you don't, I'm afraid we must ask you to leave!
Raaah!
jpnChrName: ハアあっ、お済でなけれバ お引き取り願いマショう……！
jpnSearchText:
ハアあっ、お済でなけれバ
お引き取り願いマショう……！

engChrName: Oh, great. A pair of muscleheads first thing. Just what we needed.
engSearchText:
Oh, great. A pair of muscleheads first thing. Just what
we needed.
jpnChrName: ……よりによって このガチムチどもかよ……！
jpnSearchText:
……よりによって
このガチムチどもかよ……！

engChrName: We've got no choice. We'll have to take 'em down!
engSearchText: We've got no choice. We'll have to take 'em down!
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ、無力化するぞ──！
jpnSearchText: 仕方ねえ、無力化するぞ──！

engChrName: That does it. Their strength definitely feels amplified.
engSearchText: That does it. Their strength definitely feels amplified.
jpnChrName: ……制圧完了っ。 やはり“強化”されています！
jpnSearchText:
……制圧完了っ。
やはり“強化”されています！

engChrName: Indeed, and far more than what we witnessed from those tourists under the influence yesterday.
engSearchText:
Indeed, and far more than what we witnessed from
those tourists under the influence yesterday.
jpnChrName: ええ、昨日の観光客の薬物強化より 遙かに強力なブーストのようです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、昨日の観光客の薬物強化より
遙かに強力なブーストのようです。

engChrName: We'll just have to take 'em down as we find 'em, as rough as it'll be. Agnès, how do things look with the Genesis?
engSearchText:
We'll just have to take 'em down as we find 'em, as
rough as it'll be. Agnès, how do things look with
the Genesis?
jpnChrName: 面倒だが落としていくしかねぇ。 ──ゲネシスの反応はどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
面倒だが落としていくしかねぇ。
──ゲネシスの反応はどうだ？

engChrName: Judging from the reaction, I'd say...we need to head up to the award reception at the top of the hotel.
engSearchText:
Judging from the reaction, I'd say...we need to head
up to the award reception at the top of the hotel.
jpnChrName: この反応……多分、 最上階の受賞式会場だと思います。
jpnSearchText:
この反応……多分、
最上階の受賞式会場だと思います。

engChrName: Nina, Judith, Director Gotti, and the Prince should all be there as well.
engSearchText:
Nina, Judith, Director Gotti, and the Prince should
all be there as well.
jpnChrName: ニナさんにジュディスさん、 監督や公太子殿下もそちらに……
jpnSearchText:
ニナさんにジュディスさん、
監督や公太子殿下もそちらに……

engChrName: Ehh, they've got that scary-ass bodyguard with them, plus that catgirl. I'm sure they'll be just fine in the meantime.
engSearchText:
Ehh, they've got that scary-ass bodyguard with them,
plus that catgirl. I'm sure they'll be just fine in
the meantime.
jpnChrName: ハン、ヤベぇ護衛に痴女キャットもいるし 心配はいらなさそうだが……
jpnSearchText:
ハン、ヤベぇ護衛に痴女キャットもいるし
心配はいらなさそうだが……

engChrName: There should be an elevator we can take straight up. Let's hop on board.
engSearchText:
There should be an elevator we can take straight up.
Let's hop on board.
jpnChrName: たしか直通エレベーターがある筈だ。 行ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
たしか直通エレベーターがある筈だ。
行ってみるぞ。

engChrName: Tch. They locked down our ride. Now what do we do?
engSearchText:
Tch. They locked down our ride. Now what do
we do?
jpnChrName: チッ…… “直通”はロックされてやがるか。
jpnSearchText:
チッ……
“直通”はロックされてやがるか。

engChrName: Maximum security appears to be enabled. It would take some time in order to crack it.
engSearchText:
Maximum security appears to be enabled. It would
take some time in order to crack it.
jpnChrName: セキュリティレベル最大── 解除は時間が掛かりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
セキュリティレベル最大──
解除は時間が掛かりそうです。

engChrName: What about this other elevator? It can get us up to the fifth floor, at least.
engSearchText:
What about this other elevator? It can get us up to
the fifth floor, at least.
jpnChrName: あ、こっちのエレベーターなら ５Ｆまでは行けるみたいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、こっちのエレベーターなら
５Ｆまでは行けるみたいですっ！

engChrName: We'll take it. We don't have time to waste.
engSearchText: We'll take it. We don't have time to waste.
jpnChrName: 迷ってる暇はねえ、そっちを使うぞ。
jpnSearchText: 迷ってる暇はねえ、そっちを使うぞ。

engChrName: Right. We've got to get up there, some way or another!
engSearchText:
Right. We've got to get up there, some way
or another!
jpnChrName: はい、何とか上を目指しましょう……！
jpnSearchText: はい、何とか上を目指しましょう……！

engChrName: MAAARVELOUS! This parade is exceeding all of my wildest dreams!
engSearchText:
MAAARVELOUS! This parade is exceeding all of
my wildest dreams!
jpnChrName: マアアアアアアアベラス！！ ワシの思い描いていた以上のパレードじゃああっ！！
jpnSearchText:
マアアアアアアアベラス！！
ワシの思い描いていた以上のパレードじゃああっ！！

engChrName: It's...beautiful.
engSearchText: It's...beautiful.
jpnChrName: 凄いですね……
jpnSearchText: 凄いですね……

engChrName: Yeah. It really is.
engSearchText: Yeah. It really is.
jpnChrName: ……ええ、本当に。
jpnSearchText: ……ええ、本当に。

engChrName: (So that's what it means to perform live. Really puts into perspective what that girl accomplished in Crossbell...)
engSearchText:
(So that's what it means to perform live. Really puts
into perspective what that girl accomplished
in Crossbell...)
jpnChrName: （“生のステージ”か……   クロスベルに行った彼女も……）
jpnSearchText:
（“生のステージ”か……
クロスベルに行った彼女も……）

engChrName: What'd you say?
engSearchText: What'd you say?

engChrName: Just thinking out—ah! Why are you kneeling so close to me?
engSearchText:
Just thinking out—ah! Why are you kneeling so close
to me?
jpnChrName: ううん──って近いわよ！？
jpnSearchText: ううん──って近いわよ！？

engChrName: Sorry! But your injuries need tending to.
engSearchText: Sorry! But your injuries need tending to.
jpnChrName: すみません。 でも、できれば手当を──
jpnSearchText:
すみません。
でも、できれば手当を──

engChrName: Aww. Over already? That was a little anticlimactic, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
Aww. Over already? That was a little anticlimactic, if
you ask me.
jpnChrName: あーあ、もう終わりか…… ちょっと物足りない気もするなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あーあ、もう終わりか……
ちょっと物足りない気もするなぁ。

engChrName: What do we do now, boss?
engSearchText: What do we do now, boss?
jpnChrName: どうしよう、ボス？
jpnSearchText: どうしよう、ボス？

engChrName: Heh heh heh...
engSearchText: Heh heh heh...
jpnChrName: ククク……
jpnSearchText: ククク……

engChrName: I think we're fine. These results were more than enough for our purposes. I'm sure our spriggan friend will agree.
engSearchText:
I think we're fine. These results were more than
enough for our purposes. I'm sure our spriggan friend
will agree.
jpnChrName: いや、十分すぎる成果だろう。 ───なあ、裏解決屋？
jpnSearchText:
いや、十分すぎる成果だろう。
───なあ、裏解決屋？

engChrName: Wipe that cocky grin off your ugly mug.
engSearchText: Wipe that cocky grin off your ugly mug.
jpnChrName: ……オイ、何勝手に 終わった雰囲気出してやがる？
jpnSearchText:
……オイ、何勝手に
終わった雰囲気出してやがる？

engChrName: We won't let you escape!
engSearchText: We won't let you escape!
jpnChrName: このまま逃げられるとでも……！
jpnSearchText: このまま逃げられるとでも……！

engChrName: ...Escape? Whatever gave you that idea?
engSearchText: ...Escape? Whatever gave you that idea?
jpnChrName: 逃げる──何を言っている？
jpnSearchText: 逃げる──何を言っている？

engChrName: Watch out, everyone!
engSearchText: Watch out, everyone!
jpnChrName: いけない──皆さん！！
jpnSearchText: いけない──皆さん！！

engChrName: Incoming!
engSearchText: Incoming!
jpnChrName: 下がれっ……！！
jpnSearchText: 下がれっ……！！

engChrName: Aaah!
engSearchText: Aaah!
jpnChrName: きゃあああっ……！
jpnSearchText: きゃあああっ……！

engChrName: HOLY MOTHER OF AIDIOS!
engSearchText: HOLY MOTHER OF AIDIOS!
jpnChrName: ぬおおおおおおおっ！？
jpnSearchText: ぬおおおおおおおっ！？

engChrName: Whoa, there!
engSearchText: Whoa, there!
jpnChrName: うわっと～っ！？
jpnSearchText: うわっと～っ！？

engChrName: Taking this a little far, don't you think?!
engSearchText: Taking this a little far, don't you think?!
jpnChrName: め、滅茶苦茶じゃない……！！
jpnSearchText: め、滅茶苦茶じゃない……！！

engChrName: Oh, I didn't realize you were there, Melchior. I'm ever-so sorry.
engSearchText:
Oh, I didn't realize you were there, Melchior.
I'm ever-so sorry.
jpnChrName: ああ、いたのかいメルキオル？ うっかり巻き込むところだったねェ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、いたのかいメルキオル？
うっかり巻き込むところだったねェ。

engChrName: No need to apologize! You know me, Viola. I ALWAYS love a good thrill! ❤
engSearchText:
No need to apologize! You know me, Viola.
I ALWAYS love a good thrill! ❤
jpnChrName: うふふ、気にしないでよ！ スリルは大好きだからさぁ、僕❤
jpnSearchText:
うふふ、気にしないでよ！
スリルは大好きだからさぁ、僕❤

engChrName: You have a bad habit of gratuitously pushing people's buttons, Melchior.
engSearchText:
You have a bad habit of gratuitously pushing people's
buttons, Melchior.
jpnChrName: ……メルキオル。 やはり無用に挑発的ですね。
jpnSearchText:
……メルキオル。
やはり無用に挑発的ですね。

engChrName: She does share some of the blame, you realize. In either case, they are merely engaging in their usual repartee.
engSearchText:
She does share some of the blame, you realize.
In either case, they are merely engaging in their
usual repartee.
jpnChrName: まあ、彼女にも問題はある。 じゃれ合っているだけだろう。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、彼女にも問題はある。
じゃれ合っているだけだろう。

engChrName: The hell I am!
engSearchText: The hell I am!
jpnChrName: ふざけんじゃないよっ！！
jpnSearchText: ふざけんじゃないよっ！！

engChrName: It's you bastards...!
engSearchText: It's you bastards...!
jpnChrName: ……てめぇらは………
jpnSearchText: ……てめぇらは………

engChrName: Look, that puppeteer is with them, too!
engSearchText: Look, that puppeteer is with them, too!
jpnChrName: あ、あの人形使いも……
jpnSearchText: あ、あの人形使いも……

engChrName: Stay RIGHT there!
engSearchText: Stay RIGHT there!
jpnChrName: っ……行かせないっ！
jpnSearchText: っ……行かせないっ！

engChrName: Gagh...!
engSearchText: Gagh...!
jpnChrName: ちいっ……！
jpnSearchText: ちいっ……！

engChrName: Ciao! Thanks for keeping me entertained! ♪
engSearchText: Ciao! Thanks for keeping me entertained! ♪
jpnChrName: チャオ、まあまあ楽しかったよ♪
jpnSearchText: チャオ、まあまあ楽しかったよ♪

engChrName: Will it or nill it, we seem bound by fate. I'm sure we'll meet again.
engSearchText:
Will it or nill it, we seem bound by fate. I'm sure we'll
meet again.
jpnChrName: つくづく縁があるようだ── また、会うこともあるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
つくづく縁があるようだ──
また、会うこともあるだろう。

engChrName: Not so fast! Tell me one thing!
engSearchText: Not so fast! Tell me one thing!
jpnChrName: 待て……！ 最後に一つだけ聞かせろ！！
jpnSearchText:
待て……！
最後に一つだけ聞かせろ！！

engChrName: Just how far do you plan on takin' this madness?
engSearchText: Just how far do you plan on takin' this madness?
jpnChrName: お前ら──どこまでやるつもりだ？
jpnSearchText: お前ら──どこまでやるつもりだ？

engChrName: Come now, spriggan. You know the answer as well as I do.
engSearchText:
Come now, spriggan. You know the answer as well as
I do.
jpnChrName: 決まっているだろう、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。
jpnSearchText: 決まっているだろう、裏解決屋（スプリガン）。

engChrName: There are no limits to the lengths we will go.
engSearchText: There are no limits to the lengths we will go.
jpnChrName: ───どこまでもだ。
jpnSearchText: ───どこまでもだ。

engChrName: That stealth cruiser is cutting-edge tech. These guys're better equipped than I thought.
engSearchText:
That stealth cruiser is cutting-edge tech.
These guys're better equipped than I thought.
jpnChrName: 最新鋭のステルス艇…… あんな代物まで使ってるとはな。
jpnSearchText:
最新鋭のステルス艇……
あんな代物まで使ってるとはな。

engChrName: So it seems. That specific ship isn't even on the market yet.
engSearchText:
So it seems. That specific ship isn't even on the
market yet.
jpnChrName: ええ──まだ市場に 出回っていないタイプです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ──まだ市場に
出回っていないタイプです。

engChrName: Oh, crap!
engSearchText: Oh, crap!
jpnChrName: ヤバッ……！
jpnSearchText: ヤバッ……！

engChrName: W-Well, I'd better get going! I'll let you guys take it from here! So long!
engSearchText:
W-Well, I'd better get going! I'll let you guys take it
from here! So long!
jpnChrName: あ、あたしはこれで失礼するわ！ 後の事は任せたわね、それじゃっ！
jpnSearchText:
あ、あたしはこれで失礼するわ！
後の事は任せたわね、それじゃっ！

engChrName: Wait! Your wounds, I haven't—
engSearchText: Wait! Your wounds, I haven't—
jpnChrName: あっ、手当てがまだ──
jpnSearchText: あっ、手当てがまだ──

engChrName: And there she goes.
engSearchText: And there she goes.
jpnChrName: ……行っちまったか。
jpnSearchText: ……行っちまったか。

engChrName: She could've at least said a proper goodbye...
engSearchText: She could've at least said a proper goodbye...
jpnChrName: ちょっと水臭いような……
jpnSearchText: ちょっと水臭いような……

engChrName: *huff* *huff* Nina! Are you all right?!
engSearchText: *huff* *huff* Nina! Are you all right?!
jpnChrName: ハアハア……ニナ、無事っ……！？
jpnSearchText: ハアハア……ニナ、無事っ……！？

engChrName: Seriously?
engSearchText: Seriously?
jpnChrName: オイオイ……
jpnSearchText: オイオイ……

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...

engChrName: Judith! There you are!
engSearchText: Judith! There you are!
jpnChrName: ジュディス先輩……！
jpnSearchText: ジュディス先輩……！

engChrName: I've been so worried about you ever since we got separated!
engSearchText:
I've been so worried about you ever since we
got separated!
jpnChrName: よかった、はぐれてから ずっと心配して──
jpnSearchText:
よかった、はぐれてから
ずっと心配して──

engChrName: And—oh, no! You look so exhausted! Did something happen?
engSearchText:
And—oh, no! You look so exhausted! Did
something happen?
jpnChrName: ！　凄く消耗してるみたい…… 大丈夫ですか！？
jpnSearchText:
！　凄く消耗してるみたい……
大丈夫ですか！？

engChrName: *huff* I'm fine... *huff* Really. I've just been running around this whole time, that's all.
engSearchText:
*huff* I'm fine... *huff* Really. I've just been running
around this whole time, that's all.
jpnChrName: ぜえはあ、平気よ平気…… ずっと逃げ回ってただけだから……
jpnSearchText:
ぜえはあ、平気よ平気……
ずっと逃げ回ってただけだから……

engChrName: Judith, did you see her? Grimcat was here in the flesh, baby!
engSearchText:
Judith, did you see her? Grimcat was here in the
flesh, baby!
jpnChrName: ジュディス君、見たかねっ！？ あの“生グリムキャッツ”をっ……！
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス君、見たかねっ！？
あの“生グリムキャッツ”をっ……！

engChrName: If she's not a scintillating spectacle, I don't know who is! That woman is the living embodiment of one of my 108 ideal forms!
engSearchText:
If she's not a scintillating spectacle, I don't know
who is! That woman is the living embodiment of one
of my 108 ideal forms!
jpnChrName: あれぞまさにセクシー＆スペクタクル！！ ワシの１０８ある理想形の一つと言えようっ！
jpnSearchText:
あれぞまさにセクシー＆スペクタクル！！
ワシの１０８ある理想形の一つと言えようっ！

engChrName: Aaargh, I've got to do something! I need to get to work on my next movie—one that'll put that damn Lam in his place!
engSearchText:
Aaargh, I've got to do something! I need to get to
work on my next movie—one that'll put that damn
Lam in his place!
jpnChrName: ぬおおおっ、こうしちゃおれんっ！ ラムのヤツに勝つための作品作りをっ……！
jpnSearchText:
ぬおおおっ、こうしちゃおれんっ！
ラムのヤツに勝つための作品作りをっ……！

engChrName: Ahaha. Already have your eyes on the next prize, Mr. Gotti?
engSearchText:
Ahaha. Already have your eyes on the next prize,
Mr. Gotti?
jpnChrName: あはは…… さすがはゴッチ監督……
jpnSearchText:
あはは……
さすがはゴッチ監督……

engChrName: Eh, we could all learn a little from his determination. Though maybe not the part that's waist-deep in the gutters...
engSearchText:
Eh, we could all learn a little from his determination.
Though maybe not the part that's waist-deep in
the gutters...
jpnChrName: ま、まあ煩悩の数はさておき 負けん気は見習いたいかもね……
jpnSearchText:
ま、まあ煩悩の数はさておき
負けん気は見習いたいかもね……

engChrName: (We recovered another Genesis...but at what cost?)
engSearchText: (We recovered another Genesis...but at what cost?)
jpnChrName: （……今回もとんでもない事に……）
jpnSearchText: （……今回もとんでもない事に……）

engChrName: (Great-grandfather, Mom, Grandmother...)
engSearchText: (Great-grandfather, Mom, Grandmother...)
jpnChrName: （曾お祖父ちゃん……   ……お母さんにお祖母ちゃんも……）
jpnSearchText:
（曾お祖父ちゃん……
……お母さんにお祖母ちゃんも……）

engChrName: Huh, I'd say this whole mess has given us a lot to chew on.
engSearchText:
Huh, I'd say this whole mess has given us a lot to
chew on.
jpnChrName: ま、それぞれ思う所はあんだろう。
jpnSearchText: ま、それぞれ思う所はあんだろう。

engChrName: But our clients are safe and sound—well, mostly— and I don't think we could've wrapped things up much better than we did.
engSearchText:
But our clients are safe and sound—well, mostly—
and I don't think we could've wrapped things up
much better than we did.
jpnChrName: だが依頼人も全員無事──かは微妙だが、 何とか“落とし所”には持って行けた。
jpnSearchText:
だが依頼人も全員無事──かは微妙だが、
何とか“落とし所”には持って行けた。

engChrName: I can see us getting a juicy bonus for our work, too. So good job guys—you all get a passin' grade.
engSearchText:
I can see us getting a juicy bonus for our work, too.
So good job guys—you all get a passin' grade.
jpnChrName: 臨時ボーナスも入りそうだし、 良くやった──全員及第点をやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
臨時ボーナスも入りそうだし、
良くやった──全員及第点をやるよ。

engChrName: Aww... Heehee.
engSearchText: Aww... Heehee.

engChrName: I'm not sure where you get off with thinking you, of all people, can grade us.
engSearchText:
I'm not sure where you get off with thinking you, of
all people, can grade us.
jpnChrName: ヘッ……てめぇごときに 採点しきれる器じゃねえっつの。
jpnSearchText:
ヘッ……てめぇごときに
採点しきれる器じゃねえっつの。

engChrName: I suppose that now all of this is over, this concludes my current assignment.
engSearchText:
I suppose that now all of this is over, this concludes
my current assignment.
jpnChrName: ……ふふ、これにて 今回の“出向”も終わりですね。
jpnSearchText:
……ふふ、これにて
今回の“出向”も終わりですね。

engChrName: A job well done, Mr. Arkride. Everyone.
engSearchText: A job well done, Mr. Arkride. Everyone.
jpnChrName: お疲れ様でした── ヴァン様、皆様がたも。
jpnSearchText:
お疲れ様でした──
ヴァン様、皆様がたも。

engChrName: Right back at you, Risette.
engSearchText: Right back at you, Risette.
jpnChrName: ああ……つうかお前さんもな。
jpnSearchText: ああ……つうかお前さんもな。

engChrName: I really don't know what we would have done without you.
engSearchText:
I really don't know what we would have done
without you.
jpnChrName: ──リゼットさん、 本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText:
──リゼットさん、
本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: You've been so attentive and supportive—not to mention the way you saved Van when he was in danger.
engSearchText:
You've been so attentive and supportive—not to
mention the way you saved Van when he was
in danger.
jpnChrName: 細やかな気遣いにサポート…… ヴァンさんの危機も救ってくれましたし。
jpnSearchText:
細やかな気遣いにサポート……
ヴァンさんの危機も救ってくれましたし。

engChrName: Yeah! You've been super helpful to have around!
engSearchText: Yeah! You've been super helpful to have around!
jpnChrName: すっごく心強かったですっ！
jpnSearchText: すっごく心強かったですっ！

engChrName: You ever think about trading places with our boss? Work'd go way smoother with you running the show.
engSearchText:
You ever think about trading places with our boss?
Work'd go way smoother with you running the show.
jpnChrName: つうかマジで所長と入れ替えた方が 上手く回るんじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText:
つうかマジで所長と入れ替えた方が
上手く回るんじゃねーか？

engChrName: I'm RIGHT here! Though I'd, uh, be lying if I said I hadn't had the same thought.
engSearchText:
I'm RIGHT here! Though I'd, uh, be lying if I said I
hadn't had the same thought.
jpnChrName: ──ってオイ！ まあ俺もそう思わんでもねぇが……
jpnSearchText:
──ってオイ！
まあ俺もそう思わんでもねぇが……

engChrName: It was my pleasure. I had a wonderful time working with all of you.
engSearchText:
It was my pleasure. I had a wonderful time working
with all of you.
jpnChrName: こちらこそ── 良い経験をさせて頂きました。
jpnSearchText:
こちらこそ──
良い経験をさせて頂きました。

engChrName: ...Thank you for everything.
engSearchText: ...Thank you for everything.
jpnChrName: ……本当にありがとうございました。
jpnSearchText: ……本当にありがとうございました。

engChrName: If it weren't for you all, who knows where I'd be right now? Arusha must be really looking out for me.
engSearchText:
If it weren't for you all, who knows where I'd be
right now? Arusha must be really looking out for me.
jpnChrName: 皆さんがいなかったら今頃は…… 翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きに感謝します。
jpnSearchText:
皆さんがいなかったら今頃は……
翼の女神（アルーシャ）の導きに感謝します。

engChrName: Hey, c'mon, don't sell yourself too short, yeah? You did all the hard work. We just offered a little moral support, that's all.
engSearchText:
Hey, c'mon, don't sell yourself too short, yeah?
You did all the hard work. We just offered a little
moral support, that's all.
jpnChrName: ま、お前さんたちの実力だろ。 俺たちはあくまで背中を押しただけさ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、お前さんたちの実力だろ。
俺たちはあくまで背中を押しただけさ。

engChrName: But still...
engSearchText: But still...
jpnChrName: ヴァンさん……
jpnSearchText: ヴァンさん……

engChrName: I wish we had more time to hang out! One of these days, you'll have to teach me some of your moves, okay?
engSearchText:
I wish we had more time to hang out! One of these
days, you'll have to teach me some of your
moves, okay?
jpnChrName: 今回は時間がなくて残念でしたけど、 いつか踊りを教えてくださいねっ。
jpnSearchText:
今回は時間がなくて残念でしたけど、
いつか踊りを教えてくださいねっ。

engChrName: Sure! Sounds like a plan!
engSearchText: Sure! Sounds like a plan!
jpnChrName: えへへ……うん、約束ね！
jpnSearchText: えへへ……うん、約束ね！

engChrName: I promise to pay you back for everything you've done! See you guys later!
engSearchText:
I promise to pay you back for everything you've done!
See you guys later!
jpnChrName: 今回のお返しも絶対するから── またね、お兄さんにフェリたちも！
jpnSearchText:
今回のお返しも絶対するから──
またね、お兄さんにフェリたちも！

engChrName: ...I have no excuse for my earlier lapse. Words cannot express how grateful I am you were able to contain the situation for me.
engSearchText:
...I have no excuse for my earlier lapse. Words cannot
express how grateful I am you were able to contain
the situation for me.
jpnChrName: ──不甲斐なき我が失態、 収めていただき感謝に堪えません。
jpnSearchText:
──不甲斐なき我が失態、
収めていただき感謝に堪えません。

engChrName: That was quite the ride we ended up on indeed. But all things considered, this has been a fruitful experience! In several ways.
engSearchText:
That was quite the ride we ended up on indeed.
But all things considered, this has been a
fruitful experience! In several ways.
jpnChrName: いやはや、とんでもない目に遭ったが 色々な意味でいい経験にもなったよ。
jpnSearchText:
いやはや、とんでもない目に遭ったが
色々な意味でいい経験にもなったよ。

engChrName: As promised, I threw in a bonus on top of your base reward, so you have something extra to look forward to. It will arrive separately.
engSearchText:
As promised, I threw in a bonus on top of your base
reward, so you have something extra to look
forward to. It will arrive separately.
jpnChrName: 約束通り、報酬には色を付けさせてもらった。 後日届けさせるから楽しみにしてくれたまえ。
jpnSearchText:
約束通り、報酬には色を付けさせてもらった。
後日届けさせるから楽しみにしてくれたまえ。

engChrName: 'Preciate it, Your Highness. I'll be on the lookout for it.
engSearchText:
'Preciate it, Your Highness. I'll be on the lookout
for it.
jpnChrName: はは、恐れ多いですが 有り難く受け取らせてもらいますよ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、恐れ多いですが
有り難く受け取らせてもらいますよ。

engChrName: All that being said, this has certainly been a colorful little adventure, hasn't it?
engSearchText:
All that being said, this has certainly been a colorful
little adventure, hasn't it?
jpnChrName: しかし、本当に興味深い事件だった。
jpnSearchText: しかし、本当に興味深い事件だった。

engChrName: And I don't just mean with Almata and the Genesis. You're an intriguing fellow yourself, Van.
engSearchText:
And I don't just mean with Almata and the Genesis.
You're an intriguing fellow yourself, Van.
jpnChrName: アルマータに《ゲネシス》とやら…… ──そしてヴァン君、君自身もね。
jpnSearchText:
アルマータに《ゲネシス》とやら……
──そしてヴァン君、君自身もね。

engChrName: I understand what Marduk sees in Arkride Solutions now. You can most certainly count on my continued support.
engSearchText:
I understand what Marduk sees in Arkride
Solutions now. You can most certainly count
on my continued support.
jpnChrName: アークライド解決事務所…… ＭＫ社同様、今後とも応援させてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
アークライド解決事務所……
ＭＫ社同様、今後とも応援させてもらうよ。

engChrName: All right—now that we're up to speed on our 4SPGs, let's hit up the Entertainment District again and see what's new.
engSearchText:
All right—now that we're up to speed on our 4SPGs,
let's hit up the Entertainment District again and see
what's new.
jpnChrName: ４ｓｐｇも確認したことだし、 改めて歓楽街を回ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
４ｓｐｇも確認したことだし、
改めて歓楽街を回ってみるか。

engChrName: Hell yeah. Gotta scope out the hot spots so we can have some fun tonight. I see what you're doing, man.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah. Gotta scope out the hot spots so we can
have some fun tonight. I see what you're doing, man.
jpnChrName: クク、夜のお楽しみのための下見だな。
jpnSearchText: クク、夜のお楽しみのための下見だな。

engChrName: I'm not doin' jack except working! Now stay focused!
engSearchText: I'm not doin' jack except working! Now stay focused!
jpnChrName: そういうのじゃねぇっての。
jpnSearchText: そういうのじゃねぇっての。

engChrName: Whoa, get a load of that guy! He's SO hot!
engSearchText: Whoa, get a load of that guy! He's SO hot!
jpnChrName: 見て、あのお兄さん超イケメンだよ！
jpnSearchText: 見て、あのお兄さん超イケメンだよ！

engChrName: Wow! You're not kidding!
engSearchText: Wow! You're not kidding!
jpnChrName: うわぁ、本当だ！
jpnSearchText: うわぁ、本当だ！

engChrName: I think we should maybe talk to him. C'mon, let's chat him up!
engSearchText:
I think we should maybe talk to him. C'mon, let's
chat him up!
jpnChrName: 話しかけてみよっと～。
jpnSearchText: 話しかけてみよっと～。

engChrName: H-Hey, wait! I'm not ready to—
engSearchText: H-Hey, wait! I'm not ready to—
jpnChrName: ちょ、ちょっと……！
jpnSearchText: ちょ、ちょっと……！

engChrName: Hey, you. You're real easy on the eyes, you know. You some kind of rising movie star, by any chance?
engSearchText:
Hey, you. You're real easy on the eyes, you know.
You some kind of rising movie star, by any chance?
jpnChrName: お兄さん、すっごくカッコいいんだけど、 もしかして売り出し中の俳優さんとか？
jpnSearchText:
お兄さん、すっごくカッコいいんだけど、
もしかして売り出し中の俳優さんとか？

engChrName: What kind of movies do you act in, huh? Can I get your autograph?!
engSearchText:
What kind of movies do you act in, huh? Can I get
your autograph?!
jpnChrName: どんな映画に出てるの？ サインもらっていい～？
jpnSearchText:
どんな映画に出てるの？
サインもらっていい～？

engChrName: You're not too far off. I act, but not on the silver screen.
engSearchText:
You're not too far off. I act, but not on the
silver screen.
jpnChrName: アン、役者はやってるが、 別に映画俳優じゃねえな。
jpnSearchText:
アン、役者はやってるが、
別に映画俳優じゃねえな。

engChrName: You've got good taste in men, though, I'll give you that.
engSearchText:
You've got good taste in men, though, I'll give
you that.
jpnChrName: だがまぁ、見る目あるじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: だがまぁ、見る目あるじゃねえか。

engChrName: Eeek! He just complimented me! I think I'm about to die!
engSearchText:
Eeek! He just complimented me! I think I'm about
to die!
jpnChrName: うふふ、褒められちゃった～。
jpnSearchText: うふふ、褒められちゃった～。

engChrName: You busy right now by any chance, hot stuff? We should go get some drinks! I know a good place around here, you'll love it!
engSearchText:
You busy right now by any chance, hot stuff?
We should go get some drinks! I know a good place
around here, you'll love it!
jpnChrName: ねえねえ、これから一緒にお茶しよ～よ！ いいところ知ってるよ？
jpnSearchText:
ねえねえ、これから一緒にお茶しよ～よ！
いいところ知ってるよ？

engChrName: Umm, actually...
engSearchText: Umm, actually...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: Sorry to burst your bubble, but he's with us. We're all on the clock right now, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
Sorry to burst your bubble, but he's with us. We're all
on the clock right now, as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: 悪いがそいつは俺たちの連れだ。 今はまだ仕事中でな。
jpnSearchText:
悪いがそいつは俺たちの連れだ。
今はまだ仕事中でな。

engChrName: Oho! You're not half bad yourself, tough guy! Even if you're not really my type.
engSearchText:
Oho! You're not half bad yourself, tough guy! Even if
you're not really my type.
jpnChrName: あら、オジサンも悪くないみたい、 あたしの趣味じゃないけど。
jpnSearchText:
あら、オジサンも悪くないみたい、
あたしの趣味じゃないけど。

engChrName: What do you think, hon? Aren't you into old daddies like him?
engSearchText:
What do you think, hon? Aren't you into old daddies
like him?
jpnChrName: ねえ、あんたのタイプじゃない？
jpnSearchText: ねえ、あんたのタイプじゃない？

engChrName: Yeah, he's pretty all right... Wait, stop distracting me! So what if he's prime daddy material? Didn't you just hear what he said?
engSearchText:
Yeah, he's pretty all right... Wait, stop distracting me!
So what if he's prime daddy material? Didn't you just
hear what he said?
jpnChrName: 確かに悪くないかも…… って、そういう問題じゃなくって！
jpnSearchText:
確かに悪くないかも……
って、そういう問題じゃなくって！

engChrName: ...I am NOT a 'daddy'! I'm only twenty-four, damn it!
engSearchText: ...I am NOT a 'daddy'! I'm only twenty-four, damn it!
jpnChrName: 俺はまだ２４だ！
jpnSearchText: 俺はまだ２４だ！

engChrName: Ugh, forget it. If you two're lookin' to hook up, go hit up some other guys. We got work to do.
engSearchText:
Ugh, forget it. If you two're lookin' to hook up, go hit
up some other guys. We got work to do.
jpnChrName: ったく、とにかく 遊びの誘いなら他を当たってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ったく、とにかく
遊びの誘いなら他を当たってくれ。

engChrName: You heard Papa Bear. Tell you what, though. If we bump into each other later, I'm game to chill with you ladies. Sound good?
engSearchText:
You heard Papa Bear. Tell you what, though. If we
bump into each other later, I'm game to chill with
you ladies. Sound good?
jpnChrName: ま、そういうこった。 暇な時にまた会ったら一緒に遊ぼうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、そういうこった。
暇な時にまた会ったら一緒に遊ぼうぜ。

engChrName: Aww, but I wanna go out now...
engSearchText: Aww, but I wanna go out now...
jpnChrName: ええ～、そんな……
jpnSearchText: ええ～、そんな……

engChrName: I am SO sorry about her ambushing you guys like that.
engSearchText:
I am SO sorry about her ambushing you guys
like that.
jpnChrName: すみません、いきなりこんな……
jpnSearchText: すみません、いきなりこんな……

engChrName: You need to chill out, girl! This is exactly why I told you not to drink in the middle of the day, because you get like this!
engSearchText:
You need to chill out, girl! This is exactly why I told
you not to drink in the middle of the day, because you
get like this!
jpnChrName: あんたちょっとはしゃぎ過ぎよ、 だから昼間は飲むなって言ったのに。
jpnSearchText:
あんたちょっとはしゃぎ過ぎよ、
だから昼間は飲むなって言ったのに。

engChrName: Oh, give it a rest. I haven't had THAT much, really!
engSearchText: Oh, give it a rest. I haven't had THAT much, really!
jpnChrName: そんなに飲んでないもん、 本当だって～！
jpnSearchText:
そんなに飲んでないもん、
本当だって～！

engChrName: Sure you haven't, and your breath smells like a bed of roses. Come on, let's leave them alone already.
engSearchText:
Sure you haven't, and your breath smells like a bed
of roses. Come on, let's leave them alone already.
jpnChrName: はいはい、もう行きましょう。
jpnSearchText: はいはい、もう行きましょう。

engChrName: Hey, I think one of you dropped something!
engSearchText: Hey, I think one of you dropped something!
jpnChrName: あ、何か落としましたよっ。
jpnSearchText: あ、何か落としましたよっ。

engChrName: Ack, I can't believe I did that! Thanks, sweetheart. I owe you one.
engSearchText:
Ack, I can't believe I did that! Thanks, sweetheart.
I owe you one.
jpnChrName: わわっ、うっかり…… ありがと～お嬢ちゃん。
jpnSearchText:
わわっ、うっかり……
ありがと～お嬢ちゃん。

engChrName: What is that thing, anyway? I've been seeing it around town since we got here.
engSearchText:
What is that thing, anyway? I've been seeing it
around town since we got here.
jpnChrName: サルバッドに入ってから何回も 見かけましたが、これは何ですか？
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドに入ってから何回も
見かけましたが、これは何ですか？

engChrName: It looks like it's for...smoking something.
engSearchText: It looks like it's for...smoking something.
jpnChrName: 普通のタバコと違うみたいですけど……
jpnSearchText: 普通のタバコと違うみたいですけど……

engChrName: Yup! This is what they call an orbal hookah.
engSearchText: Yup! This is what they call an orbal hookah.
jpnChrName: これはねぇ、導力シーシャって言うの。
jpnSearchText: これはねぇ、導力シーシャって言うの。

engChrName: A hookah? This is one of the things they sell in the bazaar, right?
engSearchText:
A hookah? This is one of the things they sell in the
bazaar, right?
jpnChrName: シーシャって、露店にも出ていたあの……？
jpnSearchText: シーシャって、露店にも出ていたあの……？

engChrName: Yep. I guess these orbal models are 'in' around here nowadays. They're great! All the fun of a hookah pipe, and it's extra portable!
engSearchText:
Yep. I guess these orbal models are 'in' around
here nowadays. They're great! All the fun of a hookah
pipe, and it's extra portable!
jpnChrName: ここ最近流行ってるらしくてね。 コンパクトにシーシャを楽しめる優れものよ。
jpnSearchText:
ここ最近流行ってるらしくてね。
コンパクトにシーシャを楽しめる優れものよ。

engChrName: You girls wanna try a puff or two? I'll let you.
engSearchText: You girls wanna try a puff or two? I'll let you.
jpnChrName: お嬢ちゃんたちも試してみる？　な～んて。
jpnSearchText: お嬢ちゃんたちも試してみる？　な～んて。

engChrName: Er...
engSearchText: Er...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: We'll pass. We're underage.
engSearchText: We'll pass. We're underage.
jpnChrName: 遠慮しておきます、未成年ですし。
jpnSearchText: 遠慮しておきます、未成年ですし。

engChrName: Are you CRAZY?! Your dumb ass just tried to get these kids to smoke! Think for a sec!
engSearchText:
Are you CRAZY?! Your dumb ass just tried to get
these kids to smoke! Think for a sec!
jpnChrName: ちょっとあんた、子供になにを薦めてるの！
jpnSearchText: ちょっとあんた、子供になにを薦めてるの！

engChrName: I really am sorry about her, I swear. Come on, let's get it and go already. You've caused enough trouble.
engSearchText:
I really am sorry about her, I swear. Come on, let's get
it and go already. You've caused enough trouble.
jpnChrName: 本当にごめんなさいね。 ほら、早く拾って行くよ。
jpnSearchText:
本当にごめんなさいね。
ほら、早く拾って行くよ。

engChrName: That woman definitely seems to know how to have, uh, a good time, I guess.
engSearchText:
That woman definitely seems to know how to have,
uh, a good time, I guess.
jpnChrName: なんだかテンションが高い方でしたね……
jpnSearchText: なんだかテンションが高い方でしたね……

engChrName: Booze'll do that to you. Man, wish I could get shitfaced during the day... Lucky girl.
engSearchText:
Booze'll do that to you. Man, wish I could get
shitfaced during the day... Lucky girl.
jpnChrName: 酒も入ってたみたいだな。 ったく昼間っから羨ましい限りだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
酒も入ってたみたいだな。
ったく昼間っから羨ましい限りだぜ。

engChrName: It's festival season. We're bound to run into tourists living it up.
engSearchText:
It's festival season. We're bound to run into tourists
living it up.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の前だしな。 浮ついてんのは当然ってところだろう。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の前だしな。
浮ついてんのは当然ってところだろう。

engChrName: (That being said, there's somethin' else that smells about this, and it's not that woman's breath...)
engSearchText:
(That being said, there's somethin' else that smells
about this, and it's not that woman's breath...)
jpnChrName: （だが……何か匂いやがるな。）
jpnSearchText: （だが……何か匂いやがるな。）

engChrName: You're horrible, Dingo!
engSearchText: You're horrible, Dingo!
jpnChrName: ひどいですよディンゴさん！
jpnSearchText: ひどいですよディンゴさん！

engChrName: You told me you were still in Edith, and now here you are, trying to sneak off on me!
engSearchText:
You told me you were still in Edith, and now here
you are, trying to sneak off on me!
jpnChrName: 今日はまだ首都にいるって言ったのに 一人こっそりサルバッドに来てたなんて！
jpnSearchText:
今日はまだ首都にいるって言ったのに
一人こっそりサルバッドに来てたなんて！

engChrName: And? I'm telling you, there's no reason for you to come all the way out here.
engSearchText:
And? I'm telling you, there's no reason for you to
come all the way out here.
jpnChrName: だからってお前がサルバッドまで 来ることはないだろう……
jpnSearchText:
だからってお前がサルバッドまで
来ることはないだろう……

engChrName: Doesn't Tyrell keep its reporters on a pretty tight leash?
engSearchText:
Doesn't Tyrell keep its reporters on a pretty
tight leash?
jpnChrName: タイレルはウチほど フリーダムじゃないと思うが？
jpnSearchText:
タイレルはウチほど
フリーダムじゃないと思うが？

engChrName: Oh, don't you worry, I came prepared!
engSearchText: Oh, don't you worry, I came prepared!
jpnChrName: フフン、そこは抜かりありません！
jpnSearchText: フフン、そこは抜かりありません！

engChrName: I got permission from my EIC to scout out the film festival and do a write-up about it.
engSearchText:
I got permission from my EIC to scout out the film
festival and do a write-up about it.
jpnChrName: ちゃんと編集長から映画祭を取材してくる 許可を取ったんですから。
jpnSearchText:
ちゃんと編集長から映画祭を取材してくる
許可を取ったんですから。

engChrName: Not to mention, the reporter originally slated to handle the festival had something come up, so somebody needed to be here, anyway!
engSearchText:
Not to mention, the reporter originally slated to
handle the festival had something come up, so
somebody needed to be here, anyway!
jpnChrName: ちょうど映画祭を担当する予定の人が 別件が入ったみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
ちょうど映画祭を担当する予定の人が
別件が入ったみたいで。

engChrName: ...It should be illegal to have the kind of luck you do.
engSearchText: ...It should be illegal to have the kind of luck you do.
jpnChrName: 本当に運がいいなお前は……
jpnSearchText: 本当に運がいいなお前は……

engChrName: Least it explains why you're here two days before the big event.
engSearchText:
Least it explains why you're here two days before the
big event.
jpnChrName: なんだ、わざわざ２日早く来たのは そういうことだったのか。
jpnSearchText:
なんだ、わざわざ２日早く来たのは
そういうことだったのか。

engChrName: Hey, it's the spriggan again! What the heck are you guys doing here?!
engSearchText:
Hey, it's the spriggan again! What the heck are you
guys doing here?!
jpnChrName: ああっ、裏解決屋の……貴方たちまで！？
jpnSearchText: ああっ、裏解決屋の……貴方たちまで！？

engChrName: You're getting distracted. Listen, I'm not lying. I am here on personal business, even if it hasn't gotten me anywhere yet.
engSearchText:
You're getting distracted. Listen, I'm not lying. I am
here on personal business, even if it hasn't gotten me
anywhere yet.
jpnChrName: “私用”のために来たのも本当だ。 まだロクな成果もないがな。
jpnSearchText:
“私用”のために来たのも本当だ。
まだロクな成果もないがな。

engChrName: As for you guys, I see you've got more help than ever. That new girl of yours looks pretty capable, too.
engSearchText:
As for you guys, I see you've got more help than ever.
That new girl of yours looks pretty capable, too.
jpnChrName: ……また人手が増えたのか。 それもただ者じゃない感じだな。
jpnSearchText:
……また人手が増えたのか。
それもただ者じゃない感じだな。

engChrName: You flatter me. Please, call me Risette Twinings. I am a concierge working on dispatch from Marduk Total Security Company.
engSearchText:
You flatter me. Please, call me Risette Twinings. I am
a concierge working on dispatch from Marduk Total
Security Company.
jpnChrName: 《マルドゥック社》の出向ＳＣ、 リゼット・トワイニングと申します。
jpnSearchText:
《マルドゥック社》の出向ＳＣ、
リゼット・トワイニングと申します。

engChrName: It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
engSearchText: It's a pleasure to make your acquaintance.
jpnChrName: 今後ともお見知りおきを。
jpnSearchText: 今後ともお見知りおきを。

engChrName: Marduk? As in that—
engSearchText: Marduk? As in that—
jpnChrName: マルドゥックというとあの……？
jpnSearchText: マルドゥックというとあの……？

engChrName: Dingo, quit trying to change the subject! I'm not finished with you!
engSearchText:
Dingo, quit trying to change the subject! I'm not
finished with you!
jpnChrName: ディンゴさんっ、話は終わってません！
jpnSearchText: ディンゴさんっ、話は終わってません！

engChrName: You still haven't told me what this 'personal business' of yours is! Now fess up!
engSearchText:
You still haven't told me what this 'personal business'
of yours is! Now fess up!
jpnChrName: ですからその“私用”が一体 何なのか教えてください！
jpnSearchText:
ですからその“私用”が一体
何なのか教えてください！

engChrName: You know I'll be more than happy to help you with it!
engSearchText: You know I'll be more than happy to help you with it!
jpnChrName: 私も手伝いますから！
jpnSearchText: 私も手伝いますから！

engChrName: What about 'personal business' don't you understand? I told you, I'm fine.
engSearchText:
What about 'personal business' don't you understand?
I told you, I'm fine.
jpnChrName: それには及ばないと言ったはずだ。
jpnSearchText: それには及ばないと言ったはずだ。

engChrName: But why not? I'm growing as a reporter! I can handle myself!
engSearchText:
But why not? I'm growing as a reporter! I can
handle myself!
jpnChrName: どうしてですか！ 私も少しは成長したはずです！
jpnSearchText:
どうしてですか！
私も少しは成長したはずです！

engChrName: For starters, it's not exactly a good look, roping in a reporter working for someone else to pitch in on my work.
engSearchText:
For starters, it's not exactly a good look, roping in a
reporter working for someone else to pitch in on
my work.
jpnChrName: そもそも他社の人間に手伝わせる わけにもいかないからな。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも他社の人間に手伝わせる
わけにもいかないからな。

engChrName: So what? I don't care about that!
engSearchText: So what? I don't care about that!
jpnChrName: 関係ありません！
jpnSearchText: 関係ありません！

engChrName: Besides, you helped save me before! It's only fair I repay the favor.
engSearchText:
Besides, you helped save me before! It's only fair I
repay the favor.
jpnChrName: 前にディンゴさんも私を 助けてくれたじゃないですか！
jpnSearchText:
前にディンゴさんも私を
助けてくれたじゃないですか！

engChrName: Sounds like our man's trying to keep this business under wraps. He must be doing a piece on... unseemly things.
engSearchText:
Sounds like our man's trying to keep this business
under wraps. He must be doing a piece on...
unseemly things.
jpnChrName: そこまで隠すってことはあれか、私用ってのは いかがわしい店の体験レポートだな？
jpnSearchText:
そこまで隠すってことはあれか、私用ってのは
いかがわしい店の体験レポートだな？

engChrName: WHAT?! Th-That can't be it! ...Could it?
engSearchText:
WHAT?! Th-That can't be it!
...Could it?
jpnChrName: ええええっ……！？ そ、そういうのはちょっと……
jpnSearchText:
ええええっ……！？
そ、そういうのはちょっと……

engChrName: What do you mean, 'unseemly'?
engSearchText: What do you mean, 'unseemly'?
jpnChrName: いかがわしい店というと……？
jpnSearchText: いかがわしい店というと……？

engChrName: Aaron, now look what you've done.
engSearchText: Aaron, now look what you've done.
jpnChrName: ちょっとアーロンさん……
jpnSearchText: ちょっとアーロンさん……

engChrName: I can't believe you'd report on something so despicable! This is exactly why you need to change, and I'm the girl who's gonna make it happen!
engSearchText:
I can't believe you'd report on something
so despicable! This is exactly why you need to change,
and I'm the girl who's gonna make it happen!
jpnChrName: そんな取材をするなんて…… やっぱり私がディンゴさんを矯正しなきゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
そんな取材をするなんて……
やっぱり私がディンゴさんを矯正しなきゃ……！

engChrName: Well, glad we got all that sorted out! Anyway, we'll be heading out now.
engSearchText:
Well, glad we got all that sorted out! Anyway, we'll be
heading out now.
jpnChrName: まあ、話がまとまった所で、 俺たちはもう行くぜ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、話がまとまった所で、
俺たちはもう行くぜ。

engChrName: (We haven't sorted out anything!)
engSearchText: (We haven't sorted out anything!)
jpnChrName: （全然まとまってないような……）
jpnSearchText: （全然まとまってないような……）

engChrName: (Trying to bounce real quick, eh?)
engSearchText: (Trying to bounce real quick, eh?)
jpnChrName: （逃げるつもりだなこいつ？）
jpnSearchText: （逃げるつもりだなこいつ？）

engChrName: Damn it, look at all the trouble you guys have stirred up now.
engSearchText:
Damn it, look at all the trouble you guys have stirred
up now.
jpnChrName: やれやれ、かき回しておいて……
jpnSearchText: やれやれ、かき回しておいて……

engChrName: ...Oh, whatever. If I find anything out, I'll hit you up.
engSearchText: ...Oh, whatever. If I find anything out, I'll hit you up.
jpnChrName: ……まあいい、何かあったら連絡する。
jpnSearchText: ……まあいい、何かあったら連絡する。

engChrName: Sounds good to me. Good luck with your investigating, you two.
engSearchText:
Sounds good to me. Good luck with your
investigating, you two.
jpnChrName: そんじゃ、二人とも 取材頑張ってな。
jpnSearchText:
そんじゃ、二人とも
取材頑張ってな。

engChrName: Oh, hey, everyone! Good morning! Nice to see you.
engSearchText: Oh, hey, everyone! Good morning! Nice to see you.
jpnChrName: あら、皆さん、 おはようございます。
jpnSearchText:
あら、皆さん、
おはようございます。

engChrName: Good to see you, too. You seem real perky today. You guys sleep well after a tiring night?
engSearchText:
Good to see you, too. You seem real perky today.
You guys sleep well after a tiring night?
jpnChrName: おはよう、元気そうで何よりだ。 昨夜は疲れてたみたいだがよく眠れたか？
jpnSearchText:
おはよう、元気そうで何よりだ。
昨夜は疲れてたみたいだがよく眠れたか？

engChrName: If anyone's tired, I bet it's old Lanster there. You look like you pulled an all-nighter.
engSearchText:
If anyone's tired, I bet it's old Lanster there. You look
like you pulled an all-nighter.
jpnChrName: ランスターの方は夜更かしでも してたっぽい顔してるけどなァ？
jpnSearchText:
ランスターの方は夜更かしでも
してたっぽい顔してるけどなァ？

engChrName: I...have no idea what you're talking about! I'm as full of energy as I always am! Believe it!
engSearchText:
I...have no idea what you're talking about! I'm as full
of energy as I always am! Believe it!
jpnChrName: な、なんのことぉ～？ あたしは見ての通りめちゃくちゃ元気だけど。
jpnSearchText:
な、なんのことぉ～？
あたしは見ての通りめちゃくちゃ元気だけど。

engChrName: If you say so. Good to hear you're keeping well rested.
engSearchText: If you say so. Good to hear you're keeping well rested.
jpnChrName: あー、そいつは何よりだ。
jpnSearchText: あー、そいつは何よりだ。

engChrName: Umm, anyway, are you two going somewhere?
engSearchText: Umm, anyway, are you two going somewhere?
jpnChrName: えっと、ニナさんたちは これからお出かけですか？
jpnSearchText:
えっと、ニナさんたちは
これからお出かけですか？

engChrName: Yeah, we're meeting with Saara and some other people over at Vegas Films to discuss the parade.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're meeting with Saara and some other
people over at Vegas Films to discuss the parade.
jpnChrName: はい、ベガスフィルムへ。 例のサァラさんも含めてパレードの打ち合わせなんです。
jpnSearchText:
はい、ベガスフィルムへ。
例のサァラさんも含めてパレードの打ち合わせなんです。

engChrName: After that, we've got a basic rehearsal scheduled, which is looking like it will take a while.
engSearchText:
After that, we've got a basic rehearsal scheduled,
which is looking like it will take a while.
jpnChrName: その後は簡単なリハーサルも予定されて いますから、かなり時間が掛かりそうで……
jpnSearchText:
その後は簡単なリハーサルも予定されて
いますから、かなり時間が掛かりそうで……

engChrName: That sounds tough. Hang in there, girls! I'm sure the parade's gonna be great!
engSearchText:
That sounds tough. Hang in there, girls! I'm sure the
parade's gonna be great!
jpnChrName: 大変なんですね。 明日、楽しみです！
jpnSearchText:
大変なんですね。
明日、楽しみです！

engChrName: Aww, thank you, Feri.
engSearchText: Aww, thank you, Feri.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: All of that is to say that we're going to have our hands full all day and won't be able to do much else.
engSearchText:
All of that is to say that we're going to have our hands
full all day and won't be able to do much else.
jpnChrName: とにかくそういうわけで、 あたしたちは今日一杯は動けないわ。
jpnSearchText:
とにかくそういうわけで、
あたしたちは今日一杯は動けないわ。

engChrName: We'd better see you guys start to deliver some results today, understand?
engSearchText:
We'd better see you guys start to deliver some results
today, understand?
jpnChrName: 依頼の件もある程度目処は付けてよね？
jpnSearchText: 依頼の件もある程度目処は付けてよね？

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, we'll come through.
engSearchText: Yeah, yeah, we'll come through.
jpnChrName: 分かってるって。
jpnSearchText: 分かってるって。

engChrName: We'll be careful not to do anything that'll attract the attention of, oh, I don't know, local vigilantes. You've got nothing to fear.
engSearchText:
We'll be careful not to do anything that'll attract the
attention of, oh, I don't know, local vigilantes.
You've got nothing to fear.
jpnChrName: どこかの都市伝説が見かねて勝手に手を出して 来ねぇようにするから、とりあえず任せとけ。
jpnSearchText:
どこかの都市伝説が見かねて勝手に手を出して
来ねぇようにするから、とりあえず任せとけ。

engChrName: (Just had to say it, huh?)
engSearchText: (Just had to say it, huh?)

engChrName: (Huh?)
engSearchText: (Huh?)

engChrName: Gahaha, hello, everyone! What's going on? How's everyone doing?
engSearchText:
Gahaha, hello, everyone! What's going on?
How's everyone doing?
jpnChrName: ガッハッハッ、調子はどうかね！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ガッハッハッ、調子はどうかね！

engChrName: Oh, hello, director. We're doing great, thanks.
engSearchText: Oh, hello, director. We're doing great, thanks.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督。 お陰様で万全です。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督。
お陰様で万全です。

engChrName: Well, at least physically. Mentally...I've been better. *sigh*
engSearchText:
Well, at least physically. Mentally...I've been better.
*sigh*
jpnChrName: ふう、少なくとも体調の方はね。
jpnSearchText: ふう、少なくとも体調の方はね。

engChrName: I'll take it! You girls better be feeling great, because with an itinerary this good, tomorrow's parade will be the best in history!
engSearchText:
I'll take it! You girls better be feeling great, because
with an itinerary this good, tomorrow's parade will be
the best in history!
jpnChrName: それは上々！　パレードのプランも固まったし、 明日は最高の盛り上がり間違いなしじゃ！
jpnSearchText:
それは上々！　パレードのプランも固まったし、
明日は最高の盛り上がり間違いなしじゃ！

engChrName: Sounds like you got some exciting stuff in store. What have y'all got cookin', exactly?
engSearchText:
Sounds like you got some exciting stuff in store.
What have y'all got cookin', exactly?
jpnChrName: へえ、ちなみにどういうプランなんですか？
jpnSearchText: へえ、ちなみにどういうプランなんですか？

engChrName: First, the parade will be going through the Cultural and Entertainment Districts before stopping at the hotel for the award reception.
engSearchText:
First, the parade will be going through the Cultural
and Entertainment Districts before stopping at the
hotel for the award reception.
jpnChrName: 伝統地区と歓楽街をパレードし、最後に 授賞式会場であるアルジュメイラホテルに到着──
jpnSearchText:
伝統地区と歓楽街をパレードし、最後に
授賞式会場であるアルジュメイラホテルに到着──

engChrName: Then, the winners will be picked up and the whole thing will go back exactly the way it came.
engSearchText:
Then, the winners will be picked up and the whole
thing will go back exactly the way it came.
jpnChrName: 受賞者を中へ送ってまた折り返すというコースじゃ。
jpnSearchText: 受賞者を中へ送ってまた折り返すというコースじゃ。

engChrName: But that's all you'll be getting out of me. I can't be spoiling all of the surprises, now!
engSearchText:
But that's all you'll be getting out of me. I can't be
spoiling all of the surprises, now!
jpnChrName: ま、適度なネタバレは期待を誘うが、 過度なものは宜しくない。
jpnSearchText:
ま、適度なネタバレは期待を誘うが、
過度なものは宜しくない。

engChrName: You'll just have to see for yourself what we have in store as it all unfolds.
engSearchText:
You'll just have to see for yourself what we have in
store as it all unfolds.
jpnChrName: 後は明日、その目で確かめるといいじゃろ。
jpnSearchText: 後は明日、その目で確かめるといいじゃろ。

engChrName: Although I WILL say the performers will be decked out in outfits made sexy by me personally. You're gonna love 'em, trust me on this!
engSearchText:
Although I WILL say the performers will be decked
out in outfits made sexy by me personally.
You're gonna love 'em, trust me on this!
jpnChrName: 出演者たちにはワシが特別に用意させたセクシーな 衣装を纏ってもらうから大いに期待していいぞ！
jpnSearchText:
出演者たちにはワシが特別に用意させたセクシーな
衣装を纏ってもらうから大いに期待していいぞ！

engChrName: Sexy outfits? You mean it's gonna be a grownup parade?!
engSearchText:
Sexy outfits? You mean it's gonna be a
grownup parade?!
jpnChrName: セクシーな衣装…… 大人のパレードですか……！
jpnSearchText:
セクシーな衣装……
大人のパレードですか……！

engChrName: It had better not be anything too revealing, or else my agency is going to have a serious problem with it...
engSearchText:
It had better not be anything too revealing, or else my
agency is going to have a serious problem with it...
jpnChrName: 私は事務所の方針であまり 際どいのはＮＧですけど。
jpnSearchText:
私は事務所の方針であまり
際どいのはＮＧですけど。

engChrName: Anyway! There's still a handful of things left to hammer out, but we have the shape of it ready.
engSearchText:
Anyway! There's still a handful of things left to
hammer out, but we have the shape of it ready.
jpnChrName: ふむ、少し未確定事項が残っているが…… 核となるものはもう定まった。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ、少し未確定事項が残っているが……
核となるものはもう定まった。

engChrName: Especially now that we've got Saara with us! That woman is going to be the perfect star!
engSearchText:
Especially now that we've got Saara with us!
That woman is going to be the perfect star!
jpnChrName: 昨日サァラ嬢を見つけたことでな！
jpnSearchText: 昨日サァラ嬢を見つけたことでな！

engChrName: She'll be a perfect beacon for just how diverse our republic really is.
engSearchText:
She'll be a perfect beacon for just how diverse our
republic really is.
jpnChrName: 彼女の起用によって共和国の多様性が 遺憾なく表現されるだろう。
jpnSearchText:
彼女の起用によって共和国の多様性が
遺憾なく表現されるだろう。

engChrName: Eros runs in the blood of all humans. Our shared sensuality can transcend race and culture, bringing our species to new heights!
engSearchText:
Eros runs in the blood of all humans. Our shared
sensuality can transcend race and culture, bringing
our species to new heights!
jpnChrName: “エロス”という人類共通のテーマを通じて、 魂と魂が文化や人種の違いを越え共鳴し昇華する！
jpnSearchText:
“エロス”という人類共通のテーマを通じて、
魂と魂が文化や人種の違いを越え共鳴し昇華する！

engChrName: There's only one man in Zemuria who can pull off this show to end all shows, and it's me, baby! The one, the only, Salvatore Gotti!
engSearchText:
There's only one man in Zemuria who can pull off
this show to end all shows, and it's me, baby!
The one, the only, Salvatore Gotti!
jpnChrName: まさにこのサルバトーレ・ゴッチしか実現し得ない 究極のエンターテインメントを見せるぞ！
jpnSearchText:
まさにこのサルバトーレ・ゴッチしか実現し得ない
究極のエンターテインメントを見せるぞ！

engChrName: Gahahaha!
engSearchText: Gahahaha!
jpnChrName: ガッハッハッハッ！！
jpnSearchText: <S5>ガッハッハッハッ！！

engChrName: ...Is Saara going to be okay? I'm starting to worry, now...
engSearchText:
...Is Saara going to be okay? I'm starting to
worry, now...
jpnChrName: なんだかサァラさんのことが 心配になってきました……
jpnSearchText:
なんだかサァラさんのことが
心配になってきました……

engChrName: Don't worry. For all his talk, he's got his head on straight. Kind of. He won't try to cross any lines with her...probably.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. For all his talk, he's got his head
on straight. Kind of. He won't try to cross any lines
with her...probably.
jpnChrName: こんなんでも一応弁えてる人だし、 ちゃんと線引きはしてくれるでしょう……多分。
jpnSearchText:
こんなんでも一応弁えてる人だし、
ちゃんと線引きはしてくれるでしょう……多分。

engChrName: And on the off-chance he does do something dumb, you can bet I'll kick his ass to the curb, so, don't worry, it's cool.
engSearchText:
And on the off-chance he does do something dumb,
you can bet I'll kick his ass to the curb, so, don't
worry, it's cool.
jpnChrName: まあ、いざとなったらあたしたちが止めるから 心配しなくていいわ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、いざとなったらあたしたちが止めるから
心配しなくていいわ。

engChrName: Oh! Yes! Before I forget, you two ladies had better not forget to practice your award speeches.
engSearchText:
Oh! Yes! Before I forget, you two ladies had better
not forget to practice your award speeches.
jpnChrName: そうそう、二人とも受賞スピーチの 練習を忘れるんじゃないぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そうそう、二人とも受賞スピーチの
練習を忘れるんじゃないぞ。

engChrName: Even I don't know which of you is going to take the crown as best actress! It'll be a surprise to all of us! Gahaha!
engSearchText:
Even I don't know which of you is going to take the
crown as best actress! It'll be a surprise to all of us!
Gahaha!
jpnChrName: どっちが最優秀女優賞を獲るか、 ワシも楽しみだ、ガッハッハッ！
jpnSearchText:
どっちが最優秀女優賞を獲るか、
ワシも楽しみだ、ガッハッハッ！

engChrName: Huh. They haven't posted the results ahead of time somewhere?
engSearchText:
Huh. They haven't posted the results ahead of
time somewhere?
jpnChrName: なんだ、まだ結果が出てねえのか？
jpnSearchText: なんだ、まだ結果が出てねえのか？

engChrName: Oh, absolutely not. They're set to be revealed during the film festival. None of us nominees know who's going to win or get runner-up.
engSearchText:
Oh, absolutely not. They're set to be revealed during
the film festival. None of us nominees know who's
going to win or get runner-up.
jpnChrName: 映画祭の本番の時に初めて発表されるんです。 受賞者にも事前のお知らせはないみたいで。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭の本番の時に初めて発表されるんです。
受賞者にも事前のお知らせはないみたいで。

engChrName: I like it this way. It's more exciting not knowing. I'm just glad we get to square off again like we did at last year's festival. Right, Nina?
engSearchText:
I like it this way. It's more exciting not knowing.
I'm just glad we get to square off again like we did at
last year's festival. Right, Nina?
jpnChrName: ふふ、その方が面白いじゃない。 去年の映画祭に続いて勝負ね！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、その方が面白いじゃない。
去年の映画祭に続いて勝負ね！

engChrName: You bet! You're going down, Judith!
engSearchText: You bet! You're going down, Judith!
jpnChrName: ええ、私も負けません！
jpnSearchText: ええ、私も負けません！

engChrName: Those two make for fine rivals, don't they?
engSearchText: Those two make for fine rivals, don't they?
jpnChrName: 素敵なライバル関係ですね。
jpnSearchText: 素敵なライバル関係ですね。

engChrName: They really do! It's like they shine together!
engSearchText: They really do! It's like they shine together!
jpnChrName: はい、お二人とも輝いています！
jpnSearchText: はい、お二人とも輝いています！

engChrName: Anyway, to our meeting! We'll get it done quickly and get back to practice!
engSearchText:
Anyway, to our meeting! We'll get it done quickly
and get back to practice!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ打ち合わせと行くか！ ライブ感が重要ゆえ最低限だがな！
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ打ち合わせと行くか！
ライブ感が重要ゆえ最低限だがな！

engChrName: Yeah, we'd better get going. Break a leg, guys.
engSearchText: Yeah, we'd better get going. Break a leg, guys.
jpnChrName: そっちは任せたわよ。
jpnSearchText: そっちは任せたわよ。

engChrName: See you all later tonight.
engSearchText: See you all later tonight.
jpnChrName: では、また夜に。
jpnSearchText: では、また夜に。

engChrName: At least one of those girls has got her act together— unlike a certain bondage bimbo.
engSearchText:
At least one of those girls has got her act together—
unlike a certain bondage bimbo.
jpnChrName: ハン、出来た小娘だな。 痴女の方と違って。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、出来た小娘だな。
痴女の方と違って。

engChrName: What? Who are you...?
engSearchText: What? Who are you...?
jpnChrName: ええっと……？
jpnSearchText: ええっと……？

engChrName: Hey, wait, didn't Mr. Gotti have a request for us, too? Oh, crap!
engSearchText:
Hey, wait, didn't Mr. Gotti have a request for us, too?
Oh, crap!
jpnChrName: あっ、そういえば 監督からの依頼があったんじゃ……！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、そういえば
監督からの依頼があったんじゃ……！

engChrName: You're right. He still needs to fill us in on what he wants.
engSearchText:
You're right. He still needs to fill us in on what
he wants.
jpnChrName: そういえばまだ詳細を聞いてなかったな……
jpnSearchText: そういえばまだ詳細を聞いてなかったな……

engChrName: Guess we're paying a trip to Vegas Films later, too.
engSearchText: Guess we're paying a trip to Vegas Films later, too.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねぇ……後でベガスフィルムにも 寄ってくか。
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねぇ……後でベガスフィルムにも
寄ってくか。

engChrName: You guys! You showed up at the perfect time.
engSearchText: You guys! You showed up at the perfect time.
jpnChrName: あっ貴方たち、ちょうどいいところに！
jpnSearchText: あっ貴方たち、ちょうどいいところに！

engChrName: Hey, look, it's that little reporter girl again.
engSearchText: Hey, look, it's that little reporter girl again.
jpnChrName: またあの小娘かよ。
jpnSearchText: またあの小娘かよ。

engChrName: That 'little girl' is older than you, you know.
engSearchText: That 'little girl' is older than you, you know.
jpnChrName: だからお前よりは年上だろ。
jpnSearchText: だからお前よりは年上だろ。

engChrName: Physically, yeah, but mentally, I've seen newborns who were more mature than that chick.
engSearchText:
Physically, yeah, but mentally, I've seen newborns
who were more mature than that chick.
jpnChrName: 精神年齢が小娘だからいいんだよ。
jpnSearchText: 精神年齢が小娘だからいいんだよ。

engChrName: Ahaha, aww! Don't be mean.
engSearchText: Ahaha, aww! Don't be mean.
jpnChrName: あ、あはは……
jpnSearchText: あ、あはは……

engChrName: You're a reporter with the Tyrell Times, correct? Do you need something?
engSearchText:
You're a reporter with the Tyrell Times, correct?
Do you need something?
jpnChrName: 《タイレル通信》の記者の方でしたか。 何かご用でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
《タイレル通信》の記者の方でしたか。
何かご用でしょうか？

engChrName: Yeah, I just wanted to ask, uh... Have you guys seen Dingo recently?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I just wanted to ask, uh... Have you guys seen
Dingo recently?
jpnChrName: 実は少し聞きたいことが…… ディンゴさんを見かけませんでしたかっ？
jpnSearchText:
実は少し聞きたいことが……
ディンゴさんを見かけませんでしたかっ？

engChrName: I never did manage to get him to fess up to what he's actually doing here, so I was going to try to get an answer out of him again.
engSearchText:
I never did manage to get him to fess up to what he's
actually doing here, so I was going to try to get an
answer out of him again.
jpnChrName: 昨日は結局目的を聞き出せなかったから 今日またアタックしようとしたのに……
jpnSearchText:
昨日は結局目的を聞き出せなかったから
今日またアタックしようとしたのに……

engChrName: But I haven't seen him anywhere all morning! It's so frustrating! Mrrgrr!
engSearchText:
But I haven't seen him anywhere all morning! It's
so frustrating! Mrrgrr!
jpnChrName: 今朝からどこにも見当たらないんですっ！
jpnSearchText: 今朝からどこにも見当たらないんですっ！

engChrName: You sure he's not trying to avoid you? The way you hang on to him, frankly, I wouldn't blame him if he was.
engSearchText:
You sure he's not trying to avoid you? The way you
hang on to him, frankly, I wouldn't blame him if
he was.
jpnChrName: あんなに付きまとわれたら 避けるんじゃねえのか、普通は。
jpnSearchText:
あんなに付きまとわれたら
避けるんじゃねえのか、普通は。

engChrName: Excuse me?! I am NOT 'hanging on' to him like some needy high schooler! Have some respect!
engSearchText:
Excuse me?! I am NOT 'hanging on' to him like
some needy high schooler! Have some respect!
jpnChrName: つ、付きまとうなんて 人聞きの悪いこと言わないでくださいっ！
jpnSearchText:
つ、付きまとうなんて
人聞きの悪いこと言わないでくださいっ！

engChrName: I just...want to be with him, that's all. F-For work, I mean, of course!
engSearchText:
I just...want to be with him, that's all. F-For work, I
mean, of course!
jpnChrName: わたしは純粋にディンゴさんと一緒に…… じゃなくって、仕事のためです！
jpnSearchText:
わたしは純粋にディンゴさんと一緒に……
じゃなくって、仕事のためです！

engChrName: Besides, any reporter's got to be tenacious in order to get to the bottom of a story, right?
engSearchText:
Besides, any reporter's got to be tenacious in order to
get to the bottom of a story, right?
jpnChrName: 記者たるもの、 取材のためなら粘り強くあるべし！
jpnSearchText:
記者たるもの、
取材のためなら粘り強くあるべし！

engChrName: That's not clinginess. That's doing my job. If anything, I should be more persistent!
engSearchText:
That's not clinginess. That's doing my job.
If anything, I should be more persistent!
jpnChrName: あれくらいで付きまとうとは言いません、 むしろわたしはもっと積極的に動くべきです！
jpnSearchText:
あれくらいで付きまとうとは言いません、
むしろわたしはもっと積極的に動くべきです！

engChrName: That's...logic. Of a sort.
engSearchText: That's...logic. Of a sort.
jpnChrName: 開き直りやがった……
jpnSearchText: 開き直りやがった……

engChrName: I totally get you! It's like a hunter doing whatever it takes to track down their prey until they finally go in for the kill.
engSearchText:
I totally get you! It's like a hunter doing whatever it
takes to track down their prey until they finally go in
for the kill.
jpnChrName: なるほど、狙った獲物を狩るまで 根気強く追う狩人の流儀に似ていますね……
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、狙った獲物を狩るまで
根気強く追う狩人の流儀に似ていますね……

engChrName: You're one determined lady! I can respect that!
engSearchText: You're one determined lady! I can respect that!
jpnChrName: さすがです……！
jpnSearchText: さすがです……！

engChrName: I think that comparison may be a little off...
engSearchText: I think that comparison may be a little off...
jpnChrName: それはちょっと違うような……
jpnSearchText: それはちょっと違うような……

engChrName: Ahem. Point is, we haven't seen him and we have no idea what he's doing out here, either. Your guess is as good as ours.
engSearchText:
Ahem. Point is, we haven't seen him and we have no
idea what he's doing out here, either. Your guess is as
good as ours.
jpnChrName: そもそも生憎だが、俺も ディンゴの目的までは知らねえよ。
jpnSearchText:
そもそも生憎だが、俺も
ディンゴの目的までは知らねえよ。

engChrName: ...You're really sure about that? You're not pulling my leg, are you?
engSearchText:
...You're really sure about that? You're not pulling my
leg, are you?
jpnChrName: ……本当ですか？
jpnSearchText: ……本当ですか？

engChrName: Nah, I'm not. We're in town on our own assignment and just happened to bump into him while we were workin'.
engSearchText:
Nah, I'm not. We're in town on our own assignment
and just happened to bump into him while we
were workin'.
jpnChrName: 一応俺たちの仕事関連で来てる面もあるが、 あれはあくまでついでだしな。
jpnSearchText:
一応俺たちの仕事関連で来てる面もあるが、
あれはあくまでついでだしな。

engChrName: (Not that I have NO idea what he might be up to, but best to keep that to myself until I'm absolutely sure.)
engSearchText:
(Not that I have NO idea what he might be up to,
but best to keep that to myself until I'm
absolutely sure.)
jpnChrName: （心当たりがないわけでもねえが……   確証もないしな。）
jpnSearchText:
（心当たりがないわけでもねえが……
確証もないしな。）

engChrName: Mmm... Well, if you say so.
engSearchText: Mmm... Well, if you say so.
jpnChrName: うう、そうですか……
jpnSearchText: うう、そうですか……

engChrName: There's got to be some reason why he would be out here for this schlocky excuse for a film festival, but...what? I don't get it.
engSearchText:
There's got to be some reason why he would be out
here for this schlocky excuse for a film festival,
but...what? I don't get it.
jpnChrName: 映画祭という名ばかりの俗っぽいショーに 来たのには何か理由があるはずなのに……
jpnSearchText:
映画祭という名ばかりの俗っぽいショーに
来たのには何か理由があるはずなのに……

engChrName: If I recall, you weaseled your way into covering this 'schlock' so you'd have an excuse to come out here, too.
engSearchText:
If I recall, you weaseled your way into covering this
'schlock' so you'd have an excuse to come out
here, too.
jpnChrName: その俗っぽいショーにわざわざ理由を付けて 首都から取材に来たのはお前さんだろうが？
jpnSearchText:
その俗っぽいショーにわざわざ理由を付けて
首都から取材に来たのはお前さんだろうが？

engChrName: I don't know, dude's a pretty big stud, if you ask me. You sure he isn't shacked up with some actress or model?
engSearchText:
I don't know, dude's a pretty big stud, if you ask me.
You sure he isn't shacked up with some actress
or model?
jpnChrName: クク、結構な色男みてぇだし、単に 女優かモデルとデキてたりしてなァ？
jpnSearchText:
クク、結構な色男みてぇだし、単に
女優かモデルとデキてたりしてなァ？

engChrName: WHAT?! C-Could it be? Dingo s-s-SLEEPING with...
engSearchText:
WHAT?! C-Could it be? Dingo
s-s-SLEEPING with...
jpnChrName: な、なななな……！ ディンゴさんが…………
jpnSearchText:
な、なななな……！
ディンゴさんが…………

engChrName: Umm... This is just my opinion, but I don't think he's the kind of man who would—
engSearchText:
Umm... This is just my opinion, but I don't think he's
the kind of man who would—
jpnChrName: あの、いくらなんでも ディンゴさんがそんな事は……
jpnSearchText:
あの、いくらなんでも
ディンゴさんがそんな事は……

engChrName: No, I think it might be possible. Yeah, no, I did see him with a real foxy woman earlier...
engSearchText:
No, I think it might be possible. Yeah, no, I did see
him with a real foxy woman earlier...
jpnChrName: い、いえ、そういえば前にも 綺麗な女の人といたような……
jpnSearchText:
い、いえ、そういえば前にも
綺麗な女の人といたような……

engChrName: I can't take this sitting down! I've got to find Dingo and get to the bottom of this!
engSearchText:
I can't take this sitting down! I've got to find Dingo
and get to the bottom of this!
jpnChrName: やっぱりこうしてはいられません！ 早くディンゴさんを探さないとっ！
jpnSearchText:
やっぱりこうしてはいられません！
早くディンゴさんを探さないとっ！

engChrName: *sigh* Aaron, look at what you've done now. She's a boiling steam engine.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Aaron, look at what you've done now. She's a
boiling steam engine.
jpnChrName: もう、アーロンさん…… 少し煽り過ぎですよ。
jpnSearchText:
もう、アーロンさん……
少し煽り過ぎですよ。

engChrName: I feel kinda bad for her, to be honest.
engSearchText: I feel kinda bad for her, to be honest.
jpnChrName: 流石にちょっと可哀想です。
jpnSearchText: 流石にちょっと可哀想です。

engChrName: Eh, don't feel too sorry for her. I think this is hilarious.
engSearchText:
Eh, don't feel too sorry for her. I think this
is hilarious.
jpnChrName: クク、面白えからいいじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText: クク、面白えからいいじゃねーか。

engChrName: The whole thing's kind of sweet, at least. Certainly more so than your wisecracking ass.
engSearchText:
The whole thing's kind of sweet, at least.
Certainly more so than your wisecracking ass.
jpnChrName: ま、生意気なお前と比べりゃ 可愛いもんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、生意気なお前と比べりゃ
可愛いもんだがな。

engChrName: Hey, gumshoe. Any progress in your investigation?
engSearchText: Hey, gumshoe. Any progress in your investigation?
jpnChrName: 捜査に何か進展でもあったか？
jpnSearchText: 捜査に何か進展でもあったか？

engChrName: It's you again?
engSearchText: It's you again?
jpnChrName: って裏解決屋……！
jpnSearchText: って裏解決屋……！

engChrName: Where do you get off? What makes you think I have to tell you anything about how my work is going, huh?
engSearchText:
Where do you get off? What makes you think I have
to tell you anything about how my work is
going, huh?
jpnChrName: なんで捜査のことをお前らに 教えなきゃならないんだ！
jpnSearchText:
なんで捜査のことをお前らに
教えなきゃならないんだ！

engChrName: I mean, we were the first ones to find the dude. You can't act like we've got nothing to do with the case.
engSearchText:
I mean, we were the first ones to find the dude.
You can't act like we've got nothing to do with
the case.
jpnChrName: 一応第一発見者なんだぜ？ 無関係じゃねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
一応第一発見者なんだぜ？
無関係じゃねえだろ。

engChrName: Hmph. It's slow going. We still only know the name of our culprit, Melchior.
engSearchText:
Hmph. It's slow going. We still only know the name
of our culprit, Melchior.
jpnChrName: ……進展も何も、犯人が 自ら名乗っていたくらいだ。
jpnSearchText:
……進展も何も、犯人が
自ら名乗っていたくらいだ。

engChrName: And obviously, that's only because he wrote it himself.
engSearchText:
And obviously, that's only because he wrote
it himself.
jpnChrName: ──メルキオルってな。
jpnSearchText: ──メルキオルってな。

engChrName: That's a shame. Was hopin' you boys would've found some leads on where the scumbag might be lurkin', but guess not.
engSearchText:
That's a shame. Was hopin' you boys would've found
some leads on where the scumbag might be lurkin',
but guess not.
jpnChrName: まさにその犯人の居場所について 何か手掛かりがないか知りたいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
まさにその犯人の居場所について
何か手掛かりがないか知りたいんだが。

engChrName: We don't. We still haven't been able to ascertain how he broke into the building and then subsequently got out.
engSearchText:
We don't. We still haven't been able to ascertain how
he broke into the building and then subsequently
got out.
jpnChrName: 侵入した経路も脱走の手段も まったく見当がつかない。
jpnSearchText:
侵入した経路も脱走の手段も
まったく見当がつかない。

engChrName: We were able to confirm from the files left behind that the victim had connections with organized crime.
engSearchText:
We were able to confirm from the files left behind
that the victim had connections with organized crime.
jpnChrName: 残されたファイルから被害者がマフィアと 通じていることが確定したが……
jpnSearchText:
残されたファイルから被害者がマフィアと
通じていることが確定したが……

engChrName: But aside from that grisly graffiti, the perp hardly left a trace of evidence.
engSearchText:
But aside from that grisly graffiti, the perp hardly left
a trace of evidence.
jpnChrName: 犯人については、あの悪趣味な落書き以外、 痕跡がほとんど残っていない。
jpnSearchText:
犯人については、あの悪趣味な落書き以外、
痕跡がほとんど残っていない。

engChrName: Whoever he is, it's clear he's a skilled assassin who knows his business.
engSearchText:
Whoever he is, it's clear he's a skilled assassin who
knows his business.
jpnChrName: よっぽど暗殺のような手口に 慣れているヤツだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
よっぽど暗殺のような手口に
慣れているヤツだろうな。

engChrName: That's spooky. Melchior...
engSearchText: That's spooky. Melchior...
jpnChrName: メルキオル……
jpnSearchText: メルキオル……

engChrName: It would seem finding him will not prove an easy task.
engSearchText: It would seem finding him will not prove an easy task.
jpnChrName: やはりそう簡単には行きませんね。
jpnSearchText: やはりそう簡単には行きませんね。

engChrName: Ehh, it's not like I really expected the cops to turn up anything in the first place.
engSearchText:
Ehh, it's not like I really expected the cops to turn up
anything in the first place.
jpnChrName: ま、ハナからあんま期待しちゃいないがな。
jpnSearchText: ま、ハナからあんま期待しちゃいないがな。

engChrName: Well excuse the hell out of us! I had to leave my girlfriend high and dry to investigate the scene, you know! I'm doing my best here!
engSearchText:
Well excuse the hell out of us! I had to leave my
girlfriend high and dry to investigate the scene,
you know! I'm doing my best here!
jpnChrName: なんだと！？　こっちは彼女とのデートも 台無しで現場検証をしていたのに！
jpnSearchText:
なんだと！？　こっちは彼女とのデートも
台無しで現場検証をしていたのに！

engChrName: Ah, I wasn't tryin' to mock you, man. I'm just sayin' that's the sort of slippery bastard we're up against.
engSearchText:
Ah, I wasn't tryin' to mock you, man. I'm just sayin'
that's the sort of slippery bastard we're up against.
jpnChrName: バカにしてるわけじゃねえ、 それだけ厄介な相手だってことだ。
jpnSearchText:
バカにしてるわけじゃねえ、
それだけ厄介な相手だってことだ。

engChrName: ...It sounds like this isn't your first run-in with this Melchior character, hmm?
engSearchText:
...It sounds like this isn't your first run-in with this
Melchior character, hmm?
jpnChrName: ……何か知ってるような口ぶりだな。
jpnSearchText: ……何か知ってるような口ぶりだな。

engChrName: Putting that aside, the perpetrator remains at large. I can only hope nothing happens during the film festival.
engSearchText:
Putting that aside, the perpetrator remains at large.
I can only hope nothing happens during the
film festival.
jpnChrName: ともかく、犯人はまだ捕まっていない状況だ。 映画祭が無事に終わればいいんだが……
jpnSearchText:
ともかく、犯人はまだ捕まっていない状況だ。
映画祭が無事に終わればいいんだが……

engChrName: That reminds me. I heard you kids were helping out with security on the parade. Is that true?
engSearchText:
That reminds me. I heard you kids were helping out
with security on the parade. Is that true?
jpnChrName: そう言えばお前たちもパレードの 警備に参加する予定だと聞いたが？
jpnSearchText:
そう言えばお前たちもパレードの
警備に参加する予定だと聞いたが？

engChrName: More or less. I wouldn't say it's anything official so much as just somethin' we'll be doing as part of our assignment, but yeah.
engSearchText:
More or less. I wouldn't say it's anything official so
much as just somethin' we'll be doing as part of our
assignment, but yeah.
jpnChrName: 一応な、真っ当なというよりは 依頼の一部のようなもんだが。
jpnSearchText:
一応な、真っ当なというよりは
依頼の一部のようなもんだが。

engChrName: Hmph. I realize it might be too late to say this, but don't go stepping into anything too dangerous out there, understand?
engSearchText:
Hmph. I realize it might be too late to say this, but
don't go stepping into anything too dangerous out
there, understand?
jpnChrName: いまさら言っても無駄かもしれないが、 あまり危険な状況に足を突っ込むな。
jpnSearchText:
いまさら言っても無駄かもしれないが、
あまり危険な状況に足を突っ込むな。

engChrName: Leave that kind of work to police professionals. We can handle it.
engSearchText:
Leave that kind of work to police professionals.
We can handle it.
jpnChrName: そういうのは俺たち警察の仕事だ。
jpnSearchText: そういうのは俺たち警察の仕事だ。

engChrName: We appreciate the advice, Inspector. Thank you.
engSearchText: We appreciate the advice, Inspector. Thank you.
jpnChrName: ご忠告、ありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: ご忠告、ありがとうございます。

engChrName: What she said. I'll keep it in mind.
engSearchText: What she said. I'll keep it in mind.
jpnChrName: まあなんだ、肝に銘じとくぜ。
jpnSearchText: まあなんだ、肝に銘じとくぜ。

engChrName: Come on! Like hell you're going to!
engSearchText: Come on! Like hell you're going to!
jpnChrName: 絶対聞く気ないですよコイツ！
jpnSearchText: 絶対聞く気ないですよコイツ！

engChrName: *sigh* What am I going to do with you all?
engSearchText: *sigh* What am I going to do with you all?
jpnChrName: ……やれやれ。
jpnSearchText: ……やれやれ。

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Detectives, please do stay safe.
engSearchText: Detectives, please do stay safe.
jpnChrName: ダスワニさんとネイトさんも、 どうか気を付けてくださいね。
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニさんとネイトさんも、
どうか気を付けてくださいね。

engChrName: Well, would you look at that! I didn't expect Salvatore Gotti himself to call in a favor.
engSearchText:
Well, would you look at that! I didn't expect Salvatore
Gotti himself to call in a favor.
jpnChrName: こいつは驚いたな……！ まさかゴッチ監督から依頼が来るとは。
jpnSearchText:
こいつは驚いたな……！
まさかゴッチ監督から依頼が来るとは。

engChrName: I don't know if what he wants is our forte, but never look a gift horse in the mouth—not from a guy like him.
engSearchText:
I don't know if what he wants is our forte, but never
look a gift horse in the mouth—not from a guy
like him.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋向きとは言いがてえ内容だが、 頼ってもらえんのは光栄だな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋向きとは言いがてえ内容だが、
頼ってもらえんのは光栄だな。

engChrName: Heehee! He must've taken a shine to you after your little discussion yesterday.
engSearchText:
Heehee! He must've taken a shine to you after your
little discussion yesterday.
jpnChrName: ふふ、昨日あんな事を言っていましたし……
jpnSearchText: ふふ、昨日あんな事を言っていましたし……

engChrName: Maybe he asked Nina and Judith how to get in touch with us after that meeting.
engSearchText:
Maybe he asked Nina and Judith how to get in touch
with us after that meeting.
jpnChrName: ニナさん達から４ｓｐｇの事を 聞いたのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ニナさん達から４ｓｐｇの事を
聞いたのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: He could've said something earlier and saved us some time and effort, though.
engSearchText:
He could've said something earlier and saved us some
time and effort, though.
jpnChrName: それならそうと、さっき 言ってくれりゃあ手間が省けたんだがな。
jpnSearchText:
それならそうと、さっき
言ってくれりゃあ手間が省けたんだがな。

engChrName: Oh, give him a break. He seems like a busy guy. He probably just forgot.
engSearchText:
Oh, give him a break. He seems like a busy guy.
He probably just forgot.
jpnChrName: 忙しそうでしたし、 うっかりしてたんでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
忙しそうでしたし、
うっかりしてたんでしょうか？

engChrName: Wouldn't surprise me, yeah.
engSearchText: Wouldn't surprise me, yeah.
jpnChrName: かもな……
jpnSearchText: かもな……

engChrName: From the look of things, he's probably over at Vegas Films workin' on that cavalcade of his some more.
engSearchText:
From the look of things, he's probably over at Vegas
Films workin' on that cavalcade of his some more.
jpnChrName: あの様子だと、今はベガスフィルムで パレードの準備をしてる頃だろう。
jpnSearchText:
あの様子だと、今はベガスフィルムで
パレードの準備をしてる頃だろう。

engChrName: I do want to check the bulletin board in the Cultural District, too, but...
engSearchText:
I do want to check the bulletin board in the Cultural
District, too, but...
jpnChrName: 伝統地区の掲示板も気にはなるが……
jpnSearchText: 伝統地区の掲示板も気にはなるが……

engChrName: I guess we should go talk to him and see what's up.
engSearchText: I guess we should go talk to him and see what's up.
jpnChrName: 改めて、ゴッチ監督に話を聞きに行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText: 改めて、ゴッチ監督に話を聞きに行ってみるか。

engChrName: Well, would you look at that! I didn't expect Salvatore Gotti himself to call in a favor.
engSearchText:
Well, would you look at that! I didn't expect Salvatore
Gotti himself to call in a favor.
jpnChrName: おっ、こいつは驚いたな…… まさかゴッチ監督から依頼が来るとは。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、こいつは驚いたな……
まさかゴッチ監督から依頼が来るとは。

engChrName: I don't know if what he wants is our forte, but never look a gift horse in the mouth—not from a guy like him.
engSearchText:
I don't know if what he wants is our forte, but never
look a gift horse in the mouth—not from a guy
like him.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋向きとは言いがてえ内容だが、 頼ってもらえんのは光栄だな。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋向きとは言いがてえ内容だが、
頼ってもらえんのは光栄だな。

engChrName: Heehee! He must've taken a shine to you after your little discussion yesterday.
engSearchText:
Heehee! He must've taken a shine to you after your
little discussion yesterday.
jpnChrName: ふふ、昨日あんな事を言っていましたし……
jpnSearchText: ふふ、昨日あんな事を言っていましたし……

engChrName: Maybe he asked Nina and Judith how to get in touch with us after that meeting.
engSearchText:
Maybe he asked Nina and Judith how to get in touch
with us after that meeting.
jpnChrName: ニナさん達から４ｓｐｇの事を 聞いたのかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ニナさん達から４ｓｐｇの事を
聞いたのかもしれませんね。

engChrName: Only problem is, he put two different spots to meet up.
engSearchText:
Only problem is, he put two different spots to
meet up.
jpnChrName: 落ち合う場所は書いてねえみたいだが。
jpnSearchText: 落ち合う場所は書いてねえみたいだが。

engChrName: The hotel and Vegas Films. Does the guy expect us to toss a coin and just hope we end up at the right spot?
engSearchText:
The hotel and Vegas Films. Does the guy expect us
to toss a coin and just hope we end up at the
right spot?
jpnChrName: ホテルかベガスフィルムにでも いるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
ホテルかベガスフィルムにでも
いるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Yeah, where should we go?
engSearchText: Yeah, where should we go?
jpnChrName: どちらに向かいましょうか？
jpnSearchText: どちらに向かいましょうか？

engChrName: Let's check out the hotel first. Might as well see how the girls are holdin' up today, too.
engSearchText:
Let's check out the hotel first. Might as well see how
the girls are holdin' up today, too.
jpnChrName: まずはアルジュメイラホテルを覗いてみるか。 ついでに女優たちの様子も見ておきてえしな。
jpnSearchText:
まずはアルジュメイラホテルを覗いてみるか。
ついでに女優たちの様子も見ておきてえしな。

engChrName: I still want to check the Cultural District bulletin board later. We can take a gander while we're wandering around.
engSearchText:
I still want to check the Cultural District bulletin
board later. We can take a gander while we're
wandering around.
jpnChrName: あとは……伝統地区の掲示板も気になる。 適当にぶらつきながら向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
あとは……伝統地区の掲示板も気になる。
適当にぶらつきながら向かうぞ。

engChrName: I wanna at least get somethin' done in the meantime.
engSearchText: I wanna at least get somethin' done in the meantime.
jpnChrName: ──いずれにせよ、 最低でも一つは片付けておかねえとな。
jpnSearchText:
──いずれにせよ、
最低でも一つは片付けておかねえとな。

engChrName: Looks like Bermotti's got some work for us.
engSearchText: Looks like Bermotti's got some work for us.
jpnChrName: おっ、ベルモッティから依頼が来てんな。
jpnSearchText: おっ、ベルモッティから依頼が来てんな。

engChrName: He's always so good to us. We should give him a hand.
engSearchText:
He's always so good to us. We should give him
a hand.
jpnChrName: いつもお世話になっていますし、 是非協力したいですね。
jpnSearchText:
いつもお世話になっていますし、
是非協力したいですね。

engChrName: There she is! Over there!
engSearchText: There she is! Over there!
jpnChrName: いたぞ、あそこだ！
jpnSearchText: いたぞ、あそこだ！

engChrName: *huff* *huff*
engSearchText: *huff* *huff*
jpnChrName: はぁ、はぁ……
jpnSearchText: はぁ、はぁ……

engChrName: Hmm... I don't see her anywhere, but she had to have run into this parking lot.
engSearchText:
Hmm... I don't see her anywhere, but she had to have
run into this parking lot.
