jpnChrName: ふぅ……姿は見えませんが、 この駐車場に逃げ込んだみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……姿は見えませんが、
この駐車場に逃げ込んだみたいですね。

engChrName: We're in luck if so. It's a dead end. She'll have nowhere else to go.
engSearchText:
We're in luck if so. It's a dead end. She'll have
nowhere else to go.
jpnChrName: 行き止まりだし、丁度いいかもな。
jpnSearchText: 行き止まりだし、丁度いいかもな。

engChrName: Let's split up and search for her while keeping the exit sealed off. She won't get away this time!
engSearchText:
Let's split up and search for her while keeping the
exit sealed off. She won't get away this time!
jpnChrName: 手分けして出入口を塞ぎつつ、 今度こそ捕らえるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
手分けして出入口を塞ぎつつ、
今度こそ捕らえるぞ。

engChrName: I'll guard the entryway, then. No way in Gehenna she'll get past me.
engSearchText:
I'll guard the entryway, then. No way in Gehenna
she'll get past me.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、こっちの警戒は任せとけ。 今度こそ絶対に逃がさねぇ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、こっちの警戒は任せとけ。
今度こそ絶対に逃がさねぇ。

engChrName: I think I'll go with him. Two guards are better than one.
engSearchText:
I think I'll go with him. Two guards are better
than one.
jpnChrName: わたしも出入口を見張りますっ！
jpnSearchText: わたしも出入口を見張りますっ！

engChrName: Sounds good. In that case, Agnès, you and I will search the perimeter.
engSearchText:
Sounds good. In that case, Agnès, you and I will
search the perimeter.
jpnChrName: 分かった、それじゃ俺とアニエスで 駐車場を捜索するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
分かった、それじゃ俺とアニエスで
駐車場を捜索するぞ。

engChrName: Keep a close eye out for her. She could pop out and try to book it at any time.
engSearchText:
Keep a close eye out for her. She could pop out and
try to book it at any time.
jpnChrName: いつ飛び出して来るか分からねえ。 よく注意しとけよ。
jpnSearchText:
いつ飛び出して来るか分からねえ。
よく注意しとけよ。

engChrName: Right! We'll catch her for sure!
engSearchText: Right! We'll catch her for sure!
jpnChrName: はい、ここで絶対に 捕まえてみせましょう……！
jpnSearchText:
はい、ここで絶対に
捕まえてみせましょう……！

engChrName: (There she is! It's the thief!)
engSearchText: (There she is! It's the thief!)
jpnChrName: （いました……！   スリの女の子です！）
jpnSearchText:
（いました……！
スリの女の子です！）

engChrName: (I'll circle around from the right. You flank her the other way. All right?)
engSearchText:
(I'll circle around from the right. You flank her the
other way. All right?)
jpnChrName: （俺は右側から回り込む。   反対側は任せたぞ。）
jpnSearchText:
（俺は右側から回り込む。
反対側は任せたぞ。）

engChrName: (Okay!)
engSearchText: (Okay!)

engChrName: There you are! We finally found you!
engSearchText: There you are! We finally found you!
jpnChrName: もう、ようやく見つけましたよ。
jpnSearchText: もう、ようやく見つけましたよ。

engChrName: Ah!
engSearchText: Ah!

engChrName: Do we really have to keep running? You must be exhausted at this point.
engSearchText:
Do we really have to keep running? You must be
exhausted at this point.
jpnChrName: 貴女も走り疲れたでしょう、 追いかけっこはここまでにしませんか？
jpnSearchText:
貴女も走り疲れたでしょう、
追いかけっこはここまでにしませんか？

engChrName: Can we at least sit down and talk?
engSearchText: Can we at least sit down and talk?
jpnChrName: 人の物を盗むのは悪い事ですけど、 貴女を心配している人がいるんです。
jpnSearchText:
人の物を盗むのは悪い事ですけど、
貴女を心配している人がいるんです。

engChrName: There's someone who's really concerned about you. You shouldn't be stealing like this.
engSearchText:
There's someone who's really concerned about you.
You shouldn't be stealing like this.
jpnChrName: 一度ちゃんと話し合ってみませんか？
jpnSearchText: 一度ちゃんと話し合ってみませんか？

engChrName: Yeah, right! Why should I believe you?!
engSearchText: Yeah, right! Why should I believe you?!
jpnChrName: ──そんなの信用できるかっ！
jpnSearchText: ──そんなの信用できるかっ！

engChrName: Will you give it a rest, already? We're tryin' to do right by you!
engSearchText:
Will you give it a rest, already? We're tryin' to do
right by you!
jpnChrName: とんだ手間をかけさせやがって…… 今度は逃がさねえぞ？
jpnSearchText:
とんだ手間をかけさせやがって……
今度は逃がさねえぞ？

engChrName: You're not gettin' away from us. Just grow up and turn yourself in already. Runnin' only makes it worse.
engSearchText:
You're not gettin' away from us. Just grow up and
turn yourself in already. Runnin' only makes it worse.
jpnChrName: いいから大人しく 俺達のお縄につけってんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いいから大人しく
俺達のお縄につけってんだ。

engChrName: Gah! How could I let this happen...?
engSearchText: Gah! How could I let this happen...?
jpnChrName: くっ……！ どうしてこんな事に……
jpnSearchText:
くっ……！
どうしてこんな事に……

engChrName: After much effort, Van and company apprehended the shoplifter and got in touch with Fazil.
engSearchText:
After much effort, Van and company apprehended
the shoplifter and got in touch with Fazil.
jpnChrName: こうして苦労の末に少女を捕まえたヴァン達は ファジール元締めに連絡をとり……
jpnSearchText:
こうして苦労の末に少女を捕まえたヴァン達は
ファジール元締めに連絡をとり……

engChrName: The group decided to rent a room so they could have a place to talk to the young girl.
engSearchText:
The group decided to rent a room so they could have
a place to talk to the young girl.
jpnChrName: 宿酒場の一室を借りて 少女と話をする事になった。
jpnSearchText:
宿酒場の一室を借りて
少女と話をする事になった。

engChrName: Hey, are you the guys I think you are?
engSearchText: Hey, are you the guys I think you are?
jpnChrName: おっ、もしかしてアンタ達は！？
jpnSearchText: おっ、もしかしてアンタ達は！？

engChrName: Yeah, we're with Arkride Solutions. We're here to take care of the 4SPG you left.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we're with Arkride Solutions. We're here to
take care of the 4SPG you left.
jpnChrName: ああ、４ｓｐｇで依頼を受けた 《アークライド解決事務所》だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、４ｓｐｇで依頼を受けた
《アークライド解決事務所》だ。

engChrName: I take it you're Marcello, the guy who posted it?
engSearchText: I take it you're Marcello, the guy who posted it?
jpnChrName: アンタが依頼主のマルセロだな？
jpnSearchText: アンタが依頼主のマルセロだな？

engChrName: Yep! I'm your guy! Boy, am I glad to see you!
engSearchText: Yep! I'm your guy! Boy, am I glad to see you!
jpnChrName: おおっ！　本当に来てくれたんだな……！ そうだ、俺が依頼を出したマルセロだ。
jpnSearchText:
おおっ！　本当に来てくれたんだな……！
そうだ、俺が依頼を出したマルセロだ。

engChrName: You wrote that somebody's demanding hush money from you to stay quiet about your 'gray market business.'
engSearchText:
You wrote that somebody's demanding hush money
from you to stay quiet about your 'gray
market business.'
jpnChrName: マルセロさんの“グレーな商売”に関して 口止め料を要求されて困っているという事でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
マルセロさんの“グレーな商売”に関して
口止め料を要求されて困っているという事でしたね。

engChrName: This merch must be what makes your little enterprise not quite squeaky-clean, eh?
engSearchText:
This merch must be what makes your little enterprise
not quite squeaky-clean, eh?
jpnChrName: で、その問題になってる “グレーな商売”ってのがコイツの事か。
jpnSearchText:
で、その問題になってる
“グレーな商売”ってのがコイツの事か。

engChrName: Huh? I don't get what the big deal is. He just has lots of stuff.
engSearchText:
Huh? I don't get what the big deal is. He just has lots
of stuff.
jpnChrName: えと、これは……ブランド商品が 沢山置いてあるみたいですね。
jpnSearchText:
えと、これは……ブランド商品が
沢山置いてあるみたいですね。

engChrName: Though...wait, if you look closely, the brand logos look weird. What gives?
engSearchText:
Though...wait, if you look closely, the brand logos
look weird. What gives?
jpnChrName: でもよく見ると ロゴが少しだけ違うような……？
jpnSearchText:
でもよく見ると
ロゴが少しだけ違うような……？

engChrName: Ahh, I get it. We've got stalls like this back where I'm from. Except the stuff those guys have tends to be more bogus looking.
engSearchText:
Ahh, I get it. We've got stalls like this back where
I'm from. Except the stuff those guys have tends to be
more bogus looking.
jpnChrName: そういやラングポートにも似た出店があったな。 あっちはもっとインチキな商売をしてやがったが。
jpnSearchText:
そういやラングポートにも似た出店があったな。
あっちはもっとインチキな商売をしてやがったが。

engChrName: Yeah, you've got me. I sell bootleg stuff. Or as I prefer to say, 'high-quality imitation goods.'
engSearchText:
Yeah, you've got me. I sell bootleg stuff. Or as I
prefer to say, 'high-quality imitation goods.'
jpnChrName: ああ、ウチはブランド商品のパクリ── もとい、模倣商品の専門店なんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ウチはブランド商品のパクリ──
もとい、模倣商品の専門店なんだ。

engChrName: Heh, sure. Makes you sound just a hair more respectable, I guess. Still a fraudster at the end of the day.
engSearchText:
Heh, sure. Makes you sound just a hair more
respectable, I guess. Still a fraudster at the end of
the day.
jpnChrName: ハッ、いい感じに言い換えてんじゃねえ。 要は完全にブラックっつう事だろ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、いい感じに言い換えてんじゃねえ。
要は完全にブラックっつう事だろ。

engChrName: No, no, that's just the thing. I'm not out to scam anybody out of their hard-earned mira!
engSearchText:
No, no, that's just the thing. I'm not out to scam
anybody out of their hard-earned mira!
jpnChrName: いやいや、言っておくが、 俺は別に詐欺をしてる訳じゃないんだぜ？
jpnSearchText:
いやいや、言っておくが、
俺は別に詐欺をしてる訳じゃないんだぜ？

engChrName: I always tell 'em up front that my stuff's fake, so they know exactly what they're getting when they purchase it.
engSearchText:
I always tell 'em up front that my stuff's fake, so they
know exactly what they're getting when they
purchase it.
jpnChrName: 売る時は客に偽物だって教えてやるし、 客はそれを承知の上で買って行くんだ。
jpnSearchText:
売る時は客に偽物だって教えてやるし、
客はそれを承知の上で買って行くんだ。

engChrName: Wait, really? But why would anybody buy fake stuff if they could get real ones?
engSearchText:
Wait, really? But why would anybody buy fake stuff if
they could get real ones?
jpnChrName: うーん、偽物だと分かっていても 買っていくものでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
うーん、偽物だと分かっていても
買っていくものでしょうか？

engChrName: 'Cause you can get 'fake' and look REAL fancy for a tiny fraction of the price! There's demand out there for what I offer, I tell you.
engSearchText:
'Cause you can get 'fake' and look REAL fancy for a
tiny fraction of the price! There's demand out there
for what I offer, I tell you.
jpnChrName: ああ、格安でブランドものっぽい雰囲気が 出せるって事で、一応需要はあるみてぇだな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、格安でブランドものっぽい雰囲気が
出せるって事で、一応需要はあるみてぇだな。

engChrName: Oooh! I guess that's one way to look at it.
engSearchText: Oooh! I guess that's one way to look at it.
jpnChrName: へぇ～、そういう考え方もあるんですね……
jpnSearchText: へぇ～、そういう考え方もあるんですね……

engChrName: Do the actual makers of the originals know what you're doing, though?
engSearchText:
Do the actual makers of the originals know what
you're doing, though?
jpnChrName: ですが、この事を ブランド会社は知ってるんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ですが、この事を
ブランド会社は知ってるんですか？

engChrName: Wouldn't they try to sue you if they found out?
engSearchText: Wouldn't they try to sue you if they found out?
jpnChrName: もし知られてしまったら 訴えられてしまうのでは……？
jpnSearchText:
もし知られてしまったら
訴えられてしまうのでは……？

engChrName: Like I said, I'm not out here telling folks that this stuff's the real deal. That's straight up illegal.
engSearchText:
Like I said, I'm not out here telling folks that this
stuff's the real deal. That's straight up illegal.
jpnChrName: まあな……本家のブランドだと詐称して 商売をすんのは完全にアウト、違法だ。
jpnSearchText:
まあな……本家のブランドだと詐称して
商売をすんのは完全にアウト、違法だ。

engChrName: But if I sell it all as imitation stuff up front, then I'm just barely in the clear. At least, that's what I like to believe...
engSearchText:
But if I sell it all as imitation stuff up front, then I'm
just barely in the clear. At least, that's what I like
to believe...
jpnChrName: 俺みたいに“偽物”として商売するなら ギリギリセーフだ……と言いたい所だが……
jpnSearchText:
俺みたいに“偽物”として商売するなら
ギリギリセーフだ……と言いたい所だが……

engChrName: I'm no lawyer, but I'm pretty sure this is all still against the law.
engSearchText:
I'm no lawyer, but I'm pretty sure this is all still
against the law.
jpnChrName: よく知らねえが、それも違法なんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText: よく知らねえが、それも違法なんじゃねえか？

engChrName: You're making mira riding on the coattails of real designers without their permission.
engSearchText:
You're making mira riding on the coattails of real
designers without their permission.
jpnChrName: 本家のブランドの人気に乗っかって 無許可で利益を得てる訳だしよ。
jpnSearchText:
本家のブランドの人気に乗っかって
無許可で利益を得てる訳だしよ。

engChrName: I mean... You're not wrong. But still...
engSearchText: I mean... You're not wrong. But still...
jpnChrName: ……ま、まあそうとも言うな…………
jpnSearchText: ……ま、まあそうとも言うな…………

engChrName: Straddling that line is how you get by sellin' these bootlegs in broad daylight.
engSearchText:
Straddling that line is how you get by sellin' these
bootlegs in broad daylight.
jpnChrName: で、そうやって絶妙なバランスで パチモン屋台を成り立たせてる中……
jpnSearchText:
で、そうやって絶妙なバランスで
パチモン屋台を成り立たせてる中……

engChrName: Until someone tries to extort you so they keep quiet about the illegality of it all, that is.
engSearchText:
Until someone tries to extort you so they keep quiet
about the illegality of it all, that is.
jpnChrName: 何者かに、その違法性について 口止め料を強請られてるっつう事だな。
jpnSearchText:
何者かに、その違法性について
口止め料を強請られてるっつう事だな。

engChrName: So let's hear it: who's givin' you grief?
engSearchText: So let's hear it: who's givin' you grief?
jpnChrName: で？　一体どこの誰に脅されてるんだよ。
jpnSearchText: で？　一体どこの誰に脅されてるんだよ。

engChrName: That's what makes this whole mess so tricky to deal with. It's a cop who's threatening me.
engSearchText:
That's what makes this whole mess so tricky to
deal with. It's a cop who's threatening me.
jpnChrName: ああ、そこが一番厄介な所なんだが── 実は警官に脅されてんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、そこが一番厄介な所なんだが──
実は警官に脅されてんだよ。

engChrName: Oh, shit, for real? You're not pulling our leg, are you?
engSearchText: Oh, shit, for real? You're not pulling our leg, are you?
jpnChrName: はぁ！？　警官だと？
jpnSearchText: はぁ！？　警官だと？

engChrName: Yeah, I find that a little hard to believe...
engSearchText: Yeah, I find that a little hard to believe...
jpnChrName: にわかに信じ難いですが……
jpnSearchText: にわかに信じ難いですが……

engChrName: It's true! If he reported me, best case scenario, I'd be kicked out of here. Worst case, they'd book me.
engSearchText:
It's true! If he reported me, best case scenario, I'd be
kicked out of here. Worst case, they'd book me.
jpnChrName: ああ、警察直々に通報されれば即刻退去、 最悪の場合は逮捕されちまう。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、警察直々に通報されれば即刻退去、
最悪の場合は逮捕されちまう。

engChrName: Bastard says if I don't want that, I have to pay him in order to get him to look the other way.
engSearchText:
Bastard says if I don't want that, I have to pay him in
order to get him to look the other way.
jpnChrName: それが嫌だったら、見逃してやる代わりに 口止め料を払えって言われてな……
jpnSearchText:
それが嫌だったら、見逃してやる代わりに
口止め料を払えって言われてな……

engChrName: I've got until tomorrow to get 30,000 mira together or else he's going to raise hell.
engSearchText:
I've got until tomorrow to get 30,000 mira together or
else he's going to raise hell.
jpnChrName: 相手は１人で、男の警官だった。 明日までに３万ミラを用意しとけってさ。
jpnSearchText:
相手は１人で、男の警官だった。
明日までに３万ミラを用意しとけってさ。

engChrName: Look, I'm not stupid. If getting myself arrested is what it'll come to, I'll just close up my shop. I don't want that kind of trouble.
engSearchText:
Look, I'm not stupid. If getting myself arrested is
what it'll come to, I'll just close up my shop. I don't
want that kind of trouble.
jpnChrName: 犯罪として検挙されちまうなら、まあ分かる…… それなら俺だって素直に店を畳むさ。
jpnSearchText:
犯罪として検挙されちまうなら、まあ分かる……
それなら俺だって素直に店を畳むさ。

engChrName: But don't you guys think demanding hush money out of me is absurd?
engSearchText:
But don't you guys think demanding hush money out
of me is absurd?
jpnChrName: だが、口止め料を請求されるなんて こんなの理不尽だろ！？
jpnSearchText:
だが、口止め料を請求されるなんて
こんなの理不尽だろ！？

engChrName: I don't know if I'd call it absurd, exactly. I see why he'd do it. But it does tell me this town's got crooked cops.
engSearchText:
I don't know if I'd call it absurd, exactly. I see why
he'd do it. But it does tell me this town's got
crooked cops.
jpnChrName: 理不尽かどうかは知らねえが── つまりこの街に“汚職警官”がいるって訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
理不尽かどうかは知らねえが──
つまりこの街に“汚職警官”がいるって訳だな。

engChrName: You bet it does. That's why I reached out to you folks. I want you guys to track this guy down and get him to stop.
engSearchText:
You bet it does. That's why I reached out to
you folks. I want you guys to track this guy down and
get him to stop.
jpnChrName: ああ、だからアンタ達にはその警官を探し出して、 金の要求を止めさせてほしいんだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、だからアンタ達にはその警官を探し出して、
金の要求を止めさせてほしいんだ。

engChrName: There's nobody else I can turn to. I sure as hell can't talk to the other cops, and the guild is off limits, too, given what I do.
engSearchText:
There's nobody else I can turn to. I sure as hell can't
talk to the other cops, and the guild is off limits, too,
given what I do.
jpnChrName: ウチの立場からしたら警察は勿論 遊撃士にも相談できねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ウチの立場からしたら警察は勿論
遊撃士にも相談できねえ。

engChrName: And there ain't no way I've got 30,000 mira to spare, my sales aren't THAT good. You guys have to help me, I'm begging you!
engSearchText:
And there ain't no way I've got 30,000 mira to spare,
my sales aren't THAT good. You guys have to help
me, I'm begging you!
jpnChrName: ３万ミラなんてウチの売り上げじゃ 支払えねえし、どうか頼むよ……！
jpnSearchText:
３万ミラなんてウチの売り上げじゃ
支払えねえし、どうか頼むよ……！

engChrName: That's not for you to decide, pal. ...What's it gonna be, chief? We doing this, or nah?
engSearchText:
That's not for you to decide, pal. ...What's it gonna
be, chief? We doing this, or nah?
jpnChrName: って言ってやがるが……この案件、 《裏解決屋》としてはどうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
って言ってやがるが……この案件、
《裏解決屋》としてはどうすんだ？

engChrName: That dirty cop wanting me to pay up so he'll keep quiet about my business hasn't gone away, you know.
engSearchText:
That dirty cop wanting me to pay up so he'll keep
quiet about my business hasn't gone away, you know.
jpnChrName: 口止め料を払えって 警察が脅してきてるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
口止め料を払えって
警察が脅してきてるんだ。

engChrName: I need you guys to track down the dirty bastard and get him to stop!
engSearchText:
I need you guys to track down the dirty bastard and
get him to stop!
jpnChrName: だからアンタの手で警察を 探して止めてほしいんだ！
jpnSearchText:
だからアンタの手で警察を
探して止めてほしいんだ！

engChrName: I'm begging you! I need him gone!
engSearchText: I'm begging you! I need him gone!
jpnChrName: どうか頼むよ……！
jpnSearchText: どうか頼むよ……！

engChrName: I'm not against takin' it up, but we got our hands full at the moment.
engSearchText:
I'm not against takin' it up, but we got our hands full
at the moment.
jpnChrName: 請け負っても構わねえが、 今は立て込んでてな。
jpnSearchText:
請け負っても構わねえが、
今は立て込んでてな。

engChrName: You mind if we come back and talk to you later?
engSearchText: You mind if we come back and talk to you later?
jpnChrName: 悪いが改めて来させてもらってもいいか。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが改めて来させてもらってもいいか。

engChrName: I guess, yeah. I do need you guys focused once we're doing this. Can't have you distracted with other stuff.
engSearchText:
I guess, yeah. I do need you guys focused once we're
doing this. Can't have you distracted with other stuff.
jpnChrName: 勿論だ、こっちに本腰を 入れてもらわねえと困っちまうしな。
jpnSearchText:
勿論だ、こっちに本腰を
入れてもらわねえと困っちまうしな。

engChrName: Take care of whatever you need to. I'll be waiting here.
engSearchText:
Take care of whatever you need to. I'll be
waiting here.
jpnChrName: 用事が済むまで待たせてもらうぜ……！
jpnSearchText: 用事が済むまで待たせてもらうぜ……！

engChrName: All right, we're on it. We'll have a word with your cop buddy.
engSearchText:
All right, we're on it. We'll have a word with your
cop buddy.
jpnChrName: いいだろう、この依頼 請け負わせてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
いいだろう、この依頼
請け負わせてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Really? Oh, thank you! Thank you!
engSearchText: Really? Oh, thank you! Thank you!
jpnChrName: 本当か……！　ありがとう！
jpnSearchText: 本当か……！　ありがとう！

engChrName: Things might not be all that above board here, but what this guy's doing ain't exactly legal, either.
engSearchText:
Things might not be all that above board here, but
what this guy's doing ain't exactly legal, either.
jpnChrName: まず、警察が“口止め料の要求”を する事こそ違法だろうしな。
jpnSearchText:
まず、警察が“口止め料の要求”を
する事こそ違法だろうしな。

engChrName: With any luck, if we play our cards right, we might be able to get him to back off without you having to close up shop.
engSearchText:
With any luck, if we play our cards right, we might be
able to get him to back off without you having to
close up shop.
jpnChrName: 上手い事やればアンタも 店を畳まずに済むかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
上手い事やればアンタも
店を畳まずに済むかもしれねえ。

engChrName: But how do we find this bad cop, anyway? That's the question.
engSearchText:
But how do we find this bad cop, anyway? That's
the question.
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、問題はその汚職警官を どうやって探すのか……って事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃあ、問題はその汚職警官を
どうやって探すのか……って事ですね。

engChrName: Well, how would you guys go about looking for one? You kids are smart. I want to hear my assistants' opinions.
engSearchText:
Well, how would you guys go about looking for one?
You kids are smart. I want to hear my
assistants' opinions.
jpnChrName: クク、ここは優秀な助手たちの 意見を聞かせて欲しい所だな？
jpnSearchText:
クク、ここは優秀な助手たちの
意見を聞かせて欲しい所だな？

engChrName: Nice, making your lackeys do all the hard work. I see how it is.
engSearchText:
Nice, making your lackeys do all the hard work. I see
how it is.
jpnChrName: ハッ、偉そうに言いやがって。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、偉そうに言いやがって。

engChrName: Hmm... It's hard to know where to begin.
engSearchText: Hmm... It's hard to know where to begin.
jpnChrName: ……でも、難しい所ですよね。
jpnSearchText: ……でも、難しい所ですよね。

engChrName: All we can really gather from the seller's testimony is that the police officer in question is male.
engSearchText:
All we can really gather from the seller's testimony is
that the police officer in question is male.
jpnChrName: 先程のお話だと、相手は男性だという 所までは絞り込めましたけど。
jpnSearchText:
先程のお話だと、相手は男性だという
所までは絞り込めましたけど。

engChrName: But I'm sure there are lots of male police officers in this city. That's hardly enough to narrow down a culprit.
engSearchText:
But I'm sure there are lots of male police officers in
this city. That's hardly enough to narrow down
a culprit.
jpnChrName: 男性の警官なんて沢山いる事でしょうし、 いきなり犯人を特定するのは難しそうです。
jpnSearchText:
男性の警官なんて沢山いる事でしょうし、
いきなり犯人を特定するのは難しそうです。

engChrName: Yeah. Guess our only option is to start chatting up pigs and see what we can get out of them.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Guess our only option is to start chatting up
pigs and see what we can get out of them.
jpnChrName: それならまずは、同僚の警官から 情報収集する所から始めるか。
jpnSearchText:
それならまずは、同僚の警官から
情報収集する所から始めるか。

engChrName: Only question is how to approach them. Can't exactly just waltz up and ask, 'Yo, you got any buddies who are bribe-takin' rats?'
engSearchText:
Only question is how to approach them. Can't exactly
just waltz up and ask, 'Yo, you got any buddies who
are bribe-takin' rats?'
jpnChrName: とはいえ『汚職警官を知らねえか』って 馬鹿正直に聞くわけにはいかねえだろうがな。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ『汚職警官を知らねえか』って
馬鹿正直に聞くわけにはいかねえだろうがな。

engChrName: True. That would just provoke them, and Goddess help us if we ask the culprit on accident.
engSearchText:
True. That would just provoke them, and Goddess
help us if we ask the culprit on accident.
jpnChrName: そうですね……警官や真犯人を 刺激してしまいそうです。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……警官や真犯人を
刺激してしまいそうです。

engChrName: Hmm...
engSearchText: Hmm...

engChrName: I know! What if we pretend to be customers who lost money to this seller ourselves?
engSearchText:
I know! What if we pretend to be customers who lost
money to this seller ourselves?
jpnChrName: あっ！　それなら“ニセモノ屋台の被害者”を わたし達が装うのはどうでしょうかっ！
jpnSearchText:
あっ！　それなら“ニセモノ屋台の被害者”を
わたし達が装うのはどうでしょうかっ！

engChrName: Huh? You lost me, pipsqueak. What do we get out of going to all that trouble?
engSearchText:
Huh? You lost me, pipsqueak. What do we get out of
going to all that trouble?
jpnChrName: オレたちがパチモン屋台の被害者……？ それで何を聞き出すってんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
オレたちがパチモン屋台の被害者……？
それで何を聞き出すってんだよ。

engChrName: I was thinking it could give us an idea about what the police are doing about our client in the first place!
engSearchText:
I was thinking it could give us an idea about what the
police are doing about our client in the first place!
jpnChrName: まずは、この屋台の詐欺について 警官がどういう対応をしてるのか調べるんです。
jpnSearchText:
まずは、この屋台の詐欺について
警官がどういう対応をしてるのか調べるんです。

engChrName: If we know what they're doing about guys like him, maybe that'll give us a clue that points us toward whoever's threatening him.
engSearchText:
If we know what they're doing about guys like him,
maybe that'll give us a clue that points us toward
whoever's threatening him.
jpnChrName: ニセモノ屋台まわりの警官の動きを知る事で、 汚職警官に繋がる情報が見つかるかなと思って。
jpnSearchText:
ニセモノ屋台まわりの警官の動きを知る事で、
汚職警官に繋がる情報が見つかるかなと思って。

engChrName: Oh, I see! That's a smart idea, actually! Good thinking, Feri!
engSearchText:
Oh, I see! That's a smart idea, actually!
Good thinking, Feri!
jpnChrName: なるほど……それは名案ですね！
jpnSearchText: なるほど……それは名案ですね！

engChrName: Sounds like we're going to have to pound some pavement, but hell if I can think of anything better to do. I'm game.
engSearchText:
Sounds like we're going to have to pound some
pavement, but hell if I can think of anything better
to do. I'm game.
jpnChrName: ハッ、地道な情報収集になりそうだが、 まずはその辺りが妥当なのかもな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、地道な情報収集になりそうだが、
まずはその辺りが妥当なのかもな。

engChrName: Aww, I didn't think it was that clever! But...think it'll work?
engSearchText:
Aww, I didn't think it was that clever! But...think
it'll work?
jpnChrName: えへへ、そうでしょうか……
jpnSearchText: えへへ、そうでしょうか……

engChrName: Yeah, that idea's got potential. Pretty sharp for a newcomer, actually.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that idea's got potential. Pretty sharp for a
newcomer, actually.
jpnChrName: ああ、中々冴えてるじゃねえかフェリ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、中々冴えてるじゃねえかフェリ。

engChrName: We'll try your idea and see what it gets us. Now, let's roll.
engSearchText:
We'll try your idea and see what it gets us. Now,
let's roll.
jpnChrName: まずはそれで行ってみるとしようぜ。
jpnSearchText: まずはそれで行ってみるとしようぜ。

engChrName: Quest Hush Money started!
engSearchText: Quest Hush Money started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【不当な口止め料】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>不当な口止め料<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Ugh, just once, I wish it wasn't so blisteringly hot...
engSearchText: Ugh, just once, I wish it wasn't so blisteringly hot...
jpnChrName: ふぅ、相変わらずアチィなぁ……
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、相変わらずアチィなぁ……

engChrName: Sorry to bug you, pal. Got a minute?
engSearchText: Sorry to bug you, pal. Got a minute?
jpnChrName: 悪いんだが、少しいいか？
jpnSearchText: 悪いんだが、少しいいか？

engChrName: Sure. You guys need something?
engSearchText: Sure. You guys need something?
jpnChrName: ん？　俺に何か用か？
jpnSearchText: ん？　俺に何か用か？

engChrName: Yeah, we just realized we got scammed into buyin' some fake souvenirs by a street vendor we ran into.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we just realized we got scammed into buyin'
some fake souvenirs by a street vendor we ran into.
jpnChrName: ああ、実はパチモン屋台に騙されて 土産を買っちまってな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、実はパチモン屋台に騙されて
土産を買っちまってな……

engChrName: We tried to demand our money back, but the guy won't hear any of it.
engSearchText:
We tried to demand our money back, but the guy
won't hear any of it.
jpnChrName: 払い戻しさせてくれって言ってんだが、 向こうが聞いてくれなくてよ。
jpnSearchText:
払い戻しさせてくれって言ってんだが、
向こうが聞いてくれなくてよ。

engChrName: Ah, bootlegger trouble, huh? Yeah, we've got a handful of those around the city.
engSearchText:
Ah, bootlegger trouble, huh? Yeah, we've got a
handful of those around the city.
jpnChrName: あー、パチモン屋台か。 確かに数軒見かけるよな。
jpnSearchText:
あー、パチモン屋台か。
確かに数軒見かけるよな。

engChrName: I feel your pain. Those guys are smooth talkers. They can get you to part with your money before you know it.
engSearchText:
I feel your pain. Those guys are smooth talkers.
They can get you to part with your money before you
know it.
jpnChrName: 分かるぜ、ああいう連中って口が立つし つい騙されちまうんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
分かるぜ、ああいう連中って口が立つし
つい騙されちまうんだよなぁ。

engChrName: You're telling us. Is there anything you can do to help?
engSearchText:
You're telling us. Is there anything you can do
to help?
jpnChrName: はい……なんとか 助けてもらえないでしょうか……？
jpnSearchText:
はい……なんとか
助けてもらえないでしょうか……？

engChrName: Well...I'm going to be frank with you. Dealing with those guys is like playing a game of cat and mouse.
engSearchText:
Well...I'm going to be frank with you. Dealing with
those guys is like playing a game of cat and mouse.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……正直、連中を相手にしても イタチごっこなんだよなぁ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……正直、連中を相手にしても
イタチごっこなんだよなぁ。

engChrName: You can file the papers and serve them a warrant, but another one will spring up and take their place.
engSearchText:
You can file the papers and serve them a warrant, but
another one will spring up and take their place.
jpnChrName: 被害報告があって令状を持っていっても、 また別のパチモン屋台が立ち上がっちまってよ。
jpnSearchText:
被害報告があって令状を持っていっても、
また別のパチモン屋台が立ち上がっちまってよ。

engChrName: It's a pain to be out some money, but it probably wasn't that much you lost in the grand scheme of things, right?
engSearchText:
It's a pain to be out some money, but it probably
wasn't that much you lost in the grand scheme of
things, right?
jpnChrName: それに、アンタたちの被害額だって 大した事ないだろ？
jpnSearchText:
それに、アンタたちの被害額だって
大した事ないだろ？

engChrName: I guess so...
engSearchText: I guess so...
jpnChrName: ま、まあそうですね……
jpnSearchText: ま、まあそうですね……

engChrName: Then I'd just take the hit and move on, sad to say. Be glad that's all it cost you to learn how things work around here.
engSearchText:
Then I'd just take the hit and move on, sad to say.
Be glad that's all it cost you to learn how things work
around here.
jpnChrName: それなら、これも社会勉強だと思ってさ。 今回の被害額は勉強代として諦めたらどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
それなら、これも社会勉強だと思ってさ。
今回の被害額は勉強代として諦めたらどうだ？

engChrName: Oh, it's our fault we got scammed, is that it? I thought the good, upstanding officers of the law were supposed to care about justice.
engSearchText:
Oh, it's our fault we got scammed, is that it?
I thought the good, upstanding officers of the law
were supposed to care about justice.
jpnChrName: ハッ、オレらの自業自得ってか。 警察の言葉とは思えねえな？
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、オレらの自業自得ってか。
警察の言葉とは思えねえな？

engChrName: Don't get preachy with me, kid. Fact is, we've got our hands full and we have to pick our fights carefully right now.
engSearchText:
Don't get preachy with me, kid. Fact is, we've got our
hands full and we have to pick our fights carefully
right now.
jpnChrName: そうカッカすんなよ…… 悪いが、俺達も余裕がねえんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そうカッカすんなよ……
悪いが、俺達も余裕がねえんだ。

engChrName: With all the security we have to provide for the actors and venues, we're swamped as it is with this damn film festival.
engSearchText:
With all the security we have to provide for the actors
and venues, we're swamped as it is with this damn
film festival.
jpnChrName: サルバッド警察は映画祭に向けて 外から増援を頼んでる立場だからな。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド警察は映画祭に向けて
外から増援を頼んでる立場だからな。

engChrName: Hell, we've had to call in additional help from other precincts so we have enough boots on the ground!
engSearchText:
Hell, we've had to call in additional help from other
precincts so we have enough boots on the ground!
jpnChrName: 会場の警備から出演者の警備まで、 他所の警官に指示を出さなくちゃならねえ。
jpnSearchText:
会場の警備から出演者の警備まで、
他所の警官に指示を出さなくちゃならねえ。

engChrName: Look, I get you might not like it, but we straight up don't have time to pursue every little thing that comes up right now.
engSearchText:
Look, I get you might not like it, but we straight up
don't have time to pursue every little thing that comes
up right now.
jpnChrName: 大事の前の小事に 構ってる余裕なんてねえんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
大事の前の小事に
構ってる余裕なんてねえんだよ。

engChrName: (It sucks for me, too. All these damn tourists make it tough to skip out on the job. *sigh*)
engSearchText:
(It sucks for me, too. All these damn tourists make it
tough to skip out on the job. *sigh*)
jpnChrName: （俺としちゃ、余所者が多くて   サボりにくいからダルいんだが……）
jpnSearchText:
（俺としちゃ、余所者が多くて
サボりにくいからダルいんだが……）

engChrName: I heard that, you know.
engSearchText: I heard that, you know.
jpnChrName: オイ聞こえてるぞ……
jpnSearchText: オイ聞こえてるぞ……

engChrName: But if that's the way it is, I think we're done here. C'mon, guys.
engSearchText:
But if that's the way it is, I think we're done here.
C'mon, guys.
jpnChrName: だがそういう事なら 俺達は引きさがるとするか。
jpnSearchText:
だがそういう事なら
俺達は引きさがるとするか。

engChrName: All right, I think that's enough sleuthin' around for now. We got a bombshell to deal with already.
engSearchText:
All right, I think that's enough sleuthin' around
for now. We got a bombshell to deal with already.
jpnChrName: さて、聞き込みはこの程度で十分だろ。 デカい収穫もあった事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、聞き込みはこの程度で十分だろ。
デカい収穫もあった事だしな。

engChrName: We do? I mean, we talked to a bunch of people, but it sure didn't feel like we heard anything that big.
engSearchText:
We do? I mean, we talked to a bunch of people, but it
sure didn't feel like we heard anything that big.
jpnChrName: 確かに色々と情報は聞き出せましたけど、 デカい収穫というと……？
jpnSearchText:
確かに色々と情報は聞き出せましたけど、
デカい収穫というと……？

engChrName: Speak for yourself. There's one part that's definitely been nagging at me.
engSearchText:
Speak for yourself. There's one part that's definitely
been nagging at me.
jpnChrName: ま、引っかかる所はあったよな。
jpnSearchText: ま、引っかかる所はあったよな。

engChrName: Me, too, although I'm not certain whether it's especially significant.
engSearchText:
Me, too, although I'm not certain whether it's
especially significant.
jpnChrName: そうですね、 まだ確信はありませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、
まだ確信はありませんけど……

engChrName: Whaaa...?! You're telling me I'm the only one that didn't pick up on it?! Man...
engSearchText:
Whaaa...?! You're telling me I'm the only one that
didn't pick up on it?! Man...
jpnChrName: ええっ～！　ピンと来てないのって わたしだけなんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
ええっ～！　ピンと来てないのって
わたしだけなんですか！？

engChrName: You'll figure it out once we check back in with the stall owner.
engSearchText:
You'll figure it out once we check back in with the
stall owner.
jpnChrName: ま、その辺についても屋台の店主に 直接確認すれば分かるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、その辺についても屋台の店主に
直接確認すれば分かるだろ。

engChrName: Let's head back to his place and touch base.
engSearchText: Let's head back to his place and touch base.
jpnChrName: 依頼主の所に戻ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 依頼主の所に戻ってみるぞ。

engChrName: (Okay, time to hit up another cop and see what they've got to say.)
engSearchText:
(Okay, time to hit up another cop and see what
they've got to say.)
jpnChrName: （それじゃ、他の警官に聞き込みに行くか。）
jpnSearchText: （それじゃ、他の警官に聞き込みに行くか。）

engChrName: (Sounds good to me!)
engSearchText: (Sounds good to me!)
jpnChrName: （はいっ！）
jpnSearchText: （はいっ！）

engChrName: (I know the seller said the cop threatening him was a guy, but best not to leave any stone unturned when investigating things.)
engSearchText:
(I know the seller said the cop threatening him was a
guy, but best not to leave any stone unturned when
investigating things.)
jpnChrName: （犯人は男性警官っつう話だったが   念の為聞いてみるか……）
jpnSearchText:
（犯人は男性警官っつう話だったが
念の為聞いてみるか……）

engChrName: 'Scuse me. You got a second to talk?
engSearchText: 'Scuse me. You got a second to talk?
jpnChrName: 悪いんだが、少しいいか？
jpnSearchText: 悪いんだが、少しいいか？

engChrName: Sure, no problem. What can I do for you?
engSearchText: Sure, no problem. What can I do for you?
jpnChrName: あら、どうされましたか？
jpnSearchText: あら、どうされましたか？

engChrName: Yeah, we just realized we got scammed into buying some fake souvenirs by a street vendor we ran into.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we just realized we got scammed into buying
some fake souvenirs by a street vendor we ran into.
jpnChrName: ああ、実はパチモン屋台に騙されて 土産を買っちまってな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、実はパチモン屋台に騙されて
土産を買っちまってな……

engChrName: We tried to demand our money back, but the guy won't hear any of it.
engSearchText:
We tried to demand our money back, but the guy
won't hear any of it.
jpnChrName: 払い戻しさせてくれって言ってんだが、 向こうが聞いてくれなくてよ。
jpnSearchText:
払い戻しさせてくれって言ってんだが、
向こうが聞いてくれなくてよ。

engChrName: Is there anything you can do to help? Doesn't feel fair for the guy to leave us high and dry like that.
engSearchText:
Is there anything you can do to help? Doesn't feel fair
for the guy to leave us high and dry like that.
jpnChrName: このままじゃ納得いかねえし なんとかしてもらえないか？
jpnSearchText:
このままじゃ納得いかねえし
なんとかしてもらえないか？

engChrName: Oh, wow, that's unfortunate. I'm really sorry you had to deal with that.
engSearchText:
Oh, wow, that's unfortunate. I'm really sorry you had
to deal with that.
jpnChrName: まあ……それは災難でしたね。
jpnSearchText: まあ……それは災難でしたね。

engChrName: If this were any other time, I'd be more than happy to go over and try to help you all. Unfortunately...
engSearchText:
If this were any other time, I'd be more than happy to
go over and try to help you all. Unfortunately...
jpnChrName: ですが……申し訳ありません。 出来る事なら今すぐに対処したい所ですが。
jpnSearchText:
ですが……申し訳ありません。
出来る事なら今すぐに対処したい所ですが。

engChrName: With the film festival nearly upon us, we really have to pick and choose what problems get priority attention right now.
engSearchText:
With the film festival nearly upon us, we really have
to pick and choose what problems get priority
attention right now.
jpnChrName: 映画祭を間近に控えた今、 どうしても優先順位を付けざるを得なくて。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭を間近に控えた今、
どうしても優先順位を付けざるを得なくて。

engChrName: Does that mean you won't be able to do anything today?
engSearchText:
Does that mean you won't be able to do
anything today?
jpnChrName: 今すぐ対応してもらう事は難しい訳ですね。
jpnSearchText: 今すぐ対応してもらう事は難しい訳ですね。

engChrName: Sadly, yes. Damn it...those bootleggers are a real handful, just in general. It's difficult for us to keep them in check.
engSearchText:
Sadly, yes. Damn it...those bootleggers are a real
handful, just in general. It's difficult for us to keep
them in check.
jpnChrName: ええ、それにあの手の屋台は厄介でしてね。 徹底的に取り締まる事は難しいんです。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、それにあの手の屋台は厄介でしてね。
徹底的に取り締まる事は難しいんです。

engChrName: But just to be clear, I do absolutely intend to help. I don't want scum like him to get off scot-free.
engSearchText:
But just to be clear, I do absolutely intend to help.
I don't want scum like him to get off scot-free.
jpnChrName: とはいえ、悪質な屋台をそのまま 放置しておくつもりはありませんので。
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、悪質な屋台をそのまま
放置しておくつもりはありませんので。

engChrName: I'll give you a complaint form. Once you've filled it out, can you bring it to the station when you have time?
engSearchText:
I'll give you a complaint form. Once you've filled it
out, can you bring it to the station when you
have time?
jpnChrName: 被害届を渡しておくので、 記入して署まで持って行って頂けますか？
jpnSearchText:
被害届を渡しておくので、
記入して署まで持って行って頂けますか？

engChrName: It'll have to wait until after the festival, but you can be sure I'll recommend he's at least warned, if not outright removed.
engSearchText:
It'll have to wait until after the festival, but you can be
sure I'll recommend he's at least warned, if not
outright removed.
jpnChrName: 映画祭が終わった頃になりますが…… 厳重注意か屋台撤去の勧告をしてみましょう。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭が終わった頃になりますが……
厳重注意か屋台撤去の勧告をしてみましょう。

engChrName: That's fair. We can do that. Thanks for taking the time to listen to us.
engSearchText:
That's fair. We can do that. Thanks for taking the
time to listen to us.
jpnChrName: 分かりました、 ご丁寧にありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText:
分かりました、
ご丁寧にありがとうございます。

engChrName: All right, I think that's enough sleuthin' around for now. We got a bombshell to deal with already.
engSearchText:
All right, I think that's enough sleuthin' around
for now. We got a bombshell to deal with already.
jpnChrName: さて、聞き込みはこの程度で十分だろ。 デカい収穫もあった事だしな。
jpnSearchText:
さて、聞き込みはこの程度で十分だろ。
デカい収穫もあった事だしな。

engChrName: We do? I mean, we talked to a bunch of people, but it sure didn't feel like we heard anything that big.
engSearchText:
We do? I mean, we talked to a bunch of people, but it
sure didn't feel like we heard anything that big.
jpnChrName: 確かに色々と情報は聞き出せましたけど、 デカい収穫というと……？
jpnSearchText:
確かに色々と情報は聞き出せましたけど、
デカい収穫というと……？

engChrName: Speak for yourself. There's one part that's definitely been nagging at me.
engSearchText:
Speak for yourself. There's one part that's definitely
been nagging at me.
jpnChrName: ま、引っかかる所はあったよな。
jpnSearchText: ま、引っかかる所はあったよな。

engChrName: Me, too, although I'm not that confident it's that significant.
engSearchText:
Me, too, although I'm not that confident it's
that significant.
jpnChrName: そうですね、 まだ確信はありませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、
まだ確信はありませんけど……

engChrName: Whaaa...?! You're telling me I'm the only one that didn't pick up on it?! Man...
engSearchText:
Whaaa...?! You're telling me I'm the only one that
didn't pick up on it?! Man...
jpnChrName: ええっ～！　ピンと来てないのって わたしだけなんですか！？
jpnSearchText:
ええっ～！　ピンと来てないのって
わたしだけなんですか！？

engChrName: You'll figure it out once we check back in with the stall owner.
engSearchText:
You'll figure it out once we check back in with the
stall owner.
jpnChrName: ま、その辺についても屋台の店主に 直接確認すれば分かるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、その辺についても屋台の店主に
直接確認すれば分かるだろ。

engChrName: Let's head back to his place and touch base.
engSearchText: Let's head back to his place and touch base.
jpnChrName: 依頼主の所に戻ってみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 依頼主の所に戻ってみるぞ。

engChrName: (Okay, time to hit up another cop and see what they've got to say.)
engSearchText:
(Okay, time to hit up another cop and see what
they've got to say.)
jpnChrName: （それじゃ、他の警官に聞き込みに行くか。）
jpnSearchText: （それじゃ、他の警官に聞き込みに行くか。）

engChrName: Hey, buddy. How's your hot date going?
engSearchText: Hey, buddy. How's your hot date going?
jpnChrName: よぉ、捜査官。 サルバッドのデートは順調か？
jpnSearchText:
よぉ、捜査官。
サルバッドのデートは順調か？

engChrName: Don't call me 'buddy'! We are NOT friends! I'm not interested in shooting the breeze with you!
engSearchText:
Don't call me 'buddy'! We are NOT friends! I'm not
interested in shooting the breeze with you!
jpnChrName: 出たな解決屋……一体何の用だ。 というかそもそも、気やすく話しかけてくるな！
jpnSearchText:
出たな解決屋……一体何の用だ。
というかそもそも、気やすく話しかけてくるな！

engChrName: Oh, but of course, that doesn't apply to you, Agnès! If you ever need help with anything, I'm always happy to talk.
engSearchText:
Oh, but of course, that doesn't apply to you, Agnès!
If you ever need help with anything, I'm always happy
to talk.
jpnChrName: あっ、勿論アニエスちゃんに 困り事があるっていうなら相談に乗るけどね！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、勿論アニエスちゃんに
困り事があるっていうなら相談に乗るけどね！

engChrName: Little cozy with her, aren't you, babe? Look at you, talking to another woman while you're on a date with your girlfriend.
engSearchText:
Little cozy with her, aren't you, babe? Look at you,
talking to another woman while you're on a date with
your girlfriend.
jpnChrName: へぇ？　彼女とデート中だっていうのに いい度胸してるじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ？　彼女とデート中だっていうのに
いい度胸してるじゃない。

engChrName: I-It's not like that, sweetie, I promise! I only meant I'd talk to her in my capacity as a policeman!
engSearchText:
I-It's not like that, sweetie, I promise! I only meant
I'd talk to her in my capacity as a policeman!
jpnChrName: あっ、いやいや！ 警察として相談に乗るっていう意味だから！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、いやいや！
警察として相談に乗るっていう意味だから！

engChrName: Ahaha...
engSearchText: Ahaha...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: (I thought we should try asking Detective Nate about the crooked policeman, since it is his line of work and all.)
engSearchText:
(I thought we should try asking Detective Nate about
the crooked policeman, since it is his line of work
and all.)
jpnChrName: （汚職警官の件……ネイト捜査官にも   聞いてみようかと思いましたけど。）
jpnSearchText:
（汚職警官の件……ネイト捜査官にも
聞いてみようかと思いましたけど。）

engChrName: (But if he's here off duty, then...)
engSearchText: (But if he's here off duty, then...)
jpnChrName: （サルバッドには休暇に来ているようですし……）
jpnSearchText: （サルバッドには休暇に来ているようですし……）

engChrName: (Yeah. Not to mention that he might not have much to say about that or the bootlegger in general.)
engSearchText:
(Yeah. Not to mention that he might not have much
to say about that or the bootlegger in general.)
jpnChrName: （ああ、パチモン屋台や汚職警官について   聞き出せる事は少ねえかもな。）
jpnSearchText:
（ああ、パチモン屋台や汚職警官について
聞き出せる事は少ねえかもな。）

engChrName: (That's my thinking. Could end up being more trouble than it's worth in the end, talking to him.)
engSearchText:
(That's my thinking. Could end up being more
trouble than it's worth in the end, talking to him.)
jpnChrName: （むしろ、もっと面倒くせえ事になりそうだ。）
jpnSearchText: （むしろ、もっと面倒くせえ事になりそうだ。）

engChrName: (Yeah. Guess we better back off and look elsewhere.)
engSearchText: (Yeah. Guess we better back off and look elsewhere.)
jpnChrName: （えと……それじゃあわたしたちは   退散しておきましょうか。）
jpnSearchText:
（えと……それじゃあわたしたちは
退散しておきましょうか。）

engChrName: ...So, you went straight to the source and talked to the cops, huh? Makes sense, I guess.
engSearchText:
...So, you went straight to the source and talked to the
cops, huh? Makes sense, I guess.
jpnChrName: なるほど……それでアンタ達は 警官に聞き込んでくれた訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……それでアンタ達は
警官に聞き込んでくれた訳だな。

engChrName: How'd it go? Did you guys manage to turn anything up about that crooked ass?
engSearchText:
How'd it go? Did you guys manage to turn anything
up about that crooked ass?
jpnChrName: それで、結局汚職警官について 分かった事はあるのか？
jpnSearchText:
それで、結局汚職警官について
分かった事はあるのか？

engChrName: Oh, we turned up quite a lot. In fact, I'd say we just about hit the jackpot.
engSearchText:
Oh, we turned up quite a lot. In fact, I'd say we just
about hit the jackpot.
jpnChrName: ああ、情報面でも色々と掴めたが まさに“アタリ”を引いちまってな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、情報面でも色々と掴めたが
まさに“アタリ”を引いちまってな。

engChrName: I'm confident that we found your man.
engSearchText: I'm confident that we found your man.
jpnChrName: ──その汚職警官本人らしいヤツを見つけたぜ。
jpnSearchText: ──その汚職警官本人らしいヤツを見つけたぜ。

engChrName: Already?! That was fast!
engSearchText: Already?! That was fast!
jpnChrName: な、なんだって！？
jpnSearchText: な、なんだって！？

engChrName: Wait, we have?! I didn't realize that at all!
engSearchText: Wait, we have?! I didn't realize that at all!
jpnChrName: ええっ！？ そんな人いましたか……！？
jpnSearchText:
ええっ！？
そんな人いましたか……！？

engChrName: I can understand that. It was easy to miss, but there was one officer that rubbed me the wrong way with what he said.
engSearchText:
I can understand that. It was easy to miss, but there
was one officer that rubbed me the wrong way with
what he said.
jpnChrName: そうですね……僅かにですが、 確かに一人だけ違和感がありました。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……僅かにですが、
確かに一人だけ違和感がありました。

engChrName: Well, if you're feeling so confident, it's got to be that one, right?
engSearchText:
Well, if you're feeling so confident, it's got to be that
one, right?
jpnChrName: ハン、アンタがそこまで断言すんなら やっぱりアイツって事か。
jpnSearchText:
ハン、アンタがそこまで断言すんなら
やっぱりアイツって事か。

engChrName: I want to bring you over so you can confirm whether or not we've got the right person. You mind comin' with us?
engSearchText:
I want to bring you over so you can confirm whether
or not we've got the right person. You mind comin'
with us?
jpnChrName: これからソイツの所にアンタを連れて行く。 そこで例の警官かどうか顔を見て判断してくれ。
jpnSearchText:
これからソイツの所にアンタを連れて行く。
そこで例の警官かどうか顔を見て判断してくれ。

engChrName: Sure, no problem. I couldn't forget that face even if I tried! I remember it clear as day.
engSearchText:
Sure, no problem. I couldn't forget that face even if
I tried! I remember it clear as day.
jpnChrName: ああ、アイツの顔は よく憶えてるから任せといてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、アイツの顔は
よく憶えてるから任せといてくれ。

engChrName: Did you happen to catch a name? I'm curious.
engSearchText: Did you happen to catch a name? I'm curious.
jpnChrName: ちなみにそいつの名前はなんて言うんだ？
jpnSearchText: ちなみにそいつの名前はなんて言うんだ？

engChrName: Of course. Our dirty cop is none other than...
engSearchText: Of course. Our dirty cop is none other than...
jpnChrName: ああ、汚職警官だと思われる警官の名前は──
jpnSearchText: ああ、汚職警官だと思われる警官の名前は──

engChrName: (Our best guess is Officer Kelvin.)
engSearchText: (Our best guess is Officer Kelvin.)
jpnChrName: （汚職警官だと思われるやつは、ケルビン巡査──）
jpnSearchText: （汚職警官だと思われるやつは、ケルビン巡査──）

engChrName: (Wait, no it isn't. It can't be him. Guy's got a clear lack of commitment to his job, but that's a separate thing entirely.)
engSearchText:
(Wait, no it isn't. It can't be him. Guy's got a clear
lack of commitment to his job, but that's a separate
thing entirely.)
jpnChrName: （って、汚職警官はコイツじゃねえよな。   あの勤務態度はどうかと思うけどよ……）
jpnSearchText:
（って、汚職警官はコイツじゃねえよな。
あの勤務態度はどうかと思うけどよ……）

engChrName: (Our best guess is Officer Vernier.)
engSearchText: (Our best guess is Officer Vernier.)
jpnChrName: （汚職警官だと思われるやつは、バーニヤ巡査──）
jpnSearchText: （汚職警官だと思われるやつは、バーニヤ巡査──）

engChrName: (Wait, no it isn't. It can't be her. She didn't say or do anything that stuck out as being all that suspect.)
engSearchText:
(Wait, no it isn't. It can't be her. She didn't say or do
anything that stuck out as being all that suspect.)
jpnChrName: （って、汚職警官はコイツじゃねえな。   特に怪しい点は無かったはずだ。）
jpnSearchText:
（って、汚職警官はコイツじゃねえな。
特に怪しい点は無かったはずだ。）

engChrName: Officer Camilo. Least, that's what he claims to go by. Who knows if it's legit?
engSearchText:
Officer Camilo. Least, that's what he claims to go by.
Who knows if it's legit?
jpnChrName: 名前はカミロ巡査── つっても、本名かどうかも怪しいがな。
jpnSearchText:
名前はカミロ巡査──
つっても、本名かどうかも怪しいがな。

engChrName: What? THAT guy?!
engSearchText: What? THAT guy?!
jpnChrName: ええっ、カミロ巡査ですか！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ、カミロ巡査ですか！？

engChrName: Are you for real?! He seemed super nice!
engSearchText: Are you for real?! He seemed super nice!
jpnChrName: 信じられません…… すごくいい人そうでしたよ？
jpnSearchText:
信じられません……
すごくいい人そうでしたよ？

engChrName: Out of everyone we talked to, he was the most fired up to help us.
engSearchText:
Out of everyone we talked to, he was the most fired
up to help us.
jpnChrName: むしろ、声をかけた人の中で 一番熱心に力になろうとしてくれました。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ、声をかけた人の中で
一番熱心に力になろうとしてくれました。

engChrName: Exactly. That's problem number one.
engSearchText: Exactly. That's problem number one.
jpnChrName: ああ、まず問題の一つ目はそこだ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、まず問題の一つ目はそこだ。

engChrName: Vernier was willin' to hear us out, too, but she herself said that the local bootleggers're hard to shut down.
engSearchText:
Vernier was willin' to hear us out, too, but she herself
said that the local bootleggers're hard to shut down.
jpnChrName: バーニヤ巡査も熱心に話を聞いてくれたが…… “パチモン売りの検挙は難しい”つってたよな。
jpnSearchText:
バーニヤ巡査も熱心に話を聞いてくれたが……
“パチモン売りの検挙は難しい”つってたよな。

engChrName: And as Kelvin put it, tryin' to bring 'em is in like cat and mouse. They'll just scatter everywhere on you and crop up again later.
engSearchText:
And as Kelvin put it, tryin' to bring 'em is in like cat
and mouse. They'll just scatter everywhere on you and
crop up again later.
jpnChrName: その理由に関してはケルビン巡査も言ってた通り、 イタチごっこでキリがねえからだ。
jpnSearchText:
その理由に関してはケルビン巡査も言ってた通り、
イタチごっこでキリがねえからだ。

engChrName: Plus with the festival occupyin' the force's attention, they're in no position to devote resources to anything other than serious crimes.
engSearchText:
Plus with the festival occupyin' the force's attention,
they're in no position to devote resources to anything
other than serious crimes.
jpnChrName: その上、今は映画祭にかかりきりで 重犯罪でもない限り手は回せねえ状況だ。
jpnSearchText:
その上、今は映画祭にかかりきりで
重犯罪でもない限り手は回せねえ状況だ。

engChrName: That's right. Despite that, Officer Camilo very clearly said he would absolutely arrest the seller who 'scammed' us.
engSearchText:
That's right. Despite that, Officer Camilo very clearly
said he would absolutely arrest the seller who
'scammed' us.
jpnChrName: そうですね……でもカミロ巡査は “必ず検挙する”と言っていました。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……でもカミロ巡査は
“必ず検挙する”と言っていました。

engChrName: It wouldn't be all that unusual if he was simply that dedicated to his job, but you have to remember...
engSearchText:
It wouldn't be all that unusual if he was simply that
dedicated to his job, but you have to remember...
jpnChrName: 職務に熱心な方だと思えば、 さほど違和感はありませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
職務に熱心な方だと思えば、
さほど違和感はありませんけど……

engChrName: When we mentioned it was this stand specifically, he suddenly sounded a lot less interested in helping us.
engSearchText:
When we mentioned it was this stand specifically, he
suddenly sounded a lot less interested in helping us.
jpnChrName: この屋台の事を話したら、 興味がなくなったようにも見えましたよね。
jpnSearchText:
この屋台の事を話したら、
興味がなくなったようにも見えましたよね。

engChrName: Huh, that's strange. What does it all mean?
engSearchText: Huh, that's strange. What does it all mean?
jpnChrName: お、おう……つまりどういうことだ？
jpnSearchText: お、おう……つまりどういうことだ？

engChrName: Think about what you would do if you weren't on the up-and-up. It all starts to make sense.
engSearchText:
Think about what you would do if you weren't on
the up-and-up. It all starts to make sense.
jpnChrName: あの警官を汚職警官だと思って 考えれば辻褄が合うっつう事だ。
jpnSearchText:
あの警官を汚職警官だと思って
考えれば辻褄が合うっつう事だ。

engChrName: Our man in blue wasn't interested in helping us. He was just looking for a NEW mark.
engSearchText:
Our man in blue wasn't interested in helping us.
He was just looking for a NEW mark.
jpnChrName: あの警官が興味があったのは新しい“カモ”──
jpnSearchText: あの警官が興味があったのは新しい“カモ”──

engChrName: A new mark that he can try and squeeze hush money out of in the exact same way he has with you.
engSearchText:
A new mark that he can try and squeeze hush money
out of in the exact same way he has with you.
jpnChrName: アンタにしたのと同じ手口で “口止め料”を請求する先を探してたんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタにしたのと同じ手口で
“口止め料”を請求する先を探してたんだろ。

engChrName: But once he realized he'd already hit you up, he suddenly had a bunch of reasons why trusty law enforcement can't help us today.
engSearchText:
But once he realized he'd already hit you up, he
suddenly had a bunch of reasons why trusty law
enforcement can't help us today.
jpnChrName: だが、相手は既に手を付けてある アンタの屋台だと知ってガッカリだった訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
だが、相手は既に手を付けてある
アンタの屋台だと知ってガッカリだった訳だ。

engChrName: That makes sense. I can see how someone like him would think like that.
engSearchText:
That makes sense. I can see how someone like him
would think like that.
jpnChrName: なるほど、汚職警官本人だと思うと 確かに納得できるな……！
jpnSearchText:
なるほど、汚職警官本人だと思うと
確かに納得できるな……！

engChrName: Hmm... But so far, all that shows is that he looks like he might be crooked.
engSearchText:
Hmm... But so far, all that shows is that he looks like
he might be crooked.
jpnChrName: うーん……でもそれって、 言動がそれらしいというだけですよね？
jpnSearchText:
うーん……でもそれって、
言動がそれらしいというだけですよね？

engChrName: Don't we need more evidence before we can pin the blame on him?
engSearchText:
Don't we need more evidence before we can pin the
blame on him?
jpnChrName: 汚職警官だと決めつけるにはまだ早いような……？
jpnSearchText: 汚職警官だと決めつけるにはまだ早いような……？

engChrName: Funny you should say 'looks.' That's the second problem with him, actually.
engSearchText:
Funny you should say 'looks.' That's the second
problem with him, actually.
jpnChrName: ああ、そこで二つ目の問題点だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そこで二つ目の問題点だ。

engChrName: We can't rule out that he might not be police at all, let alone a rotten cop. We may well be dealin' with an impostor.
engSearchText:
We can't rule out that he might not be police at all,
let alone a rotten cop. We may well be dealin' with
an impostor.
jpnChrName: そもそもアイツは警官じゃねえ可能性がある。 ──汚職警官ならぬ、偽警官っつう所か。
jpnSearchText:
そもそもアイツは警官じゃねえ可能性がある。
──汚職警官ならぬ、偽警官っつう所か。

engChrName: Oh, damn! Are you serious?!
engSearchText: Oh, damn! Are you serious?!
jpnChrName: な、なんだって──！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>な、なんだって──！？

engChrName: But he was clearly wearing his uniform when I talked to him! That makes him about as legit as it gets, doesn't it?
engSearchText:
But he was clearly wearing his uniform when I talked
to him! That makes him about as legit as it gets,
doesn't it?
jpnChrName: だが確かにアイツは警官の制服を着てたぞ！？
jpnSearchText: だが確かにアイツは警官の制服を着てたぞ！？

engChrName: That uniform is exactly what's wrong with him. It looked off to me, too.
engSearchText:
That uniform is exactly what's wrong with him.
It looked off to me, too.
jpnChrName: まさにその制服が問題なんだろ？ オレも違和感はあった。
jpnSearchText:
まさにその制服が問題なんだろ？
オレも違和感はあった。

engChrName: Oh, yeah! Now that I think about it, his clothes did look newer than the other officers we talked to. I hadn't thought about that.
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! Now that I think about it, his clothes did
look newer than the other officers we talked to.
I hadn't thought about that.
jpnChrName: あっ、確かにカミロ巡査の制服は 他の方よりも新しい感じがしました。
jpnSearchText:
あっ、確かにカミロ巡査の制服は
他の方よりも新しい感じがしました。

engChrName: Tharbad is a desert city with a lot of sand blowing around. Officers try to stay neat, but it should be a bit of a struggle.
engSearchText:
Tharbad is a desert city with a lot of sand
blowing around. Officers try to stay neat, but it
should be a bit of a struggle.
jpnChrName: サルバッドは砂塵が多いですし、 制服ともなればすぐ汚れてしまいそうですよね。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドは砂塵が多いですし、
制服ともなればすぐ汚れてしまいそうですよね。

engChrName: Obviously, it's not impossible that it's a coincidence and his uniform just happens to be brand new, but...
engSearchText:
Obviously, it's not impossible that it's a coincidence
and his uniform just happens to be brand new, but...
jpnChrName: おろしたて、という可能性も ゼロではありませんけど……
jpnSearchText:
おろしたて、という可能性も
ゼロではありませんけど……

engChrName: When you think about that, and the way he talked to us, that's enough to lean toward him being the culprit.
engSearchText:
When you think about that, and the way he talked to
us, that's enough to lean toward him being
the culprit.
jpnChrName: 今までの言動と、制服の違和感を合わせれば “偽警官”を疑う根拠にはなりそうです。
jpnSearchText:
今までの言動と、制服の違和感を合わせれば
“偽警官”を疑う根拠にはなりそうです。

engChrName: Yep. Couldn't have said it better myself.
engSearchText: Yep. Couldn't have said it better myself.
jpnChrName: ま、そういうこったな。
jpnSearchText: ま、そういうこったな。

engChrName: When you guys put it like that, I can see what makes him suspicious! We should definitely talk to him again.
engSearchText:
When you guys put it like that, I can see what makes
him suspicious! We should definitely talk to
him again.
jpnChrName: ここまでくると、確かにカミロ巡査から 話を聞いてみる必要がありそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
ここまでくると、確かにカミロ巡査から
話を聞いてみる必要がありそうですね。

engChrName: That asshole. I tried to be polite with him, thinking he was an authority figure, and now it turns out he's not even a real cop!
engSearchText:
That asshole. I tried to be polite with him, thinking
he was an authority figure, and now it turns out he's
not even a real cop!
jpnChrName: あの野郎……警官だと思って下手（したて）に出て やったってのに、警官ですらなかったとはな！
jpnSearchText:
あの野郎……警官だと思って下手（したて）に出て
やったってのに、警官ですらなかったとはな！

engChrName: He won't get away with making a mockery of me! Where is he? I'll kick his ass!
engSearchText:
He won't get away with making a mockery of me!
Where is he? I'll kick his ass!
jpnChrName: 舐めた真似しやがって…… 今すぐブッ飛ばしてやろうか！？
jpnSearchText:
舐めた真似しやがって……
今すぐブッ飛ばしてやろうか！？

engChrName: Whoa, slow down there, buddy.
engSearchText: Whoa, slow down there, buddy.
jpnChrName: おっと……まあ落ち着けって。
jpnSearchText: おっと……まあ落ち着けって。

engChrName: If our hunch about him being an impostor's right, we gotta tread with caution.
engSearchText:
If our hunch about him being an impostor's right, we
gotta tread with caution.
jpnChrName: 仮に相手が偽警官だったとすれば、 慎重に事を進める必要がある。
jpnSearchText:
仮に相手が偽警官だったとすれば、
慎重に事を進める必要がある。

engChrName: What? Why? What's the big deal?
engSearchText: What? Why? What's the big deal?
jpnChrName: ど、どういう意味だよ！？
jpnSearchText: ど、どういう意味だよ！？

engChrName: Pretending you're a policeman isn't exactly a casual prank. It's flagrantly illegal, and extremely risky.
engSearchText:
Pretending you're a policeman isn't exactly a
casual prank. It's flagrantly illegal, and
extremely risky.
jpnChrName: 警官に成りすますなんて、 どう考えてもリスクが高いですもんね。
jpnSearchText:
警官に成りすますなんて、
どう考えてもリスクが高いですもんね。

engChrName: So the fact that he's doing so, in full broad daylight, in a massive city, must mean...
engSearchText:
So the fact that he's doing so, in full broad daylight,
in a massive city, must mean...
jpnChrName: それにも関わらず、 堂々と街中にいるという事は……
jpnSearchText:
それにも関わらず、
堂々と街中にいるという事は……

engChrName: He's got bigger fish to fry. He's after something more than just shaking down random hawkers for shits and giggles.
engSearchText:
He's got bigger fish to fry. He's after something more
than just shaking down random hawkers for shits
and giggles.
jpnChrName: パチモン店主への恐喝なんてセコい詐欺とは別に、 デカい目的があるんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
パチモン店主への恐喝なんてセコい詐欺とは別に、
デカい目的があるんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Exactly. Until we figure out what exactly it is our man's after, it's best to try negotiating with him while trying to suss out what's up.
engSearchText:
Exactly. Until we figure out what exactly it is our
man's after, it's best to try negotiating with him while
trying to suss out what's up.
jpnChrName: ああ、相手の狙いが分からねえ以上、 慎重に探りつつ交渉するべきだ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、相手の狙いが分からねえ以上、
慎重に探りつつ交渉するべきだ。

engChrName: Let me handle the talkin' here, all right? You keep your distance from him. We don't want anything happenin'.
engSearchText:
Let me handle the talkin' here, all right? You keep
your distance from him. We don't want
anything happenin'.
jpnChrName: だから交渉は全て俺に任せておけ。 そんで、アンタは不用意に警官に近づかない事だ。
jpnSearchText:
だから交渉は全て俺に任せておけ。
そんで、アンタは不用意に警官に近づかない事だ。

engChrName: Don't worry! We'll do our best to make sure you come out on top!
engSearchText:
Don't worry! We'll do our best to make sure you
come out on top!
jpnChrName: マルセロさんにとって 有利になるように努力しますから！
jpnSearchText:
マルセロさんにとって
有利になるように努力しますから！

engChrName: Gah, I hate not being in control of the situation... All right. I'm trusting you guys to come through!
engSearchText:
Gah, I hate not being in control of the situation...
All right. I'm trusting you guys to come through!
jpnChrName: チッ……仕方ねえか。 分かった、よろしく頼んだぞ……！
jpnSearchText:
チッ……仕方ねえか。
分かった、よろしく頼んだぞ……！

engChrName: (All right, now with that settled, we should probably take this guy over to see Officer Camilo.)
engSearchText:
(All right, now with that settled, we should probably
take this guy over to see Officer Camilo.)
jpnChrName: （さてと……   この店主を連れてカミロ巡査の所に行くか？）
jpnSearchText:
（さてと……
この店主を連れてカミロ巡査の所に行くか？）

engChrName: (All right, now with that settled, we should probably take this guy over to see Officer Camilo.)
engSearchText:
(All right, now with that settled, we should probably
take this guy over to see Officer Camilo.)
jpnChrName: （さてと……   この店主を連れてカミロ巡査の所に行くか？）
jpnSearchText:
（さてと……
この店主を連れてカミロ巡査の所に行くか？）

engChrName: We'll bring you over there in a bit. There's somethin' else we need to take care of first.
engSearchText:
We'll bring you over there in a bit. There's somethin'
else we need to take care of first.
jpnChrName: 後でまた声をかける。 その時一緒にあの巡査の元へ行くぞ。
jpnSearchText:
後でまた声をかける。
その時一緒にあの巡査の元へ行くぞ。

engChrName: No problem. I'll be here!
engSearchText: No problem. I'll be here!
jpnChrName: ああ、待ってるぜ……！
jpnSearchText: ああ、待ってるぜ……！

engChrName: Phew, I owe you guys. You've done a ton for me.
engSearchText: Phew, I owe you guys. You've done a ton for me.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……アンタ達には 何から何まで世話になっちまったな。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……アンタ達には
何から何まで世話になっちまったな。

engChrName: Thanks again for everything. I'll make sure your reward is worth it.
engSearchText:
Thanks again for everything. I'll make sure your
reward is worth it.
jpnChrName: 改めて、本当にありがとな。 報酬は弾ませてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
改めて、本当にありがとな。
報酬は弾ませてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Hey, we won't say no. Just...keep the bootlegs to yourself, all right?
engSearchText:
Hey, we won't say no. Just...keep the bootlegs to
yourself, all right?
jpnChrName: おう、好きなだけ弾んでくれや。 ……ただしパチモンはいらねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
おう、好きなだけ弾んでくれや。
……ただしパチモンはいらねえからな？

engChrName: Ha! Don't worry, I wasn't going to pull that on you.
engSearchText: Ha! Don't worry, I wasn't going to pull that on you.
jpnChrName: はは、分かってるっての！
jpnSearchText: はは、分かってるっての！

engChrName: I'm a little concerned about what he said right at the end, before he took off, though.
engSearchText:
I'm a little concerned about what he said right at the
end, before he took off, though.
jpnChrName: それにしても……犯人が最後に言っていた 言葉は少し引っかかりますよね。
jpnSearchText:
それにしても……犯人が最後に言っていた
言葉は少し引っかかりますよね。

engChrName: Yeah, he said something about a brother... Maybe it was code for an accomplice?
engSearchText:
Yeah, he said something about a brother... Maybe it
was code for an accomplice?
jpnChrName: “兄貴”とか言ってましたっけ。 うーん……共犯者の事でしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
“兄貴”とか言ってましたっけ。
うーん……共犯者の事でしょうか？

engChrName: I agree with what Van said. It sure felt like he wasn't just here to threaten people. But what else could he be doing?
engSearchText:
I agree with what Van said. It sure felt like he wasn't
just here to threaten people. But what else could he
be doing?
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんが言っていた通り、脅迫以外の 目的がありそうな雰囲気でしたけど……
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんが言っていた通り、脅迫以外の
目的がありそうな雰囲気でしたけど……

engChrName: Doesn't matter. Not our problem as long as it doesn't come up in our work. Let the cops and bracers sweat it.
engSearchText:
Doesn't matter. Not our problem as long as it doesn't
come up in our work. Let the cops and bracers
sweat it.
jpnChrName: 依頼で関わらねえ限りどうでもいいだろ。 後は警察なり遊撃士なりの仕事ってな。
jpnSearchText:
依頼で関わらねえ限りどうでもいいだろ。
後は警察なり遊撃士なりの仕事ってな。

engChrName: My thoughts exactly. All we can do is hope that whatever it is doesn't land on our desk in the future.
engSearchText:
My thoughts exactly. All we can do is hope that
whatever it is doesn't land on our desk in the future.
jpnChrName: だな……下手にウチへ仕事が 回って来ねえ事を祈るばかりだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
だな……下手にウチへ仕事が
回って来ねえ事を祈るばかりだぜ。

engChrName: Just keep it in the file cabinet, and in the meantime let's find some more work to do.
engSearchText:
Just keep it in the file cabinet, and in the meantime
let's find some more work to do.
jpnChrName: ま、一応気には留めておきつつ ボチボチ次の仕事に移るとするか。
jpnSearchText:
ま、一応気には留めておきつつ
ボチボチ次の仕事に移るとするか。

engChrName: How are you feeling, Marcello? You're not too hurt, are you?
engSearchText:
How are you feeling, Marcello? You're not too hurt,
are you?
jpnChrName: マルセロさん、怪我の具合はどうですか？
jpnSearchText: マルセロさん、怪我の具合はどうですか？

engChrName: Nah, nothing I can't handle. I shouldn't have charged in and confronted the guy like that, anyway.
engSearchText:
Nah, nothing I can't handle. I shouldn't have charged
in and confronted the guy like that, anyway.
jpnChrName: ああ、このくらい大した事ねえよ。 勝手に前に出ちまった俺が悪いしな……
jpnSearchText:
ああ、このくらい大した事ねえよ。
勝手に前に出ちまった俺が悪いしな……

engChrName: I definitely owe you guys. You've done a ton for me.
engSearchText: I definitely owe you guys. You've done a ton for me.
jpnChrName: しかし、アンタ達には 何から何まで本当に世話になっちまった。
jpnSearchText:
しかし、アンタ達には
何から何まで本当に世話になっちまった。

engChrName: Thanks again for everything. I'll make sure your reward is worth it.
engSearchText:
Thanks again for everything. I'll make sure your
reward is worth it.
jpnChrName: 改めて、ありがとな。 報酬は弾ませてもらうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
改めて、ありがとな。
報酬は弾ませてもらうぜ。

engChrName: Hey, we won't say no. Just...keep the bootlegs to yourself, all right?
engSearchText:
Hey, we won't say no. Just...keep the bootlegs to
yourself, all right?
jpnChrName: おう、好きなだけ弾んでくれや。 ……ただしパチモンはいらねえからな？
jpnSearchText:
おう、好きなだけ弾んでくれや。
……ただしパチモンはいらねえからな？

engChrName: Ha! Don't worry, I wasn't going to pull that on you.
engSearchText: Ha! Don't worry, I wasn't going to pull that on you.
jpnChrName: はは、分かってるっての！
jpnSearchText: はは、分かってるっての！

engChrName: Still, it sounds like there's another guy like him if they're called the 'Devancy Brothers.'
engSearchText:
Still, it sounds like there's another guy like him if
they're called the 'Devancy Brothers.'
jpnChrName: それにしても……『ディバンシー兄弟』ですか。
jpnSearchText: それにしても……『ディバンシー兄弟』ですか。

engChrName: Yeah, I can't believe we confronted a wanted criminal! It sounded like they just stuck to Edith before. Wonder why they're here?
engSearchText:
Yeah, I can't believe we confronted a
wanted criminal! It sounded like they just stuck to
Edith before. Wonder why they're here?
jpnChrName: まさか指名手配犯だったなんて驚きましたよね。 今までは首都で活動していたみたいですけど……
jpnSearchText:
まさか指名手配犯だったなんて驚きましたよね。
今までは首都で活動していたみたいですけど……

engChrName: Probably thinking they can use the commotion from the film festival to make a killing while the killing's good, plain and simple.
engSearchText:
Probably thinking they can use the commotion from
the film festival to make a killing while the killing's
good, plain and simple.
jpnChrName: どうせ、映画祭の混乱に乗じて 甘い蜜を吸おうって魂胆だったんだろ。
jpnSearchText:
どうせ、映画祭の混乱に乗じて
甘い蜜を吸おうって魂胆だったんだろ。

engChrName: If his brother is out there, it's probably safe to assume he's already up to no good, whatever it is.
engSearchText:
If his brother is out there, it's probably safe to
assume he's already up to no good, whatever it is.
jpnChrName: 他の兄弟とやらも来てるなら、 既に何かしらヤンチャしてそうなモンだが。
jpnSearchText:
他の兄弟とやらも来てるなら、
既に何かしらヤンチャしてそうなモンだが。

engChrName: Agreed. All we can hope is that whatever he's doing, we don't get more work on our desks because of it.
engSearchText:
Agreed. All we can hope is that whatever he's
doing, we don't get more work on our desks because
of it.
jpnChrName: だな……そいつらのせいで、 下手にウチの仕事が増えなけりゃいいんだが。
jpnSearchText:
だな……そいつらのせいで、
下手にウチの仕事が増えなけりゃいいんだが。

engChrName: Just keep this all in the file cabinet, and in the meantime let's find some more work to do.
engSearchText:
Just keep this all in the file cabinet, and in the
meantime let's find some more work to do.
jpnChrName: ま、一応気には留めておきつつ ボチボチ次の仕事に移るとするかね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、一応気には留めておきつつ
ボチボチ次の仕事に移るとするかね。

engChrName: Quest Hush Money completed!
engSearchText: Quest Hush Money completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【不当な口止め料】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>不当な口止め料<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Hmm... Guess it's not coming back on its own anytime soon, is it?
engSearchText:
Hmm... Guess it's not coming back on its own
anytime soon, is it?
jpnChrName: ううむ…… やはり戻って来てはくれないか……
jpnSearchText:
ううむ……
やはり戻って来てはくれないか……

engChrName: I better round it up soon or else its load could be in real trouble... *sigh*
engSearchText:
I better round it up soon or else its load could be in
real trouble... *sigh*
jpnChrName: 早く迎えに行かなければ…… 積んであるアレも心配だしな……
jpnSearchText:
早く迎えに行かなければ……
積んであるアレも心配だしな……

engChrName: Hey, is it just me or does that guy look like he's in trouble?
engSearchText:
Hey, is it just me or does that guy look like he's
in trouble?
jpnChrName: あの人、どうしたんでしょうか？ なんだか深刻そうな雰囲気ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
あの人、どうしたんでしょうか？
なんだか深刻そうな雰囲気ですけど……

engChrName: Haven't you heard curiosity killed the cat? Keep your nose out of trouble, small fry.
engSearchText:
Haven't you heard curiosity killed the cat? Keep your
nose out of trouble, small fry.
jpnChrName: 首を突っ込むと 面倒事に巻き込まれんぞ。
jpnSearchText:
首を突っ込むと
面倒事に巻き込まれんぞ。

engChrName: Well, it might not be that bad. Maybe it's a problem we can help with.
engSearchText:
Well, it might not be that bad. Maybe it's a problem
we can help with.
jpnChrName: でも、《裏解決屋》の依頼に 当たるような困り事かもしれませんよ。
jpnSearchText:
でも、《裏解決屋》の依頼に
当たるような困り事かもしれませんよ。

engChrName: Not to mention, it might be a good way to get to know the area and the state of it.
engSearchText:
Not to mention, it might be a good way to get to
know the area and the state of it.
jpnChrName: サルバッドの現状を把握するためにも 意義があると思いますけど……
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの現状を把握するためにも
意義があると思いますけど……

engChrName: Well, we are in the area. Might as well see what he needs.
engSearchText:
Well, we are in the area. Might as well see what
he needs.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ、軽く話だけでも聞いてみるか。
jpnSearchText: 仕方ねえ、軽く話だけでも聞いてみるか。

engChrName: Hey, my man. What's wrong? You look a little annoyed about something.
engSearchText:
Hey, my man. What's wrong? You look a little
annoyed about something.
jpnChrName: よう、辛気臭せぇツラしてどうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText: よう、辛気臭せぇツラしてどうしたんだ？

engChrName: Huh? Who are you guys?
engSearchText: Huh? Who are you guys?
jpnChrName: 君たちは……？
jpnSearchText: 君たちは……？

engChrName: Arkride Solutions. We specialize in problems that can't be left to the police or Bracer Guild.
engSearchText:
Arkride Solutions. We specialize in problems that
can't be left to the police or Bracer Guild.
jpnChrName: 俺達は出張で来てる 《アークライド解決事務所》っつうモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
俺達は出張で来てる
《アークライド解決事務所》っつうモンだ。

engChrName: We work out of Edith, but we're out here to handle an assignment.
engSearchText:
We work out of Edith, but we're out here to handle
an assignment.
jpnChrName: 警察や遊撃士は請け負わねえような 依頼を専門にやらせてもらってる。
jpnSearchText:
警察や遊撃士は請け負わねえような
依頼を専門にやらせてもらってる。

engChrName: Dependin' on what's bothering you, we might be able to sort it out.
engSearchText:
Dependin' on what's bothering you, we might be able
to sort it out.
jpnChrName: 内容次第ではアンタの悩みも 聞いてやれるかもしれねえと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
内容次第ではアンタの悩みも
聞いてやれるかもしれねえと思ってな。

engChrName: You could? Oh, that would be great!
engSearchText: You could? Oh, that would be great!
jpnChrName: なんと！　それはありがたい！
jpnSearchText: なんと！　それはありがたい！

engChrName: Wait, you said you specialize in problems that can't be entrusted to the police or the guild, right?
engSearchText:
Wait, you said you specialize in problems that can't
be entrusted to the police or the guild, right?
jpnChrName: いや、だが……警察や遊撃士は 請け負わないような依頼が専門だったか。
jpnSearchText:
いや、だが……警察や遊撃士は
請け負わないような依頼が専門だったか。

engChrName: Does that mean you won't handle anything that falls outside that?
engSearchText:
Does that mean you won't handle anything that falls
outside that?
jpnChrName: それなら君たちには頼めないか……
jpnSearchText: それなら君たちには頼めないか……

engChrName: Not necessarily! Why don't you tell us what's going on?
engSearchText:
Not necessarily! Why don't you tell us what's
going on?
jpnChrName: ちなみに、どういった事情で お困りだったんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、どういった事情で
お困りだったんですか？

engChrName: Well, you see, I make my living distributing fruit in Tharbad.
engSearchText:
Well, you see, I make my living distributing fruit
in Tharbad.
jpnChrName: 私はサルバッドに 果物を卸している商人なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
私はサルバッドに
果物を卸している商人なんだが。

engChrName: This time, I thought I could save a few mira by not hiring any escorts and getting through the Sandsea all on my own.
engSearchText:
This time, I thought I could save a few mira by not
hiring any escorts and getting through the Sandsea all
on my own.
jpnChrName: その……今回は金（ミラ）をケチって、 護衛を雇わず砂丘を渡ってしまってな。
jpnSearchText:
その……今回は金（ミラ）をケチって、
護衛を雇わず砂丘を渡ってしまってな。

engChrName: I figured it would be fine. It's a route I know like the back of my hand. No big deal! Ah, was my deal-sense off.
engSearchText:
I figured it would be fine. It's a route I know like the
back of my hand. No big deal! Ah, was my
deal-sense off.
jpnChrName: 慣れた道だから大丈夫だと思っていたが、 それが間違いだった……
jpnSearchText:
慣れた道だから大丈夫だと思っていたが、
それが間違いだった……

engChrName: A vicious sandstorm hit that completely threw off my sense of direction. And then, of course, monsters had to attack.
engSearchText:
A vicious sandstorm hit that completely threw off my
sense of direction. And then, of course, monsters had
to attack.
jpnChrName: 突然の砂嵐で前後不覚になってしまってな。 道に迷った所を魔獣に襲われたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
突然の砂嵐で前後不覚になってしまってな。
道に迷った所を魔獣に襲われたんだ。

engChrName: That sounds awful. I'm glad you made it out in one piece!
engSearchText:
That sounds awful. I'm glad you made it out in
one piece!
jpnChrName: それは大変でしたね。 でも、見た所無事そうでよかったです。
jpnSearchText:
それは大変でしたね。
でも、見た所無事そうでよかったです。

engChrName: Sounds like mother nature made you pay for your hubris big time.
engSearchText:
Sounds like mother nature made you pay for your
hubris big time.
jpnChrName: ハッ、要は自業自得っつう事だろ？
jpnSearchText: ハッ、要は自業自得っつう事だろ？

engChrName: Did she ever. Fortunately the entire caravan made it out of that mess alive, by the skin of our teeth.
engSearchText:
Did she ever. Fortunately the entire caravan made it
out of that mess alive, by the skin of our teeth.
jpnChrName: うむ……そして命からがら、 商隊全員で街まで逃げ延びたのだが。
jpnSearchText:
うむ……そして命からがら、
商隊全員で街まで逃げ延びたのだが。

engChrName: UN-fortunately, it was only when we got here that I realized the last camel that was supposed to bring up our rear had gone missing.
engSearchText:
UN-fortunately, it was only when we got here that I
realized the last camel that was supposed to bring up
our rear had gone missing.
jpnChrName: 最後尾にいたはずのラクダが、 途中ではぐれていた事に気付いたのだ。
jpnSearchText:
最後尾にいたはずのラクダが、
途中ではぐれていた事に気付いたのだ。

engChrName: And that's a big problem. That animal is carrying rare food that I'd really rather not lose, if I can help it.
engSearchText:
And that's a big problem. That animal is carrying rare
food that I'd really rather not lose, if I can help it.
jpnChrName: そのラクダが、これまた 希少な食べ物が入った荷袋を背負っていてな。
jpnSearchText:
そのラクダが、これまた
希少な食べ物が入った荷袋を背負っていてな。

engChrName: I need to hurry out there and search for that camel and the food, but I'm not sure what to do...
engSearchText:
I need to hurry out there and search for that camel
and the food, but I'm not sure what to do...
jpnChrName: ラクダの為にも商品の為にも 大急ぎで探しに行きたいのだが……
jpnSearchText:
ラクダの為にも商品の為にも
大急ぎで探しに行きたいのだが……

engChrName: Tell me more about this 'rare food' it's haulin' around. What sort of stuff are we talking about, exactly?
engSearchText:
Tell me more about this 'rare food' it's haulin' around.
What sort of stuff are we talking about, exactly?
jpnChrName: 希少な食いモンねえ。 ちなみになんてやつだ？
jpnSearchText:
希少な食いモンねえ。
ちなみになんてやつだ？

engChrName: Have you ever heard of raw cacao? It's pretty obscure, so I doubt you—
engSearchText:
Have you ever heard of raw cacao? It's pretty obscure,
so I doubt you—
jpnChrName: それが、あまり有名ではないんだが。 生カカオと言ってな……
jpnSearchText:
それが、あまり有名ではないんだが。
生カカオと言ってな……

engChrName: I'm sorry, did you say raw cacao?!
engSearchText: I'm sorry, did you say raw cacao?!
jpnChrName: なにぃ！？　生カカオだと！？
jpnSearchText: なにぃ！？　生カカオだと！？

engChrName: Oh, yeah! That was the rare ingredient inside that melfita stuff we had earlier, wasn't it?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah! That was the rare ingredient inside that
melfita stuff we had earlier, wasn't it?
jpnChrName: さっきのメルフィータにも入っていた 珍しい食材なんでしたよね。
jpnSearchText:
さっきのメルフィータにも入っていた
珍しい食材なんでしたよね。

engChrName: I don't get what the big deal is. I can imagine what it's like easily enough if it's like regular old cacao. It can't be that special.
engSearchText:
I don't get what the big deal is. I can imagine what
it's like easily enough if it's like regular old cacao.
It can't be that special.
jpnChrName: カカオっつうからにはなんとなく想像がつくが。 正直ピンと来ねえんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
カカオっつうからにはなんとなく想像がつくが。
正直ピンと来ねえんだよな。

engChrName: That's where you're wrong, my friend. Sounds like someone needs a crash course on cacao and how it works.
engSearchText:
That's where you're wrong, my friend. Sounds like
someone needs a crash course on cacao and how
it works.
jpnChrName: そうだな、まずはカカオの説明から する必要があるが……
jpnSearchText:
そうだな、まずはカカオの説明から
する必要があるが……

engChrName: Cacao beans are the base ingredient of chocolate. You get 'em from inside cacao pods that grow on trees.
engSearchText:
Cacao beans are the base ingredient of chocolate.
You get 'em from inside cacao pods that grow
on trees.
jpnChrName: いいか、チョコレートの原料であるカカオ豆は カカオの木の実の中から採取されてんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いいか、チョコレートの原料であるカカオ豆は
カカオの木の実の中から採取されてんだ。

engChrName: Now, the thing about those cacao pods is that they also have this pulp that can be used, too.
engSearchText:
Now, the thing about those cacao pods is that they
also have this pulp that can be used, too.
jpnChrName: で、そのカカオの木の実の中には 果肉の部分もある訳だな。
jpnSearchText:
で、そのカカオの木の実の中には
果肉の部分もある訳だな。

engChrName: And that pulp happens to be the raw cacao. Your average marketplace doesn't usually carry 'em, so they're a hard find.
engSearchText:
And that pulp happens to be the raw cacao.
Your average marketplace doesn't usually
carry 'em, so they're a hard find.
jpnChrName: その果肉こそが生カカオ── 普通は出回ってねえ希少な部位だ。
jpnSearchText:
その果肉こそが生カカオ──
普通は出回ってねえ希少な部位だ。

engChrName: That's exactly right. You know your stuff! Color me impressed.
engSearchText:
That's exactly right. You know your stuff! Color
me impressed.
jpnChrName: おお、その通りだ。 随分と詳しいんだな。
jpnSearchText:
おお、その通りだ。
随分と詳しいんだな。

engChrName: Course. I'm a man who can't live without some good ol' chocolate, so I've been dyin' to have raw cacao at least once.
engSearchText:
Course. I'm a man who can't live without some good
ol' chocolate, so I've been dyin' to have raw cacao at
least once.
jpnChrName: 中東を思わせる強い甘みと酸味が特徴的で、 たまに混ざるほろ苦さがクセになるらしいな。
jpnSearchText:
中東を思わせる強い甘みと酸味が特徴的で、
たまに混ざるほろ苦さがクセになるらしいな。

engChrName: It's supposed to have a sweet, yet sour profile, but with a little bitterness thrown in that makes it addictive. A real Central Eastern delicacy.
engSearchText:
It's supposed to have a sweet, yet sour profile, but
with a little bitterness thrown in that makes
it addictive. A real Central Eastern delicacy.
jpnChrName: 普段チョコレートに世話になってる身として、 機会があれば一度食べてみたかったんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
普段チョコレートに世話になってる身として、
機会があれば一度食べてみたかったんだよ！

engChrName: We get it, dude, it's the greatest thing on the Goddess' green earth or whatever. You don't have to give us a lecture about it.
engSearchText:
We get it, dude, it's the greatest thing on the
Goddess' green earth or whatever. You don't have to
give us a lecture about it.
jpnChrName: 急に饒舌すぎんだろ。
jpnSearchText: 急に饒舌すぎんだろ。

engChrName: And what do you mean you 'can't live without your chocolate'? You make it sound like you'd croak if you don't get your fix.
engSearchText:
And what do you mean you 'can't live without
your chocolate'? You make it sound like you'd croak if
you don't get your fix.
jpnChrName: つうか、チョコレートに 世話になってるとか意味が分からねえな。
jpnSearchText:
つうか、チョコレートに
世話になってるとか意味が分からねえな。

engChrName: (There goes Van. There's nothing stopping him now...)
engSearchText:
(There goes Van. There's nothing stopping
him now...)
jpnChrName: （完全にスイッチが   入ってしまってますね……）
jpnSearchText:
（完全にスイッチが
入ってしまってますね……）

engChrName: Wow, I'm learning a lot today! Now you've got me curious what it's like, too!
engSearchText:
Wow, I'm learning a lot today! Now you've got me
curious what it's like, too!
jpnChrName: へぇ～なんだか勉強になっちゃいます。 どんな物なのか気になっちゃいますね。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ～なんだか勉強になっちゃいます。
どんな物なのか気になっちゃいますね。

engChrName: If you guys are that interested in it, I can let you all sample some of it.
engSearchText:
If you guys are that interested in it, I can let you all
sample some of it.
jpnChrName: そこまであの果物に興味があるなら、 君たちに味見させてあげてもいいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
そこまであの果物に興味があるなら、
君たちに味見させてあげてもいいぞ。

engChrName: Assuming you can find my camel that's carrying my stock of it, mind.
engSearchText:
Assuming you can find my camel that's carrying my
stock of it, mind.
jpnChrName: もちろん、荷物を積んだラクダが 見つかった後の話だが……
jpnSearchText:
もちろん、荷物を積んだラクダが
見つかった後の話だが……

engChrName: (It's not every day you get a chance to dine on some genuine raw cacao straight from the source.)
engSearchText:
(It's not every day you get a chance to dine on some
genuine raw cacao straight from the source.)
jpnChrName: （あの希少な生カカオが   食べられる機会なんてそうそうねえ。）
jpnSearchText:
（あの希少な生カカオが
食べられる機会なんてそうそうねえ。）

engChrName: (This might be something the guild could totally handle, but hell if I'm gonna let 'em edge me out of this!)
engSearchText:
(This might be something the guild could totally
handle, but hell if I'm gonna let 'em edge me out
of this!)
jpnChrName: （ギルド向けの案件とはいえ、   こいつは請け負うしかねえな……！）
jpnSearchText:
（ギルド向けの案件とはいえ、
こいつは請け負うしかねえな……！）

engChrName: If you guys are that interested in raw cacao, I can let you all sample some of it.
engSearchText:
If you guys are that interested in raw cacao, I can let
you all sample some of it.
jpnChrName: 生カカオに興味があるなら 君たちに味見させてあげてもいいぞ。
jpnSearchText:
生カカオに興味があるなら
君たちに味見させてあげてもいいぞ。

engChrName: Assuming you can find my camel that's carrying my stock of it, mind.
engSearchText:
Assuming you can find my camel that's carrying my
stock of it, mind.
jpnChrName: その前に、荷物を積んだラクダを 見つけてもらう必要があるんだがな……
jpnSearchText:
その前に、荷物を積んだラクダを
見つけてもらう必要があるんだがな……

engChrName: (It's not every day you get a chance to dine on some genuine raw cacao straight from the source.)
engSearchText:
(It's not every day you get a chance to dine on some
genuine raw cacao straight from the source.)
jpnChrName: （あの希少な生カカオが   食べられる機会なんてそうそうねえ。）
jpnSearchText:
（あの希少な生カカオが
食べられる機会なんてそうそうねえ。）

engChrName: (This might be something the guild could totally handle, but hell if I'm gonna let 'em edge me out of this!)
engSearchText:
(This might be something the guild could totally
