handle, but hell if I'm gonna let 'em edge me out
of this!)
jpnChrName: （ギルド向けの案件とはいえ、   こいつは請け負うしかねえな……！）
jpnSearchText:
（ギルド向けの案件とはいえ、
こいつは請け負うしかねえな……！）

engChrName: Argh... I'd love nothin' more than to take you up on this, but could you wait just a little while?
engSearchText:
Argh... I'd love nothin' more than to take you up on
this, but could you wait just a little while?
jpnChrName: くっ……悪いがこの話の続きは 少し待ってもらえねえか。
jpnSearchText:
くっ……悪いがこの話の続きは
少し待ってもらえねえか。

engChrName: We're in a big hurry and need to take care of somethin' else first. After that, we'll be free.
engSearchText:
We're in a big hurry and need to take care of
somethin' else first. After that, we'll be free.
jpnChrName: 大急ぎで野暮用を片付けてくるからよ。
jpnSearchText: 大急ぎで野暮用を片付けてくるからよ。

engChrName: Well, as you like.
engSearchText: Well, as you like.
jpnChrName: お、おお……？
jpnSearchText: お、おお……？

engChrName: I don't know what could be so urgent, but I can give you folks a little time if you need it. Go ahead.
engSearchText:
I don't know what could be so urgent, but I can give
you folks a little time if you need it. Go ahead.
jpnChrName: よく分からないが、 少しの間だけなら待たせてもらうよ。
jpnSearchText:
よく分からないが、
少しの間だけなら待たせてもらうよ。

engChrName: We don't usually take this sort of work, but...I'll make an exception this time. We'll take the job.
engSearchText:
We don't usually take this sort of work, but...I'll make
an exception this time. We'll take the job.
jpnChrName: 仕方ねえ……今回だけは特別だ。 その依頼を引き受けてやるよ。
jpnSearchText:
仕方ねえ……今回だけは特別だ。
その依頼を引き受けてやるよ。

engChrName: Are you sure you can handle it? I don't want to pressure you, but you'd be doing me a huge favor.
engSearchText:
Are you sure you can handle it? I don't want to
pressure you, but you'd be doing me a huge favor.
jpnChrName: い、いいのか？ 君たちが手伝ってくれるなら助かるが。
jpnSearchText:
い、いいのか？
君たちが手伝ってくれるなら助かるが。

engChrName: Well, if our boss says it's okay... Besides, we don't want your camel to come to harm. We'd be more than happy to help.
engSearchText:
Well, if our boss says it's okay... Besides, we don't
want your camel to come to harm. We'd be more
than happy to help.
jpnChrName: あはは……そのラクダの事も心配ですし、 是非力にならせて下さい。
jpnSearchText:
あはは……そのラクダの事も心配ですし、
是非力にならせて下さい。

engChrName: Yup! We get to save an innocent critter AND have some yummy food afterwards. This is the best job ever!
engSearchText:
Yup! We get to save an innocent critter AND have
some yummy food afterwards. This is the best
job ever!
jpnChrName: ラクダも助けられて、 美味しい報酬も貰えて一石二鳥になりますねっ！
jpnSearchText:
ラクダも助けられて、
美味しい報酬も貰えて一石二鳥になりますねっ！

engChrName: Yeah, look at us—real pack of professionals here.
engSearchText: Yeah, look at us—real pack of professionals here.
jpnChrName: ったく、《裏解決屋》が聞いて呆れるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ったく、《裏解決屋》が聞いて呆れるぜ。

engChrName: I was interested in checking out those sand dunes, though. Seems like I could get a decent workout there, so hell, I'm game.
engSearchText:
I was interested in checking out those sand
dunes, though. Seems like I could get a decent
workout there, so hell, I'm game.
jpnChrName: だが……砂丘ってのには興味があるんだよな。 そこで身体を動かせるってんならアリか。
jpnSearchText:
だが……砂丘ってのには興味があるんだよな。
そこで身体を動かせるってんならアリか。

engChrName: Then we're all in agreement. We're off to the desert to find that camel.
engSearchText:
Then we're all in agreement. We're off to the desert
to find that camel.
jpnChrName: よし、そうと決まれば砂丘に向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: よし、そうと決まれば砂丘に向かうぞ。

engChrName: Before we take off, do you happen to remember where exactly you were attacked by those monsters?
engSearchText:
Before we take off, do you happen to remember
where exactly you were attacked by those monsters?
jpnChrName: 魔獣に襲われたってのは どこらへんか覚えてるか？
jpnSearchText:
魔獣に襲われたってのは
どこらへんか覚えてるか？

engChrName: Hmm... Let me think... You know, believe it or not, I'm pretty sure it was actually close to town.
engSearchText:
Hmm... Let me think... You know, believe it or not,
I'm pretty sure it was actually close to town.
jpnChrName: そうだな……確か、 思いのほかサルバッドに近い所でな。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……確か、
思いのほかサルバッドに近い所でな。

engChrName: Looking at the map, once you're in the sand dunes and head a little to the west, you'll find the spot.
engSearchText:
Looking at the map, once you're in the sand dunes
and head a little to the west, you'll find the spot.
jpnChrName: ここから地図を見ると、砂丘──陽炎砂丘に出て 西の方角に少し行った先だったはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ここから地図を見ると、砂丘──陽炎砂丘に出て
西の方角に少し行った先だったはずだ。

engChrName: Got'cha. West it is.
engSearchText: Got'cha. West it is.
jpnChrName: 西か、分かった。
jpnSearchText: 西か、分かった。

engChrName: I have to imagine that camel can't have gotten all that far. It must still be wandering around there somewhere.
engSearchText:
I have to imagine that camel can't have gotten all
that far. It must still be wandering around
there somewhere.
jpnChrName: ラクダの方も砂丘の中を 遠くまで歩く事は出来ねぇはずだ。
jpnSearchText:
ラクダの方も砂丘の中を
遠くまで歩く事は出来ねぇはずだ。

engChrName: We'll start at the site of the attack and fan out around that.
engSearchText:
We'll start at the site of the attack and fan out
around that.
jpnChrName: 商隊が襲われた場所を中心に探してみるぞ。
jpnSearchText: 商隊が襲われた場所を中心に探してみるぞ。

engChrName: Sounds good to me.
engSearchText: Sounds good to me.
jpnChrName: へいへいっと。
jpnSearchText: へいへいっと。

engChrName: We'd better hurry. We don't want that camel getting hurt!
engSearchText:
We'd better hurry. We don't want that camel
getting hurt!
jpnChrName: 急いで向かってみましょう！
jpnSearchText: 急いで向かってみましょう！

engChrName: Quest Hump Hunt started!
engSearchText: Quest Hump Hunt started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【はぐれたラクダの捜索】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>はぐれたラクダの捜索<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Phew, thanks a ton! You kids saved my hide!
engSearchText: Phew, thanks a ton! You kids saved my hide!
jpnChrName: いやぁ、ありがとう！ 本当に助かったよ！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ、ありがとう！
本当に助かったよ！

engChrName: You guys were out there so long, I was starting to get worried I'd sent you to danger or worse!
engSearchText:
You guys were out there so long, I was starting to get
worried I'd sent you to danger or worse!
jpnChrName: 君たちの帰りが遅いから 色々な意味で心配していたんだが。
jpnSearchText:
君たちの帰りが遅いから
色々な意味で心配していたんだが。

engChrName: Thanks for dragging this poor guy back. Now I can finally rest easy, and get on with my business!
engSearchText:
Thanks for dragging this poor guy back. Now I can
finally rest easy, and get on with my business!
jpnChrName: この子と一緒に戻って来てくれて 本当に安心したよ！
jpnSearchText:
この子と一緒に戻って来てくれて
本当に安心したよ！

engChrName: It took a little effort to track him down, but by Aidios, we still managed to wrangle him up.
engSearchText:
It took a little effort to track him down, but by
Aidios, we still managed to wrangle him up.
jpnChrName: ま、そういう依頼だったんでな。
jpnSearchText: ま、そういう依頼だったんでな。

engChrName: I was expecting to get a little exercise out of our desert trek, but it gets pretty rough out there.
engSearchText:
I was expecting to get a little exercise out of our
desert trek, but it gets pretty rough out there.
jpnChrName: 軽い運動のつもりが 想像以上にキツかったな。
jpnSearchText:
軽い運動のつもりが
想像以上にキツかったな。

engChrName: Definitely. The glare from the sun is so intense, not to mention all those clouds of sand. I'm glad we're back in town.
engSearchText:
Definitely. The glare from the sun is so intense, not
to mention all those clouds of sand. I'm glad we're
back in town.
jpnChrName: そうですね、照り返しも強いですし、 砂埃もすごかったです……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、照り返しも強いですし、
砂埃もすごかったです……

engChrName: That's okay, 'cause all that effort's finally about to pay off!
engSearchText:
That's okay, 'cause all that effort's finally about to
pay off!
jpnChrName: でも、頑張った甲斐が あったじゃないですか。
jpnSearchText:
でも、頑張った甲斐が
あったじゃないですか。

engChrName: We're gonna be able to have some of that cacao, right?!
engSearchText:
We're gonna be able to have some of that
cacao, right?!
jpnChrName: 例のアレ──ちゃんと食べられそうですか？
jpnSearchText: 例のアレ──ちゃんと食べられそうですか？

engChrName: That's what we're about to find out.
engSearchText: That's what we're about to find out.
jpnChrName: 問題はそこなんだよな……
jpnSearchText: 問題はそこなんだよな……

engChrName: The cacao pods themselves looked just fine. But what about the pulp? Is the raw cacao inside still okay?!
engSearchText:
The cacao pods themselves looked just fine. But what
about the pulp? Is the raw cacao inside still okay?!
jpnChrName: 外身のカカオの実自体は無事だったが 肝心の生カカオはどうだったんだ！？
jpnSearchText:
外身のカカオの実自体は無事だったが
肝心の生カカオはどうだったんだ！？

engChrName: Well, about that...
engSearchText: Well, about that...
jpnChrName: それなんだがな──
jpnSearchText: それなんだがな──

engChrName: I opened one of the pods up...and luckily, there was hardly any damage inside at all!
engSearchText:
I opened one of the pods up...and luckily, there was
hardly any damage inside at all!
jpnChrName: １つ割ってみたが、幸いにも キズや傷みは最小限の状態だったよ！
jpnSearchText:
１つ割ってみたが、幸いにも
キズや傷みは最小限の状態だったよ！

engChrName: It's a miracle they emerged out of that ambush in this state. I'm incredibly grateful.
engSearchText:
It's a miracle they emerged out of that ambush in
this state. I'm incredibly grateful.
jpnChrName: あの状況では奇跡ともいえるだろう。 本当に感謝してもしきれんよ。
jpnSearchText:
あの状況では奇跡ともいえるだろう。
本当に感謝してもしきれんよ。

engChrName: So, yes, you all have definitely earned some raw cacao. I took it and made some juice with it for you all.
engSearchText:
So, yes, you all have definitely earned some raw cacao.
I took it and made some juice with it for you all.
jpnChrName: そこでお礼と言ってはなんだが、 生カカオをジュースにしてみたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
そこでお礼と言ってはなんだが、
生カカオをジュースにしてみたんだ。

engChrName: It's got a distinct flavor to it, but hopefully you'll like it.
engSearchText:
It's got a distinct flavor to it, but hopefully you'll
like it.
jpnChrName: 少し独特な味だが、是非飲んでみてくれ。
jpnSearchText: 少し独特な味だが、是非飲んでみてくれ。

engChrName: Wow, it's white! I would've thought cacao pulp would be dark in color, like chocolate. That's so interesting.
engSearchText:
Wow, it's white! I would've thought cacao pulp would
be dark in color, like chocolate. That's so interesting.
jpnChrName: わぁ、白いジュースですか……！ 生カカオというのは白い果肉なんですね。
jpnSearchText:
わぁ、白いジュースですか……！
生カカオというのは白い果肉なんですね。

engChrName: Yeah, it doesn't resemble chocolate at all, but it still looks amazing! I can't wait to try it!
engSearchText:
Yeah, it doesn't resemble chocolate at all, but it still
looks amazing! I can't wait to try it!
jpnChrName: チョコレートっぽさは全くありませんけど すごく美味しそうです！
jpnSearchText:
チョコレートっぽさは全くありませんけど
すごく美味しそうです！

engChrName: Makes sense. You'd need the beans in order for it to be brown.
engSearchText:
Makes sense. You'd need the beans in order for it to
be brown.
jpnChrName: ああ、茶色いのはあくまでカカオ豆の方になるな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、茶色いのはあくまでカカオ豆の方になるな。

engChrName: Anyway, this stuff isn't going to drink itself. Here goes!
engSearchText:
Anyway, this stuff isn't going to drink itself.
Here goes!
jpnChrName: それじゃ早速、頂くとするか！
jpnSearchText: それじゃ早速、頂くとするか！

engChrName: Van and the others took a sip of their raw cacao juice.
engSearchText: Van and the others took a sip of their raw cacao juice.
jpnChrName: ヴァン達は生カカオのジュースを口に運んだ。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァン達は生カカオのジュースを口に運んだ。

engChrName: Well, damn. This stuff's pretty legit.
engSearchText: Well, damn. This stuff's pretty legit.
jpnChrName: へえ……意外といけるじゃねーか。
jpnSearchText: へえ……意外といけるじゃねーか。

engChrName: Yeah, I feel more energized just drinking it. It reminds me of fruit juice from the south.
engSearchText:
Yeah, I feel more energized just drinking it.
It reminds me of fruit juice from the south.
jpnChrName: 南のフルーツらしい 元気の出る味がしますね！
jpnSearchText:
南のフルーツらしい
元気の出る味がしますね！

engChrName: I'm also amazed at how different it tastes compared to melfita, despite coming from the same plant.
engSearchText:
I'm also amazed at how different it tastes compared
to melfita, despite coming from the same plant.
jpnChrName: メルフィータとはまた違う 味わいがあって面白いです。
jpnSearchText:
メルフィータとはまた違う
味わいがあって面白いです。

engChrName: It's just a little bitter, but that doesn't stop it from being really smooth to drink. I like it!
engSearchText:
It's just a little bitter, but that doesn't stop it from
being really smooth to drink. I like it!
jpnChrName: ちょっとだけほろ苦いですけど、 とっても飲みやすいですっ！
jpnSearchText:
ちょっとだけほろ苦いですけど、
とっても飲みやすいですっ！

engChrName: Hell yeah. This is even better than what I'd heard.
engSearchText: Hell yeah. This is even better than what I'd heard.
jpnChrName: ああ、噂で聞いた以上に美味いな……
jpnSearchText: ああ、噂で聞いた以上に美味いな……

engChrName: The balance of sweetness and sourness is just perfect! I could see myself getting addicted to this stuff.
engSearchText:
The balance of sweetness and sourness is just perfect!
I could see myself getting addicted to this stuff.
jpnChrName: 甘味と酸味の バランスが絶妙でクセになりそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
甘味と酸味の
バランスが絶妙でクセになりそうだ。

engChrName: I'm impressed it doesn't take much pulp to get such a dense flavor, too. Definitely somethin' only mother nature could cook up.
engSearchText:
I'm impressed it doesn't take much pulp to get such a
dense flavor, too. Definitely somethin' only mother
nature could cook up.
jpnChrName: 少量でこの味の密度とはな。 まさに自然の恵みって感じがするぜ。
jpnSearchText:
少量でこの味の密度とはな。
まさに自然の恵みって感じがするぜ。

engChrName: Really, it's wild you can make such different things with the same cacao pod between this stuff and chocolate.
engSearchText:
Really, it's wild you can make such different things
with the same cacao pod between this stuff
and chocolate.
jpnChrName: カカオの実ひとつからチョコレートやら 生カカオが作られるんだから、本当に大したもんだ……
jpnSearchText:
カカオの実ひとつからチョコレートやら
生カカオが作られるんだから、本当に大したもんだ……

engChrName: I'm glad you all like it so much! Sounds like I made the right choice rewarding you with it, then.
engSearchText:
I'm glad you all like it so much! Sounds like I made
the right choice rewarding you with it, then.
jpnChrName: はは、そこまで言ってもらえると お礼のし甲斐があるというものだ。
jpnSearchText:
はは、そこまで言ってもらえると
お礼のし甲斐があるというものだ。

engChrName: I'll be sure to deposit some good, hard mira as soon as we're done here, of course.
engSearchText:
I'll be sure to deposit some good, hard mira as soon as
we're done here, of course.
jpnChrName: ミラの方も、この後すぐに 振り込ませてもらうとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
ミラの方も、この後すぐに
振り込ませてもらうとしよう。

engChrName: Sounds like a plan. Thanks for the drinks. Couldn't have asked for a better bonus.
engSearchText:
Sounds like a plan. Thanks for the drinks.
Couldn't have asked for a better bonus.
jpnChrName: 了解だ──にしても 最高の追加報酬をあんがとな。
jpnSearchText:
了解だ──にしても
最高の追加報酬をあんがとな。

engChrName: Not at all! I'm the one who's grateful. You went out and saved my camel's life! That was no small feat.
engSearchText:
Not at all! I'm the one who's grateful. You went out
and saved my camel's life! That was no small feat.
jpnChrName: なに、感謝しているのはこちらの方だ。 ラクダの命を救ってもらった訳だからな。
jpnSearchText:
なに、感謝しているのはこちらの方だ。
ラクダの命を救ってもらった訳だからな。

engChrName: I can only thank Arusha for guiding us to one another! Farewell, friends!
engSearchText:
I can only thank Arusha for guiding us to
one another! Farewell, friends!
jpnChrName: 君達と出会えた縁を、 翼の女神（アルーシャ）様に感謝を……！
jpnSearchText:
君達と出会えた縁を、
翼の女神（アルーシャ）様に感謝を……！

engChrName: Quest Hump Hunt completed!
engSearchText: Quest Hump Hunt completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【はぐれたラクダの捜索】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>はぐれたラクダの捜索<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: I see... So you guys want to know about that green-haired bracer?
engSearchText:
I see... So you guys want to know about that
green-haired bracer?
jpnChrName: ふむ……緑髪の遊撃士の方について 聞かせてほしいと。
jpnSearchText:
ふむ……緑髪の遊撃士の方について
聞かせてほしいと。

engChrName: Yes, I remember him, all right. Quite clearly, as a matter of fact. We don't see many customers like him.
engSearchText:
Yes, I remember him, all right. Quite clearly, as a
matter of fact. We don't see many customers
like him.
jpnChrName: サルバッドでは見かけない方でしたから、 よく憶えていますよ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドでは見かけない方でしたから、
よく憶えていますよ。

engChrName: Really?! Tell us more!
engSearchText: Really?! Tell us more!
jpnChrName: 本当ですか……！
jpnSearchText: 本当ですか……！

engChrName: He came around here about an hour ago, while out on patrol.
engSearchText:
He came around here about an hour ago, while out
on patrol.
jpnChrName: ええ、確か１時間ほど前に当店へ 巡回をしにいらしていました。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、確か１時間ほど前に当店へ
巡回をしにいらしていました。

engChrName: But there was something about him that looked a little...odd.
engSearchText:
But there was something about him that looked a
little...odd.
jpnChrName: ですがその時の様子が 少し気になったと言いますか……
jpnSearchText:
ですがその時の様子が
少し気になったと言いますか……

engChrName: He was watching the other patrons for some reason, as if he was trying to size them up or some such.
engSearchText:
He was watching the other patrons for some reason,
as if he was trying to size them up or some such.
jpnChrName: 何かを値踏みするような眼差しで お客様の事を観察している様子でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
何かを値踏みするような眼差しで
お客様の事を観察している様子でしたね。

engChrName: I think he might've been investigating something. Is that what brings you here, too?
engSearchText:
I think he might've been investigating something.
Is that what brings you here, too?
jpnChrName: 何かの事件を追っているのかと 思いましたが……その事と何か関係が？
jpnSearchText:
何かの事件を追っているのかと
思いましたが……その事と何か関係が？

engChrName: Yeah. Somethin' like that.
engSearchText: Yeah. Somethin' like that.
jpnChrName: ああ、まあそんな所だ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、まあそんな所だ。

engChrName: You happen to see if this bracer talked to anyone?
engSearchText: You happen to see if this bracer talked to anyone?
jpnChrName: それで、その後遊撃士は誰かに 声をかけていたりはしたのか？
jpnSearchText:
それで、その後遊撃士は誰かに
声をかけていたりはしたのか？

engChrName: Let me think... Ah, yes, I remember him trying to strike up a conversation with one man who was playing alone.
engSearchText:
Let me think... Ah, yes, I remember him trying to
strike up a conversation with one man who was
playing alone.
jpnChrName: そうですね……一人で遊びに来ていた 旦那様に声をかけようとしていましたが。
jpnSearchText:
そうですね……一人で遊びに来ていた
旦那様に声をかけようとしていましたが。

engChrName: The police were also making their rounds at the time. When he noticed them approaching, he was rather quick to depart.
engSearchText:
The police were also making their rounds at the time.
When he noticed them approaching, he was rather
quick to depart.
jpnChrName: 警察の方も巡回にいらしていたようでしてね。 それに気づくとそそくさと帰ってしまわれました。
jpnSearchText:
警察の方も巡回にいらしていたようでしてね。
それに気づくとそそくさと帰ってしまわれました。

engChrName: Still trying to avoid getting spotted by the cops, sounds like. For someone acting so brazen, this guy's a real chickenshit.
engSearchText:
Still trying to avoid getting spotted by the cops,
sounds like. For someone acting so brazen, this guy's
a real chickenshit.
jpnChrName: ハッ、また警察の目から逃げてたって訳か。 大胆な事をしてる割にはチキン野郎だな。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、また警察の目から逃げてたって訳か。
大胆な事をしてる割にはチキン野郎だな。

engChrName: I'm a little concerned about him staring at the other visitors like that, too.
engSearchText:
I'm a little concerned about him staring at the other
visitors like that, too.
jpnChrName: 値踏みするような眼差し、 というのも気になりますね……
jpnSearchText:
値踏みするような眼差し、
というのも気になりますね……

engChrName: Indeed. The more that we talk, the more hindsight makes me feel something was amiss with him.
engSearchText:
Indeed. The more that we talk, the more hindsight
makes me feel something was amiss with him.
jpnChrName: そうですね、思い返してみると 違和感があったかもしれませんが……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、思い返してみると
違和感があったかもしれませんが……

engChrName: In any case, I'm afraid that is all that I can share about the bracer in question.
engSearchText:
In any case, I'm afraid that is all that I can share
about the bracer in question.
jpnChrName: あの遊撃士の方について 私からお話しできる事は以上になります。
jpnSearchText:
あの遊撃士の方について
私からお話しできる事は以上になります。

engChrName: I can only guess what you would want with him.
engSearchText: I can only guess what you would want with him.
jpnChrName: 皆様が何について調査しているのか 分かりかねますが……
jpnSearchText:
皆様が何について調査しているのか
分かりかねますが……

engChrName: But regardless, I wish you all luck in your endeavors.
engSearchText: But regardless, I wish you all luck in your endeavors.
jpnChrName: ご健闘をお祈りしていますよ。
jpnSearchText: ご健闘をお祈りしていますよ。

engChrName: Well, thanks for your time—and for the hot tip, too.
engSearchText: Well, thanks for your time—and for the hot tip, too.
jpnChrName: ああ、情報提供感謝するぜ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、情報提供感謝するぜ。

engChrName: Okay, folks, let's see if anyone else caught wind of our sneak.
engSearchText:
Okay, folks, let's see if anyone else caught wind of
our sneak.
jpnChrName: それじゃ他のヤツにも聞き込んでみるとするか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ他のヤツにも聞き込んでみるとするか。

engChrName: As you wish.
engSearchText: As you wish.
jpnChrName: ええ、かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: ええ、かしこまりました。

engChrName: Huh? You say you're looking for a green-haired bracer?
engSearchText:
Huh? You say you're looking for a
green-haired bracer?
jpnChrName: へぇ、緑髪の遊撃士だって……？
jpnSearchText: へぇ、緑髪の遊撃士だって……？

engChrName: Yeah, we saw a guy like that. He came up and talked to us earlier today, as a matter of fact.
engSearchText:
Yeah, we saw a guy like that. He came up and talked
to us earlier today, as a matter of fact.
jpnChrName: 緑髪の遊撃士って言えば、 今日声をかけて来た人よね？
jpnSearchText:
緑髪の遊撃士って言えば、
今日声をかけて来た人よね？

engChrName: Heh, no kidding? I was just trying my luck in askin'. Didn't expect you all to have actually seen the guy.
engSearchText:
Heh, no kidding? I was just trying my luck in askin'.
Didn't expect you all to have actually seen the guy.
jpnChrName: 何だ、試しに聞いてみただけなんだが マジで知ってやがったのか。
jpnSearchText:
何だ、試しに聞いてみただけなんだが
マジで知ってやがったのか。

engChrName: Yeah, well, congrats. Now will you guys scram? We're in the middle of a date!
engSearchText:
Yeah, well, congrats. Now will you guys scram?
We're in the middle of a date!
jpnChrName: あのな……僕は今デート中なんだ！ 邪魔をしすぎだろ！？
jpnSearchText:
あのな……僕は今デート中なんだ！
邪魔をしすぎだろ！？

engChrName: Oh, come on. What's a little favor between friends, huh?
engSearchText:
Oh, come on. What's a little favor between
friends, huh?
jpnChrName: クク、つれない事言うじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: クク、つれない事言うじゃねえか。

engChrName: Just tell us what you know about that nerd and we'll get right outta your hair.
engSearchText:
Just tell us what you know about that nerd and we'll
get right outta your hair.
jpnChrName: だが、遊撃士について教えてくれたら 俺達も退散してやるぜ？
jpnSearchText:
だが、遊撃士について教えてくれたら
俺達も退散してやるぜ？

engChrName: Believe me, last thing any of us want is to interrupt your little tryst, right as it was getting good.
engSearchText:
Believe me, last thing any of us want is to interrupt
your little tryst, right as it was getting good.
jpnChrName: アンタの逢引きを邪魔するのは心苦しいんでな。
jpnSearchText: アンタの逢引きを邪魔するのは心苦しいんでな。

engChrName: We are NOT friends! And the best way to 'get right outta my hair' would be to not stroll up and talk to me in the first place! Ever think of that?
engSearchText:
We are NOT friends! And the best way to 'get right
outta my hair' would be to not stroll up and talk
to me in the first place! Ever think of that?
jpnChrName: というかそもそも、気やすく話しかけてくるな！
jpnSearchText: というかそもそも、気やすく話しかけてくるな！

engChrName: Oh, but that doesn't apply to you, Agnès! If you ever need help with anything, I'm always happy to talk!
engSearchText:
Oh, but that doesn't apply to you, Agnès! If you ever
need help with anything, I'm always happy to talk!
jpnChrName: あっ、勿論アニエスちゃんに 困り事があるっていうなら相談に乗るけどね！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、勿論アニエスちゃんに
困り事があるっていうなら相談に乗るけどね！

engChrName: Little cozy with her, aren't you, baby? Talking to another woman while you're on a date with your girlfriend. Points for bravery, I guess.
engSearchText:
Little cozy with her, aren't you, baby? Talking to
another woman while you're on a date with
your girlfriend. Points for bravery, I guess.
jpnChrName: へぇ？　彼女とデート中だっていうのに いい度胸してるじゃない。
jpnSearchText:
へぇ？　彼女とデート中だっていうのに
いい度胸してるじゃない。

engChrName: Gah, uh, it's not like that, sweetie, I promise! I only meant I'd talk to her in my capacity as a policeman! There's nothing between us!
engSearchText:
Gah, uh, it's not like that, sweetie, I promise! I only
meant I'd talk to her in my capacity as a policeman!
There's nothing between us!
jpnChrName: あっ、いやいや！ 警察として相談に乗るっていう意味だから！
jpnSearchText:
あっ、いやいや！
警察として相談に乗るっていう意味だから！

engChrName: A-haha... Y-Yes...
engSearchText: A-haha... Y-Yes...
jpnChrName: あはは……
jpnSearchText: あはは……

engChrName: Well, someone's in hot water. Look, all I'm saying is, we're not here to crash your date.
engSearchText:
Well, someone's in hot water. Look, all I'm saying is,
we're not here to crash your date.
jpnChrName: クク、まあ俺達だってアンタの逢引きを 邪魔したくて邪魔してる訳じゃねえんだ。
jpnSearchText:
クク、まあ俺達だってアンタの逢引きを
邪魔したくて邪魔してる訳じゃねえんだ。

engChrName: Just tell us what you know about the guy and we'll be gone like your reputation with your lady friend there.
engSearchText:
Just tell us what you know about the guy and we'll be
gone like your reputation with your lady friend there.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士について教えてくれたら退散してやるぜ？
jpnSearchText: 遊撃士について教えてくれたら退散してやるぜ？

engChrName: Ngh... You punks have a way of pushing my buttons. Fine, let's talk.
engSearchText:
Ngh... You punks have a way of pushing my buttons.
Fine, let's talk.
jpnChrName: ふぅ、なんだか腹が立つけど仕方ないな…………
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、なんだか腹が立つけど仕方ないな…………

engChrName: Long story short, we were talking to your green-haired bracer just a bit ago.
engSearchText:
Long story short, we were talking to your
green-haired bracer just a bit ago.
jpnChrName: 実は少し前に、 その遊撃士に声をかけられたんだ。
jpnSearchText:
実は少し前に、
その遊撃士に声をかけられたんだ。

engChrName: He asked if we were having trouble with anything and offered to help.
engSearchText:
He asked if we were having trouble with anything
and offered to help.
jpnChrName: 何か困ってる事はないか── あれば力を貸すってな。
jpnSearchText:
何か困ってる事はないか──
あれば力を貸すってな。

engChrName: Just outta the blue like that? Interesting. And then what?
engSearchText:
Just outta the blue like that? Interesting. And
then what?
jpnChrName: へぇ、それでその後どうしたんだ？
jpnSearchText: へぇ、それでその後どうしたんだ？

engChrName: Nothing, really. He cut things short and then took off for somewhere.
engSearchText:
Nothing, really. He cut things short and then took off
for somewhere.
jpnChrName: それが、その後早々に話を切り上げて どっか行っちゃったんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
それが、その後早々に話を切り上げて
どっか行っちゃったんだよ。

engChrName: Looking back on it, that wasn't really, I dunno, bracer-like of him to do.
engSearchText:
Looking back on it, that wasn't really, I dunno,
bracer-like of him to do.
jpnChrName: 今思えば、なんだか勝手な遊撃士だったかもな。
jpnSearchText: 今思えば、なんだか勝手な遊撃士だったかもな。

engChrName: Babe, don't you remember? He ran away after you said there was nothing to worry about, because you're a cop.
engSearchText:
Babe, don't you remember? He ran away after you
said there was nothing to worry about, because you're
a cop.
jpnChrName: ていうか……ネイト君がああ言ったから 帰って行っちゃったんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
ていうか……ネイト君がああ言ったから
帰って行っちゃったんじゃない？

engChrName: Maybe it was just me, but it felt like he got really tense as soon as you mentioned that.
engSearchText:
Maybe it was just me, but it felt like he got really
tense as soon as you mentioned that.
jpnChrName: 『自分は警察だから心配無用だ』って…… それから急によそよそしくなった気がするわ。
jpnSearchText:
『自分は警察だから心配無用だ』って……
それから急によそよそしくなった気がするわ。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. I guess he did, didn't he? Huh.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. I guess he did, didn't he? Huh.
jpnChrName: ああ、言われてみればそうだったような……？
jpnSearchText: ああ、言われてみればそうだったような……？

engChrName: (The rest of this story is completely unremarkable.)
engSearchText: (The rest of this story is completely unremarkable.)
jpnChrName: （このお話だけ聞く限りだと   さほど違和感はありませんが……）
jpnSearchText:
（このお話だけ聞く限りだと
さほど違和感はありませんが……）

engChrName: (However, the fact that he was so concerned about police attention certainly stands out.)
engSearchText:
(However, the fact that he was so concerned about
police attention certainly stands out.)
jpnChrName: （警察の目を気にしているという点は   やはり気になりますね。）
jpnSearchText:
（警察の目を気にしているという点は
やはり気になりますね。）

engChrName: (Mm-hmm. Feels like we're startin' to close in on the guy.)
engSearchText:
(Mm-hmm. Feels like we're startin' to close in on
the guy.)
jpnChrName: （だな……これでまた確信に近づいたかもな。）
jpnSearchText: （だな……これでまた確信に近づいたかもな。）

engChrName: Thanks for fillin' us in. Sorry to eat up so much of your time. Go on and enjoy the rest of your spriggan-less date.
engSearchText:
Thanks for fillin' us in. Sorry to eat up so much of
your time. Go on and enjoy the rest of your
spriggan-less date.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、邪魔して悪かったな。 引き続きデートをお楽しみくださいねっと。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、邪魔して悪かったな。
引き続きデートをお楽しみくださいねっと。

engChrName: It WAS spriggan-less until you idiots showed up!
engSearchText: It WAS spriggan-less until you idiots showed up!
jpnChrName: お、お前に言われるまでもないわ！
jpnSearchText: お、お前に言われるまでもないわ！

engChrName: *sigh* I don't know what you all are investigating this time, but you better not cause trouble for the police, got it?
engSearchText:
*sigh* I don't know what you all are investigating this
time, but you better not cause trouble for the police,
got it?
jpnChrName: 全く……なにを調べてるか知らないが、 警察の邪魔だけはしてくれるなよ。
jpnSearchText:
全く……なにを調べてるか知らないが、
警察の邪魔だけはしてくれるなよ。

engChrName: Okay, folks, let's see if anyone else caught wind of our sneak.
engSearchText:
Okay, folks, let's see if anyone else caught wind of
our sneak.
jpnChrName: それじゃ他のヤツにも聞き込んでみるとするか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃ他のヤツにも聞き込んでみるとするか。

engChrName: As you wish.
engSearchText: As you wish.
jpnChrName: ええ、かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: ええ、かしこまりました。

engChrName: All right, think we've talked to enough folks that we can paint a decent picture of what's going on.
engSearchText:
All right, think we've talked to enough folks that we
can paint a decent picture of what's going on.
jpnChrName: さて……ざっくりと聞き込みをした程度だが、 ある程度“確信”は得られたな。
jpnSearchText:
さて……ざっくりと聞き込みをした程度だが、
ある程度“確信”は得られたな。

engChrName: Let's find someplace quiet to talk and see what we've come up with.
engSearchText:
Let's find someplace quiet to talk and see what we've
come up with.
jpnChrName: どこか落ち着ける場所で話し合うとするか。
jpnSearchText: どこか落ち着ける場所で話し合うとするか。

engChrName: In that case, might I suggest that area over there?
engSearchText: In that case, might I suggest that area over there?
jpnChrName: それでしたら、 あちらのエリアはいかがでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
それでしたら、
あちらのエリアはいかがでしょうか。

engChrName: Now that we're all settled, let's go over what we know.
engSearchText:
Now that we're all settled, let's go over what
we know.
jpnChrName: さてと……それじゃ早速 掴んだ情報を洗い直してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
さてと……それじゃ早速
掴んだ情報を洗い直してみるか。

engChrName: First, this green-haired bracer's shown some weird behavior for a guy in his line of work.
engSearchText:
First, this green-haired bracer's shown some weird
behavior for a guy in his line of work.
jpnChrName: まず、“緑髪の遊撃士”ってヤツの行動には 違和感があるよな。
jpnSearchText:
まず、“緑髪の遊撃士”ってヤツの行動には
違和感があるよな。

engChrName: He's overly leery of cop attention, even for a bracer, and was sizing up customers at the casino.
engSearchText:
He's overly leery of cop attention, even for a bracer,
and was sizing up customers at the casino.
jpnChrName: 過剰に警察の目を避けてる事といい、 カジノ客を値踏みしてる事といい……
jpnSearchText:
過剰に警察の目を避けてる事といい、
カジノ客を値踏みしてる事といい……

engChrName: Which is to say, that's no bracer's act. He's rollin' like a petty thief.
engSearchText:
Which is to say, that's no bracer's act. He's rollin' like
a petty thief.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士っつうよりは、 コソ泥そのものの行動をとってる訳だ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士っつうよりは、
コソ泥そのものの行動をとってる訳だ。

engChrName: Which would make sense, if his bracer appearance is simply a disguise.
engSearchText:
Which would make sense, if his bracer appearance is
simply a disguise.
jpnChrName: つまり……偽物の遊撃士だと 仮定すれば話が通るという事ですか。
jpnSearchText:
つまり……偽物の遊撃士だと
仮定すれば話が通るという事ですか。

engChrName: This is starting to sound a lot like that man impersonating a policeman earlier today...
engSearchText:
This is starting to sound a lot like that man
impersonating a policeman earlier today...
jpnChrName: 日中に遭遇した偽警官と同じ状況…… という事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
日中に遭遇した偽警官と同じ状況……
という事ですね。

engChrName: Yup. And just like then, goin' around impersonating a bracer's not the kinda heat most're gonna wanna risk gettin' nicked for.
engSearchText:
Yup. And just like then, goin' around impersonating a
bracer's not the kinda heat most're gonna wanna risk
gettin' nicked for.
jpnChrName: ああ、あの件と同じく財布を盗む為だけに “成りすます”ってのはリスクに見合わねえ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、あの件と同じく財布を盗む為だけに
“成りすます”ってのはリスクに見合わねえ。

engChrName: No, this smells like a case of greed gettin' the better of a guy while he's working toward something else.
engSearchText:
No, this smells like a case of greed gettin' the better
of a guy while he's working toward something else.
jpnChrName: やっぱり、他に大きな目的がありつつも 欲に目が眩んだって所かもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
やっぱり、他に大きな目的がありつつも
欲に目が眩んだって所かもしれねえな。

engChrName: Oh, yeah. That 'Officer' Camilo was one of the Devancy Brothers that are wanted by the police, right?
engSearchText:
Oh, yeah. That 'Officer' Camilo was one of the
Devancy Brothers that are wanted by the
police, right?
jpnChrName: そういえば偽警官は、ディバンシー兄弟という 指名手配犯だったそうですよね。
jpnSearchText:
そういえば偽警官は、ディバンシー兄弟という
指名手配犯だったそうですよね。

engChrName: Could the bracer be the other brother?
engSearchText: Could the bracer be the other brother?
jpnChrName: この緑髪の遊撃士も その兄弟だったりするんでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
この緑髪の遊撃士も
その兄弟だったりするんでしょうか。

engChrName: I'd put good odds on it, yeah. Impersonating a bracer can get you in some real trouble, for obvious reasons.
engSearchText:
I'd put good odds on it, yeah. Impersonating a bracer
can get you in some real trouble, for obvious reasons.
jpnChrName: ああ、遊撃士に成りすますなんて どう考えてもご法度だ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、遊撃士に成りすますなんて
どう考えてもご法度だ。

engChrName: If he gets caught, there's hell to pay for that alone, never mind his other stuff.
engSearchText:
If he gets caught, there's hell to pay for that alone,
never mind his other stuff.
jpnChrName: バレた時の処罰も厳しいモンになるだろう。
jpnSearchText: バレた時の処罰も厳しいモンになるだろう。

engChrName: And that's why he's got to be doing something worth the risk. You don't go to that trouble just to steal some wallets.
engSearchText:
And that's why he's got to be doing something worth
the risk. You don't go to that trouble just to steal
some wallets.
jpnChrName: だからこそ、財布を盗む為だけに 成りすますってのはリスクに見合わねえ。
jpnSearchText:
だからこそ、財布を盗む為だけに
成りすますってのはリスクに見合わねえ。

engChrName: There's a decent chance he got distracted by the prospect of easy pickings on his way to something a lot more hardcore.
engSearchText:
There's a decent chance he got distracted by the
prospect of easy pickings on his way to something a
lot more hardcore.
jpnChrName: 他に“大きな目的”がありつつも、 欲に目が眩んだって所かもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
他に“大きな目的”がありつつも、
欲に目が眩んだって所かもしれねえな。

engChrName: Man, this hole just goes deeper and deeper the more we talk about it. That's crazy!
engSearchText:
Man, this hole just goes deeper and deeper the more
we talk about it. That's crazy!
jpnChrName: な、なるほど……！ 思っていたより根が深そうですね……
jpnSearchText:
な、なるほど……！
思っていたより根が深そうですね……

engChrName: Whatever it all is, our main problem right now is that all the eye-witness reports we have come from stuff that just took place.
engSearchText:
Whatever it all is, our main problem right now is that
all the eye-witness reports we have come from stuff
that just took place.
jpnChrName: いずれにせよ、問題なのは どの目撃情報も今夜の話っつう所だろ。
jpnSearchText:
いずれにせよ、問題なのは
どの目撃情報も今夜の話っつう所だろ。

engChrName: For a guy who seems to be wanderin' around looking for suckers to rob, he doesn't exactly have a whole lot to show for it.
engSearchText:
For a guy who seems to be wanderin' around looking
for suckers to rob, he doesn't exactly have a whole lot
to show for it.
jpnChrName: 欲を出してウロウロしてる割には 街中で成果は得られてねえと来た。
jpnSearchText:
欲を出してウロウロしてる割には
街中で成果は得られてねえと来た。

engChrName: Which could mean...
engSearchText: Which could mean...
jpnChrName: となれば……
jpnSearchText: となれば……

engChrName: That since he already successfully robbed someone after getting in their car, he could be thinking of trying that again.
engSearchText:
That since he already successfully robbed someone
after getting in their car, he could be thinking of
trying that again.
jpnChrName: 車に同乗させてもらう形での泥棒…… 一度成功している手口を試すかもしれませんね。
jpnSearchText:
車に同乗させてもらう形での泥棒……
一度成功している手口を試すかもしれませんね。

engChrName: 'Xactly. That's my hunch.
engSearchText: 'Xactly. That's my hunch.
jpnChrName: ああ、そういうこったな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、そういうこったな。

engChrName: Is there any way we can put a stop to him before he targets anyone else?
engSearchText:
Is there any way we can put a stop to him before
he targets anyone else?
jpnChrName: これ以上被害が出る前に 食い止めたい所ですね……
jpnSearchText:
これ以上被害が出る前に
食い止めたい所ですね……

engChrName: Actually, I may have a suggestion toward that end.
engSearchText: Actually, I may have a suggestion toward that end.
jpnChrName: でしたら、わたくしに一つ考えがあります。
jpnSearchText: でしたら、わたくしに一つ考えがあります。

engChrName: If we assume that the perpetrator is going to target the driver of a car with a flat tire, as he did before...
engSearchText:
If we assume that the perpetrator is going to target
the driver of a car with a flat tire, as he did before...
jpnChrName: 先程の案件同様、バーストした車を 利用した詐欺が行われるという事でしたら……
jpnSearchText:
先程の案件同様、バーストした車を
利用した詐欺が行われるという事でしたら……

engChrName: Then why don't I conduct a wide-area search for potential car targets among the ones driving in to Tharbad this evening?
engSearchText:
Then why don't I conduct a wide-area search for
potential car targets among the ones driving in to
Tharbad this evening?
jpnChrName: サルバッドに向かう導力車を、 広域サーチにかけてみてはいかがでしょうか。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドに向かう導力車を、
広域サーチにかけてみてはいかがでしょうか。

engChrName: Uh, damn. You can do that? That'd save us a lot of trouble.
engSearchText:
Uh, damn. You can do that? That'd save us a lot
of trouble.
jpnChrName: おっ、そんな事も出来るのか？ それなら願ったり叶ったりなんだが。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、そんな事も出来るのか？
それなら願ったり叶ったりなんだが。

engChrName: Indeed I can. It's a form of shard-based information analysis.
engSearchText:
Indeed I can. It's a form of shard-based
information analysis.
jpnChrName: ええ、シャードを利用した情報解析の 応用という形になります。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、シャードを利用した情報解析の
応用という形になります。

engChrName: Well, then, I shall initiate the search. Starting now...
engSearchText: Well, then, I shall initiate the search. Starting now...
jpnChrName: それでは早速、サーチをかけてみると致しましょう。
jpnSearchText: それでは早速、サーチをかけてみると致しましょう。

engChrName: Search complete. ...Oh? What do we have here?
engSearchText: Search complete. ...Oh? What do we have here?
jpnChrName: 広域サーチ、完了いたしました。 ……おや、これは…………
jpnSearchText:
広域サーチ、完了いたしました。
……おや、これは…………

engChrName: As it happens, there appears to be a car stranded near the entrance to the city.
engSearchText:
As it happens, there appears to be a car stranded near
the entrance to the city.
jpnChrName: 現在、ちょうどサルバッドの入り口付近で 立往生している導力車がありますね。
jpnSearchText:
現在、ちょうどサルバッドの入り口付近で
立往生している導力車がありますね。

engChrName: Bingo. If this guy's gonna strike again, odds are good that's our mark.
engSearchText:
Bingo. If this guy's gonna strike again, odds are good
that's our mark.
jpnChrName: おっ、やるじゃねえか。 まさに標的にされた車の確率が高そうだな。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、やるじゃねえか。
まさに標的にされた車の確率が高そうだな。

engChrName: Yeah. Let's keep an eye on that car's signal while we stake out this so-called bracer. See if he finally shows himself.
engSearchText:
Yeah. Let's keep an eye on that car's signal while we
stake out this so-called bracer. See if he finally
shows himself.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、その導力車の信号を観察しつつ 例の遊撃士が現れるかどうか見張ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、その導力車の信号を観察しつつ
例の遊撃士が現れるかどうか見張ってみるか。

engChrName: With how close that car is, it should only take a few minutes for it to pull into town. We'll go to the parking lot and wait there.
engSearchText:
With how close that car is, it should only take a few
minutes for it to pull into town. We'll go to the
parking lot and wait there.
jpnChrName: 駐車場に行って待ち伏せてみるぞ。 近くまで来てんなら数分後には街に着くだろ。
jpnSearchText:
駐車場に行って待ち伏せてみるぞ。
近くまで来てんなら数分後には街に着くだろ。

engChrName: Sounds good to me!
engSearchText: Sounds good to me!
jpnChrName: 了解です……！
jpnSearchText: 了解です……！

engChrName: Several minutes after commencing the stakeout in the parking lot...
engSearchText:
Several minutes after commencing the stakeout in the
parking lot...
jpnChrName: ヴァン達が駐車場で 張り込みを開始してから数分後──
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン達が駐車場で
張り込みを開始してから数分後──

engChrName: Man, I don't know how we would've made it here if it weren't for you.
engSearchText:
Man, I don't know how we would've made it here if it
weren't for you.
jpnChrName: ふぅ……おかげで無事に サルバッドに到着できたよ。
jpnSearchText:
ふぅ……おかげで無事に
サルバッドに到着できたよ。

engChrName: Seriously! Thank you so much!
engSearchText: Seriously! Thank you so much!
jpnChrName: 遊撃士さん、 本当にありがとうございました！
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士さん、
本当にありがとうございました！

engChrName: Oh, no problem! Just happy I could help at all, really.
engSearchText: Oh, no problem! Just happy I could help at all, really.
jpnChrName: いえいえ、大した事はしていませんから。
jpnSearchText: いえいえ、大した事はしていませんから。

engChrName: I only did a quick fix, though. You really should take ol' reliable here into a mechanic later and have it looked at by a professional.
engSearchText:
I only did a quick fix, though. You really should take
ol' reliable here into a mechanic later and have it
looked at by a professional.
jpnChrName: ただ、簡易的な措置しか出来なかったので 後できちんと修理に出す事をおすすめしますよ。
jpnSearchText:
ただ、簡易的な措置しか出来なかったので
後できちんと修理に出す事をおすすめしますよ。

engChrName: Will do. Thanks again for everything! But isn't there something we can do to repay you? I feel bad, not doing more.
engSearchText:
Will do. Thanks again for everything! But isn't there
something we can do to repay you? I feel bad, not
doing more.
jpnChrName: ああ、何から何までありがとう。 それじゃ気持ちばかりでもお礼をさせてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、何から何までありがとう。
それじゃ気持ちばかりでもお礼をさせてくれ。

engChrName: Don't worry. All in a day's work for a bracer. Your thanks is its own reward.
engSearchText:
Don't worry. All in a day's work for a bracer.
Your thanks is its own reward.
jpnChrName: ふふ、気持ちだけで結構ですよ。 これも遊撃士の仕事の内ですから。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、気持ちだけで結構ですよ。
これも遊撃士の仕事の内ですから。

engChrName: Oh, it is, huh? Sure helps when you can nick a reward of your choice, to boot.
engSearchText:
Oh, it is, huh? Sure helps when you can nick a reward
of your choice, to boot.
jpnChrName: ……とか言っておきながら、勝手に“お礼”を 貰っちまってるのはどういう事だろうな？
jpnSearchText:
……とか言っておきながら、勝手に“お礼”を
貰っちまってるのはどういう事だろうな？

engChrName: Huh?! What the—
engSearchText: Huh?! What the—

engChrName: Got'cha, pal. You're not going anywhere.
engSearchText: Got'cha, pal. You're not going anywhere.
jpnChrName: よっと……確保完了ってな。
jpnSearchText: よっと……確保完了ってな。

engChrName: Eek! What do you think you're doing?!
engSearchText: Eek! What do you think you're doing?!
jpnChrName: キャッ！？ あ、貴方は一体……！？
jpnSearchText:
キャッ！？
あ、貴方は一体……！？

engChrName: Sorry to scare you folks. We're with Arkride Solutions.
engSearchText:
Sorry to scare you folks. We're with
Arkride Solutions.
jpnChrName: 驚かせちまって悪いな。 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。
jpnSearchText:
驚かせちまって悪いな。
俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだ。

engChrName: We've been on the trail of this guy for reasons that'll become clear in a moment.
engSearchText:
We've been on the trail of this guy for reasons that'll
become clear in a moment.
jpnChrName: ちょいと訳あって この遊撃士をマークさせてもらっててな。
jpnSearchText:
ちょいと訳あって
この遊撃士をマークさせてもらっててな。

engChrName: What? Why? He's a bracer! What could he have possibly done wrong?!
engSearchText:
What? Why? He's a bracer! What could he have
possibly done wrong?!
jpnChrName: 遊撃士がマークされるってどういう事だよ……！？
jpnSearchText: 遊撃士がマークされるってどういう事だよ……！？

engChrName: Get your hands out of there! That's—
engSearchText: Get your hands out of there! That's—
jpnChrName: やめろ……！　そ、それは……！
jpnSearchText: やめろ……！　そ、それは……！

engChrName: And there it is! A wallet!
engSearchText: And there it is! A wallet!
jpnChrName: やっぱりありました、お財布ですっ！
jpnSearchText: やっぱりありました、お財布ですっ！

engChrName: Does this happen to belong to you guys?
engSearchText: Does this happen to belong to you guys?
jpnChrName: これはお二人の物だったりはしませんか？
jpnSearchText: これはお二人の物だったりはしませんか？

engChrName: Feri handed the wallet to the tourists.
engSearchText: Feri handed the wallet to the tourists.
jpnChrName: フェリは財布を観光客に渡した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>フェリは財布を観光客に渡した。

engChrName: What in—?! Yeah, that's mine! I had it stashed inside my bag, on the back seat.
engSearchText:
What in—?! Yeah, that's mine! I had it stashed inside
my bag, on the back seat.
jpnChrName: こ、これは俺の財布じゃないか！？ 後部座席の鞄に入れておいたはずなのに……
jpnSearchText:
こ、これは俺の財布じゃないか！？
後部座席の鞄に入れておいたはずなのに……

engChrName: Are you telling me this bracer stole it?!
engSearchText: Are you telling me this bracer stole it?!
jpnChrName: ま、まさかこの遊撃士が──！？
jpnSearchText: ま、まさかこの遊撃士が──！？

engChrName: That's exactly it. And that's just the start.
engSearchText: That's exactly it. And that's just the start.
jpnChrName: ああそうだ……と言っちまいたい所だが。
jpnSearchText: ああそうだ……と言っちまいたい所だが。

engChrName: Just so you all don't get any wrong ideas about bracers: you should know this guy's a fraud.
engSearchText:
Just so you all don't get any wrong ideas about
bracers: you should know this guy's a fraud.
jpnChrName: 遊撃士の名誉の為に言っておくと、 コイツは遊撃士の偽物だ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士の名誉の為に言っておくと、
コイツは遊撃士の偽物だ。

engChrName: This may sound like a strange question to ask, but did you two get a flat tire on your way to town tonight?
engSearchText:
This may sound like a strange question to ask, but did
you two get a flat tire on your way to town tonight?
jpnChrName: あの、もしかしてサルバッドに来る途中で タイヤがバーストしませんでしたか？
jpnSearchText:
あの、もしかしてサルバッドに来る途中で
タイヤがバーストしませんでしたか？

engChrName: Y-Yeah, we did, actually. I figured it was because it was such a long drive.
engSearchText:
Y-Yeah, we did, actually. I figured it was because it
was such a long drive.
jpnChrName: ああ、確かにバーストした……長い間運転したから、 そのせいかと思ったんだが。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、確かにバーストした……長い間運転したから、
そのせいかと思ったんだが。

engChrName: Luckily, this bracer happened to come across us and offered to help. That's how we got here.
engSearchText:
Luckily, this bracer happened to come across us and
offered to help. That's how we got here.
jpnChrName: その時、たまたま通りかかってくれた この遊撃士さんが助けてくれて……
jpnSearchText:
その時、たまたま通りかかってくれた
この遊撃士さんが助けてくれて……

engChrName: So, that's the problem... It is very likely he is the one who punctured your tire in the first place.
engSearchText:
So, that's the problem... It is very likely he is the one
who punctured your tire in the first place.
jpnChrName: いいえ……おそらくそれは この遊撃士の方によるものです。
jpnSearchText:
いいえ……おそらくそれは
この遊撃士の方によるものです。

engChrName: He seems to have this method where he bursts a tire and then pretends to be passing by before offering to repair it.
engSearchText:
He seems to have this method where he bursts a tire
and then pretends to be passing by before offering to
repair it.
jpnChrName: タイヤをバーストさせ、運よく通りかかった フリをしてタイヤの修理を請け負う……
jpnSearchText:
タイヤをバーストさせ、運よく通りかかった
フリをしてタイヤの修理を請け負う……

engChrName: He then hitches a ride back to town and steals whatever he finds in the back seat.
engSearchText:
He then hitches a ride back to town and steals
whatever he finds in the back seat.
jpnChrName: そして車に同乗させてもらい、 後部座席の荷物を盗むという手口なんです。
jpnSearchText:
そして車に同乗させてもらい、
後部座席の荷物を盗むという手口なんです。

engChrName: Isn't that right? If I got some part of it wrong, now's the time to correct me.
engSearchText:
Isn't that right? If I got some part of it wrong, now's
the time to correct me.
jpnChrName: ……どうでしょうか。 間違っていたらそう言って下さい。
jpnSearchText:
……どうでしょうか。
間違っていたらそう言って下さい。

engChrName: ...Ggh.
engSearchText: ...Ggh.

engChrName: By Aidios... So he was pretending to be a bracer all along just so he could rob me.
engSearchText:
By Aidios... So he was pretending to be a bracer all
along just so he could rob me.
jpnChrName: そんな……それじゃあ本当に 遊撃士のフリをした詐欺だったのか。
jpnSearchText:
そんな……それじゃあ本当に
遊撃士のフリをした詐欺だったのか。

engChrName: I didn't sense anything wrong at all! If you guys hadn't shown up when you did, we'd have been completely clueless.
engSearchText:
I didn't sense anything wrong at all! If you guys
hadn't shown up when you did, we'd have been
completely clueless.
jpnChrName: 全然気付かなかったです…… 皆さんがいなければどうなってた事か……
jpnSearchText:
全然気付かなかったです……
皆さんがいなければどうなってた事か……

engChrName: And whose fault is that, huh? That's what you get for trusting someone just because they say they're a bracer, ya morons!
engSearchText:
And whose fault is that, huh? That's what you get for
trusting someone just because they say they're a
bracer, ya morons!
jpnChrName: ハッ、騙される方が悪いんだろうが。 遊撃士だからってホイホイ信じやがってよ。
jpnSearchText:
ハッ、騙される方が悪いんだろうが。
遊撃士だからってホイホイ信じやがってよ。

engChrName: So what if I maybe took things too far this time because they were so easy to sucker? Who cares?
engSearchText:
So what if I maybe took things too far this time
because they were so easy to sucker? Who cares?
jpnChrName: あんまりにもチョロいもんだから 遊び過ぎちまったが……
jpnSearchText:
あんまりにもチョロいもんだから
遊び過ぎちまったが……

engChrName: Go ahead and turn me in. At the end of the day, our objective is still within reach.
engSearchText:
Go ahead and turn me in. At the end of the day, our
objective is still within reach.
jpnChrName: まあ、俺が捕まっても 本来の目的は達成できるから問題ねえか。
jpnSearchText:
まあ、俺が捕まっても
本来の目的は達成できるから問題ねえか。

engChrName: ...! So there IS more going on! What are you planning?
engSearchText:
...! So there IS more going on! What are
you planning?
jpnChrName: ……！ それはどういう意味ですか？
jpnSearchText:
……！
それはどういう意味ですか？

engChrName: Heh heh heh. Who can say?
engSearchText: Heh heh heh. Who can say?
jpnChrName: ククク……誰が言うかよ。
jpnSearchText: ククク……誰が言うかよ。

engChrName: Once we get our hands on THAT, they'll be able to post bail for me, no problem. It'd be a drop in the bucket.
engSearchText:
Once we get our hands on THAT, they'll be able to
post bail for me, no problem. It'd be a drop in
the bucket.
jpnChrName: いずれアレが手に入れば、 保釈金なんて簡単に支払えるんだ。
jpnSearchText:
いずれアレが手に入れば、
保釈金なんて簡単に支払えるんだ。

engChrName: Take me to the bracers or police or whoever you want. See what I care!
engSearchText:
Take me to the bracers or police or whoever
you want. See what I care!
jpnChrName: 遊撃士でも警察でも 好きな所に連れて行けばいいさ。
jpnSearchText:
遊撃士でも警察でも
好きな所に連れて行けばいいさ。

engChrName: Ooh, looks like we've got a sassy one on our hands. I think this guy needs to be taught a lesson he won't forget.
engSearchText:
Ooh, looks like we've got a sassy one on our hands.
I think this guy needs to be taught a lesson he
won't forget.
jpnChrName: 調子に乗りやがって……コイツはちゃんと 灸を据えてやった方がいいみてえだな？
jpnSearchText:
調子に乗りやがって……コイツはちゃんと
灸を据えてやった方がいいみてえだな？

engChrName: Do your worst, dirtbag! I dare you!
engSearchText: Do your worst, dirtbag! I dare you!
jpnChrName: チッ、やんのかよ！？
jpnSearchText: チッ、やんのかよ！？

engChrName: Put it in park, kid. There's no need for us to rake him over the coals personally.
engSearchText:
Put it in park, kid. There's no need for us to rake him
over the coals personally.
jpnChrName: まあ落ち着けって。 わざわざ灸を据えてやる価値もねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
まあ落ち着けって。
わざわざ灸を据えてやる価値もねえだろ。

engChrName: We'll turn him in to the guild, and then he'll be their problem. That way, they'll owe us a favor for saving their reputation.
engSearchText:
We'll turn him in to the guild, and then he'll be
their problem. That way, they'll owe us a favor for
saving their reputation.
jpnChrName: ギルドに恩を売れるだろうし、 向こうに引き渡して後は任せちまおうぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ギルドに恩を売れるだろうし、
向こうに引き渡して後は任せちまおうぜ。

engChrName: In that case, I shall contact the Bracer Guild so arrangements can be made.
engSearchText:
In that case, I shall contact the Bracer Guild so
arrangements can be made.
jpnChrName: それでは、わたくしの方から 遊撃士協会に連絡させて頂きましょう。
jpnSearchText:
それでは、わたくしの方から
遊撃士協会に連絡させて頂きましょう。

engChrName: Although before I do so, I must say, Mr. Arkride, this has been a rather impressive exercise.
engSearchText:
Although before I do so, I must say, Mr. Arkride, this
has been a rather impressive exercise.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それにしてもやはり 鮮やかなお手並みですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、それにしてもやはり
鮮やかなお手並みですね。

engChrName: It's been a true honor and a pleasure to finally see for myself how such a renowned spriggan goes about his business.
engSearchText:
It's been a true honor and a pleasure to finally see for
myself how such a renowned spriggan goes about
his business.
jpnChrName: 裏解決屋の解決業務── この目で見る事が出来て光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
裏解決屋の解決業務──
この目で見る事が出来て光栄です。

engChrName: Agh, I don't need to be buttered up. Thanks, but just ring 'em up already so we can get on with the rest of our night.
engSearchText:
Agh, I don't need to be buttered up. Thanks, but just
ring 'em up already so we can get on with the rest of
our night.
jpnChrName: だあっ、そういうのはいいから 早く連絡しちまってくれ。
jpnSearchText:
だあっ、そういうのはいいから
早く連絡しちまってくれ。

engChrName: Heehee. As you wish.
engSearchText: Heehee. As you wish.
jpnChrName: ふふ、かしこまりました。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、かしこまりました。

engChrName: Upon receiving Risette's call, a bracer team rushed to the scene, taking the emerald-haired impostor into custody themselves.
engSearchText:
Upon receiving Risette's call, a bracer team rushed to
the scene, taking the emerald-haired impostor into
custody themselves.
jpnChrName: その後──間もなく遊撃士が駆け付け、 “緑髪の遊撃士”は連行される事となった。
jpnSearchText:
その後──間もなく遊撃士が駆け付け、
“緑髪の遊撃士”は連行される事となった。

engChrName: As for the tourists, they were subsequently brought to both the guildhouse and police to testify about what took place.
engSearchText:
As for the tourists, they were subsequently brought to
both the guildhouse and police to testify about what
took place.
jpnChrName: また、観光客の二人組も事情聴取のため 遊撃士協会および警察へ向かう事に。
jpnSearchText:
また、観光客の二人組も事情聴取のため
遊撃士協会および警察へ向かう事に。

engChrName: Similarly, Van and the others also visited the Bracer Guild to offer their own report on the matter.
engSearchText:
Similarly, Van and the others also visited the Bracer
Guild to offer their own report on the matter.
jpnChrName: そしてヴァン達もまた事後報告の為に 遊撃士協会へと赴いたのだった。
jpnSearchText:
そしてヴァン達もまた事後報告の為に
遊撃士協会へと赴いたのだった。

engChrName: Oh, I meant to ask! Did you all catch my post?
engSearchText: Oh, I meant to ask! Did you all catch my post?
jpnChrName: おっと、そういえば掲示板の方は 見てもらえたか？
jpnSearchText:
おっと、そういえば掲示板の方は
見てもらえたか？

engChrName: Seeing as I hadn't heard from you all, thought I'd reach out myself.
engSearchText:
Seeing as I hadn't heard from you all, thought I'd
reach out myself.
jpnChrName: 君たちから連絡がないものだから、 ならばワシからと思ってな！
jpnSearchText:
君たちから連絡がないものだから、
ならばワシからと思ってな！

engChrName: And I figured, what better way to do that than with a 4SPG? Judith and Nina told me how to file one, and now, here we are!
engSearchText:
And I figured, what better way to do that than with
a 4SPG? Judith and Nina told me how to file one,
and now, here we are!
jpnChrName: ジュディス君達から聞いて ４ｓｐｇというのを試してみたんじゃよ。
jpnSearchText:
ジュディス君達から聞いて
４ｓｐｇというのを試してみたんじゃよ。

engChrName: Yep. Exactly why we're here.
engSearchText: Yep. Exactly why we're here.
jpnChrName: ええ、改めて伺ったのは正にその件でして。
jpnSearchText: ええ、改めて伺ったのは正にその件でして。

engChrName: We forgot to ask about it earlier, so we wanted to hurry back and check in with you.
engSearchText:
We forgot to ask about it earlier, so we wanted to
hurry back and check in with you.
jpnChrName: さっき話を聞きそびれちゃったので 早速来てみましたっ！
jpnSearchText:
さっき話を聞きそびれちゃったので
早速来てみましたっ！

engChrName: Right, sorry about that! Got my hands full with everything right now, as you can imagine.
engSearchText:
Right, sorry about that! Got my hands full with
everything right now, as you can imagine.
jpnChrName: おお、すまんすまん。 どうにも慌ただしくてな！
jpnSearchText:
おお、すまんすまん。
どうにも慌ただしくてな！

engChrName: Anyway! What say we get straight to business and discuss what I have in mind for this gig?
engSearchText:
Anyway! What say we get straight to business and
discuss what I have in mind for this gig?
jpnChrName: それでは早速、詳しい内容を 説明させてもらおうじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
それでは早速、詳しい内容を
説明させてもらおうじゃないか。

engChrName: You kids got time to talk right now?
engSearchText: You kids got time to talk right now?
jpnChrName: 君達の方も構わないかね？
jpnSearchText: 君達の方も構わないかね？

engChrName: I'd really like to sit down and go over this gig in detail with you all as soon as possible.
engSearchText:
I'd really like to sit down and go over this gig in detail
with you all as soon as possible.
jpnChrName: 早速、依頼について詳しい説明を させてもらいたいのだが……
jpnSearchText:
早速、依頼について詳しい説明を
させてもらいたいのだが……

engChrName: Any chance we can get the ball rolling now?
engSearchText: Any chance we can get the ball rolling now?
jpnChrName: 今から始めてしまっても構わないかね？
jpnSearchText: 今から始めてしまっても構わないかね？

engChrName: Wish I could say we could, but...
engSearchText: Wish I could say we could, but...
jpnChrName: ええ勿論……と言いたい所ですが。
jpnSearchText: ええ勿論……と言いたい所ですが。

engChrName: ...unfortunately, we got some other business that we should probably take care of first, if that's cool.
engSearchText:
...unfortunately, we got some other business that we
should probably take care of first, if that's cool.
jpnChrName: すみませんね、その前に野暮用を 片付けちまった方がよさそうです。
jpnSearchText:
すみませんね、その前に野暮用を
片付けちまった方がよさそうです。

engChrName: Well, if it's that urgent, don't let me get in your way.
engSearchText: Well, if it's that urgent, don't let me get in your way.
jpnChrName: ああ、他に急ぎの用事があるなら 無理にとは言わん。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、他に急ぎの用事があるなら
無理にとは言わん。

engChrName: Come back and talk to me once you have a minute. I'll make time for you!
engSearchText:
Come back and talk to me once you have a minute.
I'll make time for you!
jpnChrName: 手が開いたらまた来てくれ。 待っとるからな！
jpnSearchText:
手が開いたらまた来てくれ。
待っとるからな！

engChrName: Yeah, let's get down to brass tacks.
engSearchText: Yeah, let's get down to brass tacks.
jpnChrName: ええ、よろしくお願いします。
jpnSearchText: ええ、よろしくお願いします。

engChrName: Fantastic! Then come over here, so we can sit and chat.
engSearchText:
Fantastic! Then come over here, so we can sit
and chat.
jpnChrName: よし、それでは場所を移すとするかのう！
jpnSearchText: よし、それでは場所を移すとするかのう！

engChrName: Right, so you wrote in your request that you're lookin' to add some more cast members to the cavalcade.
engSearchText:
Right, so you wrote in your request that you're lookin'
to add some more cast members to the cavalcade.
jpnChrName: さて……確か依頼内容はパレードの 追加キャストを探して欲しいっつう事でしたね。
jpnSearchText:
さて……確か依頼内容はパレードの
追加キャストを探して欲しいっつう事でしたね。

engChrName: Pushing your luck just a bit trying to rope more folks in when the festival's tomorrow, don't you think?
engSearchText:
Pushing your luck just a bit trying to rope more folks
in when the festival's tomorrow, don't you think?
jpnChrName: 本番を明日に控えてるってのに 今から人を増やすのは厳しいんじゃねえか？
jpnSearchText:
本番を明日に控えてるってのに
今から人を増やすのは厳しいんじゃねえか？

engChrName: Quite the opposite, as a matter of fact!
engSearchText: Quite the opposite, as a matter of fact!
jpnChrName: ハハ、むしろその逆じゃよ。
jpnSearchText: ハハ、むしろその逆じゃよ。

engChrName: We're done getting ready for the parade. At this point, I'm just interested in making it even better while we still have time!
engSearchText:
We're done getting ready for the parade. At this
point, I'm just interested in making it even better
while we still have time!
jpnChrName: パレードが仕上がってきた事で、 より完成度を高める余裕が出来たんじゃ。
jpnSearchText:
パレードが仕上がってきた事で、
より完成度を高める余裕が出来たんじゃ。

engChrName: That's why I was hoping to spruce things up around the back of the parade with some hot girls! Give the joint even more pizzazz!
engSearchText:
That's why I was hoping to spruce things up around
the back of the parade with some hot girls! Give the
joint even more pizzazz!
jpnChrName: なので今回は、パレードの後方で彩（いろど）りを添えてくれる 美人のキャストを募集したいと思っておる！
jpnSearchText:
なので今回は、パレードの後方で彩（いろど）りを添えてくれる
美人のキャストを募集したいと思っておる！

engChrName: Huh? You're looking for girls? You didn't mention that.
engSearchText:
Huh? You're looking for girls? You didn't
mention that.
jpnChrName: 美人さんのキャストですか……！
jpnSearchText: 美人さんのキャストですか……！

engChrName: Who else would I look for? But I'm not just looking for babes. I need ones who can dance a bit. Nothing complicated, so don't worry there.
engSearchText:
Who else would I look for? But I'm not just looking
for babes. I need ones who can dance a bit.
Nothing complicated, so don't worry there.
jpnChrName: ああ、ある程度ダンスが踊れる事が条件じゃが。 内容は簡単なものだから、そこは心配せんでいいぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ある程度ダンスが踊れる事が条件じゃが。
内容は簡単なものだから、そこは心配せんでいいぞ！

engChrName: Are you certain we're going to be able to find someone like that on such short notice?
engSearchText:
Are you certain we're going to be able to find
someone like that on such short notice?
jpnChrName: つまり、少しは踊れるような 美人の方を探すという事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
つまり、少しは踊れるような
美人の方を探すという事ですね。

engChrName: The town may have a lot of visitors right now, but this request needs a very specific skillset, if you ask me.
engSearchText:
The town may have a lot of visitors right now, but
this request needs a very specific skillset, if you
ask me.
jpnChrName: 街に人が大勢集まっているとはいえ 少々骨が折れそうではありますが……
jpnSearchText:
街に人が大勢集まっているとはいえ
少々骨が折れそうではありますが……

engChrName: Bah, Tharbad is filled to the brim with women as talented as they are foxy. You'll have no trouble! I'm sure of it!
engSearchText:
Bah, Tharbad is filled to the brim with women as
talented as they are foxy. You'll have no trouble!
I'm sure of it!
jpnChrName: いいや、サルバッドは粒ぞろいじゃからな。 簡単に見つかるのではないかと思っておる！
jpnSearchText:
いいや、サルバッドは粒ぞろいじゃからな。
簡単に見つかるのではないかと思っておる！

engChrName: But I will admit it's not entirely out of the realm of possibility that you kids could come up short.
engSearchText:
But I will admit it's not entirely out of the realm of
possibility that you kids could come up short.
jpnChrName: だが、巡り会わせが悪ければ １人も見つからないという事もあるじゃろう……
jpnSearchText:
だが、巡り会わせが悪ければ
１人も見つからないという事もあるじゃろう……

engChrName: But that's fine! Because if that happens, I've got a backup plan, and that backup plan is you there, miss! What do you say? Could you do it?
engSearchText:
But that's fine! Because if that happens, I've got a
backup plan, and that backup plan is you there, miss!
What do you say? Could you do it?
jpnChrName: その時は──そこの君に出演を 依頼させてもらいたいと思っておる！
jpnSearchText:
その時は──そこの君に出演を
依頼させてもらいたいと思っておる！

engChrName: Truly? You would like me to join your parade?
engSearchText: Truly? You would like me to join your parade?
jpnChrName: あら……わたくしですか？
jpnSearchText: あら……わたくしですか？

engChrName: Oh, wow, yeah! Risette is super pretty! She would totally kill it on stage!
engSearchText:
Oh, wow, yeah! Risette is super pretty! She would
totally kill it on stage!
jpnChrName: おお～、確かにリゼットさんは 綺麗ですもんね！
jpnSearchText:
おお～、確かにリゼットさんは
綺麗ですもんね！

engChrName: No argument there. I got a feeling she could pull off whatever 'dance' you have in mind.
engSearchText:
No argument there. I got a feeling she could pull off
whatever 'dance' you have in mind.
jpnChrName: まあそうなるよな。 踊りもそつなくこなせそうだしよ。
jpnSearchText:
まあそうなるよな。
踊りもそつなくこなせそうだしよ。

engChrName: She certainly could. But it should really be her decision. We can't force her to do it.
engSearchText:
She certainly could. But it should really be
her decision. We can't force her to do it.
jpnChrName: そうですね、勿論リゼットさんが 嫌でなければ、ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、勿論リゼットさんが
嫌でなければ、ですけど……

engChrName: Well, I appreciate the high praise, even if I feel it is perhaps a little much.
engSearchText:
Well, I appreciate the high praise, even if I feel it is
perhaps a little much.
jpnChrName: ふふ、過分な評価を頂いて恐縮です。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、過分な評価を頂いて恐縮です。

engChrName: Very well. If necessary, I will at least consider joining your parade.
engSearchText:
Very well. If necessary, I will at least consider joining
your parade.
jpnChrName: そうですね、必要とあらば、 参加させて頂く事も検討しますが……
jpnSearchText:
そうですね、必要とあらば、
参加させて頂く事も検討しますが……

engChrName: Damn, you mean that?! Screw bringing in anyone else, I'd be happy just roping you—
engSearchText:
Damn, you mean that?! Screw bringing in anyone
else, I'd be happy just roping you—
jpnChrName: おおっ、本当か！？ それならむしろ君一人だけでも──！
jpnSearchText:
おおっ、本当か！？
それならむしろ君一人だけでも──！

engChrName: Hold on there, Mr. Gotti. Strictly speakin', Risette ain't one of my employees. She's on loan from elsewhere.
engSearchText:
Hold on there, Mr. Gotti. Strictly speakin', Risette
ain't one of my employees. She's on loan
from elsewhere.
jpnChrName: すみませんが、彼女は正式な所員ではなく “臨時のヘルプ”でしてね。
jpnSearchText:
すみませんが、彼女は正式な所員ではなく
“臨時のヘルプ”でしてね。

engChrName: That in mind, I really don't wanna impose on her if we can avoid it.
engSearchText:
That in mind, I really don't wanna impose on her if
we can avoid it.
jpnChrName: 出来る事なら、そういう無茶ぶりは させたくないんですよ。
jpnSearchText:
出来る事なら、そういう無茶ぶりは
させたくないんですよ。

engChrName: So if you don't mind, I'd rather go out and see who we can find in town, like you asked. That still work for you?
engSearchText:
So if you don't mind, I'd rather go out and see who
we can find in town, like you asked. That still work
for you?
jpnChrName: 申し訳ありませんが、先のお話通り まずは街から候補の女性を探しても？
jpnSearchText:
申し訳ありませんが、先のお話通り
まずは街から候補の女性を探しても？

engChrName: Augh, all right. If that's the way it has to be.
engSearchText: Augh, all right. If that's the way it has to be.
jpnChrName: ふむ、そういう事ならばしかたないのう。
jpnSearchText: ふむ、そういう事ならばしかたないのう。

engChrName: Thank you for being understanding of my position.
engSearchText: Thank you for being understanding of my position.
jpnChrName: お気遣いありがとうございます。
jpnSearchText: お気遣いありがとうございます。

engChrName: No prob. Getting back on topic, though... Ideally, how many ladies do you want us to try and get in on this?
engSearchText:
No prob. Getting back on topic, though...
Ideally, how many ladies do you want us to try and
get in on this?
jpnChrName: ちなみに、その追加キャストは 最大で何人を予定しているんですか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、その追加キャストは
最大で何人を予定しているんですか？

engChrName: I mean, I'd gladly take as many beautiful women as you can find. The more the merrier!
engSearchText:
I mean, I'd gladly take as many beautiful women as
you can find. The more the merrier!
jpnChrName: うむ、魅力的な者がいれば何人でも構わんぞ。
jpnSearchText: うむ、魅力的な者がいれば何人でも構わんぞ。

engChrName: But...if I had to give you a hard number, in terms of how many our plans can fit, I'd say three's our limit.
engSearchText:
But...if I had to give you a hard number, in terms of
how many our plans can fit, I'd say three's our limit.
jpnChrName: ……ああいや、段取りを仕込むという意味では ３人が限界かもしれんな。
jpnSearchText:
……ああいや、段取りを仕込むという意味では
３人が限界かもしれんな。

engChrName: I want you to find at least one, though. Once you get to work, that's what I'll be counting on! All right?
engSearchText:
I want you to find at least one, though. Once you get
to work, that's what I'll be counting on! All right?
jpnChrName: ただし、最低１人は頼むぞ。 そのつもりでワシは準備に取り掛かるからな！
jpnSearchText:
ただし、最低１人は頼むぞ。
そのつもりでワシは準備に取り掛かるからな！

engChrName: Understood. To confirm, we should recruit at least one woman and at most three, circumstances permitting.
engSearchText:
Understood. To confirm, we should recruit at least
one woman and at most three,
circumstances permitting.
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。 最低でも１人、最大で３人という事ですね。
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました。
最低でも１人、最大で３人という事ですね。

engChrName: Yes! I want the best you can find! I'm counting on you kids to have good taste, taste that'll deliver!
engSearchText:
Yes! I want the best you can find! I'm counting on
you kids to have good taste, taste that'll deliver!
jpnChrName: うむ、ワシは君の審美眼を信じておるぞ。
jpnSearchText: うむ、ワシは君の審美眼を信じておるぞ。

engChrName: And with that settled, I'm going to the training studio to plan out how to incorporate the additional talent.
engSearchText:
And with that settled, I'm going to the training studio
to plan out how to incorporate the additional talent.
jpnChrName: それではワシは先に練習室に行って 追加キャストを含めた構成を練らせてもらおう。
jpnSearchText:
それではワシは先に練習室に行って
追加キャストを含めた構成を練らせてもらおう。

engChrName: Happy hunting! Don't come back until you can bring me girls who'll knock me off my feet!
engSearchText:
Happy hunting! Don't come back until you can bring
me girls who'll knock me off my feet!
jpnChrName: 期待してるのでよろしく頼むぞ──！
jpnSearchText: 期待してるのでよろしく頼むぞ──！

engChrName: That dude's brain definitely has one setting and one setting only, if you know what I mean.
engSearchText:
That dude's brain definitely has one setting and one
setting only, if you know what I mean.
jpnChrName: 今日も相変わらずの ゴッチ節って感じだったな。
jpnSearchText:
今日も相変わらずの
ゴッチ節って感じだったな。

engChrName: That was my first time seeing Mr. Gotti in person.
engSearchText: That was my first time seeing Mr. Gotti in person.
jpnChrName: わたくしは初めてお目にかかりましたが……
jpnSearchText: わたくしは初めてお目にかかりましたが……

engChrName: He certainly lives up to his reputation as a man with an...uncompromising vision. His passion for the parade is extremely evident.
engSearchText:
He certainly lives up to his reputation as a man with
an...uncompromising vision. His passion for the
parade is extremely evident.
jpnChrName: 噂に違わず、作品に妥協のない方のようですね。 パレードに関しても並々ならぬ情熱を感じました。
jpnSearchText:
噂に違わず、作品に妥協のない方のようですね。
パレードに関しても並々ならぬ情熱を感じました。

engChrName: You can say that again. We'll have to be careful who we recruit to have any hope of satisfying him.
engSearchText:
You can say that again. We'll have to be careful who
we recruit to have any hope of satisfying him.
jpnChrName: はい、だからこそ追加キャストも ちゃんと選ばないといけませんね。
jpnSearchText:
はい、だからこそ追加キャストも
ちゃんと選ばないといけませんね。

engChrName: But where do we even start looking? Should we just wander around town and pray to Arusha?
engSearchText:
But where do we even start looking? Should we just
wander around town and pray to Arusha?
jpnChrName: でも、どうやって探したらいいでしょうか。 街をぶらっと歩いてみますか？
jpnSearchText:
でも、どうやって探したらいいでしょうか。
街をぶらっと歩いてみますか？

engChrName: If you want hot girls who can dance, it can't hurt to hit up the nightclub to see if anyone there's willing to play ball.
engSearchText:
If you want hot girls who can dance, it can't hurt to
hit up the nightclub to see if anyone there's willing to
play ball.
jpnChrName: 美人でそこそこ踊れるヤツつったら、 ナイトクラブの店員に当たってみるとかな。
jpnSearchText:
美人でそこそこ踊れるヤツつったら、
ナイトクラブの店員に当たってみるとかな。

engChrName: Y'know, for once that's a decent idea.
engSearchText: Y'know, for once that's a decent idea.
jpnChrName: 確かに無難かもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText: 確かに無難かもしれねえな。

engChrName: I'm drawin' a blank on other ideas, so prayers and vice dens it is.
engSearchText:
I'm drawin' a blank on other ideas, so prayers and vice
dens it is.
jpnChrName: 特にアテもねえし、 お前らの言う通りやってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
特にアテもねえし、
お前らの言う通りやってみるか。

engChrName: We'll walk around town and see if we get lucky as we make our way over to the club. Let's roll.
engSearchText:
We'll walk around town and see if we get lucky as we
make our way over to the club. Let's roll.
jpnChrName: それじゃ、ナイトクラブに立ち寄りつつ 街を歩いてみるぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ、ナイトクラブに立ち寄りつつ
街を歩いてみるぞ。

engChrName: Quest Extra, Extra! started!
engSearchText: Quest Extra, Extra! started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【追加キャストのスカウト】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>追加キャストのスカウト<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Say, I recognize that policewoman over there.
engSearchText: Say, I recognize that policewoman over there.
jpnChrName: おっ、あそこにいる婦警は……
jpnSearchText: おっ、あそこにいる婦警は……

engChrName: Yeah, she's one of the ones we talked to for that assignment yesterday.
engSearchText:
Yeah, she's one of the ones we talked to for that
assignment yesterday.
jpnChrName: 昨日依頼の件で話を伺った方ですね。
jpnSearchText: 昨日依頼の件で話を伺った方ですね。

engChrName: Got a real dignified look to her. Fit, too, as you'd expect.
engSearchText:
Got a real dignified look to her. Fit, too, as
you'd expect.
jpnChrName: 凛とした姿が目を引くな。 体幹のバランスもしっかりしてそうだ。
jpnSearchText:
凛とした姿が目を引くな。
体幹のバランスもしっかりしてそうだ。

engChrName: I think she could dance her heart out, if she wanted to.
engSearchText:
I think she could dance her heart out, if she
wanted to.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督のパレードの追加人員として 見所がありそうだぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督のパレードの追加人員として
見所がありそうだぜ。

engChrName: Then what are we waiting for? Let's ask if she's interested.
engSearchText:
Then what are we waiting for? Let's ask if
she's interested.
jpnChrName: それでしたら、早速声をかけてみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それでしたら、早速声をかけてみましょうか。

engChrName: Hello. Is there something I can help you with?
engSearchText: Hello. Is there something I can help you with?
jpnChrName: あら、どうされましたか？
jpnSearchText: あら、どうされましたか？

engChrName: Wait a moment. Didn't I see you all yesterday?
engSearchText: Wait a moment. Didn't I see you all yesterday?
jpnChrName: ってあら、貴方達は昨日の……？
jpnSearchText: ってあら、貴方達は昨日の……？

engChrName: You did. We got some new business this time.
engSearchText: You did. We got some new business this time.
jpnChrName: 悪いが、今日は別件で用事があってな。
jpnSearchText: 悪いが、今日は別件で用事があってな。

engChrName: Basically, we're with Arkride Solutions. We take on odd jobs for clients who are in unique pinches, let's say.
engSearchText:
Basically, we're with Arkride Solutions. We take on
odd jobs for clients who are in unique pinches,
let's say.
jpnChrName: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。
jpnSearchText: 俺達は《アークライド解決事務所》のモンだが。

engChrName: Anyway, Director Salvatore Gotti's got us pitchin' in on his Carnal Cavalcade that's comin' up tomorrow. You've heard of it, I bet.
engSearchText:
Anyway, Director Salvatore Gotti's got us pitchin' in
on his Carnal Cavalcade that's comin' up tomorrow.
You've heard of it, I bet.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督からフォクシーパレードに 関する依頼を受けてな。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督からフォクシーパレードに
関する依頼を受けてな。

engChrName: We're recruitin' some additional folks to fill out the cast and wanted to know if you were interested.
engSearchText:
We're recruitin' some additional folks to fill out the
cast and wanted to know if you were interested.
jpnChrName: 追加キャストを探してる最中なんだが── アンタに頼めないかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
追加キャストを探してる最中なんだが──
アンタに頼めないかと思ってな。

engChrName: What? You want ME to join?!
engSearchText: What? You want ME to join?!
jpnChrName: わ、私ですか……！？
jpnSearchText: わ、私ですか……！？

engChrName: Umm, wait! Before you answer, miss, can you dance at all? We're looking for folks who can dance at least a little.
engSearchText:
Umm, wait! Before you answer, miss, can you dance
at all? We're looking for folks who can dance at least
a little.
jpnChrName: あっ、でもダンスの方はどうですか？ 多少は踊れないと駄目みたいなんですけど……
jpnSearchText:
あっ、でもダンスの方はどうですか？
多少は踊れないと駄目みたいなんですけど……

engChrName: I...suppose I can dance, yes. I wouldn't say I'm great at it, either, but I can.
engSearchText:
I...suppose I can dance, yes. I wouldn't say I'm great
at it, either, but I can.
jpnChrName: ダンスですか……得意ではありませんが 一応踊れはします。
jpnSearchText:
ダンスですか……得意ではありませんが
一応踊れはします。

engChrName: Then does that mean you'll do it?!
engSearchText: Then does that mean you'll do it?!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ……！
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ……！

engChrName: Well, it's an honor just to be asked to join one of Mr. Gotti's productions. I never would've imagined this.
engSearchText:
Well, it's an honor just to be asked to join one of Mr.
Gotti's productions. I never would've imagined this.
jpnChrName: あのゴッチ監督が手掛けるパレードに 出られるかもしれないだなんて、光栄です。
jpnSearchText:
あのゴッチ監督が手掛けるパレードに
出られるかもしれないだなんて、光栄です。

engChrName: But I'm an officer, first and foremost, and I'm assigned to festival security tomorrow. I'm afraid I have to decline.
engSearchText:
But I'm an officer, first and foremost, and I'm
assigned to festival security tomorrow. I'm afraid I
have to decline.
jpnChrName: でも……明日は映画祭の警備がありますから。 残念ですが辞退させてもらえますか？
jpnSearchText:
でも……明日は映画祭の警備がありますから。
残念ですが辞退させてもらえますか？

engChrName: That's fair. Have to imagine the police here'll be incredibly busy once things kick off.
engSearchText:
That's fair. Have to imagine the police here'll be
incredibly busy once things kick off.
jpnChrName: そうですよね、本番の時こそ 警察の方は忙しいでしょうし……
jpnSearchText:
そうですよね、本番の時こそ
警察の方は忙しいでしょうし……

engChrName: That settles it, I guess. Looks like this one's a wash.
engSearchText: That settles it, I guess. Looks like this one's a wash.
jpnChrName: そうなると諦めるしかねえのか。
jpnSearchText: そうなると諦めるしかねえのか。

engChrName: I am really sorry. Good luck finding someone!
engSearchText: I am really sorry. Good luck finding someone!
jpnChrName: ええ、本当にごめんなさいね。
jpnSearchText: ええ、本当にごめんなさいね。

engChrName: Suffice to say, that officer would be rather difficult to recruit.
engSearchText:
Suffice to say, that officer would be rather difficult
to recruit.
jpnChrName: あの方にオファーを申し込むのは 難しいようですが……
jpnSearchText:
あの方にオファーを申し込むのは
難しいようですが……

engChrName: But it seems like you haven't quite given up yet, have you, Mr. Arkride?
engSearchText:
But it seems like you haven't quite given up yet, have
you, Mr. Arkride?
jpnChrName: ヴァン様は、まだ諦めたという 様子ではありませんね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン様は、まだ諦めたという
様子ではありませんね。

engChrName: Nope. I can't help but think a parade like that would really let her show off the inner strength she usually gives to the badge.
engSearchText:
Nope. I can't help but think a parade like that would
really let her show off the inner strength she usually
gives to the badge.
jpnChrName: ああ、思うに警官ならではの 芯の強さがパレードでは映えると思うんだよな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、思うに警官ならではの
芯の強さがパレードでは映えると思うんだよな。

engChrName: And we're dealin' with Gotti as a client here. We can't fold that easily if we're gonna make him happy.
engSearchText:
And we're dealin' with Gotti as a client here.
We can't fold that easily if we're gonna make
him happy.
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督を満足させる為にも、 ここで妥協する訳にはいかねえだろう。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督を満足させる為にも、
ここで妥協する訳にはいかねえだろう。

engChrName: There's got to be another way to get her to join.
engSearchText: There's got to be another way to get her to join.
jpnChrName: あの婦警を説得する別の方法を考えるぞ。
jpnSearchText: あの婦警を説得する別の方法を考えるぞ。

engChrName: Like what, exactly?
engSearchText: Like what, exactly?
jpnChrName: 別の方法だと？
jpnSearchText: 別の方法だと？

engChrName: Well...we could try negotiatin' with Inspector Daswani. I would bet he's her boss.
engSearchText:
Well...we could try negotiatin' with
Inspector Daswani. I would bet he's her boss.
jpnChrName: そうだな……それなりに責任のありそうな ダスワニ警部と交渉してみるか。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……それなりに責任のありそうな
ダスワニ警部と交渉してみるか。

engChrName: If we frame it just right, maybe, just maybe, we'll get what we want in the end. Can't hurt to try.
engSearchText:
If we frame it just right, maybe, just maybe, we'll get
what we want in the end. Can't hurt to try.
jpnChrName: 上手いこと話を持っていけば あの婦警を説得できるかもしれねえ。
jpnSearchText:
上手いこと話を持っていけば
あの婦警を説得できるかもしれねえ。

engChrName: So I figure Detective Nate's around here somewhere.
engSearchText: So I figure Detective Nate's around here somewhere.
jpnChrName: ネイト捜査官つったか？ アイツもこっちに来てたよな。
jpnSearchText:
ネイト捜査官つったか？
アイツもこっちに来てたよな。

engChrName: Let's talk to him first, see if there's not a way for us to get in touch with Daswani.
engSearchText:
Let's talk to him first, see if there's not a way for us to
get in touch with Daswani.
jpnChrName: アイツを通して、上の人間と コンタクトが取れないか探るとしよう。
jpnSearchText:
アイツを通して、上の人間と
コンタクトが取れないか探るとしよう。

engChrName: ...You people. What do you want this time?
engSearchText: ...You people. What do you want this time?
jpnChrName: お前達か……何の用だ？
jpnSearchText: お前達か……何の用だ？

engChrName: Good to see you, Inspector. You're exactly the man in the force we need to talk to.
engSearchText:
Good to see you, Inspector. You're exactly the man in
the force we need to talk to.
jpnChrName: アンタがいてよかったぜ。 実は警部のアンタに話したいことがあったんだ。
jpnSearchText:
アンタがいてよかったぜ。
実は警部のアンタに話したいことがあったんだ。

engChrName: Long story short, Salvatore Gotti's called in a request with us.
engSearchText:
Long story short, Salvatore Gotti's called in a request
with us.
jpnChrName: さっきゴッチ監督から依頼を受けてな。
jpnSearchText: さっきゴッチ監督から依頼を受けてな。

engChrName: He wants us to find a few more women to join his Carnal Cavalcade tomorrow.
engSearchText:
He wants us to find a few more women to join his
Carnal Cavalcade tomorrow.
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレードの為の 追加キャストを探してるんだが……
jpnSearchText:
フォクシーパレードの為の
追加キャストを探してるんだが……

engChrName: We tried asking Officer Vernier from Tharbad's force, but she turned us down.
engSearchText:
We tried asking Officer Vernier from Tharbad's
force, but she turned us down.
jpnChrName: サルバッド警察のバーニヤ巡査っつう 婦警に出演を申し込んだら断られちまったんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッド警察のバーニヤ巡査っつう
婦警に出演を申し込んだら断られちまったんだよ。

engChrName: Said she'd be too busy working the security detail to help out.
engSearchText:
Said she'd be too busy working the security detail to
help out.
jpnChrName: 警備に組み込まれちまってるから無理だってな。
jpnSearchText: 警備に組み込まれちまってるから無理だってな。

engChrName: *sigh* Of all the things you could've asked, of course it's something completely frivolous.
engSearchText:
*sigh* Of all the things you could've asked, of course
it's something completely frivolous.
jpnChrName: 何かと思えば……当然の話だな。
jpnSearchText: 何かと思えば……当然の話だな。

engChrName: We're already short on officers working the parade. I can't shave more officers off on top of that.
engSearchText:
We're already short on officers working the parade.
I can't shave more officers off on top of that.
jpnChrName: 映画祭に向けて警備が人手不足だってのに、 人員を減らせる訳が無いからな。
jpnSearchText:
映画祭に向けて警備が人手不足だってのに、
人員を減らせる訳が無いからな。

engChrName: Exactly. 'Sides, why's someone like Gotti got you people running around? Doesn't he have assistants for this sort of thing?
engSearchText:
Exactly. 'Sides, why's someone like Gotti got you
people running around? Doesn't he have assistants for
this sort of thing?
jpnChrName: そもそも、どうして天下のゴッチ監督から お前達に依頼が行くんだか……
jpnSearchText:
そもそも、どうして天下のゴッチ監督から
お前達に依頼が行くんだか……

engChrName: And why are you so fixated on one of our officers? There are plenty of other women you could ask. Leave our crew alone.
engSearchText:
And why are you so fixated on one of our officers?
There are plenty of other women you could ask.
Leave our crew alone.
jpnChrName: とにかく、婦警以外にも人は大勢いるだろ？ 他を当たったらいいじゃないか。
jpnSearchText:
とにかく、婦警以外にも人は大勢いるだろ？
他を当たったらいいじゃないか。

engChrName: Now, now, I'm not saying you folks have to give her time off. It's just, what if she 'works security' elsewhere in the parade?
engSearchText:
Now, now, I'm not saying you folks have to give her
time off. It's just, what if she 'works security'
elsewhere in the parade?
jpnChrName: まあまあ、そこで提案なんだが── 婦警の警備の配置を変更してもらえねえか？
jpnSearchText:
まあまあ、そこで提案なんだが──
婦警の警備の配置を変更してもらえねえか？

engChrName: Y'know, put her in the back of it. Mix her in with the other cast members, have her escort and protect the performers.
engSearchText:
Y'know, put her in the back of it. Mix her in with the
other cast members, have her escort and protect
the performers.
jpnChrName: 場所はフォクシーパレードの後方。 キャストに紛れて出演者を警備させるんだよ。
jpnSearchText:
場所はフォクシーパレードの後方。
キャストに紛れて出演者を警備させるんだよ。

engChrName: You can't be serious, Arkride.
engSearchText: You can't be serious, Arkride.
jpnChrName: なんだと？
jpnSearchText: なんだと？

engChrName: No, hear me out. Say the parade gets some hecklers who try throwin' garbage or somethin' at the performers.
engSearchText:
No, hear me out. Say the parade gets some hecklers
who try throwin' garbage or somethin' at
the performers.
jpnChrName: 例えば、キャストに物を投げつける ヤツが現れたらどうする？
jpnSearchText:
例えば、キャストに物を投げつける
ヤツが現れたらどうする？

engChrName: If you had Officer Vernier posted in the parade itself, she could handle it right there. Practically killin' two birds with one stone.
engSearchText:
If you had Officer Vernier posted in the parade itself,
she could handle it right there. Practically killin' two
birds with one stone.
