jpnChrName: パレードの内側に婦警が参加してれば 迅速な対応が出来て便利だろ。
jpnSearchText:
パレードの内側に婦警が参加してれば
迅速な対応が出来て便利だろ。

engChrName: If you ask me, that sounds like a good way to beef up security for the event. Cover all the bases.
engSearchText:
If you ask me, that sounds like a good way to beef up
security for the event. Cover all the bases.
jpnChrName: むしろ万全の警備体制を整えるって意味じゃ 好都合じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
むしろ万全の警備体制を整えるって意味じゃ
好都合じゃねえか。

engChrName: Really, I don't see what you guys have to lose letting her go. If anything, you stand to gain from it.
engSearchText:
Really, I don't see what you guys have to lose letting
her go. If anything, you stand to gain from it.
jpnChrName: この話を蹴る理由が 見つからねえと思うけどな。
jpnSearchText:
この話を蹴る理由が
見つからねえと思うけどな。

engChrName: That...actually makes a lot of sense.
engSearchText: That...actually makes a lot of sense.
jpnChrName: ま、まあ確かに……？
jpnSearchText: ま、まあ確かに……？

engChrName: ...I can't believe what I'm about to say. Sometimes I'm too soft for my own good. You hooligans always have a way with words.
engSearchText:
...I can't believe what I'm about to say.
Sometimes I'm too soft for my own good.
You hooligans always have a way with words.
jpnChrName: ったく……相変わらず口が達者な連中だ。
jpnSearchText: ったく……相変わらず口が達者な連中だ。

engChrName: Fine, you win. Since it sounds like it's in our own interests, too, I'll put in a word for her and see what happens.
engSearchText:
Fine, you win. Since it sounds like it's in our own
interests, too, I'll put in a word for her and see
what happens.
jpnChrName: 口車に乗ってやるのは癪だが、 そういう事なら配備の変更を掛け合ってみよう。
jpnSearchText:
口車に乗ってやるのは癪だが、
そういう事なら配備の変更を掛け合ってみよう。

engChrName: At the end of the day, it's true that you can never be too secure. Any means we can take to strengthen security is worth pursuing.
engSearchText:
At the end of the day, it's true that you can never be
too secure. Any means we can take to strengthen
security is worth pursuing.
jpnChrName: こちらとしても、警備が行き届くのなら それに越した事は無いからな。
jpnSearchText:
こちらとしても、警備が行き届くのなら
それに越した事は無いからな。

engChrName: Thank you so much, Inspector! We really appreciate it!
engSearchText:
Thank you so much, Inspector! We really
appreciate it!
jpnChrName: ありがとうございます、ダスワニ警部……！
jpnSearchText: ありがとうございます、ダスワニ警部……！

engChrName: She'll likely get an official call about it from the higher ups later, but if you could go ahead and tell her, I'd appreciate it.
engSearchText:
She'll likely get an official call about it from the
higher ups later, but if you could go ahead and tell
her, I'd appreciate it.
jpnChrName: ああ、後で上司から本人に連絡が行くだろうが 先にお前達から本人に伝えておいてくれ。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、後で上司から本人に連絡が行くだろうが
先にお前達から本人に伝えておいてくれ。

engChrName: Can do. Thanks again, Inspector.
engSearchText: Can do. Thanks again, Inspector.
jpnChrName: ああ、分かった。 助かったぜ警部。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、分かった。
助かったぜ警部。

engChrName: Oh, we meet again. Need something else?
engSearchText: Oh, we meet again. Need something else?
jpnChrName: あら……？ 今度はどうされましたか？
jpnSearchText:
あら……？
今度はどうされましたか？

engChrName: Sorry to keep bugging you. We actually wanted to follow up on our earlier talk about the parade.
engSearchText:
Sorry to keep bugging you. We actually wanted to
follow up on our earlier talk about the parade.
jpnChrName: 何度も悪いな、さっき話した パレードのキャストの件なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
何度も悪いな、さっき話した
パレードのキャストの件なんだが。

engChrName: We talked to Inspector Daswani, and he agreed to reach out to HQ on your behalf and pull some strings to let you do it.
engSearchText:
We talked to Inspector Daswani, and he agreed to
reach out to HQ on your behalf and pull some strings
to let you do it.
jpnChrName: ダスワニ警部を経由して、 警察本部に掛け合ってもらったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
ダスワニ警部を経由して、
警察本部に掛け合ってもらったぜ。

engChrName: What?! Really? You're not pulling my leg, are you?
engSearchText: What?! Really? You're not pulling my leg, are you?
jpnChrName: ええっ！　本当ですか！？
jpnSearchText: ええっ！　本当ですか！？

engChrName: No, not at all. The idea is that you'll still be providing security, just from within the parade itself as one of the performers.
engSearchText:
No, not at all. The idea is that you'll still be providing
security, just from within the parade itself as one of
the performers.
jpnChrName: はい、キャストとしてパレードの内側から 警備をしてもらいたいという話になりまして。
jpnSearchText:
はい、キャストとしてパレードの内側から
警備をしてもらいたいという話になりまして。

engChrName: From what we were told, you should be officially notified about the change in your post soon.
engSearchText:
From what we were told, you should be officially
notified about the change in your post soon.
jpnChrName: 後で巡査の方に正式に 連絡が来るとの事でしたよ。
jpnSearchText:
後で巡査の方に正式に
連絡が来るとの事でしたよ。

engChrName: I don't believe it. How did you guys convince the brass to change plans? Just who are—
engSearchText:
I don't believe it. How did you guys convince the
brass to change plans? Just who are—
jpnChrName: というか、警察の決定を 変えられるだなんて貴方達は一体……？
jpnSearchText:
というか、警察の決定を
変えられるだなんて貴方達は一体……？

engChrName: ...No way.
engSearchText: ...No way.
jpnChrName: まさか……
jpnSearchText: まさか……

engChrName: Sorry, I've got a call from HQ coming in. I need to take this. It should just be a moment.
engSearchText:
Sorry, I've got a call from HQ coming in. I need to
take this. It should just be a moment.
jpnChrName: 本部から通信が入って来たようです。 少し失礼しますね。
jpnSearchText:
本部から通信が入って来たようです。
少し失礼しますね。

engChrName: No problem. Take your time.
engSearchText: No problem. Take your time.
jpnChrName: おう、お構いなく。
jpnSearchText: おう、お構いなく。

engChrName: Yes, this is Officer Vernier, on patrol. Over.
engSearchText: Yes, this is Officer Vernier, on patrol. Over.
jpnChrName: こちら巡回中のバーニヤ巡査です。
jpnSearchText: こちら巡回中のバーニヤ巡査です。

engChrName: ...What?!
engSearchText: ...What?!
jpnChrName: ……ええっ！？

engChrName: Ahem. Sorry, I mean, copy that. Yes, I can handle that. No problem. Over and out.
engSearchText:
Ahem. Sorry, I mean, copy that. Yes, I can
handle that. No problem. Over and out.
jpnChrName: コホン、はい大丈夫です……分かりました。
jpnSearchText: コホン、はい大丈夫です……分かりました。

engChrName: Tharbad Police HQ just ordered me to change positions during the parade.
engSearchText:
Tharbad Police HQ just ordered me to change
positions during the parade.
jpnChrName: ……サルバッド警察本部から 配備変更を命じられました。
jpnSearchText:
……サルバッド警察本部から
配備変更を命じられました。

engChrName: They asked me to join the Carnal Cavalcade as one of the performers and provide security for the cast members from the inside!
engSearchText:
They asked me to join the Carnal Cavalcade as one of
the performers and provide security for the cast
members from the inside!
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレードに参加して 内側からキャストを警護するようにと……！
jpnSearchText:
フォクシーパレードに参加して
内側からキャストを警護するようにと……！

engChrName: Nice. Glad to hear the inspector came through for us.
engSearchText: Nice. Glad to hear the inspector came through for us.
jpnChrName: ハッ、警部がちゃんとやってくれたみてえだな。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、警部がちゃんとやってくれたみてえだな。

engChrName: So now you should make sure to stop by Vegas Films. You'll want to talk to Mr. Gotti and see what he has in mind for you.
engSearchText:
So now you should make sure to stop by Vegas Films.
You'll want to talk to Mr. Gotti and see what he has
in mind for you.
jpnChrName: それじゃ後でベガスフィルムに来てくれ。 ゴッチ監督と顔合わせしてもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ後でベガスフィルムに来てくれ。
ゴッチ監督と顔合わせしてもらうぞ。

engChrName: That's no problem at all. Thanks for going to all that trouble for me! I'll see you later.
engSearchText:
That's no problem at all. Thanks for going to all that
trouble for me! I'll see you later.
jpnChrName: ええ、分かりました。 それではまた後でね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、分かりました。
それではまた後でね。

engChrName: Nice. That's one dancer added to the crew.
engSearchText: Nice. That's one dancer added to the crew.
jpnChrName: これでようやく一人目か。
jpnSearchText: これでようやく一人目か。

engChrName: Gotti said he wanted at least one dancer, but ideally three. So what's the play? Keep looking?
engSearchText:
Gotti said he wanted at least one dancer, but
ideally three. So what's the play? Keep looking?
jpnChrName: 最低一人、多くて三人って話だったが どうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
最低一人、多くて三人って話だったが
どうすんだ？

engChrName: Yeah, if we could find three dancers, that'd be for the best.
engSearchText:
Yeah, if we could find three dancers, that'd be for
the best.
jpnChrName: そうだな……どうせなら きっちり三人揃えたい所なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……どうせなら
きっちり三人揃えたい所なんだが。

engChrName: But if we have trouble findin' anyone else, there's no harm cutting things short here.
engSearchText:
But if we have trouble findin' anyone else, there's no
harm cutting things short here.
jpnChrName: どうしても見つからねえようなら、 適当な所で切り上げた方がいいだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
どうしても見つからねえようなら、
適当な所で切り上げた方がいいだろうな。

engChrName: Perfectly reasonable. Shall we continue searching, then?
engSearchText:
Perfectly reasonable. Shall we continue
searching, then?
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。 それではもう少し探してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました。
それではもう少し探してみましょうか。

engChrName: If we decide to call it quits, we can head back to Vegas Films and talk to Mr. Gotti.
engSearchText:
If we decide to call it quits, we can head back to
Vegas Films and talk to Mr. Gotti.
jpnChrName: 切り上げる場合は ベガスフィルムの監督の下に戻りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
切り上げる場合は
ベガスフィルムの監督の下に戻りましょう。

engChrName: Yes, another dancer for the parade! We're making it happen!
engSearchText:
Yes, another dancer for the parade! We're making
it happen!
jpnChrName: ふぅ、これで追加キャスト二人目ですねっ！
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、これで追加キャスト二人目ですねっ！

engChrName: At this point, it's probably perfectly fine for us to call it good and report back to Gotti, if need be.
engSearchText:
At this point, it's probably perfectly fine for us to call
it good and report back to Gotti, if need be.
jpnChrName: ここで切り上げて監督に 報告しちまってもいいんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ここで切り上げて監督に
報告しちまってもいいんだろうが……

engChrName: Finding a third girl is a big question mark. But it never does hurt to try.
engSearchText:
Finding a third girl is a big question mark. But it
never does hurt to try.
jpnChrName: あと一人、サクッと見つからないもんかね。
jpnSearchText: あと一人、サクッと見つからないもんかね。

engChrName: Yes. I vote that we keep looking a little longer and see what we can find before deciding what to do.
engSearchText:
Yes. I vote that we keep looking a little longer and see
what we can find before deciding what to do.
jpnChrName: そうですね、もう少し探してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: そうですね、もう少し探してみましょうか。

engChrName: That's three new dancers recruited for the parade!
engSearchText: That's three new dancers recruited for the parade!
jpnChrName: これで追加キャストの方が 三人集まりましたね……！
jpnSearchText:
これで追加キャストの方が
三人集まりましたね……！

engChrName: It sure is. Time to make our way back to Vegas Films and tell Gotti the good news.
engSearchText:
It sure is. Time to make our way back to Vegas Films
and tell Gotti the good news.
jpnChrName: ああ、ベガスフィルムに行って ゴッチ監督に報告するか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ベガスフィルムに行って
ゴッチ監督に報告するか。

engChrName: Well, here we are, back at the nightclub.
engSearchText: Well, here we are, back at the nightclub.
jpnChrName: さてと、ナイトクラブに来た訳だが……
jpnSearchText: さてと、ナイトクラブに来た訳だが……

engChrName: Come to think of it, are they even gonna be open right now? It's the middle of the day.
engSearchText:
Come to think of it, are they even gonna be open
right now? It's the middle of the day.
jpnChrName: よく考えたら昼間って営業してんのか？
jpnSearchText: よく考えたら昼間って営業してんのか？

engChrName: Maybe not. Don't hear anything coming from inside.
engSearchText: Maybe not. Don't hear anything coming from inside.
jpnChrName: 店内から特に音もしねえし、 やってないのかもしれねえな。
jpnSearchText:
店内から特に音もしねえし、
やってないのかもしれねえな。

engChrName: Well, poot. Should we turn around and look someplace else?
engSearchText:
Well, poot. Should we turn around and look
someplace else?
jpnChrName: 残念ですけど、仕方ないですね…… 引き返しましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
残念ですけど、仕方ないですね……
引き返しましょうか。

engChrName: Not yet. Gotta imagine there's at least a handful of folks around, gettin' stuff ready for tonight.
engSearchText:
Not yet. Gotta imagine there's at least a handful of
folks around, gettin' stuff ready for tonight.
jpnChrName: いや、準備中の店員くらいならいるんじゃねーか？
jpnSearchText: いや、準備中の店員くらいならいるんじゃねーか？

engChrName: Aaron put his hand on the door and tried pulling it open.
engSearchText:
Aaron put his hand on the door and tried pulling
it open.
jpnChrName: アーロンはドアノブに手をかけた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>アーロンはドアノブに手をかけた。

engChrName: Knew it! Door's open. Might as well stroll inside and have a look around.
engSearchText:
Knew it! Door's open. Might as well stroll inside and
have a look around.
jpnChrName: おっ、やっぱりな。 鍵は開いてるみたいだし行ってみるか。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、やっぱりな。
鍵は開いてるみたいだし行ってみるか。

engChrName: What?! Are we, umm, sure about this? I don't know that we should walk in uninvited...
engSearchText:
What?! Are we, umm, sure about this? I don't know
that we should walk in uninvited...
jpnChrName: えっ……！ 勝手に入っても大丈夫でしょうか……
jpnSearchText:
えっ……！
勝手に入っても大丈夫でしょうか……

engChrName: Eh, it'll be fine. If anyone's there, we've got an offer they'll find interesting. I'm sure they'll hear us out.
engSearchText:
Eh, it'll be fine. If anyone's there, we've got an offer
they'll find interesting. I'm sure they'll hear us out.
jpnChrName: ま、店内に誰かいるなら 相手にとっても悪い話じゃねえだろ。
jpnSearchText:
ま、店内に誰かいるなら
相手にとっても悪い話じゃねえだろ。

engChrName: I say we go in. If anyone asks, we'll tell 'em we got urgent business.
engSearchText:
I say we go in. If anyone asks, we'll tell 'em we got
urgent business.
jpnChrName: 急ぎの用件って事で邪魔しちまうか。
jpnSearchText: 急ぎの用件って事で邪魔しちまうか。

engChrName: Jackpot! That chick over there ought to do nicely.
engSearchText: Jackpot! That chick over there ought to do nicely.
jpnChrName: おっ、いたいた。 あの姉ちゃんなんていいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、いたいた。
あの姉ちゃんなんていいじゃねえか。

engChrName: Definitely. She's obviously a pro. She knows exactly what she has to offer and how to show it.
engSearchText:
Definitely. She's obviously a pro. She knows exactly
what she has to offer and how to show it.
jpnChrName: 確かに、自分の魅せ方を分かってる プロっつう風格があるな。
jpnSearchText:
確かに、自分の魅せ方を分かってる
プロっつう風格があるな。

engChrName: Well, let's go ask her, then!
engSearchText: Well, let's go ask her, then!
jpnChrName: それじゃあ、声をかけてみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: それじゃあ、声をかけてみましょうか。

engChrName: Oops, looks like I forgot to lock up when I went out to buy some smokes.
engSearchText:
Oops, looks like I forgot to lock up when I went out
to buy some smokes.
jpnChrName: あれ、さっきタバコ買いに行った時に カギ締め忘れちゃったのかな？
jpnSearchText:
あれ、さっきタバコ買いに行った時に
カギ締め忘れちゃったのかな？

engChrName: Sorry, folks. We're not open. I'll have to ask you to leave and wait for nightfall.
engSearchText:
Sorry, folks. We're not open. I'll have to ask you to
leave and wait for nightfall.
jpnChrName: それにしても、勝手に入って来ちゃダメじゃん～。 見ての通り昼間は営業してないよ？
jpnSearchText:
それにしても、勝手に入って来ちゃダメじゃん～。
見ての通り昼間は営業してないよ？

engChrName: We know. Apologies for bursting in. We're lookin' for someone specific who can help us with a last-minute arrangement.
engSearchText:
We know. Apologies for bursting in. We're lookin'
for someone specific who can help us with a
last-minute arrangement.
jpnChrName: 悪いな、ちょいと急ぎの用事があって 条件に合う人を探しててよ。
jpnSearchText:
悪いな、ちょいと急ぎの用事があって
条件に合う人を探しててよ。

engChrName: Quick question: you interested in the Carnal Cavalcade at all?
engSearchText:
Quick question: you interested in the Carnal
Cavalcade at all?
jpnChrName: そこでなんだが── アンタ、フォクシーパレードに興味はねえか？
jpnSearchText:
そこでなんだが──
アンタ、フォクシーパレードに興味はねえか？

engChrName: What, you mean the big parade tomorrow?
engSearchText: What, you mean the big parade tomorrow?
jpnChrName: えっ？　フォクシーパレード？
jpnSearchText: えっ？　フォクシーパレード？

engChrName: Of course I am! I love Salvatore Gotti's movies! That parade should be amazing!
engSearchText:
Of course I am! I love Salvatore Gotti's movies!
That parade should be amazing!
jpnChrName: 当然、楽しみに決まってるでしょ！ あたしゴッチ監督の映画好きなんだよね～！
jpnSearchText:
当然、楽しみに決まってるでしょ！
あたしゴッチ監督の映画好きなんだよね～！

engChrName: Knowing him, it's going to be the sexiest, most spectacular thing around! I know I work here, but I'll recognize game when I see it!
engSearchText:
Knowing him, it's going to be the sexiest, most
spectacular thing around! I know I work here, but I'll
recognize game when I see it!
jpnChrName: 監督の事だから、パレードも最高にセクシーで スペクタクルにしてくれるに決まってるし！
jpnSearchText:
監督の事だから、パレードも最高にセクシーで
スペクタクルにしてくれるに決まってるし！

engChrName: Heck, I'm so excited for it, I took paid time off tomorrow to enjoy it from the VIP seats.
engSearchText:
Heck, I'm so excited for it, I took paid time off
tomorrow to enjoy it from the VIP seats.
jpnChrName: 特等席で観るために、明日は 有休取っちゃったくらいなんだから！
jpnSearchText:
特等席で観るために、明日は
有休取っちゃったくらいなんだから！

engChrName: My, my, you certainly sound like a devoted fan of Mr. Gotti.
engSearchText:
My, my, you certainly sound like a devoted fan of
Mr. Gotti.
jpnChrName: ふふ、随分と熱心な ゴッチ監督のファンのようですね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、随分と熱心な
ゴッチ監督のファンのようですね。

engChrName: Well, you're in luck, 'cause you're going to love what's coming next.
engSearchText:
Well, you're in luck, 'cause you're going to love what's
coming next.
jpnChrName: ハッ、尚更丁度いいじゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、尚更丁度いいじゃねえか。

engChrName: We're with Arkride Solutions. As it so happens, we've been retained by Mr. Gotti to help him with somethin'.
engSearchText:
We're with Arkride Solutions. As it so happens,
we've been retained by Mr. Gotti to help him
with somethin'.
jpnChrName: 実は俺達はゴッチ監督から依頼を受けて来た 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンでな。
jpnSearchText:
実は俺達はゴッチ監督から依頼を受けて来た
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンでな。

engChrName: Specifically, he's looking to add a few more girls to the parade. Would you be down for it?
engSearchText:
Specifically, he's looking to add a few more girls to
the parade. Would you be down for it?
