jpnSearchText:
パレードの追加キャストを探していてな……
アンタに頼みたいと思うんだが、どうだ？

engChrName: WHAT IN ARUSHA'S NAME?! Are you people for real?!
engSearchText:
WHAT IN ARUSHA'S NAME?! Are you people
for real?!
jpnChrName: ええ～～っ！？ それホントっ！？
jpnSearchText:
ええ～～っ！？
それホントっ！？

engChrName: Completely for real. All Mr. Gotti needs is someone who can dance 'a little'. I'd guess you can do more than that.
engSearchText:
Completely for real. All Mr. Gotti needs is someone
who can dance 'a little'. I'd guess you can do more
than that.
jpnChrName: はい、多少は踊れる事が条件になりますが どうでしょうか？
jpnSearchText:
はい、多少は踊れる事が条件になりますが
どうでしょうか？

engChrName: Honey, who do you think you're talking to?
engSearchText: Honey, who do you think you're talking to?
jpnChrName: そんなの、当然やるに決まってるでしょ！
jpnSearchText: そんなの、当然やるに決まってるでしょ！

engChrName: I work as a pole dancer. You bet your fancy ass I'm used to dancing for a crowd! Hell, I'll show everyone out there how it's done!
engSearchText:
I work as a pole dancer. You bet your fancy ass I'm
used to dancing for a crowd! Hell, I'll show everyone
out there how it's done!
jpnChrName: アタシは一応ポールダンサーだし 踊りの方も任せておいてよ！
jpnSearchText:
アタシは一応ポールダンサーだし
踊りの方も任せておいてよ！

engChrName: Aah, I can't believe this is happening! Never in a million years did I think I'd do something like THIS! Now I'm even more excited!
engSearchText:
Aah, I can't believe this is happening! Never in a
million years did I think I'd do something like THIS!
Now I'm even more excited!
jpnChrName: ふふ、これは一生の思い出になりそうね。 超楽しみ～！
jpnSearchText:
ふふ、これは一生の思い出になりそうね。
超楽しみ～！

engChrName: So we have a deal? Great!
engSearchText: So we have a deal? Great!
jpnChrName: そういう事なら決定ですねっ！
jpnSearchText: そういう事なら決定ですねっ！

engChrName: So now you should make sure to stop by Vegas Films. You'll want to talk to Mr. Gotti and see what he has in mind for you.
engSearchText:
So now you should make sure to stop by Vegas Films.
You'll want to talk to Mr. Gotti and see what he has
in mind for you.
jpnChrName: それじゃ後でベガスフィルムに来てくれ。 ゴッチ監督と顔合わせしてもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ後でベガスフィルムに来てくれ。
ゴッチ監督と顔合わせしてもらうぞ。

engChrName: You got it! I'll redo my makeup and then go introduce myself. Gotta make sure I look the part!
engSearchText:
You got it! I'll redo my makeup and then go
introduce myself. Gotta make sure I look the part!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、気合入れてお化粧直さないとね～！
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、気合入れてお化粧直さないとね～！

engChrName: Nice, that's one dancer added to the crew.
engSearchText: Nice, that's one dancer added to the crew.
jpnChrName: これでようやく一人目か。
jpnSearchText: これでようやく一人目か。

engChrName: Gotti said he wanted at least one dancer, but ideally three. So what's the play? Keep looking?
engSearchText:
Gotti said he wanted at least one dancer, but
ideally three. So what's the play? Keep looking?
jpnChrName: 最低一人、多くて三人って話だったが どうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
最低一人、多くて三人って話だったが
どうすんだ？

engChrName: Yeah, if we could find three dancers, that'd be for the best.
engSearchText:
Yeah, if we could find three dancers, that'd be for
the best.
jpnChrName: そうだな……どうせなら きっちり三人揃えたい所なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……どうせなら
きっちり三人揃えたい所なんだが。

engChrName: But if we have trouble findin' anyone else, there's no harm cuttin' things short here.
engSearchText:
But if we have trouble findin' anyone else, there's no
harm cuttin' things short here.
jpnChrName: どうしても見つからねえようなら、 適当な所で切り上げた方がいいだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
どうしても見つからねえようなら、
適当な所で切り上げた方がいいだろうな。

engChrName: Perfectly reasonable. Shall we continue searching, then?
engSearchText:
Perfectly reasonable. Shall we continue
searching, then?
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。 それではもう少し探してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました。
それではもう少し探してみましょうか。

engChrName: If we decide to call it quits, we can head back to Vegas Films and talk to Mr. Gotti.
engSearchText:
If we decide to call it quits, we can head back to
Vegas Films and talk to Mr. Gotti.
jpnChrName: 切り上げる場合は ベガスフィルムの監督の下に戻りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
切り上げる場合は
ベガスフィルムの監督の下に戻りましょう。

engChrName: Yes, another dancer for the parade! We're making it happen!
engSearchText:
Yes, another dancer for the parade! We're making
it happen!
jpnChrName: ふぅ、これで追加キャスト二人目ですねっ！
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、これで追加キャスト二人目ですねっ！

engChrName: At this point, it's probably perfectly fine for us to call it good and report back to Gotti.
engSearchText:
At this point, it's probably perfectly fine for us to call
it good and report back to Gotti.
jpnChrName: ここで切り上げて監督に 報告しちまってもいいんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ここで切り上げて監督に
報告しちまってもいいんだろうが……

engChrName: Finding a third girl is a big question mark. But it never does hurt to try.
engSearchText:
Finding a third girl is a big question mark. But it
never does hurt to try.
jpnChrName: あと一人、サクッと見つからないもんかね。
jpnSearchText: あと一人、サクッと見つからないもんかね。

engChrName: Yes. I vote that we keep looking a little longer and see what we can find before deciding what to do.
engSearchText:
Yes. I vote that we keep looking a little longer and see
what we can find before deciding what to do.
jpnChrName: そうですね、もう少し探してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: そうですね、もう少し探してみましょうか。

engChrName: That's three new dancers recruited for the parade!
engSearchText: That's three new dancers recruited for the parade!
jpnChrName: これで追加キャストの方が 三人集まりましたね……！
jpnSearchText:
これで追加キャストの方が
三人集まりましたね……！

engChrName: It sure is. Time to make our way back to Vegas Films and tell Gotti the good news.
engSearchText:
It sure is. Time to make our way back to Vegas Films
and tell Gotti the good news.
jpnChrName: ああ、ベガスフィルムに行って ゴッチ監督に報告するか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ベガスフィルムに行って
ゴッチ監督に報告するか。

engChrName: Sorry to bother you two while you're talking. Mind if we ask somethin'?
engSearchText:
Sorry to bother you two while you're talking. Mind if
we ask somethin'?
jpnChrName: 取り込み中悪いな、ちょいといいか？
jpnSearchText: 取り込み中悪いな、ちょいといいか？

engChrName: Sure, go ahead.
engSearchText: Sure, go ahead.
jpnChrName: ああ、構わないけど……
jpnSearchText: ああ、構わないけど……

engChrName: Huh? Why are you looking at me? Is there something I can do?
engSearchText:
Huh? Why are you looking at me? Is there something
I can do?
jpnChrName: えっ、もしかして私に何か用？
jpnSearchText: えっ、もしかして私に何か用？

engChrName: We're with Arkride Solutions. Salvatore Gotti's called in a favor with us that we're trying to help him out with.
engSearchText:
We're with Arkride Solutions. Salvatore Gotti's called
in a favor with us that we're trying to help him
out with.
jpnChrName: 《アークライド解決事務所》のモンなんだが。 実はゴッチ監督から依頼を受け請け負っててな。
jpnSearchText:
《アークライド解決事務所》のモンなんだが。
実はゴッチ監督から依頼を受け請け負っててな。

engChrName: Basically, we're looking for additional folks to join tomorrow's Carnal Cavalcade. You interested?
engSearchText:
Basically, we're looking for additional folks to join
tomorrow's Carnal Cavalcade. You interested?
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレードの追加キャストを 探してるんだが、アンタにどうかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
フォクシーパレードの追加キャストを
探してるんだが、アンタにどうかと思ってな。

engChrName: You're working for SALVATORE GOTTI?!
engSearchText: You're working for SALVATORE GOTTI?!
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督からの依頼！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>ゴッチ監督からの依頼！？

engChrName: And you want me to be in the parade?!
engSearchText: And you want me to be in the parade?!
jpnChrName: フォクシーパレードですって！？
jpnSearchText: <S5>フォクシーパレードですって！？

engChrName: Heh, guess it's safe to say they didn't see that one coming.
engSearchText:
Heh, guess it's safe to say they didn't see that
one coming.
jpnChrName: ハッ、やたらといい反応じゃねえか。
jpnSearchText: ハッ、やたらといい反応じゃねえか。

engChrName: But why do you want Cervi to help, of all people?
engSearchText: But why do you want Cervi to help, of all people?
jpnChrName: で、でもどうしてチェルヴィを スカウトしたんだ？
jpnSearchText:
で、でもどうしてチェルヴィを
スカウトしたんだ？

engChrName: Not to diss her to her face, but she's just a regular woman. I don't know if she'd fit in with something like that.
engSearchText:
Not to diss her to her face, but she's just a
regular woman. I don't know if she'd fit in with
something like that.
jpnChrName: こう言っちゃなんだけど、こいつは ただの一般人だし煌びやかなパレードとは無縁だろ？
jpnSearchText:
こう言っちゃなんだけど、こいつは
ただの一般人だし煌びやかなパレードとは無縁だろ？

engChrName: Hey, so much for 'not dissing me to my face'! I know I'm not special, but do you have to say it like that?
engSearchText:
Hey, so much for 'not dissing me to my face'! I know
I'm not special, but do you have to say it like that?
jpnChrName: 私もそう思うけど、 他人に言われると腹が立つわね……！
jpnSearchText:
私もそう思うけど、
他人に言われると腹が立つわね……！

engChrName: You say that, but...when I look in your eyes, beneath those glasses, I see a certain spark in 'em. A fire deep within.
engSearchText:
You say that, but...when I look in your eyes, beneath
those glasses, I see a certain spark in 'em. A fire
deep within.
jpnChrName: それはだな……アンタのメガネの奥に 光るものを感じたからだ。
jpnSearchText:
それはだな……アンタのメガネの奥に
光るものを感じたからだ。

engChrName: I can tell you've got this unquenchable sense of adventure and curiosity. A determination to see things through.
engSearchText:
I can tell you've got this unquenchable sense of
adventure and curiosity. A determination to see
things through.
jpnChrName: アンタからは、貪欲な探求心と好奇心、 食らいついてやるという覚悟を感じる。
jpnSearchText:
アンタからは、貪欲な探求心と好奇心、
食らいついてやるという覚悟を感じる。

engChrName: That's exactly the spirit Mr. Gotti wants in his parade. More spice for what's already shaping up to be a zesty event.
engSearchText:
That's exactly the spirit Mr. Gotti wants in
his parade. More spice for what's already shaping up
to be a zesty event.
jpnChrName: その心意気がパレードにおいて いいスパイスになるんじゃねえかと思ってな。
jpnSearchText:
その心意気がパレードにおいて
いいスパイスになるんじゃねえかと思ってな。

engChrName: Wow... I don't know what to say. You really get me! That's exactly who I am!
engSearchText:
Wow... I don't know what to say. You really get me!
That's exactly who I am!
jpnChrName: すごい……当たってるわ！ まさにその通りなのよ！
jpnSearchText:
すごい……当たってるわ！
まさにその通りなのよ！

engChrName: So, it just so happens we've been making our own independent movie, and we brought it to Vegas Films to have them take a look at it.
engSearchText:
So, it just so happens we've been making our own
independent movie, and we brought it to Vegas Films
to have them take a look at it.
jpnChrName: 実は私達、映画の自主制作をしててね。 ベガスフィルムに持ち込みに来たのよ。
jpnSearchText:
実は私達、映画の自主制作をしててね。
ベガスフィルムに持ち込みに来たのよ。

engChrName: We've been so focused on production stuff, I completely forgot the film festival was even going to happen!
engSearchText:
We've been so focused on production stuff, I
completely forgot the film festival was even going
to happen!
jpnChrName: 自主制作の事ばっかり考えてたせいで、 映画祭がある事をすっかり忘れててさ。
jpnSearchText:
自主制作の事ばっかり考えてたせいで、
映画祭がある事をすっかり忘れててさ。

engChrName: We're so lost. We were just fretting over what we should even do next.
engSearchText:
We're so lost. We were just fretting over what we
should even do next.
jpnChrName: ちょうどどうしたもんかって 悩んでた所なんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ちょうどどうしたもんかって
悩んでた所なんだけど……

engChrName: If you really feel like that, I think you should do it, Cervi. Get out there and leave your mark! I'm sure you'll do great!
engSearchText:
If you really feel like that, I think you should do
it, Cervi. Get out there and leave your mark! I'm sure
you'll do great!
jpnChrName: そういう事なら、参加して来いよチェルヴィ。 少しでも爪痕を残して来るんだよ！
jpnSearchText:
そういう事なら、参加して来いよチェルヴィ。
少しでも爪痕を残して来るんだよ！

engChrName: Well, I don't have any aspirations to become a professional performer or anything. My heart's set on being a creator.
engSearchText:
Well, I don't have any aspirations to become a
professional performer or anything. My heart's set on
being a creator.
jpnChrName: 私は演者じゃなくてクリエイター志望なんだけど。
jpnSearchText: 私は演者じゃなくてクリエイター志望なんだけど。

engChrName: But if it's an opportunity to meet someone like Mr. Gotti, then...I accept! I'd be thrilled to do it!
engSearchText:
But if it's an opportunity to meet someone like Mr.
Gotti, then...I accept! I'd be thrilled to do it!
jpnChrName: でも、そうね……少しでもゴッチ監督と 接点を持てるなら喜んで参加させてもらうわ！
jpnSearchText:
でも、そうね……少しでもゴッチ監督と
接点を持てるなら喜んで参加させてもらうわ！

engChrName: Umm, wait! Miss, can you dance at all? We're looking for folks who can dance at least a little.
engSearchText:
Umm, wait! Miss, can you dance at all?
We're looking for folks who can dance at least a little.
jpnChrName: ちなみに、少しはダンスを踊れないと いけないみたいなんですけど大丈夫ですか？
jpnSearchText:
ちなみに、少しはダンスを踊れないと
いけないみたいなんですけど大丈夫ですか？

engChrName: Erm. Cervi, you might want to—
engSearchText: Erm. Cervi, you might want to—
jpnChrName: チェルヴィ、まさか……
jpnSearchText: チェルヴィ、まさか……

engChrName: I-I'll be fine, really! Just because I'm not athletic doesn't mean I can't dance when push comes to shove! I'll show everyone I can do it!
engSearchText:
I-I'll be fine, really! Just because I'm not athletic
doesn't mean I can't dance when push comes
to shove! I'll show everyone I can do it!
jpnChrName: だ、大丈夫よ！　運動音痴だって、 踊ろうと思えば踊れるって証明してやるわ！
jpnSearchText:
だ、大丈夫よ！　運動音痴だって、
踊ろうと思えば踊れるって証明してやるわ！

engChrName: That's...a little worrying, but at least you're enthusiastic. I'm sure that'll carry you. I think.
engSearchText:
That's...a little worrying, but at least
you're enthusiastic. I'm sure that'll carry you. I think.
jpnChrName: 微妙に不安だが…… 意気込みは十分みてえだしな。
jpnSearchText:
微妙に不安だが……
意気込みは十分みてえだしな。

engChrName: Anyway, head inside Vegas Films when you're ready. Your man Gotti will want to speak with you.
engSearchText:
Anyway, head inside Vegas Films when you're ready.
Your man Gotti will want to speak with you.
jpnChrName: それじゃ後でベガスフィルムの中に入ってきてくれ。 ゴッチ監督と顔合わせしてもらうぞ。
jpnSearchText:
それじゃ後でベガスフィルムの中に入ってきてくれ。
ゴッチ監督と顔合わせしてもらうぞ。

engChrName: Sounds good! I promise you, you won't regret this!
engSearchText: Sounds good! I promise you, you won't regret this!
jpnChrName: ええ、任せておいて！
jpnSearchText: ええ、任せておいて！

engChrName: Uh, Cervi, you might want to practice a little before going in. Just a thought.
engSearchText:
Uh, Cervi, you might want to practice a little before
going in. Just a thought.
jpnChrName: それまでに少しはダンスの練習を しといた方がいいかもな……
jpnSearchText:
それまでに少しはダンスの練習を
しといた方がいいかもな……

engChrName: Nice. That's one dancer added to the crew.
engSearchText: Nice. That's one dancer added to the crew.
jpnChrName: これでようやく一人目か。
jpnSearchText: これでようやく一人目か。

engChrName: Gotti said he wanted at least one dancer, but ideally three. So what's the play? Keep looking?
engSearchText:
Gotti said he wanted at least one dancer, but
ideally three. So what's the play? Keep looking?
jpnChrName: 最低一人、多くて三人って話だったが どうすんだ？
jpnSearchText:
最低一人、多くて三人って話だったが
どうすんだ？

engChrName: Yeah, if we could find three dancers, that'd be for the best.
engSearchText:
Yeah, if we could find three dancers, that'd be for
the best.
jpnChrName: そうだな……どうせなら きっちり三人揃えたい所なんだが。
jpnSearchText:
そうだな……どうせなら
きっちり三人揃えたい所なんだが。

engChrName: But if we have trouble findin' anyone else, there's no harm cuttin' things short here.
engSearchText:
But if we have trouble findin' anyone else, there's no
harm cuttin' things short here.
jpnChrName: どうしても見つからねえようなら、 適当な所で切り上げた方がいいだろうな。
jpnSearchText:
どうしても見つからねえようなら、
適当な所で切り上げた方がいいだろうな。

engChrName: Perfectly reasonable. Shall we continue searching, then?
engSearchText:
Perfectly reasonable. Shall we continue
searching, then?
jpnChrName: かしこまりました。 それではもう少し探してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText:
かしこまりました。
それではもう少し探してみましょうか。

engChrName: If we decide to call it quits, we can head back to Vegas Films and talk to Mr. Gotti.
engSearchText:
If we decide to call it quits, we can head back to
Vegas Films and talk to Mr. Gotti.
jpnChrName: 切り上げる場合は ベガスフィルムの監督の下に戻りましょう。
jpnSearchText:
切り上げる場合は
ベガスフィルムの監督の下に戻りましょう。

engChrName: Yes, another dancer for the parade! We're making it happen!
engSearchText:
Yes, another dancer for the parade! We're making
it happen!
jpnChrName: ふぅ、これで追加キャスト二人目ですねっ！
jpnSearchText: ふぅ、これで追加キャスト二人目ですねっ！

engChrName: At this point, it's probably perfectly fine for us to call it good and report back to Gotti.
engSearchText:
At this point, it's probably perfectly fine for us to call
it good and report back to Gotti.
jpnChrName: ここで切り上げて監督に 報告しちまってもいいんだろうが……
jpnSearchText:
ここで切り上げて監督に
報告しちまってもいいんだろうが……

engChrName: Findin' a third girl is a big question mark. But it never does hurt to try.
engSearchText:
Findin' a third girl is a big question mark. But it never
does hurt to try.
jpnChrName: あと一人、サクッと見つからないもんかね。
jpnSearchText: あと一人、サクッと見つからないもんかね。

engChrName: Yes. I vote that we keep looking a little longer and see what we can find before deciding what to do.
engSearchText:
Yes. I vote that we keep looking a little longer and see
what we can find before deciding what to do.
jpnChrName: そうですね、もう少し探してみましょうか。
jpnSearchText: そうですね、もう少し探してみましょうか。

engChrName: That's three new dancers recruited for the parade!
engSearchText: That's three new dancers recruited for the parade!
jpnChrName: これで追加キャストの方が 三人集まりましたね……！
jpnSearchText:
これで追加キャストの方が
三人集まりましたね……！

engChrName: It sure is. Time to make our way back to Vegas Films and tell Gotti the good news.
engSearchText:
It sure is. Time to make our way back to Vegas Films
and tell Gotti the good news.
jpnChrName: ああ、ベガスフィルムに行って ゴッチ監督に報告するか。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、ベガスフィルムに行って
ゴッチ監督に報告するか。

engChrName: We meet again! So, how's the hunt coming along? Find any girls to round out my cavalcade yet?
engSearchText:
We meet again! So, how's the hunt coming along?
Find any girls to round out my cavalcade yet?
jpnChrName: おお、君たちか！ キャスト探しの方は順調かね？
jpnSearchText:
おお、君たちか！
キャスト探しの方は順調かね？

engChrName: (Should we call it a day and report back to Gotti? Or keep lookin'?)
engSearchText:
(Should we call it a day and report back to Gotti?
Or keep lookin'?)
jpnChrName: （ゴッチ監督に報告しちまってもいいか……？）
jpnSearchText: （ゴッチ監督に報告しちまってもいいか……？）

engChrName: Oh, yeah. It's goin' great.
engSearchText: Oh, yeah. It's goin' great.
jpnChrName: ええ、捜索の方は順調です。
jpnSearchText: ええ、捜索の方は順調です。

engChrName: In fact, if you've still got time to wait, we'd be happy to keep searchin' some more and get back to you later.
engSearchText:
In fact, if you've still got time to wait, we'd be happy
to keep searchin' some more and get back to
you later.
jpnChrName: 改めて報告させてもらうので もう少し待っていて頂けますかね。
jpnSearchText:
改めて報告させてもらうので
もう少し待っていて頂けますかね。

engChrName: Absolutely! You can't rush art! I'm just dying to see what kind of ladies my man and his team can line up for me.
engSearchText:
Absolutely! You can't rush art! I'm just dying to see
what kind of ladies my man and his team can line up
for me.
jpnChrName: ああ、君がどんな子を選んで来るのか 楽しみにしているぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、君がどんな子を選んで来るのか
楽しみにしているぞ！

engChrName: Hang in there just a bit longer, Mr. Gotti. We'll be back with a lineup for the ages before you know it.
engSearchText:
Hang in there just a bit longer, Mr. Gotti. We'll be
back with a lineup for the ages before you know it.
jpnChrName: ええ、良い報告をさせて頂けるまで もう少し待ってもらえますかね。
jpnSearchText:
ええ、良い報告をさせて頂けるまで
もう少し待ってもらえますかね。

engChrName: Absolutely! You can't rush art! I'm just dying to see what kind of ladies my man and his team can line up for me.
engSearchText:
Absolutely! You can't rush art! I'm just dying to see
what kind of ladies my man and his team can line up
for me.
jpnChrName: ああ、君がどんな子を選んで来るのか 楽しみにしているぞ！
jpnSearchText:
ああ、君がどんな子を選んで来るのか
楽しみにしているぞ！

engChrName: We sure have. You got time for us to fill you in?
engSearchText: We sure have. You got time for us to fill you in?
jpnChrName: ええ、見つけて来ましたよ。 早速報告させてもらっても？
jpnSearchText:
ええ、見つけて来ましたよ。
早速報告させてもらっても？

engChrName: Of course! Show me your own cavalcade!
engSearchText: Of course! Show me your own cavalcade!
jpnChrName: ああ、勿論だとも！
jpnSearchText: ああ、勿論だとも！

engChrName: Van contacted everyone that the group managed to scout. Before long, they assembled at Vegas Films.
engSearchText:
Van contacted everyone that the group managed
to scout. Before long, they assembled at Vegas Films.
jpnChrName: ヴァンがスカウトした人物に連絡を入れると、 間もなくベガスフィルムへと駆け付けてくれた。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンがスカウトした人物に連絡を入れると、
間もなくベガスフィルムへと駆け付けてくれた。

engChrName: Great work, spriggan! I knew you were the right man for the job. You knew just what I was looking for. I'm completely blown away!
engSearchText:
Great work, spriggan! I knew you were the right man
for the job. You knew just what I was looking for.
I'm completely blown away!
jpnChrName: おお、流石は《裏解決屋》だな。 ここまで仕事が的確だとは驚いた！
jpnSearchText:
おお、流石は《裏解決屋》だな。
ここまで仕事が的確だとは驚いた！

engChrName: It's like you were reading my mind! When I think beautiful women, THIS is exactly what I like to see!
engSearchText:
It's like you were reading my mind! When I think
beautiful women, THIS is exactly what I like to see!
jpnChrName: ワシの理想の美人を連れて来てくれるとはなぁ！
jpnSearchText: ワシの理想の美人を連れて来てくれるとはなぁ！

engChrName: Well, like you said before, Tharbad's not exactly hurtin' for ladies who are as capable as they are easy on the eyes. That definitely helped.
engSearchText:
Well, like you said before, Tharbad's not exactly
hurtin' for ladies who are as capable as they are easy
on the eyes. That definitely helped.
jpnChrName: ま、仰っていた通りサルバッドは 粒ぞろいだったおかげでもありますがね。
jpnSearchText:
ま、仰っていた通りサルバッドは
粒ぞろいだったおかげでもありますがね。

engChrName: Oh, stop it, you guys! You're going to make me blush!
engSearchText: Oh, stop it, you guys! You're going to make me blush!
jpnChrName: いやぁ面と向かって 言われると照れちゃうなぁ！
jpnSearchText:
いやぁ面と向かって
言われると照れちゃうなぁ！

engChrName: But never mind that. I can't believe I'm standing right next to the real Salvatore Gotti!
engSearchText:
But never mind that. I can't believe I'm standing right
next to the real Salvatore Gotti!
jpnChrName: っていうか、本物のゴッチ監督じゃん……！
jpnSearchText: っていうか、本物のゴッチ監督じゃん……！

engChrName: I'd love to shake your hand later. Or maybe, could I ask you to look at our independent film? That would mean the world to me!
engSearchText:
I'd love to shake your hand later. Or maybe, could I
ask you to look at our independent film? That would
mean the world to me!
jpnChrName: あ、後で握手してもらおうかな…… いや今こそ自主制作の映画を観てもらうべき！？
jpnSearchText:
あ、後で握手してもらおうかな……
いや今こそ自主制作の映画を観てもらうべき！？

engChrName: I may still technically be on duty, but I can't believe I get to take part in something led by you, Mr. Gotti.
engSearchText:
I may still technically be on duty, but I can't believe I
get to take part in something led by you, Mr. Gotti.
jpnChrName: 警備の任務と並行して行う事になりますが……
jpnSearchText: 警備の任務と並行して行う事になりますが……

engChrName: You can count on me to help make sure this is going to be a fun parade!
engSearchText:
You can count on me to help make sure this is going
to be a fun parade!
jpnChrName: ゴッチ監督が手掛けるパレードですもの。 いいパレードになるよう全力で挑みます。
jpnSearchText:
ゴッチ監督が手掛けるパレードですもの。
いいパレードになるよう全力で挑みます。

engChrName: By the Goddess, I am such a big fan of yours, director!
engSearchText:
By the Goddess, I am such a big fan of
yours, director!
jpnChrName: あたし、監督の作品の大ファンなんだよね～！
jpnSearchText: あたし、監督の作品の大ファンなんだよね～！

engChrName: I might not be QUITE as hot as your actresses, but you'd better believe I can still put on a hell of a scintillating show!
engSearchText:
I might not be QUITE as hot as your actresses, but
you'd better believe I can still put on a hell of a
scintillating show!
jpnChrName: 女優さん達には負けちゃうかもしれないけど、 セクシー＆スペクタクルに頑張っちゃうから！
jpnSearchText:
女優さん達には負けちゃうかもしれないけど、
セクシー＆スペクタクルに頑張っちゃうから！

engChrName: Gahaha! Now THIS is the kind of energy I like to see! This is perfect!
engSearchText:
Gahaha! Now THIS is the kind of energy I like
to see! This is perfect!
jpnChrName: ワハハ、元気があってよろしい！
jpnSearchText: ワハハ、元気があってよろしい！

engChrName: All right, time for a trip to the dressing room! It'd be a waste to have all this beauty on display without the threads to match it!
engSearchText:
All right, time for a trip to the dressing room! It'd be
a waste to have all this beauty on display without the
threads to match it!
jpnChrName: それでは早速、衣装合わせといこう！ パレードでは見栄えも重要じゃからなあ！
jpnSearchText:
それでは早速、衣装合わせといこう！
パレードでは見栄えも重要じゃからなあ！

engChrName: Does this mean we get a sneak peek at what everyone will be wearing? That's exciting!
engSearchText:
Does this mean we get a sneak peek at what everyone
will be wearing? That's exciting!
jpnChrName: 衣装も見せて頂けるんですね……！
jpnSearchText: 衣装も見せて頂けるんですね……！

engChrName: Hmm! I suppose this is one of the benefits of getting to work behind the scenes for a man like Mr. Gotti.
engSearchText:
Hmm! I suppose this is one of the benefits of getting
to work behind the scenes for a man like Mr. Gotti.
jpnChrName: ふふ、まさに役得といった所でしょうか。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、まさに役得といった所でしょうか。

engChrName: Several minutes later...
engSearchText: Several minutes later...
jpnChrName: 数分後────

engChrName: Behold, the clothing for the regular cast members in tomorrow's parade!
engSearchText:
Behold, the clothing for the regular cast members in
tomorrow's parade!
jpnChrName: どうじゃ、これがフォクシーパレードの 一般キャストの衣装になる！
jpnSearchText:
どうじゃ、これがフォクシーパレードの
一般キャストの衣装になる！

engChrName: I personally supervised every little detail just as I do my own films, from the type of fabric used to the lengths of every last cut.
engSearchText:
I personally supervised every little detail just as I do
my own films, from the type of fabric used to the
lengths of every last cut.
jpnChrName: 生地の素材から切り込みの長さまで 全てワシが監修した自信作じゃ！
jpnSearchText:
生地の素材から切り込みの長さまで
全てワシが監修した自信作じゃ！

engChrName: Whoa, you did amazing, Mr. Gotti! It all looks so beautiful!
engSearchText:
Whoa, you did amazing, Mr. Gotti! It all looks
so beautiful!
jpnChrName: わぁ～！　とってもゴージャスで綺麗ですっ！
jpnSearchText: わぁ～！　とってもゴージャスで綺麗ですっ！

engChrName: Dude certainly doesn't disappoint. I could get used to a view like this.
engSearchText:
Dude certainly doesn't disappoint. I could get used to
a view like this.
jpnChrName: ヘッ、期待を裏切らねえ出来栄えだな。
jpnSearchText: ヘッ、期待を裏切らねえ出来栄えだな。

engChrName: Indeed, I am impressed. The craftsmanship is bold and glamorous.
engSearchText:
Indeed, I am impressed. The craftsmanship is bold
and glamorous.
jpnChrName: 煌びやかかつ大胆なデザインですね。
jpnSearchText: 煌びやかかつ大胆なデザインですね。

engChrName: It's all amazing for sure, even if the outfits are definitely a little...showy.
engSearchText:
It's all amazing for sure, even if the outfits are
definitely a little...showy.
jpnChrName: すごくお似合いですね！ ちょ、ちょっぴり大胆ですけど……
jpnSearchText:
すごくお似合いですね！
ちょ、ちょっぴり大胆ですけど……

engChrName: *sigh* I'll have to take everyone's word for it. They told me to take my glasses off in the dressing room.
engSearchText:
*sigh* I'll have to take everyone's word for it.
They told me to take my glasses off in the
dressing room.
jpnChrName: ううっ……メガネを外せって言われて 外して来たんだけど……
jpnSearchText:
ううっ……メガネを外せって言われて
外して来たんだけど……

engChrName: I wish I could really see how I look. It is definitely a little breezy in parts, though...
engSearchText:
I wish I could really see how I look. It is definitely a
little breezy in parts, though...
jpnChrName: 自分の衣装もよく見えないし、 やたらとスースーするわね……
jpnSearchText:
自分の衣装もよく見えないし、
やたらとスースーするわね……

engChrName: I'm fighting the urge to become a tomato, wearing something like this at my age.
engSearchText:
I'm fighting the urge to become a tomato, wearing
something like this at my age.
jpnChrName: 私の歳でこの衣装は 中々恥ずかしいような……
jpnSearchText:
私の歳でこの衣装は
中々恥ずかしいような……

engChrName: And yet it's all definitely starting to feel real now. I can't wait to get this parade on the road!
engSearchText:
And yet it's all definitely starting to feel real now.
I can't wait to get this parade on the road!
jpnChrName: でも、なんだか気が引き締まりますね。 本番が楽しみになって来ました。
jpnSearchText:
でも、なんだか気が引き締まりますね。
本番が楽しみになって来ました。

engChrName: Haha! Meanwhile, this is my kind of dress!
engSearchText: Haha! Meanwhile, this is my kind of dress!
jpnChrName: うふふっ、サイコーじゃない！
jpnSearchText: うふふっ、サイコーじゃない！

engChrName: I'll have to make sure my dancing lives up to its sexiness. Can't leave anyone disappointed after seeing me looking like this!
engSearchText:
I'll have to make sure my dancing lives up to
its sexiness. Can't leave anyone disappointed after
seeing me looking like this!
jpnChrName: この衣装に負けないくらい いいパフォーマンスをしないとね～！
jpnSearchText:
この衣装に負けないくらい
いいパフォーマンスをしないとね～！

engChrName: This definitely has your fingerprints all over it, Gotti. You always know how to bring the best out of a woman.
engSearchText:
This definitely has your fingerprints all over it, Gotti.
You always know how to bring the best out of
a woman.
jpnChrName: 流石はゴッチ監督の一言に尽きますね。 キャストの個性が引き立ってる。
jpnSearchText:
流石はゴッチ監督の一言に尽きますね。
キャストの個性が引き立ってる。

engChrName: Gahaha! I can't take all the credit. If they look fine, it's because you and your crew know how to pick 'em, spriggan.
engSearchText:
Gahaha! I can't take all the credit. If they look fine,
it's because you and your crew know how to pick
'em, spriggan.
jpnChrName: ワハハ、それだけ《裏解決屋》の 目の付け所が良かったという事じゃ。
jpnSearchText:
ワハハ、それだけ《裏解決屋》の
目の付け所が良かったという事じゃ。

engChrName: You and I really do think a lot alike. You'll definitely have my business again in the future, that's for damn sure!
engSearchText:
You and I really do think a lot alike. You'll definitely
have my business again in the future, that's for
damn sure!
jpnChrName: やはり君とはいい酒が飲めそうじゃよ。 機会があれば是非よろしく頼むぞ！
jpnSearchText:
やはり君とはいい酒が飲めそうじゃよ。
機会があれば是非よろしく頼むぞ！

engChrName: Sadly, I guess this means I have to retract my offer to your concierge there. I'm sorry to say, but a deal's a deal. I'll let you go.
engSearchText:
Sadly, I guess this means I have to retract my offer to
your concierge there. I'm sorry to say, but a deal's
a deal. I'll let you go.
jpnChrName: しかし……こうなると彼女へのオファーは 断念せざるを得ないようじゃな。
jpnSearchText:
しかし……こうなると彼女へのオファーは
断念せざるを得ないようじゃな。

engChrName: Think nothing of it. Personally, I think these women make for far more appealing additions to your parade than I could ever be.
engSearchText:
Think nothing of it. Personally, I think these women
make for far more appealing additions to your parade
than I could ever be.
jpnChrName: 恐縮です。 わたくしでは皆様の魅力に到底及びませんが。
jpnSearchText:
恐縮です。
わたくしでは皆様の魅力に到底及びませんが。

engChrName: Come now! I stand by everything I said before. I'd still be more than happy to have you aboard some other time.
engSearchText:
Come now! I stand by everything I said before.
I'd still be more than happy to have you aboard some
other time.
jpnChrName: ハハ、それではまた縁があった時の為に 取っておくとするかのう。
jpnSearchText:
ハハ、それではまた縁があった時の為に
取っておくとするかのう。

engChrName: Anyway, time to get these girls prepped so they can make a big, sexy splash tomorrow when the spotlight's on them!
engSearchText:
Anyway, time to get these girls prepped so they can
make a big, sexy splash tomorrow when the
spotlight's on them!
jpnChrName: よし──！　では早速、追加キャストへの 仕込みに移らせてもらおうかのう！
jpnSearchText:
よし──！　では早速、追加キャストへの
仕込みに移らせてもらおうかのう！

engChrName: Thanks again, folks! I'll send your payment over, pronto.
engSearchText:
Thanks again, folks! I'll send your payment
over, pronto.
jpnChrName: 皆お疲れ様じゃった！ 後で報酬を確認しておいてくれ！
jpnSearchText:
皆お疲れ様じゃった！
後で報酬を確認しておいてくれ！

engChrName: Quest Extra, Extra! completed!
engSearchText: Quest Extra, Extra! completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【追加キャストのスカウト】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>追加キャストのスカウト<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Earned
engSearchText: Earned
jpnChrName: ＳＰが上がった。
jpnSearchText: ＳＰが<C2><C0>上がった。

engChrName: That was fast! I didn't expect to see you darlings so soon.
engSearchText:
That was fast! I didn't expect to see you darlings
so soon.
jpnChrName: あら、アナタたち！ さっそく来てくれたのね。
jpnSearchText:
あら、アナタたち！
さっそく来てくれたのね。

engChrName: And I didn't expect to see a post from you.
engSearchText: And I didn't expect to see a post from you.
jpnChrName: まさかお前から依頼が入るとはな。
jpnSearchText: まさかお前から依頼が入るとはな。

engChrName: Why go through the trouble? You coulda rung me up directly. You know I wouldn't mind.
engSearchText:
Why go through the trouble? You coulda rung me
up directly. You know I wouldn't mind.
jpnChrName: 回りくどく掲示板を通さずとも、 直接連絡くれりゃあいいものを。
jpnSearchText:
回りくどく掲示板を通さずとも、
直接連絡くれりゃあいいものを。

engChrName: Huh? Whaddaya mean, 'so soon'?
engSearchText: Huh? Whaddaya mean, 'so soon'?
jpnChrName: ん？　何かあったのか？
jpnSearchText: ん？　何かあったのか？

engChrName: Oh, you just happened to walk in to say hello, then? That's just as good.
engSearchText:
Oh, you just happened to walk in to say hello, then?
That's just as good.
jpnChrName: あら、じゃあ偶然来てくれたのね。 良かったわぁ。
jpnSearchText:
あら、じゃあ偶然来てくれたのね。
良かったわぁ。

engChrName: You see, I still don't have all the ingredients I need to make my drink for the bartending tournament tonight.
engSearchText:
You see, I still don't have all the ingredients I need to
make my drink for the bartending
tournament tonight.
jpnChrName: 実は、今夜のバーテンダー大会で使う食材が まだ手に入ってないのよ……
jpnSearchText:
実は、今夜のバーテンダー大会で使う食材が
まだ手に入ってないのよ……

engChrName: I put up a post to see if you all could be dolls and save me some trouble in lining them up.
engSearchText:
I put up a post to see if you all could be dolls and save
me some trouble in lining them up.
jpnChrName: だからどうにか調達できないか、相談させてほしくて。
jpnSearchText: だからどうにか調達できないか、相談させてほしくて。

engChrName: Ah, got'cha. C'mon, a post? You coulda rung me up directly. You know I wouldn't mind.
engSearchText:
Ah, got'cha. C'mon, a post? You coulda rung me
up directly. You know I wouldn't mind.
jpnChrName: なるほどな……回りくどく掲示板を通さずとも、 直接連絡くれりゃあいいものを。
jpnSearchText:
なるほどな……回りくどく掲示板を通さずとも、
直接連絡くれりゃあいいものを。

engChrName: Haha, I knew you were going to say that.
engSearchText: Haha, I knew you were going to say that.
jpnChrName: フフ、ヴァンちゃんなら そう言ってくれると思ったけど。
jpnSearchText:
フフ、ヴァンちゃんなら
そう言ってくれると思ったけど。

engChrName: But it's important to do these things the right way. I want to ask your help as a proper job, not just as a favor to a friend.
engSearchText:
But it's important to do these things the right way.
I want to ask your help as a proper job, not just as a
favor to a friend.
jpnChrName: でも、形式は大事にしたいの。 ちゃんとお仕事としてお願いしたかったし。
jpnSearchText:
でも、形式は大事にしたいの。
ちゃんとお仕事としてお願いしたかったし。

engChrName: Even if I do feel a little bad dragging you sweethearts out here over something like this.
engSearchText:
Even if I do feel a little bad dragging you sweethearts
out here over something like this.
jpnChrName: こんなことで相談するのは ちょっと気が引けるんだけどねぇ……
jpnSearchText:
こんなことで相談するのは
ちょっと気が引けるんだけどねぇ……

engChrName: Don't sweat it. Sounds like a real bind to be in on the day of your tournament.
engSearchText:
Don't sweat it. Sounds like a real bind to be in on the
day of your tournament.
jpnChrName: 別に相談くらい構わねぇさ。 当日になかなかヘビーな問題だしな。
jpnSearchText:
別に相談くらい構わねぇさ。
当日になかなかヘビーな問題だしな。

engChrName: May I ask what sort of cocktail you intend to make?
engSearchText: May I ask what sort of cocktail you intend to make?
jpnChrName: どのようなカクテルを作られるのですか？
jpnSearchText: どのようなカクテルを作られるのですか？

engChrName: Of course! It'd be hard for you all to do your job otherwise.
engSearchText:
Of course! It'd be hard for you all to do your
job otherwise.
jpnChrName: ふふん、よくぞ聞いてくれたわ。
jpnSearchText: ふふん、よくぞ聞いてくれたわ。

engChrName: Essentially, the main task of the tournament has been announced, so contestants can plan ahead.
engSearchText:
Essentially, the main task of the tournament has been
announced, so contestants can plan ahead.
jpnChrName: 今夜の大会は、事前に課題が発表されていてね。
jpnSearchText: 今夜の大会は、事前に課題が発表されていてね。

engChrName: The judges want us to come up with our version of a Tharbad Night. No prize for guessing what it's named after.
engSearchText:
The judges want us to come up with our version of a
Tharbad Night. No prize for guessing what it's
named after.
jpnChrName: 『この地の名を冠した《サルバッドナイト》の バリエーション』を考えることになってるの。
jpnSearchText:
『この地の名を冠した《サルバッドナイト》の
バリエーション』を考えることになってるの。

engChrName: Hell, it's a prize all its own. I ordered that shit at the nightclub, and it was great. Not too sweet, just the way I like it.
engSearchText:
Hell, it's a prize all its own. I ordered that shit at
the nightclub, and it was great. Not too sweet, just the
way I like it.
jpnChrName: おっ、オレがナイトクラブで飲んだヤツだな。 甘ったるすぎず旨かったぜ。
jpnSearchText:
おっ、オレがナイトクラブで飲んだヤツだな。
甘ったるすぎず旨かったぜ。

engChrName: Wait, you mean the other night?
engSearchText: Wait, you mean the other night?
jpnChrName: なるほど、あの時に。
jpnSearchText: なるほど、あの時に。

engChrName: Yes, Feri. When the boys decided to have a nice, fun night out on the town. Without us. By themselves.
engSearchText:
Yes, Feri. When the boys decided to have a nice, fun
night out on the town. Without us. By themselves.
jpnChrName: ヴァンさんとアーロンさんだけ 楽しい夜を過ごした時ですね。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンさんとアーロンさんだけ
楽しい夜を過ごした時ですね。

engChrName: D-Don't mind them. You were sayin'?
engSearchText: D-Don't mind them. You were sayin'?
jpnChrName: ベルモッティ、続けてくれ。
jpnSearchText: ベルモッティ、続けてくれ。

engChrName: Haha! Ah, you silly poms. Anyway, normally, a Tharbad Night is blue. Reminds you of the desert sky at night, you see.
engSearchText:
Haha! Ah, you silly poms. Anyway, normally, a
Tharbad Night is blue. Reminds you of the desert sky
at night, you see.
jpnChrName: ふふっ……《サルバッドナイト》は 砂漠の夜空を思わす青色のカクテルでね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ……《サルバッドナイト》は
砂漠の夜空を思わす青色のカクテルでね。

engChrName: You even sprinkle in some gold leaf cut into the shape of stars for good measure.
engSearchText:
You even sprinkle in some gold leaf cut into the shape
of stars for good measure.
jpnChrName: 星の形に切り抜いた金箔を散らしてあるの。
jpnSearchText: 星の形に切り抜いた金箔を散らしてあるの。

engChrName: I can see why they'd make a drink like that! The stars out in the desert are so pretty at night!
engSearchText:
I can see why they'd make a drink like that! The stars
out in the desert are so pretty at night!
jpnChrName: 砂漠の夜は星がとってもきれいですから。
jpnSearchText: 砂漠の夜は星がとってもきれいですから。

engChrName: Indeed. Without the light pollution from urban areas, clear night skies can be breathtaking.
engSearchText:
Indeed. Without the light pollution from urban areas,
clear night skies can be breathtaking.
jpnChrName: 他に一切の光害が無い完全な暗闇…… 煌めきは一際でしょうね。
jpnSearchText:
他に一切の光害が無い完全な暗闇……
煌めきは一際でしょうね。

engChrName: Exactly. It's a beautiful drink. You can see why they want us putting our own spin on it.
engSearchText:
Exactly. It's a beautiful drink. You can see why they
want us putting our own spin on it.
jpnChrName: ええ、そこにアレンジを加えるわけだけど──
jpnSearchText: ええ、そこにアレンジを加えるわけだけど──

engChrName: For my part, I'm going to give it a little intrigue, you might say.
engSearchText:
For my part, I'm going to give it a little intrigue, you
might say.
jpnChrName: アタシは“情報屋としての日々”というイメージを 加えようと思ってるわ。
jpnSearchText:
アタシは“情報屋としての日々”というイメージを
加えようと思ってるわ。

engChrName: I'm going for the life of an information broker, and the sweet, calm nights spent reveling in dangerous secrets. In drink form.
engSearchText:
I'm going for the life of an information broker, and
the sweet, calm nights spent reveling in
dangerous secrets. In drink form.
jpnChrName: 危険な秘密を共有する、静かで甘美な夜──
jpnSearchText: 危険な秘密を共有する、静かで甘美な夜──

engChrName: And I'm going to do it by adding a red hue to it, turning it into a gradient.
engSearchText:
And I'm going to do it by adding a red hue to it,
turning it into a gradient.
jpnChrName: そんなひと時を、青色と赤色のグラデーションで 表現したいの。
jpnSearchText:
そんなひと時を、青色と赤色のグラデーションで
表現したいの。

engChrName: Wow...it sounds so mature. Makes me wish I was older so I could try it.
engSearchText:
Wow...it sounds so mature. Makes me wish I was
older so I could try it.
jpnChrName: 大人な感じですねっ。 飲めないのが残念です……
jpnSearchText:
大人な感じですねっ。
飲めないのが残念です……

engChrName: It does sound fascinating! And like something only you could make, Bermotti.
engSearchText:
It does sound fascinating! And like something only
you could make, Bermotti.
jpnChrName: すごくベルモッティさんらしい アレンジだと思います！
jpnSearchText:
すごくベルモッティさんらしい
アレンジだと思います！

engChrName: Oh, you two. Sweet as grenadine!
engSearchText: Oh, you two. Sweet as grenadine!
jpnChrName: ふふっ、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: ふふっ、ありがとう。

engChrName: On that note, for the redness, I plan to use the juice of a red cactus. They're hard to find, but the color is perfect for my needs.
engSearchText:
On that note, for the redness, I plan to use the juice
of a red cactus. They're hard to find, but the color is
perfect for my needs.
jpnChrName: 赤色の表現は、発色が良いとされる 珍しい“赤いサボテン”の果汁を使って──
jpnSearchText:
赤色の表現は、発色が良いとされる
珍しい“赤いサボテン”の果汁を使って──

engChrName: With that, I'm going to accent it with some black pomegranate on top.
engSearchText:
With that, I'm going to accent it with some black
pomegranate on top.
jpnChrName: アクセントに“黒ザクロの実”を浮かべたいの。
jpnSearchText: アクセントに“黒ザクロの実”を浮かべたいの。

engChrName: And it's those two things you need us to fetch, right?
engSearchText: And it's those two things you need us to fetch, right?
jpnChrName: 要は、その２つが手に入らないってことか。
jpnSearchText: 要は、その２つが手に入らないってことか。

engChrName: Just so! Strictly speaking, it's by no means unheard of to find these things for sale in town.
engSearchText:
Just so! Strictly speaking, it's by no means unheard of
to find these things for sale in town.
jpnChrName: そうなのよ……どちらも一応、 街で流通してる物なんだけどね。
jpnSearchText:
そうなのよ……どちらも一応、
街で流通してる物なんだけどね。

engChrName: But like I said, red cactus itself isn't easy to get your hands on in the wild, so finding it at market can be dicey.
engSearchText:
But like I said, red cactus itself isn't easy to get your
hands on in the wild, so finding it at market can
be dicey.
jpnChrName: 赤いサボテンは希少価値が高いから なかなかお目にかかれないし。
jpnSearchText:
赤いサボテンは希少価値が高いから
なかなかお目にかかれないし。

engChrName: And as for those pomegranates, I specifically want ones from a luxurious kind grown in Valis known as 'nocturnal suns.'
engSearchText:
And as for those pomegranates, I specifically want
ones from a luxurious kind grown in Valis known as
'nocturnal suns.'
jpnChrName: ザクロの実の方は、ヴァリス産の高級品種である 《夜の太陽》っていうのを探してるの。
jpnSearchText:
ザクロの実の方は、ヴァリス産の高級品種である
《夜の太陽》っていうのを探してるの。

engChrName: I have heard of those. They get their name for their shining black luster that makes them stand out even in the dark of night, supposedly.
engSearchText:
I have heard of those. They get their name for their
shining black luster that makes them stand out even
in the dark of night, supposedly.
jpnChrName: 『夜闇の中でも輝く鮮やかな黒色』── という色合いから、その名がついたそうですね。
jpnSearchText:
『夜闇の中でも輝く鮮やかな黒色』──
という色合いから、その名がついたそうですね。

engChrName: They certainly do! I'd have been more shocked if you, of all people, hadn't heard of it.
engSearchText:
They certainly do! I'd have been more shocked if you,
of all people, hadn't heard of it.
jpnChrName: さすが物知りね、その通りよ。
jpnSearchText: さすが物知りね、その通りよ。

engChrName: Those fruits also only show up once in a blue moon, and if they're going to be anywhere, it'll be the bazaar in the Cultural District.
engSearchText:
Those fruits also only show up once in a blue moon,
and if they're going to be anywhere, it'll be the bazaar
in the Cultural District.
jpnChrName: それもなかなか市場に出回らなくて、 伝統地区のバザールならもしかしたら……
jpnSearchText:
それもなかなか市場に出回らなくて、
伝統地区のバザールならもしかしたら……

engChrName: Unfortunately, my pickiness has come back to bite me, and I'm nearly out of time.
engSearchText:
Unfortunately, my pickiness has come back to bite
me, and I'm nearly out of time.
jpnChrName: そうやってこだわってたら タイムリミットが近づいちゃったわけ。
jpnSearchText:
そうやってこだわってたら
タイムリミットが近づいちゃったわけ。

engChrName: You would think I'd know better, but alas, here I am. I've dug my own grave and now here lies Bermotti! Rest in peace...
engSearchText:
You would think I'd know better, but alas, here I am.
I've dug my own grave and now here lies Bermotti!
Rest in peace...
jpnChrName: 我ながら本末転倒よね……
jpnSearchText: 我ながら本末転倒よね……

engChrName: Hey, nothing wrong with wanting to put your best foot forward to win.
engSearchText:
Hey, nothing wrong with wanting to put your best
foot forward to win.
jpnChrName: ま、最高の手札で勝負したい気持ちは分かるぜ。
jpnSearchText: ま、最高の手札で勝負したい気持ちは分かるぜ。

engChrName: Can't see this crazy attention to detail not paying off when the time comes.
engSearchText:
Can't see this crazy attention to detail not paying off
when the time comes.
jpnChrName: そーいうこだわりに、結果はついてくるモンだろ。
jpnSearchText: そーいうこだわりに、結果はついてくるモンだろ。

engChrName: Even so, that does not change the fact that we have little time to spare if we are to track down these ingredients.
engSearchText:
Even so, that does not change the fact that we have
little time to spare if we are to track down
these ingredients.
jpnChrName: ですが、材料集めにあまり猶予はありませんね。
jpnSearchText: ですが、材料集めにあまり猶予はありませんね。

engChrName: Yeah, 'specially since we're runnin' on a tight schedule. Gotta make a decision.
engSearchText:
Yeah, 'specially since we're runnin' on a
tight schedule. Gotta make a decision.
jpnChrName: ああ、俺たちも今しか動けねぇしな。
jpnSearchText: ああ、俺たちも今しか動けねぇしな。

engChrName: I know just what kind of cocktail I want to whip up for my tournament tonight, but I'm up a creek without those ingredients.
engSearchText:
I know just what kind of cocktail I want to whip up
for my tournament tonight, but I'm up a creek
without those ingredients.
jpnChrName: カクテルのアイデアは決まったけど 肝心の材料が手に入らないのよ……
jpnSearchText:
カクテルのアイデアは決まったけど
肝心の材料が手に入らないのよ……

engChrName: Would you and your group have time to hunt them down for me, Van?
engSearchText:
Would you and your group have time to hunt them
down for me, Van?
jpnChrName: できたらヴァンちゃんたちの力を 借りられないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
できたらヴァンちゃんたちの力を
借りられないかしら？

engChrName: I really wanna help you, I promise, but we got some other errands to run first.
engSearchText:
I really wanna help you, I promise, but we got some
other errands to run first.
jpnChrName: 引き受けたいのは山々だが、 細かい野暮用が残っててな。
jpnSearchText:
引き受けたいのは山々だが、
細かい野暮用が残っててな。

engChrName: You mind if we come talk to you again once we've got that sorted?
engSearchText:
You mind if we come talk to you again once we've got
that sorted?
jpnChrName: そこら辺が落ち着いたら 改めてまた来るってことでもいいか？
jpnSearchText:
そこら辺が落ち着いたら
改めてまた来るってことでもいいか？

engChrName: Sure, I understand. Do what you have to do.
engSearchText: Sure, I understand. Do what you have to do.
jpnChrName: ええ、それで大丈夫よ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、それで大丈夫よ。

engChrName: In the meantime, I'll keep thinking about whether there's anything else I can do, in case I need to change plans.
engSearchText:
In the meantime, I'll keep thinking about whether
there's anything else I can do, in case I need to
change plans.
jpnChrName: 自分でどうにか出来ないか、 アタシももう１回考えてみるわ。
jpnSearchText:
自分でどうにか出来ないか、
アタシももう１回考えてみるわ。

engChrName: All right—we're in. You did a hell of a job analyzing that drug earlier. Least we can do is help with this.
engSearchText:
All right—we're in. You did a hell of a job analyzing
that drug earlier. Least we can do is help with this.
jpnChrName: ま、礼も兼ねて手を貸すぜ。 違法薬物の検査じゃお手柄だったしな。
jpnSearchText:
ま、礼も兼ねて手を貸すぜ。
違法薬物の検査じゃお手柄だったしな。

engChrName: Oh, hush. That wasn't such a big deal.
engSearchText: Oh, hush. That wasn't such a big deal.
jpnChrName: んもう、それは気にしなくていいのに。
jpnSearchText: んもう、それは気にしなくていいのに。

engChrName: But thanks, hon. I really appreciate it.
engSearchText: But thanks, hon. I really appreciate it.
jpnChrName: でもありがと、助かるわ。
jpnSearchText: でもありがと、助かるわ。

engChrName: Let's not get ahead of ourselves here. Right now we got squat. Where are we supposed to start lookin' for these things, anyway?
engSearchText:
Let's not get ahead of ourselves here. Right now we
got squat. Where are we supposed to start lookin' for
these things, anyway?
jpnChrName: とはいえ、手に入ればいいけどな。 ２つとも珍しいモンなんだろ？
jpnSearchText:
とはいえ、手に入ればいいけどな。
２つとも珍しいモンなんだろ？

engChrName: Luckily for you, a merchant in town offered me some clues.
engSearchText:
Luckily for you, a merchant in town offered me
some clues.
jpnChrName: それなんだけど…… 市場の商人さんから聞いた話があって。
jpnSearchText:
それなんだけど……
市場の商人さんから聞いた話があって。

engChrName: For one thing, apparently red cactus only grows in a particular part of the Sandsea.
engSearchText:
For one thing, apparently red cactus only grows in a
particular part of the Sandsea.
jpnChrName: 赤いサボテンはどうやら、 《陽炎砂丘》のある一帯にだけ咲くらしいの。
jpnSearchText:
赤いサボテンはどうやら、
《陽炎砂丘》のある一帯にだけ咲くらしいの。

engChrName: A nasty part where the sandstorm tends to be brutal, no less, making it hard for anyone to step foot in it.
engSearchText:
A nasty part where the sandstorm tends to be brutal,
no less, making it hard for anyone to step foot in it.
jpnChrName: 砂嵐がひどくて、人が立ち入りづらい場所に。
jpnSearchText: 砂嵐がひどくて、人が立ち入りづらい場所に。

engChrName: The way he made it sound, it's always a challenge, at best, to harvest.
engSearchText:
The way he made it sound, it's always a challenge, at
best, to harvest.
jpnChrName: 『だから、なかなか採取に行けないんだ』 なんて言ってたわ。
jpnSearchText:
『だから、なかなか採取に行けないんだ』
なんて言ってたわ。

engChrName: If that is the case, it would be nice if we could somehow obtain that juice without having to venture out into the desert.
engSearchText:
If that is the case, it would be nice if we could
somehow obtain that juice without having to venture
out into the desert.
jpnChrName: そのような場所まで行かずに済むのに 越したことはありませんが……
jpnSearchText:
そのような場所まで行かずに済むのに
越したことはありませんが……

engChrName: I think it would still be worth the trip, to be honest.
engSearchText: I think it would still be worth the trip, to be honest.
jpnChrName: 行く価値はあると思います。
jpnSearchText: 行く価値はあると思います。

engChrName: It's risky, but it also seems like our best shot at success.
engSearchText:
It's risky, but it also seems like our best shot
at success.
jpnChrName: リスクはありますが、入手できる確率は高そうですし。
jpnSearchText: リスクはありますが、入手できる確率は高そうですし。

engChrName: Yeah, and we were out there yesterday. We know our way around. It'll be fine!
engSearchText:
Yeah, and we were out there yesterday. We know our
way around. It'll be fine!
jpnChrName: 砂丘は昨日も行きましたから、問題ありません！
jpnSearchText: 砂丘は昨日も行きましたから、問題ありません！

engChrName: Very well, then. The desert it is.
engSearchText: Very well, then. The desert it is.
jpnChrName: ふふ、決まりましたね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、決まりましたね。

engChrName: So, to sum up, we'll find the red cactus in the desert and the pomegranates lurkin' in the bazaar, if Lady Luck's on our side.
engSearchText:
So, to sum up, we'll find the red cactus in the desert
and the pomegranates lurkin' in the bazaar, if Lady
Luck's on our side.
jpnChrName: サボテンは砂丘で、ザクロはバザールだな。
jpnSearchText: サボテンは砂丘で、ザクロはバザールだな。

engChrName: We can start with either one, whichever's easiest to get to as we make our rounds across town.
engSearchText:
We can start with either one, whichever's easiest to
get to as we make our rounds across town.
jpnChrName: どっちが先でもいい。 回りやすい方から回収するぞ。
jpnSearchText:
どっちが先でもいい。
回りやすい方から回収するぞ。

engChrName: Thanks again, darlings. Don't feel like you have to go berserk just for little old me, though. If it's too much, I'll live.
engSearchText:
Thanks again, darlings. Don't feel like you have to go
berserk just for little old me, though. If it's too much,
I'll live.
jpnChrName: こちらから頼んだことだけど、 くれぐれも無理はしないでちょうだいね。
jpnSearchText:
こちらから頼んだことだけど、
くれぐれも無理はしないでちょうだいね。

engChrName: Quest Cocktail Crafting started!
engSearchText: Quest Cocktail Crafting started!
jpnChrName: クエスト【スペシャルカクテルの作成】を開始した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>スペシャルカクテルの作成<C1>】を開始した！

engChrName: Yeah, that's right, I'm the one who bought the nocturnal suns off Monir.
engSearchText:
Yeah, that's right, I'm the one who bought the
nocturnal suns off Monir.
jpnChrName: ──ええ、たしかにモニールさんのとこで 《夜の太陽》を買ったわ。
jpnSearchText:
──ええ、たしかにモニールさんのとこで
《夜の太陽》を買ったわ。

engChrName: I'm planning to make a limited time flavor for my ice cream and make a killing selling it to rich people with equally rich appetites.
engSearchText:
I'm planning to make a limited time flavor for my ice
cream and make a killing selling it to rich people with
equally rich appetites.
jpnChrName: 数量限定のフレーバーを作って 富裕層相手にがっぽり儲けようと思ってね。
jpnSearchText:
数量限定のフレーバーを作って
富裕層相手にがっぽり儲けようと思ってね。

engChrName: Sounds like you're a born merchant. I can respect the hustle.
engSearchText:
Sounds like you're a born merchant. I can respect
the hustle.
jpnChrName: 気持ち良いくらいに商魂たくましいな。
jpnSearchText: 気持ち良いくらいに商魂たくましいな。

engChrName: Events like the film festival are when I make the real money. I'd be stupid not to have something lined up for the occasion.
engSearchText:
Events like the film festival are when I make the
real money. I'd be stupid not to have something lined
up for the occasion.
jpnChrName: そりゃあ映画祭みたいなイベントは稼ぎ時だし。
jpnSearchText: そりゃあ映画祭みたいなイベントは稼ぎ時だし。

engChrName: Anyway, what brings you guys here? You on the pomegranate hunt, too?
engSearchText:
Anyway, what brings you guys here? You on the
pomegranate hunt, too?
jpnChrName: それで？　あなたたちも黒ザクロが欲しいの？
jpnSearchText: それで？　あなたたちも黒ザクロが欲しいの？

engChrName: Van explained what was going on with the bartending tournament and why they needed the fruit.
engSearchText:
Van explained what was going on with the bartending
tournament and why they needed the fruit.
jpnChrName: ヴァンはバーテンダー大会の経緯を説明した。
jpnSearchText: <C1>ヴァンはバーテンダー大会の経緯を説明した。

engChrName: ...Sure. That makes sense.
engSearchText: ...Sure. That makes sense.
jpnChrName: ……事情は分かったわ。
jpnSearchText: ……事情は分かったわ。

engChrName: But I've got to make a living, too, you know. I can't go around giving away ingredients like these for free.
engSearchText:
But I've got to make a living, too, you know. I can't
go around giving away ingredients like these for free.
jpnChrName: だけど、こっちも商売だからねぇ。 大事な食材を手放すわけには。
jpnSearchText:
だけど、こっちも商売だからねぇ。
大事な食材を手放すわけには。

engChrName: But if you were to sweeten the deal and make it worth my while, I'd be willing to consider giving you some.
engSearchText:
But if you were to sweeten the deal and make it worth
my while, I'd be willing to consider giving you some.
jpnChrName: 私をその気にさせる何かがあれば 考えなくもないけど。
jpnSearchText:
私をその気にさせる何かがあれば
考えなくもないけど。

engChrName: What sweetening of the deal did you have in mind?
engSearchText: What sweetening of the deal did you have in mind?
jpnChrName: その気にさせる何か……
jpnSearchText: その気にさせる何か……

engChrName: Don't worry. We're not tryin' to be freeloaders.
engSearchText: Don't worry. We're not tryin' to be freeloaders.
jpnChrName: もちろん、タダとは言わねぇ。
jpnSearchText: もちろん、タダとは言わねぇ。

engChrName: Tell you what: what if you go ahead and make some of this new flavor of yours, and we'll give you an honest review of it?
engSearchText:
Tell you what: what if you go ahead and make some
of this new flavor of yours, and we'll give you an
honest review of it?
jpnChrName: 引き替えに俺たちが、その限定フレーバーの レビューをするってのはどうだ？
jpnSearchText:
引き替えに俺たちが、その限定フレーバーの
レビューをするってのはどうだ？

engChrName: A taste test, huh? Hmm...
engSearchText: A taste test, huh? Hmm...
jpnChrName: レビュー、ねぇ。
jpnSearchText: レビュー、ねぇ。

engChrName: I assure you, the insight we can offer would be quite valuable to you.
engSearchText:
I assure you, the insight we can offer would be quite
valuable to you.
jpnChrName: フィリカ様にとって 有益な情報となること間違いなしかと。
jpnSearchText:
フィリカ様にとって
有益な情報となること間違いなしかと。

engChrName: Mr. Arkride especially has a very refined palate for sweets. In fact, he is something of a celebrity for it in such circles.
engSearchText:
Mr. Arkride especially has a very refined palate
for sweets. In fact, he is something of a celebrity for it
in such circles.
jpnChrName: 特にこちらのヴァン様は甘味へのこだわりが強く、 その界隈では有名な方ですから。
jpnSearchText:
特にこちらのヴァン様は甘味へのこだわりが強く、
その界隈では有名な方ですから。

engChrName: W-Wow. I didn't know he was that famous for it.
engSearchText: W-Wow. I didn't know he was that famous for it.
jpnChrName: そ、そんなに有名だったんですねっ。
jpnSearchText: そ、そんなに有名だったんですねっ。

engChrName: (He's not! It's called upselling! Now zip it!)
engSearchText: (He's not! It's called upselling! Now zip it!)
jpnChrName: （盛ってんに決まってんだろ。）
jpnSearchText: （盛ってんに決まってんだろ。）

engChrName: ...All right. Deal, then.
engSearchText: ...All right. Deal, then.
jpnChrName: ……乗ったわ。
jpnSearchText: ……乗ったわ。

engChrName: I was thinking I needed some opinions, anyway. I can tell this ice cream is still missing a certain something, but I'm not sure what.
engSearchText:
I was thinking I needed some opinions, anyway. I can
tell this ice cream is still missing a certain something,
but I'm not sure what.
jpnChrName: 今のままじゃ決め手に欠けてたから、 誰かの意見を聞きたかったし。
jpnSearchText:
今のままじゃ決め手に欠けてたから、
誰かの意見を聞きたかったし。

engChrName: But I'll only offer the pomegranates if your reviews really impress me. How about three of you step up and tell me what you think?
engSearchText:
But I'll only offer the pomegranates if your reviews
really impress me. How about three of you step up
and tell me what you think?
jpnChrName: ただし、ザクロを譲るかは内容次第。 ５人の中から代表して３人でやるのはどう？
jpnSearchText:
ただし、ザクロを譲るかは内容次第。
５人の中から代表して３人でやるのはどう？

engChrName: Sounds good to me. Let's do this.
engSearchText: Sounds good to me. Let's do this.
jpnChrName: 良いぜ、決まりだな。
jpnSearchText: 良いぜ、決まりだな。

engChrName: Van's gotta be one of the reviewers, obviously.
engSearchText: Van's gotta be one of the reviewers, obviously.
jpnChrName: １人はヴァンさんで決定ですね。
jpnSearchText: １人はヴァンさんで決定ですね。

engChrName: You only offered to tell her what you think because you want to taste that ice cream for yourself, don'tcha? Be honest.
engSearchText:
You only offered to tell her what you think because
you want to taste that ice cream for
yourself, don'tcha? Be honest.
jpnChrName: 甘いモンを食べたかっただけだろ？ レビューを提案したのは。
jpnSearchText:
甘いモンを食べたかっただけだろ？
レビューを提案したのは。

engChrName: Shut up! No, I don't, punk.
engSearchText: Shut up! No, I don't, punk.
jpnChrName: 違いますぅ。
jpnSearchText: 違いますぅ。

engChrName: Whatever you say, chief. How about we have the kids be the other two reviewers?
engSearchText:
Whatever you say, chief. How about we have the kids
be the other two reviewers?
jpnChrName: ククッ……んじゃ、残りの２枠は お子ちゃまたちでいんじゃね？
jpnSearchText:
ククッ……んじゃ、残りの２枠は
お子ちゃまたちでいんじゃね？

engChrName: Really? Are you sure?
engSearchText: Really? Are you sure?
jpnChrName: いいんですか？
jpnSearchText: いいんですか？

engChrName: That sounds like a really big responsibility. I don't know if I can give a useful review off the cuff like that...
engSearchText:
That sounds like a really big responsibility. I don't
know if I can give a useful review off the cuff
like that...
jpnChrName: せ、責任重大ですね。 まともな食リポできるかな……
jpnSearchText:
せ、責任重大ですね。
まともな食リポできるかな……

engChrName: That is not a problem—you don't need to take it that seriously. Simply giving her an honest opinion will be helpful, I'm sure.
engSearchText:
That is not a problem—you don't need to take it
that seriously. Simply giving her an honest opinion
will be helpful, I'm sure.
jpnChrName: 気負わず、ありのままの感想を仰られれば良いかと。
jpnSearchText: 気負わず、ありのままの感想を仰られれば良いかと。

engChrName: If you're ready, I'll have that ice cream right up for you folks. Give me just a few minutes.
engSearchText:
If you're ready, I'll have that ice cream right up for
you folks. Give me just a few minutes.
jpnChrName: じゃあ試食を用意するわ。 ちょっと待ってね。
jpnSearchText:
じゃあ試食を用意するわ。
ちょっと待ってね。

engChrName: Several minutes later...
engSearchText: Several minutes later...
jpnChrName: 待つこと数分──
jpnSearchText: <C1>待つこと数分──

engChrName: Van, Agnès, and Feri received their ice cream and gave it a taste test.
engSearchText:
Van, Agnès, and Feri received their ice cream and
gave it a taste test.
jpnChrName: ヴァン、アニエス、フェリの３名は 黒ザクロのアイスを試食した。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァン、アニエス、フェリの３名は
黒ザクロのアイスを試食した。

engChrName: Mmm! It's so sweet, yet kinda sour! I love it!
engSearchText: Mmm! It's so sweet, yet kinda sour! I love it!
jpnChrName: んんっ、甘酸っぱくておいしいです！
jpnSearchText: んんっ、甘酸っぱくておいしいです！

engChrName: It has a really good balance between sweetness and sourness.
engSearchText:
It has a really good balance between sweetness
and sourness.
jpnChrName: 甘みと酸味のバランスが良いですね。
jpnSearchText: 甘みと酸味のバランスが良いですね。

engChrName: I could see this being a really great flavor to have during the summer. Other than that, uh...
engSearchText:
I could see this being a really great flavor to have
during the summer. Other than that, uh...
jpnChrName: 夏に食べたらもっと楽しめそうな……その……
jpnSearchText: 夏に食べたらもっと楽しめそうな……その……

engChrName: Err... Well...
engSearchText: Err... Well...
jpnChrName: えっと……
jpnSearchText: えっと……

engChrName: The girls basically got it in one.
engSearchText: The girls basically got it in one.
jpnChrName: ２人の感想には同感だ。
jpnSearchText: ２人の感想には同感だ。

engChrName: This has an incredibly refreshing taste that goes perfectly with Tharbad's hot climate. I could have it over and over again, easy.
engSearchText:
This has an incredibly refreshing taste that goes
perfectly with Tharbad's hot climate. I could have it
over and over again, easy.
jpnChrName: サルバッドの暑い気候に合う爽やかな口当たりは リピートしたくなる。
jpnSearchText:
サルバッドの暑い気候に合う爽やかな口当たりは
リピートしたくなる。

engChrName: Heehee, yeah? That's great. That's exactly what I was gunning for when coming up with the recipe.
engSearchText:
Heehee, yeah? That's great. That's exactly what I was
gunning for when coming up with the recipe.
jpnChrName: ふふん、でしょ？ それも狙ったフレーバーだからね。
jpnSearchText:
ふふん、でしょ？
それも狙ったフレーバーだからね。

engChrName: Here's a question for you: are you usin' pure fruit juice for this ice cream?
engSearchText:
Here's a question for you: are you usin' pure fruit juice
for this ice cream?
jpnChrName: これ、使ってるのは果汁だけか？
jpnSearchText: これ、使ってるのは果汁だけか？

engChrName: Yeah, that's right. Why do you ask?
engSearchText: Yeah, that's right. Why do you ask?
jpnChrName: ええ、そうよ。
jpnSearchText: ええ、そうよ。

engChrName: So, I think you got the sweetness right, but it could be takin' better advantage of the sharp sourness from the pomegranate.
engSearchText:
So, I think you got the sweetness right, but it could be
takin' better advantage of the sharp sourness from
the pomegranate.
jpnChrName: なるほど……甘さは申し分ないが、 黒ザクロのキレのある酸味を活かしきれてないな。
jpnSearchText:
なるほど……甘さは申し分ないが、
黒ザクロのキレのある酸味を活かしきれてないな。

engChrName: Have you thought about addin' some pulp to your mix? It'd probably help change up the texture, too.
engSearchText:
Have you thought about addin' some pulp to
your mix? It'd probably help change up the
texture, too.
jpnChrName: 果肉を加えるのはどうだ？ 食感のアクセントも効いてくるだろ。
jpnSearchText:
果肉を加えるのはどうだ？
食感のアクセントも効いてくるだろ。

engChrName: I did try that, and you're not wrong, it did add a nice accent.
engSearchText:
I did try that, and you're not wrong, it did add a
nice accent.
jpnChrName: それなら試してみたわ。 たしかにアクセントは良い。
jpnSearchText:
それなら試してみたわ。
たしかにアクセントは良い。

engChrName: The problem is, even when I do that, it's still not punchy enough.
engSearchText:
The problem is, even when I do that, it's still not
punchy enough.
jpnChrName: けど、酸味のパンチがまだ物足りなくてね……
jpnSearchText: けど、酸味のパンチがまだ物足りなくてね……

engChrName: What about the seeds, then?
engSearchText: What about the seeds, then?
jpnChrName: じゃあ“種”はどうだ？
jpnSearchText: じゃあ“種”はどうだ？

engChrName: I've never heard of mixing seeds into ice cream. Won't they be too hard AND make it taste tart?
engSearchText:
I've never heard of mixing seeds into ice cream.
Won't they be too hard AND make it taste tart?
jpnChrName: アイスに種を混ぜるなんて聞いたことないわ。 固いし渋みが出ちゃうんじゃない？
jpnSearchText:
アイスに種を混ぜるなんて聞いたことないわ。
固いし渋みが出ちゃうんじゃない？

engChrName: Nah, think about it. The thing about black pomegranates is, they like hot, dry weather.
engSearchText:
Nah, think about it. The thing about black
pomegranates is, they like hot, dry weather.
jpnChrName: 黒ザクロは高温と乾燥を好んで育つ。
jpnSearchText: 黒ザクロは高温と乾燥を好んで育つ。

engChrName: The fruit itself is big, while the skin is shallow and the seeds are small and soft.
engSearchText:
The fruit itself is big, while the skin is shallow and
the seeds are small and soft.
jpnChrName: 果実は大きく、皮は薄く、種は小さく柔らかくなる。
jpnSearchText: 果実は大きく、皮は薄く、種は小さく柔らかくなる。

engChrName: Somethin' like a nocturnal sun, you can eat the seeds whole, no problem.
engSearchText:
Somethin' like a nocturnal sun, you can eat the seeds
whole, no problem.
jpnChrName: 《夜の太陽》クラスなら 種まで丸ごと食べられるはずだろう。
jpnSearchText:
《夜の太陽》クラスなら
種まで丸ごと食べられるはずだろう。

engChrName: They're actually not tart at all. Quite the opposite— they smell nice and nutty.
engSearchText:
They're actually not tart at all. Quite the opposite—
they smell nice and nutty.
jpnChrName: お前さんが心配していた渋みは無く、 ナッツのような香ばしさを味わわせてくれる。
jpnSearchText:
お前さんが心配していた渋みは無く、
ナッツのような香ばしさを味わわせてくれる。

engChrName: You get that in there, I think you'll achieve an accent that offers the full pomegranate experience.
engSearchText:
You get that in there, I think you'll achieve an accent
that offers the full pomegranate experience.
jpnChrName: それこそザクロの甘味と酸味を活かす アクセントになり得る。
jpnSearchText:
それこそザクロの甘味と酸味を活かす
アクセントになり得る。

engChrName: Interesting. I hadn't given it so much consideration...
engSearchText: Interesting. I hadn't given it so much consideration...
jpnChrName: ……なるほど。
jpnSearchText: ……なるほど。

engChrName: All right, you win.
engSearchText: All right, you win.
jpnChrName: ふふ、参ったわね。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、参ったわね。

engChrName: Thanks for such detailed advice. Would three pomegranates be enough for you?
engSearchText:
Thanks for such detailed advice. Would three
pomegranates be enough for you?
jpnChrName: アドバイスありがとう。 黒ザクロは３個で足りるかしら？
jpnSearchText:
アドバイスありがとう。
黒ザクロは３個で足りるかしら？

engChrName: More than enough! Are you sure you don't mind?
engSearchText: More than enough! Are you sure you don't mind?
jpnChrName: い、頂けるんですか？
jpnSearchText: い、頂けるんですか？

engChrName: Nah, a promise is a promise. How could I deny you guys anything after getting schooled so thoroughly?
engSearchText:
Nah, a promise is a promise. How could I deny you
guys anything after getting schooled so thoroughly?
jpnChrName: 約束だもの。 良いアドバイスをもらえたからね。
jpnSearchText:
約束だもの。
良いアドバイスをもらえたからね。

engChrName: Yes! We did it, Agnès!
engSearchText: Yes! We did it, Agnès!
jpnChrName: わあっ！ やりましたね、アニエスさん！
jpnSearchText:
わあっ！
やりましたね、アニエスさん！

engChrName: Ahaha... I think Van gets most of the credit for this one, Feri.
engSearchText:
Ahaha... I think Van gets most of the credit for this
one, Feri.
jpnChrName: ほとんどヴァンさん頼りでしたけど……
jpnSearchText: ほとんどヴァンさん頼りでしたけど……

engChrName: No, no, those from-the-hip reactions helped a lot, too, girls. I'm glad you enjoyed the ice cream. That's what counts!
engSearchText:
No, no, those from-the-hip reactions helped a lot,
too, girls. I'm glad you enjoyed the ice cream.
That's what counts!
jpnChrName: ２人の素直な感想も嬉しかったわ。 おいしく食べてくれたなら何よりよ。
jpnSearchText:
２人の素直な感想も嬉しかったわ。
おいしく食べてくれたなら何よりよ。

engChrName: Now I can make the perfect ice cream that'll really bring in those high-flying customers.
engSearchText:
Now I can make the perfect ice cream that'll really
bring in those high-flying customers.
jpnChrName: おかげでもっと素敵なアイスを作れそう。
jpnSearchText: おかげでもっと素敵なアイスを作れそう。

engChrName: I wish you luck with your new ice cream. I am sure it will be a great success.
engSearchText:
I wish you luck with your new ice cream. I am sure it
will be a great success.
jpnChrName: 新商品の開発、陰ながら応援しております。
jpnSearchText: 新商品の開発、陰ながら応援しております。

engChrName: Aww, thank you.
engSearchText: Aww, thank you.
jpnChrName: ふふ、ありがとう。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、ありがとう。

engChrName: Tell your bartender friend I hope those pomegranates help him make something special, too. I'll be rooting for him!
engSearchText:
Tell your bartender friend I hope those pomegranates
help him make something special, too. I'll be rooting
for him!
jpnChrName: そちらも、素敵なカクテルを作れるよう応援してるわ。 バーテンダーさんによろしく。
jpnSearchText:
そちらも、素敵なカクテルを作れるよう応援してるわ。
バーテンダーさんによろしく。

engChrName: Will do. You're doing him a real solid. We appreciate it, and we'll get out of the way now.
engSearchText:
Will do. You're doing him a real solid. We appreciate
it, and we'll get out of the way now.
jpnChrName: ああ、助かったぜ。 邪魔して悪かったな。
jpnSearchText:
ああ、助かったぜ。
邪魔して悪かったな。

engChrName: Obtained the three black pomegranates.
engSearchText: Obtained the three black pomegranates.
jpnChrName: 『黒ザクロの実』を３個手に入れた。
jpnSearchText: <C1>『黒ザクロの実』を３個手に入れた。

engChrName: Wonderful, we've got both of the ingredients. We should be good to go, right?
engSearchText:
Wonderful, we've got both of the ingredients.
We should be good to go, right?
jpnChrName: これで２つの材料が揃いましたね。
jpnSearchText: これで２つの材料が揃いましたね。

engChrName: Yep. Let's drop these off with Bermotti so he can do his thing.
engSearchText:
Yep. Let's drop these off with Bermotti so he can do
his thing.
jpnChrName: ああ、すぐにベルモッティへ届けてやろう。
jpnSearchText: ああ、すぐにベルモッティへ届けてやろう。

engChrName: Now all that's left to find is that red cactus, right?
engSearchText: Now all that's left to find is that red cactus, right?
jpnChrName: あとは、赤いサボテンですね。
jpnSearchText: あとは、赤いサボテンですね。

engChrName: Yep. Next stop, the Sandsea.
engSearchText: Yep. Next stop, the Sandsea.
jpnChrName: ああ、《陽炎砂丘》へ向かうぞ。
jpnSearchText: ああ、《陽炎砂丘》へ向かうぞ。

engChrName: You're back! How did you sweethearts do?
engSearchText: You're back! How did you sweethearts do?
jpnChrName: あら、お帰りなさい！
jpnSearchText: あら、お帰りなさい！

engChrName: We did great. Everything you want is right here. You'd better be grateful, man.
engSearchText:
We did great. Everything you want is right here.
You'd better be grateful, man.
jpnChrName: お望みのモンを持ってきてやったぜ。
jpnSearchText: お望みのモンを持ってきてやったぜ。

engChrName: Arusha's wings, you don't have to be such a jerk about it, Aaron!
engSearchText:
Arusha's wings, you don't have to be such a jerk about
it, Aaron!
jpnChrName: どうしてアーロンさんが偉そうなんですか。
jpnSearchText: どうしてアーロンさんが偉そうなんですか。

engChrName: Look, I just want a little appreciation for having to haul this shit all the way back, okay?
engSearchText:
Look, I just want a little appreciation for having to
haul this shit all the way back, okay?
jpnChrName: 帰りはオレが荷物持ちだったからな。
jpnSearchText: 帰りはオレが荷物持ちだったからな。

engChrName: Yeah, yeah, thanks for being our pack mule, sport. Now give the man his ingredients.
engSearchText:
Yeah, yeah, thanks for being our pack mule, sport.
Now give the man his ingredients.
jpnChrName: いいから、依頼品を渡してやんな。
jpnSearchText: いいから、依頼品を渡してやんな。

engChrName: Aaron handed over the red cactus and black pomegranates to Bermotti.
engSearchText:
Aaron handed over the red cactus and black
pomegranates to Bermotti.
jpnChrName: ベルモッティに『赤いサボテン』と 『黒ザクロの実』を渡した。
jpnSearchText:
ベルモッティに『赤いサボテン』と
『黒ザクロの実』を渡した。

engChrName: Wow! You darlings really did get them for me!
engSearchText: Wow! You darlings really did get them for me!
jpnChrName: まあ、どっちも手に入ったのね！
jpnSearchText: まあ、どっちも手に入ったのね！

engChrName: Please feel free to inspect everything to make sure it is all in order.
engSearchText:
Please feel free to inspect everything to make sure it is
all in order.
jpnChrName: 念のため、現物の確認をお願いします。
jpnSearchText: 念のため、現物の確認をお願いします。

engChrName: Oh, it's fine. You all did great! These are perfect! I couldn't be happier!
engSearchText:
Oh, it's fine. You all did great! These are perfect!
I couldn't be happier!
jpnChrName: うんうん、文句なしの上物よ！
jpnSearchText: うんうん、文句なしの上物よ！

engChrName: Thank you all so much. You must be exhausted after that running around. Look, you're still half-buried in sand!
engSearchText:
Thank you all so much. You must be exhausted after
that running around. Look, you're still half-buried
in sand!
jpnChrName: みんな砂だらけになって……本当にお疲れ様。 本当にありがとう。
jpnSearchText:
みんな砂だらけになって……本当にお疲れ様。
本当にありがとう。

engChrName: Heehee, that's okay. We're just glad to hear we did well.
engSearchText:
Heehee, that's okay. We're just glad to hear we
did well.
jpnChrName: ふふ、それを聞けて安心しました。
jpnSearchText: ふふ、それを聞けて安心しました。

engChrName: That you have! Now that you've done your part, it's my turn to deliver some results so all the blood, sweat, and tears weren't in vain.
engSearchText:
That you have! Now that you've done your part, it's
my turn to deliver some results so all the blood, sweat,
and tears weren't in vain.
jpnChrName: こうなったら絶対に結果を残さないとね。
jpnSearchText: こうなったら絶対に結果を残さないとね。

engChrName: And I'll start with a little test run and mix the drink I plan to enter, right here. Would you be kind enough to taste it for me?
engSearchText:
And I'll start with a little test run and mix the drink I
plan to enter, right here. Would you be kind enough
to taste it for me?
jpnChrName: ……そうだ、今から試作してみるから 味見をお願いできないかしら？
jpnSearchText:
……そうだ、今から試作してみるから
味見をお願いできないかしら？

engChrName: Hell yeah! I'll taste as many free drinks as you wanna throw at me.
engSearchText:
Hell yeah! I'll taste as many free drinks as you wanna
throw at me.
jpnChrName: よっしゃあ、任せとけっての。
jpnSearchText: よっしゃあ、任せとけっての。

engChrName: Sucks to be you, small fry.
engSearchText: Sucks to be you, small fry.
jpnChrName: 残念だったなチビ。
jpnSearchText: 残念だったなチビ。

engChrName: Grr. So what if you're old enough to drink? You don't have to rub it in!
engSearchText:
Grr. So what if you're old enough to drink? You don't
have to rub it in!
jpnChrName: むっ、先に２０歳になったからって……！
jpnSearchText: むっ、先に２０歳になったからって……！

engChrName: For a couple of people who just went walkin' in blazing-ass heat, you sure don't sound worse for wear, somehow. What a miracle.
engSearchText:
For a couple of people who just went walkin' in
blazing-ass heat, you sure don't sound worse for
wear, somehow. What a miracle.
jpnChrName: 散々出歩いてきたのに元気だな、お前ら……
jpnSearchText: 散々出歩いてきたのに元気だな、お前ら……

engChrName: And here we are.
engSearchText: And here we are.
jpnChrName: ──お待たせしました。
jpnSearchText: ──お待たせしました。

engChrName: I call it a Charme de la Nuit.
engSearchText: I call it a Charme de la Nuit.
jpnChrName: その名も《シャルム・ニュイ》。
jpnSearchText: その名も《シャルム・ニュイ》。

engChrName: As I said, it's intended to invoke a quiet, sweet night. The kind you might spend, say, trading in dark, dangerous secrets.
engSearchText:
As I said, it's intended to invoke a quiet, sweet night.
The kind you might spend, say, trading in dark,
dangerous secrets.
jpnChrName: 繰り返しになるけど、テーマは 『危険な秘密を共有する、静かで甘美な夜』よ。
jpnSearchText:
繰り返しになるけど、テーマは
『危険な秘密を共有する、静かで甘美な夜』よ。

engChrName: Damn. That gradient you've pulled off looks killer.
engSearchText: Damn. That gradient you've pulled off looks killer.
jpnChrName: ほう、グラデーションが映えるな。
jpnSearchText: ほう、グラデーションが映えるな。

engChrName: The nocturnal sun adorned on top is also a very pleasing touch.
engSearchText:
The nocturnal sun adorned on top is also a very
pleasing touch.
jpnChrName: 浮かべた《夜の太陽》も 良いアクセントになっていますね。
jpnSearchText:
浮かべた《夜の太陽》も
良いアクセントになっていますね。

engChrName: It looks perfect. It came out just like you said it would!
engSearchText:
It looks perfect. It came out just like you said
it would!
jpnChrName: ベルモッティさんの目論見通りです！
jpnSearchText: ベルモッティさんの目論見通りです！

engChrName: We don't know that for sure, yet. Van, hon, I'll let you have the honor of being the first to taste it. Please, go on. You've earned it. ❤
engSearchText:
We don't know that for sure, yet. Van, hon, I'll let
you have the honor of being the first to taste it.
Please, go on. You've earned it. ❤
jpnChrName: ふふっ、じゃあまずは代表してヴァンちゃん。 どうぞ召し上がれ❤
jpnSearchText:
ふふっ、じゃあまずは代表してヴァンちゃん。
どうぞ召し上がれ❤

engChrName: Can't say I'm much for day drinkin', but I suppose this counts as part of the job. Well, bottoms up...
engSearchText:
Can't say I'm much for day drinkin', but I suppose
this counts as part of the job. Well, bottoms up...
jpnChrName: 飲むには早すぎるが、ありがたく頂くぜ。
jpnSearchText: 飲むには早すぎるが、ありがたく頂くぜ。

engChrName: That...is good. Real good.
engSearchText: That...is good. Real good.
jpnChrName: …………うまいな。
jpnSearchText: …………うまいな。

engChrName: Crisp sweetness, comforting sourness...it's sublime, Bermotti.
engSearchText:
Crisp sweetness, comforting sourness...it's
sublime, Bermotti.
jpnChrName: すっきりした甘さと、心地よい酸味が絶妙だ。
jpnSearchText: すっきりした甘さと、心地よい酸味が絶妙だ。

engChrName: You can taste the black pomegranate, too, and the grainy texture it adds is a fun touch.
engSearchText:
You can taste the black pomegranate, too, and the
grainy texture it adds is a fun touch.
jpnChrName: 黒ザクロの風味も効いてるし、 プチプチした食感が楽しいな。
jpnSearchText:
黒ザクロの風味も効いてるし、
プチプチした食感が楽しいな。

engChrName: Sounds like I have a winner, then. That's a relief.
engSearchText: Sounds like I have a winner, then. That's a relief.
jpnChrName: ウフフ、満足してもらえたようね。
jpnSearchText: ウフフ、満足してもらえたようね。

engChrName: But it only turned out so well because of everyone's hard work today. Thank you all again.
engSearchText:
But it only turned out so well because of everyone's
hard work today. Thank you all again.
jpnChrName: みんなのおかげで最高のカクテルを作れた。
jpnSearchText: みんなのおかげで最高のカクテルを作れた。

engChrName: I can now enter the tournament tonight at my absolute best.
engSearchText:
I can now enter the tournament tonight at my
absolute best.
jpnChrName: 万全のコンディションで大会に臨めるわ。
jpnSearchText: 万全のコンディションで大会に臨めるわ。

engChrName: Damn right, you can. I absolutely mean it when I say that with skills like yours, you're gonna knock 'em dead.
engSearchText:
Damn right, you can. I absolutely mean it when I say
that with skills like yours, you're gonna knock
'em dead.
jpnChrName: 実際お世辞抜きで、 お前の腕なら良い結果を残せると思うぜ。
jpnSearchText:
実際お世辞抜きで、
お前の腕なら良い結果を残せると思うぜ。

engChrName: Fingers crossed! I don't intend to pull any punches, that's for sure. I'm in it to win.
engSearchText:
Fingers crossed! I don't intend to pull any punches,
that's for sure. I'm in it to win.
jpnChrName: ありがと。 やるからには全力で勝ちを目指すわ。
jpnSearchText:
ありがと。
やるからには全力で勝ちを目指すわ。

engChrName: Okay, great, the old man's had his turn. Now when am I gonna get in on the action, huh?
engSearchText:
Okay, great, the old man's had his turn. Now when
am I gonna get in on the action, huh?
jpnChrName: なー、それは良いんだけどよ。 オレにも早く飲ませろや。
jpnSearchText:
なー、それは良いんだけどよ。
オレにも早く飲ませろや。

engChrName: ...I wish I could have some. *sigh*
engSearchText: ...I wish I could have some. *sigh*
jpnChrName: ……羨ましいです。
jpnSearchText: ……羨ましいです。

engChrName: Aww, no need to be sad! I'm making some for everyone!
engSearchText:
Aww, no need to be sad! I'm making some
for everyone!
jpnChrName: ああん、そんな悲しい顔しないで。 みんなにも同じ物を作ってあげるわ。
jpnSearchText:
ああん、そんな悲しい顔しないで。
みんなにも同じ物を作ってあげるわ。

engChrName: Of course, the ones for the minors here will be a little less twisty.
engSearchText:
Of course, the ones for the minors here will be a little
less twisty.
jpnChrName: 未成年の子たちにはもちろん、ノンアルコールでね。
jpnSearchText: 未成年の子たちにはもちろん、ノンアルコールでね。

engChrName: Yay! That's more like it! Thank you, Bermotti!
engSearchText: Yay! That's more like it! Thank you, Bermotti!
jpnChrName: わぁ、ありがとうございますっ。
jpnSearchText: わぁ、ありがとうございますっ。

engChrName: I'm glad you won't have to miss out after all, Feri.
engSearchText: I'm glad you won't have to miss out after all, Feri.
jpnChrName: 良かったですね、フェリちゃん。
jpnSearchText: 良かったですね、フェリちゃん。

engChrName: What about you, Risette? Want a sip?
engSearchText: What about you, Risette? Want a sip?
jpnChrName: お前さんはどうする？
jpnSearchText: お前さんはどうする？

engChrName: ...I suppose I can accept a drink, given the occasion.
engSearchText: ...I suppose I can accept a drink, given the occasion.
jpnChrName: ……せっかくですから、わたくしもいただきます。
jpnSearchText: ……せっかくですから、わたくしもいただきます。

engChrName: Although I would ask that mine be nonalcoholic as well, seeing as I'm on active duty.
engSearchText:
Although I would ask that mine be nonalcoholic as
well, seeing as I'm on active duty.
jpnChrName: 出向中の身なので、ノンアルコールですが。
jpnSearchText: 出向中の身なので、ノンアルコールですが。

engChrName: Van and the rest took a short break to enjoy Bermotti's specially prepared drinks.
engSearchText:
Van and the rest took a short break to enjoy
Bermotti's specially prepared drinks.
jpnChrName: それからヴァンたちは小休憩として ベルモッティに振る舞われたドリンクを味わった。
jpnSearchText:
それからヴァンたちは小休憩として
ベルモッティに振る舞われたドリンクを味わった。

engChrName: Soon enough, however, they got back to work.
engSearchText: Soon enough, however, they got back to work.
jpnChrName: その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。
jpnSearchText: <C1>その後、解決業務を再開したのだった。

engChrName: Quest Cocktail Crafting completed!
engSearchText: Quest Cocktail Crafting completed!
jpnChrName: クエスト【スペシャルカクテルの作成】を達成した！
jpnSearchText: <C1>クエスト【<C2>スペシャルカクテルの作成<C1>】を達成した！

engChrName: Received
engSearchText: Received
jpnChrName: 報酬としてミラの振り込みを確認した。
jpnSearchText: 報酬として<C2><C0>ミラの振り込みを確認した。

engChrName: Van's pickup truck is parked here.
engSearchText: Van's pickup truck is parked here.
jpnChrName: ヴァンのピックアップトラックが 駐車してある。
jpnSearchText:
ヴァンのピックアップトラックが
駐車してある。

engChrName: Ugh. When I get back, I'm gonna have to give you a full wash, top to bottom.
engSearchText:
Ugh. When I get back, I'm gonna have to give you a
full wash, top to bottom.
jpnChrName: ちっ、帰ったら 外も中も丸洗いしねえとな……
jpnSearchText:
ちっ、帰ったら
外も中も丸洗いしねえとな……

engChrName: Why? It still looks good as new to me.
engSearchText: Why? It still looks good as new to me.
jpnChrName: ？　まだ全然ピカピカに見えますけど……
jpnSearchText: ？　まだ全然ピカピカに見えますけど……

engChrName: Well, it IS covered in sand.
engSearchText: Well, it IS covered in sand.
jpnChrName: あはは……砂埃を 被ってはいますからね。
jpnSearchText:
